review_text: This is nice and lightweight, but if you have any dry/texture patches that need hydration this is not the one for you. I have super oily skin, but with dry patches around my nose and dehydration. This “moisturizer” does not do a good job at all at moisturizing. When you put it on, it is very smooth and makes your skin feel nice, but that’s it. It’s more of a “skin smoother” than a moisturizer, I feel like it doesn’t penetrate or moisturizer at all. So if you are anything but just straight up oily (just oily, not oily because your skin is actually dehydrated) then I don’t recommend it.

I have oily skin that’s prone to acne, and I’ve tried so many moisturizers but they all break me out. I use an acne face wash which dries my face and makes it look flakey, but after I started using this my skin is so soft and plump and I don’t break out because of this. This is a good pick for you ladies with oily skin who need something to moisturize their face without breaking them out.

This moisturizer has changed the game for me. I use this in tandem with the toner made for oily combination skin and it is wonderful! I get very oily on my forehead, nose, chin, smile lines, and occasionally cheeks. I find that using this in the morning right after I wash my face and tone really helps with my makeup application. Generally, I mainly only use this product in the morning because at night I apply a Vitamin E oil to my face. Do not think that you need to use a lot of this to cover your entire face, 1 and a half pumps is really all you need. I prefer to blend my moisturizer in with a brush and I find that using that method with this moisturizer really ensures that all the product has been rubbed into my skin properly. I have been using this moisturizer for 4 years and I go through about 2 bottles a year. It really is a good investment into your skin. Plus, if you have a Sephora near you, you can just ask for a sample! I was able to convince my best friend to try this moisturizer and now she loves it too!
Best moisturizer for daily use, make up sits so well on it. Does not make u oily or sticky. Holy grail !!
it feels like water on your skin, not greasy at all and it does its work.
I only use this on my t zone and it keeps my foundation from getting greasy throughout the day. I really like it.
This has been my go-to since college! I’ve tried many (MANY) others over the years, but always come back to this one. And everyone guesses my age to be much younger than I am! Win!

I used this for a week and liked how it brung my skin back to life after shaving my face trying to get rid of deadskin. I have oil skin and it really balance it out. I will be buying the bigger version, just wish it came in a larger jar size
This product feels so good on my skin. I feel it has also helped me with my acne.

I had high hopes for this moisturizer. I have oily skin but this lotion dried my skin out so bad. I had to apply 3  layers before my face didn’t feel tight anymore. I went back to Sephora and the helpful ladies suggested another brand which I currently like much better.
review_title: Extremely drying - even on oily skin

review_text: Great for my sensitive acne prone skin
This was to replace my Mary Kay velocity gel that they don’t make anymore. I really liked this!
I love the regular moisturizer.  I bought the gel to try, and on a trip to Colorado, it failed.  My face was dry and itchy, not soothed and calm as the regular lotion. I won’t buy this again
Clinique is the only moisturizer I will use.The gel is amazing moisturizers without causing any skin irritation and is easy to work with when applying makeup

this moisturizer was very dry and and I’m usually oily/combo so when I put this on and it dried... it DRIED DRIED like I didn’t feel it do anything hydrating to my face even with all these reviews I’m extremely disappointed in this product I had to exchange it quick because I didn’t want a dry face.

I tried the mini size of this product to try out because my oily skin is rather particular about moisturizers. This product was moisturizing without being heavy on my skin and it had a light scent to it. Unfortunately, I am giving 4 stars because I had an increase in shininess/oiliness of my skin during the daytime while using this product.
I have used this product in the past.  I can’t recall why I stopped using it. It is amazing! I have oily combo skin and this definitely hydrates the face after washing and cleansing.
Perfect for oily skin! A little goes a long way..half of a dime size amount is just enough.

I bought this because it was recommended for my skin type. (Combo). It is not moisturizing at all. It has the velvety texture as a primer, not a moisturizer. The ingredient list is similar to some primers as well. Returned it after one use as it seemed to be a waste of money.
my skin is oily so this is perfect for my skin!

I have combination skin, but the dry patches are very dry. I love this product because its lightweight and moisturized without being oily! I use it every day on my face and you only need a small amount! I got a small sample with my points and as soon as I ran out I went and bought some!

I love this moisturizer, and have bought the normal size of it at least three or four times now. This past purchase I decided to try the “Value“ size, knowing that I would eventually use it all. I have to say, while the gel is the same, it just was a little odd. The bottle was wrapped in a baggie, and had no unit carton as do the standard ones. I also ordered the new Hydrating Jelly in the standard size, and that came in a normal carton. My main issue with the “Value“ size is that it wasn’t anywhere near full up!!! I don’t know quite how much is actually in the bottle I got, but it definitely disappoints to see this larger bottle not be full. Perhaps you are getting the 6.7fl.oz and it is just in a larger bottle to seem like you are getting even more, but either way, I will definitely only be buying the normal standard size from now on. There was just a weird vibe with the “Value“ size! PS You can see the comparison in a photo I have attached, and the plastic bag behind the bottles.

I’ve purchased this moisturizer numerous times. It sinks right into the skin and doesn’t feel greasy at all. I love that it doesn’t contain any added fragrance and keeps me hydrated. Also, it comes in a pump form which keeps the sensitive ingredients safe and also it’s very sanitary. I really don’t understand why most moisturizers still come in jars! I only wish it had more anti-aging and brightening benefits.

I bought this moisturizer years ago and i loved it and repurchased it multiple times. the last time i bought it it broke me out with all these little bumps all over my face and when i put it on to go to bed i woke up in the morning with a layer or moisturizer sitting on my skin. I do have oily sensitive skin so i’m not sure if they reformulated this product but it does not work for my skin anymore...
I have used this moisturizer for a couple years and love it.  The gel is the perfect thing for my oily skin!
Absolutely love this product! I’ve been using it for years and even at 32, it’s the perfect morning gel for the hot Florida humidity.
Love this product gives you enough hydration without feeling heavy
The only moisturizer that doesn’t breakout my super sensitive skin. Will use forever. Light enough for summer and works during the winter months too.
I bought this because I wanted a moisturizer that wasn’t too heavy and wouldn’t clog my pores but it doesn’t even begin to moisturize!
Favorite moisturizer. I’ve used the lotion for years but wanted to try the gel! It’s just as great.
thought that this would be good since i was using other clinique products but this has made my skin so dry and so uncomfortable to wear. Wouldn’t recommend.
Love this lotion. It’s not too heavy, doesn’t make you break out and great for everyday. I use the gel in the summer and this in the winter. I have oily skin.
Je l’ai eu en échantillon et dès que je l’ai finit, j’ai acheté le gros format : ma peau est de plus en plus douce, elle absorbe vite et il n’en faut pas beaucoup <3

This is my all-time favourite moisturizer. Leaves your skin feeling bouncy and supple. The formula is grease-free and keeps any dryness at bay. If you’re oily or acne prone then you’ll love this. I simply won’t face the day without it.

i have combo oily skin and i use this as my nighttime moisturizer bc it doesn’t have spf (the one downside). but it makes my skin so soft and it absorbs quickly without feeling greasy - and i always know when a moisturizer is greasy bc i wear glasses so i will ALWAYS feel it on my nose which is so annoying. but this doesn’t do that! i bought the biggest size bc i had a sample of it before this and i loved it from the get go.
one of my all time favorites, great for mixed skin. oily/dry
This goes perfect with my oily skin! Makes my skin feel soft and hydrated without making me feel like a grease ball.
I have super dry skin around nose and lips...this works well . Feels like my skin just drinks it up so I do use heavily , makeup goes on perfectly and I don’t get the dry flakes
my favorite moisturizer ever! not too oily but still very moisturizing and it always makes my skin feel so smooth in the morning!
she loves it, my 58 year old grandma loves it, she sayed it made her ski n feel great

This has always been a great go-to moisturizer for me and it has never given me problems. It’s hydrating, light, and doesn’t leave my skin feeling icky. As someone with combination skin, this is great because it is gel-based. I tried the lotion version and it was way too oily for my skin and caused me to break out. I usually only use this during the summer time because it is light on my skin. I don’t recommend using this in in the winter as it might not be moisturizing enough. It is a great value for the amount that comes in the large bottle. I have recommended this to a couple of people already and they all feel the same. Will definitely continue to use this product!
this moisturizer has helped so much with my oily skin, it keeps it well moisturized but also controls my oil. the texture on my face has been a lot better too

This is my holy grail moisturizer. I have oily/combo skin and this doesn’t make me feel like a greasy mess. Whenever I wear this under my makeup, my makeup looks so much better and smoother. It gives the perfect amount of moisture to my face. It absorbs very quickly and makes my face very soft without being greasy. I’ve been using this for almost 3 years now! Totally worth the price for me!
I have combination skin, but this is truly for more oily types. It has a very watery consistency, which ironically doesn’t feel hydrating. Didn’t experience any significant results.

I bought this moisturizer for the first time years ago as a tween, with the accompanying 3 step system for oily combo skin, which makes your skin super manageable by the way,  and I fell in love with the product. Once my 6 months on Accutane ended, I needed a less thick but still hydrating and oil controlling face moisturizer for under makeup. And this is it. It isn’t super expensive, it has no scent, and blends in super well. It makes your skin have that smooth and full feeling of the outside of a water balloon. You will see results within a week or so. I do hate the bottle shape though, as leftover product always is stuck in there, so one less star for that because it is annoying. Other than that, this is a great product!!

This is the only moisturizer I’ve ever found that didn’t make my face oily or greasy. It goes on smooth and absorbed into your face so well. I’ve been using this for at least 5 years now and it’s the absolute best.

This is my favourite moisturizer by far (I’ve tried tatcha, drunk elephant, etc). It’s super lightweight, non-greasy/tacky, sinks into the skin quickly, & really works well with my oily skin type without adding to it. I find my skin more balanced & less oily on the days I wear this. It’s great!
Feels weirdly itchy and oily on skin after applying
Did nothing special for my skin at all. Very runny and does not sink in, just sits on top.
My holy grail moisturizer ❤️
Anyone with oily skin and in need of an occasional face moisturizer should look no further because you’ve found it. At a bit of a price, but in my opinion, the best so far.
Love Love L O V E this moisturizer. It hydrates my dry skin without feeling heavy. I love how quickly it sinks into my skin.
I like the texture that feel a bit like aloe vera gel but a little bit more liquid. It hydrates well my oily skin. Honestly, it does not changes anything on skin but it doesn’t do bad neither.
goes on non greasy and stays on all day - through sweat and tears....would def buy this again.
Love love love this non-oily moisturizer!!!
Pretty decent moisturizer i think it’s greatcolor the summertime because it’s very light and drieds down but for the winter id need some thicker. Sample size last a decent time period

I received a 100 pt. perk of this and I loved it.  When I purchased the full size it caused skin irritation.  My skin has been extra sensitive lately so I can’t really fault the product.  I love the consistency and how it hydrated my skin.

I’m an oil slick on the average day but my skin still somehow winds up tight and itchy after using some products. Redeemed my beauty insider points for a deluxe sample and this was exactly what my skin needed! I purchased it as soon as the sample ran low with the cleanser to pair. These will now be staple products of mine.

I have extremely oily skin and have been trying to find a daily moisturizer that doesn’t leave me greasy. This is the one! I love that it comes out of a pump so it’s hygienic. It also goes great under my makeup! It’s very reasonably priced compared to all of the other oil free moisturizes out there.

Received this as a sample. This product provided quickly absorbed moisture, however, both my teen and myself broke out terribly from it. After more carefully looking at the ingredients I see it contains dyes and a number of chemicals we avoid with our sensitive skin.  Fragrance free is great. Close Bowie just needs to go a bit further.
It makes my skin feel soft and hydrating. And I like the consistency of the moisturizer. It is worth the money to buy this product.

I was excited to try this because I absolutely love Clinique for foundation but I was extremely disappointed w/ this product. I have sensitive/combination skin, which is oily in my T-zone w/ dry patches on my cheeks
I am in love with the way this feels on my skin. I have very oily skin and this doesn’t make my skin feel more oil.
This product is moisturizing but it made me break out which is not suppose to happen when an oily combo face meets a gel moisturizer.
soaked in and kept skin smooth for the day
Amazing product totally recommend it I love it so muchhhhhhh

This is a perfect lightweight moisturizer for those with oily or oily combo skin! I love to use it during the warm months when is humid outside To prevent my face from looking shiny. I have combo skin and during the winter months I do feel like I need a little extra moisture on my skin so a good way to complement this is to use a serum under it to avoid any dry patches. This moisturizer sinks into my skin fast and it doesn’t feel sticky. overall this is a good moisturizer for those with oily and acne prone skin looking for a lightweight moisturizer.
This is the only moisturizer I will use. Everything else feels like it sits on top of my face, but this really absorbs quickly. I use 1-2 pumps all over my face and neck.

My mom has the oiliest skin imaginable and shes never used anything beauty related as shes a very simple woman. But this moisturizer has changed her life. Ive never seen her stick to a beauty product like this before and she swears by it. Its great for mature and oily skin and i can tell its doing wonders for her.

I live by this product. Since I was 14 I have struggled with cystic acne along my jaw line, chin, and on my cheeks. I have literally tired everything...proactiv, over the counter topical products, as well as numerous face washes and leave on spot treatments. All of the above would either work for a while, or actually make my skin more sensitive and inflamed. A couple years ago my mom recommended Clinique’s face makeup to me, and I decided to buy this product along with their foundation. After a week of washing my face twice a day and using a couple of pumps this gel afterwards, my skin issues virtually vanished. I no longer struggle with painful, deep cystic breakouts along my chin, jawline, and on my cheeks, and the redness in my skin had greatly diminished as well. I ACTUALLY get compliments on my skin, where I never have before. This product leaves my skin feeling moisturized and cool; not like many other moisturizers which tend to leave skin feeling greasy, and heavy. Your skin will literally drink this gel, and thank you for it! One tip I have for people who really struggle with sensitive, acne ridden skin is to use this product in conjunction with Glam Glow’s SUPERCLEANSE Clearing Cream-to-Foam Cleanser. There must be something about the combination of high quality ingredients and the fact that both products have been formulated for sensitive skin, that makes this combination such a winner for acne prone skin. Either way, buy this moisturizing gel, and I promise that you won’t be disappointed with the results- clear, even, beautiful skin :)
review_title: Solved my acne problems for good...

review_text: This is now the only moisturizer I use for Summer. In Winter I switch to the lotion. This has been a lifesaver for my skin, which tends to get really oily in the warmer months. I’ve never found a Gel that actually makes my face feel dry and soft until now. It’s very soothing as well for my sensitive skin. I will keep on purchasing this most definitely. I love and trust this brand.

So I have EXTREMELY oily skin. I always have, and it appears I always will. But oily skin does need to be moisturized from time to time. And in those times I have tried countless moisturizers, from drug store to very high end brands, but to no avail to my almost mirror like forehead. But I think I have found the answer. I bought the smaller size because you can’t trust anything these days, and I’m shook. When I put this on it doesn’t feel greasy or weirdly sticky or even silicone like. My face doesn’t feel heavy or tight at all. My skins almost- dare I say- normal. Hours after initial application and I no longer reflect light, only my highlight does now.

This was the first moisturizer I tried and I absolutely loved it! It’s thin which I loved but it still hydrates your skin! It’s amazing! You definitely feel and see the difference. This was also the first and only product I’ve tried from Clinique and I highly recommend this product! It doesn’t clog your pores nor does it feel sticky. As for the smell, it’s very subtle.
Really love this product! It doesn’t feel heavy on my skin and I don’t have to use a lot. Tried it first with a trial size. Now just purchased the big size.
Awesome product! Real results. Always comfortable.

This moisturizer is so light and easy to wear. I used it both day and night. I received a small sample of this gel two years ago and have used it since. We travel and live in the north during summer, Florida in winter. It works well wherever I am. I like the 1.7 oz size because of traveling. I am 71 with oily/combination skin.
I have combo skin. This is my go to face lotion. Perfectly moisturizing and never feels oily.
Very nice light moisturizer for summer, best used on oily skin as it is very light.
This product is really good! I have oily skin, but I don’t feel super oily after using this. It makes my skin super soft and I only have to use 3 pumps to get my whole face and neck. Love it!
The gel is great for moisturizing my oily skin but not making it greasy. Love it!

I’ve tried other moisturizers and this is the only one I keep coming back to! It works so nicely with my skin, never breaks me out, and keeps my skin hydrated. I have oily/acne prone skin, and I’ve found when I switch up my moisturizer my skin does not like it! I’m a die hard fan now.
MY FAVE! I’ve gone through two 4.2 oz’s, a travel size, and a sample size. I love this stuff! I have normal to dry sensitive skin so it feels amazing on a fresh cleaned face.
Love this moisturizer!  This 4.2 oz container lasts forever and it keeps me moisturized all day with just a single pump.  I’m acne prone, so the gel is great for my skin.
this is a classic and a goodie, worth every penny. perfect for those who have oily skin, this will never leave you greasy but at the same time your skin feels hydrated. best part of all is its vegan

10/10 Highly recommend!!! I have oily/oily combination sensitive skin including occasional atopic dermatitis (excema). I had stopped using moisturizer for YEARS because everything clogged my pores, irritated my skin, or caused a layer of sebum to form on my face. This stuff does no such thing!!! My Clinique consultant introduced this to me and I absolutely love it. It’s everything you want from a moisturizer: non-greasy, oil-free, soaks evenly into skin, cooling and soothing, and makes your skin baby-soft! It’s also evened out my usually pale-pink complexion and never irritated my skin. I now have no more bumps or red patches. It’s also a great addition to a flawless beauty routine! I would recommend one thing to people who use this for the first time though: cleanse your face and start with a little less than a pea-sized amount! This moisturizer goes VERY far and if you overdo it you may not like the way it feels and also waste moisturizer. I only use about a pea-sized amount every day total, and that’s for both my morning and evenign skincare routine!
review_title: GAME CHANGER!!! Calmed my sensitive skin!!

review_text: Literally best moisturizer ever! I never write reviews. Had to for this. Found a sample of this stuff that I never used. Just found it and decided you try it. I’m very oily and acne prone. Stopped consuming dairy and started doing clay masks and cleansing with African black soap. This is super drying so my skin texture was rough. I use ddmg in the morning after black soap wash while face is still damp. I pat it in. Skin clear and smooth in a week. Best thing is no oily girl breakouts and much more improved smooth skin texture. Will purchase the full size now!
review_title: Dramaticall Improved skin texture and cleared acne

review_text: Absolutely love this product! I have combination skin, were my skin can get very oily or very dry. This moisturizer is perfect for me because it’s not too heavy at all, it’s thin and leaves my skin feeling moisturized! I highly recommend it
This is the best moisturizer for oily skin!

This is the MOST amazing moisturizer in the world !!! It absorbs into the skin super fast, doesn’t leave a film like many other moisturizers do. My skin was so dry before I started using the gel. My face would literally peel and within two uses the peeling was gone ! I use it before bed and in the morning before make up and it does not mess with my complexion products. One bottle lasts forever ! I got mine 3 or 4 months ago and it is still halfway full! And last and most amazing has not broken me out at all !!!!! I love love love LOVE this and would 100% recommend!
The best moisturizer I’ve ever used! I have oily skin and it keeps my skin feeling hydrated without the heavy feeling that other moisturizers leave. My go-to, especially in the summer.

I overlooked this product until I received it as a free sample. I loved it so much I went out and brought the full size. This product is light, but highly moisturizing. It does not leave any sticky or oily feeling, plus it is oil free! It leaves my face feeling hydrated and most importantly so smooth to the touch! I tend to get oily around my T-zone and super dry around my cheeks, but somehow it got rid of the dry flakes on my cheeks and managed not be oily. My skin is truly dramatically different for the better.

Switched to this from Tarte’s Drink of H2O moisturizer for cost reasons and I don’t regret it. It’s about 80% as good for 50% of the price. It doesn’t make my oily skin better, but it also doesn’t make it worse, which is fine with me as I use a face wash and toner for oily skin before I apply it. Hydrates perfectly, smells nice, and doesn’t make me any oilier - for the price, that’s all I need.
Perfect moisturizer for combination skin

This is the only moisturizer I’ve found that doesn’t break me out or leave me looking oily, but also is moisturizing!! As someone with acne-prone combination skin this is all I can wish for in a moisturizer.
lightweight, hydrating, and quickly sinks into skin! great moisturizer underneath makeup, or for light hydration during my summer nightly routine.

I order this for my mother. She loves Clinique and this is her favorite moisturizer. This is lightweight so it is perfect for every season especially the hot days of summer. The gel formula is ideal for oily skin. This can be used day and night — mom likes to keep it simple.
Perfect for oily/combination skin! Helps with breakouts and doesn’t leave you with a greasy feeling!
Love this moisturizer! It’s not too heavy and does not make your face oily.

it’s a good moisturizer. pretty lightweight and disappears into skin super fast. but the smell is just awful. it’s the opposite of what you would want your skin care to feel like to be honest. still on the search for the holy Grail gel moisturizer.

I received a sample of this with an order and I have to say that I am IMPRESSED; not only did I use this under my foundation but I used it on top as well as a test, just to meld everything together and I have to say that my foundation and skin look absolutely flawless. I usually always have a problem with my foundation not looking quite right and am very self conscious of build up around my nose and my around my forehead. I can’t even.for reference I used nars sheerglow skinfeels good skin tint coverfxenhancingdrops and mixed benefit porefessional primer into my foundation.Amazing.

For a long time I really liked this product because it was super lightweight which was perfect, but I have oily/ dehydrated skin so it didn’t do enough so I felt the need to keep reapplying and when I woke up my face felt a little tight because it absorbed too quickly. Overall pretty good especially for the amount you get for the price but I would recommend a more hydrating one if you have dehydrated skin. Would give 3.5 if I could
Moisturizes well when I first put it on... But is absorbed quickly and leaves my face still feeling dry
Its not anything special but this is my daily mostrizuer its really absorbs into the skin but not for dry skin so i wont be using this in the winter
This is my all time favorite skin care product ever it lasts so long and works so well I recommend it to anyone with semi-dry skin
My favorite moisturizer.  It is light and perfect for summer!
I have sensitive, acne proneness skin.. this moisturizer has worked perfectly with my skin type.
This is my go to product!! It is so hydrating and moisturizing and it has helped so much with my dry skin! It is amazing
I love this! I can feel results right away. Make a my skin so smooth.
In less than a week, it saved my skin!
I have really dry skin, especially because I live in a desert area, and this is PERFECT. I struggled to find a  moisturizer that works on my dry/oily skin and this worked for me! Highly recommend!

I added this product to my skincare routine a couple of months ago and it’s amazing. I have oily skin and this is just the perfect moisturizer for me. It helps retain my skin’s bright, youthful glow and as it is summer time, it doesn’t feel heavy or greasy on my skin. I’m interested in seeing how this will work in the winter (I get dry in the colder months). My only gripe is i got the standard size a month ago and it is already half-way gone, so I’ll be purchasing the larger size and pray to the skin care gods that it’ll last a longer time.
Does not control my very oily skin but the hydration is great and very refreshing. no scent.

I got this in a Clinique starter kit and fell in love with it. I like this as a daytime moisturizer, especially in the spring and summer months because it is nice and light and not heavy on the skin, which is important to me because I have oily skin. It sinks into the skin quickly and moisturizes well. I personally like something a little heavier at night, though. The price is reasonable for prestige skincare. I will continue to repurchase.

so far the only moisturizer i’ve ever really stuck to. i have oily skin so for fall,spring, and summer its perfect.the only times i feel i need a little more lotion type moisturizer is in the winter since this does dry fast.

It’s okay but I expect a LOT more for this price. If you’re in doubt at all go with the lotion instead my skin is combination and doesn’t even get too dry but the gel just isn’t enough to be a moisturizer in my book
Great for combination skin! Very little scent, and glides on nicely with no sticky after affect. A great size for the cost!
This product saved my extremely dry skin the in the winter. Feels so good, smooth and light and healing.
This moisturizer is light on my skin. It leaves it feeling hydrated all day long. It helps keep my skin from being as oily as it usually is.

Simply the best moisturiser for oily skin out there. I’ve used it along with the liquid cleanser and toner for 20  years. Calms skin and moisturizers perfectly without any slick feel. Absorbs immediately and leaves skin feeling clean and soft. LOVE IT.

I grabbed this product thinking it was the lotion, and I’m so glad that I did!  The gel works great with my combination skin!  It provides a ton of moisture without clogging my pores. And you can’t beat the price!
One of the first high end moisturizers I ever tried and one I constantly go back to! Very light weight and keeps my skin smooth.
This is a ride or die for me! Have not found another moisturizer that compares to this. Btw I have oily skin
This is perfect for my combination skin. Most people recommend the lotion but the lotion seemed to be too hydrating in places and never would dry, but the gel works great all over my face.

I got this mini size with my rewards and fell in love. I use it every night and every morning on my face. Since then, I have had no new blemishes and reduced redness. I have dry skin, so being moisturized has always been really important and I finally found the product that works!
review_title: So moisturizing and makes my skin soft

review_text: This is a great everyday moisturizer. Very light weight, and hydrating, but not greasy. I usually buy the tiny $5 ones because you only need a little bit for each use, and it’s lasts me a while. Plus great for keeping in your purse!

i love this moisturizer, it’s lightweight and not scented, perfect for my acne prone and combination oily skin. However, this is just wayyyy to over priced. I bought the 6.7oz which cost like $40 and it doesn’t even last a long time.
review_title: Perfect for my skin but overpriced

review_text: I absolutely love how moisturizing this is. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and steers me away from dry skin. Totally worth every penny!!

I love Clinique products, and this moisturizer continues on to impress me. I’ve tried many, many different moisturizers, creams, and lotions, and this one is 100% in my top 3. Days my skin is feeling a little more oily, the gel moisturizer is ideal. My makeup goes on perfectly after this product, too. I love it, I recommend, and I couldn’t live without it!
Very mild, effective moisturizer! I love the gel rather than the lotion for sure! There’s no scent which is fine. I prefer other moisturizers over this one but this one does a great job regardless!
Great moisturizer for oily skin. Leave you feel soft and hydrated but without the greasy feeling of most moisturizers.

Sooo in love with this moisturizer! My skin gets really dry and patchy, but since I’ve added this to my routine I’ve had NO problems! Would totally recommend this to others. The only catch is it’s kind of spendy for me, but a little bit goes a long way.
I have dry and oily skin so this is the best for me. It hidrates without leaving my skin oily! Love it
I have been using this for years.  It is a great moisturizer.

I have oily/combo skin, this moisturizer has been the holy grail! I use it during the day and it’s been able to combat my oiliness, I still get the normal shininess around my nose. I live in Orlando, FL, humidity city. It’s also lightweight.

My skin gets oily around my noise and most moisturizers increase the oiliness, but this works very well. It is hydrating, but doesn’t make my skin oily at all! I got one mini size as a free sample, but had to buy the big size once I ran out!
This lotion is one of my favorites. I have sensitive, oily, acne prone skin, and it works great for me. It also works well under my make-up.
I like this for my morning skin routine. It melts right into the skin without leaving a greasy feeling.
I switch between the gel in the summer and lotion in the winter... this stuff it’s absolutely amazing especially for the oily combo skin.
Makes your face feel like a baby’s bottom! Does not leave me greasy or oily! Just soft and smooth!

Great moisturizer. The largest size is really worth it as it can last me months. It doesn’t break me out, and it moisturizes my skin nicely. It’s not oily either. I was switching moisturizer for so long, now I found the best one!
This is in my travel bag and I love using this. I have oily skin and I feel like it really penetrates the skin quickly which I love. I would definitely buy the full size of this and use everyday.

I wanted to love this product due to its hype in reviews but it has a major downfall. The dewing texture after applying i absolutely love, but It kinda smells like motor oil when you apply it. the smell disappears very quickly so that’s not my man concern. My biggest downfall for this product is how greasy you get in a matter of an hour. My cheeks are dry as the Sahara desert, dry patches and all. And my T zone is oily. So this moisturizer on my cheeks was amazing. But my T zone area gets SUPER oily in a matter of an hour. I mean i went from a beautiful dewy beach glow to a filthy McDonald’s grease fryer in a matter of max an hour. It’s gross. And if you put it under make up, even with flawless prep and application, it will all just slide right off. So don’t dear touch your face, all your hard work will just come off as if your finger was a sticker
I used the Clinique regular moisturizer under foundation for years which was ok. The gel is fantastic for wearing under foundation or alone. It’s super smooth, you won’t regret it.
review_title: Best moisturizer for use under foundation!!

review_text: This is my everyday moisturizer. Absorbs in seconds, isn’t greasy, doesn’t cause breakouts. It goes under makeup well and keeps my skin moisturized. No scent to irritate skin. Perfect! You’ll love it.

I was always hesitant to try this moisturizer out, but this has been the only one able to tame my acne, redness and brightness. I’ve seen a huge difference in my skin ever since I started using it and I love it. It will be a staple in my skincare routine. I’m on my 2nd bottle now but it lasts forever. If you have oily combination skin then this guy is for you!
Works great use it every morning

I recommend this as a moisturizing makeup remover! This is the only product I’ve used that gently removes my makeup. I suggest this because I don’t always have a chance to do my full nightly routine, so being able to lay in bed watching Michael Scott be the worlds best boss while I remove my makeup with this and a cloth is a WIN WIN WIN

I got this a 100 point perk. I use to have very bacon grease oily skin and something changed I was have super dry flaky skin with a little oily and this saved my face without returning it to super oily!!! I’m in love and will be buying the full size!
review_title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE! DONT PASS THIS UP!!!!!

review_text: I tried incorporating this product into my routine since i needed a moisturizer and i heard great reviews about it. But this broke me out really badly. I do have acne prone skin but this product gave me break outs on my forehead and cheeks, where i dont usually have them. Anyway this one did not work for me.
hydrates my skin..lives it smooth..regulate the excessive oiliness of the t-zone in my complex skin

I had heard great things about this so I had high expectations. Unfortunately, it is not something i would repurchase. I started breaking out when i got this product but didn’t pay much attention to it because i thought it was something else. After the 3rd day I realized that it was this product that was making me break out like crazy. I get 1-2 breakouts a month so I was caught a little off guard with how my skin reacted to this moisturizer. It simply did not work for me. The pictures are what my skin looks like after 3 days of using the product

Nothing else to say except this is MY cream.  I got a sample few months ago in a store, than a bought the mini size to make sure I liked it, and now I have the big one and use it everyday.  Texture is smooth, you need a little tiny amount to cover the whole face and neck, and it doesn’t dry out my skin as some people said.  I would recommand it to anybody, especially with the summer coming!

So perfect! DDML is too much for me even with my dry skin. This has the same emollient and moistizing qualities with a better delivery. Its light and easy to apply with quicker more even absorption. I’m in love! Its what I always wished DDML would be everytime k came back to try it again.

I believe this is the size I received for 100 points. I absolutely love this, it feels so nice going on and is easily absorbed, not too heavy, it makes my skin feel so much more moisturized and it will still work great when it’s very warm out. I also mix my Marc Jacobs dew drop coconut highlighter with it and it mixes very well and looks great. I have very sensitive skin and have had absolutely no issues with it. Highly recommend. I actually just purchased the largest size you can get as I am so pleased with it.

I have super oily skin and have been trying to fine a moisturizer that doesn’t make my face feel like a total oily slick. This is the only thing I’ve found that works! It’s light weight, but gives my skin the moisture it needs without making my skin feel greasy or clogging my pores. I had bought this back in November and I still have half a bottle left, so it does last a while and worth the price! I’ll definitely be buying this over and over again!
The only thing I can use with my oily skin. Absolutely amazing. I’ve used this for 15+ years and will use for the next 100.

I absolutely love this stuff. I have very sensitive and finicky skin which is oily/combo. I use this every day and have for the past two-ish years. And, at least for my skin, it works wonders. It absorbs into the skin so well and doesn’t leave a sticky film like a lot of other moisturizers. And it’s so light I can’t even feel it. But I know it works because if I miss a day, my skin feels dry and a bit itchy for at least a few hours. And this has really helped keep my skin hydrated and less oily. Also, the 4 oz. bottle lasted me about a year and a half, so you get your money’s worth. If you have a similar skin type I would definitely recommend trying it (maybe even just the mini size to see how it reacts with your skin).

I have combination/oily skin and this helps moisturize without drying my dry patches and prevents my t-zone from becoming super oily throughout the day.  Leaves my skin with soft, smooth texture and great base before make up application.

After one day of using this I loved it and still do. My skin had some kind of allergic reaction to a face wash because my skin is so sensitive it turned my face so dry. This Gel made my face feel so relieved and smooth I seriously am grateful for it.

At my 2nd bottle, it lasts you like forever. The largest size takes me 6-8 months to use it up although I use it 2-3 times per day. It absorbs so fast making me feel like this is nothing on my face but at the same time,all the white chapped skin on my face calm and disappear. I never ever can wear any makeup without applying this moisturizer first since it hydrates my skin, keep my makeup last long without any stickiness or oily at all.

Great for dry, red irritated skin,When I use it, it makes my skin feel nice and moisturized (I have dry - very dry flaky skin) I use at night and I always wake up with a fresh plump, hydrated, calm, soothing face because of this product, love it! (Very my extra dry girls use the cream vs this lotion+)
Great lightweight lotion. Perfect if you add on other layers in your skincare regime.
review_title: Perfect any time of the day.

review_text: amazing moisturizing gel, adds a nice layer without breaking me out

If you’re looking for a gel that is lighter than other moisturizers, this is a fantastic one. I regularly come back to this product when I try something else out because I know this to be a tried and true moisturizer. It has a subtle, pleasant smell, is easily spreadable, soaks into your skin quickly (nice before makeup application), and feels good. I have never found this to clog my pores or irritate my skin in any way.
Lightweight formula that is perfect to apply before makeup primer. Gives just enough moisture without getting oily throughout the day
I’ve oily and and acne prone skin and hands down to this moisturizer. It is amazing. It absorbs so fast and it makes your sling super soft.

I have oily, acne prone skin that sometimes gets dry around the nose and mouth area. This was recommended to me at the Clinique counter, and they said it works great with acne and oily skin types. It just felt really greasy on my face and made my skin even more oily. I much prefer the Clinique Moisture Surge to this. The Moisture surge feels more lightweight and moisturizes without making my oily skin feel greasy and doesn’t cause me to break out. I gave this 2 stars instead of just 1 because it didn’t break my face out so it’s not completely terrible.
review_title: Too Greasy Feeling, Made Oily Skin Worse

review_text: This product is marketed for oily skin but I love the cooling effect the gel has on my dry and red-prone skin. The gel calms my morning facial redness and smooths out my skin before makeup really well. I started getting some breakouts shortly after I started using the product and realized the culprit was the silicone ingredient (which is why it smooths out nicely under makeup!). Silicone isn’t a bad ingredient but a warning to be sure that your face wash has a sulfate or that you are diligent at using a good face toner or you will get pore buildup like I did! I tweaked my cleansing routine and it stopped being an issue.
review_title: Nice but be aware of ingredient list!

review_text: I love this moisturizer! I’ve been using it for about 2 years now abs I can’t stop buying it. I have very oily acne prone skin and it’s never made me break out. It’s actually made my face feel softer also. I’ll always continue to buy this.

I have oily combination skin and I love it! so refreshing and light weight, absorbs quickly and keeps my skin moisturized! Although it is really dry where I live in the winter and sometimes I do feel the need to reapply after 6 hours or so. In the spring and summertime when it’s more humid it would definitely work even better!
Love this very hydrating and soaks right in my skin
Good moisturizer for the price. Does not break me out or cause redness.
I was skeptical, but I LOVE this stuff! I swear I’ve used this or the lotion before and didn’t like it, but I’m now a firm believer. So glad I picked it back up for a second chance.

First of all, you get so much product for the price! It is so nice to get a good moisturizer at sephora for this price:) But there’s more: It works wonder! The gel is hydrating and still matifies oily skin. My skinis sensitive and oily and it loves this gel. It is so refreshing and nice, mostly during summer! Anyways, i would recommand this to anyone.

I have a very dry skin but i’ve also been having some blemishes and this moisturizer seems to help because it doesn’t block my pores. I still prefer the lotion instead of the gel because my skin gets dry again fast after the use of this product.
I have oily/combination skin and this works wonders for my skin. Its lightweight and doesn’t clog my pores. I’m so glad it comes in this larger size!
Feels very smooth and its not sticky when it drys

It is very difficult to stay moisturized in Colorado! At 44 years old, trying to stay moisturized and fight age (in the most minuscule bottles) feels like a losing battle. I strayed away from Clinique products for awhile, but honestly, this gel is the only daily moisturizer that works for me and comes in a nice size. I’m back, Clinique!!!
I love this for my daily routine. I live in a dry climate and this has been a game changer so far.
I love this product, it helps with my oily skin

This is very refreshing and lightweight which is great for those with oily skin. I like to add a drop of facial oil for extra hydration in the winter months. It gives a smooth finish to the skin BUT I just realized it contains dimethicone :( which is an ingredient I like to avoid because I have a lot of clogged pores. Other than that I really enjoyed using this.

This doesn’t /not/ keep my face moist, but it leaves this thin film on my skin after I apply it. And that film pills if I rub my skin at all. So this really has to be the last layer. I hate the film, it makes me feel like my face is dry. At first my skin was actually very dry, but then I started using more (4-5 pumps) and since then haven’t had any problems with dryness, flaky skin, or breakouts. So I can’t real decide if I hate this product or if I actually like it. It’s a great price for the amount you get. I use it day and night and it’s not even half over. I’ve had it for about 2 months now.
This product has helped with my oiliness in that it is more under control and not as problematic.
I have acne prone skin. This is better for me I think because the regular moisture clogs my pores. I have less breakouts using this

I’ve been on the hunt for a moisturizer that works for my skin. I have combo skin and eczema, so it’s a little difficult for me to find products that work well with my skin type and don’t break me out. I got this moisturizer and facial wash (for oily/combo skin also) and they both worked wonders. My skin looks more even, and my pores don’t seem as bad. I work at In-N-Out, so all the oil/grease that’s in the air and when I cook really affect my skin. This gel is the perfect amount of moisturizing I need. After this I use my Aveeno lotion, and my skin is so smooth and hydrated. The price point is definitely a plus as well!

This is my go-to moisturizer! I have combination skin type which can get drier in this Minnesota winter and it has never failed me. What I love about it most is the texture of the lotion. It feels so weightless yet gives me all day moisture. I love how sheer it is under my foundation and my concealer. It also doesn’t have a scent which is crucial since my skin is very sensitive.
This was my favorite summer time moisturizer because of its light texture. But I feel like it didn’t moisturize enough.

I tried the sample and it turns out this moisturizer is really hydrating! I use it in the morning after Clinique’s 3 step acne-cleansing routine - and this doesn’t not break me out or make my skin oily. It’s like, after massaging it into your skin, it absorbs incredibly fast. Theres also an effect for me of reduce redness. I’m definitely buying the full size now.
review_title: Only Moisturizer that has helped my Combo Skin!

review_text: Didn’t do much for moisturizing my skin. I’m glad I just purchased a mini of the product.

This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. This gel goes on smooth and cool and actually leaves my skin feeling fresher than if I didn’t have anything on. My skin can actually breathe through this moisturizer and doesn’t feel uncomfortably warm. It disappears into the skin instantly but doesn’t dry out. This also means that its buildable, so if you have combination skin with areas that are dryer than others you can apply more to those areas. I feel like every other moisturizer I’ve used has a wool blanket effect where one layer on my face feels like too much all over. I highly recommend this product.
This stuff is pretty good. It makes my skin feel super smooth at night.

i have been using strictly this moisturizer (morning and night) for about 2 years and it’s amazing! i have normal to dry skin and it’s the perfect everyday moisturizer. when i am feeling more on the dry side i layer it (i also tried the lotion and i didn’t like it as much) but my friend has oily skin and she also swears by this moisturizer, so it’s great for all skin types :) it leaves my skin feeling plump, hydrated, and soft- who doesn’t want that??
My skin loves it!! I suffer from rosacea with oily sensitive skin but somehow this helps my skin.

This moisturizer is just okay. I have dehydrated oily skin and this did not provide enough hydration for the dehydrated parts on my face. If you have only oily skin and need just a light moisturizer then I’m sure this would work well for you.

This has been my daily moisturizer for over five years now. I can rely on it to moisturize my oily skin without making me greasy. It absorbs quickly, and feels great on my face. Overall, I would highly recommend this moisturizer to anyone with oily, sensitive, and acne-prone skin.
Best for oily skin. If you have some really dry patches it won’t help.

If you have dry skin I wouldn’t recommend this. I have combination but dry in the winter and I don’t like the way this feels. Definitely not hydrating enough. I find myself using 2-3 pumps and then it leaves a weird filmy feeling on my skin.

I am so happy that they have this in such a large quantity! I have oily skin and I shine bright like a diamond about halfway through my shift but I haven’t had that happen with this moisturizer. I did try a free sample of this and was hooked! The consistency is a little on the watery side than a gel but that’s not enough to take off a star. The quantity vs price value of this is also amazing!
Definitely does the job and the gel is s lovely feel, like all their products. But after receiving a La Mer sample, this doesn’t compare. Still amazing, but I prefer the Moisture Surge.

I have sensitive combination acne prone skin. I’ve been using this moisturizing gel for over a year now and it’s transformed my skin and has really helped control the excess oil my skin used to produce! Other moisturizers used to break me out but this one does the opposite, I’ve noticed that I begin to break out when I don’t have this moisturizer stocked in my bathroom. The formula is not sticky or thick, it’s light weight but gets the job done with leaving my skin very moisturized. It sits really well under makeup too! I’d definitely recommend this.
review_title: a must have for my skin!

review_text: I’m on my 5th bottle of this... My oily skin loves this!

When I first used this, I was pleased with how well it absorbed into my skin. It was super lightweight. As soon as I put my makeup on, it became flaky and “tight“ feeling. My skin is very dry in the winter, so layering my makeup overtop of this gel just didn’t work. It would probably work best in a warmer climate and for people who don’t have dry skin. Not for me.

I have difficult skin.. sensitive, dry but breaks out from lotions or creams. Go figure. I thought I’d give a gel moisturizer a try. I’ve had the 4.2 oz for months it lasts awhile. Keeps my skin hydrated without causing breakouts. My skin seems more balanced. Glad I found this

I have some wicked combination/oily skin and can break out at the drop of a hat, and this moisturizing gel managed to calm everything down within a couple days of using it for the first time! It is fantastic for oil control and my skin is so fantastically soft for hours after I use it. I honestly don’t know what I would do without this!
This moisturizer is really good. It doesn’t let my skin dry. Very handy to use.
This product was apt for my excessively dry and peeling skin when I moved to San Francisco. It’s moisturizing and makes my skin feel supple. I do not mind reapplying it at least 3-4 times a days.
This isn’t bad, but isn’t really doing anything particularly amazing for me

I love this moisturizer!! I have oily oily skin and it absorbs right into my skin without adding on to my oil or causing me more oil. I love using this under makeup or just on a bare face during the day
this is my go to moisturizer. I have combination oily skin and this is the perfect moisturizer to combat oil and leave my skin feeling moisturized
I love the light, silky feel of this moisturizer and the fact that it doesn’t clog my pores and cause breakouts.
Great moisturizer for oily skin!  This gives me the perfect amount of moisture and keeps me matte all day.  Only a pea size amount is needed, it’s a great value.

I have dry/combination skin (I am extremely oily in the T-Zone and acne-prone, but the rest of my face has dry patches.) I prefer the DDMG over the DDML , because the DDMG does not leave a greasy residue, and my face does not look like an oil slick. This actually moisturizes my face, and makes it feel soft. On my 3rd bottle, and more to come!
Works great on my skin and moisturizes well, but it doesn’t have a very pleasant smell.
I have normal skin with some dry patches and this does not work for me. After using it, my skin looks and feels dry
It does the job alright, but I found it not enough moisturizing (especially for the winter time), and it leaves my skin very shiny
Really did not like this moisturizer. I found my skin to be very dry and flakey after applying, even after several coats.

As an oily skinned girl, I have always struggled to find the right moisturizer. I think I’ve found it. the texture is super smooth and spreads on the skin so well. My oil production has diminished and my complexion looks fresher. I love it and I will repurchase once it runs out.
This is a great product for people with oily or combination skin. It hydrates your skin without making your skin oily.

This moisturizing gel is lightweight and incredibly hydrating. I love how quickly it absorbs, and how amazing my skin feels - even in the middle of winter! I have combo skin and this moisturizer tones down my oily t zone and hydrates dry patches. Best part: a little goes a long way! Definitely worth the $!

I have extremely sensitive skin... I break out from just about any product no matter how “safe” they are for sensitive skin. I wash with dove soap (anything else makes my skin break out and I’ve tried dozens) then apply this liberally. It leaves me feeling super moisturized, refreshed, and without a heavy residue on my face. My skin has not had a bad breakout since 5 months ago when I first used this and I haven’t looked back!

This is a moisturizer you can’t go wrong with. If you liked the lotion version of this but found it a bit too heavy, you’ll love the gel version. I certainly did! It’s light enough where it doesn’t weigh your face down but it’s definitely moisturizing enough where you feel like you don’t need to layer more products on.I will say that it didn’t do anything extraordinary for my skin (wrinkles reduced, face more plump, more glowy, or etc). I absolutely hate washing my face and not applying anything hydrating afterwards because it will feel dry and tight, so this product would just hydrate for me, if that makes sense. Which isn’t bad, you just can’t really go wrong with it.

I love love love this product. I always struggled to find a moisturizer that left my combo/oily skin feeling hydrated but not slimy. This is so great because it absorbs into dry patches and doesn’t turn to sludge on my t-zone. I finally found something that works! Lightweight consistency, no fragrance, and absorbs fast. My makeup goes on waaaay better with this product too, as opposed to the drug store moisturizer I was using.

I’m on my third bottle and I’m never going back. So moisturizing yet doesn’t make me greasy. I don’t have night cream so I use this but when I wake up my skin still feels moisturized and like there’s still some on that hasn’t absorbed yet. I like how slow absorbing it is because it keeps me not dry looking throughout the day.

I love this moisturizer...omg I’ve been needing a good moisturizer and this is definitely the one. I didn’t like the lotion version of this one cuz it felt heavy and greasy...but this one doesn’t feel like that at all. It gives you a nice lightweight, smooth texture when it’s on. It feels like silicon after it settles on the face. Ugh in love!!!
review_title: Best lightweight and none greasy moisturizer evaaa

review_text: Amazing!! My skin is usually very dry during the winter and this has help me so much and is an amazing product to buy! Highly recommend! Also they have a selection for different types of skin

let me first say i was skeptical about this product; i had heard bad things about the LOTION version of this years ago and so just kind of dismissed this moisturizer. fast forward like 5 years and i’m on retin-a, struggling with acne/dry patches, and balancing bipolar skin that sometimes decides it wants to behave well under foundation, and sometimes wants to separate and cling to those oh-so-attractive dry, flaky skin spots. i had tried every expensive moisturizer, and i thought i had hit gold with the origins original skin matte moisturizer-gel. but the finish was just too dry and matte, and it wasn’t hydrating enough. let me tell you: this stuff WORKS. my skin is so soft, it absorbs extremely well and fast, leaving not a matte finish but just a natural finish that works so well under a full face of makeup and rms beauty oil at night. plus, the $26 tag is amazing and you get double the product. if you’re on the fence, try it. i know clinique isn’t fancy or exciting but there’s a reason it’s been here so long and there are so many good reviews. i use 2 pumps morning and night (i don’t feel bad about it because of the price). love love LOVE.

I LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER. From the very first use my skin felt so much softer, and I definitely noticed less oil, especially on my t-zone. Usually 40 minutes after applying makeup or even just wearing no makeup, my nose and forehead would be super oily, but with this moisturizer it’s way way less and way way later in the day. My skin has been getting clearer and I will keep buying this product for sure. Thank you Clinique!

I love this! I love that my face is moisturized without getting super greasy! It works really well with my skin routine. The only issue is that sometimes, on the days that my skin is really dry from the winter air, I have to use it more than once... but that’s something I can get over, if my T zone isn’t nasty greasy.

Not the one for me. I liked the old school moisturizing lotion from Clinique but the new formulations are not ideal for my crazy skin. The + makes me too oily & the gel doesn’t hydrate enough for my weird skin. I look scaly in places and still oily in places.

I like to use this gel during the day and a different brand cream at night. It absorbs quickly, isn’t sticky and has a lovely cooling effect (to me anyway). Price isn’t too bad either; could be cheaper BUT since it’s not $80 for 2 ounces like my fave brand.... then I won’t complain, haha.
review_title: A nice light, day time hydration

review_text: This is honestly so great. I have combo skin (but leaning more towards oily) and this is the perfect amount of moisture. It’s not greasy and absorbs into my skin quickly. It’s especially great if you use it before applying makeup because it’s so smooth. It gives me the perfect amount of moisture because it moisturizes my dry spots but doesn’t make my oily areas greasy, if that makes sense haha. I’d say this is great for combo skin. My skin never feels sticky with this. I wouldn’t recommend this for those with dry skin because this product is really light, so it might not be enough if you need more for your skin.

I have very oily skin and I absolutely love this moisturizer. I like how there is a pump and you don’t need to squeeze product out like a shampoo bottle. Also, it might just be my skin type, but after only one night of using this moisturizer I noticed a little bit of a difference with some of the spots on my face.

I have oily skin and this makes it feel like I have nothing on my face. This is especially a great product if you layer a lot of serums and treatments on your face and want to seal them in without the extra heaviness of a traditional moisturizer. One pump covers my whole face.... the $27 bottle will last me a whole year. Great Value!
I love this moisturizer it feel so luxurious and it leaves skin feeling soft!!

I got a free sample of this and I love it. There’s no scent at all and has a watery consistency. This isn’t the perfect amount of hydration in these cold winter months but it would be wonderful in the summer. It dries down quickly without leaving your face and hands tacky. I would probably buy the full size.

in love with this moisturizer! The regular one makes me break out bc it’s oil based but bc this ones gel based it makes my skin look dewy and fresh and plump! I typically have really dry to normal skin and this is absolutely perfect for me.
Was hoping the gel would deliver more moisture. For my dry skin, it is not nearly enough hydration. I would recommend for someone with normal to oily skin.
The only moisturizer I’ve used that doesn’t leave me greasy at day’s end. Note you may need something heavy-duty on hand for night or times when skin dries out
review_title: LOVE IT. Great for combo skin

review_text: I love this! Super moisturizing and absorbs quickly. Not at all greasy and makes me feel super comfortable.
Good basic product was a little bit drying
Awesome for combination skin. Completely non-greasy but very moisturizing.

As someone who most unfortunately cannot use oils on their face without completely breaking out, this gel has been my go to moisturizer for a while now. I can’t honestly say that the results it gives are “dramatically different“... even when I supplement with thermal water, hydrating masks and the like, but I can say that it does a solid job of keeping my skin mostly happy without breaking me out. I also like that it’s a pump (much more sanitary) and lasts a long time for the price point. If you’re not looking for a miracle, just something dependably “good enough“ than this is the product for you.

I bought this product in the first place because I thought certain parts of my face are extremely oily. After using this cream I realized all the excess oil produced on my skin was compensating the dry skin. This product worked on my cheeks. But it turned out to be extremely drying when it came in contact with my T-zone. It got so bad that peeling and redness of skin began to occur. I would only recommend if your overall face is truly oily

This is the only moisturizer I’ve found that doesn’t leave me oily by the end of the day. I have combination skin where everywhere is pretty normal except my t-zone. I’ve tried all kinds of moisturizers, mattifying primers, setting powders, etc. and I’ve never found anything that makes such a big difference like this does. It goes on really nicely and absorbs without feeling oily or thick on your skin. I have found that it’s not as moisturizing as it could be, so I make sure to use a really good hydrating moisturizer at night. If my skin is kind of dry that day, I’ve found that sometimes this moisturizer isn’t enough. I also had to heavily supplement it with great nighttime moisturizers when I went home for Christmas to a Northern, cold, and no humidity climate, because it definitely wasn’t enough then. Slight disclaimer that I do still have to use some other products geared towards oil control (mattifying primer and translucent powder) with this, but those were never enough with other moisturizers. This one is a game changer for combination/oily people!
review_title: Game changer for oil, but could be more hydrating

review_text: This is the perfect moisturizer for my acne-prone, dry, sensitive skin. It’s so lightweight and spreadable that at first I thought there was no way it would be moisturizing enough, but I was wrong because this stuff is amazing.

The perfect moisturizer for under makeup! Dries immediately and doesn’t “pill” under your primer. I only use it in the morning because I don’t find it as moisturizing as I like my night cream to be but still so worth it for daytime.

Seriously the best ish ever! I have seriously tried EVERYTHING for my greasy sensitive face! It instantly sinks in your skin and feels like you’ve got nothing on and I can definitely tell the difference in even the texture of my skin. I’m so glad I’ve finally found something.
Works extremely well for my very sensitive/ combination skin. I’m never afraid to apply to my eye area which typically always is prone to being more sensitive to products

I have really oily skin around my nose and upper lip, and this has helped a lot! I have noticed the oils in my skin evening out, and I really like the feel of this product! Very silky! I bought the little one, but will FOR SURE buy the bigger one when I am out!

I have repurchased this since the beginning of last year and I LOVE IT!!! It is a great everyday basic moisturizer and I use it every morning/night. It is great under makeup and it does not make me more oily. It absorbs quickly, it is not greasy, and I feel it makes my skin smoother over time.
review_title: Best Everyday Moisturizer For Oily Skin!!!

review_text: I can’t get enough of this product!  I love that it is a gel and goes on so smooth and dries fast. it’s very light feeling on my skin and leaves it so soft and smooth.  one pump is all it takes, so it will last me a long time!

I love this stuff! It sinks into my skin almost immediately and feels especially good if you stick it in the fridge!  The Moisturizing Lotion was way too thick for my skin and broke me out, so this was an excellent alternative.

This worked perfectly for the first few uses. I love that it’s fragrance-free and the packaging is more hygienic than a jar. However, after a few days, I noticed that while it still felt amazing when applying, I needed to reapply several times throughout the day. I would also wake up feeling very dry and tight, and I’ve never really had issues like that before. I still think it’s a good, quality product and would definitely recommend to someone with oily skin, but unfortunately it just wasn’t right for me.

I love this product as just a simple effective moisturizer, I highly recommend it. Though, I won’t purchase it from Sephora anymore because they don’t have the 200mL size. From what I calculated it’s .28 cents per mL for the 125mL bottle and .24 cents for the 200mL bottle since this is a staple I will save money with sticking to the 200mL.  Since I live in Canada, we have The Bay and they sell the larger bottle so from now on I will repurchase only from The Bay.
review_title: Love it, but Sephora won't help me save money.

review_text: This is a great moisturizer which I use everyday. It make your skin soft and provides the right amount of moisture. Its very effective in the winter season. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a daily face lotion.

I’m loving this so far. Bought the sample size to try it out and so far so good. I have REALLY oily skin and this doesn’t not make my face feel heavy. Love how lightweight it feels yet I can feel the moisture to my skin. I would recommend the gel version to anyone with oily skin.

Doesn’t contain any antioxidants or anything particularly special, however it is a great fragrance-free, gentle moisturizer that’s wonderful for combination/oily skin. It’s never once broken out my acne-prone skin. I can get all my antioxidants and actives from serums if I have to, because this will always be my go-to for gentle, lasting, non-greasy moisture.

I have extremely oily skin with some breakouts (currently clearing up). This moisturizer has been great. No greasy feeling, not shiny, absorbs quick, and works well with the acne products I have to use. I can never use moisturizer but this one has changed that!
i have really dry skin and this helped a lot overall this has been the most effective product i’ve bought

I just purchased this as an experimental splurge. I’ve been hunting for a moisturizer that was lightweight, gentle, hydrating and that dries without a heavy textured feeling. This WAS PERFECT! Goes on smooth, absorbs quickly, ,y skin actually feels hydrated and fresh after using it. I’m so excited! - And Sephora delivered VERY QUICK, which had me even more excited.

I absolutely love this product. Most moisturizers irritate my skin and cause me to break out, but this is the first that left my skin smooth and hydrated. An amazing product for those with sensitive skin.
This product is amazing for oily skin and even keeps my dry patches hydrated in the winter. I can’t wait to see how this holds up in the summer.

This is probably my favorite moisturizer that I’ve tried so far. I bought this bottle in June of 2017 and still have more than half of the bottle left. You don’t need to use that much but it definitely hydrates my skin. I apply it before makeup and I love the way my skin feels.

Perfect to use during the day and at night for moisturizing your skin! I like that this is a gel, and not a lotion, since some lotions can feel a little heavier on the face, and that can sometimes make my skin more oily. Whereas this didn’t make my skin more oily at all, and feels really light and pleasant on the skin. I don’t use this one everyday, since I have different moisturizers that have spf in them, which I would prefer more. I would definitely make this an everyday moisturizer if it included some spf coverage!
It’s what I expected it to be. It’s not oily
I’ve used this gel for years and love it. It is the perfect balance not greasy and light. I have combination skin.

I have horrible combo skin. In the morning my face is super dry and by mid day my skin is incredibly oily. To counter act the oil I would have to wear a good amount of makeup to help absorb some of the oil. I also get extremely red throughout the day. But this changed everything for me. It helped out all of the spots on my face that were dry and the formula is light enough to put on in the morning and doesn’t make me oily an hour in. I also find that it helps me from getting super red throughout the day. I love this stuff so much, I hardly have to wear makeup now because it makes my skin look so good! I have tried so many moisturizers and never found one that worked like this. This is my holy grail! And you get so much product for the price. Love love love!

This gel is great for my combination skin. My skin gets oily throughout the day but in the morning is dry. This gel does not give me moisture overload, but a perfect balance. My skin doesn’t get as oily and the gel is really light. It is inexpensive too, which for such a great product is a steal.
not heavy and smoothed skin well
Soaks in fast and very moisturizing. I love the feel.
I have combination skin and I love this product. For me when applying it sort of cools down my face and leaves it looking glowy but not oily. Keeps it moisturized throughout the day.
I have been using this for a few years now. It’s perfect for those that have oily
Awesome product! Been using this for sometime now.

originally came into Sephora to buy the lotion from Clinique but they had no more, so I decided to try the gel and I’m glad I did even though they made the gel for oily skin I have normal to dry skin and it works perfectly and it’s winter and my skin has a decent amount of dry patches definitely recommend
best face cream for my oily acne prone skin!!!

Super lightweight. I have oily skin for the most part and this doesn’t make my face feel ‘clogged’ or heavy. Put this on after your skin care routine - I swear my face has gotten softer after a week of daily use!

I love this moisturizer. Where I live, winter weather happens extra early, which meant my skin was extra dry earlier in the year. To solve this problem, I went to Macy’s to get something recommended to me (this was the first thing recommended). I would have just bought it there, but it was about 30-35 dollars which was more than most other stores. So, I thought I would never be able to purchase this. A few weeks later, I was in Ulta and saw a travel size, so I tried it out for a few days, and I knew I HAD to get the full size somewhere. Right after I made my Sephora account, this was my first purchase. I use it everyday, once a day and it leaves my skin soft, smooth, and less oily than before putting it on. The most amazing think about this is it absorbs into your skin almost instantly, and doesn’t leave it the least bit sticky (which can be a huge problem for any skin type).

I’ve been using the product for years. Always makes my skin feel great after a wash and removes any feeling of tightness. Never greasy and has always worked will with my skin. If you haven’t tried this, I reccomend it. A little goes  a long way and I expect this to last me about 6-8 months!
I use this for my night time moisturizer, and sometimes day time if i won’t be wearing makeup. it leaves your skin feeling super moisturized, but it’s not very thick. ive repurchased this twice now
This is my 6th bottle! I’ve been using this since highschool and it’s the only lotion that makes my very oily skin moisturized (but not greasy) and not break me out

I have been using this product since I have been 15. I have extremely sensitive skin and this is the only product I can use on my face that won’t cause it to break out. Use it morning and evening after washing your face. If you just do it 1x/day it won’t completely keep it moisturized until the next day
review_title: A Favourite for the Last 10 years

review_text: This has made my skin amazingly soft, I LOVE it.

This moisturizer is the best for oily to combination skin or any skin!! The gel goes on so easy and is perfect for under foundation. I put it on even if I’m not wearing makeup. I live in a cold climate and it helps soooo much!!! I recommend 8 days a week!!!

I used to use this gel for a good 2/3 years. I found that, I had to switch because I stopped seeing any effects on my skin and my skin was just as dull, before applying this. However recently, because I like to switch my skin care products. I’ve found it to be delightful and great for complete locked down moisture (the healthy looking type). My skin feels smooth, gentle and great!
Love this moisturizer! An old roommate got me stuck on this many yrs ago.. I ONLY use the gel!!!
A great, affordable option for oily girls! Definitely would recommend. The reason I only gave it 4 stars  is because I didn’t feel ‘wowed.’ It’s a good product for the price!

Great I love it!! Helps a lot to control oil through the day with my foundation, penetrates super fast! The only problem i need a little more the feeling of moisture in my skin and u don’t get that, i decide to use it during the day and use a better moisturizer for night time but overall if u have oily skin this is great!

I have been a Clinique user for a little over 5 years now. My complexion is dry combination and this gel is perfect for my skin. It worked while I lived in the east coast and it works for Colorado weather as well. In the winters I do add a face oil or the Clinique moisture surge mask. It has helped minimize breakouts. Recently my husband started using it as well (score!) and is loving how quickly it absorbs into your skin.
Favorite moisturizer! It’s perfect for my oily skin never leaves a gross residue and absorbs into my skin super fast !!
I was hesitate to wear moisturizer for my oily skin. Until few months ago I decided to give this moisturizer a try and I’m so glad that I DID. It works wonder!
This is the second time that I have bought it. It lasts me for over a year. Fast absorption. Very moisturizing. Does not feel greasy at all.
Love this moisturizer! It’s very light weight and great for my combination type skin. I will be buying the full sized tube when my sample runs out!

This is the best moisturizer for oily to extremely oily skin. Applying it right before foundation makes the foundation go on very smoothly. I have acne prone skin and this product has never caused a breakout.

This is my go to moisturizer. I don’t think there is anything remarkable about it, but I have a tendency to keep buying it. It’s your basic moisturizer, scent free, lightweight and great for everyday.

here’s why- it’s actually more drying on my skin. I have sensitive, red prone + combination skin, so probably winter isnt the best time to apply this one. It does a good job of removing dirt and controlling oil (that is only certain areas for me). Its also been and still is a bone dry climate over in my area So for now im still undecided whether to continue using.

Literally just tried it out for the first time. I cleansed, toned, and the moment the moisturizing gel touched my face I was in love! It’s light but hydrates incredibly well. It may be a mini but it its very thin and seems like even the smallest pea of product can trace your entire face. It is so refreshing and I’m kind of still in a shock of how much I love it. Definitely getting the full size next time.

I really liked this moisturizer a lot. It’s extremely lightweight, lasts a decent amount of time and reasonably priced.My only con is that during the winter my skin becomes more dry, so I’ve had to switch over to something more hydrating for the time being. Most likely will repurchase when summer is approaching again though.

I have normal skin, not oily, not dry. I tried this moisturizer, the first week, I loved it, it felt really nice on my skin but after a week my skin start to break out...I got pimples everywhere, so I stopped using this immediately, after a few days, my pimples got better. I would recommend this for people with oily skin, definitely. I really liked how it felt on my skin but sadly it doesn’t work for me.

I have very intense combo skin. my dry parts get very dry and my oily t zone gets extremely oily. I have been using this and it balances out my skin perfectly. it has also helped with my rosacea on my cheeks as well. highly recommend. I also prefer the gel to the cream I feel it soaks in faster and leaves no residue.

Love, love and love this product. I have slight combination skin, but my biggest problem is finding a moisturizer for oily skin that doesn’t make my skin feel heavy or even more oily than it already was..If you have the same problem this moisturizer is amazing!! My skin no longer gets greasy all over as well as its super light weight. I was also skeptical on the claim on smoothing, softening, and improving the texture of your skin.
