However, I have been using this product now for three weeks and I have noticed the difference in my skin. My face is super soft and the texture is already getting way better!! My last thing is that is does say for the best results to use the steps that go with it. But i have been using my face wash I have always used and it still works. So, for anyone who is not trying to change their whole routine I’m pretty sure you will be fine.
This moisturizer is great for oily skin. It’s great for day to day use.
I’ve used this since high school, and it never disappoints. In the cold Midwest winters, it keeps my skin moisturized and calm without bringing on the grease and oil.

I went against the product description and got this for my dry skin, because of the Clinique moisturizers I’ve tried, this one seemed like a good moisture payoff for the price and it doesn’t irritate my skin like many moisturizers, possibly because it has no fragrance which I refer. This is my day moisturizer and it works well under makeup. I’d wear a thicker cream all the time but 24/7 thick creams would clog pores on my nose...so i use this in the day which is a nice compromise and origins apricot mask at night which is also great considering the price.
I found mine in the shade 200  Ivory Bisque at TJ Maxx for $14.99. I just looked on the Sephora app and it normally retails for $46!! Such a steal!!!

I have combination skin with an oily T-zone. I have tried 100 different products to mattify my skin and this one finally passes the test. I use it in conjunction with Clinique pore minimizing primer and my face stays oil free through the day. I also use it after the Clinique Clarifying lotion at night and I have noticed an improvement in my complexion in just a week.
Very light on my skin and doesn’t make me oily and does not irritate either. I’m very pleased with this!
this was my holy grail at first made my skin look really nice and not so oily...but now its really drying my face out i dont think ill buy it again.

My skin was having a really bad crisis (my skin was peeling and I had a really bad breakout) I had been using the tarts H2O moisturizer and it was good but something in it made my skin irritated (my skin is super sensitive) so I went on the Sephora website hunting for a good moisturizer that would help my break out and the peeling. I got a Clinique mini set for acne prone skin and this product and with it and I instantly fell in love with it. I am currently on my third bottle but trust me and it is definitely worth buying :)
This feels and works so fell in effectively moisturizing❤️

i was looking for a moisturizer that i can use in the morning rush before applying the make up. this one works great. its not greasy and you can do make up right away.it doesnt give you super moisture during the day you need to reapply end of the day and use something else for over the night but it definitely doing the job i got it for - premakeup moisturizer . i will buy again for sure

Switched to this after most moisturizers were leaving my face oily and breaking my whole face out.  Cleared up my dry spots and feels comfortable on my skin. Still have a few break out around my chin and jawline but I just started using it.

I love this moisturizer more than anything. If I could only use one beauty product for the rest of my life it would be this. I first started using it when I was on accutane and this saved my life. I’ve been buying this for 3 years and I don’t see myself stopping anytime soon. Its not too heavy and it makes my skin look and feel great.

Been using this for a couple years now and it so great for oily skin! Very gentle yet effective enough to use morning and night. Hydrates the skin without being too greasy. Great option it lasts a loooong time and pretty afordable worth the investment to get nice skin
Amazing for oily skin! It instantly starts absorbing into my skin once I apply it and doesn’t leave a greasy finish. It also doesn’t make me breakout and I’m so glad I had finally bought it!

Without having changed anything else, my skin has gotten noticeably less oily after I started using this product. I’ve tried a lot of different moisturizers marketed for oily and acne-prone skin, but this is definitely the most lightweight and non-greasy one so far. I also like that it doesn’t have any salicylic acid or tea tree oil in it because that makes it more versatile and not irritating at all. I use two pumps mixed with one pump of Shiseido sunscreen all over my face and neck in the mornings and at night either alone or under a thin layer of clindamycin gel on my forehead for those stubborn little pustules that are common with oily skin. I feel like I’ve finally found the moisturizer that’s perfect for my skin and works best with my daily routine, so I definitely will be buying this again!
I bought the mini size to see if it a good for my skin type or not. But it is truly amazing i will repurchase it for sure !

This is the very first moisturizer I’ve ever purchased. I bought it from recommendation of a YouTuber and I ended up loving it!! It leaves your skin feeling smooth without any residue that you’d get from a cream based moisturizer. Gel moisturizers are absolutely perfect!! The smell of it is so refreshing as well!
My go to moisturizer
Has changed my skin for the better! I use it every morning and one pump is enough. My skin is never dry or and oily due to this lovely right here.

Overall this is a great product. I prefer to use it at night because it doesn’t go well with any heavy foundation. But it is intensely hydrating; great for the colder months. The formula is really nice. It can be cold, so warming it with your fingers is a good idea.
Doesn’t break me out and is super lightweight but moisturising

What can I said... I love this Moisturizing, leaves my skin very soft, and best part doesn’t feel oily. Other brands hadn’t work for me at all, and I had been using Clinique for years now and this it’s my savior.

I really love this one! It’s not oily at all and the price is fair for the product. I bought this one in February of 2016 (YES, 2016), i use it everyday for the mornings and it’s barely halfway of the bottle! Has a very long expiration time so it really last a lot.

Purchased this product at a time when I️ felt my grease was greasier than how it normally has been (usually have normal skin not dry not oily) and did notttt like it it made me break out even now when I️ fun out of my normal moisturizer and I️ have to use this one I️ break out every single time! (This has happened a few times!) I️ don’t even have sensitive skin so I️ would only suggest this lotion if you absolutely have oily skin 24/7

I love this gel. I have been using it for years, only straying a bit sometimes in between to try something new but I always came back to Clinique. It’s an amazing day moisturizer that keeps my oily skin at bay yet moisturizes just the right amount. I find that during the winter it’s not quite enough of a moisturizer for me so I change up my products or add a serum. Otherwise, this product is a staple for me. It’s also scent free for those that are sensitive. Highly recommended.
This product doesn’t do a great job at moisturizing my skin. It has a thin, almost serum-like texture

I’ve tried other moisturizers (super high end to drugstore) and this is the one I always go back to. I’ve used it everyday for almost a year and it never fails to hydrate my skin but not leave it super oily or greasy. lovelovelove
Works just as well as Drink of H2O and Hydration Surge, but it is cheaper.
I love this oil free gel.  It is hydrating but doesn’t feel heavy or greasy on the skin.  I use it as part of my 3 step skin care twice a day.

I️ don’t know what is in this moisturizer but it is honestly the only thing that really keeps my oily skin under control while also refreshing and hydrating my skin. I’ve tried to find other products that are as good as this and it ultimately fails. It’s worth every penny.
Tried it out, and ended up buying the full-size version. Best moisturizer for daytime. After my skincare routine, I always moisturize with this during the day.

i love this stuff!! i have really oily skin and this doesn’t make it any greasier than it already is. it makes my face super soft and smooth. i also have ssensitive/acne prone skin and this didn’t irritate or break me out

I have VERY oily skin and this is perfect. Every other moisturizer makes my skin feel heavy and more oily, but this one doesn’t. I love almost all Clinique products especially because I’m very acne prone and none of their products have ever broken me out.

I have oily skin, so I’m always hesitant to wear a moisturizer under my foundation because I usually end up with an oily mess of make up half way through the day.  Enter this gem of a moisturizer!  I have been using this for a few weeks under my foundation and wow!  My foundation goes on better, my complexion is gorgeous, and my makeup lasts way beyond 8 hours.  I actually blot less now than I did before.  I cannot express what a godsend this is for those of us with oily skin.

Originally I purchased the dramatically different facial cream and I HATED it. It just stayed and the surface of my skin and didn’t sink in at all!! The gel version of this however is AMAZING. I will never not use this facial cream, it has become my ride or die. It feels light and sinks into the skin right away. A little goes a long way so the bottle lasts me well over 6 months and I use it twice daily. My skin looks amazing after using this, well hydrated, plumped and overall just healthy looking. Because it is a super light formula I actually like to mix a pump into some of my thicker foundations to liquefy them, helps foundations blend and gives your skin a refresher. I HIGHLY recommend the gel formula. Sooo so good!

I love this moisturizer. Its amazing on oily skin, would not recommend on dry skin. I have tried a bunch of drugstore moisturizers and a few other high end ones, they have all felt far heavier and far greasier on my skin than this one. I use to be turned off by this greasiness and didn’t enjoy moisturizing (and waiting for it to sink into my skin), but this one is so quick to absorb into the skin. It’s awesome for use before make up in the morning for that reason. This also works well for use prior to exercise since it’s so light you don’t get that heavy, greasy, sweaty feel as much. I’ve been using this product for a few years and now that my skin is getting drier I’m not loving this product as much at night because I want a little more hydration out of my moisturizer but this is really the best moisturizer for oily skin. This is kinda a little specific but if you’re a mother looking for a moisturizer for a teenager, this one is perfect.
My favorite moisturizer!!
This is hands-down my favorite daytime lotion ever! It never makes me feel greasy, and the bottle lasts for months.

I sampled the lotion first because I have dry skin but after use with the lotion I learned I actually have combination skin as my T-zone was very oily after the lotion so I purchased the Gel Mini and I’m so satisfied with this product! Extremely hydrating and doesn’t get greasy in my T-zone while not drying out the rest of my skin! :)
Great moisturizer for oily skin!

I have combination oily skin and wanted a good moisturizer that would help control my oily T-zone so I bought this to try out. I used it until it was empty and loved this under my make up, used it night and day. It’s very light and made my skin very soft I had no negatives about it. I ran out and didn’t have time to get another. Keep in mind all throughout puberty I was lucky enough to never have breakouts, only the odd pimple. After not using this product for only a week I started to realize that my face was breaking out like crazy and not just in my T zone, but my entire face. A month later and my face is still a mess. Basically this is a good moisturizer if you want to use it forever but your skin becomes accustomed to it and will breakout like crazy if you stop using.

I started using this after using points on a small sample and absolutely fell in love with it. I have acne prone skin that includes combination skin and I really love this moisturizer for not adding to the grease but soothing and balancing my skin throughout the day. Really Recommend!

This gel saved my skin. I had clogged pores on my cheeks that stood out when I’d wear makeup. My skin was SO bumpy! My sister started this before I did and loved it so of course I had to try it! not only has this made my skin clearer and smooth but the oiliness has greatly diminished as well. I really can’t say enough good things about this.
Just nope. Doesn’t moisturize my dry patches, takes forever to dry. Personally this just doesn’t work for my skin.
Best and only moisturizer I use. I have very oily skin and this is a holy grail! Definitely would reccommend!
Leaves my skin feeling soft without any tackiness or greasy feeling. Doesn’t feel dry or yucky, I love this around my nostrils and eyes.

This is a great and very basic moisturizer. Not oily at all, but sometimes can’t keep my face feel smooth all night in dry seasons, need to apply twice. The price is very good for a basic moisturizer, too.

This product really broke me out. I had tiny little white pimples every where. Also, I have combination skin and when using this it did not feel moisturizing at all. The other moisturizer from this line is better than the gel.

I love Clinique’s products usually and when the salesperson advised me to buy this moisturizer for my combination skin, I did not hesitate.However, I was really disappointed. My skin feels dried 5-10 minutes after applying it which is highly unpleasant.I won’t buy this product again even if I usually trust this brand.

This is my go -to daily moisturizer. Terrific for oily/combination skin. Sinks right in and gives a nice drink of moisture to the skin, feels soft and smooth all day. I use it under makeup and on makeup free days. Living in a humid climate, it’s just the right amount of moisture, not too little, not too heavy.
I was looking for a light moisturizer for my sensitive skin. This has worked perfectly.
review_title: Just what I was looking for

review_text: Gel is different than the cream. It doesn’t feel as thick but doesn’t feel like it moisturizes as well but good for normal to dry skin.
Great moisturizer without all the oil.
BROKE ME OUT SO BAD!
I love this product I have very oily sensitive skin and it works wonderful for me I like to apply it 30 minutes before my primer and foundation just to let it really soak into my skin.

I was using a drug-store gel moisturizer that was discontinued so I recently switched to this and so far, I love it.  I have combination skin and it’s just the right amount of moisture and it doesn’t leave my skin oily.  My T zone still gets a little oily, but I have yet to find a moisturizer where it doesn’t at all.  I will definitely continue using this!

I’ve been using the clinique dramatically different lotion since I was 15... I’m 32 now... when clinique came out with the gel, I was all over it. I love the feeling on my skin. The gel tends to be for Oiler skins, but my skin is dry and I just love it. This little mini is good for traveling or tossing in your purse when your face feels a bit dry. For the price, this is definitely a steal!
Perfect travel size! This yellow gel works wonders for mine and my husband’s incredibly oily skin! Moisturize without breaking out!
Been using this for years for my combination skin. One of the only moisturizers that doesn’t make me break out. Love it!

I have combination to oily skin and this works amazing! It helps to hydrate the face but doesn’t over hydrate! My skin feels softer when using it and it’s so lightweight that it doesn’t cause me to break out. It doesn’t completely matify me but now I have a slight glow all day compared to looking like an oil field! I recommend giving it a try, plus they have many sizes so you can buy the cost friendly travel sizes!!
Absolutely love this! This lotion is perfect to balance out my combination skin in the summer without making it too greasy. Plus the size and price are perfect

This is the best moisturizer ive bought in a very long time. I have always loved Clinique products but this one takes the cake! I use it as a night time regimen and it work a wonders. I’m 27 so hopefully it will help my aging process in the future!

I have been using Clinique moisturizer for years it is very light feeling and makes your skin feel fabulous one of the best moisturizer to use. Your skin doesn’t feel tight but soft as you don’t need a lot a little bit goes a long way. Have recommended this moisturizer to a lot of people.

I’ve tried many different moisturizers in the past but they soon left me shiny and oily after less than an hour or two but this is the first one where my skin has been matte and minimally oily all day. I think I might have found my holy grail moisturizer.
Love using this in the summer time when my skin gets oily, plus you get a lot of product for a great price

My go to! Doesn’t clog pores But need to supplement with another moisturizer on my dry patches (my eczema )

It sinks in the skin without leaving a residue which is nice bc most moisturizers leave a sticky feeling on my face. Also I haven’t had any breakouts which is rare. Will def continue buying this.
It does not smell, it’s not grease. My skin feels so much better without me even noticing it’s there. Absolutely perfect! Love this moisturizer.
I’ve always liked this lotion, can feel the difference in my skin.  Plus it’s affordable :-)
This moisturizer has been my go to product for years! I can not stress on how much it has saved my skin. I’m always on the look for new moisturizers to try, but I’ve always come back to this one.
Love this product from my dry skin!
It’s nice ! Sinks into skin quickly and love using it before I do my makeup
The GOAT. I repurchase all the time. Can’t live without it. Absorbs so quickly, and doesn’t leave any greasy feeling.

My OG moisturizer since middle school... and I just graduated college. Literally the best moisturizer I have come across so far. It smells great, no gross strong fragrances/smells like some moisturizers I have encountered. It feels amazing on my skin. It does its job. And this one specifically, the gel as opposed to the lotion, is so so good for people with oily skin. The lotion one is amazing too, I’ve used that before in the past, but that’s better for people with more dry/normal skin. This gel is perfect for combo/oily skin! Trust me.
review_title: My MVP from middle school till now (post college)

review_text: Basically, this is the best $27 I’ve ever spent. I’d normally never spend more than $15 on anything but this is life-changing. I’ve had oily skin since puberty, and even after being on a good skincare regimen for years my skin would still produce oil like craazy - I’m talking wake up, wash face, put on moisturizer, no makeup, and 30 minutes later I look like an oil slick.I’d tried the Lotion  version (and regretted it), but got a $5 sample of this gel version and thought I’d give it a try. I put it on, went to bed, woke up expecting to see my gross oily morning face and almost fainted. Fresh skin! Smaller pores! Skin is no longer overproducing oil as it had been for apparenTLY my whole life (I want to go back in time and drop-kick myself).So my skin had been dehydrated my whole life and this is was the turning point. I have ascended.Pay attention to the moisturizer you use, kids.(PS - my skin is acne prone - the lotion  version of this gave me/contributed to deep acne that took 3 weeks to clear - so I’d wholeheartedly recommend the gel version unless your skin is drier than the Sahara and you’re one of those mystical god-beings who don’t have to deal with acne at 23 like I do)
review_title: I, an idiot, have good skin now for once

review_text: Amazing!! Help with my dryness
I have very dry skin and it helps a lot!
This is great for my oily skin. Makes me skin feel super smooth and moistured!
This is so refreshing and leaves the skin feeling so soft. I like the gel moisturizers a lot and I was very impressed by this. Quickly become one of my go-tos.
I love this even more than the lotion! it’s amazing and feels light weight on the skin. takes away my dryness for sure!
This product had a big impact on bringing my oily acne prone skin on track. Not greasy and doesn’t cause breakouts. I can’t see myself ever buying any other moisturizer.
Best muostrizer ever
Obsessed! Anyone with oily or combination skin will love this! I won’t even try other moisturizer’s because this one transformed my skin!

I love this so much. Some days my skin is dry, others it’s more oily. This helps regardless of the stage my skin is in. It’s absorbs quickly into the skin, which is nice if you’re used to applying moisturizer before makeup, and it leaves an almost matte finish. I love that it’s light weight because I can’t deal with really thick moisturizers. Only reason I don’t give it a 5 is because on days where my skin is really dry, i have to use a bit more of the product to get the full effect. But I’ve repurchased

This has been my go to moisturizer for years. I have combo/oily skin and this is the only moisturizer that never gets greasy/oily or breaks me out. I’ve tried moisturizers from around the world and nothing compares to this. It’s lightweight and sinks right into the skin.
This is my favourite moisturizer! It doesn’t leave my combination skin oily, and works for me even in the winter.

I have combination skin with adult acne. I tend to dislike the feeling of anything on my face so this lotion is probably as light weight as it gets! I also felt that it helped my skin indirectly not produce as much oil because it was somewhat moisturized. One thing I am concerned with is that that the ingredient list had listed some dyes in the product. The product is very  basic already and so having the dye in it makes me suspect there may be negative impact on my skin.
My go to moisturizer !!

my daily moisturizer that I can rely on not causing me to break out and even out my skin. It is NOT super moisturizing but for my combination oily skin it provides the moisture without feeling too oily. love ti!!
Love love love this product. It gives your skin the right amount of moisture. Never too little or too much.
This saved my skin and eliminated the texture I had! I will never not repurchase. I definitely would recommend this to everyone.
By far the best moisturizer I have ever used. If you have oily skin, 10/10 recommend. A little goes a long way and it just makes my skin feel so smooth and amazing.
I love this stuff! It’s a gel so it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin and its perfect if you have sensitive skin like I do. I’ve been using this for a few years now and I always come back!

This is the only moisturizer that I’ve found so far that works well with my skin, under my primer and foundation. Even better than the Glamglow matte moisturizer. Good for day and night, best for oily skin. 4 stars because it isn’t PERFECT but close to it.
its amazing for oily skin!
Love this product ! Since I have oily skin, im constantly searching for a moisturizer which doesn’t make me oily and this product does that for me. Highly impressed with it. Good job clinique !
wonderful for oily-combo skin!! not as hydrating as the lotion, but much less greasy! sinks deeply into the skin for long-term moisture!!! love
Best for daily use and oily skin.

I really love this moisturizer. It’s very light weight and feels very hydrating. Only reason I didn’t give this five stars is because if I wear this for over 6 hours I start to get shiny. I’m not sure if it’s because of this product of because I’m just naturally oily. But I would love it if I stayed matte like when it’s freshly applied.
I have combo skin so it is moisturizing enough for my t-zone but not for the rest of my face

This is my holly grail moisturizer during the summer. Even when I wear it on top of sunscreen, it still leaves my skin hydrated yet not oily. It’s great when it comes to oil control. This is a must if you have oily skin.
Provides just the right amount of hydration without any greasiness. I use this on top of my day serums and treatments, and this does an excellent job of locking everything in.
Love this stuff; a great moisturizer for oily skin; only down side is price
Classic- this stuff doesn’t irritate my eyes like some other moisturizers

I’m Dry-Combination (skin type 2), but I like this one better than the lotion. It’s incredibly moisturizing, and doesn’t feel heavy. It has a slippery gel texture, so if you tend to be sensitive to that I’d suggest testing it out in a store first. Personally, I love it. My makeup sits incredibly nicely on top of it. My skin is really sensitive and this is the first moisturizer I’ve ever used that hasn’t caused me to burn and break out.

Best moisturizer ever!! I have dry acne prone skin and use this as my morning moisturizer. It is just enough for the morning under a hydrating primer. I have been using this for over 2 years now and cannot see myself stopping. Based on my skin type I should be using the other formula but it breaks me out. I use five pumps for my entire face and it soaks it right up. I love this stuff so much!!!
This is the best moisturizer ever. I brought it along with the other two products in the 3 step routine but sometimes I use it by itself whenever I feel my face getting dry.
I use this one specifically during the day under my makeup because it is light, yet moisturizing. I wouldn’t recommend for night time moisturizer though because it’s very light.
Awesome I use it everyday
Great for oily skin. Very hydrating and lightweight. Wouldn’t recommend for dry skin or for use in the winter.

This moisturizer works amazing with my oily skin. As soon as I apply it, my skin absorbs the moisture and doesn’t leave it feeling shiny or greasy. I use this moisturizer during the day and the Extended Moisture Surge at night. I’ve been loving the gel consistency of the products, as I’ve never tried a gel moisturizer before. The whole Clinique skin care collection has done wonders for my skin. I will definitely be repurchasing.

I have combination skin, therefore it’s a little tricky for me to find a good moisturizer. The lotion is too heavy and oily for me and I am not a big fan. This gel on the other hand is perfect.It does not make my oily areas any more oily but it does prevent my dry areas from getting flaky or, well, dry! My only 2 issues are that 1. It doesn’t contain SPF, so I only use it at night, and 2. During winter, this doesn’t do much for my dry areas. I removed a star for the SPF, not because I can’t use it in the winter. Not because it doesn’t help my skin in the winter means it’s not a good moisturizer. I know this is suggested for oily skin not dry skin, so to be fair, I shouldn’t expect it to provide enough moisture for super dry skin. Therefore I must say that this is one of my favorite moisturizers of all time.
review_title: works great most of the year

review_text: Best moisturizer for oily skin. Doesn’t make your face feel oily after applying it.

My hubby has become more interested in conditioning and moisturizing his face in the last few years, but he’s had a tough time finding a moisturizer to which he has no objections. They’re either too greasy, run into his eyes and sting, smell (even if they say “fragrance free,“ etc. He’s so sensitive to smells and particular about the viscosity and weight of lotions, that he’s rejected drugstore favorites by Cetaphil and CeraVe. I don’t know why it took me forever to recommend Dramatically Different, as I’ve been familiar with Clinique for 30 years; but better late than never. Eureka! We’ve found the Holy Grail. The gel is even lighter than the DD lotion, and even though my hub has combo/dry and not oily skin, it still works great for him. We’ll repurchase this gel for him again and again.

I have combination skin and occasional breakouts on my face, so I was on the lookout for a good daily moisturizer that fit my needs. This moisturizer is lightweight AND it moisturizes very well. Also, it lasts very long. One full size bottle can last you a year!

I’ve always struggled trying to find the right moisturizer for my skin as my skin is combination. Some moisturizers aren’t enough for my skin, meanwhile others break me out. I was hesitant to buy at first but I’m so glad I did! It’s the best moisturizer I’ve tried so far and I have tried many. My skin just seems to love this stuff. It’s so lightweight and gives the right about of moisture. I also love the different sizes they offer. HIGHLY recommend.

This is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. Goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. Doesn’t feel heavy or greasy... my face feels smooth every time I wear it. Will keep buying this one over and over.
review_title: Love the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel

review_text: This product has come down to being my everyday moisturizer for a reason: it’s super lightweight, eventhough it is moisturizing, and my combination skin LOVES it. Worth every penny. Try it!

I have combination skin and when my face feels particularly dry I massage this into my skin and it moisturizes instantly!! It’s also amazing to put on after showers to really let it sink into your skin before you go to bed . It’s also really lightweight, it doesn’t feel heavy on your skin and leaves a dewy but not oily feel . 100% recommend

first I just want to say I have normal skin but oils tend to peak through when I’m wearing makeup. I absolutely love this. It’s a perfect daytime moisturizer to put on underneath makeup. It’s not heavy at all, sinks into your skin very well and doesn’t leave your face feeling greasy!

It totally didn’t work my my skin type. If you have a skin type of combo to dry, this lotion will not work too well. My mother has very oily skin and loves this though. So just not good for combo to dry

I ordered the travel size one to test before I committed to the full bottle, and I love it! It’s very lightweight and goes on easily. It also makes my face feel super smooth and soft. If you have sensitive/combination (oily before washed but flaky and dry after washing) skin like me, it works well in conjunction with Erno Laszlo sensitive oil/soap set. This gel doesn’t exacerbate the oiliness but helps keep my face hydrated throughout the day. Plus, it’s super affordable, and the smell isn’t apparent at all after application, like some of Clinique’s other products. Overall, a good price for a great product. 5/5
Perfect for oily skin! My skin is red and acne prone and this keeps it calm!!
I use this everyday. Only a small amount is needed so it last forever! it can also be used as a primer as well.Review

I bought the 3 step system and I love the moisturizer. I’ve tried everything from dr.jart to philosophy to origins and this has just been the best. It doesn’t leave me oily or break me out. I was skeptical at first because it absorbed really quickly but it was moisturizing enough for the whole day. The only problem I have is that its a bit pricey because it takes 2.5-3 pumps to cover my face so this runs out quickly.

This moisturizer is great for everyday wear under foundation, because it definitely controls my oily face and sinks in super quick so I never have to wait long to continue my face routine. It’s so inexpensive and a little goes a long way. I love it

Every moisturizer I used clogged my pores and made me break out. I discovered this one via a travel size I snagged and I’ve been hooked ever since. It doesn’t increase the amount of oil on my face- which is great for my foundation.

After reading the reviews and hearing close relatives rave about this product, it was just not meant to be for me. It made my skin look more oily and broke me out. On the hunt once again for a good oily skin moisturizer.

I have acne prone skin however my skin has been perfectly fine and acne free for the past month. However when I bought this product within a day or two my skin broke out severely with large pimples and whiteheads on my forehead and it dried my skin out completely. 100% do not recommend
I have adult acne and this has dramatically improved it!
I totally recommend for starters or for anyone!!

I live in Arizona, and at a 120°F weather, I don’t like the layering a lot of products on my skin. This moisturizer is amazing, it is super light weight and it sits really well under makeup. My grandma loves it too, she has very dry skin and she says that this moisturizer goes a long way. My boyfriend also likes it, as it dries down and it doesn’t feel like anything is on your skin. I have combination normal to oily skin.
review_title: Great All Year Round AZ Weatherproof

review_text: I have sensitive oily skin, I break out very easily if a product is too heavy/rich. I wasn’t sure what to expect with this one. To my surprise it is very moisturizing and soft for a gel! It is not sticky but rather silky smooth. Even if it is a light gel, I still feel like my skin is being moisturized. I have not had any breakouts since I’ve started using it 4 days ago, which is a new record. It does absorb fast and does not make skin greasy at all. A keeper!

I’ve literally never had anything break me out so terribly. Tried it out for about 2 weeks to see if the break outs were maybe caused by my skin just adjusting to the new product but that wasn’t it. Bought it because of the reviews but I’m very disappointed

I’ve been using this moisturizer for almost 8 months now... it’s light, fast absorbing and sits well with my skincare and makeup routine. I really like the gel formula and the bottle last for a good amount of time. Plus it has a pump; which helps keep germs/bacteria away!
review_title: Worked well with my combination skin!

review_text: I know this is a cult favorite for oily/combination skin. I really wanted to like it, I love how cute it looks in the pale yellow color! For my skin though, it never really got absorbed even on my dryer cheek areas. I know so many ppl who swear by this, just not for me, booo!
Love it make my face feel nice and hydrated

I’ve been using this lotion for less than a year now, and it’s my go to in he morning. I put it on first, before my primer. It’s just the right amount of moisturizer to go under my makeup. There’s no spf in it, which is a bummer, but I don’t have much to complain about. Until I find something I like more, this will be my go to. Also, it lasts quite a while.

I have combination-oily/acne skin (my t-zone is oily and the rest of my face is normal with acne). During the summer time, I usually like to switch out my moisturizer to something more lightweight and mattifying. I used this moisturizer before and I couldn’t seem to remember why I discontinued using it so I went to give it a try again. Within the first few days of using this, my cheeks and neck experienced extreme flare ups that were hard and itchy. My skin also began to peel a little bit. After a week, i couldn’t understand why this would break me out because there aren’t any bad products, but I stopped using it and switched back to my old moisturizer. The flare ups dissipated and my skin began to turn back to how it normally is. I can understand that maybe this would work for someone with extremely oily skin, but then it also stops working after the second hour (my t-zone became oily after the first two hours). This is definitely not a product that can be used for combination skin if the non-oily part of your face is normal or dry.
I have sensitive skin and I break out easily. I didn’t have any problems with this moisturizer! Really lightweight, which is perfect if (like me) your pores get easily clogged.

I have been hooked on this close to a year now and I am not ashamed to say it! This stuff has saved my life! Whenever I have a dry patch or anything it goes away instantly with the help of my gel! I love the formula for my dry skin but it works for my mothers oily skin as well! Definitely worth the price considering a little goes a long way and can’t wait to purchase it again and again!!!

I got a big bottle of this moisturizer in December of 2016 and I’ve been using it twice a day: once after washing my face in the morning, and once after taking a shower at night. It’s a lightweight,  rapidly-absorbing moisturizer that doesn’t feel heavy on my super oily skin.It doesn’t keep my skin from getting oily by any means, but my skin is definitely much better when wearing this than it is without.

I have oily combination and breakout prone skin, this moisturizer works like a dream, after i used it for 2 weeks i noticed for the first time, a large reduction in oil i produced on my face each day (no makeup). Also i used this as primer too, its so smoothing and makes your face really soft!

Ok sooooo I have REALLY sensitive acne prone oily skin an I haven’t liked any of the moisturizers I’ve invested in in the past This works WONDERS plus for the price compared to others it’s worth it an reasonable In my opinion. It leaves my oily skin Matte fresh clean an soft feeling after I wash my face. I use it Day/Night. LOVE IT

I live in Houston and summer time means extreme heat and humidity and with my combo/oily skin, I need all the help I can get for my T-Zone. Unfortunately this did NOT help at all. I tried the product for a week and even with no foundation I found myself having to dab my face within 3 hours. Thank goodness Sephora has a great return policy.

This makes my skin oily the next couple of hours, but for the first couple of hours it makes my skin moisturized and nice but it gets dried out really quick idk how to feel about it real let down but it is a good working moisturizer it gets the job done and I still use it and I would keep buying it, but I don’t have the money or the time to get a new one

I love this moisturizer to use before makeup application. It absorbs immediately into the skin and it gives me hydrated, supple skin. I love the gel version instead of the lotion, as the lotion can leave an oily feeling. The dramatically different gel is an awesome, lightweight product. Try patting it into the skin versus rubbing it all over.

I bought this product based on its excellent reviews and because it was recommended for my combination skin. The end of winter left my skin very dry, and after putting DOUBLE how much I would usually put, I am left with dry, visible, itchy patches. Would not recommend nor ever buy again.

I started using this moisturizer in my freshman year of high school and I always come back to it! Non-greasy, very moisturizing, and doesn’t cause my makeup to slip and slide. Perfect for both summer and winter.

Light enough that I can use it in 90+ F weather, this moisturizer is what I am currently using in the AM. I’ll be using it for at least a year, probably, as the bottle is huge and I haven’t even made a dent in it in the months I’ve had it so far. Good product and product size. It’s fragrance free, but I like the smell it has. Is that weird?
I bought this product first time, it’s good

This is truly the worst moisturizer. I purchased in the middle of winter to combat my super dry skin. It sits on the ski and feels super sticky. It doesnt absord at all. I never had this issue with a moisturizer. Complete waste of a product!

It just seemed like no matter how much of this I put on my face, it always maxes out at a certain point. If you put on anything more than a tiny amount, you can just feel the product sitting on your skin...it doesn’t add any extra moisture or sink in. Also, I didn’t find it was as hydrating as I needed. I bought the smallest size so, I’d recommend checking that out before investing in the big bottle.
I have combo skin, and since its not oil free it broke me out and caused my acne to scar, 10/10 would not recommend
Best moisturizer for oily skin!

This is a good moisturizer but not exactly a great one considering its price. It does NOT make a difference to my skin. It feels quite greasy on the skin. i bought it because of the reviews but i am here to say that im not pleased with it. I believe the lotion is better for dryer skin styles but this gel is not so great for oily skin people like myself.

im not one for moisturizers because im a mix of oily and dry and when i use moisturizers i tend to get tooo oily in the oily parts and ok in the dry parts but this stuff is a happy medium. i got this as sample size and i think i might go buy this in full size.

I really enjoy this moisturizer as it feels light and soft on the skin. It helps give some added moisture in my dry spots and balance the oil in other areas. I don’t like moisturizers that feel heavy and thick so this is perfect for me.
This stuff feels great the first hour then makes me look SOOOO oily! There are many other matte moisturizers that work better...

With all the good reviews about how it’s amazing for oily skin I had to try it so I got it with my points and was so excited to try it I mean I have super duper oily skin and have been looking for a moisturizer to help with it and honestly it did nothing it did moisturizer my skin though so that’s amazing and it goes on your face super soft and doesn’t look greasy but within 3 hours My face is sooooo oily glad I didn’t purchase it and only used my points.
I love this stuff! It doesn’t do much to improve the appearance of my skin, but it makes it baby butt soft and is a great makeup base!
Love this as my everyday go to moisturizer!

I have been trying multiple product for my combination skin, either many of my moisturizers have too much oil, and add to my T Zone area or not give me enough and I end up with tight, dry spots. This gel really works well! It gives enough moisture but keeps my face shine-less, and lasts throughout the day. Very happy and impressed with this product. Will be ordering again!

Thank god I got the travel size. I always do that if possible with moisturizers because it is really hard for me to find one. I have oily skin but also some dryness around my mouth and nose. This made my dry spots dryer and my skin started producing more oil. It feels good once you apply it and your face is smooth but in 2-3 hours i get oily and by the afternoon I need to blot. I have to find something hydrating asap.

I have extremely oily skin, my make up will need to be applied again within 2 hours and this helps it last about 4 or 5. Definitely feels lightweight and helps my skin be more balanced while still providing moisture.
I’ve been using it since first tried it on. Did amazing job on my problematic oily skin. Very moisturizing and seems to help with acnes and blemish a bit. My go-to moisturizer.

I’m usually not one that likes to wear moisturizer during the warmer months due to extra oily skin. Most moisturizers make my breakouts outs worse. This moisturizer has helped improve my texture like it says it would.
I have oily skin, so I use the gel, and this is amazing.
I like how it doesn’t have a scent. I like using it, but it doesn’t make my face feel dramatically different. It’s just a lightweight, all purpose face moisturizer. I probably won’t repurchase.
I am going to be bold and say it but this is the best moisturizer for oily skin. I have yet to find another one that does as much as this one. If you are skeptical, you need it!

I wasn’t a fan of the dramatically different moisturizing lotion, but I think it was too heavy for my combination skin. I love the gel version! I use this at night as the last step in my multi-step skincare routine (cleanser, toner, essence, serum, eye cream, and this). I originally got it for boyfriend because he doesn’t like scented products but still needed something for rough, dry skin. It’s the only moisturizer he likes using, and I ended up loving it too! It’s non-irritating and absorbs quickly, and better than a lot of more expensive moisturizers out there. I have no negatives to say about this product.

I have super mega ultra oily skin which is also sensitive AF AND manages to have flaky/ dry spots despite my abundance of oil..... so finding something I could even use without breaking out was a challenge! I googled “best moisturizer for oily skin“ and went through the list. I LOVE this one because even though it’s very light and absorbs quickly, it still keeps your skin moisturized and not feeling greasy. I bought the 4oz bottle and I use 2 pumps twice a day and it’s lasted me over 6 months so for the price, it’s definitely a great value. Also, it’s unscented which is great because for some reason, i now have allergic reactions to a lot of lotions/ creams/ serums that smell strongly. Overall, it’s a great product :)

I got this as a points reward and really liked it so I purchased the full size. I have combination skin (dry cheeks and chin area/oily T-zone, combo oily/dry forehead) and it is very acne prone. I’ve tried many moisturizers, but they all end up leaving me with pimples, but this does not. It’s very moisturizing. However, as far as my oiliness, it doesn’t make me oiler than usual, but doesn’t do anything to minimize the oil so I still have an oil issue, but this hasn’t caused any pimples, so I’ll take it!
I absolutely love this for my dry skin! It sinks in to the skin fast and leaves my skin feeling like baby skin! Also perfect for prepping your skin for makeup!

I just started using this moisturizer about two weeks ago and I am so obsessed! I can already see a big difference in the way my skin looks and feels! It leaves your skin feeling fresh, and soft and clean. I use it twice, in the morning and right before bed after taking off my makeup.

This gel absorbs fast and is very lightweight, but very moisturizing. I used to use this a couple years ago but stopped, as I figured that if my skin got slightly oily, I didn’t need moisturizer. This spring my skin got sooo dry but it was still greasy at the same time. I couldn’t figure out what was going on until I went and got a facial and the woman told me that I was overdrying my skin with acne products, when I really didn’t have acne! Long story short, I began to use an oil they recommended at night and this in the mornings! It spreads in so easily, it feels moisturizing yet light, and the best part, my skin isn’t greasy anymore! My skin was creating more and more oil to compensate and I couldn’t be happier with the result I have received with this product! Highly recommend! Perfect for normal to oily skin!!!! If you can’t afford the full size, buy the travel size, because it will last a long time and it is totally worth it!

I got a deluxe sample size of this and noticed how quickly it made my skin feel moisturised and soft. I have dry sensitive skin in the winter and more combination and oily skin in the summer and I used this product right when I needed a hydration hit and it worked like a charm.

I bought this because various websites listed it as a great moisturizer for oily skin. It feels light & blends really well into my skin and leaves my face matte, not glossy. I can wear this and go out without make-up. It also doesn’t cause shine later in the day. All this and it’s very moisturizing as well. So I’ll give it three stars.. Unfortunately, it made my skin break-out (acne), so I am still looking for a better moisturizer.

I switched to this as my Spring/Summer moisturizer and I’m in LOVE. I have acne prone skin and this has not broken me out, it gives me enough moisturization, and my skin doesn’t look extra oily at the end of the day!

I have oily, and extremely sensitive skin that breaks out in hives. This is the only moisturizer I’ve tried that works for my skin, gives it the hydration it needs, and won’t break me out! Using for 3 years now and never looking back.

Love this product! I have an extremely oily T-zone but regular skin everywhere else, and this lotion takes care of both areas. The lotion itself is very lightweight and feels great on the skin. It absorbs very quickly, so quickly I use it also as a pre-primer before applying my makeup (and a true primer). I replaced my old lotion with this one after just one use! Also if you do the math for price per ounce of this lotion compared to your others, you may be in for a surprise!

I have some really annoying white head patches that make foundation look horrible even with primer. After using this gel i wake up every day with amazingly smooth and matte skin and the white heads are now barely there. Sometimes i even skip the primer step and just use this under my foundation. This is really good for combo oily skin, it leaves a “hydrated matte“ finish.
review_title: hands down best moisturizer for combo oily

review_text: Absolutely amazing for this oily skin of mines. Extensive hydration and oil control. Gives me the best radiant glow without the oil slick! A new must-have for my skin care regimen!

I have very oily combination skin and I’ll tell you right now that I’ve had trouble with my skin for YEARS, and I’ve been using this stuff for a few months now. My skin has never looked better. This moisturizer absorbs so fast and doesn’t leave my skin greasy at all. I’ve also noticed that my skin doesn’t get very greasy throughout the day, either. The only thing that I really don’t like about this is that it has no SPF, so I have to buy facial sunscreen separately. But it’s totally worth it.

This is really a game changer. I came from drugstore moisturizer to high end and this has really done it for me. Most beauty gurus or workers at sephora always tells me that I need to moisturize before applying makeup or just on a daily basis so your skin will hydrate. THIS MOISTURIZER DOES THE JOB FOR IT!! Im glad I came to this product. Its such an amazing moisturizer under your makeup and it wont clog pores either. GOOD JOB CLINIQUE

This stuff has done wonders for my skin. I love it so much. My skin looks brighter, less dull and SO much more radiant! I also have not had one break out, even a tiny little spot, in over a week now which is incredible for me!! My tone is even and my red areas have been so much less red since using this product. Yay Clinique!

I’m not a big fan of Clinique, never have liked their products and most of them have been Bleh.This moisturizer I got as a Sample, and I’m so glad it did, because its wonderful.It blended into my skin right away, and I think its perfect moisturizer to wear under your makeup. Guys if youre looking for itensive treatment, use coconut oil on your face and the put this over. Maybe at night time but that literally will make your skin feel Fantastic!!!!!!!
My new favorite moisturizer. I use every it day and night. I would’ve bout the full size but they only have travel size at my local Sephora:(

My skin is only actually visibly dry when i put on foundation, but only on my nose & T-zone. I have tried so many moisturizers, face washes, primers everything :( I received this as a sample & it actually worked & didnt make my T-zone look dry & flaky(did nothing for the dryness on my nose). BUT after a couple of hours the dryness started to slighty show again. I gave it 3 stars because this is the only product that actually gave me any kind of results!
My son has terribly dry skin and patches of eczema. I got this as a sample and it worked wonderfully!
Works great for oily skin.

I’ve got oily skin and this gel moisturizer is great. Feels light and refreshing and my skin soaks it up pretty quickly. No fragrance which I love because I have sensitive skin, super gentle no complaints here.

I have super oil skin and I wanted something lightweight but moisturizing. At first I thought the Josie Maran argan oil could solve that for me but I was wrong. However the Clinique moisturizing gel has met my needs. At night it’s so lightweight and airy that I hardly feel i added anything excessive. So light that I can layer it on top of the pixie serum. Fast drying and very absorbing. I can also use it in the morning with primer and it doesn’t roll up. No complaints at all. And it didn’t cause any breakouts for me unlike the argan oil. I can’t praise this gel enough. I can touch my face and not feel anything sticky but my skin is moisturized through out the day. Wish I had just bought the largest size to begin with.
review_title: oily skin and this is amazing

review_text: I have combination skin with an oily t-zone and normal everywhere else. The first time I used this moisturizing gel I loved it. It made my t-zone matte and my foundation looked great. Recently though I’ve noticed it’s been making my t-zone dry and flaky so I’ve stopped using it and my skin is finally starting to not look dry and flaky.
used to have oily skin, purchased this product because of the hype, and left me dry and flaky. DEFINITELY not worth it!!
didnt do much for moisturising for me, left me with tight shiny skin :/

This stuff is the best moisturizer, and I feel like I have tried them all! I never had problems with my skin until I was well into my twenties and having children, then it started breaking out, drying out, and acting up. This is money well spent, one pump covers my whole face.

I have normal skin and choose this because it is light and soaks into skin very fast prior to makeup application- which is great. Not really any smell either which I think is great. Never tried the sample before either. Just decided to go for it from all the reviews I read. Not disappointed I did!
review_title: There is nothing bad to say about this product

review_text: LOOVE this stuff!! I only have a sample rn but I’m def getting the full size because this stuff is amazing especially for my oily skin!!

Just got the sample and so far love it! It’s not greasy and absorbs into the skin fast. Wouldn’t recommend on dry skin. I’m oily combo with some dry spots mainly oily. It doesn’t really make the skin feel like OMG smooth but just enough moisturizing for my type of skin. So recommend
review_title: Oily combo skin with some dry spots mainly oily

review_text: This is literally the best stuff on the market. I have tried everything I tell you EVERYTHING! And I keep coming back to this product. It is lightweight. Doesn’t break me out. And my skin stays less oily throughout the day. Plus my skin is super sensitive and it has never irritated me. Because there aren’t a lot of high antioxidants in the product, I’ve solved this by using a lightweight serum before I apply the moisturizer, but it is so worth it because this product is so good.10/10 would highly recommend!!!!
review_title: MY HOLY GRAIL FOR OILY SKIN

review_text: Love this moisturizer. I have combination dry skin, although it’s drier in the winter and oilier in the summer. This works great for both seasons! It’s very lightweight but great at moisturizing away even the roughest of dry patches. I also have problems with acne but this doesn’t break me out at all.
I use it on my face daily and it works well. No more dry spots

I always see people saying great things so I thought I’d give this a whirl and it’s really nice! I only use this during he day after my morning cleanse and it moisturizes really nicely. It is not thick or greasy whatsoever and it has no harsh fragrances which is good for my sensitive skin lol recommend this for a day moisturizer.

I just used this for the first time tonight and I have never written a review before but I just had to for this! I have very dry skin and live in New York so the winter is really rough for me. I was using the lotion version of this about 6 months ago which I did like but I ran out and don’t have a sephora near me so I was just using the wal mart version of the same moisturizer. I did like both however I am very weird about my face feeling like there is ANYTHING on it once it is cleaned before i go to bed and I could feel both of these especially since I sleep on silk pillowcases my face would just stick, so I dealt with having a dry face because I preferred being dry over my face sticking to my pillow. I placed an order the other day and decided to give this a try this time instead of the lotion and oh my god. I just laid down on my silk pillowcase and my skin feels moisturized but did not stick to my pillow in the slightest bit and I still feel like my face is completely clean and not oily at all!!! I can definitely see myself using this for a long long time. I’m so excited I finally found the perfect moisturizer for me!

I recently switch from the First Aid Beauty Ultra Hydration moisturizer to this one and I love it! This sinks in the skin so nicely and doesn’t leave a slimy residue like many other moisturizers. Great for under makeup and as a night mask. It makes me skin feel really soft yet is still very light and will be great for summer. I recommend!

This was honestly a let down. It didn’t help moisturize my face anymore than the cheap face moisturizer from trader joe’s. The only way I could get it to moisturize my face at all was if i smothered my face with it, but then it made my face look and feel greasy, without actually hydrating it.

Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing GEL will be a favorite of mine for life !! i’ve used it for years & will be using it forever. The texture of this moisturizer literally gives me a deep breath the second I put it on. Silky smooth, light but deep moisturization, overall perfect.

Have been using this for the past 5 years, tried other more brands but nothing worked as well as this. I have super oily skin, but this moisturizing my skin without leaving it greasy or coated.Take care to get the moisturizing gel and not the moisturizing lotion. It is easy to mix the two and if you have oily skin you might break out using the moisturing lotion instead of the gel.
review_title: Best moisturizer I have ever tried

review_text: I have oily skin with dry patches, this works great with my foundation.  Provides the perfect balance of hydration without making my skin oily.

I suffered from dry skin FOREVER. I tried organic moizturizers to vitamin E cream and nothing seemed to make my dry skin go away. I bought this for 20$ to try it and i will keep buying it. I have such sensitive skin and it didn’t make me break out! I use it every morning and night. My skin glows after using it and is so soft. BUY IT LADIES
I have extremely sensitive skin and this works perfectly!

I don’t know anymore! I’ve been using this gel (and toner #3 formula) since I was 22, now I’m 24, and my skin is so super dry. I can’t use it as my only hydration. I always liked it BBC it absorbs quickly, lightweight, but I think I dried out my skin so much with all this acne products that I need some serious hydration here.

I am amazed at this lightweight, fast absorbing moisturizer. I have quite oily skin so it is a dream to finally use a moisturizer that hydrates my skin without excess oiliness. Quite a good sized bottle as well for the price. Definitely recommend for oily skin!

I’ve been searching for the perfect moisturizer for some time. I’m very sensitive to fragrances, and I prefer the gel moisturizers. This was everything I wanted and more. This is very light but provides a great deal of moisture that lasts all day. It also has little to no scent which is perfect for me. I’ve also noticed a difference in redness on my face. So so happy.
they weren’t kidding when they said dramatically different because that’s how my face feels!

I am a fan of Clinique, but this was an okay product. I have combination skin and this stuff did not hydrate my face enough. I had to apply 3 layers every single day so that I could feel my face hydrated.
Very light to the touch and once applied on a clean face.  I just love the way it feels.

I have combination skin with my t-zone having the tendency of becoming shiny throughout the day. I used to avoid putting a moisturizer on my face because it seemed like everything would turn my face into an oil slick (even with primer). I’ve been using this product for years now because it’s the only thing I can use to hydrate my skin without really worrying about it midday. It absorbs into my skin quickly and never feels greasy. It’s definitely my holy grail.

This cream is decent for hydrating but I do not recommend using this during the winter months. I plan on saving this for the summer when my skin tends to be greasier. If your skin is even slightly dry in the winter, go for the Clinique moisturizing cream over the gel formula.

This moisturizer is awesome to thin out thick foundations and to make them more blendable, and it doesn’t significantly hinder the coverage nor increase oil production. I only tried it b/c i was running out of foundation and thought this would make it last a while longer, little did i know i would love the finish it gave on my skin! As an actual moisturizer, its pretty basic which isn’t a bad thing.

I have combination skin and a lot of acne problems so finding the right skincare products is always challenging. This moisturizer has found a permanent place in my routine. It is so amazing. It doesn’t have a smell, my skin absorbs it within seconds. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily or shinny. It makes my skin smooth and healthy looking. It also helps me with my discoloration on my skin too! I LOVE IT!!!

I am very very picky with moisturizers...none seem to work for my normal/oily skin. I purchased this 7 months ago and used it for a few times and was not impressed so it got cast aside. I began to try other moisturizers and just wasn’t satisfied with the way they made my skin look...many made me too oily, too dry, not enough hydration, broke me out, etc. Recently I found this in my skincare drawer and decided to give it another try because I love the clinique brand..and I am pleasantly surprised. My skin is mostly normal but can tend to get oily at some points throughout the day and this moisturizer is perfect. Light and hydrating enough and meshes well with my skin type. Really happy that I found this again and will be repurchasing

I use this everyday on my face, I’m a swimmer and The chlorine dries my face out so much but my skin is acne prone to oily lotions. This is light, moisturizes my skin & putting it on every night won’t make you wake up with pimples from the oils sinking into your skin. Very good product.
review_title: easy thin moisture, very little to none oil

review_text: Super hydrating and love the consistency and how a little goes a long way
This is the best daytime moisturizer I’ve used for my oily skin. Applying this under a moisturizing primer creates a beautiful base for my foundation without wrecking my cranky skin.
I liked this moisturizer and I have very oily skin. However, my upper lip area under my nose was always oily but chapped when using this product.
Best moisturizer! My sister and my mom both use it as well, we are obsessed

I first received a sample of the Moisturizing Gel, and didn’t have high expectations for it. (I was under the impression that many of Clinique’s formulas are out of date.) I’d usually characterize my skin as normal or slightly dry, but lately have really been struggling to keep it moisturized without resorting to a heavy, occlusive cream. This gel surprised me by moisturizing much more effectively than my other moisturizers, including those heavy on hyaluronic acid. I bought a full-size bottle immediately. It’s a simple moisturizer, so I layer it with other products in my regimen.
This moisturizer doesn’t last longer than 10 min. It absorbs too quickly and leaves my skin dry. Oh, it smells like rubber, horrible horrible scent for a non-scented product. Will not repurchase.

My skin runs on the oilier side. I used to live in very humid climate and this stuff was great all year because it doesn’t feel greasy and it gives light moisture. Now in a very dry climate, I only use it during the day and in the winter I might need a little boost here and there of something stronger (in addition to my night cream) but it’s still my absolute go - to basic moisturizer. I have super sensitive skin and this doesn’t give any issues.
review_title: Good Basic Lotion, esp for Oily skin

review_text: Received this as a gift from my mom a few years back but I never really got around to using it until just recently. It feels great on my skin and it just smells so refreshing! Highly recommend.
<3 worked really well with my combination skin
Best moisturizer for oily skin. Simple yet effective No-nonsense formula.

I love this lotion i have been using it for over 2 years now its fast absorbing and doesn’t clog my pores. However you will need something heavier during the winter but its perfect for summer. It is worth buying the bigger size.

I wanted to like this because I love the lotion. I bought this accidentally since it looks so much like the lotion. I thought I would give it a try. It covers the skin well and a little goes a long way. But it doesn’t seem to absorb into the skin like the lotion does. It left a slight residue on my skin. I prefer the lotion and won’t be using this again.
I love this because it moisturizes my skin without making it feel greasy or oily. It sinks in really fast and is a good base for makeup.
Needless to say my skin is a disaster. Everything I put on my skin ends up clogging my pores or give me irritations. I’ve been trying all kinds of moisturizing gel, but this one is the best.
I received a sample from that store & I love it. It doesn’t feel heavy and it’s hydrating. I have combinaison skin, so I recommend to use this product on the summer.

I have very oily skin and this is the best moisturizer ever! I got a sample of this and tested it out along with several others (it was a sample pack from Sephora) but nothing compared to this one. I think the price point is fair and a little goes a long way. I’ll never use another again.

This moisturizer has changed my face. I could never get makeup to look as natural and matte as I wanted, and finally decided to see what I could do about my oily skin. Since using this in the morning and evening everyday, my skin has never been better. I’ve tried out a few different foundations as an experiment and seriously ALL makeup looks perfect over this moisturizer. And even without makeup my skin doesn’t get oily during the day anymore. This stuff is amazing.

It’s a good moisturizer. It’s very light and Controlled my oiliness a little. It did not dry out my dry areas. I would recommend it. Just don’t expect magic to happen if you’re looking for something to completely eliminate oiliness.

I’ve recently been diving into serums as a way to add hydration to my skin, particularly at night, and I am so glad I followed my impulse to add this to my cart. It’s more thick like a gel but I do like that since it’s not running all over and I feel like it’s sitting and sinking into my skin like doing a sheet mask without the sheet. It does absorb quickly, no discernible scent. Have already repurchased!

This stuff is amazing. I have combination skin that tends to get oily as the day goes on. This product keeps me moisturized and keeps me balanced. It stands up to my harsh acne treatments and keeps me soft and not oily.

Love this moisturizer!! I have combo skin and this helps control the oil on my nose and forehead all day. My skin feels soft and that tight, dry feeling disappears. Would definitely recommend for dry, combo skin
I’ve had a time trying to find that perfect moisturizer. It is very difficult to find when you have oily skin and want something that won’t make it worse. This is perfect!
Works great! I have used this item for years and its the only face lotion that does not break my skin out. It’s super lightweight but helps with dry skin!

Keeps face hydrated but doesn’t turn oily on skin and a little goes a long way so the price point is not too terrible. I love to put this under my foundation and it makes my face feel and look smoother with longer lasting matte finish then a typical oily moisturizer.

If you have oily skin, this moisturizer will be perfect for you! Nice and lightweight, and is still hydrating without feeling like it’s leaving a greasy residue on your face. This truly sinks right into your skin.

I have combination skin so for the dry parts it was okay but for the oily parts (T-zone) it was horrible! I looked so oily I had to stop using it. Also, it left sort of film/residue on my skin that I feel coming off while washing my face at night. Try a sample before you commit to buying the entire thing

This is a VERY thin lotion, perfect for the summer! However, it’s not so great for colder weather; It doesn’t leave me feeling moisturised. I will definitely keep it and use it during hotter months, but I would recommend Belief’s True Aqua Bomb for my oily/combo friends.

I have this both in gel and lotion form. Since I have combination skin, I prefer the gel form instead of the lotion. It is super lightweight and easily absorbed by my skin. After application, my face feels so smooth and moisturized. It didn’t break me out too.
review_title: Great Moisturizer for Oily / Combination Skin

review_text: I had a gift card so I decided to buy this because I was almost out of my Lush Vanishing Cream. This is the first Clinique product I have ever purchased. After reading reviews I figured I would get the 125 mls instead of the trial size and I’m so glad I did! I have oily skin and this gel is amazing. I have only been using it for one day and I can’t get enough! It’s so lightweight and absorbs right into my skin, completely mattified. I can’t tell you any other affects as I have yet to see them but the fact that it absorbs nicely, moisturizes and mattifies is enough to make someone with oily skin in love with their skin!
Perfect for under makeup or alone also isn’t greasy.

I bought this while waiting in line. First I will tell u my skin concerns. I have mild rosacea and kp (little dry bumps) on my jawline/ lower face. I used this as first as my usual moisturizer. I noticed my face wasn’t at moisturized as I really wanted it to be. I started using it as my morning moisturizer AND I AM IN LOVE. it makes my skin soooo smooth. Although I like this moisturizer a lot but I want to try a moisturizer for dry skin. If u have oily/combination/ normal skin u have to get this.
review_title: better if ur skin is not very dry

review_text: I’ve used this moisturizer for combination skin since I was a teenager and it’s always been okay. I was fine with it until I started paying attention to how my skin felt and decided to try other products. The instructions of the moisturizer say to dispense 1-2 pumps and then apply to the skin. I find that it takes 5-6 pumps before I feel like my skin is moisturized. I take relatively hot showers and use their full routine - the face wash works great for me and so does the toner, but the moisturizer doesn’t seem to be completely effective. Sometimes I can feel the layer of moisturizer on top of my skin, and my face will have a slight rubbery texture. I think the product offers a lot for it’s price, but I’ve found a better moisturizer for my skin!

I bought this after being talked into it at the store. I have very dry skin, so I was looking for something that would keep it under control. Used it for about a week and it made my skin even worse. It made my skin super dry and flaked off into pieces everywhere. Definitely not worth the money and I will not be repurchasing.
I have super sensitive skin and this moisturizer doesn’t cause breakouts. I have used it daily for over a year and highly recommend it!
It makes my skin feel suuuper. Its hydrating without being greasy. Perfect for combination skin ❤

Before I start, let me talk about my skin a little bit: I have large pores on my very oily nose and a very oily forehead, but dry cheeks. I get pimples on my forehead and chin, but nothing too abundant or plentiful at one time.After searching far and wide for the perfect moisturizer, I plan on repurchasing this one over and over again. It isn’t too thick or too light, but JUST the right consistency to keep my oily/combination skin happy. I’ve used it for about six months now and it has kept my few dry patches from being dry, and my extremely oily T-zone from getting oilier. It has kept me from breaking out and saved me a lot of acne-related grief. BLESS this moisturizer. I will NEVER let this stuff go.
great for everyday use, perfect with moisture surge

I purchased this product about two weeks ago, and I have been using it day and night. I apply it onto clean skin in the morning, under my makeup, and it leaves my skin super smooth and soft all day - even under my makeup. I stopped using primer since using this gel because my pores and skin texture has improved so much! At night before bed, I also apply it on to my clean, makeup free face, and I wake up every morning just looking forward to going to the mirror to check out my skin. I have done nothing but rave about this product to everyone I know!! I’ve had acne prone skin all of my life that has left some scarring and uneven skin tones and texture. I’m always on the look out for products that will reduce the visibility of just about every problem area I have, and I have found it!! All skin types vary, so this is just my review, but hopefully it does for most what it has accomplished for myself!

I have very oily skin, particularly my nose, and this moisturizer has simplified my makeup application so much!! I had so much trouble with my makeup separating from my skin producing too much oil and forever, i’ve blamed the foundation (I currently use Estée Lauder double wear, but i’ve tried so many samples of others). As soon as I switched from a clean & clear moisturizing gel to this moisturizer, my makeup not only goes on much easier, but stays in place. I won’t say that it reduces my skin’s oiliness, but it gives my makeup something else to hold on to so that I can blot my skin without worrying about my makeup separating! and a little goes a long way- I use about half a pump for my whole face!!

I was previously using Neutrogena moisturizer for combo skin and bought a small size of this. I mean I noticed an extreme difference and its winter time. My skin just feels like it has the right amount of moisture. Fresh and the “tightness“ people are referring to is barely noticeable unless maybe you’re using too much. Balance and moderation is key. I have no complaints, obviously if you have dry skin or super dry patches you’ll want something more moisturizing but this is great for combo/oily skin types. It’s the first department store moisturizer I have actually liked. I will definitely be purchasing the full size.

I have very oily skin and I have never been able to wear moisturizer without it making me more oily or making little bumps break out on my face. This moisturizer has become my holy grail, I am on my second bottle and it is PERFECT! The gel texture wears nicely on the skin and help control my oil. It even serves as a primer because of its slightly tacky texture before it dries down. I highly recommend this foundation to anyone with oily skin, as it has been my personal savior in my skin care routine.

I have always suffered from oily, acne prone skin. This is the first moisturizer I ever tried because I never knew that moisturizing (even with greasy skin) is so important. I have to say that the overall condition of my face has changed dramatically since using this product. I started out with the small size and just went and purchased the large pump. So thrilled to finally have found a good moisturizer for oily skin! :)

I have combination skin like many of the reviewers on here, and I gotta say while I love the first two steps of Clinique’s line, this moisturizer is terrible!! My skin is actually drier after I put this on. It applies very lightweight and dries quickly to a tight, uncomfortable finish. When I smile or raise my eyebrows it actually feels tight like I have a mask on. I prefer most drugstore moisturizers to this. If you have any kind of dry skin, find a heavier moisturizer! Although the matte finish may be nice for people with oily skin.

My face type is oily.I was excited to use this product since this was actually the firs time wearing any kind of moisturizer. As I applied my face felt very moisturized but as soon as it dried my skin felt so dry and cracked.My skin looked like I was wearing a peel off mask. That feeling when it dries and if you smile it feels like it’s pulling your skin. I couldn’t take it, it just wasn’t me. This was just my experience it probably works on other skin types.

I have combination skin. This feels great and is just enough moisture and dries to a nice semi Matte finish. I found it to be the perfect primer. If you have combination to oily skin, give this a try.

This stuff is AMAZING. It’s the first moisturizer that gives my combo/oily skin the hydration it needs without leaving a residue, it’s dry to the touch in a minute or less, controls my oil production, doesn’t conflict with my oil based cleanser or foundation, and my skin has drastically changed for the better since using it. I thought the whole “dramatically different“ thing was a gimmick, but I see undeniable results from this product, being that it’s the only thing I’ve changed in my routine since my skin started improving. My only qualm is that since it’s winter it doesn’t provide enough hydration, so I use this in the morning and coconut oil at night, but I usually do that anyway. I never thought I’d rave like this over a moisturizer, but it’s my holy grail for sure.
Leaves my skin moisturized and glowy without looking greasy
This is moisturizing without making the face too oily throughout the day. Nice and light too! Nice alternative to the moisture surge :)
Love the fact that this leaves me glowing without being greasy.
It was okay, but not that great. Felt nice to apply, but wasn’t super moisturising sook after

Before I tried this, I was using Ole Henriksen Sheer Moisturizer. I am so glad I switched to this. It absorbs very quickly into your skin and I never feel greasy afterwards. For the price point and how hydrating it is, it is worth a try.
This is great as a moisturizer. A friend recommended it to me. I have been using it for 2 weeks now and my skin feels great.

I do like this moisturizer. It lives up to the description -- lightweight, fast-absorbing -- and I like the way it keeps my face hydrated all day. I have to dock 1 star for the smell. I think it’s trying to be fragrance free, but has a slight off-putting scent. I would love it if it had a light fresh scent.
I have never had a moisturizer that worked so well with my skin and I actually seen a difference so quickly I love it and I have oily skin but it’s fantastic
Will be using this for long time! It does what it claims to do!

I had to come get a new one because I was running out. Bought it on a whim and fell in love. Its lightweight, definitely leaves my skin babybutt soft although if you have drier skin, you gott use a bit more to moisturize it. But thats ok with me. I use it everyday!
Favorite moisturizer, works great with my oily skin. I apply it everyday after washing my face and before applying my foundation and after washing my make up off

I didn’t hate this moisturizer but I also didn’t love it. I really disliked how sticky it made my skin feel, but I enjoyed how lightweight the product is. I’m very in between with my opinion but I definitely wouldn’t buy it again. There are different moisturizers on the market that would be much better for my skin.
