I have combo skin, and this gel moisturizer is perfect.  Super lightweight, absorbs quickly, and makes my skin feel so soft.  I’ve bought it twice and will probably continue to buy it.

I bought this about 1 month ago and it has quickly become an indispensable part of my morning and evening routine, as well as a holy grail skin care product! I have normal (non oily non dry) skin and deal with some acne and mainly texture. This moisturizer does not break me out or leave me feeling oily and also makes my skin feel baby soft! The best part about it is how quickly my skin absorbs it, making it easy to apply before makeup. All I can say is GET IT!

I am in love with this stuff! I am 46 oily skin. this stuff is great over top my serum during the day. I even put some under my eyes over my serum during the day and my makeup goes on flawlessly. like most products you need to let your creams/gels etc soak in. this feels sticky at first but within a minute you have a soft matte finish. Does not make you break out, my skin looks amazing quite happy with this.
My favorite, nourishing without the weight and grease of a lotion

I had seen this moisturizer recommended by many for oily skin and decided to try it. First of all, I love companies that provide small travel/sample sizes so that people can test their products without breaking the bank. The smallest travel size lasted me about 3 weeks with generous daily use. I also love the pump/tube packaging--too many moisturizers come in jars.The gel formula absorbs very quickly and is lightweight compared to even the lightest cream formulas I’ve used. It would be great for people who dislike the sensation of thicker moisturizers that sit on top of the skin. My oily skin is genetic, not dehydration-related, so this moisturizer doesn’t decrease oiliness for me, but it doesn’t increase it either. The only potential downside is that it might not be moisturizing enough for the worst of winter. Overall I’m very happy with this moisturizer, and just ordered the full size.

It’s a perfect gel moisturizer for combination & oily skin type. However I have acne prone skin and there’s mineral oil in this product! It did not cause me any breakouts but it clogs pores and may stop my pores absorb the acne treatment. So I still keep & use it for my cheeks zone - where my skin are clear with no acne. And it’s holy grail forever!!

My biggest problem was finding a moisturizer that I could apply in the morning under makeup and wouldn’t make me more oily. After years of trying new products and many bad picture days I finally found this! I love it. There is a slight scent but nothing too strong. The gel formula is light weight and isn’t intense, it’s defiantly not a heavy cream and you may need to moisturize more at night so your skin doesn’t get too dry like moi. But for during the day this stuff is great.

I have oily skin. Sometimes, it can get so oily it’s just plain embarrassing. Within 2 days of using this I haven’t had even half the problems with my skin that I used to. I’m a forever buyer! I love the toner 3 and face wash too! My skin has never looked this good. (I’m 28 years old)

I have combination skin and i dont think this product is good for my skin. Even though, it is great on my oily T-zone, it leaves the rest of my face super dry. My skin flakes with this moisturizing gel.
review_title: Not the best for combination skin

review_text: I have acne prone skin and this moisturizer is light enough to moisturize without clogging my pores.
I have extremely sensitive and rather dry skin, this is the only moisturizer I can use every day without breaking out into a red blotchy mess or having sore skin for the rest of the day. Amazing!!!
This product keeps your face from feeling dry throughout the day and works well under makeup.
This moisturizer is great for everyday use! It absorbs quickly and isn’t oily. I just wish it was a little more hydrating or else it would be perfect!
Great moisturizer my face feels very soft and great after using it.

I have tried quite a few moisturizers in the past, and have found they leave a tacky, greasy residue that leads to my makeup creasing... Until I found this gem! This absorbs beautifully into the skin, leaving a slightly matifying, smooth, lightweight finish. Also, compared to other higher end moisturizers, the price is quite reasonable! I would suggest buying the value size if it’s still available!
I use this as additional moisture when I’m extra dry--works well and is lightweight
My favorite moisturizer! Absorbs really fast and my skin feels soft and plump after. The best for my oily skin.

This gel has been absolutely incredible for my acne prone, normal to combination skin. This gel feels heavy on application but within a minute your skin seriously drinks it up and you are left feeling clean, smooth, and comfortably moisturized. I get absolutely zero breakouts from this and I am amazed by how much this product has improved the texture of my skin. It gives you a healthy glow without making you look dewy or wet, which can enlarge pores. This is really the best day time moisturizer, though I would suggest something heavier before bed. You get the biggest bang for your buck with this product too. Other moisturizers I’ve used before this are triple the price of this while only giving you a quarter of the amount! I’m hooked for life.
Leaves my skin balanced! I have very oily skin and I use it in combination with other Clinique oil free products. LOVE.
I like this, it calms skin after it feels tight, only problem is; with continous use I have noticed larger pores! This turned out to be harming me more than helping.
This is a holy grail!! Love this stuff!!! Does what it needs too!!
It’s the best for my oily skin! I like how light and moisturizing it is without being greasy. It also lasts me about 2 months for the 26$ size and I use it everyday twice a day
I love this moisturizer! It’s perfect for oily skin.
I have very oily skin & I have tried so many moisturizers Murad mattifying , etc and none have helped my oil like this one! I love it and will definetly recommend it. great base for under makeup!
Favorite moisturizer! Perfect for oily prone skin.

This lotion is a great consistency - it absorbs well and doesn’t leave a residue on your face like I’ve found with other moisturizers.  The only complaint I have is that I wish it was a tad more moisturizing.

I have dry skin and this worked really well for me during the summer months. Now that winter is coming around (I live in Montreal, so winter is somehow a very wet cold), this is already not moisturizing enough, so I’ll mix it with oil until I’m done and get a cream moisturizer for the winter, then repurchase this for the warmer months.

I’ve been struggling to find a moisturizer that doesn’t create more oil on face, but still moisturizers well and this is great for oily skin since it is very lightweight And great for every day of the year
It’s really good!! Worth the money. I have oily skin and I really like this moisturizing.

Yeah this moisturizer was good for my oily skin like it stayed matte for a long time but sadly it broke me out! :( I tried it again after like 2 months because I really liked how it worked under my makeup but unfortunately it broke me out again :/

If you have a normal, combination, or oil skin and need a basic moisturizer, this one is absolutely for you. It is a moisturizing gel formula, so it is really lightweight, absorbs quickly, and does a great job in order to hydrate your skin with fair price. However, in the winter, it won’t make your face moisturized enough as this is gel formula, but Clinique also carries a heavier one, it is Lotion Formula, too. So you can switch to the Lotion Formula when the winter is coming. I have been using this for a couple years, I have tried so many different moisturizers because I always want to explore more, but when my skin is in trouble, I always go back to this one to calm my skin down. It is really an excellent product of Clinique that I keep repurchasing so far!

I’ve used Clinique on and off since high school.  Their moisturizers have to be some of the best around.  When I saw they had a gel I was delighted and am thrilled with the results. It’s lighter and goes on easier than the lotion but I find for me it provides enough moisture that I don’t have to use a separate night moisturizer anymore. And cost size, it works better for me than lots of expensive ones.
Purchased this lotion twice with the entire line and the second purchase made my skin break out. Returning it.
Great choice for someone in there 20’s and 30’s who doesn’t need a heavier cream yet. I use it every day and never looked back!

I really like this moisturizer. I bought the sample because I very rarely get through an entire bottle of moisturizer before looking for another one. I have very acne-prone skin and am currently on some prescription-grade cream for it which makes me very dry. This moisturizer has not clogged my pores at all and worked well with my acne medication. It did not make me oily like other reviewers mentioned. I didn’t give 5 stars only because its not as moisturizing as I would have hoped (especially with winter approaching!) But I just make sure to use a heavier moisturizer at night and that seems to be ok

I used to use Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel when it was in a glass bottle. I drifted away and was using other brands for a while but decided to give it a try again. I was bummed when I saw that they changed the packaging to plastic. The first thing that stood out to me was how much the lotion smelled like petroleum. It also feels very heavy and sticky on my skin. I have sensitive, combination skin and don’t feel that it benefits or harms my complexion but I’m going to return it and try something a little lighter that doesn’t smell. Sorry, Clinique... I like your price point but you lost me on this one.
review_title: Smells like petroleum, heavy, sticky, and oily

review_text: I bought this on a whim after the Sephora employee used I on my face when she did a foundation application. I have combination oily skin. I bought the smaller tube to see how well it works and can go back later to buy the bigger bottle if needed. I wash my face in the AM with my normal face wash (Cera Ve) followed up by my Sunday Riley Martian toner. Then I put this moisturizing gel on and my skin has stayed matte and hydrated for several days now. Even now after wearing it all day, no oily slicks! The gel is light and doesn’t make my skin feel greasy. It absorbed quickly and can’t really smell it. So far I approve.
This is by far the best moisturizer for oily skin on the market. I use it nightly in my routine and I can feel a difference when I don’t use it. 10/10

The sales associate raved about this so I thought I’d give it a try but with my combination skin, the moisturizer still makes my face feel dry after one application. I usually have to do a few to get a “moist“ feeling.
review_title: Face still feels dry after using

review_text: I have not ever been so oily as I have been since using this product. I went a day without moisturizing to compare, and I am much less oily than I am while using this product. It will most definitely moisturize but, I am highly disappointed. Would not recommend.
Its a nice cream lightweight and it has a pump but it does nothing for my oils, any way it keeps my skin hydrate and soft.

In short, this moisturizing gel is a non-greasy but moisturizing one! It leaves my skin soft and smooth in the dry weather! I love the point that it absorbs really quick! Owing to my combination-oily skin type, I rarely purchase any moisturizer that do not label themselves to guarantee “blemish free“ , but my skin has some issue with salicylic acid recently due to weather change, so after reading all the reviews I decided to give this moisturizing gel a try! I love this gel and would definitely buy it again!

To start things off, I have oily and acne prone skin (your typical teenager) and had some serious problems with breakouts last year. But then I discovered this- trust me when I say my skin has never been better. Not only has my acne gone down, my skin has this gorgeous glow. To those who said their skin felt too dry: maybe the moisturizing lotion will be a better match for skin that is a little more of a dryer type. But in the end, I can’t live without this product!!
review_title: the best moisturizer I've ever had!

review_text: Amazing product : ) I have been using the moisturizer gel along with cleanser and gentle face wash for probably 5 years now and my skin has never been better LOVE IT!!!! Highly recommend to anyone!
I’ve been using this for over 10 years.The best and it’s relatively inexpensive compared to other moisturizers out there of the same quality

I have oily skin in some areas of my face and dry in others like around my mouth and my chin. This gel gives just the right amount of moisture in both areas. And when you compare the price to other great moisterizers like shisedo it is so much more affordable and you don’t have to sacrifice quality at all. I always order the jumbo size and it lasts me all year!
I love the way this feels right after I apply it, but my face is dry by the middle of the day. I think I might need a stronger one... maybe?
review_title: Feels nice, but does not last through day

review_text: With combination skin, I have a hard time finding the product to hydrate but not make me super shiny by noon.  I’ve been using the product for about 3 weeks now and very happy- it’s lightweight and absorbs quickly.  Even on my dry areas, I don’t need to use a ton of product.
My most favorite moisturizer ever! Been using it for years. Great for oily skin.

I have very oily skin and needed something specifically just to moisturizer my skin without making it oily. It’s good for that specific reason, if ur not looking for any other benefits than this is a great option

Great moisturizer at a reasonable price. I use about two pumps a day, and it goes a long way. The bottle lasts a long time. Makes my skin super soft. It instantly moisturizes & relieves tight, dry areas. It is super lightweight and effective.

Love this moisturizer! I tried it in a sample I got from becoming Rouge, and didn’t expect to like it so much! I unfortunately bought it right at the turn of the season and didn’t think about how my skin always gets so dry this time of year, so it’s a bit useless for me at the moment, but when my skin /is/ oily it’s the best thing out there.
Good for oily skin. Doesnt do much for texture or wrinkles but its a descent price point compared to other gel moisturizers.
I guess it’s moisturizing but I hate the texture and I hate how it feels on my skin.
I’ve been using this product for years. Even though I like to try different brands, I always come back to this one here.
LOVE this for oily skin!!! Doesn’t break me out and helps hydrate my skin without making it feel greasy and nasty.

This is so good!!!!!!! I finally found a good moisturizer after years of searching!!!! This is extremely light weight and sinks into your skin so good. It makes my face look so plump and moisturizer and it doesn’t make my face oily! :) if you have oily skin this is the best moisturizer in the world! I’m in love with this!
My skin is oily combo and I am really loving this moisturizer for my face! It goes on pretty wet, but then dries matte leaving my skin smooth and ready for the day!
keeps my skin nice and moisturized throughout the day. i use it as part of the 3-step system and this has been my best skin yet!

I have always used drugstore moisturizers and my skin has always been too greasy from them or get irritated from them.  I recently went to sephora and got a sample of this gel.  I was skeptical because many reviews said that it was amazing for oily or combination skin and mine was on the dry to normal side.  I did not want to try the “Lotion Plus“ because it has mineral oil.  I tried this lotion and immediately saw a difference in my skin.  My skin used to be red and have small little bumps on my forehead.  I didn’t know what the bumps were, they did not look like pimples or blackheads, they were just texture.  This lotion cleared up all my bumps and reduces the redness in my skin.  It soaks in extremely fast so I am able to put my head on my pillow and go to sleep within minutes of using the moisturizer.  It works amazing for my normal teenage skin and I will continue using it forever.  A NEW HOLY GRAIL. -- works well with my Purity face cleanser.

my entire life i have struggled with acne. I recently found out that part of the reason was i wasn’t moisturizing or exfoliating. so i began a routine: Spectro jel blemish prone cleanser & this amazing Clinique moisturizing gel in the morning. Then I do the same at night but I also apply the eradiakte spot treatment. once a week i exfoliate with an aveda tourmaline charged exfoliate. i now have no acne, only left with the aftermath of scars but im sure it will fade. i was scared to try this moisturizer but it’s so amazing, won’t break you our or irritate, gives just enough moisture. i recommend 100%, and good luck to finding your skincare routine!

I’m 21 with acne prone, hyper sensitive skin and this works amazing! It’s not too thick won’t clog ur pores, but gives u enough moisture so ur skin won’t get oily and still have that healthy look to it. I used this for the first time and in one night have seen a difference in my skin! My routine is:Clinique acne foam cleanser ( remove makeup)Murad acne cleanser to clean my poresClinique acne gel all over face to prevent and heal existing breakouts And then this moisturizer.My skin looks better already!

I cant express my love for this in words i have crazy oily and acne prone skin but using this with clinque toner have changed my skin for ever i love it in both summer and winter.its v good for v oily skin.i definitely recommend this for v oily skin.
I love this!! It doesn’t leave my face shiny at all. It makes my foundation apply like a dream!
Literally have no words for what this did for my skin! It’s literally so great! I love ❤️

Best moisturizer I’ve come across for my skin! I have really oily skin and most lotions leave a shine on my face. This goes on matte and stays matte while keeping my fave fresh and soft. Does not dry out my skin and is so light weight! I purchased thè 1.7 Oz bottle to try it out and will definitely purchase the bigger one with time. I only need a dime size squeeze for my face and use any left over on my neck.

I have been using this stuff for almost 20 years now, literally the day my mother introduced me to it at 16 years-old. I swear by it, use it morning and night, use it for immediate dry spot treatments, and will never change. I have and always recommended it to others and I have made a handful of friends into true believers already!

I received a sample, immediately fell in love and had to buy the full size. It is the perfect moisturizer for combo/oily skin. It gives just the right amount of hydration without any greasy feel or look. It’s also one of the more affordable options. I did recently notice that the largest size (that I purchased) is not no longer available:( I hope it is still being produced and I can purchase it elsewhere since I assume that it’s just discontinued for Sephora Canada as that seems to be happening a lot lately:(
review_title: Holy Grail Moisturizer for Oily Skin!

review_text: This is absolutely the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. I have really oily skin and this balances it out, makes it silky and cool to the touch, and prevents acne. Absolutely love it.
I have oily skin and this is the best product I have found! I’ve used it for years and refuse to leave it. Maintains a dewy look without looking greasy.

THIS CLEARED MY ACNE LIKE NO OTHER.I have naturally oily skin but have realized that some (read: most) acne face washes tend to dry out my face and make it tight after cleansing. This moisturizing gel tones things down and bring my skin back to its happy medium.Definitely in love with this product; so so happy with it.

This is the holy grail for a young woman with oily skin! I use this right after the clinique liquid soap. Been using for years now; doesn’t break me out, leaves my skin feeling very fresh. Recommend for anyone with combination-oily to very oily skin.
love this moisturize is lightweight ... and good for oily skin will definitely purchase again
I have been using this moisturizer for a very long time. It works great for Oily/Combination Skin. It’s light and not heavy. A little goes a long way.
I love this lotion! It gives your skin lots of moisture but doesn’t make it oily or greasy looking! Great for combo skin!

I’ve been looking for years for a moisturizer for my oily skin trying even some of the high-end moisturizers. I haven’t had luck until I tried this one! It moisturizes all day without me turning into a grease ball a few hours later. So glad I gave this a try. This is now a MUST-HAVE staple in my skin care regimen!!!
this gel makes my skin feel so smooth it’s a very  light moisturizer perfect for my skin

My skin has changed and I no longer needed the lotion + I was nervous that the gel wouldn’t be enough but it’s actually working very well!!! I use the entire Clinique line which helps a lot!!! This has been my skin routine for 5 yrs...

This product actually made my skin drier! I picked it up because I was out of the Lotion+ from Clinique but it is not the same. My skin type is normal but oily on my nose and in between eyebrows. I’m dry right above my eyebrows and the rest of my skin is normal. This made my skin matte but over time, dry af. I am returning it!
I purchased the travel size to try it out. I really liked that it didn’t leave me looking greasy. I ended up purchasing the larger size. Love it so far.
I like using this in the summer especially, when my skin is oilier.  It moisturizes without contributing to breakouts.

I’ve been using this product for years and it is HANDS DOWN the best face moisturizer for combo to oily skin. It’s feels amazing on your skin and best of all, it’s not terribly expensive as far as high quality moisturizers go. Definitely a product everyone should try!
review_title: The best moisturizer for combo/oily skin!

review_text: My skin ranges from combination to normal. Most of the time if i try a new moisturizer, my face breaks out right away (gel or thick cream).So if you’re like me, this Clinique gel is for you. It’s fool-proof, lightweight and doesn’t clog pores, very low chance of breaking you out. My skin is very sensitive and this worked for me.However, i can also say it’s not very hydrating.. A better option for me was Clinique’s Moisture surge gel.
review_title: Good for sensitive skin that tends to break out!

review_text: At first I enjoyed it but then the more I used it I noticed that my skin was getting dryer and starting to break out a lot
Best moisturizer I’ve ever used. Works super well on my oily skin and dry patches.
I love the gel base of this moisturizer. My sensitive skin feels clean and toned yet I get the benefit of hydration. No breaking out with this one. Will repurchase.

Eh. Well, it does function as a moisturizer. And if you’re just looking for a moisturizer without any special skin concerns to be aware of or any added benefits or long term effects, this works. But in consideration of all the advancements in skincare out there, this moisturizer just doesn’t make the cut for my routine anymore. Other moisturizers win out in every category -- from ingredients to visible effects to longevity to texture. You don’t even have to search outside Clinique to find a better moisturizer (although, you ought to-- there’s a whole world out there).  It’s not a bad deal, if you look at the price for a tub of it and the fact that it comes with a pump. But even though it didn’t completely fail me by breaking my sensitive skin out, it also didn’t do anything besides give my skin a little subpar moisture.

While I don’t know how this product will be for the winter, I’ve used it for most of summer and it is pretty good. My skin is usually dry and flaky around my nose even during the summer and this helped my skin alot.
This product is not as what I expected.. Not really moisturizing after an hour and so I need to put on another layer once more. Not worth it!

I will start by saying that I have yet to use this in the winter, when my skin gets very dry, so I don’t know how it will work then... but in the summer, this is perfect. My nose was getting weirdly dry and my makeup didn’t look good as a result, so I figured I’d try this. It’s moisturizing but light because it’s a gel, and my skin seems to love it.

This is the only moisturizer that works for my oily skin! I got the smallest size and it lasted almost 3 months with both my mother and I using it nightly. A little goes a long way, since it’s a gel. We just got two 3oz bottles of the stuff so we won’t have to be without it.
review_title: the only one that works for me

review_text: I got this in the smallest size because my oily, sensitive skin HATES almost everything that touches it. This is such a life saver!! I use morning and night and my skin feels fresh, moisturized and looks great. Will be repurchasing In the larger size when I run out.
I have combination skin and this works fine. It leaves a definite gel finish and feel to the skin while leaving my face feeling hydrated but not clogged. Definitely recommend.

I have been using this product for 2 months now, religiously morning and night after cleansing. My combo skin has never been this balanced in years! My oily T-zone seems to have disappear and I have zero dry patch. I also haven’t had any breakouts.I love the gel formula, it sinks in the skin immediately, no greasy feeling at all. Definitely recommend for combo/oily skin types.
this has been my go to moisturizer for years. it absorbs quickly and leaves my combination skin feeling great without a greasy feeling

This isn’t the most intense moisturizer ever, don’t get me wrong, i only wear this during the day because it keeps me pretty matte and it is lightweight and great to apply before putting on my make up (let it on your skin for a few minutes before applying your make up so the moisturizer is set!) although i do have VERY oily skin i do get dry patches so i use another moisturizer at night that is more hydrating and intense than this but I do love this for the day to day. works great with a matte primer as well!
review_title: Great for before your make up  (for oily skin!)

review_text: I purchased this moisturizer based on a comment I saw saying that it was the fastest absorbing moisturizer. And it is!! Doesn’t leave my face greasy, or sticky all day... I use 1-4 pumps, depending on how I feel, and it always sinks right into my skin. I use it twice a day and it keeps my face soft and smooth! You will not be disappointed if you purchase this!

This moisturizer is great! It’s quite light so it doesn’t add another layer of grease to my already oily face. It doesn’t keep my skin matte all day or anything, but it is a nice and light moisturizer that doesn’t feel heavy on my skin.
I’ve used the Dramatically Different Lotion for years, but my skin has become oily recently, and it was just a little too much.  The gel works great for me!

My super oily skin loves this gel. I’ve tried so many moisturizers and I always feel like an oil slick mid-way through the day. This gel absorbs completely and leaves my skin moisturized and semi-matte. This is all I am using for now!

Wow do I love this product! I have oily, acne prone skin and I really enjoyed this. It left my skin soft and moisturized. It has sun screen in it which is so important and best of all it left me matte and not oily like so many moisturizers can do.

this moisturizer works well and it gentle on places where I get raw skin from eczema but along my t-zone it tends to feel slightly oily and doesn’t feel like it soaks in all the way. I recommend using a very small amount because if you are trying to avoid that feeling then a little goes a long way. It didn’t cause me to break out but it did make my nose a bit shiny.

I bought my mom a Clinique brush with face wash and other goodies and this was the moisturizer it came with. Total life changer. It feels like a gel on your fingertips and feels so soothing going on. My skin drank it right up and left no residue or stickiness behind! There’s no shiny or sticky finish, my skin almost looks matte or natural minus the constant t-zone shine. This super lightweight Formula is awesome for a quick refresher. I don’t moisturize before o put on makeup, only at bedtime so I can’t attest to how it holds up under makeup. No breakouts either! I only ever deal with cystic acne but I’ve managed to get a grip on that with other products.
Very moisturizing, and it smells good

I really wanted to like this, but I couldn’t because it was the cause of my breakouts. I was using this for a while until I ran out and had to buy a cheaper moisturizer from the drug store. That moisturizer wasn’t that great for my oily skin, but I didn’t have any breakouts. I got more money, and decided to buy this moisturizer again. I started breaking out like crazy! I thought that maybe it was because my skin needed to adjust to the switch, NOPE! 3 months later and my skin is still breaking out like crazy. My friend asked what moisturizer I used, and she said this broke her out as well!
review_title: Good for oily skin, but caused breakouts!

review_text: This formula is perfect for oily skin, especially in the summer. It hydrates and then doesn’t leave any residue behind. Your skin will be smooth, and feel dry to the touch yet moisturizers. I cannot believe how inexpensive this lotion is! It’s a win win!!
Hydrates skin without being heavy or oily and fully absorbs in minutes leaving the skin matte and oil free while preventing any dryness.My skin feels so smooth! Love the Clinique line.

For starters, I am very oily and live in hot and humid weather. I do not like creams on my face during the day because it feels too heavy and by the time I step out of my door, I feel greasy and it feels like my face is coming off. So, the fact that this is a gel and absorbs so quickly is amazing to me. This moisturizer does wonders on my skin. It makes my skin feel so clean and baby soft. It also smooths out your skin to make it easier for applying makeup. It’s so light and keeps my face feeling fresh throughout the day. I’ve gone through about four bottles of these, and I do not plan on switching to a different moisturizer any time soon.

I have combination skin, that is more on the dry side. I also have dermatitis, that leaves my skin extra flakey. After using this moisturizer, my skin felt softer and my complexion was more even. It didn’t break me out, or irritate my  skin whatsoever, which is a very rare find as I’ve gone through lots of moisturizers that irritated my skin. This is definitely becoming a permanent part of my skincare routine.

I have oily/combination skin and am rather acne prone. This worked beautifully on the very oily places on my face that didn’t have much acne, but it cause flaking around the places with acne and I had to apply more. Once I applied more to the ance prone areas it was fine. It was also not nearly enough for the normal parts of my face and they felt dry. It might not be the best match for normal skin and I think I’m going to try something else, but if you have very oily skin then this will be perfect for you!

This moisturizer does not work under makeup for me, there’s something about it that makes my makeup cake up and look uneven. I’ve tried it with many different brands/types and still would not recommend for your morning moisturizer if your planning on applying makeupHOWEVER. Perfect night time moisturizer or for days I don’t plan on applying a foundation. Just the right amount of hydration for my combo/oily skin!
I absolutely love this moisturizer! I have really sensitive skin, anything that I’ve tried before this has not worked for me until I found this! my skin has never looked this good

I started using this gel in the beginning of 2016 and I will not use anything else.  I have combo skin but leans more towards oily and this works perfectly for my skin.  I am prone to breakouts and this does not break me out at all.  It is effective in moisturizing my skin without leaving it greasy.  I can wear this under my makeup as well and its a great base. Love it

I’ve been searching for a moisturizer to cater to my combo, extremely sensitive, acne prone skin for such a long time and I have found it! This moisturizer is light weight, doesn’t leave a film(like with aloe vera gel or other “gel“ moisturizers i’ve tried), and scent free. It’s perfect for the summer and winter! I’ve noticed a dramatic difference in the quality of my skin after using this and I highly recommended it to others who have annoying skin - like me :D

I like this moisturizer. It does not break me out and the formula is lightweight like it states in the description. It absorbs fairly quickly and moisturizes well. It doesn’t make me less oily, but it is summer so I don’t expect it to stop that!

I’m in LOVE with this product. It absorbs quickly, so it works great under makeup, and it’s perfect for my combination skin. It doesn’t leave me feeling greasy, but I don’t feel tight and dehydrated either.
Because this is oil-free, it did wonders for my acne. I give this product 100% credit for keeping my skin clear, yet hydrated and looking healthy.

Wanted to love this product so so so much but just couldn’t. First of it does not give hydration to the skin what so ever nor does it give moisture. The smell is a little overwhelming and can lead to a bad headache. I’ve found using a tiny little pump of it every now and then isn’t so bad but to use as a everyday moisturizer is a no go. Will not be repurchasing ever!
I agree with the other reviewers saying there wasn’t enough moisture. This left my skin feeling tight, showing fine lines and wrinkles. Will not repurchase

I was recommended this face moisturizer b/c I have uber oily skin (how oily? makeup has been known to legit slide off my face) BUT I never felt truly moisturized with this lotion.With the gel I felt like I had to keep applying it to areas like around my nose or my chin which are my less oily areas b/c they always felt dryNow I only use it on my T zone, and then the normal moisturizing lotion everywhere else
I love this moisturizer! It’s great for dry skin and doesn’t make me blotchy.I like the gel better than the lotion as it seems to moisturize more.Definitely a fave!

I have combination skin, it’s oily on the cheeks and chin, and extremely oily on the forehead and nose. This is the only moisturizer that makes my forehead seem just oily instead of extremely oily. I consider that a miracle and will definitely keep buying this. It is a lightweight moisturizer, and because of the silicones you only need a little to cover the whole face so it will last a long time. This is not enough moisture for me at nighttime though so I only use it during the day, and it makes a perfect base for either makeup or sunscreen.

Ok. So I have combination skin, but it gets pretty oily in the summer. Therefore, I thought it would be a good idea to switch to a lighter formula to calm down my oil. Nope. This thing made me skin drryyy. I have never gotten dry flaky skin in the summer. ever. I didn’t want to waste product so I tried mixing this with a face oil and that didn’t even help. I could only see this working for the extremely oily.

I just started using this product and I love it. I’ve never used clinic products before and I have to give it to them. It’s great for my oily skin and has actually improved my skin. I can actually see a difference.

I have used this moisturizer for a long time. I bought the 1.7 oz size (in a tube) because I travel a lot and this size is great for that. I also use this size at home. A tube lasts me about four months which is longer than I would have expected. Clinique must have improved their moisturizer in the past couple of years, as I’ve noticed better results.
I love this moisturizing gel I been using this product about 6 years never makes my face oily
So glad I bought this, purchased the smaller one on a whim, going back to purchase the large size

I love this moisturizer! I have combination skin that can sometimes be dry, but will sometimes find myself blotting a couple of times a day, especially through the T-zone. This moisturizes and smooths my skin but never feels heavy or oily. Just soaks right in! Highly recommend!

I have very oily skin and many “oil-free“ moisturizers make my face look even more oily. This one, however, doesn’t do that. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and super soft. Definitely recommend it.

This product was very very drying to my face. I would always have to add another moisturizer on top of this. However, I did find that it worked ok as a primer underneath my makeup. I will not repurchase.

I’m very fussy about skincare products, and rarely expect to be pleasantly surprised by anything (since, at this point, I’ve tried so much). My skin is oily and acne-prone, but also very sensitive, and it’s difficult to find a moisturizer that works with my skin. Love this stuff because even though it goes on like a light gel, it doesn’t leave that sticky residue that one gets from a lot of gel-based products (like serums, etc.). Skin feels moisturized and quenched.

This is my 2nd bottle and I absolutely love this moisturizer. It does help control excess oil, specially over the T-zone. The first bottle (I think 4oz ) lasted me for 2 and a half months. One big change noticeable on my skin was the pimple marks. Even though I take care of my skin to make sure I don’t break out, sometimes it just happens. And the marks are super stubborn. This was indeed my best decision to include in my skin care routine. No breakout, no shine , so excess oil plus keeps skin hydrated. Definitely try it out if you have the above stated skin problems.

I have combination skin with an oily t zone. I’ve tried other lotion-based moisturizers and found that they either made my skin oily or left a lotion-y type residue. When I found this gel moisturizer, I was thrilled! No oily, lotion-y feel, just quenched, silky smooth skin! It absorbs great on its own but I’ve found it works even better over a facial oil! Also, no scent! Just a wonderful, effective moisturizer!
Amazing product. Made my skin feel so nice and not greasy. All the reviews are mad because it doesn’t control oil - it’s not marketed to control oil. It’s just a moisturizer.
review_title: Great - but NOT for oil control!

review_text: I used this product 5 years ago and it made my skin so soft and clear. I think the formula changed, and I re-bought the product and literally it was HORRIBLE. My skin broke out, and it made my entire face red and puffy. I don’t think anyone deserves what happened to me. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
review_title: Honestly if I could give it 0 stars I would.

review_text: I just came to the realization a few years ago that I have oily skin, and I need to be more careful when picking out moisturizers. I noticed that there are a lot more options for other skin types, but I’ve always had trouble finding a good moisturizer for me. I ran across this on the Sephora app as one of the tops for oily skin, so I tried it and I am so happy I did!! This is really absorbent and light. I put it on and my skin feels hydrated, but when I touch my face it feels bare, like I don’t have anything on, which is great because eventually any product sitting on my face eventually becomes an oily, heavy mess. I’ve tried a lot of gel type moisturizers ( Drunk elephant b-hydra gel, tatcha water based gel, belief aqua bomb) and this one I reach for more than anything. I tried the five dollar smaller size first to test it out, and when that runs out I will be buying the fuller size.

It’s such a challenge finding moisturizer for my oily skin. It feels like a never ending cycle of buying and returning products that just don’t work. This one isn’t perfect at keeping oil at bay for an extended period but it’s still really good and worth repurchasing. Hasn’t stopped me from looking for that holy grail moisturizer that I dream will one day tame my oily skin.

Excellent lightweight moisture for every day! I have combination skin and use this with Clinque’s toner system as well and my skin looks clear, clean and even. Even in hot summer climates it doesn’t feel “melty“ or “greasy.“ Only downside is it has no SPF so I look for that in my makeup. Would recommend to anyone and everyone.

This moisturizer is amazing for my extremely oily skin. It’s lightweight, absorbs quickly for almost immediate makeup application, hydrating, and makes a huge difference when it comes to having to blot.
Favorite daytime moisturizer of all time, I always go back to it! It is lightweight and absorbes quickly so I can continue with my makeup and it’s not greasy at all.

I’ve been on a search for ages for something that would moisturize my skin and not making my already oily skin worse. This product did just that, it hasn’t broken me out or made me itchy. It also sits nicely under makeup, most other products sat ontop of my skin and then my makeup would cake up during the day, with this the makeup didn’t move around either or set into the edges of my nose. I will definetely be getting the version with the pump. If you are looking for matteifying properties this is not it, it simply just moisturizes and protects your moisture barrier without making you MORE oily or greasy.

I had high hopes for this product because of all the positive reviews from people with oily skin. I’ve been searching for a face moisturizer to use under my make up in the morning that would help control my very oily skin but this unfortunately didn’t help. I don’t believe it made it worse, but it didn’t help control it either, so it’s not what I was looking for. I had bought the little $5 one so I kept it and have been using it at night. Still on the hunt for something that will help.

I do not see any improvement in my acne-prone skin, however, I think this moisturizer is lightweight and has the right amount of hydration necessary for oily skin. I give it four stars because this product only acts as a moisturizer. I am still on the hunt for a moisturizer that also does something more for my skin overall. I also appreciate that a little goes a long way 2-3 small pumps covers my face and neck area.
I really love thismpisturing gel but everytime i use it i keep sneezing and having runny nose all the time.so i decided to stop using it.

Best moisturizer for oily or combination skin I’m truly in love with this product in gel form. It’s light weight and there is no oily result. Also the amount of product you purchase is actually worth it. $34 for 4.2 fl.oz
Really fresh and doesn’t let my skin greasy. Just excellent. Do not smells good, but it’s worth.
The only basic moisturizer I can use on my oily skin.  I have never had a greasiness issue with this gel and I have been using it for almost ten years.
Life changer if you have oily skin!

I feel bad giving his a low star rating because I think it just wasn’t a good match for me. I have acne prone combination skin, and I purchased this moisturizer because my friend said she loved it. When I put the moisturizer on my skin almost felt dryer than before I applied it. I ended up returning it
I have trouble with both oily and dry skin in different spots. This moisturizer solved my problems! I only need to use a little bit and my skin looks and feels so much better!

I got the travel size to try it and it was great, I loved it. I went ahead and got the 4.2 oz and I hate it. The formula between those 2 is completely different. The 1oz was more like a gel and didn’t make my fade greasy. This one does
Smells of chemicals when you first put it on. I have redness and it didn’t take care of that. It’s alright but I would pass. I didn’t brake out from it. There are better moisturizers out there.

I mix a dab of my oil free sunscreen in with this ,and my skin feels hydrated but never oily. I am getting more combo as I age. In the summer , I use this and my spf. In the drier winter months , I use this and the moisture surge spray. It’s good stuff! I will continue to buy this as long as I am oily skinned.

I have combination skin and this is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used! It doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily or greasy and I can instantly apply my make up. I live in Arizona where the weather in the summer is crucial and this gives me a nice matte yet natural dewy look which I love. It also evens out the texture on my skin because I do often get dry patches

There are users who absolutely swear by this product (or its oil-inclusive sister, Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion), but for me it just didn’t make the grade.  Clinique’s Three-Step Skincare was my first attempt at regular, attentive skin treatment as an adolescent.  It certainly improved over nothing, but it didn’t hold up and I looked elsewhere for more targeted teenage-acne help.  Later, once my skin had mellowed, I returned, and it still just isn’t enough.It provides mild hydration without slicking skin (like the Lotion can).  But even though I’m prone to oiliness, the inclusion of some oil in my skincare prevents the skin from feeling over-dried and keeps it from over-producing oil in response.For those this works for, that’s great, but I suspect that most users will find much better success (and much more comprehensive benefits) from other moisturizing products.

I have oily skin and was using the dramatically different lotion, and it was way to greasy for me. I decided to switch to the gel. WOW. I have been using this for 7 months and it is my holy grail. It mosturizers ammazingly, but isn’t greasy. I have acne and this doesn’t break me out, it is honestly great for oily skin. LOVE!

I bought the type 2 skin care set and it came with the moisturizing lotion. I didn’t know if I would like it as I am use to the gel and I was correct it was too heavy! I love this gel as it gives great coverage, doesn’t make my skin feel heavy or oily and makes me feel moisturized all day!

This is the only moisturizer that works for my sensitive, oily prone skin without leaving me greasy 30 minutes after applying. It fully soaks in and I can apply makeup about 1 minute after. It is light - perfect for summer and oily skin but those with dry skin will likely need something thicker. I only wish it had spf!

I have an oily t-zone, sensitive skin & am prone to breakouts on my chin. This is the only daily moisturizer I’ve found that helps me manage all 3 issues, goes on light & doesn’t feel greasy. I use it on my face & neck alongside a vitamin E eye cream and am very happy with the results.

I use a retin-A product for acne. Using this afterward stung my skin badly and made it turn very red.  For a long time, I thought it was the retin-A causing irritation, but I switched to another moisturizer in clinique line and have not changed the retin-A, and my skin is much happier. Just retried the dramatically different moisturizing gel again tonight and realized it is what was stinging. I am giving it two stars because I am using up what I have left on my hands and it does sink in quickly and moisturize pretty well. Just not for sensitive skin, and maybe interacting with retin-A.

As a person with oily skin this broke me out. I don’t have acne prone skin I just get oily. I didn’t like that after using I had red bumps everywhere. Maybe I am allergic but my husband has dry skin and he loves this. I think it’s the gel consistency. I

Bought this recently and have been using it for about a week and I loveeeee it! It moisturizes and it lasts it doesn’t feel greasy or like it’s sitting on top of your skin it absorbs in and provides lasting moisture, my skin feels so soft and I don’t feel like I get overly oily throughout the day when I use this
Recently bought this and it really is awesome for acne prone skin that needs a little moisture. I’ve been loving this and will definitely repurchase
Love this! Got it for my oily skin and helps make my skin feel soft and avoid becoming shiny on really hot days.

I’m 22 years old and this is my first moisturizer that I’ve used that hasn’t been a free sample given to me, so this is just my results. I have oily combo skin with redness on my nose and cheeks and usually color correct just to prevent it showing later in the day. I just started the 3 step routine with the mild wash, #3 toner, and this gel about three days ago and I already have seen a difference. The little fine lines underneath my eyes are completely gone, my redness has disappeared and I’m able to skip foundation and go with a BB cream, and I’ve got a healthier glow. I also only need to powder once later in the afternoon, and I do my makeup before work around 8:30 so it’s lasting a whole lot longer than before! Completely and totally love this product especially, so great for moisture and oil control!
I have oily skin and this moisturizer feels amazing when you put it on and it does not add onto the oiliness. Love this stuff and have been using it for 3 years

This is my favourite moisturizer I’ve used so far - other moisturizers that bill themselves as being for oily/combination skin are not only few and far between I feel, but super watery and I find I have to apply two layers of the stuff to re-hydrate after cleansing, and even then that’s often not enough.This is a nice consistency that I don’t have to fight with to get enough on my skin and I don’t feel tight and dry after cleansing.

I purchased this to tame my combination skin oiliness on the forehead but it didn’t do the trick. I bought the one for oily skin. I would say I get the same results with any  other moisturizer. 5 hours in and everything slides off my forehead! Maybe it’s better in winter? Otherwise a decent, average moisturizer.

I only used this product for two days and then had to return it. It had a nice texture and absorbed into my skin well, but it didn’t really moisturize at all. It was probably just not appropriate for my skin type..

This moisturizer has been a god send for me. I’ve struggled to find one that doesn’t make my face break out, so I was ecstatic to stumble across this one. It also leaves my skin feeling so smooth, and never causes it to become oily. Great for my combination skin!
This gel is perfect for oily skin. It really helps prevent shine and is so lightweight!
I am always switching up my moisturizer but this is a great moisturizer for oily skin/combo skin! I am loving it!

I have combination skin, which is prone to looking shiny after a few hours (especially the T-zone). I discovered this gel formulation last year and am so happy that I made the switch! (Prior to this, I had been using the Clinique lotion for many years). This product is light, non-greasy and quickly absorbs into my skin, leaving a wonderful canvas for my make-up. My face no longer looks shiny after a few hours.

I purchased this awhile back around October and I still have 1/4 of the pump one left. It’s an okay moisturizer however I’ve noticed lately that it’s been making my face super greasy on my chin and t-zone areas after 3-4 hours upon applying. I use it every single day and night and it hasn’t dramatically changed anything besides my decision to switch to a different moisturizer..

I purchased this very recently and have only been able to use it a few times but so far I am in love! This goes on smoothly and absorbs in to the skin beautifully. It leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. I recommend this for a combo/oily skin. I am 33-years-old, so I am not quite to the point of needing to use ani-aging creams as they are usually too thick and make my skin oily. This is a wonderful skin hydrator and I highly recommend it. I love a lot of Clinique’s products. They have a better price point than a lot of other brands and they have been around for many years. If you are just starting out trying clinique skin care I think the 3-step facial wash, toner, and hydrator would be a great start!

I apply this before i apply my foundation so after i washed off my make up with my cleanser, my face was fully white because of the dry patches all over my cheeks, around my nose and forehead. I have combination skin, some areas are drier than others and some areas tend to get oily but after washing my face with this on, i was shocked to see how badly my face was dried out.
review_title: dries quickly but after you wash your face...

review_text: I’ve almost used a whole bottle of this. I used it first as my daily moisturizer and then I thought it was causing my skin to become oily so I switched it to my night moisturizer. After doing that for a while i reversed its order again for daytime and it’s working well. This is the first gel moisturizer I’ve used and it was very different in a good way for my oily skin! It sits nicely and soaks into the skin fairly fast. Doesn’t feel tacky and does what it’s supposed to do.

I have extremely dry skin. Wait, let me correct that. I HAD extremely dry skin. Girl, let me tell you this: THIS GEL IS AMAZING. My face feels baby soft after applying this. I recommend this over the lotion version because this gel is extremely lightweight and refreshing. BUY THIS. WORTH EVERY PENNY.
I bougt the travel size and tried it.... Omg! It works great for my skin. I have normal to dry skin... And this gel leaves my skin soft and absorbs fast.... I will repurchase asap...

Overall I can’t have anything bad to say about this products. If you suffer from oily and dry skin this is a good solution. I would say if you have acne using this is a moisturizer isn’t a good idea because it can get greasy if your already battling oily skin. I will repurchase as a staple in my beat it regimen.
I love this lotion. It is perfect for oily skin and does not cause me to break out with acne. This lotion works perfect during all seasons and can be used under any makeup.

I’ve been using this daily for the past couple of weeks. It is by far the best moisturizer I’ve used. It controls my oily skin without clogging my pores, which is no easy feat. Clinique has found a longstanding customer with this product.
I was expecting more from this product. The reviews are so great, but I found the gel quite average. It was not moisturizing enough for my skin. Is it bad? No. Is it good? Meh.

I freaking love this stuff. It is the only moisturizer I have ever used that moisturizes my skin without leaving a residue. It absorbs very quickly, is very lightweight, and is also buildable (i.e., one pump will lead to sheer moisture all over, but two pumps will help if for some reason my skin is very dry that day).

I have purchased this lotion before so it is a fave for me. Only use it when the weather starts to warm up.  I have combination oily skin and it does a great job in spring/summer.  I have not experienced any breakouts. It has a pleasant scent that fades. It absorbs quickly and does not leave me with a shiny look.
I don’t see the point of this moisturizer since it does absolutely no moisturizing. This went back after two uses.

I have a oily skin, so it gets a little bit difficult to find a really good moisturizing for my skin type, ’till I found the this one from Clinique. I like this product because it absorbs quickly and does not make your face looks shinny. The only thing I will suggest to Clinique could be to put sun protection
Been using this for a month or so and love the way it feels! Great for oily skin!! Doesn’t leave it feeling greasy but still moisturizers

This is a very lightweight formula, perfect for my combo/oily skin. You can’t even feel it on, it absorbs quickly leaving your face smooth. I like to use this mainly under make up and during the day. At night I’m trying a whole bunch of other products to see if there’s anything else I want to spend my husband’s money on.

I’ve been using this daily for about 4 years! It’s perfect for my dry/combo skin. It’s super lightweight - the gel absorbs quickly and doesn’t feel too heavy under foundation. It’s perfect for layering with primer or sunscreen, and you cannot beat the price point. I can’t see myself switching away from it any time soon!

This is my favorite moisturizer of all time, I typically just get something from the drugstore to moisturize my face but I doubt I will ever go back to that now. It’s very gel like in consistency and slightly cooling which is wonderful for warmer months and great for before putting on makeup. It’s non greasy so you don’t have to wait awhile for it to soak it. Totally worth the money, you will not want to use anything else ever again.

I have oily and acne prone skin and have been trying to change my skincare regimen to address those concerns. That being said, I took to looking up moisturizers for oily skin and this one won out due to the reviews and price point.But man, I wish I bought a smaller size of this. I’ve been using it for close to a month now, and while it’s not the worst thing I’ve ever used, I feel like this moisturizer is useless for me. I need about 3+ pumps each use to feel like it’s remotely absorbed into my skin. I also have to layer it which takes more time than I’d like in the morning/before bed. Another thing I’ve noticed is that the remnants of a hormonal breakout I had over a month ago have been sticking around longer than usual, and has even gotten slightly worse since using this :(I threw out the box and the receipt so I’m not sure if I can return at this point, but I’m going to try. I’m pretty disappointed because I wanted to love this and have it work for me, but nope!
Doesn’t break me out, and I love using it to dilute my foundation when I want lighter coverage

This moisturizer reminds me of my grandma, it is what she used forever. Everyone wants something new and flashy so I dismissed this as an option for me. However, it is harder than I thought to find moisturizers that are completely fragrance free, not in jar packaging and affordable but effective. So I received a sample of the Dramatically Different Lotion and gave it a try. I really did like it, it was just a bit too greasy for me. I have pretty “normal“ to combo skin that can sometimes get oily in the t zone and dry around the edges of my face and especially under my eyes (probably from the Retinol I use) So I wanted to try the gel, and I am in love. It is perfect. Just a perfect amount of hydration and soaks in super quick. I usually just use my regular face moisturizer for under my eyes, but with this gel i had to use something with more hydration in it for under my eyes. It doesnt bother me at all because my face feels so good all day and my makeup applies beautifully on top of this.   My favorite thing about this gel is how lightweight it feels after applying. That is something i will appreciate more as the weather gets hotter. I also use a bunch of different products and treatments on my face at night and it tends to feel really cakey before I go to bed and i wake up the next morning looking like a grease ball. With this moisturizer it doesnt feel like i have added anything extra, which is really nice, and the next morning my face is nice and smooth without the grease. Really love it. If you have normal, combo, or oily skin or if you have tried the Dramatically Different Lotion and it was too greasy feeling for you...try this, it is perfection.

I wanted a moisturizer that wasn’t too heavy, but also would leave my skin feeling hydrated. Since I have oily skin I also would like something that is hydrating enough so that my skin wouldn’t look shiny a few hours afterwards. This did that exactly for me!!!! I plan on purchasing more, the bottle bought two months ago is still halfway full! Great purchase, worth every penny.

People clearly don’t read descriptions. The gel is for drier skin while the lotion is for combination skin. That being said I love the gel form. I use it before applying makeup and my foundation applies so smoothly. Also, I love how light weight and absorbing it is but I must say if you’re looking for a night time moisturizer look else where as this is too lightweight. The lotion form felt tacky once applied on my face and it didn’t absorb as quickly as I would have liked.

Looove this moisturizer! Perfect for oily skin. All you need is two simple pumps and ta-da!:) I’ve tried several moisturizers but none work like Cliniques moisturizer! It doesn’t leave that oily slick feeling on your face like most do! It’s a must buy if you’re oily prone/acne prone!
This is the best moisturizer for oily skin. My skin just drinks it in without making it greasy and lasts all day.

It’s hard for me to find a face product that doesn’t leave me greasy, even after all day of wear no greasier  than if I didn’t have anything on. I love this!! And it didn’t break me out everything breaks me out.

I’ve been using the dramatically different line since the age of 12, and specifically he gel since it was introduced. This has by far been my favorite moisturizer for everyday under foundation. It soaks in very quickly and has a short dry time. Now that I’m older and my skin is more dry and showing signs of aging, I mix various beauty oils and serums based on my needs that day. This lotion mixes beautifully with everything! Holy grail product.

Great product for humid climates, but not long-lasting enough for me in the desert.  Very lightweight, super quick absorbing gel.  Not the biggest fan of how much the pump dispenses... one pump isn’t enough, two is too much.  Meh.  First world problems.  Still buy it for travel.

Definitely not one I’d even recommend for combination skin as it offers very little hydration. It’s a light weight gel that delivers moisture for pretty much the time it takes for it to sink in but the moisture simply doesn’t last. I believe it would be better suited for the oilier ladies as it made my dry areas feel even drier and I had to follow up with an oil. I do like the lotion version of this as it’s much mor hydrating without making you feel oily

I travel a lot between my house and my not-boyfriends house (its complicated) so this is the perfect moisturizer for quick and easy every day use. It goes on cool and absorbs very quickly. Super light-weight and not greasy. I have super sensitive skin and this formula doesn’t clog my pores or causes breakouts.When I went to Colorado for snowboarding, I had to add oils to this because its not intense enough for that kind of dry air. In Texas, its just fine to use everyday under my powder foundation.
This is my favourite moisturizer of all time, I have been using it for years. I have very sensitive skin and this product is gentle and feels very lovely on the skin.
It didn’t clog my pores and is a lightweight moisturizer. I have combination skin (oily t zone) and it didn’t hydrate the parts of my face that are dry. Is a good daily moisturizer but not the best.

Definitely a lightweight moisturizer. I don’t know about it being an all-day moisturizer because I could see having to reapply which I don’t like doing. It didn’t clog my pores like other people were suggesting.
I never break out ever and when I used this product I got pimples like crazy, it isn’t well at moisturizing either.

My skin is combo-oily, with an oily t-zone and dryness between my eyes, on my cheeks, and around my mouth. This didn’t make me oilier or break out, but it did not take care of my dry spots, so back it went.
review_title: Just okay, Didn't really moisturize my skin

review_text: After reading the reviews, I thought this would be a great moisturizer. Not. Makes me breakout anytime I use it. Waste of money :(

I have extremely oily skin. I’ve always tried different moisturizers even ones with no oil like this one but they always make my skin greasy. This moisturizer is very different than anything I’ve tried. It makes my skin smooth and silky but no where near oily which is insane for me, considering every moisturizer I’ve ever had makes me oily. I’m going to be using this for as long as I have this skin type.

It made a huge difference for my skin. The texture, the look and feel. I got this in a set for combination oily to oily. I have acne prone skin and this feels amazing. I use it day and night and after the Clinique scrubs.

I am always so excited to use any Clinique product, this one was no different. My friends swore by this so I thought I would try it out and I want dis disappointed. It did not soak into my skin at all and my makeup would not apply to my face. I don’t know whether I always get duds or if this brand just isn’t for me but it unfortunately did not work at all.
This product is great. Leaves m skin feeling hydrated and smooth. Although I am more on the oilier side, I might switch it up because I can tell it’s making my face a bit more oily than usual.

I’ve been using this product for about a month now every morning. I have to say I love how lightweight yet effective it is. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave my skin oily (which pretty much everything does).

Unnamed: 0: I definitely see a difference in my skin’s texture. Much smoother and overall healthier looking. Not nearly as dull as before. I gave it four stars because it’s not as brightening as I had hoped.
I’m not sure if it’s this lotion on it’s own or a combination of steps in my skincare routine that’s giving me the results. Either way I will keep using it!

review_text: i wanted to love this moisturizer. i have combo skin oikly tzone and DRY cheeks. if i dont take care of my skin it starts to look dull an breakout. after using this product i started noticing that my skin started having extremely bad whiteheads/clogged pores! EVERYWHERE to the point that my  hubby even noticed all the breakouts. i gave it another chance an used it for 1 full week and again clogged pores an bumps! wont be able to use this for my everyday routine! the gel does dry quickly an your skin does feel moisturized tho just wasnt for me
I have dry skin, and I instantly fell in love with this gel. I tried the sample sized first, but needed to get the full bottle.
This product left my skin feeling dewy & didn’t absorb into my skin like I would have wanted. It also didn’t help with my t-zone, like it said that it would.
Feels great on skin- hydrates your skin very well! Sinks right in.
I’ve tried a lot of moisturizers that just didn’t even come close to the power of this stuff. I have combo/oily skin and I use this on the 3 step skin care set and I absolutely love it.

I recently returned to this after using an unscented, lightweight moisturizer for months. The other brand is good, but this is noticeably better and leaves my skin softer. I’ll be switching back to this for sure.

I love this stuff-- dries fast, dries matte. It’s much better than the sticky lotion, however since I do have normal skin around my chin and exfoliate frequently, I do get a tiiiiny bit flaky there! But that’s due to my own neglect. Ah, well-- best moisturizer I’ve ever used nonetheless!

Been using this moisturizer for about 2 years makes my skin feel amazing, hydrated and not greasy! Use it both morning and night and has helped to reduce severity of my break outs and is wonderful on my sensitive skin!

I started using this product along with the mild facial soap and the clarifying lotion in the 3 step process they recommend at Clinique, twice a day. I found that my skin got super oily when I used this moisturizer during the day, so I decided to use a different moisturizer for daytime and do this process only at night. I wake up to soft, glowy skin whenever I use this gel. It is very gentle and I would definitely recommend this product.

This is literally the only moisturizer I have ever found that I can wear without turning into an oil slick or breaking me out!! I use this morning and night, it’s actually kept my pores clean and my skin feels amazing. My make up sits better and it’s absorbed instantly without that heavy moisturizer feel. A little goes a long way with this! The pump bottle easily lasts my 6 months. Totally worth the price and drastically cheaper then most higher end moisturizers
Light lemony scent, weightless feel. Great for oily skin in the winter when my cheeks and under eye area are a bit dry.Not a deep or heavy moisturizer. Perfect for my older, acne prone skin.

I’m in love with this product. Over time it doesn’t make my skin oily like my other face lotion that I use to used. I love it so much I switch to this one now it’s my bestie. It’s even perfect to wear under face foundation also. If u have combination skin try it.
I love the gel. I apply it every morning and night. It is light and does not leave me oily. It’s my favorite. I recommend it if you have oily skin.

I know some people swear by this product, which is why I was so excited about it. I have combination/acne prone skin, enlarged pores... you know the story. I was told the gel consistency would be perfect for my oily skin but this made me breakout like crazy. I know it has worked wonders on some of my friends who have similar skin but it did not do the trick for me. Maybe try a sample first... that’s my take on it.
I have combination skin that tends to get oily. I found it really great to moisturize while not creating excess oil. Skin feels soft, smooth and fresh.

i usually NEVER write reviews but I really wanted to like this product after reading all the reviews about how amazing it was but it broke me out so badly. I have combination skin and I don’t think it was moisturising enough. it would still leave my skin kind of dry. even my oily t zone. it broke me out like crazy. and I’ve never had a product break me out before. I’m even breaking out on my neck!!! my skin looks so gross I can’t wait to return it.
I have a super oily t-zone but extremely dry cheeks and this works perfectly. I don’t use the whole three step system either.
I love how hydrated my skin feels, I use it both night and day

This is awesome the texture and a little goes a long way, I bought this cause they said it worked for oily skin that’s true it seals it in not all day but most of the day. It feels nice on the skin and foundations sits on top, I like it and will recommend to someone
The Gel is best! I have used a TON of different products ranging in low to high price range. This by far is the best.

This moisturizer is definitely a staple in my skin care regimen now. I put in on every night (since it doesn’t contain SPF for daytime use) and my skin is so soft when I wake up the next morning. Best part is...it doesn’t break me out! Which was a fear I had purchasing it. A lot of product so it will last a while and the price is great!
What this is: light, quick absorbing, perfect, it also lasts FOREVER?? I swear it just doesn’t run out.What this is not: oily, greasy, residual, thick, gooey, smelly, acne-causing,
review_title: Lasts forever + my face is so SMOOTH

review_text: It says on the label that it dramatically moisturizes your skin, but I bought it and it caused me to break out. I talked to the skin care specialist and she said that it really shouldn’t be used without a moisturizer underneath. Overall disappointing.

I have very oily, irritated, acne-prone skin and this is the literally the ONLY moisturizer that does not make me break out or make me look greasier. I get dry spots during the winter but then I just put another swipe on and it treats the dryness. A great value too! You really cannot find another moisturizer like this at 4.2 oz for this price.

I have very oily skin. I still want to moisturize but it was almost impossible to put on moisturizer and then my makeup without looking like i’d been swimming. The GEL moisturizer from clinique is perfect. It goes on lightweight and is not greasy. Recommend this to anyone!

I have conbination skin, but more on the oily side of it. TERRIBLY on the sides of my nose. All the moisturizers I was using made my foundation practically melt off two hours into the day. I like this because its not really a lotion, it is a gel. Which I didn’t know what to expect before I purchased it, as I’d never used a gel. But its fantastic. It dries quickly and almost has a matte feel to it. I’ll buy this as long as its a part of their line!

I love this gel moisturizer. For so cheap, (14.50$), you get a very decent sized tube, and a little bit goes a looooong way. I am so pleased. I have very dry, yet oily skin and it’s patchy and red in some places, and I feel like this gel keeps it at the right ph balance and it also improves the quality and look on my skin! It really evens out my skin even when it’s the only thing I have on. Would recommend & would buy again :)

I didn’t like how i get dry flaky spots when I put on my makeup. I think I have drier skin than most combination skin people even though I have combination skin. I will switch to the moisturizing lotion just to see if it’s better

I feel like sometimes this gel just barely gets the job done. During the winter months my combination/oily skin tends to get super dry on my nose and forehead and this gel is just a temporary bandaid for the problem. By the end of the night my skin is again super dry and beginning to peel.
Sits well under makeup but it’s not extraordinary for me.

This gel moisturizer is perfect for those w/ combination/oily skin. It is very moisturizing, but it does not make your skin look oily and gross. I bought this during summer because my t-zone kept getting oily and shiny. When I apply this before using Bare Minerals Powder Foundation & Mineral Veil, my skin remains the perfect mix between dewy & matte. It is good to use as a base for foundation and I noticed it helps in preventing my pores from getting clogged w/ foundation.

my skin will literally not take in this product’s moisture. I have dry skin in the winter and combination in the summer and it worked well in the summer. now, my skin is crying for help. it did its job though during the summer months for sure.

i have combo/oily skin, though my skin tends to get dehydrated every now and then. i find the lotion version much more moisturizing for my skin. this gel versions leaves my cheek areas feeling tight and dry. and my skin doesnt feel as smooth. its more lightweight than the lotion, but i still prefer the lotion.

I have combination skin where my cheeks are dry but my t-zone is oily and I found this moisturizer to be okay. It didn’t help with my oils throughout the day and for the dry cheeks, it felt like a very light film over top of my cheeks.. However, it is very lightweight and didn’t cause me to break out

I have been using it on and off for 4 years now. I have oily skin and it definitely moisturizes without making my skin feel sticky or oily. I have tried other products but always end up going back. Im done searching

This lotion is perfect if you’re even the slightest bit oily. I have combination skin which tends toward the drier end in winter, but it still works great for me. No greasy after feel, which is great!

I haven’t been using this product long, but it is amazing! I have oily combo skin that very rarely takes mosturizers well. My skin didn’t feel gross or oily all day after using this product. Definitely going to repurchase this item!
This is hands down the best face lotion I’ve ever used. The gel (as opposed to the lotion) is so light that it never feels cakey or sticky on the skin...highly recommended.
It’s a great formula for oily to normal skin.. I love this formula in the lotion, the gel is not for my skin type
I have pretty clear normal skin. I use this full time in spring, summer and fall and then in the am in winter with a heavier night cream. It dries quick and keeps my skin moisturized.
review_title: it is a classic for a reason

review_text: Holy grail for my oily/combination skin!!

I have had some skin troubles (breakouts) lately, more than normal. I’m trying to use hypoallergenic/gentler products on my skin. This is good -- it feels nice on and goes well under makeup. I’m not sure if it’s helping my skin at all but it’s definitely not causing more irritation.
I got this and was hoping for something great. It does good but nothing really good. Not worth the money. My skin is also very hard to moisturize and is oily.
I’ve been using this for about a year now. It moisturize my face without leaving it greasy. Love it
review_title: Best for combination to dry slin

review_text: I love this product! I have been using Clinique products of many years, and I love that they keep adding to their already great products. I use this moisturizing gel twice a day. It does not leave my skin greasy at all. 2-3 pumps is all it takes for my entire face and neck. I wear this under my makeup and I have noticed that my skin is not drying out like it used to before I used this product. It also helps my makeup go on smooth and last longer. I will buy this again and again in the future!

This moisturizing gel is very light and nongreasy. I use 2 pumps once a day (at night) so it last at least three months. I have sensitive and oily skin and this product does not cause any harmful reaction.
It’s tough to find a good gel moisturizer that does not irritate my skin. This is the exception. So gentle and works great even on my dry areas.
Great for my oily skin!! My face stays moisturized all day without becoming oily. Definitely recommend!!!
Best moisturizer ever!! Definitely recommend if you have oily to oily combonation skin.
Prefer this gel over the regular moisturizer because it does not feel as watery . Can’t tell if it makes a difference but I like to use some moisturizer every morning and night.

I’ve been battling acne for over ten years now (I’m 24) and this is one of my holy grail items. This is one of the few moisturizers that does not break me out and makes my skin feel like it got adequately moisturized. I just use two pumps at night on my face and neck. And it lasts for a long time. I’ve had mine for a few months and I still have 1/3 of the bottle left.
this product is great, it hydrates your skin with just a small amount
Best moisturizer hands down for acne prone skin.Super fast absorbing and really adds great moisture to the skin.
great for my oily skin i love it its not too muh but enough also LOVE the texture
I like the feel of this product and it works good when i get home after work to put moisture back into my dry skin
I’m oily!!! And this moisturizer keeps me hydrated without the access oil. Keeps me pretty matte

I have combination skin with mild-to-moderate acne problems. I’ve previously tried the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, but it was a bit too “lotion-y“ for my face and felt like it took forever to absorb. But I love this version so much more! It really is lightweight and sinks into the skin quickly. It’s perfect...but only during warmer months like summer. For winter time, it doesn’t really moisture that well despite living in California weather, so I need something a little bit more hydrating. Still, this works great as an everyday moisturizer.
Love this moisturizer. I have oily skin and it’s the only thing that works! Moisturizes but doesn’t leave me oil and it’s lightweight. MUST HAVE!
