This just doesn’t seem to quite moisturize enough for me. It’s just a little too lightweight and I don’t feel like it is really soaking in and hydrating my skin. Shortly after applying my skin feels dry to the touch again. I have combination skin, but it might do better for someone who only needs very lightweight moisture.

My dry/combo skin boyfriend loves this in place of proactiv’s moisturizer! It’s the only balance he’s found that keeps his extremely sensitive skin from being red and from it being dry at the same time!

This product is a great moisturizer for anyone who is naturally oily or young. It would also be great for someone new to moisturizers or to department store moisturizers that doesn’t want to spend a lot of money.This product is very light and is absorbed easily. It does not leave residue, so its perfect for before make up and before bed! It’s great for sensitive skin and acne prone skin.What this product is not great for is shaved skin. My boyfriend used this after a shave and found it slightly irritating. (His skin is not sensitive to much).It isn’t as powerful as other moisturizers out there, but for the price it’s good.
Love all the clinique cleansing products
Loveeee this product
I am a fan of both formulas of the Dramatically Different Moisturizer (cream and gel), but I find the gel ideal for very day use. It is so light weight but so effective at clearing up dry skin.

Ohhh baby! This stuff is amazing! I love it for everyday use because it is so light weight but it still definitely does the job! I don’t like the heavy feeling that a lot of lotions/creams leave on my skin so this stuff works perfect for me!I even put some on my back where I’ve been breaking out a lot and the next morning my blemishes were practically gone! NEW FAVORITE!!

I am an oily folk and I am extremely happy about this. I’m not really a fan of their other products, but this one really hits the spot for my oil control. This moisturizer really keeps my face feeling fresh and hydrated without causing me to feel layered up by tons of lotion. A little goes a long way, I use it in the morning after my face cleanse and at night. Keep me feeling fabulous, my boyfriend has recently started falling in love with it also!

I’ve been using the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion since I was a teenager, but I always had to stop using it in the summer because it was just too heavy. Now I finally have a lightweight version!It moisturizes well without causing my sensitive combination skin to break out, it’s light, it absorbs quickly.
review_title: Lightweight version of the moisturizer I love!

review_text: This was my go to moisturizer for years. It did not completely absorb into my skin, and left a little residue. It did well on my extremely sensitive skin but it never gave me the full hydration that i needed. This is a good fit for those who need just a little moisture. I have switched to First Aid Beauty’s Intense Hydration Cream and it gave me everything that I hoped for from this cream!
Not really what I was expecting. My skin is definitely combination/oily and it dried out my skin. It also left some sits on my face really slippery.
I like this moisturizer but it wasn’t exactly what I was hoping for. My skin is combination-oily and I didn’t find it helped much with oil control.

This moisturizing gel has never failed me. I remember my mom using this when I was in grade school (I’m 27 now) so I tried it... been a loyal user since! It’s so nice for oily skin, absorbs pretty quickly. I rarely use a foundation primer because this makes my skin so nice.

I’ve struggled with oily skin/makeup not staying on my skin for a very long time. I’ve tried lots of things - different primers, setting powders, jojoba oil, powder foundations ...etc. I wasn’t looking for a HG or anything - I just wanted my foundation to actually stay on my face for once.This... this just works! I don’t know how it does but for the first time I don’t have an oil slick on my face by the end of the day, with my foundation and concealer melted away. I do have a slight glow at the end of the day but nothing close to shiny/oily. (Oh that part around the nose still gets oily but for me it’s not a big deal.I find that using this only in the daytime works best. When I use it at night too, my skin actually gets a bit dry so I just opt for my regular moisturizer then.TLDR; Oily skinned girls: Definitely check this product out!
review_title: I would like to confirm that this is magical.

review_text: I must admit that I had not used a moisturizer (or much skin care products) at all before purchasing this product and a couple of others. I have always been nervous that moisturizers would make my face greasy or break it out. I really like this product; it does not make my face greasy (at all) and it just makes it very smooth. It absorbs almost instantly- I put my makeup on directly after- and it seems to contain the normal oil I usually get in my T-Zone.Worth a try for the price (other nice moisturizers are quite expensive)!

This has done wonders for my skin. I was using low quality products for ages and noticed how dull and textured my skin had become from it. This moisturizer was part of the reason why my skin is now incredible. It leaves my oily areas so smooth and not greasy at all, and my dry areas are moisturized with no patchiness. The price is reasonable considering the wonders it’s done for me. I will never go back to low quality drugmart products again.
Great moisturizer! I have oily skin and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy at all, moisturizers and absorbs right into my skin. Love it.

I really wasn’t impressed with this - I have combination skin and wanted a lightweight moisturizer but this didn’t moisturize *at all*. It made my skin...slippery but that’s about it. I suspect this is mostly silicone. What’s even weirder is that it made my foundation ball up on top of it even though my foundation is also silicone based and it should go together, nicely. The only pro here is that it didn’t made me break out and I love that all of Clinique’s products are unscented.
I have very sensitive skin and this lotion is a blessing for it. Very reasonably priced for the awesome quality you get!

This is my go to moisturizer. It absorbs really quickly and leaves the skin feeling amazing. It’s not oily at all, which is a huge plus for my combination skin. By far the best moisturizer I’ve ever used.

I have been using the dramatically different lotion for quite some time but I felt my skin was getting a bit on the oily side, so I decided to try this. It was not for me. I think unless your skin is very oily, do not use this product, it dries up your skin. I will go back to use of the lotion.

This gel absorbs very well into my oily skin. It’s moisturizing and not heavy at all. Only complaint is that it doesn’t have spf so i can only use it when i don’t plan on going out, or at night when i need some light nigh time moisture.

I am and always have been an absolute oil slick. Everything and I mean everything slides off my face, I have to blot 20 mins after I apply makeup and multiple times throughout the day. I have never used anything like this and my only regret is that I didn’t discover it sooner! It hydrates my skin beautifully, sinks in immediately and leaves a soft-matte finish. Every other moisturizer I’ve ever tried left my skin looking and feeling greasy. This has a lightweight, gel consistency that glides over the skin nicely and sinks right in. It magically controls my oil and I legit only have to blot once during the day now. TOTAL game changer! If you struggle with oily skin, get this...yesterday. Listen to me now and thank me later!

This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used! Always heard such great things about it, I finally went ahead and purchased it. Best purchases I ever made, it’s excellent for my oily acne prone skin. It keeps me moisturized and is not greasy at all..I love it!

This is perfect as a daily moisturizer before makeup it’s not too greasy and it absorbs almost instantly. It soothes dry spots. Definitely a great moisturizer. I’m 19 with oily skin and it’s also very light on my skin.
This went on smooth with no scent and disappeared into my skin. I just use my regular makeup over it. Best of all it has spf

I actually bought this as a gift for my relatives but I was left with an extra one so I decided to try it out for myself. Although I have normal skin, I enjoyed using this moisturizer. It’s lightweight and absorbs very quickly. It spreads very easily. I only need to use a pump or so to cover my whole face.Pros:- Absorbs quickly.- Lightweight.- Spreads very easily.- Hygienic (pump bottle).Cons:- I found it not hydrating enough for cold winter days. However, I can’t really complain about this as this moisturizer is developed for combination to oily skin, not normal skin.
i have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate it at all and applying my makeup is a dream because my skin is soooo smooth!

this gel is perfect for acne prone/oily skin. I tried the lotion version by accident and broke out like crazy. This gel is moisturizing but doesn’t make me oily/breakout. The only flaw is i wish it helped with fine lines
Love this moisturizer ! It makes my skin feels so soft after applying it. Have been using it since a month now. I have a combination skin and this just stays on all day without making it greasy.
this is one of the best Moisturizer that i have ever used and i have used like 50 and stopped my search. i will always will use this moisturizer.
This is the perfect moisturizer to use daily under your makeup! It sinks into your skin fast and doesn’t leave a residue. I truly do love this stuff!

My younger sister bought this for me as a holiday gift (Happy Chanukkah!) and this moisturiser has absolutely changed my skin for the better! My skin started changing around 2 years ago and it wasn’t as oily. Yet I used the same facial lotion which I could feel weighed heavily on my pores. Serums from Dr Jart and Ole Henriksen left my skin too dry and were very expensive. This gel not only controls my sebum production during the day (ie I am not as oily), but it also gives me enough moisturisation without it feeling heavy and sticky upon application. It also works very well with foundation and powder makeup. If you have skin like me (the in-between old and young and doesn’t know what it wants to be type) I suggest you give this a go. It doesn’t break the bank either.
This product is very hydrating and soothing on the face.

LOVE this moisturizer. I have super sensitive skin and struggle to find skin products that do not make me break out or get a rash. This moisturizer does not leave my skin feeling like there is grease slabbed all over my face, even when I have to apply a lot to really moisturize dry patches. It also smells very clean. After using daily for about 2 weeks, my face feels and looks noticeably softer and smoother. I would have given it 5 stars if I didn’t have to use so much to moisturize dry patches and if it had SPF in it for everyday sun protection. I definitely recommend!

The myth that oily skin people can’t use actual moisturizing moisturizers should end. I bought the travel size version of this when I accidentally left my usual moisturizer at home and this did nothing. I have a really oily t-zone and dry patches on my cheeks and around my nose and this didn’t even moisturize my oily areas. When you try to rub it in, it’s like it just disappears. Make-up was harder to apply because it left my skin feeling rough and dry. Oily skin people, don’t be afraid to use more hydrating formulas

I have very oily skin, so I understand the idea of putting a moisturizer on your face is a bit difficult. You don’t want to put more oils on your face yet you don’t want to have wrinkles. This product is gel formulated for that. The difference between this and the lotion is that this has all those extra oils out. Overall this product is great and I will continue purchasing!
i love this product as it it goes on and soaks into the skin really really easily, it took about 3 days for me to really notice the difference in my skin, would deffinatly use this again.

I wanted this to work for me so bad!! I have very oily and sensitive skin! Just after two uses my skin went crazy!.... I broke out terribly.. My boyfriend even noticed the pimples under my makeup. I’m a makeup artist and I know how to cover acne and acne scarring but this was something i couldn’t cover without looking like a cake face! I can’t wait to return it tomorrow and go back to my First Aid Beauty!
Extremely hydrating, without the heavy sticky sensation. This is a staple in my beauty regimen!

I’ve struggled with acne, combination, and sensitive skin as long as I can remember, and tried this in combination with Purity facial cleanser at the recommendation of my dermatologist as a last ditch effort since we thought using too many harsh products (hello acne solutions line by Clinique!) could be making my skin worse. She was so right, and 5 years later I still cant live without it! It makes my skin soft and smooth without feeling heavy or sticky, works great under makeup, and makes my complexion look more radiant!I highly recommend this product to pretty much anyone, no matter the state of their skin!
Doesn’t help with the dry spots around my mouth. Great for oily skin without dry spots.

I have oily and very sensitive skin and this moisturizer doesn’t upset my skin at all, I’ve repurchased 3 times and I’m still very happy, perfect day time moisturizer to put underneath makeup. Absorbs quickly and doesn’t make my skin oily (more than it already is)

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! I sampled the 1 oz. bottle, and I ended up purchasing the large 6.7 oz one! I have oily skin, so this is perfect for me. It’s light and absorbs quickly. My skin feels moisturized but not greasy. It wears great under makeup too! I love how it’s fragrance free, so it doesn’t irritate my skin.

bought this in hope it would moisturize my face and leave it fresh like many reviews and friends have said it could but after two weeks of use i had pimples and white heads all along my jaw line and chin. stopped using it and my skin is finally going back to normal. returned asap.

I´ve heard a lot of great reviews of this gel! All my friends recommended me to use it, but I don´t like the gel at all. My skin was mixed, but right now it is really really dry. I think the gel is too strong for my skin.

This was great for my skin. I have combo/oily skin so when I first used it I thought it was going to make me more oily than I am. But it didn’t. It gave off a semi matte finish on my face with I like in a moisturizer because sometimes moisturizer sometimes make me oily and sticky.

I really want to love this product i really do. Ive heard so many great reviews but this product just isn’t for me. I have combo-oily skin so i wanted to find a moisturizers that would keep my face moisturized while not leaving behind a greasy residue. At first my skin felt great after using it ! I thought to myself “yes i finally found the perfect moisturizer for my oily skin!“ Turns out i was wrong.. After a week my skin didn’t feel so amazing anymore and it started to feel really dry. Now when i apply this gel, it doesn’t even feel like im putting anything on after washing my face. I don’t know if its the gel or the harsh winter weather that’s drying out my face but i can only give it 2 stars for now. Maybe it will be a good moisturizer for the summer when the weathers all sticky and humid.
All other moisturizers left my face either super oily or super dry. This definitely helps with my combination skin and I am so happy I have finally found something that works for me!
review_title: A. M. A. Z. I. N. G.

review_text: this gel makes ur skin feels soft, it is also good to wear under makeup.

This by far my favorite moisturizer for winter weather. It keeps my skin clear and pretty much immediately makes skin glowing and moisturized. I’ve used so many products and nothing has compared to this moisturizer.

The perfect everyday moisturizer! My acne gel drys my skin out so bad. But when I combine it with this, as I have been for the last 3 years, my skin is perfect! It’s the perfect gel consistency to mix with my acne gel, it doesn’t leave a residue, and it isn’t oily! Leaves my skin fresh and smooth.
Doesn’t irritate, keeps skin moisturuzed but not oily. Worth the money.

You get so much product and it makes your skin feel incredible! After I used it my boyfriend complimented how soft my face felt I used to use mattifying moisturizers which made my face feel tight rather than soft
Love this moisturizer, drys fast and don’t leave your skin oily. My face never felt better!
This moisturizing lotion is amazing. I’ve tried high end brands, but nothing has come close to this! It’s moisturizing, but not oil. LOVE
This is my HG under sunscreen/’makeup moisturizer.... I always have this in my arsenal...

I’ve been using this moisturizer since I was 20 years old (7+ years) and find it works well with my combo oily skin. I have an oily t zone so it does a great job of providing moisture there The only negative is that I have dry skin around my mouth and chin, especially in the winter, and the gel formula works less well in those problem areas. However, I prefer to continue using this formula because it gives me a nice, healthy glow, doesn’t cause breakouts, and I can always touch up extreme dry skin with a regular lotion. This is a lightweight moisturizer so is better for oily skin types. I also appreciate the price for the 6.7 oz bottle. I buy 2 bottles a year and only when the larger size is on sale. I think the smaller sizes are less of a good value.
review_title: Lightweight moisture good for an oily T-zone

review_text: Bought it online and it came without its original packaging box. Just some wrapping paper. Cannot be a gift at all. Disappointed!

This is my first Clinique product, and actually i have never been too concerned about my skin until now. That is why i spent days working on finding a new skin care routine for my self. I came across Clinique, and with its reputation and excellent reviews, I chose 3 step skin care with this Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel to be the third and final step. I have to say, the product it self brought my skin the best feeling i have ever had. I mean i feel like i have baby skin ( duh!! ) It has been only 3 days so I don’t have much to say about the long term result, but I like it so much that I have to sign up and write my first review. I think the result is best when used with the 2 other steps ( face soap and clarifying lotion ). But it worked just fine when used alone.And one more thing, Im glad I got this gel one instead of the lotion one because it absorbs very fast and does not feel sticky at all.
review_title: My skin never felt this good

review_text: Not the most moisturizing product, but I love how quickly it absorbs. It’s pretty much the only thing I can use under foundation without looking like an oil slick. Definitely recommend it for oily skin, or light moisturization during hot humid weather.

I’ve had issues over the years with moisturizers being to heavy and causing my skin to breakout. I’ve been using this moisturizer for about 4 years now and have not been disappointed. In the winter when my skin tends to get a bit dry, I like to use a heavier night cream. In the summer months when my skin tends to be a bit more oily, I’m able to use this both day and night. It goes on smooth and dries without feeling oily.
review_title: Dries without leaving your skin feeling oily...

review_text: I have had problems in the past with lotions breaking me out like crazy but I haven’t experienced this with this lotion yet. It is very lightweight. The only problem I have with it is it seems more like a lotion than a gel.
My daughter using for couple of years and this the only moisturizer works for her. It is perfect for her oily skin.

I am in love with this moisturizer. It is a gel formula but doesn’t feel like it. It makes my skin feel so moisturized and soft. It doesn’t leave a residue or any oily feeling at all. I even got my boyfriend on it and he said he won’t use anything else! The prices are even amazing on this product. I’ve repurchased so many times!

I actually have dry skin so after my bad experience with the lotion + I decided to try this and it was much better. Although it didn’t break me out and wasn’t greasy, I felt like it didn’t give me enough moisture, my face felt tight after an hour of wearing it.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I have a very oily T-zone and this product keeps my skin feeling soft and refreshed, without being overly shiny. This product gets absorbed almost immediately and has a nice cooling feeling as well. No real smell, and great consistency. 4.2 oz lasted me a year.
I love this product soooo much and I would highly recommend it! I always feel so fresh all day, matte looking and my skin feels so soft too ;-)

I had used a face wash that made my skin peel and after just 4 days of using this, my skin started to repair itself. leaves skin soft and feeling healthy & elasticy. not sticky at all & dries pretty fast.

I started using this product about a year ago when I received a sample of it. After the sample was used up, I bought a bigger bottle. I LOVE this product and cannot stop raving about it. I have combination skin and my face tends to get oily around my nose, but with this moisturizer my skin feels soft and less oily throughout the day! I use it after I wash my face in the morning and at night.

I absolutely love Clinique skin care products, and this moisturizer is no exception. I prefer the gel to the lotion plus formula as I find it more hydrating and light weight and it also clears up my problem skin. I use this as a nighttime moisturizer and my skin is never oily when I wake up in the morning. I’ve found it shrinks my pores too.

I’ve used this on and off and have repurchased over the years. It’s a decent day time moisturizer and wears well under makeup. I like the gel consistency and that is not oily. It is good for sensitive/oily/acne-prone skin, but I no longer find it moisturizing enough for me, especially in the winter. It’s probably best for more oily skin types. The price point is also pretty decent compared to other options. The pump dispenser is great.

I break out easily and I have dry skin. I have tried many moisturizers that led to breakouts. But this moisturizing gel has worked so well with my skin and I have used it for 2 years now. If you break out easily you should really give this gel a try. FYI I did try the lotion version of this but my skin broke out.

This is an amazing lotion for oily skin types. I have combo skin type and I love this moisturizing gel. It doesn’t break me out, it doesn’t add oily greasyness to my skin. I really am happy I found this, I will be buying another one. Holy Grail.
I love this product. I have been using it for about 3 years now. and I honestly cant get enough of it! My makeup looks so much better when i use this product.

I really wanted to love this considering how many people gave rave reviews for this. I wanted a new moisturizer since winter is coming. However, it broke me out and this was the only new product I was trying, so I believe that this is what caused the breakouts. It did feel amazing on my skin and absorbed rather quickly.

this is a basic moisturizer. Which is fine. My skin is really dry so it wasn’t enough, light weight so looks fine under makeup. 3 stars because it was like a drugstore moisturizer. cant justify the price

I have been using this moisturizer for a while now. The small 3.4 oz bottle has lasted me forever. I use this as my morning moisturizer because it is not heavy enough for the evening. I have combination skin and this works very well with it. I do get dry patches around my mouth and unfortunately this does absolutely nothing for them. It absorbs quickly and is great if you have sensitive skin. Great under makeup and doesn’t have an irritating smell. I couldn’t give it 5 stars because it doesn’t give me enough moisture when i am drier, but its still great.
I love this day or night it does great things for my skin definitely buy again
I have oily to combination skin, this moisture is perfect for me as it is hydrating but not make my skin feel very oily. I have been using it for years

I love the way this moisturizer compliments my skin. I hate the stickiness/heaviness of creams and lotions -- because I have combination skin, I thought the gel would be a good fit, and it is! It’s light, and absorbs quickly, leaving my face soft, smooth and balanced. The price is well worth it because the bottle is big enough to last for a long time, and I only need like one pump to cover my whole face.I’ve used it twice a day for three days and I cannot even being to tell you the difference already! It’s helped to even out my skin tone, I have no new breakouts, it’s healing my old scars, brightening dark spots, this is the best ever!

I have very oily, acne-prone skin so it’s hard for me to find a moisturizer that doesn’t make my skin feel greasy and clogged. I can wear this stuff under my makeup and it’s still moisturizing enough that I also use it at night.
Good moisturizer, but definitely not as good as the original product. It dried my skin and felt tight.
review_title: not as good as the original

review_text: I prefer the gel over the regular moisturizer. Love the texture and how it feels on skin. I’ve used this for a very long time and it’s my go item!

I love, adore, and cannot live without this product. This saved my face and did even more. My skin is the best it has ever been. It is silky smooth and just gorgeous. I have no words. I highly recommend this product. I was in a rut with dull oily skin and now I have clear glowing skin. All thanks to this. This is my only moisturizer and I can’t get enough. No negatives just a lot of love.

I am an African-American woman with oily/combination skin, and this moisturizer is perfect to help control my oils during the day. This gel formula makes it so your skin is hydrated, but you aren’t a oily mess by the end of the day. It is very lightweight, which is a plus for me. I wear this under my makeup and after I do my night time face wash routine. I love the way my face looks and feels with this product. I will buy it for years to come.
I love this stuff...been using it for years and years. It’s the only moisturizer that I enjoy...it feels clean and refreshing on your skin. Not oily at all. Love it!
my skin is relatively dry on checks but oily in tzone. this product works great in summer, but too light for me in winter and spring.

Plus is that its not greasy or heavy at all. Bad side is that it contains unhealthy ingredients like sulfate, etc. I have dry skin and this moisturizer leaves it feeling dry and sometimes VERY dry. It gets worse gradually the more I use it. Will try out other products.
review_title: not greasy, but not that moisturizing

review_text: Somehow didn’t work for me. It was just making me oily whole day.

I’d never moisturised my face before (I know, shocking!) and had really dry/flakey skin around my nose but also oily around my T-zone. Went to Clinique as I know they’re the best, and never looked back. It doesn’t make my face feel greasy or oily, soaks in quickly (so can be done in a rush in the morning) and makes your make up sit better. My skin has improved dramatically and no break outs - despite having sensitive skin!

I have been using this moisturizer for so many years, I’ve lost track. I have combination/oily skin and acne and this gel formula is moisturizing enough for me and doesn’t break me out. At this point, I can’t even imagine switching to another brand or product. I’ve gone through countless bottles.

I have struggled with both oily and dry skin and this moisturizer completely balanced out my skin. It is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. Not greasy, don’t dry out. Perfect. And a little bit goes a long way!

I have been using this moisturizer for several years now. I can’t live without it. I even find I can still use it all year round, which is a huge bonus.It has really transformed my skin. It feels smoother, I don’t tend to blemish as much and it doesn’t have any residue once it dries, which has always been an issue with other facial moisturizers.My skin feels super soft and it feels like I am wearing nothing on my face. It lasts all day long and I even feel like it controls my oily t-zone. It’s doesn’t really have a scent.I also find it is reasonably priced because it lasts me close to 6 months with daily use (morning and night).Best moisturizer I have ever used.
I have oily to combo skin and i love wearing this before i put my makeup on. it keeps my oils at bay. love this product. and i only use two pumps.i love clinique!
I have acne prone, combination skin with dry patches, and It gets oily throughout the day. This

Just what the discription states..lightweight and fast absorbing on to skin. I tried the original version and just had an awful smell and left my already oily skin feeling even more oily. This one doesn’t feel sticky or gummy after its applied. It’s a great moisturizer for the price.

I will use this moisturizer for the rest of my life. My dermatologist said that gel moisturizers are better for your skin because they don’t clog your pores and this has changed the way my skin looks. I’m actually happy to take off my makeup because my skin is beautiful. All thanks to this!!! Forever my HOLY GRAIL moisturizer!

Lightweight liquidy texture, spreads easily, absorbs quickly.I thought those characteristics made it seem cheap when I was developing my first skincare routine. But now, I know better!!! These qualities mean I don’t have to wait long for the product to absorb into the skin and it’s not going to wear heavy as I apply layers of other skincare and makeup products. Noticeable difference in my cheek dry patches at the end of the day too. Best for every day wear, but not a HG for me.
As mentioned, fabulous for oilier skin or skin in a more humid climate. It’s very lightweight and fast absorbing

I have combo skin - oily T-zone. I use this moisturizer twice a day. It’s a gel which I find suits oily skin much better than creams.I do not breakout at all from this whereas I do from almost all other moisturizers.It works great. Makes skin soft and gives just the right amount of moisture to oily skin, without leaving it feeling tacky or heavy. Absorbs fast.Search for a great moisturizer has been over ever since I first tried this a few years ago.

This stuff is saving my skin. If you have dry patches on your skin it won’t help you there, but if you have skin that gets oilier and oiler throughout the day, you need to try this. It doesn’t smell strongly, it’s in a sanitary pump bottle, and a little goes SUCH a long way since it’s such a smooth, jelly texture.I use it both morning and night, it was my morning moisturizer but my oily skin was not responding well to my normal nighttime cream (Origins Night A Mins Oil-Free).

I have been searching for a great daytime moisturizer for my oily skin and this is it! Sinks into skin immediately and skins feels moisturized but not greasy whatsoever. Really helps control my oil throughout the day and leaves my skin super smooth. I am very sensitive and this has not irritated me in the slightest. Deff worth a try!!!

I have tried countless moisturizers for my combination skin and Clinques Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel takes the top prize! I no longer worry about those little flaky pieces of skin thanks to this product!Very lightweight, absorbs quickly, and not greasy!

I really really wanted this to be the right moisturizer for me. I heard so many great things and reviews about it. I went and bought it and it just... doesn’t work. Right after I applied it, my skin still felt a little tight and kind of like it just disappeared after I put it onto my face, in a bad way.There’s that and the fact that Sephora doesn’t seem to bother including the ingredients list? Funny how that works... I checked it out myself and found a few worrying things: Silica, Laureth-23, & Laureth-4. Use it at your own risk. I will not be buying this again or recommending it to anyone.

I was a die hard DD original fan until getting a sample of this. I was nervous that it absorbed almost immediately and didn’t leave the dewy feel that I was used to, but I adored the look of my skin so I purchased a bottle. I certainly don’t regret it! This manages to moisturize and heal my skin perfectly without leaving behind a sticky layer. I use it morning and night. I wake up with gorgeous smooth skin and love it under makeup as well. The only con is that I do need eye cream when using this, which I did not with original DD. I’ve still been fully converted and will purchase this over and over!

My Opinion: I really recommend this product. Ever since I bought this moisturizing gel, I have no interest in searching for THE next best thing anymore. It’s a great addition to anyone’s skin routine.Rountine/How it Feels: 2 pumps for the entire face and 1 pump for the neck. The liquid looks more like a lotion, however, you will notice the gel-like feeling once you apply. It doesn’t feel oily and I didn’t have to wait long to be makeup-ready (some moisturizers leave your face feeling drenched and will take forever to dry in order to apply your cosmetics). In addition to the daytime, I actually look forward to my skin routine at night now too (*pump pump, rub, pump, rub “ahhh feels good, sleepy time“) Lol.I recommend the pump over the squeeze tube. Unless you travel often and need something more convenient to throw in your makeup bag, you will not need to use the product more than twice a day (morning/night) and can leave it at home.

To date Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is at the top of my list of favorites. Clinique is a brand that you can really trust to do all the necessary research in order to produce the finest products. I am so brand loyal to this product and to Clinique. I always keep this amazing gel handy as it keeps my skin in a perfect stateofequilibrium. I urge all my friends to try this gel as I have been using it for a long time and plan to buy more, some for me and some for gifts.A little bit goes a long way. The sensation is so wonderful the instant you apply it. Another bonus is it does not interfere with my makeup.

I first bought this when I was in high school and I have never needed to try anything else. I did try their lotion instead because the sales lady in Sephora told me to but it’s awful. I have dry skin and I have to moisturize my face daily or I have problems. The gel is so refreshing and keeps my skin hydrated. It is a must have. If you don’t have dry skin this may not be for you. My friend bought it after she tried mine on our ski trip but after a week it broke her out.
My skin has a great texture and look, it has definitely improved since I started using this product. Doesn’t clog my pores or cause blemishes, great under makeup. Not too greasy and leaves skin soft.
I apply this under my makeup and it moisturizers without looking oily. When it dries and you can barely even feel it on!

I have been using this lotion for years- I like it because it is light weight, but still makes my face feel moisturized and not dry- even in the winter time when my face is more dry it still does the job. & it isn’t too expensive either!
I started using this product a year ago and absolutely love it. Absorbs well and no greasy feeling, I have combination skin and can be sensitive to some creams, works great!

I have fair, normal-to-very-oily skin. This is perfect for me. I use Step 1 & 2 of a different skincare brand, but I always go back to this moisturizer. I wish it had SPF, but I’m very satisfied given what it does for my skin. All I use is a pea-sized amount and my skin feels hydrated. It isn’t greasy and feels very lightweight compared to some products that I’ve tried.

I have become a big fan of this moisturizer. It absorbs quickly and does not feel greasy. I use it in the morning as well as before bed and have noticed that I do not wake up with as oily skin as I used to.

This is my go-to daytime moisturizer. It absorbs in a flash and is a dream under make-up. I use this moisturizer year round but it is especially nice during the summer months because it is very light. After discovering this product, I simply cannot use anything else. Now, all other moisturizers just feel so heavy, sticky, and greasy. Very reasonably priced for what you get as well and because it smooths on so effortlessly, a little goes a long way. One bottle usually lasts me about 5 months.

This moisturizer is amazing! I have combination and acne pro skin, with this moisturizer my skin is soft and nearly acne free. If I use it at 6am with powder my skin is matt until 4pm. With my old moisturizer using the same powder I was oily in the t-zone after 4 to 5 hours.A little bit goes a long way here, I use the amount of gel for face, throat and cleveage that I used for one cheek before. I love this and I’m going to repurchase it!

I have been using Clinique products even since I started using makeup. I have tried other moisturizers over the years and this is one out of two staple moisturizers that I use daily and have used since I started taking care of my skin (I use this in the morning after my morning face washing and before makeup). This is so lightweight and super absorbing. The gel formula is my absolute favorite and I can see myself using it for years to come!

I am in love with this product. I’ve been using it for a few months. It is my must-have product. I have tried so many moisturizers. I have oily skin so I’ve gravitated towards gel moisturizers. Most of the gel moisturizers I tried though weren’t very nourishing, It wasn’t until I tried this that I realized how a gel moisturizer as supposed to be. I am never going back.
Broke me out! Beware of this if you have sensitive skin.

This is my first ever Clinique product and I must say that they didn’t fail to impress! The SA recommended this to me when I was looking for a moisturizer. Upon application, my skin instantly felt smoother and softer. I have classic combination skin (oily T-zone, dry patches on cheeks and jawline) and they truly moisturized my oily parts but not so much the dry patches, hence the 4-star rating but it definitely made them much less dry and rough. This product has not broken me out yet and I made the mistake of only buying the 1.7 oz tube. Will definitely repurchase this in the full size. Definitely recommend this to everyone with skin like mine but if you want something strong enough to moisturize dry patches, you’re in the wrong place.
review_title: BUY IT IF YOU HAVE COMBINATION SKIN!

review_text: I have acne - prone skin that pumps out the oil in the summer months, but looks parched in the winter. I have tried different glycolic washes and acne treatments, even gentle, oil free cleansers, but my skin always looks parched under the acne. I’ve been thinking that maybe my skin lacks balance because it no longer has a moisture barrier. I tried other moisturizers that caused so much congestion. Not this one! For the first time in years I can moisturize my skin. It’s looking healthier and the acne is even clearing up. I’m able to use toner now because I have this moisturizer. I can’t believe I found something that works without breaking me out. I’m so glad to read that this is a product that’s been around for awhile, so that it will stay around for me.

My skin is super prone to cystic acne, but also to dryness which further irritates the acne. I tried this moisturizer and it has worked like magic. It is super light, absorbs super fast ,and provides just the right amount of moisture without feeling greasy.
review_title: best moisturizer I have ever used

review_text: I purchased this after doing a TON of research... I have extremely oily skin, and do everything in the book to keep my acne under control... I was looking for a gel moisturizer because any other moisturizers would cause me to be oily within hours... no joke. So, not being a big Clinique user of products, I noticed this got really good reviews and decided to try it. I’m glad I did! I really like how quickly it absorbs into my skin and it feels hydrated without being slick like oil! It’s not “perfect“ and I still am oily by 4:00, but it controls it way better than any other moisturizer I’ve tried. It’s great under makeup, and doesn’t make your foundation look cakey or dry... I would recommend to anyone with oily skin!

I tried the new mini gel version of this recently and noticed that it does not have as good a quality and effect on my skin as what the original moisturizer cream does. It’s not to say its a bad cream, just not for me - and I’ve been using the other one for years.
review_title: Not as good as the cream

review_text: This moisturizer is nice, lightweight and refreshing. It doesn’t have real moisturizing power, but it hydrates a bit. It’s good for people with young oily skin.

I will admit that today is my first time using it, but I’m not sure if I will be able to get over the odor when initally applying it. Once absorbed the odor does disappear, and its seems very hydrating but non-greasy on my typically oily skin.At this point I’m on the fence, but wanted to give an initial review of my reaction when applying it.

I was expecting for this to be everything and more because of the rave reviews but instead it was terrible! The product DID NOT! absorb into my skin instead it was stuck on top and is very greasy and annoying I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT WHATSOEVER

Sooo moisturizing, so creamy. It feels nice going on. I loved it, but unfortunately after a few months of wearing it I realized it was the cause of my closed comedones. They’re incredibly difficult to get rid of, too.

I’ve been using this for almost 10 years, and has never disappointed, it provides my skin with enough moisture without making my face oily and greasy. It leaves my skin refreshed, hydrated and super soft.

I have the TRUE definition of combination skin; in the summer I have oily skin especially in the t-zone region and in the winter I have drier skin. I bought this as it was recommended for combination skin and it was a little disappointing. I live in Canada where the summers are somewhat hot and the winters are REAL cold so it was for an ideal moisturizer for me. I ended up giving this to my cousin who has combination skin who is moving to Texas where it’s really hot and thought it was more beneficial for her. I think this moisturizer is better suited for people with oily skin and NOT combination skin.

I only gave this four stars because originally, I bought this directly from Clinique website. UPS lost my order for a month & told me I’d have to take it up w/ the sender, so when I called Clinique to figured out what to do. They said they’d overnight me a new order free of charge. I ended up getting the lost order in the mail after my free order. & Clinique said to just keep both. But in truth. I have completely mild skin. I use a moisturizer before I tan & before my makeup cause I ♡ that dewy look. & altho cliniques cleansers are my favorite. So fresh. This is just too heavy for me. Leaves me feeling VERY greasy. Would be best for someone who has super dry/sun burned skin. I only continue use, cause I know have like over 12ozs of this stuff from the free ones that Clinique gave me. Love them. Just not this. On the market for something else

I would recommend buying this directly from Clinique because you can get a small set of face wash, toner and this lotion for the same price as just the medium sized bottle alone. Which is what I did.I love this gel lotion. It’s what I wear religiously under my oil free foundation on the daily, as well as the days I don’t wear makeup. If they could add SPF and keep the same consistency this would be heaven!I do have an SPF 30 similar gel from Philosophy but it’s a bit more expensive and it definitely has a chemical smell to it.So because of value and effectiveness this is #1 for me.
I will never use another moisturizer because this is perfect for my skin! I have combination skin and this helps significantly with oil in my t-zone.
My sister got me hooked on this and I will never stop using it!I always recommend this to my combination friends and they agree that it is a terrific product!

I love the way this product glides on and how it makes my skin feel. I have dry/combination skin. I first applied it when I didn’t intend to wear makeup and my skin didn’t feel oily and had a nice, dewy glow. I also applied this product under my makeup the following day and I noticed my makeup application was a lot more smooth than usual.

The perfect moisturizer for oily, acne prone skin. I can use it with all of my other skincare products. Not as heavy or greasy as most moisturizers. Lightweight and super moisturizing. I love! Would recommend to anyone with oily skin looking for a good moisturizer. The value is awesome too, you get so much product for the price.

Definitely my go to moisturizer, especially in the summer. I have combination skin so its hard to find something that wont make my tzone so oily but still hydrates my cheeks. This gel has the best balance!

I can see this product being amazing for most people. I have very oily skin (perks of being of oriental descent) but I have combination skin in the winter because of dry patches.This product was too dry for my skin for some reason, leaving rough and dry patches after it’s absorbed. I have learned that my combination skin requires moisture first and foremost so I will avoid products like this from now on. If your skin works well with very oil-free and limited moisture products, you will like this.
review_title: all around great but too dry for me

review_text: i am very picky when it comes to lotions. My skin is slightly oily and sensitive. It took me a long time (I’m over 40) to find this. When I put this lotion on it makes my skin go AAAAHHHH :) it feels good, I LOVE LOVE LOVE the smell so much too. It keeps my skin hydrated, never oily, I never feel as though I have just put lotion on after I use it, it soaks in leaving me refreshed. I have been trying different moisturizers (much more expensive ones) lately, but I just keep coming back to this one (I actually got up out of bed the other night and rewashed my face and put this on, because the lotion I was sampling felt heavy and dewey and I just couldn’t handle it.This is an all around great lotion for oily skin, it goes on smooth and sinks in great, and smells fab to boot! Love it!

I totally love this amazing facial lotion. It is great for oily skin and also combination skins. I don’t like to make up my face glossy and this Moisturizing Gel is so helpful. Now I am using the second bottle and this is gonna be my life-lotion!!!
Has always been my go-to moisturizer, no matter how many times I sample others.

Discovered this after many years of failed moisturizers. This is my night time moisturizer and can not get enough. I’m very oily, especially an hour after cleansing and I don’t mean to be gross or give too much info, but I sweat at night. A LOT. So many times other moisturizers were too heavy that I would find myself awake with sweat and moisturizer just mixed on my face and on my pillowcase.This moisturizer dries quickly and prevents me from getting super oily so quickly. I use a full pump during the summer months or hot nights and 2 if I want my skin to feel moisturized and if my cheeks and chin feel drier than normal.
It’s a very good moisturizer but the smell is so... it smells like plastic and sulfur. I hope mine is just a bad batch because I really like this stuff, just can’t stand the smell.

I have very sensitive skin, but don’t love a thick cream in the summer. This is the perfect fit for my skin! It moisturizes enough, and is gentle enough for my skin. But no oiliness, and it absorbs almost immediately. I can’t believe I haven’t found this before!

I’ve used other drugstore brands of oil-free/mattifying lotions before, but most of them only made my skin less oily for a few hours, and then I would need to use oil-blotting sheets all over again. This product however, does not cause me to be oily for a long time, even on humid, hot days. A little goes a long way for the whole face, and it is best to wait until after your toner has dried to apply. I wish it wasn’t so pricey for the amount you get, but I guess you have to pay for good quality!
review_title: A little pricey, but not oily

review_text: I use this moisturizer after my toner and serum. As an oily girl, it provides just the right about of moisture without leaving me feeling greasy. Definitely my go-to for all seasons.

I rarely leave reviews, but I really felt the need to do it with this product. I have been using this moisturizing my face and neck with this product for years. I love it so much. It is the only facial moisturizer I have found that doesn’t make my face feel greasy and keeps it soft and supple all day long!

I have super oily, greasy skin that I will call combination because it does get super dried out from all of the acne treatments I use- particularly my glycolic acid face peels leave my skin super parched.This is LITERALLY the only facial moisturizer that I have ever, ever been able to use that neutralizes my skin. It leaves my skin beautifully smooth and moisturized without ANY oily greasy residue or breakouts. It is absorbed into skin in minutes and makes my foundation look 10x better- smoother and stays on longer.A little goes a long way and I truly believe I will never be able to find a moisturizer as good as this one. This is a must for oily/acne prone skin. I don’t wear it every day because I use a salicylic acid moisturizer everyday but when my skin does suffer from treatments/too much sun/recovering from a skin peel this is a must.
review_title: One of a kind of acne prone skin

review_text: I was desperate to find a moisturizer that fit my oily skin so I gave this a try and I fell in love!!! It hasn’t broken me out and it leaves my face feeling refreshed and smooth. I definitely recommend it!!!!

This is my first actually step into skincare, besides drugstore moisturizers, and I am very happy. My mom suggested this product to me and it is perfect. I have dry skin and it gives me the perfect amount of refreshing, non-thick refresher when my skin is feeling rather drab.

I keep venturing away and trying other moisturizers, but I always seem to come back to this one. My t-zone tends to get oily, but my under eye area as well as chin and a few other places tend to get dry. I always use an eye cream, but for the rest of my face I want something to moisturize the dry spots without making my oily spots greasy. This seems to fit the bill. It is light and moisturizing. One pump does my entire face (one pump is quite a small amount). This moisturizer lasts me forever. For the price it is quite a great value. It doesn’t control my oily spots, but I’m fine with using my Boscia blotting sheets for that throughout the day. If you are looking for a light, non greasy moisturizer-give this a try! I bought the small one the first time and it lasted several months.
not quite sure how I feel about it. Love that it’s light weight, but not really sure if it is working cause my forehead is starting to breakout. I usually have pretty clear skin.
The gel is perfect for problematic skin and has become part of my daily beauty routine. It is the perfect light-weight moisturizer!

Love love love this moisturizer for summertime! It’s amazing how balanced and nourished it keeps my oily skin without that greasy feeling or clogged pores. I use this every morning after washing my face with Clinique Liquid Facial Soap (oily formula), a perfect duo!

My most favourite moisturizer in the summer. My skin can’t survive without it. It’s moisturizing yet SUPER lightweight and absorbs VERY quickly. Perfect for combination/oily skin such as myself. Just amazing!

Oil free doesn’t mean anything. I have oily skin and I use facial oils. They don’t make your skin produce more oil What I have a problem with is the amount of silicone in this formula. There are so many bad things in this. Don’t do it.

I love this moisturizing gel.. I usually use this after the toner and before applying my makeup. It makes for a nice base. Then at night I will use either the moisture surge or acne moisturizer - depending on my skin needs. This shouldn’t break you out, seeing as Clinique is very gentle and universal.

I would classify my skin more normal, but according to clinique, i’m a combination-oily. I tried this moisturizer hoping it would solve that greasy feeling most lotions give my skin. I found a winner and I will not being going back. While it doesn’t have an SPF, it controls oil, hydrates quickly, and leaves a wonderful feeling to my skin. My foundation goes on much smoother and stays longer. I’m so glad they came out with this formula.!
I do like this product but it’s just like other moisturizer and nothing special to it but I do like how it soaks into my face nicely.
i love this lotion absorbs quickly,not greasy,hydrates very well my combination skin type ,fragancefree ( good for sensitive skin) and the regular one is perfect for normal to dry skin.

I have combination skin. It’s very oily in my t-zone, but it tends to get dry around my eyes. This just further irritated my skin where it was dry. I would not recommend for overly dry, sensitive skin. It’d probably be nice for non sensitive oily skin thigh.
My daily skin drink, repairs and hydrates dry patches on skin ,prone to comedones.completely non-comedogenic formula,a must have .
review_title: holy grail for acne-prone sensitive skin

review_text: This lightweight moisturizer has solved all my summer skin problems. I’m so glad I found this.

I have really oily skin, but with the dry Minnesota winters, I can get patches of dry skin on my face. Other moisturizers feels like they sit on top of the skin and makes me oily later in the day, but I never get that with this.
I love this use it daily before i apply my makeup. Wont make my face greasy at all . Can apply my primer right away.
I wanted to give this moisturizer a try and it dried my skin!

This moisturizer works so well for me. I personally have dry skin, but it works better then the other formula for me. Goes onto the skin with a cooling feel that feels great and doesn’t leave me greasy or feel heavy at all.

the search criteria showed this moisturizer as #1 for me and my concerns but unfortunately it made my combination/oily skin more oily and caused some breakouts. i had to return it after 1 use. i gave it 2 stars instead of 1 since the price is very reasonable.
Great for my combo skin. Leaves it very soft. I took one star off because sometimes it’s not quite enough hydration and I have to use a lot.

I recently purchased the Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel to try out, based on some recommendation from friends. I wanted to like it: unscented, great reviews, etc. but it wasn’t that great for me. When I first put some on my fingers, the consistency was very loose and liquidly. Then I put it all over my face and it took awhile to work in to my face. After a while, it started to absorb into my skin but it left my face oily but then sticky/tacky once it dried. I’m a guy so finding a working, unscented, and natural moisturizer is hard to come by, especially for my dry/combination skin. I could see how this could work for people who wear daily makeup, because once it drys, it is very matte. But for me, it left my face oily but then sticky/tacky once it dried. It also felt like it didn’t really moisturize my face. I will continue to use it to see if that feeling goes away and god price though, considering the price of some moisturizers on Sephora. However, not that great of a product for my skin...
love this moisturizer, even if I’ve decide to try other brands, I always always come back to this face lotion. no break outs and no oily skin from this lotion.

I love this moisturizer! I have a very oily t-zone so I have to use an oil-control primer. The problem was that it would dry out my skin really bad, but not using that primer made my skin look greasy after a few hours. This moisturizer was the solution. I applied a thin layer before my primer and voila! Perfectly hydrated skin. Not greasy after a few hours, my skin thanked me.
I have combination oily skin and always had trouble finding the perfect moisturizer! Finally found it! Is very light, leaves my skin so smooth and silky!
Light, but moisturizing. Absorbs quickly. Great for oily skin.

i have combination oily, acne prone skin and this moisturizer is great for my skin! Moisturizes really really well, doesn’t break out, irritate, or aggravate anything. It feels so smooth, soothing, and nice on my skin.

I am a flight attendant so my skins gets really dry after every flight. This moisturiser Hydrates really well. My skin does not feel dry at all throughout the day. After a day out in winter, my skin still feels supple n smooth. And I did not have any makeup on!But I was afraid it would be greasy when I’m back in Singapore. But that wasn’t the case! Even in humid weather, I do not feel like I’ve something on my skin!

My skin varies from being covered in dark spots and dehydrated to plump and clear on an hour by hour basis, I have what you call “sensitive-dehydrated-very dry but very oily-freckled“ skin and the Clinique Dramatically Different moisturizing gel helps whip it into shape! I use it before bed after exfoliating and serum and in the morning under my makeup and sunscreen. The gel absorbs quickly so there is no product build up and peeling under the rest of my products! I would give it 5 stars if it included a mild spf so I could skip the extra sunscreen on light sun days.
review_title: Lightweight gel for "All Over the Place Skin"

review_text: I have very oily skin and this works very well for me. It really helps manage the oil.

I have combination skin(oily w/ some dry patches) & I found this to be nice to use after applying my serum in the mornings. It absorbs quickly, is lightweight, does help with moisturizing. It’s perfect for everyday and under makeup! I gave it 4 stars because it’s not as moisturizing as I thought and the ingredients could be better.

Perfect during the summer months when my skin can’t handle a heavy moisturizer. During the winter I bulk it up with the moisture plus, which is too heavy for my skin.My favorite. I’ve been using it for about 5 years now.
Daughter is a teen and this was a great option. She was never washing her face or using moisturizer and now she actually likes washing her face.

I live in a particularly humid climate and the gel version of the Clinique moisturizer is perfect for the climate, not too heavy or greasy, and absorbs quickly. Just the right amount of moisture. When I travel to a drier climate, I switch to the lotion version.

LOVE it! Hydrating enough for my oily skin. I have exema around my nose and mouth and it doesn’t irritate me at all. The only reason I rate this 4 stars and not 5 is because the pump is awful. Not even halfway through the bottle and the pump will hardly let out any product. Major flaw for me. Wonder if it’s just a defective pump.. Other than that beautiful product
I love this for my oily skin. It actually sinks in and doesn’t just lay on top of my skin.
Great for oily skin because its light on the skin. Nice formula to get your moisture for the day
Im on my second bottle! With that being said it is the best moisturizer around for oily skin.
I love this lotion! It is not oily, and my skin is noticeably softer and smoother. I will definitely keep this in my regular skin care regiment.
Very moisturizing & it doesnt feel greasy on my skin. It is perfect for summer. My skin is very oily especially in the summer. I would definetly recomend it.

PRO: The gel moisturizer is light weighted, has light-scent,the bottle lasted at least a half a year, the pump gives a perfect amount for my face, it’s very moisturizing for my oily face. It leaves my face smoothe and soft and maybe radiant or glowing reflection to my face or maybe that’s just my oily typed skin.CON : Leaves me looking shiny throughout half of my day

Love this especially in the summer! Never too oily and it glides on smooth. The only bad thing is the design of the bottle. Once you’ve used so much of the moisturizer, the pump doesn’t collect it and you have difficulty using the last little bit. Other than that, great product!

This product helped clear my dry skin in about a week. It does not just sit on your face and is great for beginners in makeup. I recommend this for all ages but is generally a good choice for younger users.

I have been looking everywhere for a light, fast absorbing face moisturizer that wouldn’t make my skin oily! Recently my skin has been more oily than usual and my normal cetaphil moisturizer was just making it worse. I ended up buying a $40 cream from lush that does the job but has a very strong scent and is too expensive for every day use. This is the PERFECT buy, I love that it is a gel because it works its way into skin so fast. My skin has never felt smoother, j can’t stop touching my face.

I know your supposed to use the gel when you have oily skin, but it works better for me when my skin is more on the dry side. I use it during the day and it makes my face feel soft and hydrated all day.

I’ve tried many face moisturizers and I always come back to this one. Been using it since I was a teen and don’t know why I quit. Sinks in fast and isn’t too heavy for my oily combo skin. If I do have dry patches I do use a different Clinique moisturizer though.
This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! It’s super hydrating, without being oily! I used to use the Lotion+ and this is even Better! I would recommend this product to anyone!
I LOVE THIS MOISTUIZER. It feels so good on your skin--not too oily, no residues, just a great face lotion.
I loved it! got it as asample and immidiatly new that I waned to buy it!

I used this years ago and when I repurchase it on a whim, I realized either my skin is very different now, or this product has changed DRAMATICALLY. First of all, even if it is fragrance free the ingredients clearly have a scent and it is not apelasant one. It smells like intense flowers or something that would go in perfume. It goes away quickly, but it is startling. Secondly, it is a light mousturizer. I stress the light as your skin will prob feel dry after an hour.

I’ve been on a quest to find my favorite moisturizer, and so far this is it. It’s lightweight, super refreshing, and doesn’t make me break out. I have combination skin, and this seems strong enough to keep dry flakes at bay without being heavy or oily. It’s also a very reasonable price.
i’ve bought this product many times, nothing else seems as good as this, and the price is not bad. It also lasts months.

If you’re in search for a moisturizer that controls your oily face without clogging your pores, well stop the search, you have found your miracle product! The only down side is that it isn’t as hydrating as I would like it to be, BUT do not pass on this product because of this. Give it a shot, it might work wonders for you.
It’s light as a gel. I like it but I am not sure that it is super hydrating.

After hearing and reading about the entire hype over this moisturizing gel, I gave in and purchased a bottle for myself. I’m not sure if it’s because I’m not using the entire “3-Step Skin Care“ program, but it’s been nearly a month and I still have dry patches throughout the day after using it AM and PM. My skin is combination/oily, and lately I guess my skin is a lot more dry than I thought? Anyway, this gel isn’t working for me at the moment, I really wanted to love it. The texture and formula feels amazing though. It’s not greasy AT ALL and won’t leave your skin feeling gross. I love how fast it absorbs into the skin.

I wanted to like this gel. I bought this to travel with and it was a HUGE mistake. This lotion drys your skin out like you wouldn’t believe. It left me with dry patches all over and when I continued to use this it burned the dry patches, making my skin more dry. I note that this does not have an ingredient list, so I’m thinking there is alcohol in this product which produces the severe drying factor. I get when companies put alcohol in a moisturizer to dry your skin out, forcing you to use more and thus these companies making more money off of you...but holy cow this moisturizer was super DRYING. Buyer beware!!!
Seems moisturizing when you first put it on but doesn’t last. Can’t say it does anything to help improve the oily areas on my face. The formula is light though, not thick. Okay for now...

My fave moisturizer for my oily skin - leaves it clean, soft and refreshed. Layers flawlessly under makeup, plumps up the skin nicely for non-makeup days. This is one of those products I can’t run out of!
I’ve been using this since before my teens and always seem to run back to it. Does exactly what I need a moisturizer to do, and my skin always feels and looks its best! Will never use anything else.
Maybe I got the wrong one for me but still good makes my face fell soft but when u first put it on feels like it drys my face up

I love this moisturizer! It goes on smoothly, works in quickly, and doesn’t make my skin super oily in the morning. I’m also really loving the .5 oz. travel size tube! Great for flying! Hope they keep this size around!

I have pretty oily skin but I found that this moisturizer just wasn’t moisturizing enough. My skin just doesn’t feel as supple with this as it does with other moisturizers that are meant for oily skin.
This stuff is the BEST!!
2 weeks after using this moisturizer started to break out. Return it right away

I started using Clinique when it came out in the 70’s. I never was that impressed with the moisturizing lotion.It seemed too heavy. I always looked for and used other moisturizers. Now that I am 60+ I need more moisture and the lotion was okay for me (got beauty gifts and would use it) still felt a bit heavy though. I saw the $5 travel size of the gel, read the reviews and decided to try it. I am glad I did. I love this stuff. It’s summer in the humid south and even though I am getting dryer with age, I still get a bit oily in the t-zone. Not with this product. My skin is soft and moisturized but mot shiny on the nose and forehead.If you are on the fence, order the small travel size. I think you may fall in love like I have
This moisturizing is amazing. I use it every morning and every night. It gets the job done and doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy.

This moisturizer is definitely a staple for me as I’ve been using it for 5 years now. I have combination skin, this is just melts into my skin and doesn’t have a greasy feeling. Very good under makeup!
I have combination skin and it works great!

If you’re reading this please just go buy this product. It’s by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. From it’s lovely gel-like consistency, to the light aroma, to the way it works wonders on my skin year-round, I am always pleased with the results I get. If you’re unsure, get the travel size, which actually is a great deal as you get almost as much as other “full size“ moisturizers, with a much lower cost.

I have always used the other dramatically different lotion moisturizer from this brand. one day I decided to use this one and really did see a difference and by difference i mean since this one is a gel. I actually prefer this one a lot better you apply it and it drys, there’s no sticky feeling which I prefer things that don’t leave a sensational stickiness. Which it gets very annoying there’s no smell its fragrance free which is great for someone like me with sensitive skin and it does help moisturize areas where I need the most. And I don’t need to reapply once I put in the morning I am set for the day. Will be repurchasing again!
review_title: The name says it all of this product!!

review_text: I have oily/combination skin, and this moisturizer has been a life saver. The regular lotion is still too rich for my skin, but this absorbs instantly and keeps my face hydrated all day and night. I swear by this moisturizer - you won’t be sorry once you try it!

I have really oily skin and I love this moisturizer! Nothing works as well for me as this product. It does not leave me feeling oily when I put it on (which most do), and my skin actually feels hydrated. Can’t say enough about this product. However, skin will become shiny in the afternoon if you don’t use a foundation.

I have really oily and acne prone skin. I’ve tried every moisturizer in the drug store especially ones that claimed to control oil and/or acne. I had been eying this specific product for a few months until I had the money to actually buy it. I’ve been using it for about a month and a half now and it’s hands down become holy grail for me. It moisturizes my skin while also softening it, and it controls ALL my oil all around my face! Foundation always lays well on top of it and I feel like it makes my foundation look even better. If you’re thinking about buying this, buy it. It’s amazing.

I have had oily skin since I was a teenager. Now that I am approaching my 30’s, it’s more on the combination side. This moisturizer is the perfect balance for me in the warmer months because of its light texture. Clinique really hit it out of the park with this cult classic!

I remember using the old formula from approx 10 years ago and I loved it then. ( I had gotten the standard formula then, not gel.)I was told to try this because I still suffer from breakouts (34 and still breaking out!!! even been on accutane twice! grrrrr!)Anyways, when I use this product my skin actually feels DRIER then when I put it on!!I know it’s “lightweight“ but its just a little too “lightweight“ for me. Doesn’t feel like a “moisture drink“ for my skin.I give this two stars because I have always loved and appreciated the fact that Clinique doesn’t use fragrance in their facial care products.Still LOVE Clinique but just not this particular product.

i really always liked clinique, every purchase i have made from this brand has worked out, but this to me was not worth it...when it says its lightweight it feels very watery and not worth it, has no moisture what so ever. i purchased it because i think it was a reasonable price.

I love putting this product on every morning. I have combination skin and I love how lightweight this moisturizer feels. I’ve tried many moisturizers to give life to my skin in the morning and nothing compares. Since using religiously, I’ve had way less breakouts, too!
Hydrating + no greasy feeling as long as it’s applied lightly. Has never broken me out. Combination skin. Love it!

When I read the reviews, I was expecting a really great product... especially since I have combination skin. Oily on the T zone, dry around the cheeks.But I’ve been using it on and off for over a year now - I keep trying to convince myself I could finish the bottle. I’m half way through, but sadly I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing this.The plus is that there’s a pump. It takes about one pump to cover your entire face and sure, it’s fast absorbing.However, it leaves my face feeling dirty. Like there’s this sticky feeling and my skin doesn’t feel satiny smooth, you know? Like how it would when you put on a normal moisturizer. It just has this ... “plastic“ feeling (lack of a better word) texture afterward. I don’t like it.

The gel is so light and hydrating, perfect for under makeup or on it’s own. I don’t feel the gel after I’ve applied it, it is so light but doesn’t leave me with dry patches. I find the lotion too heavy, leaves me shiny. The 0.5oz bottle is REALLY small, guess you don’t realize how small until you see it, if you want a good tube for travel get the 15ml.

My sister recommended this moisturizer to me and I love it. I have extremely oily skin & easily breakout. I started using this moisturizer along with Clinique’s acne 3 step treatment 3 months ago and I love it.
This gel makes your skin feel so fresh and hydrated. If you have really dry skin like I do on my face. You may have to apply twice but it doesn’t feel heavy at all. I love this!!
What I like about this moisturizer is that it doesn’t feel heavy on my skin when I put it on. It moisturizes well and doesn’t feel greasy.

In the past I have shied away from Clinique moisturizers because the ones I tried I found to be far too heavy for my oily skin. I was headed to Miami (hot and humid city) for a long weekend and wanted a travel size moisturizer. Rosa at Sephora (42nd and Mad NYC) put the travel size of this product in my hands and assured me the product would absorb and leave me matte. She was completely right!! My skin drinks this stuff up! I use it morn and night. In the morn I pair it with Shiseido’s SPF 50+ for face.

This gel formula is perfect for my normal to oily skin! It gives just the right amount of moisturization and sinks into the skin very fast leaving a refreshing feeling. My skin also seems to have a better texture. I love it and will continue buying more!

I never review anything, but today I randomly picked this up at my local Macy’s and went home, washed my face, and immediately put this on. Oh my lanta it is something. It immediately absorbed into my skin, (combination dry-oily) and I saw results. The dry patch on my whole nose was now refreshed normal skin. I love the texture and feel it gives my skin after I put it on. Its amazing!

This still has a bit of the magic of its predecessor, i.e., it’s very hydrating. But unlike the old version it’s a bit too thick and caused me a great deal of breakouts and clogged pores. It’s really a shame, the original was a classic but I wouldn’t recommend this formula.

I too have combination/oily skin and mild chin acne breakouts about once a month at least. In past I have tried a few different moisturizers and very quickly gave up using them. Always made my skin look worse, and break outs increased. Never bothered again for years. Then someone mentioned gel moisturizer..and I cannot say enough how pleased I am. Within days I noticed results in my chin acne, and it leaves my face looking soft and fresh.
review_title: Never took moisturizer seriously, until this!

review_text: Hi, so i have combination/oily skin and some mild acne issues. All I have to say is that is hasn’t even been a week yet since I purchased this and I can already see results!! I am in love with this moisturizer!! It leave my face semi-matte (not that dry look) It absorbs quickly and it leaves my face soo smooth!!

After all the great reviews about this product, I thought I had found my holy grail. Turns out, this product made my face worse! I have sensitive and SUPER oily skin, but I have never tried a moisturizer that actually made my skin worse.I cleansed my face, put this on, and put on some make up. At first, I saw how fast the gel absorbed in my skin. The formula is so light and a little went a long way. My face felt so smooth and hydrated. I kept my fingers crossed, but within a couple hours, my face was drenched with oil. The oil I was producing had a different feel to it. There is some type of silicone in this product and I could actually feel the silicone in the oil. This was not a pleasant feeling. After about a couple days of using this product, I also noticed some bumps on my face and a few blemishes. I’m pretty upset about this and I am still on my way to finding the perfect moisturizer for me and my oily skin.

This is my new go-to moisturizer because it doesn’t leave my skin greasy or dewy like the lotion does. I would highly recommend for people with combination skin like myself. It dries quickly and is light enough for me to wear foundation and not feel like I’m wearing too much on my face.

Lol seriously. My skin feels nice and soft and smooth and hydrated just as described. I toned with witch hazel first after my routine facial wash. First night I’m using this. I can’t wait to see if my skin will be oily in the morning. I hope not

I bought this for my pre-teen daughter. Even though she has fantastic skin, she occasionally gets one or two pimples. Since she started using this moisturizer, she hasn’t had a single breakout. She loves it so much, she’s been sharing with her friends. We will definitely keep buying!
I love this stuff!! absorbs quickly. doesn’t make my skin oily or greasy and just makes my face feel amazing! It has helped a lot with my dry patches!!
Leaves my skin feeling super soft all day long. And it doesn’t make my face oily at all. Great product !
This is great for oily skin girls, i use this before my makeup application and it just makes my makeup go on much more smoother

Once I put on the moisturizer, I thought it was going to moisturize w/o drying but yes it did dry my skin. It’s probably just my skin but this product is meant for people with really, really oily skin with no sign of dryness. :( Sad that I have to go return it.
review_title: It felt great when I put it on but then...........

review_text: I have been using this product for about two weeks and I have yet to see any good results. My face has only became more oily. Either I am using this product wrong or I need to wait longer.
Perfect for my oily skin! Absorbs super fast, never greasy. I only wish it had a little SPF. So happy I splurged!!

I bought the small tube to try, I am very picky about moisturizers. I fell head over heals for this one. It is light weight and works very well on my sensitive skin. I have gotten compliments on my skin over the last few weeks. I have noticed a big difference.

Switching to this moisturizer truly changed my skin! It is lightweight and yet still powerful enough to combat dry winter skin. I highly recommend this moisturizer for all skin types. It also works well when paired with Clinique’s CC Cream for a nice, even, healthy glow.

I bought a small tube version one about two weeks ago. Because I wasn’t sure if that works on my face. After two weeks, I feel like to get the full size one. It feels so good for daily use, even a little bit oil control.

So I bought this as it was told me to me that a gel moisturizer is good for people with oily and acne prone skin.It absorbs quickly, and I like that it doesn’t feel sticky on my skin at all.Now, I suggest that you use it once a day. If it use it twice a day, your skin will dry out and flake. Splash a little water on your face with your finger tips to lock in more moisture and then put this stuff on. Overall, I’m fairly pleased.If you have dry skin, skip this one. It won’t do anything for you. Super oily skin? Try it. I have combination skin at best and I’m prone to breaking out. So far, no breakouts, so that’s a plus in my book! It’s a matter of finding out what works best for YOU, and not every persons experience who writes a review on here. What doesn’t work for them could produce amazing results for you!
Used this product and dried my skin out. Was not hydrating AT ALL, returned it and purchased the Sephora brand instant hydrator I previously received as a sample and I love it.
