I usually have a hard time with moisturizers....either they break out my sensitive skin or they are too greasy and cause my already oily skin to get even more oily. I was given this “gel“ in a sample gift pack and immediately fell in love with how quickly it absorbs into my skin...I loved it so much that I ended up getting a large bottle of this! Its like giving your skin a wonderful drink of moisture. Although I have oily skin, I use to always get dry flaky patches here and there on my cheeks or between my eyebrows, and I never have any dry patches now. I use this in the morning after I use Clinique’s clarifying lotion, and my skin hardly ever breaks out now. My skin is extremely smooth and healthy looking. All I need is two pumps for my whole face and neck. Also, I am sensitive to smells in products now, and this gel has a very light scent that quickly evaporates, so I love that too.
Excellent moisturizer for combination skin. Light weight and drys quickly.

I recently moved from Florida to Michigan and the change in humidity really did a number on my skin. I naturally have pretty oily skin, but with the dryer air here, not only was I still oily, I somehow kept getting these dry, flaky patches on my face. Most moisturizers either ’evaporate’ or they leave my face feeling greasy after a few hours, but this stuff really hits the spot. One pump is just about enough for my whole face, and it feels so refreshing and light when I put it on. Definitely helps keep my oil in check and banishes those dry patches.

I really like how it’s not thick and does well with my makeup, feels really smooth and light. My skin is still gets oily after 4 hrs. But mind you this is my second day wearing it.. Still getting use to it.
Thin and not too greasy. Seems to dry quickly, on my skin anyway.

When I first started using this moisturizer without the first two steps in the regemine (Facial Soap and Clarifying Lotion) my skin became kind of dry. Which sucks.Then I bought the starter kit and used all three products 2-3 times a day and, i gotta day, my skin has never been smoother. I still have acne once in a while and dark spots and dark circles, but my skin is SO SMOOTH. If I have dry or flaky skin in some areas, I use a bit more of this under my makeup and I am GOOD TO GO. This stuff makes my dry/oily skin look incredible.Would recommend the first two steps with this. It’s AMAZING together.
This is my summertime moisturizer because it’s light and is the perfect base for my morning routine. Love this product and have for many years. It’s not greasy and makes skin soft.
I’m mid 40’s with acne prone skin and love this wonderful moisturizing gel. It is NOT greasy or heavy like most lotions and works very will under makeup. I highly recommend!

I bought this about 6 months ago rather hesitantly, but I’m SO glad I did. I still have 2/3 of the bottle left. I have used this almost everyday, almost always twice a day. A pump and a bit is enough for me. Love how soft my face feels, especially in the winter, plus my face is definitely not as shiny/oily throughout the day (vs when I don’t apply/forget to). Breakouts are at a minimum, and no more blotting required. Everyone always said to moisturize, moisturize, moisturize. God, why didn’t I do it sooner??

I have sensitive, combination skin that breaks out and reacts to products. I like this moisturizer because it doesn’t make my skin greasy or oily and I don’t break out in it. I do get a little reaction in which my face gets a little red when I first apply, but goes away after a couple minutes. I think the price is reasonable and there’s no scent to it. I know there are probably better moisturizers out there for my skin but this is been working for me so far.

I’ve always had a hard time finding a moisturizer that doesn’t leave me greasy 10 mins later and this is it! It doesn’t break me out or add unnecessary moisture to an already oily face. I’ve repurchased this 5 times already and don’t plan to change!

This is just what I’ve been looking for! I used to use Clinique’s MoistureSurge gel religiously through high school/college, but then stopped once I realized my all-too-common breakouts were because of the fact I was dipping my fingers in a pot. I went through a lot of other moisturizer brands that were all good but not good enough, and then finally came back to find this! For whatever reason, I’d always tried the actual lotion (which was way too heavy for my skin), but this gel... I can feel my skin saying YUM! It is the perfect texture, nice and hydrating but never oily on my skin (I’m combo with dry areas near my mouth/nose area and oily-prone t-zone, sides of nose, sometimes cheeks). This stuff is fab! How did it take me so long to get to this?? Plus a little goes such a long way for me!
The consistency/texture is nice, but was not as moisturizing as I would have liked. I even have oily skin

Purchased this moisturizer because I needed to change up my skin care routine. I have dry skin after cleansing with some dry spots but I can get very oily throughout the day. This product is simply amazing for hydrating the face without it feeling heavy or creating a greasy look. I use this in combination with the Clinique matte foundation and they work wonders together! I will definitely be purchasing this product again!
As someone with very sensitive, oily skin, this gel is amazing! My face feels silky after just one use and it doesn’t add weight or feel greasy.

this is so far THE BEST moisturizer i’ve ever used. I have an oily/combination skin so usually after 2-3 hours my skin is shiny no matter what.. but with this i’m totally mate and my skin looks really good.

The consultant helping me accidentally gave me the GEL instead of the LOTION. I learned that I definitely do have a preference! I didn’t realize the mix up until I was home and ready to use it that night. I figured it couldn’t be that much of a difference so I tried it anyway. I don’t like the way the gel feels and it doesn’t seem to absorb into my skin as well; seems to sit on top of it longer. I’ve been a Clinique lotion user since preteen years, so I’m very loyal to it. I live almost an hour away and I had opened the gel, so I’ll use up this bottle. It’s gets the job done ok, just doesn’t agree with my skin. Bottom line: I would sample both before I made a decision.

I got this 2 weeks ago. I used to use the one in lotion, didn’t help. This version in gel is the best! I was feeling really dry around my nose, I notice a huge different right away. I have acne-prone skin and it hasn’t made me break out! It feels great, and makes my makeup look awesome.
I love how it feels on my face, it’s lightweight but I still feel like my face is getting moisturized. I’ve been using it for two weeks and it’s yet to break me out which is such a relief.

I am acne prone and have oily skin. I really wanted to like this, but alas, I found an increase in my acne, increased flakiness around my cheeks and increased oiliness in my T-zone. The feeling is slick like silicone, but doesn’t actually seep into the skin for moisture, but rather sits on top like a mask. A little goes a long way because it isn’t being soaked in. I returned mine.

I love this product. Its delicate enough for me and my teenage daughters skin. I have combination skin and one pumps goes a long way. This moisturizer is not think or too watery. It’s refreshing . A must try. I will repurchase this when I’m running low
review_title: One to Two pumps is enough

review_text: This moisturizer happens to be my holy grail. I’ve repurchased this moisturizer several times.. It leaves my skin smooth but doesn’t leave a residual feeling that most gel moisturizers leave. It has a beautiful consistency and no annoying scent. I definitely recommend it ❤️❤️❤️❤️
nice and light-probably better for warmer weather-not really suited for extremely dry skin. Pretty much no scent, blends in well.

I think this is the perfect daytime moisturizer. I use it as a last step with the Clinique Acne system, and it is perfect for my sensitive skin. It also plays well with my foundation and my skin is noticeably less oily during the day. However, the downside is that with this and the acne system, my skin is still pretty dry. I use a heavier moisturizer at night to balance it out but, again, this is perfect for daytime wear!

I use this moisturizer during the day and it’s amazing. It absorbs quickly and keeps me really comfortable throughout the day. I don’t get oily partway through the day like I used to with every other moisturizer I’ve used that didn’t dry me out.I recently started using the Clinique Acne Solutions 3-step system, and it dries me out a bit and this moisturizer isn’t quite enough anymore. So now, I use the Lotion version of this moisturizer at night, and this one during the day. That way, I get the added moisture from the Lotion version to help combat the dryness from the system, but this one still keeps me really comfortable during the day (the Lotion version is too greasy for day).Bottom line, I really like this moisturizer, and it’s really great as long as your skin isn’t particularly dry.
review_title: Really great moisturizer! I love it.

review_text: This is a great, lightweight moisturizer. I always opt for this one instead of the lotion, because it doesn’t feel as heavy. No off-putting smell and my skin always feel refreshed and hydrated. The only thing that I have encountered personally, is that I don’t feel that the hydration lasts as long as some others that I have tried. I sometimes have to reapply more frequently than I would prefer.
I have used this gel for years and have recently persuaded my teenaged son to try it. It’s a great moisturizer that does not clog pores.

Seriously ... Why did I never use Clinique before?! I’ve used every other brand in sephora. This gel is really great for oily/combo skin. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave your skin oily or have a weird texture on the surface. I use about 1 1/2 pumps morning and night. I noticed it hasnt made me break out either. Definitely getting more products from the brand

I’ve used so many different moisturizers over the years, and I must say that this is the best. I have acne prone skin so it’s hard to find one that doesn’t make my skin too oily but also doesn’t dry it out, which a lot of others have. It lasts for a long time because you don’t need very much, and doesn’t dry my skin out at all! It’s amazing so if you’re considering buying it, I highly recommend it!
I have combination skin, and this moisturizer did not make my forehead feel greasy or my chin dry by the end of the day. It’s great under makeup.

This moisturizer is changing my life. I was in-store trying to find a new foundation and then girl at the Color IQ station used the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel before trying foundations.At the end of the work day my face generally looks like a mirror, this moisturizer has completely stopped that. I can go from the office to hour looking like I just applied my makeup. Clinique has a forever customer in me with this product!
review_title: O B S E S S E D

review_text: Hands down the BEST moisturizer I have ever used. Feels amazing on the skin
Good for every day uses for oily skin. Sometimes I need a little bit more moisture so I take the non gel one.
I tried this moisturizer and it left my skin with a funky gross film on it. I switched to the moisture surge gel and it works wonders. The lotion is way too oily for my combination skin

This is the only moisturizer I can use without worry. No breakouts ever from this. Its not super moisturizing so if thats what you are looking for, this isn’t for you. This is a nice oil free moisturizer and have repurchased several times.

I love this stuff! I’ve been using is pretty deliciously, in the morning and before bed, for about 5 years now. I should technically use the lotion, due to my particular skin concerns, but the gel has always been my go-to because it doesn’t leave me feeling sticky and it easily mixes with my Clinique spf.

I had been using moisturizing lotion for my acne and using 1-2 blotting sheets a day to remove excess oil but with this gel, I don’t really need any at all! The gel prevents oil buildup and I have noticed a decent difference in the size and redness of my acne in only
I’ve heard a lot about this product through YouTube beauty bloggers.. I wasn’t sure if I’d like it. But turns out I LOVE it! I have combo oily skin and this is perfect :)

I haven’t used Clinique’s regular moisturizer since high school. I always thought it was too thin and didn’t provide enough moisture so when I saw this gel version I decided to buy the small tube trial and boy, this is so much different! It is much thicker but goes on light as air and blends in perfectly and smoothly. Not greasy at all or leave any tacky residue texture like some moisturizers do. It’s just perfection and I’ve since ordered the big bottle. I’m convinced! Just try the little tube and you’ll be hooked too!

I absolutely love this moisturizer. It makes my skin feel so silky and smooth. It also adds a great deal of moisture without making my skin feel greasy. I will be using this product for a long time to come.
It does moisturize the skin nicely but I’ve noticed I produce more oil
Better for summer in my case, as my skin gets dry during winter. Great for what it costs!

This moisturizer is cool, light, and refreshing. It absorbs quickly and feels great going on- a little goes a long way. However, sometimes I feel it leaves my skin feeling taut. I don’t have oily skin so maybe the moisturizer would’ve been better for me. Also, it offers no other benefits other than simply being a moisturizer, which is slightly disappointing.
As advertised -- lightweight and moisturizing! Perfect for warmer months when I find my combination normal/oily skin can get too slick.

Before using, I had very dry, flaky, red skin. My makeup looked awful and cakey. After using this for about a week, my dry patches were gone. My face looks so much better with makeup on. I love the gel texture. It’s very lightweight and absorbs seamlessly into the skin. No greasy feeling. It has a very clean smell, but once you have rubbed it in, it goes away. A little goes a long way. I only use about three pumps to cover my whole face. Love love love this product. Will definitely repurchase.

This is my all-time favorite moisturizer. I have combination/oily skin that can get dry patches in the winter. This absorbs quickly into my skin and doesn’t affect my makeup application at all. I would highly recommend for all skin types - especially because there is no scent. I only wish this came with SPF.

-Well first of all, let me say that this product definitely caters more to the oily skinned girls. I have combination/oily skin. I mainly get oily on my nose and chin with some dry/normal places every where else. So if I want to REALLY be moisturized I do have to put extra product in those dryer areas to make sure no dry patches show up when I put my foundation on.-This stuff will last you FOREVER. I’ve been using it since January 10th (got this for my bday) and I haven’t even really dented it at all. You definitely will get your moneys worth with this.-I LOVE the pump on this. Perfect for distributing just the right amount.
review_title: Moisturizing, If You Put Enough Product

review_text: Lightweight, fast absorbing, and non-greasy. Much better than a lot of other moisturizers I’ve used. I think people with sensitive skin would be able to use this without an issue.
This is a great product to use to add moisture to your skin. My skin feels completely refreshed it absorbs into my skin quickly and I have no dry patches on my skin throughout my day.
This is my favorite moisturizer for my combination skin. Super lightweight. It absorbs right away leaving my skin feeling instantly hydrated. Highly recommend this product!

I got this in the three-pack along with the other two steps in the 3-Step Skin Care System, and this is by far the best part of the system. Lightweight, no strong scent, and soaks right in. I’m going to buy the big one once the tiny one from the three pack runs out!

This moisturizer does help balance my dry combination skin, while others I’ve tried ended up of being too oily or not moisturize enough. I also tried the lotion version but it was oily and caused break out due to the mineral oil in ingredient. And Im glad that Sephora has the mini size, so I can put it in purse or travel.
review_title: Good choice for dry combination skin

review_text: i cant believe it took me all these years to find this fantastic product!! i >3 it! i have SUPER oily skin. just after 1 hour of washing my face it will be covered in oil but not after using this product! God bless you Clinque, you have a customer 4 life

Finally I’ve found the perfect moisturizer for my combination, acne - prone skin! The gel formula is crucial for not clogging up oily skin but also effective enough that problem areas don’t become dried out and flaky from acne treatments. Will repurchase again and again!
This is great for oily skin and absorbs instantly with no greasy residue. This is meant for oily/combination oily skin types so people with dry skin should get the lotion variant of this product.
review_title: holy grail moisturizer for oily skin

review_text: I have extremely sensitive, acne-prone skin. I have been on retin-a, so my skin has been pretty dry. Despite that this is an oil-free gel, it provides enough hydration for my dryish skin. It also hasn’t broken me out.

I have stubbornly dry skin to start. I ordered the travel size to test this out and I’m glad I did. Alone this product is good in value because a little bit will cover a large area. It also doesn’t sting, smell strong, or caused a breakout. It absorbs well and didn’t make my face feel greasy afterwards. But it didn’t make my skin feel dramatically different in moisture either. My skin seems to soak up most gels and lotions in minutes and then begs for more. So it’s been a tough experience finding only one product to do everything. Why I like it though is that I can use it with these other moisturizers and it still doesn’t cause any breakouts, it also seems to work better with them. So overall I’d say it’s worth trying in the travel size if you are looking to try something new.
review_title: A little goes a long way

review_text: Great stuff I use every time after I wash my face just it moist and hydrated so I don’t get dry sky works Like a charm don’t get oily either=)
Great for sensitive skin.
I love this! I have oily skin but still get dry spots. I love this moisturizer cause it controls my oil but keeps my skin hydrated! I can’t recommend it enough.

I received a sample of this prior to witnessing my two former roommates use it and recommend it to me. I have oily skin, and have not seen improvement in that, but I have seen an improvement in my acne scars. I use it as my night moisturizer now. I really like it and I will keep using it, and will be on the look out for a new cleanser, preferably oil, for my skin type.

It absorbed quickly, but it didn’t really hydrate my skin (especially compared to the Lotion+ version). But the reason I ended up returning it was it burned my skin every time I put it on, so I went and got the Lotion+ instead unfortunately. I can imagine that it’d work for other people though especially in the summer, but it just wasn’t for me.

This is the most affordable moisturizer I’ve found that is most effective for my combination skin. I have never been able to find a product that doesn’t weigh my face down (I can tell because when I sweat my face gets hot and sticky under the product, something that doesn’t happen with this). It’s not quite moisturizing for my dry patches but I remedy that with a light layer of maracuja oil before gel application. It minimizes oil development in my t-zone throughout the day.I have been using this twice a day, two pumps per use. I’ve gone through about 1/3 bottle in 2 months so this will last a decent amount of time.
Best thing I have ever put on my face!

It absorbs quickly which is great when you are in the rush getting ready in the morning. You always want your moisturizer to be absorbed before applying another product on your face. It has a cool sensation which also feels nice. Also the price is not too bad for the amount you get and what it does. I also use this in the winter and I have normal skin during this season.
My all time favorite moisturizer! I have oily skin and this is perfect gives me moisture without feeling greasy soaks up nicely into my skin and doesn’t break my out!

I have very oily skin with Seborrheic Dermatitis and this is one of my favorite moisturizers to use, especially under make-up. It absorbs fast, leaves my skin hydrated and soft and feels so light!I will always repurchase this one!

I have quite oily skin and typically don’t like to moisturize all that much however this product is go-to for me! Its super light weight, a nice light texture and does what it says. I will continue to buy, hands down!

This is the most incredible moisturizer I have ever used! It perfectly hydrates and balances oily skin after washing. It seeps into your skin and is absorbed immediately, leaving a deliciously soft face. I have tried a million products to replace it when I have run out and there is truly NOTHING LIKE IT. Favorite project ever!

All-time favorite. This is a *daytime* moisturizer, you should still be using a night cream, especially during the winter! The gel is lightweight and goes perfectly under foundation, no caking!! I’m a forever user!

i need a very lightweight moisturizer for the daytime that I can wear under my makeup and that isn’t greasy. I have tried so many before I finally decided to try Clinique. I love this gel version so much. It’s so light not oily and moisturizes my face beautifully. This will now be my go to moisturizer.

This is a nice moisturizing gel. It goes on very light and smooth, and you only need a little bit of it. I have combination skin, and this was light enough to not leave me feeling greasy while still effective as a moisturizer. I don’t know if I would buy it again, but if you’re looking for something lightweight and soothing, this is good.
I really like it so far, I’ve been using it for about 3 weeks. I have very oily skin and this is the first moisturizer I’ve tried that doesn’t break me out!

Spent a lot of time and money looking for a moisturizer that worked for my skin. Moisturizing is not an option for me my skin is very dry after washing and very oily by the end of the day and it’s also acne prone and extremely sensitive. This calms angry skin and is a light moisture that’s not too heavy and doesn’t leave your skin with a film or layer of gunk. It helped contribute to clearing my skin after finally finding the right combo of products and continues to keep my skin clear so I will never buy a different moisturizer!

I’ve tried this product twice - each time hoping I’d finally understand why others rave about it. Didn’t work, in fact I switched to another before finishing the second bottle. I’m 32 with combination skin and definitely need something that feels a little heavier. The “lightweight“ and “absorbency’ here leaves my skin a few mins later as if I didn’t apply any moisturizers at all.

This product is amazing! Not only keeps my skin hydrated but also controls shine! Great for combination skin and acne prone skin. With just one single use, I’m really impressed by how soft and smooth my skin becomes. Non fragrance is a plus. :) Definitely stick with it!

I’ve only used this for a few days but I’m in love with this product. Perfect for my oily skin, it dries quickly to a matte feel, but leaves my skin feeling silky. I’ve seen a huge different in my face after using for just a few days.

I go through many products to add extra moisture to my skin after using Proactiv+, however, Cliniques gel is a great compliment to my skin care routine! After tossing my supplemental lotion with this moisturizing gel, my skin is prepped for makeup! I have seen a big difference in my makeup application, longevity, and oiliness throughout the day.
It works great and it doesn’t bother my acne prone skin!

This is the best moisturizer ever, I have oily skin that is also acne prone, I start using the 3 step regiment from clinique about 2 months ago, I love it my skin has cleared out a lot, this moisturizer leave my face so soft.
I really liked how this moisturizer was so lightweight. This moisturizer would be most ideal for summer but still loved the way it felt even for winter time. I will definitely buy again!

Firstly, I have very oily skin on t-zone and very dry on my cheeks , dry on nose and forehead also. I really like this moisterizer. Another that i ever used it is always make me get pimples all the time.but this not.how amazing! It’s not heavy. Nonetheless, it kinda not enough moise for winter you might have to put it about *2 of nomal one!

This moisturizer has been great for my combination/oily skin (which is what it’s made for). It feels very light, as a gel generally does, without leaving a film. The first day I used it, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin’s oiliness, and have been impressed with the results over the past couple weeks. As long as my skin keeps reacting this well to it, I think this is my new moisturizer!
review_title: Light formula, big improvement in my skin

review_text: This is the best everyday moisturizer I’ve ever used for my skin. The gel formula is great for my combination skin. I wear it alone and under my makeup...I use it multiple times a day. I would repurchase this again and again!

I have oily skin (T-zone) that can be acne prone.I’m so happy I bought this, as it’s the best moisturizer I’ve used! It’s mosturizing and leaves the skin feeling soft, not dry in some spots like lighter moisturizers have done, and not oily like heavier mosturiziers have left my skin.If you have oily skin, purchase this product!
Not much moisture, but during the summer when I’m super oily i’m sure this will come in handy. :)

I was not that impressed with the product. It does absorb quickly and is super lightweight, but felt more like alcohol evaporating from my face and less moisturizing than I needed it to be. My skin is less oily in the winter and I am willing to give this product another try in the warmer months when oil control is a major issue for me. However, I think that I would rather search for a less expensive option in the future.
Love this for SUMMER but does not for winter. I wish it had some spf in it, that would make it a perfect summertime face lotion.
It is so dry during the winter and this makes my face feel hydrated and amazing.

This moisturizer is extremely lightweight while being hydrating as well. It is perfect for people with oily/oily combination skin! I have combination skin, leaning on the less oily side, but I live in a humid climate and this is perfect for me!
review_title: Perfect for Combination to Oily Skin!

review_text: I hate when heavy moisturizers park themselves inside my large pores. This gel does no such thing. As you know, moisturizers can’t reduce the size of your pores, but Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel makes them less visible. At least, that’s how it feels

I’ve been looking for a face moisturizer for my combination skin and every time I think I’ve found “the one“ it makes my T-Zone super oily and my chin/cheek area dry. This moisturizer was recommended to me and so far I really like it.
This is a great moisturizer for me with my very combo skin. It doesn’t make my oily spots any oilier but provides enough moisture for the dry spots.
Absorbs quickly, hydrates the skin just well enough without making it greasy, does not make your meke-up slide off if you have oilier skin. On the whole, a very nice moisturising gel indeed!

Prior to this gel I was using another oil control lotion which I loved. I decided to try this product since it had rave reviews especially for girls with oily skin. The product feels very nice on the skin and gives my skin moisture but it does nothing for my oily skin. By the time I get to work I already need to blot my face. I was expecting another result from this product. I will be returning it.
I have oily combo skin and this helps without making my face greasy!

This moisturizer is definitely my go-to and will be the only one I ever use. It helps balance my sometimes oily skin and provides a good base for makeup application. I prefer this formula to other ones because other ones tend to leave my skin feeling oily, and since I have oily skin already, that’s a big no-no! It absorbs quickly into the skin and is very lightweight on the skin, but does what it’s supposed to do. I’ve tried many moisturizers, both drug store and high end and this is definitely my favorite.

Great lightweight moisturizer for addressing greasy skin. I like applying it after exfoliating or using a clarifying mask because I know it won’t clog my newly cleaned pores. After application, my skin feels completely matte and smooth. I use this mainly during the summer but prefer the Clinique Moisturizing Lotion for the winter, which is a little more moisturizing.
I love this moisturizer, it absorbs very quickly and leaves the skin soft and not greasy!

I have purchased this moisturizer several times and love it for my combination/acne-prone skin. It is oil free, lightweight and absorbs quickly. I have tried Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, which unfortunately was too heavy for my skin and made me break out. I will be sticking with the gel version from now on. My only drawback is that this gel is often times not moisturizing enough, especially during harsh Wisconsin winters. However, I have not found a heavier product that works well for my sensitive and acne-prone skin. Will purchase again.
review_title: Great lightweight moisturizer for acne-prone skin

review_text: This is literally the only moisturizer that keeps my seriously sensitive skin calm and moisturized. I’ve tried hundreds of other moisturizers from $10 to $100 and this is the best I’ve found.

Let me preface this by saying that I have never liked using moisturizer, have tried a cajillion different ones, and generally avoid moisturizer like the plague. HOWEVER, my oily skin betrayed me this winter season and it became necessary to seek a new one out. This stuff does not: break me out, cause excess nose area oil, feel greasy, make my makeup wear faster. It does: absorb quickly, lightly moisturize and can layer up for more if needed, and generally feels great. I would not recommend this to someone with very dry skin, but have been so overwhelmingly pleased by the quality (and price! It’s cheaper than some drug store moisturizers I’ve bought) for my oily yet winter-dry and very sensitive skin that I’m going to buy the biggest size Clinique makes of this when I run out.
review_title: The moisturizer for those who hate moisturizer

review_text: Good overall, but it still didn’t help my oily skin. I used it for a couple of days but then discontinued it.
Love this moisturizer, particularly because it absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling smooth and not greasy. I have combination skin and I find it moisturizes just enough.

I have been using since the summer as my only moisturizer and couldn’t be more happy makes my skin extremely soft and plump. My skin is acne prone and this has helped cleared it up. Love this moisturizer will buy the big bottle next time.

I am generally a fan of clinique products. They introduced me to the concept that not all skin is the same and to the whole TONER idea back in the 1970s. So when I became aware there was a moisturizing gel for super oily skin, I knew I needed to try it.Going on, this gel feels light and cooling. After am hour or two, my skin felt even more oily! Not a good product for me.....sending it back.
I was looking for moisture without irritation, and while this product was very gentle on my skin, it just didn’t provide the moisture I needed this time of year.
review_title: Gentle, but not enough moisture for winter months

review_text: This moisturizer definitely hydrates my skin without the feeling of becoming oily. My skin does get a little dry during the winter with this moisturizer, but it’s nothing too much for me to handle. This is my go-to moisturizer especially during the summer, as it is very lightweight and doesn’t make me too oily as the Clinique moisturizing lotion.

I have combination skin(dry red spots and oily spots all at once) and acne prone skin and this stuff is a miracle worker. My skin has never felt softer, more supple, or better hydrated. This is light weight and almost cooling but moisturizes the dry spots enough that I never get those raw areas.
I love using this product during the summer when my skin is extra oily. It does help keep my oily skin in check without drying it.

This is my HG moisturizer. I’ve been through 3-4 and so this time I picked the largest one I could find. works very well for my oily-combo skin. So light but does it’s job really well. doesn’t give me milia under the eyes too.Will continue using it!

I was excited to try this out since it’s supposed to be for oily acne prone skin and It was summer time and I needed something that would help keep me moisturized but also not make me oily. At first it felt nice! Definitely doesn’t promote my skin to be more oily but doesn’t really hydrate long enough. Eventually I just felt like it was a waste of money. I could purchase the same results from drugstore type of moisturizers.
I have combination, acne prone skin and I love this stuff. It’s great for the morning under makeup. Now during the winter o do use something a bit more moisturizing at night.

I have never had a very good track record with this product line but I wanted to try something new. It might be a good product but not for my skin type. The texture is weird... Goopy and very wet feeling. I feel like I use a TON and it just doesn’t moisturize the way I would like. Once I use this bottle up... I will be going back to my old standby: Origins!!!!
This is the most magical moisturizer I have ever used. It absorbs right in and doesn’t make my skin feel greasy at all. It makes my skin feel like silk, I will use it forever.
review_title: my skin has never felt so smooth!

review_text: it is a okay product. gets absorbed quickly and does not make my skin too oily. but i still feel that my skin is a bit dry and not totally moisturized AND i have combination to oily skin. i think it is better for summer use.
Classic favorite moisturizer for oily skin. Always kept my oily skin fresh and It has this really nice barely there scent.
This is my favorite moisturizer. It soaks in very quickly and doesn’t break me out. It also has a neutral smell. Will repurchase the biggest size when my current bottle runs out. Worth the price.

I have a very oily skin and most moisturizers result in a slimy skin in the morning, or worse, breakouts. This is one of the VERY few moisturizers that moisturizes but does not leave the skin oily. I apply this at night before going to bed, and my skin is very soft and smooth in the morning, making the application of makeup very nice and smooth.
Doesn’t leave a feeling of stickiness, absorbs very quickly - perfect all year round

I wanted to try this moisturizer for a while. I love the Moisture Surge, and the DDML, but some days I don’t need that intensive of a skin hydrator. This lotion is perfect for that! I don’t recommend this as a winter moisturizer, but it would be perfect for summer days. It has no SPF to irritate your skin or eyes, and your skin won’t feel “heavy“ with it on afterwards.

I cannot go without this moisturizer. It may not include sun protection or anti-aging benefits, but when your skin is dry and irritated, this is the best lotion for 100% hydration without leaving behind any gross residue. I’ve tried so many face creams that never really felt moisturizing enough until I found this. Now I pair this one with other face creams (UV protection cream for day, anti aging cream for night) and my skin is so much happier!! It is a must have!
review_title: Like a glass of water for your skin!

review_text: It’s an alright moisturiser, nothing to write home about but nothing to complain about either. True to the claim; it is very light-weight and absorbs quickly. I use this as another layer of moisture on top of my normal moisturiser because it doesn’t bunch under foundation. All in all, a good product.
I’ve been using this moisturizer for over 3 years. It is lightweight and your skin drinks it up! Never had it broken me out of caused dryness. I love it!!

This moisturizer is amazing!! It is so fast absorbing, and non greasy moisturizer that is just perfect for my extra oily skin. I can’t say it enough... I love this moisturizer and will buy it over and over again!!

I dont like using thick moisturizer as a base for makeup because I have oily combination skin and thick/creamy moisturizer will make my makeup look greasy. This gel is super lightweight, easy to apply and absorbs super fast. It helps me have a natural, thin and light makeup but still hydrating my skin. My skin can break out easily but this never causes me any pimple so far.

I have an oil skin and i’ve been using this moisturizing for a long time. I tried others but always come back to this one because this is the one who does not make my skin more oil and also i really feel my skin more soft. recommend it
Never going back to lotion. Truly a miracle worker. It melts in your skin!
I luv it my face luv it it is absorbing water for your skin
I like this moisturizer its lightweight and its oil free which helps with my oily/combination skin. I wish it had some kind of UV protector. Other then that is a really good daily moisturizer.

I’m the kind of gal that revamps her entire routine every so often, because of new products/trends and trial and error with said products and trends. When I discovered this product, I knew immediately this would become a staple in my beauty routine. For anyone with combo/oily/acne prone/sensitive skin, this is the holy grail! I don’t know how it works, but it works! When I originally bought this product I was using a a benzoyl peroxide cleanser, a salicylic acid liquid astringent, and then this as a moisturizer. I wouldn’t even use a foundation primer at that time, I would just apply bare minerals right over the top of this product and it would look flawless and last for hours! Loved!Later my needs changed and I tacked on a mattifying moisturizing after this step in that routine, and added a foundation primer because I changed foundations. I was using hourglass immaculate and the veil mineral primer. The products applied beautifully over this prep routine and lasted until I washed it off! Sometimes I could sleep in a fully made face and wake up and wear it again! Don’t tell any one, that’s gross!Now I’m a little less concerned with acne, although I do still combat breakouts, I am moving into aging prevention. I do enjoy tanning and I have to consider sun protection and my routine has changed drastically. I’ve recently started using a PTR anti aging cleanser, a few different facial treatments and masks. However, I still use this gel and my mattifying moisturizer or night cream. This is always applied after cleansing or applying a mask, I kind of use it like a gentle toner before moisturizer or treatments. No matter how my needs change, I still seem to see immediate and long term results from this product. It immediately starts to even out the complexion and tighten pores. It evens out dry and oily patches AT THE SAME TIME! It’s truly amazing!
review_title: This is the hero of my routine!

review_text: I was the kind of person who thought I didn’t need a moisturizer for my acne prone skin. then when I finally thought to give it a whirl I used BODY LOTION. yeah, it’s been a ride.the point being, this moisturizer did all the things for me that I did not previously think possible. it makes my face feel firm and hydrated without being greasy or uncomfortable under my other makeup. it smells good but not to the point where it’s distracting.definitely a repurchase. think about this product if you’ve had a hard time finding a moisturizer that works for you!
I have very oily skin and this is the only product I’ve ever found that actually controls and reduces the oil on my skin. Many products claim to do that, but this is truly the only one that does it.
I’ve purchased this before, and had to repurchase! It’s the only moisturizer that keeps my face demons in check while also keeping my face moist!
My absolute favorite moisturizer! I have really dry skin, especially when it gets cold and this is the best thing for it. It just makes my face feel so hydrated.

I probably will start switching back and forth between the original formula of this moisturizer and this one; richer formula in winter, gel formula in summer. It is definitely lighter than the original moisturizer, and I like it quite a bit!
Pretty moisturizing.. Absorbs quickly.. Probably perfect for summer.. I may try the Dramatically Different Lotion for the winter..
I have oily skin and this moisturizer is perfect! It moisturizes, is lightweight, and does not leave an oily shine or finish on my skin. I highly recommend this product!

This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever tried. It is light weight and non oily yet still moisturizes effectively. I use it ever day and have had it for a year and half only used half the bottle! You barely need any to cover your whole face.

It’s really amazing. I have oily T-zone so I hate something that makes me feel even slightly oily. This moisturizer absorbes really fast and then it’s like I am wearing nothing. Before I find this, I used to avoid the moisturizers because most of them were kinda heavy for me. I used retin-a every night and my skin is already a bit sensitive but this moisturizer does not sting my skin and if it does slightly just because sometimes my skin is really irritated because of scrubs, it subsides in few seconds. Also it does not break me out at all. I really like that it has a pump so I don’t have to put my fingers inside of the bottle that spreads the bacteria. I think I never stop using this moisturizer on a daily basis. I do have the clinique moisture surge as well that I received as a gift on one of my purchases so if I need a boost in moisturing, I use it as a hydrator on top of the dramatically different gel.

I’ve been using moisturizers for roughly 15 years, and in that period I’ve tried several different products from drug store special to high end designer. I always come back to Clinique moisturizing gel because it is hands down the best product for my combination skin. It moisturizes without being heavy or causing my face to become more oily/shiny.
review_title: I've tried a lot of moisturizors....

review_text: I have been using it for more than a month now. And I have acne prone skin. I got more acne after using this moisturizer. It does not moisture enough my skin.

I love this moisturizer. I can’t say it’s done anything dramatic for my skin, but it is just a good solid product for my oily skin. It absorbs quickly and wears great under makeup. To me, it’s unbeatable as far as value in concerned.

I love this stuff, I have only been using it for a month, but my skin has been so different, and I think it has helped to clear up my skin. I only use it at night before bed, but my skin has just been so soft and clear, and I have hardly had any break outs. I love it!!

As someone who has mostly normal skin that sometimes leans dry I picked this up on a whim for my mother who frequently complains at the greasiness of most moisturizers, while she has yet to form an opinion on it I’ve found it to be really nice for the days you feel like you don’t need moisturizer or even during summer when your skin may not be as vulnerable to dryness.It’s not the best moisturizer for dryness but in all fairness it doesn’t claim to be, my expectations were unrealistic in that regard.A minor complaint with the bottle design not exclusive to the gel, I’d like to be able to take the moisturizer cleanly from the pump instead of having the eventual long term build up of dried product around the opening but the muzzle is very short and that is an unfortunate inevitability.I do recommend trying it if only the small sized tube if your skin leans from combination to oily as I believe it will work really well for you.

I have been using this moisturizer for over five years and I haven’t found anything else that compares. My skin tends to be somewhat on the dry side and this does a great job at giving it the perfect amount of moisture. My mom also uses and loves this and she has oily skin. This is also much cheaper than comparable products from Sephora, so it’s a win-win! I sometimes use it to take off any stubborn eye makeup too- just put a tiny bit on a cotton ball or some tissue and wipe off any makeup. It’s super gentle and I think even works better than most makeup removers!
I love this moisturizer for my oily skin. It is so lightweight and absorbs quickly. Never feels or looks greasy. I use this under my Too Faced BB cream and its perfect.
I had been wanting to try this product for so long and when I used it this managed to give me dry patches everywhere on my face. I have combination/oily skin and was very disappointed.

I’ve been using this product for about 2 weeks now and I love it. I accidentally bought the gel thinking it was the lotion but now I’m not sure if i’ll ever switch over to the lotion. I don’t use the three steps skin care system that Clinique recommends because this product does enough for me. I’m iffy about moisturizers since my skin is so oily but I think I have now found the perfect one with this moisturizer!

I have very oily skin, so I’m extremely picky when it comes to moisturizers. This is the first product I’ve found that works for my skin type. For years I opted to skip out on moisturizer altogether because the others I’d tried were too heavy or made my oily skin feel worse, but now that I’ve found this one from Clinique I’m never giving it up.
Been using this for years & have no complaints. It does tend to get a little heavy in the summer but all I do is switch up from the dry skin formula to a more oily & problem solved. Great product

My skin gets oily everywhere except around my mouth. I’ve been using this moisturizer since about mid-September and my skin hasn’t felt or looked more moisturized in the drier areas. It actually looks worse now that it’s starting to get colder, and if it can’t handle 40 degree weather, I have absolutely no hope that it will do anything once we really get into winter.I have noticed that my skin feels slightly less oily, and the product doesn’t feel heavy or greasy at all, which is a definite plus. It leaves a nice, soft feeling once absorbed. I’ll hang onto this to use in the summer months, but I wouldn’t recommend it for winter use unless you live in a warmer climate.
Love this stuff! Feels very nice on your skin and does not break me out! Which is very important lol

I have a VERY oily t-zone, but my skin still gets flaky and dry once the weather starts to get cold. I’ve also always had a problem with moisturizing in the morning before my makeup routine because I would be an oil monster within hours. This product has solved all my problems! It’s light, fast-absorbing and so refreshing. I would definitely recommend it! Do not EVER stop making this miracle product, Clinique!
I am a big fan of this moisturizer! As a girl with oily, but not acnaic skin. Its hard to find a moisturizer that feels good on the skin and isn’t greasy! I love this product!

I bought the large one after seeing it on sale at my sephora store a while ago just to come home and find out I got the gel not the lotion .. I’ve received plenty of the sample sized lotions and fell in love ... Pretty disappointed with the gel compared to the lotion but it’s good and does the job.. Just not as great as the lotion .
It says it’s hydrating yet when it is soaking in it feels right. I found that it causes black heads and clogged pores.

I find this moisturizer good for wearing under my makeup. I have very oily skin. I still have oily skin at the end of the day even with this product, but since I am getting older and realize my skin needs regular moisturizing I find this to be an adequate product.
This is an great moisturizing gel for my combination oily skin & is fast absorbing.

Clinique saves the day once again with this amazing facial moisturizer.Bottle comes with a pump so it’s really clean and you’re not dipping your fingers into stuff.The gel formula spreads across your face evenly and is absorbed within a few seconds.Oil-prone areas of the face like the T Zone behave and remain dry a while after application, which is nice.No real smell.GREAT quantity for value. Based on most oily-skin targeted facial moisturizers, this one is among some of the most inexpensive for the largest quantity.

Don’t even know where to start... If you are sitting there now considering this lotion, just buy it! For some reason I found this and took a chance because of reviews and I’m SO glad I did!! I’ve had acne since early teens and I’m 28 now. My skin was finally clearing up but then I got prego and it broke out again. Thought I’d give this a try and within 2 days my skin started clearing up! Then my girlfriend with a 10 month old said she was recently struggling with acne so I told her to try this even though I’d only been using a week...she got it and said same thing....skin started clearing up in a couple days! SO this is miracle stuff....I use twice a day after washing my skin and under my BB cream. Life saver!!!
I have an oily t-zone and this didn’t help minimize anything. At least it was lightweight...

I always come back to this moisturizer. I just wrote a review for the lotion because the combo between the two is so reliable and effective. I have combo skin, and alternate between the gel on oily days and the lotion on more dry days.The gel is SUPER fast absorbing and it leaves skin feeling like silk. It really provides a great base for makeup and I think that the yellow tint really helps to combat redness before going in with foundation.I only gave it a 4 (as I did with the lotion +) because I do think that there are “better“ products out there, however this one is great and reliable therefore I’ll always have it my skin care collection.

I just received this a week ago and I simply love it!! I have been looking for the right kind of gel moisturizer from drugstore to high end and I have finally found it. It’s perfect for oily/combination skin. The gel isn’t sticky and goes on smoothly. I highly recommend this to everyone!!

This is a great, light-weight moisturizer if you have sensitive skin. My skin reacts to practically everything, but not this! I have been struggling with bumps and texture issues that are almost gone since I began using this.

I love this product. I switch between this and the murad skin perfecting lotion and i truly love this lotion. It really moisturizes and has a good smell. I only use it at night though because where i live its over 90° probably 340 days of the year and only rains maybe 5 times a year and this makes me really greasy. My house it super cold 24/7 though (set at 68° and i keep fans on in the bedroom at night) so at night it only mosturizes and doesnt cause me to get greasy.

Although I’m a skincare junkie and love to mix it up I always end up coming back to this amazing moisturizer. Yes it doesn’t have any major anti-aging claims or any revolutionary new ingredients but the fact is it works. Its hydrating without making me greasy, looks great under makeup, is fast absorbing, and best of all doesn’t break me out. What else can you ask for? :)
This is my holy grail moisturizer. Love the gel consistency.. perfect for my sensitive skin!! Clinique girl for life.

I use this every morning. Very lightweight, absorbs fast. I like the smell :). I started using this because I used to have oily skin. This helps me not getting oily throughout the day. I dont get oily at all anymore. Lasts a long time.

I dont know what everyone else is complaining. apply this after the clarifying lotion. this makes my skin so soft. The best part about this is. Most lotions leave your skin feeling sticky and does not absorb to your skin fast. This does and makes it sooo soft

After hearing the rave about this moisturizer, I decided to give in and purchase the 1.7oz to try it out. Honestly one of the worst purchases I have ever made. I tried to use this multiple times hoping it’d change my mind, but every time I used it it’d leave my face feeling super greasy and oily. Did not feel like it was moisturizing my skin at all!

I really wanted to like this, but I just cant and I’ve given up. It feels so nice going on the skin, but about a minute later my skin feels tight, dry and itchy. I would not recommend this. Honestly, I find the Simple line (yup, drugstore) is much better, and cheaper.

I have combination oily skin during summer months. Bought this about 5 months ago and have been using it twice a day every day since (still on the same bottle!) it absorbs quickly and leaves no sticky residue. My skin doesn’t get as oily throughout the day anymore.My skin changes during the winter months to combination dry so I’m looking forward to seeing if the moisturizing lotion works just as great as the gel :)
this is my second time repurchasing this because i love it so much. for me, one pump is enough for my whole face. it is light and easy for the skin. not too oily so it doesnt break me out.

I have oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin. This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used, and yes, oily skin ladies, you need your moisture, too. I slather my face in this stuff twice a day, and my skin drinks it right up. It absorbs quickly, and leaves absolutely no stickiness (which I really, really hate). I have never used another moisturizer that felt this nice after absorption, and it really makes a difference with my skin. I also love that it doesn’t have SPF, because that’s not necessary over night. I blend in a dollop of Shiseido’s Urban Environment Oil-Free UV Protector Broad Spectrum SPF 42 For Face during the day, and it’s completely absorbed and I’m protected, then at night, I just use the moisturizer. It saves me having to have two different moisturizers for AM & PM, which I love, and I think this is a great value for the money anyway.

I have an extremely oily face, large pores, and I’ve had hormonal pimples since I was about 14. I’ve tried every drug store product known to man, and while not everything works for everyone, I must say this lotion has been the only lotion to actually show physical results in my skin. My pores have become significantly smaller, my face has become brighter, smoother, more firm looking, produces less oil (you will never find a product that takes away all the oil, I promise. All you can do is find products that help lessen and conceal it) and my skin is actually soft to the touch. Give it at least a month, don’t think you can try it for a week and give up because you don’t see results. It needs time to repair your skin and show results. I love it so much, I have switched my face wash to Clinque (and for someone with acne for most of their life, switching products is a very big deal). Hormonal acne is not something a face wash can really prevent, but if I have a breakout, Clinque’s Acne wash and gel, combined with this moisturizing gel, clears my face up overnight. My pimple will be gone by morning and my face will actually glow with moisture.Obviously most everyone else agrees and loves this product, but I loved this product enough to review it as well. Like I said, not every product works for everyone, but this product seems to do as intended. It’s worth the extra money!
This is literally amazing. I have combination- dry skin. It makes my skin soft and glowy.
Great for combination skin, light weight gel, can’t go wrong with clinique!
It’s light & non greasy so perfect for me, makes my skin feel great.
I use a cleanser that can make my face very tight and dry, but this moisturizer brings all of the life back to my face! love it so much! don’t know what id do without it!

I have oily and acne prone skin. I’ve been looking for a good moisturizer for ages, but all of them would make me breakout or would make me extremely oily after a few hours. I decided to gave this a try and couldn’t be more pleased. I’m currently doing some skin treatments for my acne and my skin is extremely dry and this moisturizer still works perfectly - so in my experience, it worked well with both oily and dry skin. Also a good price for so much product, since a little bit goes a long way. Only down side is that it doesn’t have SPF.
I’ve been using this cream religiously for years. Definitely recommend it.
love this one for daily use. night or day:) perfect gel formula for acne prone skin :) will purchase again

I absolutely love this moisturizing gel. I use it twice a day after washing my face and I can feel a major difference in hydration. I’ve been using it for the past few weeks and I haven’t received any acne breakouts or blemishes. I love the price and it’s been lasting me for a while now which I enjoy!
review_title: In love with effects vs. price.

review_text: I’ve tried many moisturisers in my lifetime but I always come back to this. It’s perfect for my oily and sensitive skin. Lightweight, and absorbs super fast. Has never made me breakout. The only possible issue is during the winter time or if you have slightly dry skin, you might need to add a denser moisturiser because this is so lightweight. But other than that, this is the best!

I’m not in love with this moisturizer, but I don’t hate it either. It doesn’t offer much hydration. It almost feels like a primer on the face. I use this on days where I’m feeling pretty oily, but my skin still needs hydration! My makeup goes on great over it. Probably great for really oily skins, but I’d recommend using something more hydrating at night!

I have very oily skin which tends to cause breakouts and I’ve tried many many many moisturizers for oily skin, from drugstore moisturizers to more high end brands, and I could never find anything that didn’t end up feeling too heavy on my face throughout the day, causing me to look and feel extremely greasy. Well, this moisturizer was the answer to my oily skin problems! It’s a gel which makes the product go on lighter and it keeps me oil free all day!

I was using Philosophy’s Hope in a Jar before I converted to this one. It was working in the beginning, but then I started to break out again. I switched over to the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel at a friend’s suggestion and LOVE IT. It absorbs quickly yet is so intensive! I find it extremely soothing on the skin. I use my own toner underneath this and it’s been so good on my skin. I haven’t had to use oil blotters since I switched over. There’s just something about this formula that WORKS. Smells very light, for those who are concerned about fragrances.

I recently purchased this Clinique lotion and am very happy with it. As I become older, I am allergic to more and more lotions. So it is nice to buy a lotion that work for me. The downside is that I have dry skin so I am going through the bottle quickly. I may try a heavier cream for night and leave this for daytime only.
review_title: Review for Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel

review_text: I really like this moisturizer. Since I have oily skin, I don’t need a thick moisturizer so this gel is the perfect consistency for me. It goes on light and absorbs without a lot of rubbing.

I like this! I have been using it for a few weeks and really like the consistency, texture and overall feel of the moisturizer. I just wish the full size was cheaper since I purchased the mini to give it a shot!

I have oily/combination and this really helps control my oil. I only apply it where I get oily the most then apply a different moisturizer where I don’t get oily. lightweight and smells good. Recommend this to combination and oily skin
My skin is still the same oily skin even after applying. Light weight moisturizer.

I have been using this for years, and I really like the get for my skin as part of the 3 step Clinique routine. It hydrates but doesn’t encourage breakouts; my makeup can go one directly afterwards without a primer most days (primer helps when my skin is troubled and spotty).
review_title: Great for aging skin with acne!

review_text: I don’t even have oily skin, all I know is this stuff doesn’t feel like it suffocates my skin. What I use this for is my morning moisturizer. After washing my face with the Ole Henricksen Red Tea Cleanser or the Origins Frothy Face Wash or the Korres Milk Proteins Cleanser, I douse my face in Boscia’s Balancing Tonic and then apply 2-3 pumps of this stuff all over my face and neck. It doesn’t make me look shiny, and the best part is, it sinks into my skin so fast that I’m not bothered about putting makeup on overtop. The only reason I took off a star is this: IF YOU HAVE CRACKED OR BROKEN OPEN SKIN FROM A SUNBURN OR HEAVILY DRIED SKIN DO NOT USE THIS. IT BURNED THE HECK OUT OF MY FACE WHEN I WAS SUNBURNT
review_title: I don't even have oily skin...

review_text: I love this moisturizer so much. I have been using this since my freshman year of high school and I LOVE it. I always try to branch out and try different moisturizers but I always come back to this one. I hope it never discontinues. Its amazingly lightweight and it keeps me oil free all day long.

I have to say, I was weary to try this. Years ago, I was an avid user of the Dramatically Different Moisturizer Lotion. In recent years, I felt that it over moisturized my skin, to the point where I could feel the lotion peel off. So I stopped using it and moved on to another brand.Last month, I was in the market for a new moisturizer and stumbled upon this. I remembered that at one point, I had really liked the lotion, and for this great price, I would give the gel a shot. I am SO glad I did! This gel gives just the right amount of moisture, doesn’t dry out my skin, and feels so light and smooth! A little goes a long way with this as well; two pumps and I am good to go! I especially love the pump because I hate dipping my fingers(and long nails) into my moisturizer jar every morning. I’m sure many can relate to this!If you can find this in a set with the face wash & clarifying lotion, it is the same price & includes the full size moisturizer! I highly recommend this product!!

I’ve been using this moisturizer since I was 14/15. I’ve always had problematic oily skin, and it seems like every other moisturizer I’ve tried has irritating fragrances, breaks me out, makes me oilier, etc. I’ve tried using other daytime moisturizers featuring spf, but they always make me look like an oil slick. Other nighttime moisturizers I’ve tried either irritate my skin or clog my pores-but this is perfect. It’s literally like putting nothing on your skin, except your skin is more moisturized. It’s so lightweight, it absorbs very fast, doesn’t irritate, doesn’t feel like anything on the skin at all! Perfect moisturizer for oily skin, because even those with oily skin need a moisturizer!!

Love this for using before applying makeup especially if you have oily - combo skin like myself. I found that I needed two or three pumps to get the moisture that I needed and it wasn’t great for bedtime. It did last me 4 months though which is definitely a plus in my books!
Great for sensitive skin! No break-outs or irritation. Highly recommended.
I’ve tried SO MANY moisturizers but I always come back to this one. It’s truly hydrating and has cut down on my oiliness during the day. I highly recommend this to anyone.

I LOVE IT! I use this under my make up, and also before I sleep. It works awesome with the clinique clearing gel spot treatment. My face isn’t oily at all anymore :) This is the first moisturizer I actually fell in love with.

I had purchased a bottle as a gift to a friend and decided to splurge on another for myself given the recommendation from a sales associate. At the time, I had just discovered that I had very oily skin. Absolutely adore this! The moisturizer has a refreshing effect and is not at all greasy/sticky (I use this under my day makeup). Highly recommend! Only concern is that the friend that I gifted to complains of the pump to pump out too much product.

I have been using this moisturizer for about 3 years now and still haven’t switched and probably wouldn’t for a very long time. My boyfriend uses this as well. I have also introduced it to 5-6 of my friends and it’s all a part of their daily routine now! It makes me skin feel so soft. I don’t know how I lived life before it. It’s not too oily, just perfect for my oily combo skin. And absorbs right away leaving skin feeling really natural and soft. I LOVE IT! That’s all I can say about that.I love using it before applying makeup.

This is my favorite moisturizer... Ever. I have oily/acne prone skin and this has been my go to for years and years. The only time I use another is if I get a dry patch on my face and then I’ll use the Clinique Moisture Surge gel along with this. This has no scent, is light and never greasy.
I have a very dry scaly skin and this face cream makes it feel soft and silky as soon as I apply it on. Doesn’t feel heavy, greasy, nor tacky. Feels smooth to the touch and fresh.
I have oily and acne prone skin and this stuff works wonders. It leaves your face soft with the oily feeling and controls the shine and oil all day long. Love it!
I have very oily, acne prone skin, I wanted a moisturizer that would help control my oils

This moisturizer is perfect for my oily skin. I noticed a huge difference once I started using it. It keeps my oil controlled all day (except for minor blotting later in the day) and it also helps with my acne.

i bought this because i heard amazing reviews about it from my friends. to be honest it was just average to me. i like how it was fast drying but it did not at all help with my oily skin! my skin turned oily after an hour of wearing this moisturizer alone. i’m just keeping because its very light weight and doesn’t feel tacky to me like most moisturizer i’ve tried. been using this product for a month and my skin still looks the same.

This is a decent moisturizer, I like that it has a pump and a very light fragrance. It absorbs quickly on my combination oily skin but doesn’t give me much moisture. That’s ok for the Summer but I definitely will not use this in the winter where my skin needs more moisture.

I’ve been using this product for a few weeks now and I have oily/combination skin and I an in LOVE with this. If you’re in the market for a gel moisturizer go for this one - it’s so worth it. I’ve used the Take a Deep Breath by Philosophy and like that one but I feel this Clinique one actually makes a difference and I obtain more moisture from this product without feeling greasy. A little goes a long way with this - one pump should definitely be enough for your entire face, when I pump one and a half pumps out I feel I have too much but it blends into the skin nicely. The only thing is that on some days I feel I need a little more moisture but that’s because of my combination skin - otherwise PERFECT for everything else.
review_title: Only gel moisturizer you should use

review_text: I love the fact that this moisturizer is something that I can wear without worrying about getting too greasy even in the summer! It works great for my combination skin and combines well with sunscreen (because SPF is important)
This moisturizer feels very lightweight, absorbs quickly, doesn’t leave a sticky feel and doesn’t give you a shiny face, but it does make my skin feel a little tighter. It’s perfect for summer!

This stuff has forever changed my skin. I use this in the morning after I wash my face and before I put my makeup on. The gel goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly. I can see a difference in the way my makeup applies and keeps my skin shine free, makeup or no makeup. Also this has not irritated my acne prone skin. I would highly recommend to anyone.

I had really high hope for this product.I like alot of women have dry skin and i like to wear foundation and need a good moisturizer. I thought this would be a great product. I wanted something that would moisturizer while also sinking into my skin quickly so my makeup doesnt sit on top this doesnt do that it does skin in quick and is light weight BUT it feels like gel after you put it on you can feel wear it is on your face which isnt a pleasant feeling. also it didnt moisturize very wel i found that i needed alot to really make sure it was soft and not dry and still the whole day i could feel it there under my foundation. i wanted to love this product but just couldnt i say if your in between products go with the other one. even though i love clinique this wasnt great

This may have been my best purchase yet! I started using this and noticed a difference in my skin on Day 1. It keeps my skin from being oily and hydrates it at the same time. I bought the small trail size, but will definitely be getting the whole product

I have been on the hunt for a facial moisturizer for months now, and couldn’t seem to find something that gave me everything I was looking for. I was using the Origins Gin Zing moisturizer and I liked it, but wasn’t in love with it. I decided to give the Clinique a try, and I am so happy I did! I use the Clinique Take the Day off Cleansing Balm with the Eco Tools Pure Complexion Facial Sponge to cleanse, follow that up with the Michael Todd True Organics blue green algae antibacterial toner, the Tarte Maracuja Oil, and then the Clinique Moisturizing Gel and its the perfect combination for my skin. My skin is dramatically less oily and shiny throughout the day, and I have had no breakouts. I love it!
I have sensitive/combination skin. This works great. doesn’t break me out or make me oily. Have re-purchased! follow on instagram for more beauty posts @doubletakebeauty

I have sensitive skin and this product, though not right away, made me break out. I got the 3-step care system and ended up just giving it to a friend after a couple months because my skin never neutralized again.

i’m thrilled with this purchase. i have tried dozens of products to moisturize my very oily acne-prone skin and they all left me feeling greasy. this one is perfect. i love that this absorbs very quickly. it feels really lightweight and doesn’t clog my pours.

I cannot justify why this is call a “dramatically different moisturizing gel.“ I understand the “moisturizing gel“ part but where is “dramatically different?“ At least I did not see it in my skin after using this for more than 1 year. It is just a typical gel moisturizer. I have used many other similar products that does the same thing but at a much more affordable price. My honest opinion is that this product is too overrated. Get it if you can afford it, but if you think it is a little too expensive, you are right - the result is not worth the price anyway. Another tip, this is not hydrating enough for the colder seasons.
review_title: A good gel moisturizer, nothing special

review_text: I was using the Clinique acne solutions moisturiser for years as, although I didn’t have acne, I found so many moisturisers felt heavy and sticky on my skin and it was nice and matte.I was recommended to try this though and have been happy with it. My face can be oily with the wrong moisturiser but I have found this quite light and non-greasy. My Mac makeup wears quite well over it also, I only use it as a morning moisturiser. I would recommend if you don’t have very oily skin. Huge bottle at great price too!

After years of searching for the best daytime moisturizer I’ve found this to be one of them! It’s hard to find a moisturizer for combination skin that simultaneously controls oil without drying you out/making your face feel tight. My favorite is Arbonne’s FC5 only because it has some SPF as well. If this had some SPF it’d be perfect!

Bible must buy. My skin is so oily I can fry an egg on my forehead in the summer. I wash face, use this moisturizer, primer/or no primer, foundation, and wont be a grease ball all day. I will tho get some what shiny, but NOTHING like before using this product.
review_title: Must buy who have oily skin!!!

review_text: This moisturizer is super light weight great for oily skin which I have myself. My skin is also very sensitive and acne prone. This moisturizing gel is great for day time under my foundation. It does moisturize but nothing extremely deep so at night I use a much heavier cream but this is great for day time !

This moisturizer is super light weight and absorbs quickly. I can use it all the time, and love the light smell of clean. It just feels really great on your face and I highly recommend it. I have normal skin, not prone to oil or breakouts, but i occasionally get dry spots on my nose and chin. This helps keep my skin looking smooth and radiant!

I have sensitive, acne prone, combination skin, and have to say this works very well. Makes your skin incredibly soft, a nice, light, daily moisturizer. I’ll need something that includes antiaging, so I’m not sure that i’ll repurchase this specific item, but maybe one in the line that is meant for fine lines and wrinkles. Definitely recommend as a summer moisturizer!

I HATED the texture of this product. I’ve read so many great reviews about this moisturizer for oily skin and thought it would be a great daily lightweight solution. Wrong! It’s so runny and feels very disgusting. I like thicker moisturizers that absorb into my skin and this just feels like it’s left sitting on the top ready to slide off. Gross!
review_title: One of the worst moisturizers I've ever tried

review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have used it for years and it is a great basic moisturizer for combo/oily skin! My skin has recently changed and is leaning more to the normal/dry side, but, I am still scared of putting anything too heavy on it. This soaks in quickly, and doesn’t have any kind of offensive smell. I also love that it isn’t too heavy.
Love this product!!! My skin is very tempted for breakouts, however this cream is amazing. Very light, nice texture, great for under the make up base. Will rebuy!

This was ok I guess, Nothing special in any way.Lightweight but did cause me to break out.I have oily skin and I would prefer a texture like this but this did nothing for my skin. It has no benefits other than being lightweight so its really useless unless all you want to do is moisturize.If I am going to use something daily I want some type of result. At least have sunscreen.If this was a sunscreen then I could see purchasing this but until then you can spend your money on products that will have better benefits for you skin including moisturizing.

I’ve been looking for a gel formula for away. This is the first gel moisturizer I have tried. It suits my skin because I have oily/combination skin. The product is lightweight and absorbs quickly so it doesn’t leave an oily feeling on my skin.
I always come back to this moisturizer - it’s absolutely the best. Absorbs entirely, no residue, no oil, it’s just great.
I love this - it’s moisturizing without being greasy

I like that the stuff is light weight and doesn’t feel sticky at all, but it didn’t give my skin (oily skin) enough moisture and dried me out during the day. In the end it caused me to break out some. In my opinion it’s okay, but not gonna repurchase it.
I love the 3 step system and I love this moisturizing gel! It is perfect for my very oily skin. Purchased the smaller tube and then went back for the bigger bottle.

I have an oily t-zone. I made the mistake of using the “lotion “ instead of the “gel“. I thought the shiny t-zone was inevitable. However when I finally tried a sample of the gel formula I was amazed. Sinks right into the skin and absorbs oil throughout the entire day. It’s a great basic moisturizer for oily skin.
I use this on my t zone area and it doesn’t feel heavy and it doesn’t leave an oily residue like other facial creams.

I received a sample of Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel and became hooked. I had read several complaints regarding the new formula but in all honestly I feel in love. Never trying this product before I was more than happy to try the sample that I was provided with. I give this product a 5 star for it’s lightweight, non-greasy texture and formula as well as it being fragrance free.
review_title: Light weight and great for my oily skin!

review_text: I bought the smaller tube in hopes of finding a long lasting moisturizer for my extremely oily skin. This product did not disappoint. After washing my face, I apply this moisturizer before my make up and my foundation does not slide off my face anymore. It is very inexpensive and worth it IF you have oily skin. I don’t think it is moisturing enough for dry skin. No harsh smell, and your skin feels nice and firm after first use.

This lotion goes on so smoothly. I put it on top of my tarte oil for more moisture. I have noticed that the texture of my skin has improved. Now I can go out without make up on when I want because I’m not as blotchy in color or in texture anymore!

I tried this moisturizing gel at Sephora and LOVED IT. I have sensitive, oily skin and was afraid that it will cause more oiliness, and breakouts but it didn’t. It’s perfect for all seasons. It’s not heavy and absorbs fast. I recommend this to everyone. I’m on my third 4.2 FL. OZ. Five stars!
I have never loved a moisturizer so much before, it has always worked perfect for me. I have combination skin

I have extreme combo skin (really dry cheeks, really oily t-zone) and this moisturizer is perfect. Wonderful light smell, absorbs quickly, and doesn’t leave me greasy. I add a small pump to my foundation (on a beauty blender) and it makes my foundation glide on perfectly.

In all the years that this has been around I can’t believe that I have never tried it. I have horrible skin. Oily/combo skin, acne prone, sensitive, and uneven. I have tried many moisturizers from high end to drug store, and I never could find one that worked for me and didn’t break me out or cause me to look like an oil slick before 12pm. I saw some YouTubers mention it and I picked it up while in line at sephora (the small bottle, they always get you at the check out lol). And I fell in love. I really recommend this to those who have oily acne prone skin!
I’ve had trouble finding the perfect moisturizer for years and this one has now taken my top spot. It feels lightweight and clean on my face, with a nice neutral smell.

I have extremely sensitive skin. EVERYTHING makes me breakout. I was using a basic Neutrogena moisturizer, but was starting to get frustrated with constant breakouts, when someone told me about this moisturizer. I purchased the smaller squeeze bottle to try it out, and all I can say is WOW!!! what an improvement in my overall skin texture, im less oily, and when I do have a breakout, it seems like they are healing quicker. I will purchase the bigger pump version now!
Love it! Always a great “go to“ moisturizer!
