Pretty much what the title says; this gel goes on and absorbs quickly without leaving me feeling dry. My skin is normal type, but I like using this better than the DDML+. There’s a smell that the DDML+ doesn’t have, but I can’t place my finger on what it is. It’s not unpleasant, but I just wonder what it is since Clinique claims to be fragrance-free.

I have oily/combination and acne-prone skin, and this moisturizer is absolutely perfect! Ever since I started using this product, my skin has gotten less oily. The gel texture feels great and my skin soaks it all up. This product really gives great moisture and hydration. One thing I should probably note is that the areas around my mouth and nose get pretty dry during the winter and this moisturizer is not very effective for me during the winter season.

This is the second best moisturizer I’ve ever used. I have combination to oil skin. This helps to restore a balance on my face. It’s light weight but it gives a fine moisturizing effect and never feels too thick. I would continue useing it.

Before I found this moisturizer a couple of years ago I considered myself a serial moisturizer user. I would go from different brand to different brand because I never found one I liked enough to stick with. Then I was recommended Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel and fell in love. It works so well with my very sensitive, combination skin! It soaks in right away and isn’t oily AT ALL. The gel consistency always feels amazing and refreshing. And it doesn’t have a funky scent. Seriously, I have found a winner with this one!
review_title: I'll never use another moisturizer again.

review_text: Having very dry, sensitive skin, this is the ONLY moisturizer I use! It has no scent, a little goes a long way, and it works amazingly. Definitely buying this for life!
I have very dry skin on my hands. This is the only moisturizer that helps. Love it!
Although I found this moisturizer to be a bit pricey, I loved it!! The moisturizing GEL is great for oily skin and gives a great fresh feeling to my skin.

Been trying this out for the past month or so and I love it. I use it day and night and it helps keep my dry-combination skin matte. Sometimes I do use a bit more than usual because I feel like it does dry my face out a bit, so I just add a little more and it works. If you have oily or combo skin it’s a must, but if you have dry/combo skin you might need a little bit more.

i got this as a sample , i was debating on trying it because every moisturizer seems too oily for my already oily skin.Luckily i ended up trying it out... omg!!! made my skin so smooth and soft!all day i had matte skin plus it helped me clear out my skin a bit ... now almost running out... will purchase full size!!! love it ... not discontinue!!!
Very good. I love it
i have oily/combo skin so most moisturizers make me feel even more oily, except this one! its a gel-like formula and absorbs into your skin very quickly. a little goes a long way.
I buy this for my husband, it’s the only moisturizer he will use. Very lightweight and no perfume smell, he loves it.
This is a great product, it always makes my skin feel very refreshed, clean, and protected!

Perfect lightweight daily moisturizer for oily skin. I use this daily. So light, but perfectly moisturizing without leaving my skin greasy. I love this stuff. It’s so consistent and doesn’t break me out.
Clinique well done!! The only moisturizer I will use. What I love about it? - everything. So it better not be discontinued... or else...

I bought this because I was looking for a new moisturizing product specifically without SPF. I didn’t think I would like this but I do. It says fragrance free but still smells great and leaves my skin feeling so smooth. Because of my skin type I only need the tiniest amounts. It’s not the most hydrating product I have ever used but it fits my individual needs.
I’ve been using this moisturizer for months now and I LOVE IT, i’ve repurchased this product twice now and I use it everyday after my morning cleanser.

I have oily skin that still requires moisturizer. This is the first moisturizer I’ve used that hasn’t resulted in an oil slick on my face by the middle of the workday. It goes on light, absorbs immediately, and doesn’t feel gloppy or thick. Also, just a little bit goes a long way. Love it!

I’ve been looking for awhile for a moisturizer I’m really excited about -- one that doesn’t just do its job, but one I enjoy using and feels really good. This one does just that! It’s unique formulation causes my skin to feel hydrated and glowy, but it absorbs extra oil -- perfect for spring and summer! I love the smell, consistency, and the fact that a little goes a long way! I’ll definitely be purchasing this again (in the big size) and try more Clinique products in the future.

I was introduced to this product about 2 years ago and after i finished the product I was talked into trying other products but I’m back. No other moisturizer has made my skin feel so fresh, helping me prep my skin for my makeup routine. I have combination skin and before this product I would try moisturizer after moisturizer and it would either make my skin more oily or extremely dry. This one is perfect. It’s consistency, price, and results made me come back and never leaving it again.
I have normal/dry skin this is amazing! I like it , it absorbs really quick light weight but do the job.

I had to return another moisturizer after it gave me a huge allergic reaction on my face, so coming back I was a little worried about having another reaction. But, so far so good! This is probably the best moisturizer/face gel I’ve ever had, by far! I feel like it evens out my oily T zone with the rest of my face, leaving both hydrated but not oily at all. I put it on right before putting on my bb cream, and it absorbs so quickly that it doesn’t mess with my coverage. I use it both day and night (a nice big bottle size means I don’t feel bad about using it twice a day), and I haven’t had any breakouts or reactions so far!

I originally tried the lotion, but it was so greasy, I just couldn’t take it for everyday use. This is amazing!! I have normal/dry skin, and this is perfect. It’s lightweight enough to be worn under BB cream, but moisturizing enough to use every day on its own. Love it!!!
This is such a nice, light moisturizer for my oily skin. It feels weightless and gets the job done with only a small amount. It’s been a longtime favorite of mine.

I can get really oily in my T-zone and I have struggled with finding a product that doesn’t make my forehead shine by mid-way in the day even with using primer and a good foundation. Problem solved with this lightweight gel formula. I use for day and night and it never clogs my pours or makes me left feeling dry
review_title: Ideal for Oily to Combination Skin

review_text: This is a great product it goes on easy and it leaves your face smooth and soft I wish they would come out with a mask I am looking for a good mask.
I’ve been using this lotion for about 6 years, I have a veryyyy oily t-zone and my skin is also sensitive, this lotion is my holy grail, I will never use anything else.
My skin seems to like this product. It didn’t broke me out since I have a acne-prone/sensitive skin. It’s moisturizing for my skin type. It’s non greasy and refreshing.

I have very oily skin and was hoping that this would work and not dry me out, but unfortunately it did dry me out. It’s not moisturizing enough for me. It does help alittle when I’m at a humid place but I still get oily pretty quick.
The oily moisturize i have, however i cant used daily because it cause me breakouts. The person said is good for combination oily/ prone but i dont think so... For winter is a most have

This a real nice moisturizer. I have been using it for a month or so now and like the light weight non-greasiness of it. My make-up seems to hold better and it soaks right into your skin with no greasy feel. I will buy this again
This is the most amazing moisturizer....it leaves you matte and it’s perfect for summer....A little goes a long way def a must have!!

I was somewhat hesitant to switch from the dramatically different lotion to the gel but my face gets a little more oily as the weather warms up. However, I love this product! It’s great under my makeup and dries up the oil without making me too dry or tight! So smooth and absorbs quickly. LOVE IT.

I’ve been using this product every other morning for about a month now. My skin is very combination dry in some areas and definitely oily in others.I do like this product because it doesn’t make my skin sticky and because it has little to no fragrance, it is just clean. It works great on the parts of my skin that are just semi-dry and the ultra dry places. The parts that are oily have had no change in appearance though. It just isn’t the perfect one for my combination skin.
Feels so refreshing on my skin. It moisturizes without leaving my skin feeling oily.

I always come back to Clinique. This is my holy grail moisturizer. I have oily skin, and this is the only moisturizing lotion that I’ve found that does not make my skin greasy. It’s lightweight and it doesn’t interfere with my makeup. And a little goes a long way. Love this stuff.

I’ve been using this for 5 years and I love it! I wish I could have found it sooner because my face was too oily for most face lotions, but this absorbs so well without making my face feel greasy. GREAT product.
Great product. Absorbs well. Non-greasy. Doesn’t break out my skin. Very little smell-- and what is there is inoffensive.
I love this product so much. I have been using this product for almost 5 years and it doesn’t make my face oily even though I have an oily based skin. It absorbs quickly and feels refreshing too.
simply great. Have bought this a second time without regrets. Has become a staple of my morning routine before applying make-up. I use three pumps and spread on my face and down my neck.

I love to try out new beauty products. I have tried other moisturizers, but always come back to this. I have oily, sensitive skin and have been using this since the gel formula came out. It leaves my skin moisturized, but without an oil slick. I use sun screen daily, and this does well under Clinique and Shiseido and a the few drug store brands I’ve tried. Love this stuff!
I like it so far, it absorbs really quickly and doesn’t feel heavy at all. If you want to have extra moisture, just add more. I have been enjoying this lately.

I have sensitive skin that tends to dry out, and I was hoping this would work well for me. It did not irritate my skin at all. However, it went on very heavy and greasy-looking and was very shiny. It also didn’t retain the moisture in my skin overnight. I wanted to like this but it just didn’t work for me. I sent it back.

The moisturizer feels nice and very lightweight. Absorbs quickly and leaves no sticky residue. For best results, I suggest exfoliating first. Warning: If you exfoliate too hard, the moisturizer WILL sting for about 5 seconds.I use this under my primer to make sure my make-up goes on smoothly and isn’t clinging to any dry skin flakes. I have extremely sensitive skin that breaks out very easily. I need to change my pillow cases every 2 days and try my hardest to never touch my face with my hands because it is just that sensitive to bacteria and pimples. However, this moisturizer has yet to break me out and I use it about 5 times a week.It CAN make you a bit shiny (but not greasy), so I don’t suggest using it by itself to go out in public. Great for bedtime routine or using under makeup ONLY.If you are looking for a nice mild moisturizer for your sensitive skin this is it. It is not EXTREMELYYY moisturizing so if you have some chronic dry skin, you may need something stronger.

I’ve tried so many moisturizers and this one is definitely my favorite! It doesn’t leave your face feeling oily or greasy and almost acts like a primer to my makeup. I have sensitive skin and it didn’t make me break out. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new moisturizer!

I tried this after a long time thinking on getting a new skin routine, is an ok product, the consistency is nice and absorbs quick by the skin, it has a mate finish, but if you have dry areas of your skin it would do nothing to help, is good if you have oily skin since it controls the oil but definile not for oily/dry combo skin. Returning this!

I’ve been using the Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel for...about 4 years now? It is great for normal - combination skin like mine. When I have really dry patches, I need to use something a little stronger, but this is what I use on a daily basis. Works well and feels great (light, not oily, absorbs quickly) I’m really happy to see a new, bigger size and will be purchasing this in the future

Absorbs really quickly, very moisturizing without being greasy. I have combination skin so I need to use something else on my cheeks thats a bit heavier than this (this alone leaves it dry) but I would recommend this moisturizer any day. Good value for price too!

This is great for people with mildly dry skin. If you have super dry skin, you’re better going with the Lotion, as that’s a thicker and more moisturising formula than the Gel.This product is lightweight, non-oily and non-greasy. It makes my skin very soft and supple in order to begin my morning makeup routine.I’ve been using this for over 6 years now and I’ve never strayed away. Love it!
This didn’t provide anywhere near enough hydration for my combination normal to oily skin. After applying it I just felt like I needed something more. This just didn’t cut it for me.
Not greasy, sticky, or oily. I love this product!

I have only used this moisturizer a handful a times and usually under make-up. It works well and doesn’t clump up with my foundation like other moisturizers! Super easy to apply, not greasy, and excited to use it alone to see how it performs.

I was looking for a new moisturizer product for my summer time face as I get combination/oily during that time of year. Found this and I love!I use this in the morning and before bed. I usually wake up in the morning with an greasy oily face, but I don’t anymore! Lasts throughout the day and is Super fast absorbing which is really important to me.I don’t really get the gel aspect though. It isn’t your typical gel feeling, just feels and looks like a lotion. But that’s no big deal, just an observation.

I absolutely ADORE this moisturizer. This is actually my FIRST EVER moisturizer and i think this is Holy Grail worthy. It is so light and weightless and i can already feel the difference in my skin after just a few minutes! I thought it was going to be oily when i first put it on, but once i started priding it on, i couldn’t even feel it. This is ABSOLUTELY perfect if you have oily skin or acne. I usually never write reviews but i just had to because i had to tell everyone about this amazing product.

This makes my skin feel so much softer without feeling greasy or heavy, it helps keep it moisturized without feeling oily. And at first I thought it would give me an allergic reaction so to be safe I put it on the lower end of my cheek. It didn’t burn, it didn’t turn red or anything after an hour. So then I put it on the rest of my face and my skin has never felt better.

I love this moisturizer. It is so lightweight and feels amazing on the skin after using my other 3step steps. I use other moisturizers on top to add hydration, sunscreen, and anti aging but the ddmg is a great base for the other steps in my regimen!! This will always be in my skincare routine.

I have oily, acne prone skin with random dryness, but have always steered clear of daily moisturizers because they just seemed to weigh my skin down and make it even more oily. This gel is absolutely the perfect balance. I use it in the morning and at night. It soaks in so quick and works fabulously under makeup. I swear the overall texture of my skin has improved. I can’t live without it now!
Definitely a great moisturizer for spring and summer. Leave your skin smooth and oil-free.

Never really knew how to take care of my skin. This is one of the first skincare I bought. I love this product, it is in a gel form so it gets absorb into my skin really fast and doesn’t feel heavy or make me break out. I would say this moisturizer is great of the spring and summer, basically the warm weather for me since it is night and light. As for the colder weather, it isn’t moisturizing enough but I still put it on then if nesscary then I would just put another moisturizer on top of this one. I went thru a few bottles already and when Sephora does the VIB promo, I stock up because this product is an essential item for me.
Awesome hydrating gel. I have combination skin and this product is good for hydrating and doesn’t make me break out. It is a great product. Love Clinique!
This is great. I have sworn by it for years. I use Retin-A and pair it with this to help cancel out the drying effect the Retin-A has. My skin is terribly oily but this levels it out.
review_title: My one and only face lotion at night

review_text: 个人觉得这瓶lotion是clinique出的最好的商品，很适合混合偏油性的肌肤，特别喜欢喜欢搽上去时候有种冰冰凉凉的感觉~ 是清爽的润肤，不会油腻腻的感觉~ clinique 加油~
I have the oily skin and this one is a perfect fit! hydrate my face but not too intensive or sticky. Love it!

i would say this product is basically ok, but you will feel dry if you use the gel one without serum, what I suggest for people who want to buy it is use the gel one with the serum and pick the lotion one without the serum....

I’ve been using the lotion version for years and it’s been perfect for my sensitive skin/scent allergies. I wanted to try the gel because I felt like my skin would be more oily during the upcoming spring/summer months. I was really shocked when I first used the gel because of it’s very clear scent, smelling like lemon-alcohol. The Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion smells completely different, almost scentless which is what I need. Other than the inconsistency in scent, the gel is refreshing and very light.
review_title: From the moisturizing lotion to gel

review_text: I have combination-oily skin, and find this product not very moisturizing. I like how light and fast-absorbing it is, but in the drier seasons of winter and spring, I can feel my skin drying up very fast. I’m keeping it to use during hotter summer months, but this product definitely doesn’t live up to the hype.

I have combination skin so I’m oily in my T Zone area and I have acne prone skin. This moisturizer is one of the best ones I have tried. I like that it is a gel so it goes on smooth and my skin takes it in immediately. I don’t feel it sitting on top of my skin and it does not make me look or feel greasy!! I will continue to use this moisturizer because it works and it doesn’t cause me any skin problems!!! The price is pretty good too!!

I was hesitant about using gel as a moisturizer, but it works better than any facial lotion I’ve ever tried. It absorbs very quickly, doesn’t leave any shine and hydrates my skin incredibly well. My skin feels very soft for a while after I use it. I purchased the small bottle to try it out but will be upgrading soon. Another great thing is that a little goes a long way, so it lasts a while.

This moisturizer is the only one I’ve found that does not make my skin turn bright red. I cannot recommend this enough for sensitive skin. I mix it with a bit of neem oil and it still absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave my face shiny.
I have Combination oily skin and live in a very dry climate and this product doesn’t moisturize well enough.
This gel absorbs quickly and is lightweight enough to be used under sunscreen or makeup. No grease or caking. Perfect for oily skin that can’t handle Clinique’s other moisturizer.

I have pretty oily, acne prone skin. Of course, the key to treating oily skin is to avoid stripping it of it’s natural oils. I have trouble finding a balance between moisturizers that moisturize nicely without being thick and greasy. This moisturize is perfect! It soaks into my skin well and feels so light weight. Love love love.

I bought Clinique’s Moisturizing Gel as a Christmas present for myself. I bought it instead of Clinique’s Moisturizing Lotion because other reviewers recommended girls with oily skin use the Gel. I am so happy I listened to them! This lightweight formula absorbs into your skin in a matter of seconds without any residue. Perfect for a girl with combination/oily skin!

This moisturizer is the best! I bought it because I was ready to start purchasing high end skin care items after not finding the results I wanted with purchasing drugstore. This product leaves my skin soft and smooth while not making me break out or oily. It’s perfect

Yes it’s a fair amount of money. But even the 4.2 oz has loads of product. The actual moisturizer is amazing. Definitely worth the purchase. It is light, absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and so baby bottom soft. I have

Amazing product!! I was looking for a good moisturizer for oily to combination skin and I kept hearing good reviews about this. Definitely measured up to its reviews. I use it morning and night and my skin is amazingly soft just in one week. Highly recommend this for people with oily skin. Does not break you out and doesn’t feel heavy or greasy. LOOOOVE it!!!
Gives enough hydration, but not even a little bit oily, definitely works for my oily- acne skin

after trying so many other moisturizers, promising to lift, restore, rejuvenate and eradicate fine lines, I have returned to my fiirst love, Cliniques Dramatically Different ....my face is so happy! The gel formula glides on so smoothly, a little goes a long way...no more falling for all the hype! This is the only moisturizer I will ever use! I love you, Clinique. xxx
I use it on my whole head and it has made a big difference in skin softness and suppleness.

This moisturizing gel is lightweight and absorbs very quickly; however after 1 month of use, I haven’t been able to notice any dramatic differences in my skin and it lacks any added sunscreen. It moisturizes well enough, but I will likely search for something different when this bottle runs out.

I have dry skin, but during the spring and summer that tends to change a bit. Bought this to try it out since it has amazing reviews. Didn’t moisturize my skin at all, it actually felt even more dry after I used it. Also not a fan of the smell.
review_title: Not for skin on the dryer side!

review_text: I received a generous trial size of this product a little while ago, and after much experimenting I figured out how best to use it. By itself this gel is very sticky and I felt like I had smeared my face with Elmer’s Glue when I used it by itself. However, when I add some to my usual Origins Plantscriptions night cream I get a great moisturizing mask that stays on all night, doesn’t rub off on my pillows if I should toss and turn, and leaves me with soft skin in the morning. So by itself not great, but as an additive it gets high marks!
review_title: Add to your evening moisturizing routine!

review_text: I think this product is ok my skin didn’t feel different or look any different... It made my oily skin very drying to the point where it was flaky

Drys quickly and is absorbed into the skin well, though I don’t use as much as the lady in the store told me to. I use this with Clinique’s facial wash and toner from the acne solutions collection when my skin is too dry to use the all over treatment cream. I have noticed that my skin is far less oily and I haven’t had any major breakouts. This s*** works.
Only moisturizer that doesn’t cause me to break out.

I have a tough time finding moisturizers for my skin. Most products break me out. As someone with cystic acne, it kinda sucks. The regular Dramatically Different lotion is a bit too heavy for my skin but the gel is great! It’s not too heavy and it doesn’t break me. I use keep a tube in my car for when I forget my moisturizer in the morning or need an extra dose. Mixes great with liquid foundation for sheer coverage.
review_title: Gentle on oily, acne prone skin

review_text: I really love this. It’s light weight, doesn’t clog my pores, and gets the job done. I only gave it 4 stars because it’s not quite enough during the rough winter months. Overall it’s a good product and worth the money. Lasts forever so you’re not wasting money buying it every month.
This moisturizer is best for those with oily skin because it absorbs quickly into the skin.

This moisturizer is the best I’ve ever had! My skin is oily, and a lot of the moisturizers I’ve tried just sit on top of my skin and don’t absorb all the way. I want my skin to feel moisturized, not greasy. This product does just that! Absorbs easily and makes my skin feel soft and nice. No tackiness or greasy shine! Definitely try it if you have oily skin!

I really liked the sample I received so I both the full sized version. I wasn’t really wowed with the results I can combination / oily skin and it did leave my skin oily by 12 noon. Wont be re-ordering.

Fabulous moisturizer it absorbs the oil on your skin keep your face hydrated at all times... I have very oily skin so this gel works great with my skin... Now I don’t have to keep patting my face every hour
I LOVE this moisturizer. It is really light and the consistency feels great. I have combination/oily skin and this is my go-to brand and moisturizer.
I bought it for my mother who is in her mid-50’s. Clinique seems to be the only brand her skin isn’t sensitive to. It’s very gentle and mild on her skin and she loves it.

I love this lotion. I try others but always return to this lotion. It feels good on the skin no clogging very light weight. and when I rub it into my face sometime it gets on my lips. Other lotions taste toxic but this one doesn’t. It’s a great price for the amount as well

I’ve always loved using Clinique products. I recently bought some more of this moisturizer because I stopped using it for awhile. This moisturizer is smooth, lightweight and absorbs into the skin quickly. It leaves your face soft!
It felt very nice going on, but it did not moisturize at all. My skin felt and looked visibly tight, dry, and flaky. I wanted to like it, but I was very disappointed.
guys please take the time and scan through the ingredients in this product. there is no benefits for the skin despite it temporarily feeling great while you use it.

This is sooo much better than the Clinique Dramatically Different Lotion Plus. Fast absorbing, non-sticky! I have been using this for two months, and it has not irritated my skin. Just a very basic moisturizer. I don’t feel like it does anything to protect or clear dark spots. But otherwise a very good simple lotion.Con: If you are very sensitive to scents, this one has a slight chemical smell. There is no additive fragrance. The chemical smell does go away after about 5 minutes. I also wish this had some SPF.

I was gifted a sample of this moisturizer from Sephora to review and I have to say that I’m totally in love! My skin can generally be described by the phrase “hot mess“ as it is naturally oily and acne prone, but has become simultaneously flaky and dry from acne treatment products and harsh New England winter weather. This moisturizer was able to provide some much needed nourishment to my skin without being heavy or greasy. I’ve noticed that my skin stays soft but also matte throughout most of the day, which is not so easy to accomplish! The only downside to daytime use of this product is that it doesn’t contain any sun protection, so I have to make sure that if I’m applying this lotion in the morning that I’m using a BB cream or foundation with SPF.
review_title: Awesome moisturizer for oily/acne prone skin

review_text: The lotion itself is great, it’s lightweight and absorbs quickly, and you only need a little to cover your whole face. I really like the texture of it too, and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling overly greasy after use.However, the pump on the bottle is incredibly short! And since there’s no spout and it’s literally just a small hole with maybe 2 mm of tube sticking out, it can be really hard to pump out the product without it dribbling down the side into the creases of the pump. There’s no room to put your finger/hand to catch the lotion because of how short the pump is; when you press it, the lotion comes out just above the crease at the ridge on base of the pump! So it always always gets in there. I find I have to press the pump REALLY FAST to shoot the product out into my hand to avoid making a mess or wasting product.A simple solution would just be a longer pump, or a longer spout. The product is great, but this design flaw really frustrates me.
I have extremely oily skin and this gel does the job. I’m not completely floored, but it works better than most others I’ve tried. Doesn’t create more shine to your face which is a huge plus.

I tried this product for a week. I am usually pleased with Clinique, but this product felt like it did not soak into my skin. It felt really heavy and thick. It also caused my face to breakout after using it for a few days. I went back to my old moisturizer and my face cleared up.

Completely dissatisfied with this product. Actually deserves 0 stars, but this lotion is marketed for oily, combination, acne prone skin but I bought this (even though I have dry skin) because youtubers who have the same skin type as me raved about this lotion. DID NOT MOISTURIZE WHATSOEVER. It was like putting on something and nothing happened AT ALL. Clinique wth man you failed on this one. I must insist that even if the oily skinned people out there this is NOT moisturizing! I tried it on my friend’s skin and it was just bad. :(
This is my favorite moisturizer hands down! I have oily skin and I use this twice a day. Its light weight and doesn’t leave skin feeling heavy, great for my oily skin!
I’ve been using Clinique’s Dramatically different moisturizing gel for years. It’s the first step in my morning makeup routine. I’ll never be without it.

I have been using Clinique since I was 16 and this has been my moisturizer for the past seven years. Every once in a while I try branching out from the brand, but I keep coming back. I am frequently complimented on my complexion and I always recommend Clinique.Having skin on the oilier side of combination, the gel formula is the best part of this. Cream-based moisturizers always end up being too thick and end up clogging my skin if I do not over-exfoliate. The gel works wonderfully at hydrating my skin while not adding unnecessary oil and shine. The texture of my skin is so smooth and has a very healthy glow, not oily shine as I have found with thicker moisturizers.The only thing I would change about this product is adding SPF so I could take one less step out of my routine, but other than that it’s perfect! If you are looking for a new staple in your skin care routine, add this product! I cannot recommend it enough. Don’t forget the broad-spectrum SPF and drink lots of water!

I’ve been loyal to this moisturizer gel since I was in middle school... And now I’m a sophomore in college. I have combo oily and dry skin...this moisturizer is the most refreshing thing to ever put on my face. It absorbs within seconds and feels as if you’ve applied nothing, but it makes your skin noticeably smoother and less oily!!! Love love

My mother had one of these on her vanity and as a teenager I would always use a pump or two during the winter time for those pesky dry spots (i.e. middle of the forehead, sides of the nose, etc.) after cleansing. Its been my go-to moisturizer for more than a decade! I use it day and night religiously. However, what is keeping it from a full 5 star review is that it is unable to keep those dry spots at bay, I feel as if it masks the dry spots more than it treats them. However, it gets the job done and I can’t complain when it controls my oily skin and hides those dry spots so well.

I have combination skin but you wouldn’t notice with this moisturiser. For the whole day my make-up stays put and my skin stays shine free. My skin is just as hydrated as ever. I definitely recommend this product!
Perfect lotion for oily and combination skin

The lotion itself is good, very lightweight. I thought it was perfect at first. Buuut then I started seeing sparkles all over my face. I held it up to the light (my face) and saw more. Then I washed my hands, put a dallop of lotion on my finger and held it under several different lights. Sparkles. The glitter really annoys me. The quest for sparkle-free lotion is still in progress. :[

I used the Clinique moisturizer often when I was younger and was so glad when they came out with the gel. I was skeptical at first, but it really does help with oily skin. This is a fabulous moisturizer! With that said, I’m in my late 30s now and think my skin is needing something a little more potent. But for you younger women, you’ll love it! Buy the tube though. The pump doesn’t reach to the bottom of the other and you end up not being able to access about a fifth of the product you paid for.

I have always been a big advocate of the Clinique moisturizer, but didn’t like how greasy it left my skin feeling. I have very sensitive skin so I’ve always just stuck with it because it works and only used it at night because of the greasy feeling. This gel formula completely solves that problem and is just as hydrating for your skin. It feels really smooth and I love the texture -- I’m especially looking forward to using it in the summer months

I use this in combination with the 3 Step Acne Solutions. I use this in the morning and use Acne Solutions Clearing Moisturizer Oil Free before bed. The Gel is amazing. Absorbs quickly, refreshing, non-greasy, and does not break me out. I find this helps balance my skin’s moisture levels causing me to break out less. I found using the Acne Solutions line caused some dryness on my cheeks, this helps fix the problem wonderfully!

I have tried many moisturizers and this is my favorite one I have tried so far. This moisturizer is perfect for combination to oily skin, it’s lightweight but still moisturizes well even in the winter months.

I have oily skin and received this sample after a purchase. I love it!!! I break out easily and this product has worked great giving me no break outs. Goes on smooth without residue. Lightly scented. I use it as a night moisturizer.

I am a fan of the original formula and wanted something to layer under make-up, but this was not the product for that. It also does not work well with serums or other oils/products. Not great for layering anything with.

A little of this gel goes a long way. 200ml will last a long time and, compared to other face creams, Clinique’s option is relatively inexpensive. In hot, humid summer, this may be all the skin needs. However, in the winter, its moisturizing power is lacking -people with combination skin with dry areas on the cheeks will notice. Additionally, it actually does not help with the oiliness of my skin and, paradoxically, using a more moisturizing cream or mixing the gel with a cream helped with excess oil. There is a unique factor to this product which, despite the above problem, makes this gel unique. It smooths out the skin. Right after applying the gel the skin is smoother, which is why I continue to use it alongside other creams.Whether to purchase this gel depends on the person’s needs and skin. For me, it did not combat the oiliness of the T-zone and seemed to make it worse, though the smoothing properties of the gel are something to think about. Nevertheless, with regular exfoliation and other tools like Clarisonic, skin will be smooth without the Moisturizing Gel. I will not be purchasing it again.
This is great it doesn’t leave your skin feeling oily its light and it keeps you moisturized all day

I have extremely oily skin and this works great as a daily moisturizer, not too heavy not too light. The only thing I will say is that during the winter (esp this winter being so cold an hard on my skin) I’ve been using a slightly heavier cream at night because I use an acne wash and that can cause extra dry patches.

I have always had acne and oily skin. As I have aged my skin has dried out but somehow the zits and oil slicks have survived the now desert habitat. I knew it was time to follow the wise advice that you must moisturize acne/oily skin to bring it into balance. I have tried several products from drug stores, department stores, and home demos and this is the only one I have ever repurchased.

I have combination skin and I used to use the lotion version but I didn’t like the new formula (it left my skin super greasy, heavy and prone to breakouts). I’m very glad I gave the gel a chance. I’ve only been using it for about a week and I’ve noticed my skin is no longer oily and the redness I used to have is now gone. The only down side is it isn’t moisturizing around my cheekbones so I have to use a little more there. Otherwise it’s a great product.

This is honestly my holy grail moisturizer. I cannot stress enough how wonderful this is for my skin. My skin feels like it just absorbs it all so well and feels so hydrated after this. The gel is perfect if you have oily or combo skin. GO GET YOU SOME!

This is my absolute favorite moisturizer! I have oily, acne-prone skin that occasionally gets dry in places (primarily my nose). This moisturizer seems to keep my skin from getting excessively oily, and it’s so lightweight. I definitely recommend this for oily skin.

I have extremely oily skin and this stuff works wonders to moisturize my few dry patches without making the rest of my face oily. It’s very lightweight and is the perfect summer moisturizer. It makes my skin so soft after I apply it and I swear my pores have become smaller too! I will definitely repurchase when I run out.
I love it because it leaves my skin feeling very smooth without leaving an oily residue.

As everyone has highlighted already, it absorbs quickly and it’s lightweight. However, it’s not as moisturizing as I’d like for the winter months, even though I have combination skin. I think it’d be great for summer but, if you have an oily T-Zone but dry cheeks/patches, I’d probably recommend the lotion for the winter.

I use this product daily even when I’m not going to be wearing makeup. It truly hydrates my skin, a very small amount goes a long way and my face will feel silky smooth all day without a shiny, oily appearance. I used to use the Clinique Moisturizing Lotion but eventually found the gel to be better for my face/skin type. Forgetting to apply this before face makeup is such a bummer because I know my makeup will not stay on as long as if I had applied it. My boyfriend has even been using it during these cold winter months to help correct his dry skin.
review_title: Smooth and Silky without being oily

review_text: i have oily/sensitive skin so i have to be careful which creams and soaps to buy. i needed a gel that keeps my skin hydrated but not to the point where it gets oily and clog my pours and this gel is really lightweight and did not make me breakout. it feels like i have nothing on. it keeps my skin moisturized without giving me any rashes. my skin feels fresh and clean and it is not heavy as other lotions or creams. it’s my favourite product. trust me i’ve tried every product out there and nothing worked. i finally found the product that will keep my face clear and moisturized! buy it!
Made my skin where I applied the lotion lumpy and more dry after just one use. Disappointed, but seems like this lotion is not for me.

I love this moisturizer. My skin has started to feel so soft since I’ve been using it. I do wish that I had bought the lotion instead of the gel to feel a little bit more initial moisture, but I think once the skin has absorbed the product you’d feel the same.

One of the sephora girls suggested that I try this when I was looking for a new moisturizer as it’s won some awards and it’s one of their best-selling products. It does not moisturize my skin at all (I have dry combination skin) and prefer a creamier texture.
review_title: Not recommended for dry skin ladies

review_text: I really like this moisturizer but since it doesn’t have SPF I use it at night only. It’s lightweight and moisturizing for my dry/combo skin. It has felt drying on my skin before but for the most part it works well on my skin. If you have really dry skin, this may not be the product for you.

I love this, i think everyone should buy it. it actually give enough moisturize, i have an oily skin and it doesnt really give you that much oil on your face. it feels very comfortable after. i suggest use it every morning and night.
I like it a lot. This moisturizer is fast absorbing and not greasy or oily.

I have combination skin, and expected this to solve my problems with the dry parts of my face. Instead, once I started using this my skin got more dry and I felt like I had to use it more and more often in order for it to stay hydrated. If I didn’t use it one day it would get extremely dry which is worse than I had ever had before. Would not repurchase.

At first when I tried this out I thought i would really like it. It wasn’t a heavy product that’s for sure , It actually didn’t moisturize enough :/ . After a day or two of using this I developed little bumps on my skin. I thought maybe it was my skin getting used to the new product. It of course, never went away but only got worse and gave me breakouts ! I don’t deal with acne like this on a regular basis so I know it was this product that clogged up my pores !

i’ve never had a moisturizer that work like that... it calm my sensitive skin and hydrate perfectly my skin is comfortable and i can’t live without it ...my skin has never been this beautiful in the morning i even need less make up... love it ... don’t hesitate to buy it you won’t regret it

This is a great moisturizer for me in the summer, when I’m normal combination( normal on the cheeks and oily on the T zone). This hydrates my skin without making me more oily or making my normal spots dry. I also like using this in the morning all year round when I have to apply makeup right after, because it dries quickly and doesn’t make me oily under
I use this daily post-cleanse pre-cc cream with SPF. It hydrates and absorbs quickly. My cc cream and makeup go on smoother.
This disappears quickly and is very moisturizing.

I have combination skin, and this is perfect in the summer, spring, and fall. It isn’t greasy at all, but it’s thoroughly moisturizing. It’s not enough for me in the winter (I use Shisheido in the winter) but it’s perfect the rest of the year.

I love using this moisturizer in the morning because it’s really hydrating but it absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a residue or make me look oily. I have combo skin, and the last thing I want to do is use a moisturizer that makes me look even oilier in my t-zone, so needless to say I was super happy to find this moisturizer.

In love with this product! It soaks into your skin after a few minutes and turns matte, which is ideal for my oily skin. It is not moisturizing for my dry spots so I just put another dab of a different moisturizer on them. It definitely helps with dark spots and old acne scars and lightens them up. I saw results with in a week!

I have very oily skin. This moisturizer does not make my skin more oily like others. I am able to apply my make up immediately after applying the moisturizer verses having to wait for it to sink into my skin.

I have been using this gel for over 5 years. I used it through my early teenage years when I struggled with acne. I have combination skin and love this moisturizer in the summer and as a basic moisturizer throughout the day, patting on over makeup, or applying right after a shower or washing my face. In the summer, I use this in conjunction with a tinted moisturizer with spf or a heavier day cream with spf. In the winter, I use this with a spf moisturizer and a heavy night cream. I love this but it is very basic.
A small pump would make my oily skin matte half day.

Love this moisturizer! However, it doesn’t do much for my combination skin in the cold winters (I live in Ontario and it gets pretty cold!) so I only use this spring/summer. Great price and absorbs into my skin very quickly. Highly recommended.

I have combination skin along with acne prone skin. I wanted to keep using this product but it just made me break out. It really is a “moisture drink“ however it would leave me pimples later in the evening. I gave it to my sister in law and even though she has super dry skin and acne, the product smoothed out her complexion and washed away her acne. It was a miracle work for her.

I have very oily skin and this stuff works wonders...My face is very soft after applied. I have acne prone skin and it is gentle enough for my skin. It controls my shin all day. This is my first bottle and more to be purchased in the future.
This is definitely the best moisturizing I’ve used, highly recommend for oily or combination skin. On my third bottle now love it!

I have heard about this gel all over Youtube and was skeptical because I have tried different Clinique products before and some have burned my face, I guess because of sensitive skin. In the past few months, I have tried about 10 different facial creams and none seemed to work. I get flaky, dry skin around my nose and mouth during the winter months. I couldn’t find any moisturizer that helped with this problem. I got a sample of this at Sephora and it honestly worked wonders. I have since bought the medium sized one and am very happy with my purchase. It’s definitely not the cheapest on the market, nor is it the most expensive. If you have the same problem as me, I definitely recommend trying it out.
review_title: May have found the best moisturizer ever

review_text: This gel is perfect if you have combination skin and need a moisturizer to use under face makeup (foundation, concealer, etc). It gives skin a smooth and relatively matte finish so long as you moisturize the more dry areas of your skin overnight. If you don’t, however, it will not be able to completely smooth out those areas, and I don’t recommend this product as an overnight cream (it’s really just not thick enough). Overall, really great product as long as it’s used in conjunction with a steady skin-care routine.
review_title: Excellent product, staple of my beauty routine

review_text: Tried the regular formula, it was ok, but some how I didn’t feel it made my skin the best it could be + I felt that through out the day my founsation would look bad, as if it was falling down my face (and I barely wear foundation).Wasn’t that quick to absorb and it didn’t give me the fresh look I was hoping for.Got the sample of the gel formula : AWESOME!!!! It’s exactly what I needed, quickly absorbed it holds my foundation ALL day, even without a primer, I look fresh from 8 am to 8 pm. Very impressed about that. Love the feeling I get once it’s applied.My skin is sensitive and dry, prone to breakouts on the chin area and can get oily during the day (nose). But it doesn’t with the gel version.FYI: I don’t use it as a night cream, I use Biotherm Aquasource Night (high-density jelly).
This product does help for oily skin but around winter time when I am inside of building with heater on all the time, I think this will be too dry even for oily skin specially at night time.

I have combination skin, some oily spots, & some dry areas around the mouth/on my chin. One pump will cover my whole face & this lasts forever! I was previously using a neutrogena moisturizer but the winter air has made my skin flaky. My clinique gel has fixed that issue in one night!

On a day to day basis I have very clean and clear skin. However, I recently just moved across the country and my skin broke into a war against me. At first I didn’t know if my reaction was caused by my foundation or cleanser or diet, ect. I spent hundreds on facial cleaners and toners and lotions and i was already eating a very clean diet-- needless to say 2 months later I was still unable to calm it. I went to a local dermatologist and she suggested to try a hydrator. I asked if she recommended any non-pharmisutical solutions and this is what she recommended to me. THIS PRODUCT IS A MIRACLE!! Super hydrating, not the least bit oily, DOESNT clog my pores. I will never use another lotion/gel in my life.

A great lotion for oily skin. Goes on smooth, not sticky or oily, absorbs quickly. Perfect for warmer months.In drier air, at night time it is not enough for me. I really like the moisture surge for oily skin, it is perfect!

The best moisturizer for oily or combination skin- provides light hydration, absorbs quickly, leaves skin glowing but not at all oily or greasy, good for sensitive skin, makes my skin feel smooth and doesn’t break me out. Love it.
I have oily skin and this really helps me. I use it twice a day, once in the morning and right before bed. It keeps it fresh and oil free :)
It’s perfect for protecting oily skin, it helps to moisturize not only during winter but also summer!

I’m really sensitive with the smell of any skin care product and this gel smells okay for me. I bought this gel because its reputation and it doesn’t have a annying fancy description. It really works for me. My skin texture became smoother and softer than before. Also it’s not greasy at all and very easy for my skin to absorb it. The only problem I have is my face gets oily quiker than before but furturnately the amount of oil is less than before. Love it!

For my sometimes sensitive, sometimes dry, sometimes oily skin this product does an amazing job of moisturizing every single time! After using it for a few weeks I have already noticed an improvement in my complexion. I apply it after my showers and before applying my makeup. The gel goes on light and easy and your skin will soak it right up. It has a very light, fresh smelling scent. This will work great as your go to moisturizer!

This has such great reviews but I am not in love with it. I have pretty oily skin but I moisturize after I was my face. It moisturizes about the right amount if you have super oily skin, but it doesn’t improve texture or tone at all, at least not on me. I love and use a lot of other clinique products this one just wasn’t as great as the others. I would recommend trying it out in a Sephora store first.
Absorbs quickly, feels light and fresh.

I love that it doesn’t make your face feel oily after but yet works to moisturize my face all day long. I have fairly dry skin. I can’t get out of the shower without putting something on my face to moisturize it and this is by far my fav! I have tried a few others but I find they either don’t moisturize enough or they are oily and leave a greasy feeling on my face after I apply. I think this is the perfect balance and it lasts forever (I think I only need to buy it yearly)!

As a self-confessed beauty junkie, I have a huge collection of both makeup and skincare by several brands. I’m always looking for that new “holy grail“ product, even if I’m already using something I enjoy. Of all the moisturizers in my collection to choose from, THIS is the one I keep going back to over and over again. It is to the point where I cannot see anything else coming along that is good enough to replace this. This ultra-light moisturizing gel is PERFECT for oily skin. It is lightweight, oil-free, absorbs super quickly, makes the skin smooth, and makeup glides over this like a dream. I love it when I’m getting ready in the morning because I’m often rushing and don’t have time to sit around and wait for moisturizers to soak in. After putting this on I’m ready to apply my makeup less than five minutes later. It is also the perfect moisturizer to use for nights out because there is no SPF, so no annoying whitecast flashbacks in photos. This is truly an amazing and unique moisturizer that is also very reasonably priced. I’m so glad that my perfect moisturizer is not only effective, but also relatively inexpensive compared to other high-end brands. I will be buying this forever!

I love this moisturizer. It’s great for combo to oily skin. It dries up nicely too without that sticky feel to your face. The only thing I did noticed (probably just on me) is that in the winter time, I still get dry patches here and there when I use this. I have to switch to the lotion version and the dry patches are gone. I require just a little bit more moisturizer in the winter, which is pretty normal and expected I think. That is why I gave it 4 out of 5 stars. Overall, I love this and would recommend to anyone.

This is a great mosturizer. I love that it’s a gel. My skin is combination and it works perfectly for me. It soaks in very fast without any residue left behind and it works great under makeup. This is my second bottle and I will keep repurchasing it!

This moisturizing gel is just what my skin needed. It is the perfect 3rd step after cleansing, and toning my oily, acne prone skin. It is so lightweight, makes my skin smooth and moisturized, but not greasy or oily. AMAZING STUFF. I don’t think I’ll ever be able to live without it.

Has not made my acne prone skin break out at all! With that being said, it is not strong enough to get rid of the major dry patches and flakes I have from using proactiv. (Peroxide cleansers are very drying). It does moisturize normal dry flaky spots that happen in the winter.I also like using this as a primer before my make up. It smooths my skin out and isnt greasy at all.Going to try the lotion next.

For my oily skin, I love this moisturizer. It hydrates without making my skin feel greasy. It absorbs quickly into the skin and feels lightweight. Its holy grail status because it does not break me out, it makes my skin feel comfortable and foundation applies smoothly overtop. Also, i like how the ingredients are gentle and there is no harsh fragrance added in. It’s just an all around simple moisturizer thats perfect for oily skin. If you need more intense hydration then opt for the dramatically different lotion instead.

I’ve used at least half of my container and these are my thoughts:I thought that this would be the perfect moisturizer for me because I have skin that is mostly normal but a t-zone that becomes oily by the end of the day. Overall, it does a good job of making my skin feel smooth for the first hour but after that it leaves certain parts of my face feeling a little dry. In the end it does not control oil for more than 3 hours but that should be more for your foundation’s job.Overall, there’s nothing huge to expect out of this product but it gets the job done. There is slight chemical smell to it but only when you open the bottle and sniff the entire content. Packaging is great with the matte bottle and the controllable pump. Next time though I will go try something different at Sephora.
review_title: Pretty good but not the best

review_text: This moisturizer is perfect for my end-of-the-day, oily skin. The lightweight formula is perfect for keeping my face hydrated and can be used for multiple daily applications (in my case- in the morning after a shower and at night after removing my makeup). I also use the Clinique Liquid Facial Soap and the Clarifying Lotion 3.
This moisturizer is great for oily skin. It does not cause breakouts like heavier moisturizers sometimes do. I have used many others, but always come back to this one.

I have combination skin - oily/dry in the winter and oily in the summer. I was using this as a summer moisturizer and it’s not moisturizing enough. Pros: absorbs quickly, fragrance free, very light. Cons/: my skin still feels tight and dry after cleansing, applying a serum, and using this moisturizer (I am also very thorough but gentle with cleansing, so it’s not my cleansing method). If you have REALLY oily skin, it might work for you. Give it a try, but I don’t recommend for combo skin.

Had a few hits and misses for my oily, acne-prone, sensitive skin before I chanced on this miracle worker. Its a little more expensive than other products but then it does exactly what it claims. It gently hydrates your skin without any irritation. Do stop by my blog if you’d like blue-arc-en-ciel.blogspot.inCheers!
Bought this in mini size because I was afraid the moisturizer isn’t the right one for my skin. But I loveeeed this one! Couple of days so far but my skin is already super smooth!
this product is nice, but it tends to break me out.... it is very moisturizing which I love, but too heavy for my skin.
A must have. Works great for oily skin.

I have been using this for almost a year now and I still love it as much now as I did in the beginning. I have oily skin and this gel is absorbed almost instantly (good for those of us always running late!). It mattifies my skin and is perfect for putting make up over. I alternate between mineral powder foundation and liquid foundation and find it works well with both. I don’t like committing to one product for too long and so I keep buying the smallest travel size but I think next time I will buy the bigger one!
Got this moisturizer for my cameo appearance oily days. Got to have some form of a moisturizer on. Regardless of your skin type. MOISTURIZE MOISTURIZE MOISTURIZE GIRLS!
I bought this because of the good reviews but my skin is still too dry for this moisturizer. It wasn’t enough for my skin. Since I also have acne prone skin I thought this moisturizer would help.

This product feels amazing on your skin. It melts right into your skin and leaves your skin matte for most of the day even though I have an oily t-zone. I love that is has no scent so it doesn’t dry out or irritate my sensitive skin.
Very nice product--lightweight, no oily shine a few hours later like so many other moisturizers. Will definitely purchase again.

I have oily and dry skin. It’s the weirdest combo ever and I still don’t understand it. I love using this after I get out of the shower and in the mornings after washing my face. It’s the best for my dry/oily areas such as my forehead and on the corners of my nose. I love it. This is the only thing I use in the winter.
Quick absorption. I didn’t pay attention to the product...for oily skin. I have dry skin. May work better for the intended oily skin type.

I use the 3-step skin care system that Clinique has and my skin has never looked or felt better!! The liquid facial soap leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. The clarifying lotion gets what’s left after washing your face so there’s no grime in your pores. The Moisturizing gel makes your skin so soft afterwards. I use it twice a day and my skin feels great!!
Pros: thin formulaabsorbs quicklyhydrates my oily combination skin without making me shinyCons: if you have dry flaky skin due to acne medications or cold weather then it is not enough moisturization

Love this moisturizer, this was a recommendation from a friend and I can already feel a difference with my skin. It doesn’t feel greasy and it sinks in quickly but still gives my skin exactly what it needs.
I have extreme combination skin and this product works great. It moisturizes dry spots without making greasy spots worse. It’s light so I don’t feel smothered by moisturizer. Great find!

My skin is pretty dry other than my forehead, but this moisturizing gel still does the trick. I don’t like how greasy most things that are formulated for dry skin feel, and I love how this sinks in and makes my skin feel smooth. I only wish they could figure out a way to incorporate sunscreen without losing the oil-free feeling.
review_title: love it even for my dry skin

review_text: I have a combination skin, and it has been difficult for me to find a good moisturizer because I want it my face to stay hydrated but not turn oily after. very lightweighted, and it gets absorbed really quickly. I put 4-5 layers at night because my face gets really dry with the heater but it doesn’t turn oily in the morning, and it doesn’t dry quickly. I am definitely going to continue on with this product.

This didn’t cause breakouts, but I was hoping it would help clear my skin. After a couple months I realized that wasn’t going to happen and stopped using it. It’s a very generic moisturizer, hence the price.
I love this! It keeps my skin moisturized even during the harsh cold winters. And it doesn’t feel oily at all. I apply every morning and sometimes at night too.

I first purchased the 1.7 oz gel on a whim, not really expecting much. I’m so glad I did! I have combination skin and this seems to provide the perfect amount of moisture. I love how quickly it absorbs. I only have to wait about 30 seconds before applying my bb cream. I used to use Philosophy’s Hope in a Jar and I would have to wait minutes for it to absorb. Even once it was dry, it would cause my bb cream to clump up. I never have that problem with this lightweight moisturizer. Also, with Hope in a Jar, I felt like my face looked really greasy, but with the Clinique moisturizing gel, my skin has a nice matte look to it. I’m so happy I found this product!
Good product for my teenager that has acne prone skin and for me in the summer months.

I am pleasantly surprised at how well this works on my oily skin. Very lightweight. Absorbs quickly. Mositurizes perfectly even during the cold, dry winter days. I really like how well it blends into my skin without a sticky feeling I would have expected from a gel-based product. It also keeps my oily skin looking semi-matte throughout the day. Very happy with this purchase. Great price. Great value. Wonderful results
It works okay but doesn’t absorbs very quick. Feels kinda greasy actually. So I guess it works better as a night cream but not a day cream.

the first time i used this gel, i immediately noticed that my face was EXTREMELY smooth. it absorbed really well, but i felt that it was not moisturizing enough for my face (even though i have extremely oily skin.)but later on in the day, my face became extremely itchy adn red around the cheeks and my skin had bumpy patches on it. my friend told me she had used it too and the same thing happened. it’s a good product, but i guess it’s not for everyone :(

I really like this stuff! It dries really quickly which is awesome, and it doesn’t feel greasy at all. It’s a really great light moisturizer for good skin days, but for days when my skin is a bit drier, I use a heavier cream. I use this every morning under my makeup.:)

I have combination skin type: in the summer my skin gets very oily but in the winter it’s really dry. The area around my mouth and my nose gets really dry for some reason. I cannot use lotion because lotion usually has too much oil in it for my skin. So I was recommended to this gel, which is oil-free.The first time I used it I thought it was great because it was light and left my skin so soft. But about half way down the bottle, I noticed some stinging around my mouth. I ignored it because I thought it would go away. But the stinging just got worse and the gel actually started to cause redness under my mouth. It was only red when it was stinging. I didn’t have this problem when I used a different moisturizer. I switched to a moisturizer that is organic and the stinging and redness is going away. I guess this works for some people, but didn’t work for me. I’m not sure whether this gel has alcohol in it, but it seemed like the gel dried my sensitive skin parts.

I have combination to oily sensitive skin that is acne prone and very dry (crazy combo right?!) So i decided to go into sephora to look for a great moisturizer. An employee helped me look at different ones and she thought this one would offer the most moisture. It did not! I feel like it does nothing for my skin, but maybe dry it out more! I will be taking this product back ASAP and gettting my money back as well!

This has Been my everyday moisturizer for almost 2 years now . I use it daily before applying make up. Absorbs quickly and keeps my face hydrated. Doesn’t feel greasy at all. Doesn’t cause break outs.
Must be due to the silicones in this product. Won’t repurchase. Not all that moisturizing either.

This is perfect for oily skin, it sinks into the skin quickly and leaves a very soft canvas for makeup. However I gave it 4 stars because I feel is not so hydrating around my eyebrows where I am really dry. But overall it’s a great product.

This has been my go-to daily moisturizer since I was 13. I am now 35 and my skin looks amazing. No one ever believes me when I tell them how old I am!!! I have tried other moisturizers, but I always come back to this one. Even during 2 pregnancies, and the crazy hormones involved in being pregnant, this lotion just seemed to know how much or little moisture I needed!!

I’m going through a transitional phase with my skin right now (too young for intense moisture but still need a nice moisturizer to keep my skin supple) and this moisturizer fits the bill. I originally was going to buy the regular lotion or the lotion +, but both moisturizers would have been too thick/oily for my skin type (I have combination skin, meaning I tend to have an oily t-zone but have dry skin everywhere else on my face). This moisturizer is super light but gives me enough moisture so my skin isn’t tight after washing - the perfect in-between. It also lasts a pretty long time, I use it morning and night all over my face and neck and usually only need 3 pumps for my whole face and neck area. It absorbs quickly and immediately after I use it, I experience a nice healthy glow to my skin that I just love. Great product; I will never use another moisturizer other than this one (unless I need more moisture later on!).

have repurchased over and over for the past few years.i use it as a daily moisturizer for under makeup, and don’t need a primer with it.this is a perfect moisturizer for fall, spring, and summer.i have combination skin that gets dry in winter, so i mix it with a tiny bit of something thicker.definitely prefer the ddm gel over the lotion.
So I bought this gel for my face because I am prone to acne and I am very impressed. It does not irritate my skin and I love this product. I will definitely be buying it again.

I have used the dramatically different moisturizer for years and recently tried this gel version. I am scent sensitive and I’m not sure what in this formula is causing it, but there is a definite scent that irritates my skin. I’ll be going back to the original moisturizer.

I have been using this for about two years now and i truly believe this is the best moisturizer out there. Even during the winter, my skin doesnt flake anymore and it does control the oiliness of my skin. I love using this product in the morning before putting my makeup on. I only use this in the morning because I put on my acne treatment at night. I will definitely purchase this again and use it forever.

I like this moisturizer- it is light weight, doesn’t make my sensitive, combination skin breakout in acne or other skin reactions. However, I don’t really like to use it on its own in the winter, because I think it is almost too light to be effective- to fix this, I use Origin’s White Tea Skin Gaurdian serum underneath.
Perfect moisturizer. No more dry skin and the gel isn’t oily at all. Worked perfectly. I especially love using it before putting on makeup in the morning. Absorbs super fast too!
review_title: Best thing a girl could ever ask for.

review_text: I tried a lot of mosturizers in my life and I have oily skin.. I received a sample of it and I LOVE IT ! It dries very fast and gave my skin a very different feeling (it is very lightweigt on the skin). It made my skin VERY soft and when i put my hands on my skin it’s like i didn’t put any moisturizer at all. But, I only recommend for a daytime routine.

Great texture and goes on smooth. Unfortunately, it does not solve my oily t-zone problem - which is the only reason for my low rating. I have applied this lotion at 7:30 a.m. and around 10 a.m. my skin is visibly oily again. I’ve used this lotion only twice. I’m not sure if I need to use it for a few weeks before it works - that is, prevent the oily shine on my face for 8 hours. I will not purchase this product to address my oily t-zone problem.
Amazing for oily skin! When I use this, I don’t even have to use a primer! It helps keep my t-zone looking shine free throughout the day!

I had high hopes for this, but I was sadly disappointed. I used the original Dramatically Different Lotion years ago , but it was too oily. This new formula, while claiming to be oil free still caused me to break out. I returned it.

I had high hope for this from all the great reviews --- I got combo/oily skin and was hoping this will be something nice I can use daily under my makeup. However, only after a couple of uses ... it made me broke out. Strange --- because it went on very smoothly and quickly absorb!!

I was always hesitant on using a moisturizer on my face, because I oily skin, but this product is amazing! My skin didn’t feel oily after putting it on but felt nice and refreshed. It is great for use in the winter time and works fine as a under make up moisturizer (just give it 5 minutes before you put on the rest of your make up, including primer).

I’ve been a fan of this moisturizer for years. It leaves your skin feeling soft and dewy and doesn’t impart any kind of annoying shine or stick or anything afterwards. Makeup will cover it flawlessly. The pump bottle lasts forever. I have very acne-prone skin and no other moisturizer has ever minimized breakouts like this one.It has only one flaw as far as I’m concerned- no spf. I’m currently on a quest for a moisturizer exactly like this but with sun protection.
review_title: If it had spf it would be PERFECT

review_text: My go-to moisturizer! I have oily skin so I hate using something super thick. This provides just the right amount of moisture without making my face too greasy.

This is my HG moisturizer several months out of the year. The only time I use anything else (reluctantly) is when the weather gets cold and the air and my skin get really dry. During the colder/dryer months, I need something slightly more moisturizing. I hope they never discontinue or change this product as it is the only moisturizer I have tried that doesn’t break me out. Love this stuff!

I’ve been using this for the past two years and it’s been a staple in my routine! Over the summer, it’s a perfect lightweight moisturizer and I simply add a creamier moisturizer on top of this during the winter.The gel feels better and doesn’t have the funky smell that the lotion has, which is why I’ll be repurchasing this for years to come!

This is a great workhorse moisturizer to keep in your skincare arsenal as long as you don’t have really dry skin. It’s reasonably priced and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. I tend to switch my products a lot but come back to this one on a regular basis, especially if I’m in a hurry and just want to throw on something light that I don’t want to ration, like I do when I’m carefully applying my more expensive products!If you have oily skin or live in a warmer climate it would probably be ideal for year-round use. I find that in the winter I sometimes need to use a heavier moisturizer, especially if I’m going to be outside for any significant amount of time. I used to use the original DDM as well, until they “improved“ it by adding a “+“ and making it more moisturizing. The new “+“ version is too sticky for me - hope they don’t “improve“ this one!
I used this THREE times and got so many breakouts on my chin

Lightweight and really does dramatically moisturize your skin! I really loved this gel formula because the cream felt very heavy and like my skin couldn’t breathe. Also, it felt like it added a lot of excess oil which I didn’t want or need. This doesn’t add any extra oil and really is the front runner for face moisturizers in my opinion.
I use this moisturizer every day and I love it. It goes on smooth, no oiliness. Great base has a wonderful scent!

So I got this as a recommendation from my dermatologist way back and am still using it today. Its light, doesn’t break me out, and feels really cooling when you put it on. The only thing is that I only use this as part of my nighttime routine because it isn’t really as moisturizing especially during the winter when my skin gets dry and peeling. But in the summer its great!

Love this moisturizer! I put this on every morning and afterwards my skin feels very soft without feeling greasy. It’s very light weight and also doesn’t make my skin break out. One bottle lasts a good 4-5 months so it’s definitely worth the money.

It has helped to moisture my oily skin even though sometimes it has made it oilier by night… Haven’t found any better moisturizer for oily skin, as long as I use the 3 step clinique system the moisturizer woks as it should but if I don’t apply the lotion for oily skin it makes my face oilier.

I’ve been using Clinique products for my sensitive skin since my teens. The DDMG is excellent, moisturizes without causing breakouts. In the winter when my skin needs a little extra moisture/protection, I use Clinique Moisture Surge gel (also oil-free) on top of DDMG. Perfection!

Love it. I have always loved the feel of the lotion, but since I hit my teens (with horrible acne) I haven’t used anything that didn’t say oil-free. I was having a dry skin emergency with the recent season change, and I was deciding between this and the Boscia Oil-free moisturizer. While I wish the Clinique was natural, it works great and is less than half the price of the Boscia. My face is no longer falling off. Your skin should feel soft but not greasy. Will definitely buy again.

I have normal skin, maybe even on the dry side. This moisturizer does a great job of leaving my skin soft without the oily feeling. I’ve also tried Philosophy Hope in a Jar, but this worked better for me.

I have combination skin, but I’m mostly oily. I have been using the Clinique three step skincare system for a month now. . .and it made my skin completely freak out!The gel does absorb quickly, and it’s lightweight. But it’s too lightweight. I felt that after using the three step system, my skin was stripped of its natural oils further than what the moisturizing gel put back into my skin.It’s okay, but I don’t think I’ll be repurchasing.

I was really worried when I first ordered this moisturizer. I’d had bad experiences with moisturizers and serums that had this same sort of “texture“ I guess you’d call it? Anyways, I easily break out with certain types of moisturizers, and I was sure this one would be no different, but nope! I love this stuff! It’s super lightweight, glides on super smoothly, and my makeup sits on top of it really well. Doesn’t break me out at all. Not to mention it smells so fresh! I have also noticed a slight reduction in the oiliness on my forehead, which is usually the only place I look shiny. Nothing extreme, but noticeable nonetheless. I highly recommend this moisturizer! Clinique for the win.

I have oily skin - my brother in law once told me I look like an oil painting by the end of the day. It has been very hard for me to find a lotion that gives enough moisture to keep my skin young but that doesn’t increase the oiliness issue or break me out. OH MY GOD this lotion will be my go to day lotion forever and always. It makes me skin feel incredibly soft and most importantly I am oil free at the end of the day. I use this in combination with the Philosophy Vitamin C Booster in the morning and after using a retinol serum at night. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a residue feeling on my face like some lotions. My skin has never looked this good and has NEVER made it through the day without being shiny until now! I *may* start using something a little heavier for a tad more moisture at night, but for now, I am so satisfied with just this. If you have oily skin, get it!

I have been using this moisturizer for years since it came out in gel form. I have oily skin so I don’t like the textures of cream or anything that feels greasy. This gel version is great especially in the summer because its very light yet moisturizing. In the winter I use 2-3 pumps if my skin is extra dry. The large bottle lasts me about 4-6 months and that makes it really good for its price.
Love this for summer time under my foundation. It’s very light weight. It moisturizes without leaving you feeling greasy. It provides a nice base for your foundation.

This gel moisturizer keeps my skin supple and youthful without being greasy/oily. I love to use it in the morning under my makeup bc it is so light weight and isn’t greasy. It absorbs right into my skin. I use something slightly heavier at night. This is a staple in my skin care routine and believe it always will be. It is also very reasonably priced and 1 full size bottle lasts me several months.

If you’ve tried the DDM lotion and found it greasy, then this is for you. I used that lotion as a night cream only and always woke up feeling like a grease-ball.I have combo skin that gets dry patches occasionally but is oily on my chin and t-zone. I’ve been using the DDM gel in the morning before my makeup and I’m really happy with it.It makes my skin feel soft and supple but also leaves it MATTE. I also haven’t had to use blotting papers at all for the last week (amazing for me). I bought small bottle and at $17CAD, I’m sure it’ll last me almost two months, so I’m pretty happy with that price.Definitely recommend this for combo/oily skin though if your skin is super dry, it may not be moisturizing enough.
I have been using this product since highschool and don’t plan on changing it any time soon!
I have combo skin - oily nose and chin, dry forehead and cheeks. My skin drinks this up, and it never breaks me out. Just enough moisture when I need it. I like that it doesn’t have any fragrance.
I didn’t see any difference on my oily skin other better ones in the market

I had been using a drugstore moisturizer, but it left my skin feeling so oily. I have combo skin. I had read the reviews on different ones and went to store to see how this one felt. The lotion on one hand felt to oily. I tried gel on other hand and was pleased, so I bought bottle and I have loved it ever since. Does not make skin so oily and I love how it makes my skin feel. I plan to always use this.
This is perfect for my combination skin - not too moist, doesn’t break me out, but keeps all my dry patches in check. I will purchase again and again! Plus, it feels good to apply.
I love this lightweight moisturizer, my skin drinks it in. Goes on so smooth! Great for my usually oily skin

THE BEST MOISTURIZER. I have been using this product from years. Though I do try out new moisturizers, I always come back to this one. It is great for oily skin.. It is so unbelievably lightweight and soaks in so quickly. I truly think it is the ONLY product out there that feels completely oil free while still providing adequate moisture. This baby got me through years of cystic acne and I still use it on my clear skin to this day. It is also so “spreadable“ and not much product is wasted. I do one pump on my face and one pump for my neck. This is a must have!!
it is nice product. but it will probably work for summer or for teenage,
