Clinique will always be the best value for your money. It may not always be the perfect product but it will be quite good and have an amazing value. This product is nearly perfect I still end up a bit shiny but I don’t think anything can stop that tbh. One of the few constants in my regime.

Hands down best for 30 somethin’ combo skin that can’t decide if it wants a drink or an oil-blotting sheet. Adds that needed moisture to my sandpaper spots & controls over-production of oil on the t-zone. The gel formula feels light, not heavy or greasy. Love it!

I wish my skin wasn’t so temperamental because otherwise I would definitely still be using this stuff. Not only is my skin combination but the drier areas are actually flaky while my T-zone is super oily. Ridiculous. I was hoping for a lotion that would absorb quickly and completely without leaving me too shiny. Definitely yes on the first one, but I was still a little shiny. That wouldn’t have stopped me except it didn’t do much for my dry patches. It also has a rather strong, odd smell, but I would have dealt with it if not for the dry skin. Oh well - hopefully it will work better for you!
I very love this product.I have oily skin and it does not make my skin oiliness during the day.It leaves my skin smooth.

I’ve been using this product for about 6 months now. I like how my skin quickly absorbs it, making it easy to apply my powder right after without having to wait. The true test will be the Canadian winter that’s around the corner!

I used this twice for the first time today so all I can say is that its the first moisturizer I’ve ever used that wasn’t oily or greasy or hard to rub in and dry. After my skin felt so incredibly smooth like never before. I must say I did first use boscia black clenser and miracle skin restoring mask, but the clinique was what made all the difference. If it does nothing else but smooth I’ll be happy. (And this is from someone with a past of acne and oily skin so I don’t play around with this stuff.). Its a must-buy!

living in LA, my skin has become quite oily and this moisturizer is great because not only does it absorb quickly it’s also really lightweight. i don’t think anything will solve my oily skin problem but at least with winter coming up, this will moisturize and hydrate my skin at night without adding to it. lovely!
review_title: non oily, great moisturizer for PM

review_text: i was very impressed with how this moisturizer’s performance. very lightweight, and absorbs into the skin immediately where your skin feels hydrated after, but doesn’t feel like there is any product on your skin. a great price and size for a moisturizer compared to others on the market. probably would not recommend for someone who needs a lot a moisture due to how lightweight this is but it is definitely something i would consider repurchasing in the future
I live near the equator so I appreciate this being so lightweight and non-oily. I usually follow with Youth Surge Day (oily skin) for better age prevention and sun protection.

I have combination skin and this product is simply not enough hydration for me. And I am the type used to using pure hydration and gel/jelly texture moisturizers. And this Broke Me Out! I don’t know what it is in it but as soon as i start using it i get break outs and as soon as i stop the break out stops. So i gave to someone else.

I love everything about this moisturizer. I bought my mom one as well. It’s light and absorbs very well. It’s perfect for my skin since I’m using medication to control my acne. I have extremely oily skin and this have not noticed any increased flares up. I honestly feel it’s improving my skin. I have since brought the 3 step kit but that’s another review. I will definitely repurchase. Also the fact it doesn’t have SPF doesn’t bother me. I like to wear this moisturizer at night too.
I absolutely love this product! It’s great for oily skin. I use this on a regular basis and it has improved my skin, Really recommend it for oily skin.
I love this moisturizer! I have oily acne prone skin and this keeps my skin hydrated, soft and demi matte for about six hours. For my skin type without a primer, that is significant.
This moisturizer is excellent for me. I use separate Vit C and Retinol, so I need a moisturizer that is versatile. I mix things together before use so it is fresh. Clinique is the best way to go.

Yes, it’s light. Doesn’t feel like a moisturizer, though. Thanks to the high proportion of silicone (it’s number two, after water), it felt more like it sat on top than setting into my skin, and really noticeably when applying primer on top, some foundations actually separated on my skin. It wasn’t drying, per se, but nothing felt particularly hydrated after application, or after several weeks of use. Returned it.
review_title: Felt more like primer than moisturizer

review_text: This moisturizing gel keeps my face from feeling greasy through out the day. It works great!

I am in love with this moisturizer. It is perfect for my combination skin! It absorbs quickly, isn’t oily and most of all lasts forever. My skin feels extra soft after applying this as well. It is also fragrance free which is nice. My first bottle lasted me 8 months and that was using it twice a day (which is super impressive).

I am so happy they came out with this gel version. I love gel moisturizers in general but this is amazing. Same signature smell as the original formula. Deeply hydrating, absorbs super quick, lightweight. Amazing!
I ready the reviews on this product and was really hopeful it would work for me. Sadly, it did not. I used this for about a week and my face broke out terrible! Would not recommend!

This product melts in easily, no greasiness or shine. Yet it hydrates my 54 year-old skin beautifully! Nice for daytime under foundation. It makes my skin a bit more ruddy right after use, but that goes away fairly quickly.

This is the ultimate gentle moisturizer for sensitive, combination skin. This is perfect to put over a serum that doesn’t supply extra moisture. Super lightweight with extra hydrating power. Love this moisturizer!
Good for oily skin, not greasy, not thick like some other moisturizers I’ve tried.
This is the best moisturizer for oily skin.

I bought this item for a friend who had bought a small bottle and after using it a few times asked me to get her a larger bottle while i was travelling. She loves it and recommends it to others, she finds it feels really nice on her skin

When I couldn’t find the original version, I took a gamble with the gel. Huge mistake! The gel feels like it lays on your skin but is never absorbed, so my face never felt more dry! Guess I have to go to the + next. Hope it ddoesn’t dissapoint like this one did.
review_title: NOT a substitute for the original

review_text: Love this! Hydrates my face without that greasy feeling

After changing moisturizers 5-6+ times in 3 years I was ready to find the one that would be suitable for my combo-oily skin: hydrating my cheeks which are fairly normal and not exacerbating my very oily T-zone. I read through hundreds of reviews on here and compared dozens of products and finally chose this one! I am so glad I did! This gel is the answer for combo-oily skin. I live in Ontario, Canada where our summers are super hot and humid and our winters are soo bitter and drying. This gel takes me through these extremes flawlessly. It’s lightweight and non-greasy enough that in the summertime heat you don’t feel like you have anything on your face, but in the winter you can apply more and it keeps your skin beautifully hydrated. Since I started using this product in April 2012 I have much smoother skin and I never feel like my skin in “weighed down“ under a greasy film. This product glides on and absorbs quickly so you can start your foundation routine within a few minutes. This product was my first Clinique purchase and I will be starting the 3-step system this week and can’t wait for the results!!

I like this product. It is very light weight on my face and refreshing. It moisturizes my face nicely without leaving it greasy. I find myself having to wait a few minutes to actually put on my makeup as the moisturizer is still sinking into my skin.

I have very oily skin and resisted trying this product again after initially using the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion about 20 years ago. But Clinique has always priced their products decently, so on a whim I picked up the travel size of this while standing in line one day. The timing was perfect. I was looking for something that would moisturize my face without contributing to the oil production and this gel is definitely it, plus the price tag was just right. I use it morning and night after washing my face with a cleanser and it gives me just enough moisture to keep my skin soft without looking like an oil slick. I can even wake up in the morning and put off washing my face for a few hours if I happen to be lounging around the house. Before, I would get that nasty grimy feeling from the oil building up. Yuck! Kudos to Sephora for choosing their impulse buy products so well, and congratulations to Clinique for coming up with a moisturizer that works so well for oily skin!

Great for oily skin, but not for my combination skin. It doesn’t help with my dry chin, it actually dried it out a little more. I recommend this product for oily skin, but if you ever get dry patches, go for the lotion.
this moisturizer is lightweight, fast absorbing, non greasy, and controls my oil! I will be sticking to this moisturizer for a long time.

Hydrate without looking too shiny. I used this the entire time I was on vacation at the beach and It kept my skin super hydrated and soft also it looked great under make up. I find it works best if you put it on your face immediately after washing your face (no longer than five minutes after). Then let it soak into your skin for at least 3 to 5 minutes before applying make up. AWESOME NEW FORMULA!

This is my all time favorite moisturizer. I have used this for years and have tried others as well and seem to always come back to this one. I hope that Clinique never quits making this wonderful product.

This gel provides very light moisture to the skin. I love the texture, it’s non greasy and sinks in so fast you feel like you can layer it on forever. It doesn’t make the skin sticky after use. Will be great for normal / oily skin.Doesn’t have an SPF though ...However I returned this simply because my skin is dry and it’s not moisturizing enough. But if you just need the right amount of moisture, this is awesome.
Love the way this feels when it goes on. So lightweight and smooth. It is a great product.

this is my all time fave moisturizer! I have oily/combination skin and I’ve been using this forever, my skin always feels so soft and hydrated after using Clinique. This will always be my go to moisturizer.
love the lightweight feeling of this lotion. great for daily use on combo/oily skin. Skin feels cool and refreshed.
I really did want to love this product, but the results weren’t as great for me. I have very dry skin and it does not do much for me. My face still gets dry not long after application.

I love the gel texture. It drys very nicely. The original dramatically different lotion was slightly oily on me. I have combination skin that can either become more oily or dry depending on the season. This can be ever so slightly drying. I believe I will have to switch back to the original for winter. Great product for oily skin. Acts similar to a primer on skin.

I’ve been looking for a good moisturizer lately and found this and heard lots of good reviews and man I love it! I hate using lotion on my face just because it makes it more oily and I already have oily skin. I’m half way through with mines and will be purchasing another one soon:)
Very moisturizing without being greasy!

After the disappointing DDL, I actually decided to switch my regimen to oily combination since I noticed that my face was more oily in general, than dry. With that being said, I tried the gel, which I was skeptical at first. Well I can tell you, this is tons of times better than the DDL:1. Consistency-compared to the DDL, the gel moisturizer is light and somewhat slippery, but manages to absorb into my skin without any problems.2. Effectiveness- like I said before, the gel absorbs into my skin, without it leaving it slippery and irritated. My skin is soft, and smooth after using the lotion (toner) and soap which evidently is supposed to (dry) up the oily parts of the skin.Overall, I’d say even if you’re combination dry, you can use this gel!
review_title: If the lotion disappoints, this is your haven!

review_text: I absolutely love this gel moisturizer! I put about a nickel size amount, or even less I’m not even sure, every night before I go to sleep and when I wake up, my skin looks and feels great. Before I purchased this, I didn’t put anything on my face before I went to sleep which is pretty bad but now I make sure to always include this step. Amazing product!
Moisturizes without heavy feeling on skin.

This has to be the best moisturizer that I have ever tried. At first, it can be a bit drying but it’s because your skin isn’t used to it yet. Once it is, you’re skin begins to feel very hydrated without feeling greasy. I love it. It makes my skin feel baby soft

I originally tried this in the sample size since it had come in a kit i purchased earlier. I instantly fell in love. I have super dry skin, and this moisturizer does my skin justice. It is really soothing and has a great scent to it as well. Its a must have!
review_title: Plain and simple, the best moisturizer ever

review_text: This moisturizer feels amazing on the skin, absorbs fast, helps control my oily t-zone dying the day & the texture of my skin feels so much better!

My mom has serious combination skin - oily/shiny at 53 yrs old with red, scaly rosacea and bumps in some areas. She hates spending time and money on skin care or makeup, but this is the 1st better-brand product I’ve gotten her to actually buy on her own, because it is so gentle and effective. She likes how it smooths her skin before makeup application, and soothes it after cleansing.

I loved this the first week I started using this, but I began to notice my pores were becoming clogged where I would apply. The next day I woke up to terrible break outs that literally throb and hurt terribly bad. I wish I still had the receipt or box so I could return!
review_title: Did nothing but cause extreme acne

review_text: I have been a Clinique user for 15 years and everytime I try any other brand, despite of the reviews, I have to go back! This is really for sensitive skin and something girls with oily skin suffer, it is really not greasy. Disappears and does its job. I notice when I don’t use it. So I fully reccomend it. I use all the pre refining line and it’s also awesome. Poreless for real and most importantly, non clogging. Hope this helps! I have spent money in every oily skin brand out there and can tell you, it’s not worth it... Hope this helps!
review_title: A Must for oily and complicated skin

review_text: I have combination sensitive acne prone skin and this is the only moisturizer that does not cause me to break out. I have been using it for almost 10 years.

This is a perfect moisturizer for oily skin. It is very lighweight and does not sit on your skin. Your face absorbs it quickly. It is a great alternative to the Clinique Lotion which gets a lot more promotion over the gel. The lotion is too heavy for oily skin while the gel version is perfect. Like most Clinique products, there is no funky smell and it is well priced compared to other brands at Sephora. The only thing that would make this better is if it had SPF.
It’s very comfortable for my oily skin.I will keep using it.

I love this moisturizer!!! I have combination/oily skin and I’ve been looking for something that’s light but moisturizes. Not GREASY! Makes skin feel natural like there is no product on it which I love! Sets well with my make up too! I feel like my skin can breathe now. Very happy with this product!

I live in Hawaii and have oily to oily combo skin, depending on the weather or if I’m traveling. I like to use this moisturizer in the morning after washing my face because it soaks right in and doesn’t make my makeup slide all over. It isn’t enough moisture for my skin if it’s dry but on the average day when it’s not, I find this to be perfect. I like the pump feature on the larger size and I find the smaller, squeeze tube size to be perfect for my makeup bag and traveling. I will continue to repurchase this until I find something I like better.

I’ve used this ever since I got a hold of a sample from Clinique years ago. It moisturizes my skin well with only a small amount needed, and absorbs quickly. And if you ask me it gives you a nice plump effect. It’s my favorite moisturizer, great for the summer months.

I used this product for 1 week and I feel my face is drier and tighter than ever before. I have combination skin type. After applying the moisturizer, my t-zone area becomes flaky. Maybe this is too strong for me.

i recently bought this product after struggling to find a new liquid foundation that would last through out the whole day without budging or sliding off. I have super oily skin; about an hour after applying makeup it starts to slide off and cake up in certain areas. I randomly asked a makeup artist what I should do about my problem and she recommended this product under my makeup. Ive literally never felt so good about a product before! Seriously kept my makeup on all day long and not once did I have to reapply any powder or liquid. Deffinatly recommend to any girls who are going through the oil struggle! This has been my savior especially for those super hot days when your makeup is bound to slide off your face. Deff a MUST!

I’ve used Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizer for years. It’s always been the only product that truly effectively moisturizes my skin. I wanted to try the gel, however, because I started to notice that my combination skin was becoming increasingly oily, especially during summer months, and thought it would make sense to try this. I’m very happy that I did! It’s lightweight, non-greasy, and, as far as I could tell, doesn’t smell as bad as some other reviewers claimed. It’s a very, very effective moisturizer.
it keeps my skin hydrated all day. good base for make-up, i don’t even need primer when i have to rush.

This moisturizer is great if you have oily skin. As everyone should know, you need to moisturize even if you have oily skin to help balance out oil production. This leaves my skin soft and supple without that gross greasy feel. It also helps to control oil production throughout the day!

I used to buy this all the time to be my moisturizer. But I’ve become more skin conscious and would like an SPF moisturizer. While looking for a new moisturizer online someone stole mine from the dorm bathroom... hmm maybe a sign?! ;)
review_title: Used to be my go to- but no SPF

review_text: I have been using this moisturizer for about three years now and in my eyes, it is the best moisturizer on the market. It goes on smoothly and absorbs very quickly, it will leave your skin feeling refreshed. I use this along with the facial cleanser and toner in the 3-step system and will never use anything else.
It is so hard for me to find a moisturizer because my skin is oily and dry. The price on this is also fairly reasonable because a little goes a long way. Also good if you have sensitive skin!

I’m so glad that Clinique looks out for the oily skinned girls. There’s nothing worse that having oily skin and only being able to find moisturizers that feel thick and greasy. This gel moisturizer is so lightweight, it almost feels like I’m putting on a serum. It’s incredible!!

I can rave on and on about this product but here’s a short version:A little goes a really long way, so you don’t need to pump a whole lot to get that amazing texture. This gel immediately made my skin matte up, tighten up, almost leaving the skin feeling that squeaky clean resistance when you run your finger against it. It feels smooth, fresh, and oil free! Also, this product smells fantastic, really clean and the best part is that it feels like a real treat for my skin. Finally, this product glides right on, doesn’t feel like those thick creams that you slather on and take forever to dry. This one is super lightweight and keeps your skin bouncy.The bottle is also a great size. Large enough to last you a while and the pump works great to get you just enough. This got me to fall in love with Clinique.
review_title: Still In Love With this Product

review_text: I bought this bottle after trying on a sample of the lotion. I originally wanted to get the lotion but since I have oily and acne prone skin I heard this gel is the better option. Love how it moisturizes and love how my skin is so soft and flexible after applying and gives me a healthy glow when I put on my foundation after. I also like how it feels in the hand before I put it on.. Like a skin smoothie.
review_title: love it! dramatically awesome moisturizing gel

review_text: I have tried a bunch of different moisturizers that are designed for people with oily skin and nothing holds a candle to this one. I always end up coming back to this because it is amazing. It may seem a bit pricey, but the bottle should last you a while. My HG moisturizer.
review_title: Best for those of you with oily skin

review_text: This is an ok product. I have dry patches around my mouth and i have to double or triple apply for this to be “effective“. Is very good over my night time serum since it is not heavy. Next time i will try the creme not the gel. Maybe there will be some difference there.

I appreciate this moisturizer. While I don’t mind emollients like coconut oil or argan oil on my face, I like that DDML gel is fragrance free and oil free. I used moisturizers previously like Aveda Hydrating Lotion and Muji’s sensitive skin lotion, but Clinique’s DDML gel is my favorite. My skin feels smoother and less oily, and while phenoxyethanol or silcones are in this product, I’m willing to overlook these chemicals—you get what you pay for. I just can’t justify paying above $30 for a moisturizer, especially since I use DDML gel twice a day. Fortunately though, parabens seem to be missing from the ingredient list which is a good thing. And I can’t use mineral oil or petrolatum which is still in Clinique’s other formulation DDML+. Maybe if my skin was severely dry and I lived in a cold, dry climate. But DDML gel is perfect for southern california.DDML gel works best on cleansed and toned skin. I’m using Clinque’s mild clarifying lotion and it’s great with DDML gel. I’m experimenting with a retinol serum or a benzoyl peroxide topical in addition to DDML gel... so far so good. Also great with Shiseido suncreen on top.
Oily skinned gals unite! This is a must have along with many of their other products. It absorbs immediately and evens out skin tone. Feels so good on your skin. LOVE this stuff!
review_title: Your Skin Will Drink This Up!!

review_text: I’ve used so many expensive moisturizers but I have not found something that did wonders all the while being affordable. I love this stuff!
Great product! It leaves skin soft without oiliness.

I really liked this moisturizer until my skin started getting irritated and broke out. I have dry skin but it still tends to break out at times when I use something too strong on it, which may have happened in this case because of the very artificial ingredients. Overall, I wouldn’t recommend this for dry, sensitive skin.
I have combination skin and this stuff really helps me get the moister I need and controls oily throughout the day.
Second review for this product. Initially started with the smallest size, then moved up to the 4.2 oz and for the price, it lasts forever. I’ve had it for over a year now and I still have lots to go.
Feels great on, easy to use and affordable

Best moisturizer ever. Love the gel texture - soaks right into my skin and you can really your skin “drinking“ it up persay. I wear this alone and under my makeup and have noticed a dramatic different within a week. My skin is so much softer and luminous. This is a must buy.

I love, love, love this moisturizing gel! It’s one of my favorites...except for the price. It’s way too expensive! I recently bought the new clean & clear gel and it was just as good, for a fraction of the price
review_title: Great cream, a bit too expensive!

review_text: I’ve got combination skin so I need moisture with zero oil and this is the best I’ve used. I had it years ago and tried to go with cheaper products but fell in love with it again after getting a sample size of it. I use the Clinique clarifying lotion 3 and BareMinerals purifying cleanser for a balance between gentle and acne-fighting. The scent is light and doesn’t irritate my very sensitive skin. My skin feels great after my first week of use. Very worth the price, especially with the small amount you have to use.

i think it is a good moisturizer, but my super sensitive skin over reacts...i really tried to get used to it but i still have intense stinging feeling whenever i apply this...I really want to return it....
review_title: not for my super sensitive skin

review_text: I brought this with me on my cruise because I didn’t want to bring a full size jar of moisturizer. I love how this product hydrates my skin without making it oily. I have combo skin so this is perfect for me in the spring and summertime.
Love this gel, ran out while on vacation.

This gel is amazing! I have combination/oily skin an fever time I use it my skin feels much fresher and moisturized. It feels really light on the skin and works great! I will definitely be repurchasing!

I previously tried a sample of this product and chose not to purchase it because I was looking for something that would help to clear up my acne-prone combination/oily skin. I got my skin under control and I have changed up some of my other products, so I tried again and it works fabulously for me now. It is extremely lightweight and perfect for my summer skin. I have not broken out while using it. It did exactly what the product description says it will do and at a lower cost than many other products.
The first product that allowed me to have the perfect matte finish on my face. Makeup goes over smoothly, no caking, and no shine! Skin feels moisturized but not greasy. Great product.
WONDERFUL PRODUCT! ONLY BEEN USING IT FOR A FEW WEEKS NOW AND MY SKIN LOOKS RADIANT.,

This is one of the best moisturizers I’ver used. I normally won’t use moisturizers because I have extremely oily skin and they’re often too sticky and oily on me, which makes it too uncomfortable, but this one is perfect. It sets quickly and doesn’t feel think or oily at all.

Exactly what I was looking for - quick absorbing, lightweight, and affordable. It feels matte against my skin, and gives my dry skin the soft, supple look I wanted!The best part is the pump. It dispenses a perfect amount and keeps you from using too much (I’ve had the bottle for about a year now and I STILL have at least 1/4 left!), and I trust pumps significantly more than tubes or tubs. It doesn’t allow anything in, so I feel comfortable using a product that does not allow outside bacteria in.

I have combination-oily skin and this did absolutely nothing for me. It took ages to “sink into the skin“ and left my face looking like a shiny mess with dry patches here and there. I also tried the lotion in the winter for when my skin is dryer and that also did absolutely nothing! It also smells really bad.

This is a great moisturizer for combination skins: it does not make your face sticky, prevents shininess but still hydrates well. Makes your skin nice and soft.I love it, I wish Clinique was cruelty free though, which is probably why I won’t buy it again... too bad.

I absolutely love this. I have really crazy skin: I’m thirty now so I often have dry patches at different times of the year (I also live in Oklahoma, which has pretty loopy weather), I have cystic acne from my teenage years still, and in the summer I’m super-oily. This is one of the few moisturizers that work! Absorbs beautifully no matter my skin/the weather’s mood :)
review_title: Used for ten years and still love it!

review_text: Because I have oily skin, it’s hard for me to find moisturizers that don’t make me look like an oily, greasy mess. But this moisturizer is GREAT! It’s so lightweight, and sinks into my skin in under 20 seconds. There’s no oily residue left behind, and feels very soft after it dries. It also makes my makeup go on smoother, like a primer!I’ve used it for about 2 weeks, and agree with its claims. It has reduced redness, and made my very bad skin look much more presentable. It doesn’t clog my pores, either. I never thought I’d say this about a moisturizer, but I LOVE THIS! And the price is good, too. I used to use Shiseido, but they are way too expensive and not even as good as this. At least try the smaller, $14 dollar bottle to test it out if you’re skeptical. It is the best out there!

I’ve been using this for years and I am very satisfied and will still continue using this. I have oily skin and this product is non greasy and lightweight. I doesn’t clog my pores. I love this product.
not greasy but moisture enough and good for sensitive skinSince clinique is non-fragrance brand, It smells...not good
A great moisturizer! It feels wonderful on the skin, and doesn’t leave you with an oily looking sheen. Beware, no SPF though.

ive been using this moisturizer for quite a whlie now. i like that it’s nice and light weight because the thick ones just do NOT absorb into my skin. though i find it’s just a slight bit too light in the winter for those really dry skin patches. i have normal/slightly dry skin. the only thing i dont care for is it doesnt absorb RIGHT away but it does. but it provides great moisture, and my skin is soft and hydrated mostly. i do enjoy it, but i also am always looking around for new products to see if anything can beat it! 4 stars bc of the not absorbing so quickly and feels kinda “sticky“ after applying for a bit.
Refreshing, perfect for under a foundation or no foundaton! Moisturizes, not greasy, perfect for winter or hot hot summer weather. I use all year round. No fragrance, light, love it!
This item keeps your face moist, not oily. Great product.

I use this moisturizer every day. It is free hydrating, without making my face super oily. I love the feeling it gives my skin. It has also helped my acne problem decrease majorly, I don’t even have to use a facewash anymore! I love this moisturizer and will definately buy it again and I reccomend it to oily skin types indeed.

I have this a shot, and used it for about a month. I felt in order to actually moisturize my skin I had to smother my skin in it. I never truly felt it was absorbed, it felt like it was sitting on top as a nice “coating“. My face still had that “tight“ feeling even after letting it sit for a good 10-15 minutes. Just not for me I guess.

I have used the dramatically different moisturizer for years, but I started noticing oil build-up especially on my forehead lately. I switched to the Gel and its perfect. Just enough moisturizer without the oil.
review_title: Just like the Moisturizer with no oil

review_text: Back when my skin was oily-er this was a life saver for over 7 years! Even if you tend to break out this moisturizer will help your face feel calmer, softer, and suppler with out aggravating your break out. I wish I could find a moisturizer this wonderful for my combination skin. :(
review_title: So Wonderful For Oily Skin, A Must Buy!!!

review_text: I have oily skin, and this perfectly balances my skin. It prepares it for foundation in the mornings, and leaves it soft in the evenings after cleansing (sometimes followed by the Moisture Surge from Clinique). A little bit goes a long way, too, so I rarely buy more than the squeeze tube. Worth the money for this one!

I don’t really care for this, I like the lotion better. When i use the lotion i can just feel my skin drinking it in, when i put this on my skin still feels a little tight. I am still going to use it under my makeup, but I won’t rebuy it.

I used Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion in high school and through college. It has always been a reliable and effective lotion. When Clinique released the gel version I was ecstatic, as my face is combination-oily. It is a great moisturizer! Light-weight, fresh and even minimizes lines around the eyes. It also helps with sunburn and peeling.

Great lightweight moisturizer. I have combination-oily skin and this leaves my face feeling moisturized and fresh but not too oily. Sometimes my face wash can leave my face dry so before I put on foundation I put this on and it helps prime my face.
I have combination oily skin and this is light and non irritating while still giving a good setting for a liquid foundation.
pretty good as a moisturizer. I have sensitive skin which reacts to a lot of creams, but this one is safe to my skin

I had a very oily T-zone, and every time I put this on, my face would feel softer and moisturized. Also I have less breakouts (I didn’t have them often to begin with, but I still got pimples once in a while).But I recently found out this product had parabens. I have a 3.6 fl oz. one which I’m about 1/4 of the way through...as much as I love this lotion/gel, I don’t think I will get another once I’m done with the one I have. :(

Honestly, this is one of the best moisturizers for oily/combination teenage skin. Unlike most moisturizers that claim to be sensitive-skin-friendly, this one feels gentle when applied and glides onto your skin like a sheet of cashmere. I genuinely feel like it absorbs well into my skin best right after a good shower and scrub with my Mia. I’m not a big beauty hull genius, but I do recommend this moisturizer to anyone with sensitive, oily skin. Heck I gush about it to my friends too.
I love this lotion! Its not greasy at all and it soaks right into your skin

I’ve been using Clinique’s moisturizer FOREVER! When this formulation came out a few years ago, I gave it a try and love it. I use it sparingly since I am VERY oily (I mean VERY - and I’m 55!). It’s lightweight and does a nice job when I get flakey (insert joke here). I use it daily on my throat and around my eyes in addition to an eye serum. It’s nothing fancy, but does a nice job of moisturizing. Now if they’d only add an SPF it would be a 5-star product. If you want a simple moisturizer without bells and whistles, this stuff is for you.
I love the gel formula. It is so moisturizing but absorbs quickly. Great for my dry/normal skin.
I had,the sample before purchasing. Its nice and light. Refreshing gel is unscented. This would be good for sensitive skin.

This is the perfect warm weather moisturizer. Deliciously light weight but you don’t have to use more than a small amount for all day. I use this for a night time moisturizer all year and for daytime in the warmer months because it is non greasy.
A nice light moisturizer that doesn’t make me break out. Doesn’t do anything drastic, but for the price, you cant beat this. Goes on light & smooth, doesn’t clog poors & works well under makeup.

I purchased this because I recived it a a free sample before and I was impressed so I had to buy the bigger bottle. it is a very lightweight gel and great for oily/combo skin. sinks right in and does not leave a greasy feel behind. non irritating. no smell and has been great fo my sensitive skin. also I use the oily facial soap and acne cladifying lotion before hand. and I will use the scrub three times a week. a little goes a longway as well. highly recomend.

I went from using a drugstore-brand moisturizer to this Clinique Gel, and I’m so glad that I did! This moisturizing gel does exactly what I want it to do, without over-moisturizing and causing excess oil. It absorbs into my skin so quickly, without ever making me feel dry. Because I have combination oily skin, I’ve sometimes struggled with finding a moisturizer that didn’t make me feel like a greaseball, but this does exactly what I want it to. Plus, it’s super affordable, considering some of the other moisturizers Sephora sells. Overall, a great product, but if you’re looking for something with a deeper moisture-factor, I’d recommend trying the Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, or the Korres Greek Yoghurt Advanced Nourishing Sleeping Facial.

I’ve been on the search for the right moisturizer for the longest time. I have combo oily skin (mostly oily in my t-zone and cheek area), as well as sensitive skin. So I thought Clinique would be perfect since it combats all of those areas. Apparently, that’s not the case. I’ve used this product from winter through spring and in both cases, it has dried out my skin. In the winter, I saw small dry patches in my drier areas of my face. And currently, my upper t-zone is the place that’s a bit dry. If i put on too much, I feel as if I have a mask on. Too little, and my face is too dry (and eventually oily...). No matter how much I apply to face, I’m just not a happy camper.
review_title: Not what I thought it'd be.

review_text: DDM is my soulmate. I have been using this product for 15 years.. recommended from my mom. She also uses it too.Texture of cream is light and skin absorb the cream real good.
love this! i’ve been using for over a year & it feels smooth, light and gives fabulous moisture. great for my oily skin!

As you may know, Clinique is not the greatest about making its ingredients known for its products. So I am here to tell you that this oil-free moisturizer includes sodium hyaluronate, which I understand to be the same thing as hyaluronic acid. HA draws water to the skin, at least in non-dry climates. Haven’t used it long enough yet to give it 5 stars, but I am hopeful!
review_title: It has hyaluronic acid! (a good thing)

review_text: I have combination skin and get hives at the drop of a hat. I have used probably every lotion, moisturizer, gel,and oil on the market. This is my most favorite ever! It’s more than a moisturizer. It actually calms my skin when it’s inflamed and itchy.
Keeps my skin hydrated without being oily or greasy. My face looks matte all day long. Goes great under makeup and iver sunscreen.
This moisturizer is my absolute favorite. Moisturizes well without leaving me oily or breaking me out
This moisturizer is the best one out there.

I love this gel moisturizer. I use it in the morning and it does not feel too greasy nor heavy. It is prefect for my combination skin. I did not buy Step One or Step Two but will be trying the whole skin care system now since this gel works so well for me.
My face feels so soft!!

This did absorb quickly into my skin but I felt it did absolutely nothing for me. I have combination skin, but get a little oily as the day goes on around my t-zone. I have switched to the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion and that has been perfect for me.

I was super excited about trying this moisturizer since I love Clinique products and the reviews on this one were so positive, but I was not impressed. Like a lot of others reviews state, I was quick absorbing, BUT for me and my combination/oily skin as soon as warm weather approaches this makes me SUPER oily later in the day. Winter months not really an issue, but I don’t think I’ve ever seen my face get that shiny later in the day. I’m talking so shiny I used blotting paper multiple times a day and still fell like my face was covered in oil. Won’t be repurchasing.

I have tried so many moisturizers that left me feeling greasy and lotion-y. This absorbs into the skin so quickly and leaves me naturally matte all day without looking dull. I’ve tried the dramatically different moisturizing lotion thinking I could trick my skin into thinking it was hydrated enough however the lotion still felt too, wet(?) on my skin. It’s better for dry skin. This moisturizer keeps my makeup for greasing over since it’s so lightweight! I HIGHLY recommend this product for people with oily skin. My t-zone still gets oily, but I think that is inevitable for me. I rather have a slightly oily t-zone than my whole face! If you have combination skin I believe this will work perfectly!
Love this moisturizer. I have super oily skin and 95% of moisturizers make my face greasy within 5 minutes.

I have very oily skin and this is a great moisturizer. I am able to use one pump during the day if I wait a while for it to soak in before I apply my makeup. At night, I use two pumps and wake up with my skin feeling very hydrated. Great product
Does the $36 one gonna come out soon again????

This is very lightweight and it absorbs quickly into the skin. It never leaves me that oily feeling that most moisturizers give me -- which I love. Perfect for the summer! However, it doesn’t feel as moisturizing sometimes.
I have very oily skin and this lotion doesn’t make me as shiny as most moisturizers...buuuuut it caused my face to break out. So I’m a quite a bit disappointed.
I love gel better than lotion. It’s not oil.
I have used this product for a long time and like it very much.The gel is helpful for those of us with combination skin that breaks through shiny on noses and foreheads.

I used to use the lotion/creme version of this and it made my skin SO oily that I abandoned the clinique moisturizer all together for 8 years and did not look back until I noticed that there was a gel version for oily skin.. and it is WAY BETTER for my skin than the original formula.It’s not very moisturizing but does give moisture for when my skin is behaving (not super dry/flaky). I suffer from acne and use alot of topical treatment and with the flakiness that comes with using acne medication, this is not moisturizing enough so I use the Egyptian Magic Cream at night to combat the dryness and use clinique during the day once the flakiness has subsided. For people with near-to-normal skin/oily skin it will work for minimal moisturization. For dry/flaky skin, look for something else to use in combination or separately altogether.

I used to use this product when i was in high school, but then left it behind and started using drugstore moisturizers. I had a gift card and Sephora was doing 15% off so I decided to go for it... and i still like it, just how i remembered! I have fairly oily skin and this does not leave me greasy, but still does it’s job!
So far so good. It is no too moisturizing. Good for my combination skin in the summer.
Love this moisturizer! Great for combo or oil skin- gives just enough moisture to be absorbed without resulting in a greasy film. Would not recommend to dry skin types.

I switched from the lotion to the gel because I have combination skin. They are definitely different in terms of the texture, smell, and the effect on my skin. I get a burning sensation and the gel actually dehydrates my face. I gave it a week’s try...Definitely switching back to the lotion - hopefully I can get an even exchange for this.
review_title: Not as compatible as originally thought...

review_text: I have been in search of a product that will keep me from ending up a hot oily mess. I’ve tried different foundations, moisturizers, powders...and although some worked for a bit I would still end up extremely shiny or with my makeup melted off. I saw all the good reviews from this and decided to try it out. The first few days I tried it dried me out and at the end of my work shift I would have flakes. Then I decided to put moisturizer* on first and then layer the gel over it. It made all the difference. My skin looks amazing with extremely minimal shine, almost like I just put my makeup on. That’s a miracle considering I made it though an entire shift as a server.*In case you’re wondering, I use First AId Beauty Daily Face Cream.
review_title: Keeps me from being an oil slick!

review_text: I bought a bottle 2-3 months ago and I’m still using the same bottle. I personally think that it’s worth it. With the sale sephora was doing last week (25%off) I bought another bottle. It’s a moisturizer I’m not afraid of using. It soaks into my skin really quick and it feels really light after applying.
My skin is no longer dry, the moisturizer is not greasy at all

My facialist insists that I moisturize, even tho’ I’m 60 and haven’t a wrinkle on my face because of PCOS hyper-oiliness. I’m trying this as an alternative to the really expensive stuff the facial spa sells and the drugstore hydrating gel I’m not sure I want to use up. My brother-in-law was a dermatologist and he liked the Clinique products. The word out there is that this is good stuff. I’m hoping.
Love this product. I have oily skin and this product complements it well! Its light and gets the job done and doesn’t leave my face feeling greasy a few hours later.
I love this moisturizer. I have very oily skin but it doesn’t irritate that problem or cause breakouts. I repurchase this every time I run out and can’t imagine being without it.

really great! im a person with extremely oily skin and i would shade in my eyebrows and by 2 or 3 hours passing they were would be smudge all over the brow area . with oily skin all over my face not just my t-zone. but when i used Cliniqe by the end of the day my eyebrows looked perfect the way i left them!! and my face would still be a bit oily at the end of the day but i was a great help

I’m super oily in my t-zone and bone dry in the cheek area, so this is like a dream for me. Lightweight, no smell, absorbs quickly and oil-free, yet moisturizing enough for my cheeks. I have the tube for travel and pump for home.
I’ve used a lot of really expensive moisturizers, but this one is really great. It’s so lightweight, doesn’t have a strong smell and works well on my combination skin. If only there was SPF in it!

Look no further, this is simply the best moisturizer for combination/oily skin. It leaves skin super soft, shine free and it even controls my acne breakouts. If you have normal to dry look for the lotion version of this moisturizer, the gel is not for you.
review_title: The BEST moisturizer for oily skin

review_text: It’s a great product, light weight and moisturize and friendly price. Highly recommend in the summer, but I would like to have something more moisturized in winter,
review_title: All the time favorite except for winter time

review_text: I have all over oily skin on my face with large pores. I had used the lotion version of this and was not impressed in years past. I had a slow reaction time, but when I realized that the gel version was available, and recommended for oily skin, I hastened to get a sample. It works perfectly well.I apply after my shower (and toner) in the morning, and let absorb for about 5 minutes before I put on my makeup. I can’t say that it prevents my skin from being oilier, because I am still shiny after about 3-4 hours (I have embraced this about myself), but it doesn’t make it worse that’s what I was looking for when I purchased this.
review_title: Works well for my oil slick of a face

review_text: I was getting extremely dry flaky patches but I also have oily acne-prone skin. This seriously helped with the dry patches but it doesn’t make my skin oily at all or break me out and it absorbs quickly and feels great. As a plus the packaging is really nice.

I LIVE IN A VERY HUMID AREA AND HAVE OILY SKIN. I GAT A FACAIL RECENTLY AND THE GIRL TOLD ME THAT MY SKIN IS VERY DEHYDRATED. I WAS SURPRISED BECAUSE I DRINK PLENTY OF WATER AND USE DAILY MOISTURIZER. YET I HAVE DEHYDRATED SKIN. DECIDED TO TRY CLINIQUE I FOUND IT AT A LOCAL OUTLET STORE FOR A LITTLE CHEAPER PRICE.IT ABSORBS QUICLY AND DOESN’T LEAVE MY SKIN SHINY. I CAN FEEL MY SKIN MORE HYDRATED AND LUMINOUS NOW THAT BEFORE
This is by far my favorite moisturizer on the market. My skin is completely natural so this lotion leaves my skin not too oily but evenly moisturizes
Works magic for me :)

I used this for a couple years during spring/summer, because it was Clinique and less expensive than other moisturizers, but it just doesn’t do much for the skin. Moisturizes for a little while, but nothing in there to really improve the skin.
You dont need a lot, a small amount get’s the job done. Feels light compared to the lotion version.
I lives in Brazil where the skin is always oily because of the hot wether. So, for our climate, this is the better moisturizing I’ve ever tryed. I always buy a new one when my is going to finish.

i’ve been using this moisturizer for a couple years now. it’s my favourite because it absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling and it keeps my skin hydrated.i have combination skin and this is the perfect product for me.

If you have oily skin, this is a MUST HAVE product. Every other moisturizer I’ve used (even ones that claim to be oil-free) has left my skin feeling greasy and clogged. This gel moisturizer is the only one that truly feels lightweight, does not clog my pores, does not give me breakouts, soaks in immediately and smoothly, and never leaves my skin feeling greasy. I use a heavier moisturizer at night because I use a lot of acne products that severely dry out my oily skin, but I use this every morning and it works like a charm.I will say, though, that this is a moisturizer intended for oily skin. If you have dry skin, this will do little for you. If you really struggle with dryness, you’ll need a stronger product, but if you have oily/combination skin and just need a light moisturizer to even out skin and keep it looking healthy, this is the perfect product.

I have been using clinique products for over 7 years and started out with the 3-step system and while I have tried a number of products over the years I always go back to clinique. This small size is great if you are just wanting to try product or for travel.

I wasn’t expecting much from just using a daily moisturizer twice a day just from changing to a gel but over the past 3 weeks my skins texture has become smoother and less acne has shown up. I used to use lotion moisturizer but they’ve always clogged my skin. The gel has been such a great change.

I really like this product. I’ve always had positive experiences with anything from Clinique. I have relatively clear skin, with few breakouts. During the winter months though, my skin tends to be a little on the dry side though. I don’t usually like putting lotion on my face but this doesn’t make my skin feel oily or anything like that. i will definitely buy it again.
review_title: Makes My Skin Feel so Soft

review_text: I have combination skin and I have been pleased with this moisturizer. It hasn’t caused breakouts or increased oiliness in my T zone.

I have sensitive skin and this moisturizer provides enough nourishment with out causing break outs. I tend to react badly to anything to rich yet my skin is super dry in the winter. On days where its extra bad I use this and then a nightime cream to sleep in.

tried the lotion before which didn’t work that well so i thought the gel might be better for me - sad to report that i wasn’t that impressed with this product. i had random patches of dry skin on my face (which was primarily why i bought this) that this product did nothing for. maybe if you have a different skin type it’d be great
have been using for years. i love it. Perfect for senstive skin or oily skin.
I have oily skin, this is the only product that can soften my skin without the excess oil!
Lightweight yet moisturizing. Doesn’t break out my combination skin.

I have always had a problem with moisturizing my skin because it does get dry after I wash it but it gets oily so quickly--especially if I use a moisturizer. This gives me the perfect amount of moisture while without any heaviness and, I might be imagining things, but I feel like it actually keeps my skin from getting too oily throughout the day. I use it every day and am done looking for other moisturizers.
This gel is amazing. Glides on and moisturizes instantly. Love it. Would recommend.

I love the cool feeling I get when I put it on! It goes on nicely and sets really fast too. I don’t have to wait long for it to absorb before I go out or put some make up on. It’s perfect for hot weather too because I don’t feel like it’s going to make my face super oily.

I had a small 1.7oz travel size that was nearing the end after 4-5 months and decided to finally buy this in the 4oz size. I like how it is moisturizing enough for the dryer portions of my face, but not too much to make me oily. i love the gel consistency, if im feeling a little more dry then i just add more and it doesn’t effect the application of my makeup. Occasionally in the summer, i will alternate between this and my super light fresh face lotion when it becomes super hot. best of all, it is SO affordable and im sure this size will last me a really long time.
Moisturizing and Hypoallergenic
I love how it feels on my face. A little goes a long way.

This is a miracle moisturizer! I absolutely love it and anyone who is thinking about getting this moisturizer definitely should! It absorbs so quickly and it feels so great on my skin. I have very oily skin and this does not enhance my oily skin but makes my skin look fabulous! I will be using this moisturizer probably for the rest of my life.
I did not have high expectations for this gel. However, after I started using it, I realized that it is the best moisturizing gel!

I used this because I have sensitive skin, and it did nothing for my face. In fact, my complexion looked a lot more dull when using this, which is a pity as I thought something more ’high end’ would do wonders for my skin. I bet it works well for several people, but personally it did nothing.
review_title: Did absolutely nothing for my face

review_text: Good lotion for oily skin, keeps if from getting dry, but does not make my skin oily.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for over two years and dont really think there is a better product for my oily combination skin.It controls perfect the shine in my face.Would be better with some spf; thats why im givin only 4 stars.

This gel actually balances me out rather than makes me feel like there’s a film of grease on my face! I love using this for day time use because it absorbs well into the skin and makes my face feel refreshed and balanced. I don’t think it’s good enough as a night moisturizer however, at least not for me. But I’m definitely going to repurchase this when I run out!

I find that this moisturizer did not penetrate my skin. It has a gel texture that would just sit on top of my skin all night long. It did not however broke me out. It’s good for someone who is looking for a basic moisturizer but I would prefer something that has some anti aging and/or brightening properties.

I have sensitive acne prone skin, and this is the only moisturizer that doesn’t break me out or clog my pores. I have tried numerous drugstore products, and while this is pricier, it is definitely worth it. It makes my skin feel soft and smooth and doesn’t make it oilier. I just wish I had tried this sooner, as my skin has cleared up so much since using this. Also, it lasts a long time, my bottle lasted nearly 6 months using every day and night.
This is a good moisturizer for oily skin. It’s the only one my husband will use because it’s fragrance free.

I normally have trouble finding a good moisturizer because of my oily skin, this has done a perfect job smoothing out my skin and moisturizing without oiling up my face. NO MORE SHINE FOR ME. CLINIQUE 1 - 2 -3 FOR OILY SKIN IS THE BEST.

I accidentally ordered this moisturizer, not realizing that it is intended for oily skin....and my skin is very dry, sensitive and OLD. I hesitated even trying it, rather than returning, but I started using it and LOVE it. My skin is moisturized, even in this un-ending winter cold. It is a little less creamy than the other lotion, but the gel consistency moves around very easily and is definitely non-greasy. Good stuff!

I love this stuff. I got it as a sample a few times then decided to buy it. It works great for my skin type. My skin starts off dry then gets oily quickly and most lotions/moisturizers are too oily for me. This gel is very light weight, absorbs quickly and leaves my skin very smooth and soft.

After years of going through just about every drugstore brand supposed oil-free moisturizer I just about gave up. I decided to try this after seeing a couple of good reviews on it. It’s a decent price (IMO) at about $35 for 4 ounces. Yes there are less expensive things out there but I would rather pay this knowing I’m no longer an oil slick! I think I’ve found my HG moisturizer. I know my skin may change later on but for now I’ll never give this up!!

I have oily combo skin and i never preferred wearing any sort of moisturizer on my face as i would grease out more. Since i was young i used to see my mother putting this on (the cream version) i tried a couple of times then and i felt great on the skin. When the gel formulation came it was perfect for my skin type. A little goes a long way for me and it applies well over the face, very light weight,moisturizers and a good primer too. I did not face any greasing out later .
Very good! although after a few hours it leaves my skin with a little bit weird like open, i dont if its because of working or else, the thing is that after a few hours my face is greasy

Great moisturizer! I mix it with a few drops of Argan oil at night, and it makes my skin feel fantastic. I’m withholding one star because this isn’t a “changed my life“ product. It’s a good moisturizer. I might repurchase for use in summertime.

I’ve never been a fan of moisturizers (or even BB creams, for that matter) because I feel like as soon as I put it on my face has an almost greasy sheen to it. I was looking for something lightweight, that would absorb quickly into the skin, and this is just that product. Wish I could give 6 stars.

Been using Clinique 3-step for over 15 yrs and couldn’t have been happier when they came out with DDMG. This Moisturizing Gel is the best for oily skin, even in hot climates (I lived in the desert for 10 yrs.) It’s lightweight, soaks into your skin and leaves it feeling soft and smooth. It is not a heavy moisturizer by any stretch. Can’t be without it.

This stuff is amazing! Before I started using this cream, I had no idea something could exist that would moisturize my face while keeping it oil free. The gel is very light, and as soon as you put it on it disappears into your skin. This is perfect to have underneath foundation since it doesn’t make your face oily at all.I’m so happy I found this and I just ordered the larger size!
I have oily skin, and this gel is the best. Gives me the moisture I need, but doesn’t leave a greasy residue. It’s fantastic!

I have been using this product for years and don’t plan on changing it any time soon. I have an oily T-zone and dry areas on my cheeks so this lightweight formula doesn’t feel heavy on the oily areas and adds moisture where it is needed. It spreads easily too so a little goes a long way. Getting the bottle with the pump is also a fun and convenient little feature.
Very light but very moisturizing. Only need a small amount.
I ave been using this product for over 10 years!! I cannot use anything else!!

I have an oily T-zone and dry cheeks and this product works perfect...I love how thin and lightweight this is...Thin as we say - i can add fillers, concealers, primers, foundations added without feeling one more layer of extra cake...the only downside is that it doesn’t have SPF... So be careful to add another layer of sun protection...my skin looks a lot better over the year...

I was looking for a product that would moisturize and help control my oily face. This has really done this! It’s a gel and it soaks into my skin and I don’t find myself getting as oily through the day. It feels really good on the skin and it seems to play well under my BB Cream. I will buy this again.
I love the feel of this lotion. The gel texture goes on so smoothly and it feels light on my skin. I mix it with my Retin A and it works wonderfully.
I had originally bought the 3 pc cleansing system with the small cleanser and moisterizing gel in it.I LOVED the moisterizer so I had to order a large size.Makes my face feel smooth and soft.

I have combination oily skin and this product is great! I use it as part of the 3-step system and it soothes the skin after toning. It doesn’t leave my skin oily and absorbs quickly. Best of all, the large size has a pump that controls the amount that comes out. One pump usually does the trick for me. Best product for your money.
This product doesn’t work for my skin type as I am sensitive and this overly dried my face
review_title: it really is only for combination/oily skin types

review_text: Love this stuff. Oil-free, lightweight gel that does a thorough job of moisturizing. If you’ve tried the Dramatically Different Moisturizing LOTION and hated it, this is WAYYYY different. Not even close. LIke it states, it’s good for combination and oily skin. Since I myself have combination, I find that sometimes, like at the driest times of winter, this is not quite enough for my face and I have to use a heavier moisturizer around my mouth and eyes (where I’m not as oily). For most of the year though, this is my guy!

Definitely the best moisturizing cream/gel I have ever used (it’s actually a yellowish cream, but that’s just semantics). It literally glides onto your skin as you apply it and is very quickly absorbed. Your face feels so smooth afterwards (no oily residue at all) and is prepped and ready for foundation.I used to use CeraVe for all my skincare needs. Always had dry skin, used to struggle with acne, and saw the dermatologist frequently. Cerave is usually the over- the-counter go-to brand for face washes and moisturizing creams. BUT I am now a huge fan of Clinique products, especially this moisturizing gel. You won’t regret buying it.

I’ve been searching for the perfect moisturizer for my combination, acne-prone skin and I think this is it. It’s lightweight, doesn’t break me out and doesn’t burn or smell weird like some drugstore products. It’s expensive but reliable and basic and definitely beats looking continuously for something that ends up burning my sensitive skin or breaking me out. I use this with Dr Jart’s BB PA+++ cream and love it!
I got this once on a whim. I love the gel since it’s not as greasy as the lotion. It suits my oily skin perfectly. It might seem a little pricey, but it’s worth it!
I have very sensitive, oily skin and eczema to boot and this stuff really works for me. it keeps my skin hydrated and soft all day long.

My mom has been using the Clinique dramatically different moisturizer for dry skin. My skin is combination to oily and found out that they have one for my type of skin, so i bought it but have not started using it until I ran out of my philosophy moisturizer. The first time i used it, I liked it right away because it absorbs immediately and doesn’t make my face oily or shiny. With regular use, I noticed that it doesn’t make me break out too! I found a great moisturizer that is compatible with my combination skin type and prone to break outs.

I have oily skin, so I bought the gel (instead of the lotion) and it makes my skin hydrated and smooth. I apply it in the morning, and it keeps my skin soft throughout the day. Unfortunately, I still need to use blotting tissues after several hours (as there is no oil reduction with use of this product), but I still love it and have made it part of my morning routine. I am also happy that it is reasonably priced, and that you need to apply very little of it with each use (as it spreads easily).
I have oily skin. On a typical day, my face greases up like a pizza. After adding the moisturizing gel to my morning regimen, it keeps me noticeably matte and oil free longer throughout the day.

I’m giving this only 2 stars because it didn’t accommodate my entire face. I recently switched to this from the DD Lotion. My forehead and nose are extremely oily while my cheeks are extremely dry. Therefore I have to use a combination of the two moisturizers. But even then, my forehead and nose dries out about 10 minutes after using DD Gel even when I use two pumps. I’m not completely satisfied but it’s the only thing that’s not making my face become a grease pan.

There is pretty much nothing I can find wrong with this product. I’m only 20 years old, but I try to take care of my skin by moisturizing every night and morning, but usually moisturizers are either too “weak“ to use at night and I my face feels dry the next morning, or they’re too heavy and I can’t use it in the morning under my makeup. This moisturizer is just perfect in that I use it morning and night and my skin has actually improved in appearance. My skin just looks healthier since I’ve started using this product.I was actually surprised because it is just a basic moisturizer, but it outperforms all other anti-aging, super duper fancy moisturizers.Also, I wouldn’t say that I typically have oily skin (other than my t zone, but who doesn’t get oily there?) but this moisturizer has definitely helped with what oiliness I do have.

I have extremely (!!!) oily skin and i do have breakouts around my time of the month. This product is incredible! I can’t believe how much it has helped my skin. I rarely get breakouts now, my scars from previous acne are gone (i can actually walk out of the house with no foundation). Its lightweight, doesn’t feel heavy at all, doesn’t sit on your skin. I’ve been on the hunt for a cream for my oily skin and this one is it. I won’t ever buy anything else.
review_title: Oily /Acne Prone Skin?? You NEED this!

review_text: I love this lotion it absorbs right into my skin without leaving a film or greasy feeling. I am very picky about what I put on my face and this lotion has been my go to product for 10 years now.

The first time I used this, I gave up because it started making me breakout. However, I went on it again two weeks ago and I realized that I just had to wait a couple of weeks in order for my skin to get used to the products and now all my breakouts have healed! IT truly is moisturizing. I use the clarifying lotion before I massage this on so my skin dries out. This makes my skin feel so smooth and shine free throughout the day! Definitely will repurchase!

I’ve used Oil of Olay daily SPF moisturizer from the age of 12 to 26. It made me shiny but otherwise did the job, until recently, when my skin suddenly decided it didn’t like this product any longer. I picked up this Clinique moisturizing gel and I’ve found it to be light, soothing, quickly absorbed, and just enough hydration for my combination-oily skin. This has been a life-saver for my suddenly changing skin.

I used this for years. It’s not irritating and great for daily use. I wish they had a version with SPF. I don’t find it moisturizing enough now, but the lotion version just doesn’t seem as good. If you have combo-normal skin, I highly suggest.
This is the perfect moisturizer for my oily combination sensitive skin. I like a nice light moisturizer that absorbs quickly and this one fits the ticket. It’s amazing!

I think this moisturizer really does help dry skin. I have oily skin and I do find that when I use this product I get really oily. But, that’s just me. I have extremely oily skin. But it does help the dryness, which is the point to it. I don’t think my skin is “dramatically different“ at all though.
I love this produced have used many expensive products and ... Still keep going back to this one.... Because it works best for my combination skin.
Absolutely in love! I feel a difference in my skin and its hasn’t even been 2 weeks. Price is amazing considering what I was paying for other brands.

This is my favorite moisturizer EVER. I have combo/oily skin, and this does wonders. It’s light and provides just enough hydration for your skin. Since everything Clinique produces is free of dyes and perfumes, this is definitely for anyone who has experienced irritation with other facial moisturizers.

I have used the Clinique 3-step since I was a teenager and love the gel version of Step 3. I actually stopped using Step 2 because the alcohol was very drying. So the Clinique cleanser, followed by this gel, was my morning and nighttime routine for years.Now with my maturing skin I use a couple other products as well but still stick with the gel for quick moisturizing. In the NY dry winters, I need to use an additional moisturizer if I’m going out, but otherwise, this delivers a cooling, refreshing, softening feeling. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t feel sticky or greasy- really different an much better than any other facial lotion I’ve used. My skin is soft to the touch and the Clinique cleanser & this gel both keep my skin free of breakouts.Whenever I’ve tried to switch up my routine too much, it’s caused breakouts- my skin is sensitive and I have large pores which are prone to clogging, but this is so light that I never have a problem with it.My only regret is that I always buy the 1.7 oz size (the tube is just so much more convenient and travel-friendly) but the 4.2 oz size is such better value!

I’m still trying to find the perfect moisturizer! This is definitely not it. I like the lightness of it, but I have combo skin with an oily tzone and it leaves the dry parts of my skin wanting more moisture. I’ll go through this bottle and search for something better.

was recommended this product due to my combination skin. The packaging is simple and easy to use. It spreads easily on the skin, and is absorbed quickly. Skin after application initially felt strange, but after a few weeks of use, skin feels noticeably softer and more supple. Highly recommend

I mean, the review title says it’s all. My face gets chapped in the winter around my nose and cheek area. My face can get combination oily on off-days though, so using the gel moisturizer doesn’t overwhelm those patches of my skin. Overall, my skin feels nicely balanced now that I’ve started using this when I wake up and before I go to sleep.Plus, it’s great under makeup. Dreamy smooth.

This provides a great shot of moisture for oily skin! It’s oil free so it won’t clog your pores, but it helps moisturize any dry spots. I have acne-prone skin, but this certainly helps because it’s so light and does not irritate my skin!

I got this and use it twice a day. I have combo skin and my prescription acne face wash dries me out but after adding this to my regimen my skin is no longer dry and flaky and my dark spots from acne scaring have faded. It’s worth every penny and then some

I’ve used this product for years and it is the only moisturizer I can depend on to moisturize my skin and not leave a greasy residue. It absorbs, feels fresh and just makes my skin feel like its hydrated with no extra layer. VERY RELIABLE.

This product is pretty great at moisturizing my dry areas and not causing me to be ultra-oily in the T-zone.I only use step 1 and 3 of their “3step system“ and this works fine for me. the second step of exfoliating I do while i use the soap with a face brush, so I just don’t need it.I wish that all sizes were just tubes and not the pump, I think the tube works better with this product.

I adore this product! I have very oily skin and have tried lots of different products to get rid of my acne, I have the clearest skin I have ever had. And this is part of my daily routine. It is not super intensive, but for oily skin, it’s great!

I have very dry/combination skin. I have a very oily T-zone and my cheeks tend to become very dry and flake off in the winter. I have tried this moisturizer on several occasions and it does not feel hydrating whatsoever. It is very light, but it does not moisturize my skin at all. I do have difficult skin so it might work well for others, but it’s just not for me. I prefer Boscia’s Black Hydration Gel which is incredibly moisturizing and cooling.

Every winter my face flakes all over, and I had no relief until purchasing this product. One pump seems to give little product, but it’s just enough to moisturize my whole face. It’s well-worth the price, and I’ll be purchasing again. With the added bonus of refilling my container.

I love this product and rely on it as my daily moisturizer year round. I have oily skin in the summer and dry skin with t-zone oil in the winter. This always feels soothing yet never feels greasy. Perfect!
review_title: Wonderful Go-To Moisturizer for Oily or Combo Skin

review_text: This is the ONLY moisturizer that works for my dry skin! I tried the Clinique DD lotion but prefer the gel. Price is good for the amount you get. This gel is a lifesaver during the winter when my skin gets extra dry! Definitely a must-have product-I use it every day!

I used to use the pink moisturizer from Clinique and really loved it for the very dry parts of my skin. It was a little too pricey for me though and this was suggested as an alternate. Works great. I have combination skin and this is not too greasy for the oily areas and moisturizes well in the dry areas. It soaks in quickly and feels fresh. I’d definitely recommend it.

I have been using this gel for about a month now and it has really helped with keeping my combo/oily skin under control. I use this morning and night along with the first two steps the cleanser and the toner. It has really made a difference.This gel has a great texture and goes on smooth without that greasy leftover residue that lotion left on my skin. After I put this gel on it absorbs really fast and leaves my skin feeling smooth and hydrated. I love the light texture and the smell. Which I’m not sure how to describe besides saying that it’s just a fresh scent. I bought the biggest size of this lotion when Sephora was running the double points offer on all skincare. I had the 1.7 size before and it lasts a long time. A little goes a long way.I also haven’t had any breakouts since using this. Sometimes when I start something new with my skin I get a small breakout on my chin or forehead. That hasn’t happened with this gel. If you have combo/oily skin you need to buy this and give it a try. There’s a reason Clinique has been around as long as they have.

I think that it’s a great product and it moisturizes without leaving any residue behind, y’know, like that kind of feeling like there’s something still on your face. I feel like with my dry skin, I may need something a little more moisturizing. However, this is not a bad product at all! It definitely lives up to its hype.

Overall a good moisturizing face lotion. It is called ’gel’, but it is more of a blend between a lotion and a gel. It is quite thick and feels a little bit like a mask when you put it on, but after about 20 seconds it will dry and then you do not feel it. It definitely helps my dry skin, especially in the dead of winter in new england. I am happy with my purchase.
Great product--have been using for 5+ years. Best moisturizer I’ve used for my oil skin! Doesn’t make your skin feel slick, and layers well with primers and foundation!

Where do i begin? If your looking for a moisturizer for oily skin, stop here! I CANNOT EXPRESS HOW MUCH I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It soaks into your skin in a minute, makes your face SO SOFT, oh and also mattifys your face! I bought the large size, it’s such an amazing deal! Clinique never has put me down! LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!

I’m a big fan and have been using this product for a few years. I have problematic skin, and this seems to make it happy for the most part. I tend to break out, and I don’t think this exacerbates that. I mix it w/ Clinique BB cream, and this works really well for moisture and light coverage. My only complaint is that it’s hard to get the last bit out of the bottle w/ the pump.
I love this gel!! I was using a lotion that I really liked but it was much more expensive. This gel gives me the same results at a much better price.
I like this much better than the lotion for my oily skin. It gives me the same moisturizing effect without the oiliness I would feel by mid-day. I wish there was some SPF in it, but oh well...
I use this moisturizer every day, and I love being able to slap it on and go. I have very oily skin and this is the only product I found to help keep my skin soft while not causing oily buildup.
review_title: Simple Daily Care for Oily Skin!

review_text: This is the first higher end moisturizer I have used. So far, it’s been a good experience. I feel like it goes on easily, doesn’t feel heavy and it works. I haven’t had any breakouts since using it which is great since I have really oily skin and I am prone to acne. The only issue I have with it is the fact that I do have to use a little more around the sides of my mouth because I still tend to be a little dry, but it’s easy to fix. It works well with my primer (Too Faced) and at the end of the day I don’t feel like my make up looks awful :)

This is a nice lightweight moisturizer. It does an okay job, but I didn’t find it was the best thing for my oily skin. I prefer Boscia Black Gel moisturizer. I feel like this one caused me to be more shiney then I would have liked.

i love this moisturizer because it’s not too oily-ish “feeling“ and it didnt break me out at all. I use this at nite because it doesn’t have spf in it. I put it all over my face/neck and especially around my eyes. I see a big difference in the way my skin feels and looks, which is younger, healthier and more vibrant looking.
I love this stuff!! Whenever I try something new it breaks me out and/or isn’t moisturizing enough. I have combination skin & I’m prone to breakouts. Thank you Clinique!

I have very oily, acne prone skin and have had a serious problem with clogged pores lately. My skin has reacted so well to this gel, that I no longer have to get monthly facials to have clear skin! It has reduced my acne to almost nothing and my skin feels so much smoother. It absorbs very quickly and makes my skin feel hydrated yet not nearly as oily as it usually is. Im now on my second bottle and Im sure ill be sticking to this moisturizer for a very long time!
This is the best I’ve ever tired. I recommend it to people with oily skin

I have used the 3-step for about 8 years.. Even if I run out of other steps I always use the lotion. It is light and absorbs very quickly. It works great throughout the year even on dry winter skin or when my skin burns in the summer.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! I love how my skin feels after I put it on. I use this as part of the 3 step system along with acne peels. My impossible acne is finally going away! It’s super light under make up and helps calm redness! I’m so happy I found this!

As a first time Clinique user, I’m satisfied with this moisturizer it helps my skin in the dry cold weather months however it isn’t like crazy amazing where my mind is blown, it gets the job done. I will say that it does not irritate my sensitive skin and I have noticed that it doesn’t make me oily like some other thick moisturizers. All in all it’s a good product, can’t go wrong with it.
