i have been using this gel moisturizer for almost 3-4 years now. i have oily skin, except where i breakout which tends to be really dry and this works out great. it is very lightweight and your skin absorbs it very quickly which makes the process of putting make up on afterwards really easy. love this product.P.S. this has a light weird smell.. almost like ginger. so you’ll have to get used to it.

I actually used the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion first - and was very pleased - and after I ran out I just purchased the DDM Gel because I thought it was the same thing. Then, afterwards, when I ran out of the gel, I had to use my mom’s moisturizer for a while until I could get a new bottle and holy cow it was just SO oily, heavy, and waaaay to scented. I hated it! Now I completely appreciate this Clinique product - it’s very lightweight, non-greasy, and hydrates amazingly. Plus! no scent!! I really love that <33

I got this product about a month ago and it has really been helping with my dry skin. When you put it on it is so refreshing, and you can feel it really working. I use it in the morning before I apply any makeup, and then again at night before bed.
Great moisturizer that doesn’t make your face oily. I use it at night or layer it under other make up.

THIS IS MY SECOND BOTTLE AND I JUST LOVE IT SO MUCH! I USED TO USE A PRODUCT WHICH IS ALMOST 4 TIMES PRICE THAN THIS ONE, THAT ONE WAS ALSO VERY GOOD FOR MY SKIN. BUT FOR SOME REASONS I JUST WANNA TRY SOMETHING NEW SO I CHOSE THIS ONE. I GOT COMBINATION SKIN AND IT WORKS WELL FOR ME, NOT TOO ’THICK’, A VERY IMPRESSIVE PRODUCT, AND I THINK I LL KEEP USING THIS FOR A PERIOD OF TIME =)
I have used this moisturizer on my oily skin for over two years and counting. I have nothing but praise for this product as it is well priced and soothing and smothing. wears well under makeup!
It’s soothing and makes my face feels silky!! Love this - -Price is good and it’s small and easy to travel with as well.

I’ve been using Clinique dramatically different moisturizing gel for years. It’s moisturizing but doesn’t leave my skin feeling heavy and oily like other products. I definitely recommend this product who like fast absorbing, lightweight, moisturizing lotion.
I love this moisturizer. I have oily skin and this moisturizes it without making it greasy.

This is so great. Super light, but hydrating. My go-to for Spring and Summer. In the Winter, I need a more intensive moisturizer at night, but I still like this during the day. Most moisturizer makes me break out, but NOT this one!

I’ve been using this for a year now. Wow, this stuff is AMAZING for my Combination to Oily Skin.It’s just FABULOUS!My skin has become no oily and still has a good moisturizer.It’s very good under the make up too.It’s light too...^^But, of course, it will not heal ur oily skin. If I’m not using this for about 2 days, my skin will become oily again, which is kinda normal I guess....
the gel is great for 3 season moisture (and winter too...sometimes need to supplement with the lotion in dry spots)..would love if there was an anti-wrinkle component to boost.
review_title: All-over-great, would love for anti-wrinkle part

review_text: I have combination skin that goes from dry to sometimes oily.. This one works for me!

I started using the regular Dramatically Different when I was in High school but having combination skin it did not always work as well as I wanted. I tried this several years ago and this is exactly what I was looking for...

I simply cannot rave enough about clinique’s 3 step skin care system. Have been using for 4 years. I am just leaving my teen years and walked through acne and many other facial concerns. This is an amazing moisturizer. One pump does the job!

I cannot say enough good things about this moisturizer. It’s light, absorbed quickly, and leaves my oily skin balanced, not shiny or greasy as most other moisturizers did.I use the entire 3 step system for oily skin and its been great for my oily, acne prone, and sensitive skin! I highly recommend the whole line.

I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this moisturizer! I was a little skeptical at first, but after feeling how soft it left my face, I bought it. Never using another moisturizer again! I use it as a stand-alone moisturizer, I don’t use Clinique’s skin care system at all. It works great by itself!

I have tried both them lotion and gel moisturizers, as I have combination skin. I instantly fell in love with the gel version, as it dries instantly leaving skin feeling deeply moisturizers yet not weighed down. The lotion wasn’t as great, if you have oily skin I’d recommend the gel version you’ll love it!
I have oily skin, so I decided to order the gel instead of the lotion and I’m happy I did. It feels amazing on the skin & absorbs very quickly. It smells good too, which is a plus. I love it!
I really like how it is lightweight yet keeps my face from being dry.
I’ve tried other brands some less expensive some more all sold @ sephora. But this is still my go to daily lotion.
Very moisturizing, but does not clog pores. I love it because my skin is very sensitive and gets red without moisturizer, but my skin is oily, and most moisturizers cause me to break out.
I love this! I really like how it feels when i’m applying and it doesn’t clog my very oily skin.
This product has become my holy grail moisturizer, as it is lightweight and most importantly non-greasy! I will definitely purchase it again, and this time in the bigger version.

I normally use body lotion and add jojoba or some other oil, but with the Clinique Moisturizing Gel, it does the job and does it well. I need extra in the winter because of our cold weather and this works better than anything else I’ve used on my face. Will purchase again.

I have been using this with the Clinique 3 step set that comes with the cleanser and mild soap for years. By far if you had to choose one of the three products in the set it would me this! Perfect for people with oily skin, dries quickly and doesn’t make your foundation slip and slide all over your face! Has a nice finishing to it when applied and is light weight!

This is a very light, quick absorbing moisturizer that leaves my skin very soft. It is a tad too light for winter, when my combo/oily skin dries out and begins to flake as a result of use of benzoyl peroxide to combat acne. I need something a tad “heavier“ in the harsh midwestern winter. But, that’s on me, and not the fault of the product. It will be absolutely ideal in summer. Very good buy, will definitely be repurchasing come summer.

Back when my skin was super oily, this was the ONLY moisturizer I could use. Even though my skin was oily, the acne treatments I was using made my skin flaky, and this gel was the only moisturizer that worked for me. Other moisturizers would feel thick and greasy, and a lot of them would actually ball up and rub right off as I was applying. If you have very oily, acne-prone skin, you need to give this moisturizer a try.

This is the BEST moisturizer EVER! I have oily skin & this doesnt make me greasy. It makes my skin super soft & drys quickly. I also got the biggest size available, I’ve had mine scince May (it’s December now) and I have alot left! I wouldnt recomend the gel formula if you have dry skin (try the lotion) , but this is perfect for oily to combination skin!

I have combination skin and this moisturizer keeps my face balanced. It’s not greasy nor is it too light. I absolutely love this for the summer. I sometimes switch to Clinique’s Moisture Surge Intense during winter especially when the temperature drops like crazy here in Toronto.
review_title: my go-to moisturizer for 5 years now

review_text: Perfect moisturizer for my oily skin! It is far less greasy than the regular dramatically different lotion moisturizer. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a residue on my skin.
I love this moisturizer. It’s lightweight, non greasy, leaves my sk

This moisturizer has a nice cool, texture but my skin feels a bit like gel has dried on my face rather than being soft. Definitely doesn’t leave your skin oily so I agree it’s lightweight. It’s a decent moisturizer, but I wouldn’t recommend it for winter use.
review_title: Decent, worth what you pay for

review_text: I love this moisturizer. This will be the third time I have purchased it. I try other moisturizers every now and then, but I always come back to this. I have combination skin and it hydrates my dry skin while not making the oily parts worse. It’s not greasy at all and I love the way it makes my skin feel. If you have very dry skin, this may not be hydrating enough, but I highly recommend this for people with combo or oily skin.

It good and lightweight for the time of use but i wouldnt call it“dramatically different“ - it doesnt longterm make my skin not dry, Id have to apply it twice a day ... Ive used better, although I love the clinique, thought this would be better

I have tried sooo many different moisturizers for oily skin, and I always come back to this product. It hydrates but is not heavy on the skin at all. It does not clog pores because it is oil free and fragrance free. My skin is soft and smooth after applying it. It even helps my makeup apply more evenly.

This is the product I’ve been searching for! Absorbs quickly, moisturizers my combination skin without looking greasy on my t-zone. Oil-free which is def a plus. I’ve been using this for about 2 months and it hasn’t made me break out. I have sensitive skin and react to most products but this one is gentle. Doesn’t have a smell/scent like most do.Only drawback is that there is no SPF.

This gel was just ok. It’s starting to get cold finally here in Colorado and my face became flaky with this, so I returned it but I think it’d be a better summer moisturizer. I do have sensitive skin though and it didn’t break me out or make my skin burn like some others so that’s a plus. But I need more moisture right now and went back to hope in a jar.

this is by far the best moisturising product i have ever used.makes ur face so soft and radiant all day, if u use it before going to sleep, it makes u have a glowy angel look when u wake up.would defs recoomend!!

This is the only product that I have gone to the bottom of the bottle with and gone back for more. I have normal skin that gets dry around the mouth and oily on the nose/cheeks depending on the weather and time of the month. This moisturizing gel balances everything out and I don’t even use it every day! Totally non-greasy and very light. This is a must for me since I don’t like the feel of makeup on my skin.

I have very oily skin, however in the winter I tend to get dry patches that flake (yet still get oily throughout the day). I purchased this gel after reading all of these amazing reviews and I love it.It helps keep my oil in check throughout the day, feels lightweight on my skin, and the gel texture absorbs very quickly. It also doesn’t have a strong scent, which I like.My only complaint is that for the winter, it doesn’t moisturize enough, however, I have picked up a thicker cream to put on my skin at night during the winter and this works perfectly in conjunction with that, when applied in the AM. I will more than likely be purchasing this again when I run out (but I would like to add that you get a lot for the price).

I have never used a moisturizer that did not break my face out during the initial period. This does not. I used this some months back, then switched to something else. It immediately broke my face out, so I switched back to this. At night I do use something heavier, but that’s just due to getting older and skin getting drier.
I have been using this moisturizing gel for almost 5 years now and its great.

This is the only moisturizer that I’ve found that doesn’t doesn’t result in an oil slick on my face in a few hours. I first bought a travel size to try it and just went back and bought a full-size bottle because I loved it. It’s not overly expensive either.
This is my new fav faical lotion works great with my combination skin .. Kinda pricey tho
best moisturizer, it is just as amazing as the rest of clinique’s products

This product is everything! Best moisturizer I have ever tried especially for my oily skin yet dry...plus the first time I put it on my face felt soft...in just the first time. A must buy,I haven’t tried the cream but I’m really satisfied with this product.
I absolutely adore this moisturizer! Most moisturizers cause me to break out, but this is so lightweight and is perfect for my combination skin.

I like this so far. I have acne-prone skin that also gets dry on my cheeks, especially during the winter months. This feels so good and lightweight going on, and doesn’t seem to clog my mores or exacerbate my acne. Looks fine under makeup. I have noticed that it has also seemed to improve the quality of my skin- even when i’m not wearing it, my cheeks aren’t dry and flakey anymore. I have been using this for about two weeks. Will continue to use and purchase.

I’ve used both the lotion and gel of this formula and they are both great! I’ve found this works better in the summer when my skin is a little less dry. It’s just the right amount of moisture and leaves my skin so soft! I will keep repurchasing this!

I love this product. First time trying the gel style and it is wonderful! Absorbs fast and lasts! It is very light and not greasy at all. The 1.7 size is way bigger than I thought-will last at least 6 months. Great value! Put this in your cart right now!
After all the hype of this product I decided to repuchase this. It is a very nice formula and absorbs quickly, but I felt it did nothing for my skin! I will definitely not be repurchasing.
I have used this for at least 10 years and it is a main staple in my beauty regimen. Perfect for oily skin and absorbs quickly. I definitely recommend for combo-oily skins.
It feels nice and soft on the skin.

I’ve gone through many bottles of this and consider it a great standard oil-free moisturizer. It’s wonderful for the summer, but it isn’t enough for me when the weather gets colder. It’s perfect if you are using strong serums and don’t want to risk mixing too many ingredients together.

I think this product is amazing. My skin looks/feels smoother after just a couple days of use. Only issue is that I still have dry spots due to the dry winter air. I will use this for summer. Still looking for winter moisturizer that is heavy enough for moisture, but won’t leave me oily!
review_title: Great, but more for summer for me

review_text: I’ve been having problems with my skin so I decided to switch up my face wash regimen. I’ve always been a fan of Clinique and decided to try this moisturizing gel, and I’m so glad that I did! It absorbs quickly and super lightweight. It doesn’t get my face oily like other moisturizers that I have used before. Highly recommend!

When it comes to skin, my sister and I are polar opposites. My skin is more oily then a spill in the Gulf of Mexico and my sister is drier then the Sahara dessert... and her face peels from dryness. I can’t imagine it feels good. Anyway, our grandmother used to use, and to use, Clinique meant... well, old people. But, they’ve been around like over 50 years, so they must be doing something right. As a make up person, I gravitated to my roots and rediscovered Clinique, but my sister hadn’t - not yet.Well, as we all know, in the winter, skin peeling is worse... and my sister’s peeling nose was, well it looked sunburnt in the middle of the winter. Despite her protests, and grandmother comments, I got her Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel (I have the lotion, felt it might be a bit heavy for her). Well, she loved it! Said she could not believe she waited for so long to use Clinique! It was So light, and cleared up her skin peeling! No smell, and felt so refreshing!

While it seemed to absorb into my skin at first, it began to not be absorbed at all because it clogged my pores up. In about a week, it made my pores have a grey-ish brown cast to them (which meant my pores were totally clogged). I had to use a drugstore toner to clear this product out of my pores because the clarifying lotion didn’t work either.
GREAT GREAT GREAT! Best thing that has ever happened to my combo skin.

Didn’t break out my sensitive skin which is a big plus for me. Goes on light. Smells nice, not too overbearing.Doesn’t leave my skin feeling wet or greasy. Just a great product that does exactly what it says.

I’ve used Dramatically Different Moisturizer for 30 years. I liked the original product, but I think the gel form is even better. There is no greasy feeling; it feels light. I’ve not used it long enough to really know how well it actually moisturizes. It doesn’t feel like it is as moisturizing as the older version, but we’ll see.

Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is the best Moisturizer I have ever used. I love applying it before foundation and NOT having to worry about my face looking oily. It is enough moisture for me even in the winter months! I ordered a couple smaller bottles and keep on in the bathroom, One in my purse and one beside my bed. Great Product!

Love this moisturizer! It absorb super quickly and feels very light, yet still does the job! I don’t feel like I have to wait after applying this to apply my concealer and powder.I love the travel size version. Perfect to throw in my makeup bag, as I travel on a weekly basis.Only downside is that I wish it had SPF in it.

This moisturizer is light and does not break me out. It will not help in areas that are really dry, for those you will need a heavier lotion. This is a great moisturizer for those who are oily or acne-prone however, as it doesn’t seem to cause breakouts.
This moisturizer is perfect for my acne prone skin. It prevents my skin from drying out without breaking me out. I love the gel consistency as opposed to a lotion for my oily skin.

I love the texture, feel, almost everything about this product, but it broke me out after a few uses. I didn’t use all 3-step skin care system, so that might be the reason?? I still wanna go back and try again someday.
review_title: I really wanted to like this..

review_text: I have incredibly oily, sensitive skin, and have been looking for a long time for a moisturizer that will moisturize without being too heavy and breaking me out. I wish I hadn’t waited so long to buy this, it is amazing and makes my skin super soft. If you’re concerned about the price - this is definitely worth it, and it lasts a very long time as you only need 1-2 pumps to cover the entire face and neck.

This moisturizer smells pleasant and is a perfect balance. I have combination skin and this seeps right in without leaving any residue on my face..just providing the perfect tint of moisture to keep my skin feeling fresh.

I love this moisturizer as it makes my skin so smooth! Also, it doesn’t make my skin oily and is light enough for everyday use. However, I do find that because my skin is combination that I need to use a thicker cream at night. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product!

What’s good: this moisturizer does not cause breakouts, and it does not irritate the skin.What’s not great: I feel like I need to use a lot of this product to beat the winter flakes. Also, it seems this product is more fast-drying than fast-absorbing. After applying, I feel more like I put on a primer than a moisturizer. Cheeks are still a little tight.I probably will not repurchase.

I have used this moisturizer a few times since I got it as a sample and I think it does exactly what it claims to do. Very light weight and does not add to any shinyness I already have. Will probably buy a full size when I run out. I think t works well with their acne solutions line.
Great moisturizer. It absorbs fairly quickly and doesn’t leave any sticky feeling after applied. I have been using this gel everyday. It works well with my oily skin.
it’s great, it absorbs very quick, but it fit more in summer than winter.
I like it very much, I bought this a lot of times, it is very soft , and keep your face very well. Perfectly.

Everything that Clinique claims on this products is true. Is a basic gel mousturizer that won’t clog clog your pores of you have oily skin. It feels fresh and you feel that you skin stop feeling thirsty but at the same time you stil keep “the clean skin sensation“ after applying this.Mousiturizers are the products that areOre prone to clog pores creating blackheads since the are absorbs by te skin. I they are heavy, thy will get clogged on the middle of the pores.
Absorbs easily does not make makeup look greasy Just wish it had sunscreen
great lotion!!! it isn’t sticky nor oily :) it really light and soft. It’s good for sensitive skin

I have battled acne for over 10 years and this product cleared my skin nearly completely. I searched for years and years for anything that would help and I found this product and it changed my skin. Its lightweight, non greasy and refreshing. If you are looking for that magic product, give it a try!

This stuff is amazing and I can’t live without it! My mom has very sensitive skin and recommended it to me, and I will never try another product again. I constantly get dry skin around my nose, but have skin that is very sensitive to oil. If my moisturizer is oily, I will break-out the next day. I have never once had a skin issue from using this, and it helps to keep my face moisturized almost all day. It also doesn’t give my face any sort of oily sheen, like I used to get using drug store oil-free moisturizers.

Nothing special to me about this lotion. I have combination skin and this tends to dry out my cheeks quite a bit. It goes on smoothly, dries instantly and sits on top of the skin like a mask. Altogether not a bad product, especially for the price and how long it lasts! But the only down side for me was the dry and flakiness i noticed on my cheeks.

i have been using the moisturizer for 3 years now. it is the only moisturizer that does not feel heavy on my skin and make me break out/get oily. my skin is dry, with the occasional break out, this moisturizer soaks in quickly and leaves skin dewy and soft, not waxy or heavy. great for the summer months. i knocked off one star because during the cold, dry, winter months i need to apply several layers to achieve the same effect.
brightens skin, not sticky, acne scarring SLOWLY goes away, perfect for oily/comb skin

This product is really good for if you have a combination to oily skin type. I do have sensitive skin and this product never harmed my skin before so I bought it again! Its amazing! Right after you apply it, it feels very light and absorbs the oil from your face! So I hope you guys try it too !:):)

I’ve just started using Clinique products again. It’s been probably 10-15yrs (high school) since I last used anything by Clinique. The DDM gel did not exist then and there was only the DDM lotion which was and still is too heavy for my combo skin (also the DDM lotion has parabens).I bought this as part of a 3-step set. I didn’t plan on using it because I was under the assumption to that had parabens. I checked the ingredient list 3 times and it is paraben-free. This is intended as a pre-moisturizer step, sorta like a serum but I use it as a light moisturizer. I use this when I come home from work and I take off all my make-up before I head out to the gym.It’s light, dries quickly and it keeps my combo skin matte looking. I’m really surprised I like this product. I would buy this product again specifically to wear/take to the gym because I hate working out with heavy feeling products on my face.
review_title: I can't believe I love this

review_text: I ran out of my old moisturizer, but I decided to try a sample I had gotten of this, and it’s absolutely wonderful!! It immediately cleared up any acne I had, and it keeps my face soft and smooth!
I used to use Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion religiously. However, once I started using the gel, I have officially switched. Even better for oilier/combination skin types.
this gel is amazing. it’s not heavy, so it leaves my skin feeling smooth, fresh and soft all day. I have combination skin, so it works beautifully on the dry spots on my face.
Like this product more than the moisturizing lotion. The gel does not have a greasy feel.

Every other product that I’ve used targeted to oily skin doesn’t compare to this. No matter what I end up finding my way back to it every time. Skin feels great after usage and the formula absorbs into my skin very quickly. Doesn’t leave my skin shiny and works exceptionally in combination with the clinique toner.

Seriously, this stuff is a godsend. It goes on light and smooth and leaves no greasy residue or feel on your skin. My oily skin is usually slick and greasy in an hour or so after washing, but when I use this, my face stays pretty matte for most of the day. If I don’t wear make-up, it stays fresh and clean-feeling all day long! I got a sample of this about a week ago and will definitely be going back to buy a full size soon.
it moisturized my skin but did make me oily
It’s oil-free and lightweight product. Feel really good after using it.
LOVE this! so light, and not greasy or heavy at all. Def. a long term product for me, and reasonable price!

I have been fighting with acne for many years so I need a lightweight product that won’t be too heavy. This product works pretty well (I have to apply two layers for best results) and it doesn’t break my skin out. Win!
review_title: Really good product for my problem skin!

review_text: Great moisturizer for oily skin.
Like it! It glides on the skin smoothly, and provides a good base for foundation. This will be my “regular“ moisturizer from now on!

My skin has always been very oily. I’ve tried so many products but they usually just make my skin oilier! I’m almost 40 and it’s a challenge to deal with aging AND oily/acne-prone skin at the same time! This gel sat in my medicine cabinet for several months before I even used it on my face. I was afraid it would make me break out or cause me to be even oilier. I used two pumps at night and found that I woke up less oily and my skin looked clear and no breakouts. I was hesitant to try it during the day but I’m so glad I did! It keeps the oil at bay, moisturizes without being too heavy, and seems to balance my skin. This is truly a miracle product for me; I only wish I had discovered it sooner! I’m able to go all day and be confident that my makeup is not sliding off my face. I finally feel like I have “normal“ skin. Thank you, Clinique!
review_title: FInally, a cure for oily yet dehydrated skin!!

review_text: Great for oily skin!If your skin is combination try this on the T zone and the dramatically different lotion on cheeks.

Due to my combination skin, I have trouble finding the perfect moisturizer--they seem to be either too greasy or not intensive enough. This one comes close. I love how quickly it absorbs and how soft it feels on my skin. It is great for my full face, and then I use something heavier on top of the really dry areas. The bottle lasts a long time as well.

I heard great things about this product so I was really excited when I purchased it.When I first started using it, I could see my skin seemingly getting clearer, less blotchy, less redness, and just generally nicer, softer skin. But then I started continually using it as my morning and night lotion, and I noticed that I was breaking out a lot more with even bigger, redder pimples and in places I don’t normally break out, like my forehead.So I stopped using it and started using my old lotions from spas, etc and I noticed my skin looking much better.I would’ve given it 3 stars, but considering how much rave I’ve heard, I was really let down; maybe it’s just because I have really oily, acne-prone skin that’s super sensitive, glad it worked for others but definitely not the right product for me.
This moisturizing gel works well with my skin and I do not experience breakouts as I had with other products. The price at Sephora makes it better!
review_title: Great product at a great price

review_text: I am so impressed with this moisturizer! It’s lightweight and it makes my complexion more even. Not to mention, it works great under foundation. Can’t beat the price, either :)

I’m a product junkie and like to try new brands but this moisturizer will always be a staple in my collection. It just plain works. Refreshing, lightweight, doesn’t clog pores; I highly recommend for oily/combo skin!
review_title: Always come back to this one!

review_text: This is my go-to product in the summer as I have extremely oily skin. Be sure not to use too much or it will be too wet on the skin.
review_title: Great lightweight moisturizer for oily skin!

review_text: I have both the lotion and the gel and i actually like the gel better. its lightweight, combats oil, actually moisturizes my skin and doesnt clog my pores. no cons here. and a lil dot goes a long way

I have oily skin so I wanted a moisturizer that works but doesn’t have enough moisturizer. A lot of times with moisturizer for oily skin it doesn’t do enough and your skin turns dry. But this one was good, is light, and moisturizes the perfect amount. I would recommend it to someone with oily skin.

I LOVE this moisturizer. It has a translucent quality to it, it is not heavy or greasy at all. It sinks in and doesn’t leave a film or residue on my face. I have sensitive oily skin that tends to break out if I apply harsh or heavy products. This one does the trick.

This is my go-to moisturizer for nearly every day in the year. It’s only once the weather gets significantly colder and dryer that I feel I need a touch more moisture. Even then, I simply add a little of the original Dram. Diff. Lotion to the pumps of Gel and I have a perfect richer version that doesn’t leave me greasy like the original does.

My go-to moisturizer! It’s perfect for oily or combination skin. It dries really fast compared to most moisturizers which I LOVE because I hate the oily feeling after putting on lotion, moisturizers etc. Very lightweight and refreshing! I put this on after using Clarisonic Mia and Philosophy Purity. Perfect combination for me!

This is a good moisturizer for the morning if you have oily skin. It provides just the right amount of hydration without any greasiness and absorbs quickly. I love the texture. I would use a thicker cream at night though.
i used the lotion one before but decided to try the gel this time.And oh my god, i love it! my skin feels sooo good. it is moisturizing enough but doesnt give u greasy face

I moisturize with this twice a day (morning and night) each time after I wash my face with my Neutrogena Naturals Face Cleanser and I swear the pairing together gives me the best results for my combo skin. I also use this to moisturize before makeup. I like it a lot especially because of its easy absorbing gel consistency. I feel like it gives my face a balanced hydration and has never broken me out. Pretty much my HG moisturizer.

Since it’s a gel, it leaves me with that feeling that my skin is trapped and heats up for a few minutes while it soaks in. It is definitely very lightweight and absorbs quickly. I usually have oily skin, and this keeps the oil away pretty much ALL day. And I’m talking about 7am until 9pm. However, it makes my skin feel a little drier than I’m used to. It’s not quite as wet as I’d want it to be. But that’s just me. Works great otherwise.

I have combo-oily skin and this moisturizer glides so easily onto my skin when blending in. it provides moisture, which lasts the entire day! it does take a few minutes to dry, but the wait is worth it!

I really do like this moisterizer i just wish it was a little more moisterizing. I have combination and i love this for my oily areas like my nose. But then i started to realize that areas that are a little drier like my cheeks have dry patches on them that werent noticible before i started using this. I really do like it so i think im going to try the loition version.

I will say it does absorb quickly and it is lightweight but I broke out horribly from using this. I have sensitive skin, maybe it’s just me but I will not be repurchasing again. As far as moisture goes, I didn’t find it that moisturizing for me.

i just decided to buy it and try it and now my skin is softer than ever ! its really great ! i have really oily skin and this product definitely did not make my skin more oily ! when i first tried it on my hand it stayed soft for days ! i was really amazed at its hydration process ! i love it !
Great lightweight moisturizer

i have been using this for years, it’s the best moisturizer for oily skin, absorbs very quickly and doesn’t feel sticky or greasy like many other moisturizer do. sometimes in the winter i will alternate with the clinique moisture surge because i occasionally get dry patches on the cheeks but for the rest of the year its awesome!

For the past four years, I have used this product in the warmer weathers. It is perfect for a sunny day because it is very lightweight and doesn’t make your face greasy and oily. I have bought two small bottles and the big one and I haven’t finished the big one yet. You use a tiny amount for the whole face. I would definitely recommend this to someone who has oily skin.
review_title: Used it for years and I love it!

review_text: It is a bit too matte/dry formulation for winter but great for summer and fall. I mix with my foundation.
good moisturization but it left my skin too oily.
I love this moisturizer so much! It absorbs quickly, easy to apply, and lightweight. After using it, my face feels super smooth. It hydrates without turning my face into a pile of grease.

I moisturize at least twice a day. In the evening I use oil, but during the day, I frequently use this moisturizing gel. It doesn’t seem to bother my skin and although I use a few pumps, it absorbs quickly and allows me to put on my foundation without fighting a grease slick. I find I have to add a a drop or so of oil when my skin feels drier, though.
review_title: Great for oil, acne-prone skin (at least mine)

review_text: I. Absolutely. Love. This. Product.Of course, I’m only speaking on behalf of myself. I have combination (dry cheeks, oily T-zone) and super sensitive skin. I’ve tried countless moisturizers, including drugstore brands. They’ve always either left my skin shiny as ever within a few hours or cause a my face to have a reaction. I also love the pump, being a stickler for sanitation. I haven’t strayed to another since.

This is a good lotion from Clinique for my combo acne prone skin. It’s not quite enough for dry patches but the DD lotion is too much for the acne prone areas. If only there was an in between lotion with more antioxidants. I can’t use the Super Antiox Rescue because it makes me break out
This made my skin feel really soft, but oily pretty quickly. I’m still on the fence about this though, because my skin felt and looked good for a short amount of time.

I have oily sensitive skin. I also have rosacea so i have to be very careful with products since i am prone to break outs. I started using this lotion on my face in January 2012 and OMG the results on my face have been nothing short of a miracle! I now hardly ever have a breakout and when I do they are just little white pimples and they are few and far between. It is now August 2012 and I actually went out without foundation tonight for the first time in my life!!! I used concealer on a few spots and then the rest of my makeup as usual but I cant say enough about this and what it has done for my skin!!! I am forever a clinique user! Sephora gave me a few samples of the toner #4 that i am trying out and I really like it so far as well... it really helps with the oil in my t-zone....

I have really oily skin so I’m always hesitant to try new moisturizers, but this stuff works great! It leaves my face silky smooth and I’m not constantly blotting my face through out the day. It also looks great under my make up!

The moisturing gel is the best I have ever used! It goes on smoothly, dries quickly, and lasts all day. Very easy to use and not messy. I can apply my powder foundation right away after applying the gel.
feels great for my combination to oily skin. love it for the summertime, but may not be enough for the winter unless paired on top of a serum.

I love this stuff, there are very few moisturizers that I like and this is my favortite. I have sensitive skin and most moisturizers make my face feel gross. This is very lightweight, it makes my skin feel silky and also makes my skin looking healthier. I also use it on my skin while using drying acne products and it doesn’t mess it up.

I wanted to love this product because of all the hype but unfortunately, it did not work out. I found that it was not moisturizing enough for my combo/acne prone/sensitive skin. I love the price and the packaging but that’s about it.

There is a REASON this product wins Allure Beauty awards (which started with the other moisturizing lotion). This is lightweight enough on my skin but still mositurizing. I’ve never used another moisturizing and I often get compliments on my skin.

Honestly, I don’t see the difference or feel any different after using this product. I have oily skin so I’m always in the look out for a good moisturizer. I’m still debating if I should return it or not.
It didn’t leaves sticky residue. Really soft and refreshing. Its good for summer or hot weather.

I use many expensive lotions, creams, gels, serums, you name it, I have it. When you just feel like going simple one day, Clinique comes through and saves the day. I did buy the gel because I am very acne prone and the gel is oil free!!
Great moisturizer for oily skin, especially during the summer.

This moisturizer definitely did not work for me. I have sensitive, oily acne prone skin and although it didn’t cause pimples, there were a lot of small bumps that popped up ALL OVER my face.... So that’s almost as bad as craters. Glad it works for so many other people but definitely did not work for me!

My daughter feels that this is the only product that fits her needs: dry delicate skin, worse when she swims 8 practices a week, but teenage skin which can break out. It is the only moisturizer she trusts.I gave it 4 not 5 stars because it seems expensive

I’ve been looking for a new skin care regimen. This apparently isn’t my thing. Tried the 3 step system and it made me break out. Moisturizer is light but I can’t stand the menthol in it. And it made my skin greasy looking by noon.
This stuff is amazing. I have EXTREMELY oily skin and this product works wonders! My face doesn’t get as oily as before. I deff recommend this!

I have combination skin, with “normal“ (and prone to drying) cheeks and neck, but with an excessively oily forehead, nose, and chin. These areas are super prone to breaking out. This is the *only* moisturizer that is light enough to work for my t-zone, but does not dry out my cheeks and neck. This is the only moisturizer that I use.

I love this moisturizer! Clinique products have never disappointed me, and this is no expection. . I have combination skin and slight eczema on my face, but this moisturizes very well. But at the same time, it’s very lightweight, and absorbs quickly. Definitely recommend this!

I love this moisturizer! I use it every morning after cleansing. The gel absorbs quickly and leaves me skin feeling very soft and smooth. It isn’t really intense, so I wouldn’t recommend it for people who have really dry skin, but for someone with normal/combination skin this works great. I don’t use it as part of the 3 step system because I really don’t like the first 2 steps, but I keep coming back to this gel. Definitely a staple in my routine.
I’ve got dry skin and have been happily using this gel moisturizer since they started making it. I’ve got one for home and one for travel (the tube is TSA-approved size). Love it!
It is a very lightweight moisturizer. I have combination skin with dry cheeks, this does exactly what I need it to without ever making me feel oily.

wish this had SPF but other than that, it absorbs so fast and makes my skin feel so smooth and great. It’s helped with my texture over time, I’ve been using it for about 6 months now and I definitely notice a difference. It’s perfect if you live somewhere that gets hot/humid in the summer and want a lighter moisturizer. If you have dry skin I would suggest the lotion version instead of the gel one.
This is a wonderful moisturizer. It is light wait and doesn’t make my skin oily instead it leaves it moisturized and smooth.

I’ve only been using this for a few days, but I can say that I’m already impressed with this moisturizer. Most of my other moisturizers were heavy and left my skin feeling greasy. This one absorbed into my skin right away and left me with great skin. But, like I said, I’ve only had it a few days and these results might not last.
Most lightweight moisturizer I’ve used, practically disappears right when you put it on, great under makeup. However, I’m not sure it will be intensive enough for the winter.
Been using this moisturizing gel forever, it is great! I have combo skin and this gel is good for my oily spots and my dry spots.

Great for oily skin especially in the summer, no greasiness. I’ve been using it for almost 2 weeks and it hasn’t caused breakouts. The downsides are no spf and not moisturizing enough for dry areas. There’s a very light lemon scent but disappears once you apply.

This product is absolutely perfect for oily skin. I have skin that gets shiny within less than 3 hours after washing my face/ applying makeup. When applied, its an instant cooling sensation, which I LOVE during the summer months. It provides the perfect amount of moisture, its not heavy or greasy.Notice I didn’t say it minimizes shine. On my skin, it just doesn’t. But keep in mind I have VERY oily skin. Maybe someone with combination skin will see a difference.Nonetheless, I am VERY happy with this product and will definitely be buying again. :)

I tried these a few years back with the 3-step system but wasnt really impressed. I decided to try it again recently and didn’t see anything too amazing with it. It is a good basic moisturizer for quick hydration but doesnt provide any long term help.

i first got this last year and was obsess with it. I actually got the smallest one, 1.7 fl oz. and was running out and went back to purchase the bigger size. Unfortunately i purchase the wrong one, instead of the “gel“ one i purchase the dramatically different moisturizing “lotion.“ And i kept asking myself why is the consistency so different. lol... and i recently found out why..idiot i know.. And although I like both of them very much I definitely prefer this one, the dramatically different moisturizing gel..The lotion one comes out in a thicker watery liquid form and feels heavier on my face, but it is moisturizing as well. As for the gel one, the texture is lightweight and creamy and melts into the skin more wonderfully...

I have been using this moisturizer for 6 months now and not sure what is suppose to be “dramatically different“. I have combination skin and it kind of feels like any other moisturizer. It is a decent price for the amount that you get in the bottle, but kind of hoping to run out soon so I can try something else.

This is my favorite moisturizer! I was using Philosophy’s Hope In A Jar, but the Clinique gel is so much better for my oily skin. My skin has never felt softer and it moisturizes without making my skin even oilier. LOVE IT!
I love this product. For some reason it works better on my skin than the dramatically different moisturizer lotion. The GEL has a light-weight feel. I wear it every day in the summer.

I have been using DDMG for over a couple years now. I was introduced to it during one of the makeup tutorials at my local clinique counter. As a young woman, I find that my skin is more sensitive than ever. This moisturizing gel is perfect for combatting dryness and for a base under my makeup without causing a rash or skin irritation. This gel can be used sparringly, which lets it last for quite a while.Overall, I find that the clinique brand is great for offereing what it claims to do. I have used multiple clinique products and have loved and repurchased them all! The smaller container of the DDMG has lasted me over six months.
review_title: The only face cream I trust

review_text: I’ve used the DDML (Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion) before and it was horrible - too greasy and texture was odd - also broke me out insanely that I gave up on all Clinique products for a couple years.Just recently, I tried this DDMG (Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel) and it is really great. The texture is very smooth and leaves a nice texture. It leaves a nice base for you so you can apply makeup on top. It leaves a little bit of a cooling feeling but not in a menthol type of way. I like to keep mine in the refrigerator or mini fridge - the temperature of my room is really hot since I live upstairs and it will get extra runny is I don’t keep it in the fridge. The consistency is still runny regardless - it is more of liquidy gel than an actual gel. Also, I have very sensitive skin that tends to - dry out, get red, or break out. But this product did not break me out. It actually helped when I was going through a really mad skin faze after it had gotten irritated after using a bad scrub. It did sting a pinch because my skin was so raw at the time. But now that my skin is much better - it does not sting at all, just a light cooling feeling and a matte texture. One thing - it doesn’t moisturize very dry spots, if you are only a little dry then it should be sufficient but otherwise you will need something more moisturizing for those tough spots.This is definitely a good buy if you are normal or oily or even if you have breakouts. Just don’t use toner or astringent too often as it can cause your skin to get more sensitive, just have a good face wash and moisturizer and masks. Don’t wash your face too often in the morning, just wash with water and a face rag. That is what I did and now my skin looks great.
I use a different moisturizer at night and always comes back to this one. Feels good to the skin. Luxurious even
This is a great lightweight moisturizer that absorbs quickly and is perfect for oily skin. The only thing I was it had was SPF for the summertime.
review_title: Great but wish it had SPF!!!

review_text: This moisturizer is amazing! My skin is dry-combination, acne prone and sensitive which makes finding the perfect moisturizer somewhat difficult, however this product works wonders! It’s very light weight and comfortable to wear - especially on hot summer days! And I have found it to be best to wear while at the gym as it hydrates my skin while still allowing it to breathe!

I have combination skin and most other moisturizers either does not moisturize enough or leaves my skin feeling oily. I like this gel because it’s perfect for combination skin and does not leave my face feeling oily and gunky. I love feeling my face after i put this on. I even got my boyfriend to start using this.
I love this moisturizing gel- it makes your skin so soft and it actually controls oil also. Try this - you will not be disappointed!!

glad i got this for the summer - it seeps into the skin so quickly (no fanning your face or walking around waiting for it to settle)and it is NOT greasy. it feels like adding water/moisture back into your skin.it’s also a great primer for my foundation - my skin is noticably softer and easier to handle in terms of make up application.rated 4 instead of 5 because i don’t know how this will perform in the winter as it is very light weight.
This is by far my favorite moisturizer! Perfect for my skin type! Also great for acne prone skin. A little bit goes a long way, so it’s a really great value in my opinion, too.
i have been using this product for years, and will continue to do so. it is perfect for my oily acne-prone skin!

I have been using this product for years and have found that no other moisturizer works like it!When applied, I can immediately feel the moisturizing feeling, but it does not feel greasy or oily at all. It is great for my oily skin! It works week under products too!

This gel is fabulous! I have a VERY oily T-Zone. I noticed right away that my skin was much more blanced. I only had to touch up my make-up once. It doesn’t get rid of the oil completely but it definitly makes a BIG difference. I would highly recommend.

in seventh grade i had bad acne, and my mom took me to the clinique counter and got me the three step system. this made my skin blemish free (1 zit like every time i start my period=normal), i use the tinted moisturizer til this day every morning after i use toner- wouldn’t ever dream of switching my moisturizer. THIS IS THE- i repeat THE HG MOISTURIZER FOR OILY/COMBINATION SKIN TYPES. LOOK NO FURTHER!

I’ve had this for a year and half now, still working on the 4.2 oz size. I don’t use this everyday, only when my skin feels dry after too much cleanser/acne products. I like that you can feel it sink into your skin when you smooth it on. If my skin is really dry, I’ll use 3 pumps and that is enough for my face and neck. I have very oily/acne prone skin, and have never noticed any breakouts or any more oil than when I go without. I also like that it doesn’t have a scent, but you do feel fresh/cool when putting it on your face. I will buy this again, when I run out. I wish they made this same moisturizer, but with spf.
I have been to doctors and I never got anything to get rid of the dry skin, but after I started using this product I will never use anything else.

I have suffered with hormonal, cystic acne for over 10 years and with that has come some pretty potent acne medications that caused excessive drying/peeling of the skin. Once a friend gave me a sample of Clinique’s Dramatically Different lotion years ago, I never experienced the peeling again. This moisturizing gel is the new and improved version of the sample I tried years ago. It does not contain oil and I have never had a breakout from this gel, which is a miracle in and of itself with my face! This is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. It beats every other moisturizer on the market. I *love* this product.
review_title: Best moisturizer I have ever tried

review_text: I have had a hard time finding a good moisturizer for my face because of its sensitivity and oiliness in some parts, while other parts are dry. I love that this moisturizer is a gel because that makes it lightweight and goes on smooth and evenly. It also doesnt have that gross smell some moisturizers tend to have. If you have combination or oily skin, look no further! This is a match made in heaven

I am in my 40’s and still get break outs, but I also try to keep the wrinkles at bay. This cream is the best. My skin is all soft and so far no break outs either. Would recommend it even more if it had an SPF in it.

I’ve been on the search for a good moisturizer that will moistureize my oily skin and keep the oil in control - and this product has worked wonders for me. From the first day I used it I noticed a difference. My face didn’t feel greasy or gross anymore.I purchased the travel size ($13) because I didn’t know if it would work. I’m now convinced and will be purchasing the big bottle ($24) when I run out.I’ve heard complaints that this is too expensive - and true, it is - but, it’s worth it and is actually a lot cheaper than other oil control moisturizers I’ve used in the past that have not worked.Bottom line - if you have oily skin, try it out. It worked for me, and it could work for you =)

I used to work for Clinique during college and at the time I used Moisture in Control as my moisturizer because I couldn’t stand the original DDML. I’ve been using the gel for about five or six years now (whenever it came out) and just love this. This will always be my ’go to’ moisturizer. Lightweight, absorbs quickly and doesn’t cause breakouts. But gives much needed hydration to us oily skins. Love love love it.
review_title: If you're oily this is your moisturizer!

review_text: great moisturizer, does not leave your skin oily but definitely does the job it claims to do. great for all year all day.
Great product! It soaks into the skin with no oily sheen or feel.

This is the best moisturizer i’ve ever tried.I have an oily skin an this moisturizes my skin without making it oily.I tried the clinique moisturizer for dry skin by accident (they look the same) and I skin started to break out right away

I have fussy skin. I’ve used probably every moisturizer for oily skin that you can think of. Most I feel sit on top of the skin, or starts to become greasy and slick within the matter of hours. I haven’t experienced that at all with this moisturizer. I think this will be a continued favorite of mine and I’m buying a larger size. The only reason why this review is missing an extra start to make it a 5 star rating, is because I wish it had an SPF of any level.
review_title: I Can't Believe It! It's ACTUALLY good.

review_text: They sure do mean lightweight.. It hardly does a thing if your skin is very dry. But I suppose gels are just not for me!

I love the gel much more than the lotion because it’s less greasy on the skin and absorbs so amazingly. This is perfect for oily, or combination skin. I tried the lotion for my oily skin and my skin looks so greasy and oily, but I love the gel.

I bought the 1.7 oz bottle to try, and to bring on my vacation in a few weeks if I liked the product. I think it’s fantastic! It mousturizes really well, and leaves my skin really soft. It feels almost like a primer. It seems to control my oil pretty well, I still get a bit shiny throughout the day but it’s ok. I have the Mineral Veil to cover up the shine.I have generally oily skin in my T-Zone, and normal on my cheeks during the warmer months, but once we get to the colder I get dry on my cheeks but still oily in my T-Zone. I don’t know how it will work during the colder months, but for the warm humid summers and warmish late springs/early falls it should be just what I need.

First of all, I have SUPER oily skin so finding a light moisturizer that actually sinks into my skin and and doesn’t make my face an oily mess is not an easy task. I’ve been using this for a couple weeks now and I noticed my skin is indeed softer and it doesn’t add to the oil issue. I use this under my foundation daily and it seems to contol the oil a lil bit too. I will definitely purchase this product again!

Pretty disappointed after hearing such good reviews! I can tell this moisturizer is expensive--the silicone in it feels good on my skin, but since it is completely oil-free and light, it ends up not moisturizing at all.Your skin is oily because it isn’t moisturized--since we wash our faces so much, chemically stripping them of their natural oils, I’ve come to realize oily skin actually NEEDS moisture/some oil. Although this moisturizer feels nice, it makes my nose super oily since it doesn’t moisturize, causing my face to produce lots of oil because of a complete lack of any oil whatsoever. However, this moisturizer does not help my dry cheeks either (I have combination skin). A small amount of the right type of oil will actually help oily skin be less oily. I’m going to get a moisturizer that actually moisturizes next time. I also feel like this is overpriced, doesn’t feel like much, and doesn’t last long. Sad, I really wanted to like this but I don’t think oil-free moisturizers work for me.

I have used this lotion in the past and decided to try it again. I am currently having trouble with my skin being too oily. This lotion did not help at all, it actually made it worse. Do not recommend for oily skin types.
The perfect moisturizer for oily skin. It’s soothing and it does the job.
review_title: A staple in my beauty arsenal

review_text: I have been using this along with Philosophy’s Hope is Not Enough serum for about a month and I have actually seen improvement in my skin. I have oily, break-out prone skin and every moisturizer I have ever tried breaks me out. This one actually doesn’t. My pores look smaller, my tone is even, I’m barely wearing make-up for the first time ever. I’m in love.

I was looking for a basic moisturizer that I could layer treatments, BB Creams, Spf, Foundation, and serums with that had no other active ingredients. I am hooked. I have normal to combo skin and this is the most comforting, cooling drink for skin. Used with the 3 step its great, But I love to layer with it. And its a so cheap ive payed $200 for gel-cremes that where 1oz cant say enough!

I have bought this moisturizing gel many times. It’s a safe bet. There may be better ones out there, but this is will do the job and not cause any irratation. It’s soothing and cooling and inexpensive. I always like to have it on hand.

Goes on smooth, absorbs quickly, and I can feel the difference in my skin--I really feel hydrated. It’s not heavy or greasy at all. I searched for a long time for a good moisturizer for my oily skin, and now I’ll never use anything else.Well, almost. When I’m feeling extra dry, or just want to pamper myself, I sometimes use the moisture surge--it gives the skin a lovely velvety feeling, which you don’t really get with the DDMG--DDMG just feels like your own clean skin (unless you use too much, and then it feels sticky). The moisture surge is extremely similar, but a little thicker and more moisturizing--but also 3x the price, so in general I stick with the DDMG.
I usually need to put on a different moisturizer after 10 mins. My skin is oily combination and it some areas its perfect but it others its like my skin didn’t absorb it.
I used to break out a lot. This helped to clear up my skin. =)

I have combination skin..more on the oily side. I find myself blotting the oil away multiple times a day because im always self concious about it. Ive tried so many moisturizers that claim to be oil free and for oily skin but they always just feel like a thick layer of stuff that just sits on my skin and dosent sinnk in. But not this stuff, this stuff hydrates without being to heavy and oily. My skin has never felt so good, and I no longer worry all the time about if i look oily or not. Definantly the best moisturizer i have ever used and i definantly recommended

I feel like my face drinks this like water. I apply it on my skin everyday before applying very sheer make up. It doesn’t seem to moisturize my dry spots and I will continue to see the dry skin after applying. I have a combination of oily to dry skin so I can’t use anything too heavy to moisturize, but this definitely doesn’t help the areas that need it.
Love it! Have used it for years and have no desire to use anything else.

This is the only moisturizer I’ll use on my face. I’ve tried countless others (including oil-free ones) and they all seem to be too greasy and make my combination to oily skin look more oily and then I break out from all the oil. This moisturizer is the only one I’ve found that works for me. It’s lightweight and leaves the skin hydrated but not greasy. I don’t use all 3-steps in the line but this one is a staple product for me.

This stuff is great, I buy the big bottle. Feels like it really quenches my skin on contact & absorbs super fast leaving my skin feeling soft & ready for makeup. I don’t feel like there is any residue with this. It doesn’t interfere with my makeup at all. Totally non greasy. Feels great on my skin. You don’t need to use that much & the bottle isn’t that expensive. This is my go-to everyday moisturizer. There are certain Clinique products that I don’t want to be without. This is one if them. I will repurchase again & again.

I have used Clinique products for years until recently my skin started breaking out when using some of their moisturizers including this gel. My before experience was good. Specially the amount of product you get for the price.
Love, love, love! I have very oily skin and this has been a life saver. During the summer when it’s super hot & sticky the lotion stands up all day under my makeup.
review_title: Where have you been all my life?

review_text: The Moisturizing Gel is great because it hydrates and softens your face without leaving it all oily. A little goes a long way too, it took me almost a year to use up a bottle of it. I would definetly reccomend this product!

Now I don’t know why I do this to myself but I always purchase the small $15 bottle that over by the checkout line, and never do I buy the actual size posted above. But in any case I absolutely LOVE this stuff. Its the ultimate moisturizer. Great for all skin types, as I have oily skin and my skin absolutely loves it!!!! It’s worth every dime!!!

its great because its a gel so its not thick and heavy like other moisturizers. It also is perfect for my skin because my cheeks get dry and red and this helps minimize that, while also helping from getting oily! My face can also be a little sensitive but i have no problems with this!!! I cant imagine using a different moisturizer!

This is a really wonderful moisturizer. It hydrates without leaving me greasy, doesn’t break me out, and leaves a nice fresh feeling. I took off two stars because of one drawback. One star for that drawback itself, and one star because it limits my ability to use this product. There is no SPF... And these days that’s a deal breaker for me! Now that I’m solidly in my late twenties and fine line and wrinkle prevention has become more of a concern, it’s important for me to use SPF on my face and neck every day. If Clinique ever started making this with SPF it would get 5 stars from me for sure. I might go back to this during the colder months but I doubt I’ll use it much throughout the rest of spring and summer.
review_title: A great product with an unfortunate downside

review_text: I really like it. It makes skin smooth.
I love this moisturizer. It leaves my face feeling really soft and isn’t greasy in any way. People have complimented me on how soft my face looks and feels
I really like this moisturizer! It’s light and it doesn’t make me face feel oily. Its very gentle on my skin and doesn’t make me break out. Great job Clinique :)

This is the only moisturizer I’ve ever used that has hydrated my skin without leaving a weird residue or making my skin break out. I’ve only been using it for two days, and my skin is baby soft, with the prettiest glow! I absolutely recommend this moisturizer.

After using the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel the first time, I thought it was “okay“ but not amazing, but at that time, I figured there wasn’t anything else that does the job somewhat than this, so I went out to buy another bottle. Sadly, the second time around, I felt like it did nothing for my skin. My skin was still oily (T-zone) after the first hours, and it didn’t do much moisturizing. Maybe my skin just sort of got used to this and so it didn’t work for me. Still on the search for a moisturizing gel for my oily skin!

I have a dry/oily combination skin, and this gel works wonders. My acne has cleared with the use of this gel, and my other gals who either have oily or incredibly dry sensitive skin have reported that this has really helped. Adefinate buy:)
This gel is lightweight, fast absorbing and soo comfortable to wear. I use it; my husband uses it, my mom, my sister... it’s really great. If it ever comes out with SPF, it will be a dream!
This is amazing for oily/combination skin. It makes my skin feels and look great ! The best part about it is it doesn’t make my face oily like most moisturizer do.

i was on the search for a good moisturizing but i have oily skin and every single one i try made it worst until i decided to give this a try and iam so glad i did and its better than hope in a jar. this gives my skin all the moisture it needs plus it keeps my skin acne free and my pores seem smaller and every time i apply it feelis so fresh and it smell wonderful i just love this. I do not use the other 2 steps just because i love my purity and microdeliver this is just a wonderful adition to my skin rutine
review_title: im a clinique girl for life

review_text: I first got this as a sample with one of my Sephora orders and I loved it so much that I decided to buy the full size. It was bigger than I expected but I am very pleased. I usually have dry skin and have to cake on moisturizer but this product leaves my skin soft and hydrated with one small coat. I will definetly buy again

I have a very sensitive skin, prone to breakouts and dry patches. This moisturizer soften my skin so much that i have told my mom to touch my skin! It absorb quickly and does not leave a greasy texture.

The title says it all... I use this in combination with the Turnaround Concentrate Radiance Renewer and these two products in combination have given me the best skin I’ve probably ever had. Since I started using this moisturizer, the oiliness in my face has balanced out significantly, my breakouts have reduced, and my skin feels incredibly soft and moisturized. It’s doesn’t feel heavy, and it sinks in quickly. If you have oily skin and need a good moisturizer, you should give this product a try.

I’ve been using this since it came out (like 10 years ago?), and used Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion forever before that. I keep going back to it as my standby after trying different products because it moisturizes without adding grease or shine.
It really hydrates my skin and does mot make it look shiny or oily. It is perfect for summer months, i do use the intensive thirst quencher by clinique during winters if i need added moisture.

I’ve just switched from my Korres Yoghurt Cream because I ended up with a bad (and traumatizing) batch of it to this cream.I’m not sure if I’ll be able to use this in the winter, but so far, it’s fabulous for the Spring and Summer. My skin is a lot less oily with it, and breaks out a lot less because of it. It’s also layerable, for parts of my face that need a bit more moisure. And it’s a great price.I do sort of feel as though my skin isn’t as happy if I don’t use my NARS tinted moisturizer over top of it though. Thus the 4 stars instead of 5.

I have combo dry skin in winter and oily skin that still needs hydration in summer. I spend time on the beach and in the sun and sweat a lot, so I bought this thinking it would feel a lot better on my skin. Unfortunately, even in the thickest humidity and heat, this lotion makes my skin feel dehydrated and parched. Not my answer to hot weather skin care. I will not purchase this again. Gave it two stars bc it didn’t do anything adverse and it may be suitable for very problematic skin types.

I like this moisturizer a lot. Did not make my acne-prone skin break out at all. Dries quickly, leaves skin feeling soft. In the winter months, I found that it sometimes wasn’t moisturizing enough. Also, did not notice a difference with oil control. My oily skin still got oily a couple hours after applying this. I love how lightweight this feels though. Will probably continue to use. Great price.
i don’t know if it’s moisturizing wellbut it feels nice on my skinbut nothing dramatic

It does not really gives off that moisturizing feeling, After you apply, some parts on the face will have that tight drying feeling. However, overtime use will have your face feeling really smooth. It does not help with discolorations or even skin tone. If you are strictly looking for smoother skin, I would recommend this product.
I had never used the gel before and I think it’s great! It makes your skin feel like silk. And the bottle is huge! A good buy all the way around.

This is my all time favorite moisturizer. I refuse to try a different one because this one works so well on my skin. My skin tends to get dry since I wash it so much, and as soon as I apply this (the LOTION, not GEL, I had to exchange it since I accidentally got the GEL) my skin is back to good.
If you have used the DDML and it was too greasy, this is probably what you’re looking for! It’s not heavy and provides your skin with needed moisture. Perfect for those with oiliness.
This is great--it moisturizes without leaving me feeling (and looking) oily immediately. Also it smells nice! Perfect lotion for the summer.

Great lotion. Hydrates quickly and makes lotion look better. I would know because I’ve tested about 4 different lotions total (regular formula clinique, boscia, jurlique) and this one had the best results in terms of how my foundation looked. You do you have to apply generously though, or else it will dry out (i use 2 pumps)

I have incredibly oily skin and so oil control is always a primary concern for me when considering putting anything on my face. I researched what other oily skinned individuals used, and this one came up pretty consistently so I thought I’d give it a shot. I’ve been using it for about a month, and so far so good. It’s very moisturizing as well, and finding a good balance between moisturizing and creating more oiliness is always hard. I would say that the only donwside is that it does NOT contain SPF, which means I can only wear foundations with SPF (or I have to wear a separate SPF and I really don’t want that much layering).
Non oily texture and quick absorption
It feels so light and very hydrating no sticky feeling nor oily
This is a gentle and effective moisturizer for sensitive skin. It is light, leaves your skin soft. Only wish it had SPF!
This moisturizer is a must. It’s light and doesn’t clog pores, it’s also hypo-allergenic for those with sensitive skin.
it gave off a very matte feel, which i personally liked.however, i feel that other moisturizers work better at moisturizing.
review_title: Did not moisturize that well but liked the feeling

review_text: For years, I have used a moisturizer followed by a mattifying primer. And I honestly did not expect to ever find anything to replace both. But here it is! True to its name, the consistency is a gel, and it absorbs pretty quickly to a matte finish. Yet it is effective in moisturizing as well, so I never have to worry about flakes. Best single-step face product I have come across. Well done Clinique!

This is a great product because it is very lightweight and it doesn’t feel like it clogs the pores. It absorbs quickly.On the label the product reads that it is “combination oily to oily’ skin, so I thought that it would help reduce my oily skin (I tend to get oily around the nose area throughout the day), but it does not.It is a good product and I like it because it feels very nice on my skin and it does not cause break-outs, but I don’t think I will be repurchasing it any time soon just because reducing oilyness is my priority.

Stocking up on this again for the warm weather. I Love Moisture Surge for winter, but this gel is perfect for the summertime. It’s just enough moisture without being greasy. It absorbs quickly and does not irritate my sensitive skin and is the only lotion I’ve ever tried that doesn’t make my acne worse.

This moisturizer is light but gives just enough moisture for acne prone or oily skin. It’s like it is not even there after it absorbs. Goes perfect under makeup, leaving no residue. Only gave it 3 stars because there aren’t any long term benefits like anti aging.

I have combination/oily skin and it usually gets oily in the t-zone by the end of the day. This is one of my go-to products. I try other brands but always come back to this. In the winter i use the lotion because my skin gets a bit dry but the gel is perfect for spring and summer with the weather getting warmer. This definitely hydrates without being too sticky and it soaks right into the skin which makes it perfect to wear under foundation.This sits well under makeup but i usually also wear a primer(nars pore-miniziming) just to make it last all day. I will definitely be repurchasing this again and again. I recommend everyone to give it a try
LOVE this!!! Even my kids use it!!! Doesnt make me breakout,,,no stinky smell.

I have combination skin, with my cheeks/chin area being fairly normal and my t-zone being super oily. I have been meaning to try the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel for ages and ages, I just never got around to it as I bought endless face moisturizers which left me unsatisfied. Then, one day, 4 weeks ago, I decided, why not, and took the chance on Clinique. THIS STUFF IS AMAZING! It completely nourishes my skin, leaves it soft and quenched, while also preventing oily build up/clogging I got from other moisturizers (especially on my nose!!!). With this gel moisturizer, I was surprised, because I was expecting it to be kind of thick and hard to dissolve. Actually, though, it very easily sinks into your skin, and with one pump I can have my face feeling fully refreshed. I have also been using it for my neck as well. I am really enjoying this moisturizer like I have no other! It is DEFINITELY worth the price! I would say the only downside is the fact that there is no SPF in it. I am a light brown, so it’s not like I absolutely gravitate toward products with tons of SPF, but living in the Arizona heat, I need SOME kind of SPF coverage! So this would have gotten 5 stars had it at least had SPF 15. Either way, I will continue to buy!

It’s inexpensive, it doesn’t make me break out, it doesn’t make me feel like an oil slick in the summer but it’s hearty enough for winter. I’ve been using this for years, and I think it’s the reason I get mistaken for a college student all the time. :)A tip: a drop of jojoba oil in about three pumps of this stuff helps tame the shinies on your t-zone and actually helps prevent zits.

I honestly love this product to death. I used this product for over 2 years in between other moisturizers whenever I ran out of this one but nothing can compares to this product. I don’t even know why I think other moisturizers can compares to this one.

I have super oily skin. Even though I wipe down all my oil, it comes back again. This moisturizer helped me so much to control my oil because it’s non-oily and non-greasy. It was also very moisturizer and absorbs quickly. Definitely gonna repurchase this!
I really like gel moisturizers, because lotions tend to leave my skin too oily. I like this one because it leaves my skin moisturized, but I wish it would soak in just a little faster.

I have dry to combination skin depending on the season. I’d been having some flaky patches on my nose this winter which I hated and wasn’t having any luck with any other products I’ve tried. I picked up the small size tube of this at Sephora for about $20 CAD just to test it out. I’d read glowing reviews about how fantastic it is so I was intrigued.This stuff is so nice and light, absorbs completely with no greasy feeling, and a little goes a long way! Flaky skin - gone! I’m really glad I bought this and will definitely be buying a bigger size the next time. I’m still working through the small tube I purchased in January.

I’ve been using this product since highschool. I first started with the standard moisturizer, but I found that too heavy for the summer months. I was thrilled when this gel was introduced. It is fast absorbing, and doesn’t make you feel like you are baking in your skin. I use it all year long now, and I wouldn’t dream of using another moisturizer.

I have used this moisturizer for years. Love it, wouldn’t be without it. I tried to switch to a cheaper drugstore-type moisturizer but my skin rebels! I use this year-round for my combination skin and it is the best. I only wish the pump would truly get the last bits out of the bottle. By the end of the bottle I am tipping it to the side and scooping the rest out Nothing to deter me from using it but just a small annoyance.

I love this product! I bought it back in november, and I use it morning and night. I have pretty crazy skin... sometimes its super dry (mostly in winter) but sometimes its normal. My nose tends to get a little oily sometimes, and this moisturizer is great! I will definitely be re-buying this product(:
I love this moisturizer. I use it every morning and night. It feels really good on your skin and it is oil free. It is the BEST!!!!!!

I have used this moisturizer for years now and was very happy to find it in a value size. This bottle will last a long time. Glad to see that Sephora is working hard to find great deals for customers!
What I really love about this product is that it isn’t greasy and absorbs into the skin quickly. It is also very soothing.

The best moisturizer I’ve used quite a few bottles now. I have extremely oily skin. This product is so easy to obsorb and is not greasy at all. I do feel that in the winter this product alone makes my skin feel a bit dry in the first couple hours.

i have combination skin with a super oily t-zone and normal-dry cheeks. i have tried all kinds of moisturizers and although they claim all sorts of things, i’ve always ended up breaking out. this product is the perfect match for me. doesn’t break me out, is not thick nor does it feel clogging at all. i use it night and day and am seeing serious improvements to the texture of my skin
this moisturizing gel helps control the oil and acne on my face. i’ve tried every brands out there but this is the only one that works for me. highly-recommended!
I love the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. Its not greasy and makes my face so velvety smooth! Wouldn’t change for anything else!
LOVE this product! It works miracles on dry, flaky skin in the middle of winter!

This will be a very good moisturizer for you if you do not have very dry skin. I have very dry skin (especially now in the winter) and it doesn’t work very well for me. After I put it on after washing my face, I can see and feel my skin still being very dry and flaky. I will have to put it on two or three different times to have my skin fully moisturized.It also doesn’t absorb very quickly.If you need a really good moisturizer because you have very dry to dry skin, then make sure you get this lotion in the lotion and not the gel (the one for dry to dry combination skin).

I have that skin that is always so dry it’s peeling but still breaks out. I tried many moisturizers before this and they all made me either break out or they didn’t do anything to help my skin. This product is perfect. It moisturizes without leaving skin oily or shiny and it definitely doesn’t make you break out. it’s light and feels amazing the second you put it on. Although the price tag is a little above the average budget it is worth every last penny. i would highly recommend this product.

I like this moisturizer because it is lightweight, it absorbs really quickly - but it sometimes feels like there is a sticky film left over for a while (but eventually goes away). It doesn’t mattetify and I get pretty oily quickly but it’s better than anything else I’ve tried except Bliss Steep Clean Mattetifying moisturizer which is my favourite - but this is much more cost efficient and it works almost as well.

My current HG moisturizer as I battle an outbreak of acne. I’m not a big fan of some of the moisturizers out there that are formulated for acne-prone skin. I’ve been using this moisturizer with the Murad Clarifying Cleanser and Toner and have seen an improvement in my skin.
