I love the texture and lightness of this moisturizer - my skin drinks it up and remains perfectly hydrated. I’m impressed!
review_title: Perfect amount of moisture for oily skin

review_text: I used this gel during the summertime when your face gets sweaty and its great, it dries fast and does not leave your face feeling oily at all. For the winter I use the hydrating cream because my face gets dry, but great gel!

I have fairly oily skin but also get random, flaky patches which makes finding a good moisturizer tough. This stuff is excellent though. It is very lightweight and absorbs into the skin immediately, leaving a smooth surface. It also moisturizes my dry patches. I will definitely purchase it again :)
my friend very like this,I buy this for her gift.Her skin is dry,but it is too oil Maybe because this name.
I bought this for my daughter as it is a classic staple product, meaning it was around when I was a teenager too. It is a very light moisturizer and good for avoiding breakouts.

I have been using this for almost a year and in that time my face is much smoother. Wonderfully smooth. Prior to using it I felt the need to exfoliate, but no longer. It’s light gel and it is long lasting.
Every other moisturizer I have used has made my face break out. This one is great because it is lightweight and leaves me face silky without the grease of lotions.

This product is amazing. This is my first time using any moisturizing cream.I was unsure what to get. This product was not the cheepest product out there. But i can tell you its worth the money, You wont regret it!

This moisturizer is so wonderful, I cannot even express it. My skin is so sensitive and extremely oily and this works like a charm for everyday use. I think it’s changed my skin texture and made it much smoother. I definitely recommend this for everyone, it’s the best!

I have oily/combination skin and found this product to be a perfect moisturizer for my skin. I’ve tried other oil-free moisturizer lotions and always felt the product to be too heavy and left my skin feeling sticky and appearing shiny and greasy. This moisturizing gel absorbs thoroughly and hydrates without any of those unpleasant side effects. Also, this product was great at not causing any breakouts too. I absolutely recommend this!

I have repurchased this many times. I layer SPF over this during the day & use it alone at night. The large pump lasts over 6 months, and the travel size lasts several months.Pros: lightweight, oil-free, hydrates oily/combination skin, doesn’t break skin out.Cons: none

I like that this moisturizer didn’t aggravate my mild acne or make me oily, and I appreciate the clean scent as well as its nice price tag. However, it does not moisturize my combination/normal skin thoroughly- particularly in the winter. (In the summer it is OK.) It’s a good moisturizer, but I wouldn’t buy it again because I prefer something more nourishing (with vitamins and all that good stuff) as opposed to simply hydrating. If you are oily, I expect this would do wonders for you and keep you matte (since I myself am on the oilier side in the summer affirm this).

I swear by this stuff. Its the PERFECT moisturizer for my combination skin. Having an extremely oily t-zone and very dry chin and lower cheek area have made it difficult to properly care for my face in the past. Seriously, every other moisturizer that I have tried has ended in breakouts for me; while going without has made my face red and flaky from the dry areas. Since discovering this product 2 years ago, I have been amazed at how wonderful it is. Its the perfect lightweight yet effective moisturizer.

I did’t use moisturizer because my skin is super oily and every time I try a sample or one of my friends’ moisturizers, I felt my skin even greasier. I decided to give this gel moisturizer a try because the small bottle was just $13, so I didn’t have anything to loose.I immediately felt the change: my skin is definitively moisturized and I don’t feel I have a layer of product in my face. It also feels softer and with more elasticity. I love this product!

When I resided in a colder, dryer climate I would use the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel for very dry skin. I now live in a fairer climate zone and my skin is not dry anymore so I purchased the one for combination skin and it is WAYYY too drying for me to use. I can only use this in addition to make-up primer or with an additional moisturizer.
This is a good moisturizer :) I have a crazy combination skin type, ranging from super-dry to super-oily. This moisturizer is perfect!
I love this lotion, a must have

This lotion goes on smooth and makes my skin feel smooth. It also absorbs quickly and leaves my skin matte, which is great because i have oily skin. BUT winter has not been kind to my skin and i have flaky dry patches around my nose, eyes, and mouth and this lotion does not help with that. It just soaks right into my dry skin and leaves it flaky. I dont expect it to hydrate since it is for oily skin. So i will be looking for something to help with my dry patches that doesnt make me a greaseball.
LOVE! I wear this over another moisturizer or by itself. It holds in the moisture amazingly! I can’t go a day without it. I prefer the gel over the lotion.
used for over a month. so far, no blemishes like from other moisturizers i have tried in the past. and it seems to do what it says it will.

I bought this moisturizer after I ran out of the lotion version of the “dramatically different“ as the lotion is for dry, and the gel is for oily, and I have mostly oily skin. I live in GA so the summers are pretty humid and I thought it was a little drying then, but the humidity evened any difference out. But now in the winter, my skin feels flakey (even after exfoliating) and dry after I use it. Not sure if I’ll switch back to the Dramatically Different Lotion, or if I’ll seek something completely else out. I was very dissapointed.

I really wanted to like this product because I’m a fan of Clinique, but I was very disappointed. I have an oily t zone and the rest of my skin is dry and it made all my face dry! When applied under makeup it made my skin look dehydrated.

I really like this moisturizer because it moisturizes just enough without leaving my face shiny and oily. I started to see shortly after applying my makeup that face would be shiny, I new I needed to switch moisturizers. This did the job. Less touch ups are needed throughout the day.

I recently just stopped using Proactiv because it was getting expensive and needed a moisturizer. It is great at controlling my oil during the day and is very light. Will now use only this! Pair this with the Purity face wash by Philosophy and you’re set!

Just like the description by other customers, it is“Lightweight, Absorbs Quickly, Intensive, Non-Greasy, Moisturizing, Hydrating, Gentle, Refreshing, Smooth, Soothing, Long Lasting, and after all, very Affordable.Great product, really Amazing!

I have had trouble with many moisturizers causing my skin to break out but this has been the perfect balance. I have severe combination skin (very dry in the dry areas, very oily in oily spots) and using this gel in the morning and evening as my moisturizer has helped even it out almost completely!

I have combination skin of the extreme kind: very sensitive and dry with excessively oily problem areas. That being said, this is by far the best lotion I’ve ever used. Leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth without any greasy residue. Also provides a great matte finish before makeup application. Worth the price,
Works great and makes my face feel so smooth! I tried the lotion version but it was too heavy/greasy for me, but the gel is perfect.

I used to use the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion but that started breaking my skin out so now I use the gel and my skin is pimple free, would recommend this for people with sensitive skin like me.
No sticky residue and not too thick

this is a heavy duty face moisturizer. oily skin people should stay away but if you have combo or dry skin its perfect or if yu just get dry in the cold months. ive been using it for the past 3 years and i love it but i do you a lighter one sometiems
This gel really helps my dry skin without making me break out or look too oily. That is all I could possibly ask for from a moisturizer. I won’t be using anything else for a looooooong time.
This moisturizer is AWESOME. I really like it. Your skin feels so soft after using it ! you dont need a lot of it. It does everything it says. Really like it.

I love that it is so lightweight yet it keeps my skin moisturized all day. With other products my skin tended to get tight about mid-day but that doesn’t happen with this. It absorbs quickly and I also like that you don’t need much to cover your whole face / neck (one pump for me) which means it will hopefully last a long time.
This is my all time favorite moisturizer! I have tried so many other brands, but always come back to this one.

This gel moisturizer feels much more lightweight than a standard lotion and absorbs very quickly. Despite its lightness, it keeps my skin properly moisturized during winter dryness. It is, by far, the best face moisturizer I have ever used.

i couldn’t find anything that would get rid of the gross dry flakey skin i get in the winter and occasionally the rest of the year, until i found this! i pair it with an age-defying serum (i’m not at the wrinkle prone age, it’s just that age-defying serums are extremely moisturizing and good for hydration) and it does the job! it also makes my skin soo soft!
I’ve been using this for years. I love it. My combo skin makes it hard to find something that gives me moisture without being oily. This so far is what has work.
This is one of my staples. I buy two bottles at a time so as not to run out.
I have combination oily skin and really struggled for a while to find a moisturizer that was enough, but not too much, and didn’t irritate my sensitive skin. This stuff is perfect!

This stuff is amazing. I only have to use 1 pump, and it covers my whole face with a little extra for dryer patches. Because its a gel, my oily skin stays under control but still properly moisturized. I love it! And it doesn’t smell funny. In fact, I don’t think it smells at all

Absolutely worth the money. If you are oily/acne prone then I would at least give this a try. It really seems to balance the oils. I will be buying the new larger size as soon as I run out of what I already have.

My favorite facial product. It is smooth, doesn’t clog my pores, and I can wear it under makeup or alone. It doesn’t make my face shine and my face looks better now that I use it. I am already on my fifth bottle :)

This is definitely a great moisturizer. I have been through countless moisturizers; Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel does not smell too strong, (it has a nice clean-just-got-out-of-the-shower smell) it’s lightweight so you can use it any time of day, the and it doesn’t make your face feel sticky after putting it on.
review_title: my favorite moisturizing gel of all time!

review_text: This moisturizing is amazing ! I love it ! I’ve been using this product for about 1 year now , and it’s great ! It doesn’t make your face look shiny , oily . It apply so smoothly . This product is definitely worth the money ! I would recommend this to a friend or family . P.S. It feels so great on your face ! (:

I like this moisturizer. It is exactly what it says in that it is lightweight. The only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is that I put it on two coats? I don’t know if it’s because it winter and my skin is super dry or what but sometimes if I just put it on once I am left feeling still dry. Wondering if in the summer it will be different...

I have been tortured by my acne for years and have to be careful with every single product that I purchase for my face. I never viewed Clinique as an acne solution, but I’ve already tried everything else. This moisturizer is wonderful. It feels so fresh and clean on my skin. I was worried at first because I did notice it looked greasy when I first applied it but it quickly absorbed into my skin and looked like a natural dew. I swear it makes my skin look smoother and clearer and I’ve only been using it for a few weeks.

I tried dramatically lotion first., but it didn’t work well on my skin. So I got this instead of the lotion. This gel works really well on my skin. It is really smooth and it softens my skin. I don’t get breakouts although it contains mineral oil. This is oil-free formula so I can apply on my nose or chin area. Great!! It is winter now but it moisturizes my skin well too.

I heard of this moisturizing gel from a video and decided to try it out. When i apply it on my skin after i wash my face, it feels...slick. It doesn’t feel so soft but i will continue using it until it runs out. I will probably not buy it again.

I use it twice a day after using regular facewash and my skin has never been happier. I rarely get breakouts now and my face never feels dry or tight and never oily. It seems to balance my skin perfectly.

I use this along with the rest of the 3-step system. After using the first two steps, my skin tends to be stripped dry, and I need some sort of moisture or it’ll get irritated. This is perfect because it’s not oily, but I do have to pat away a lot of excess because I prefer to have a super thin coat on my face (just so it doesn’t get too greasy feeling, or looking).

I have combination skin where I get oily in my t-zone but dry everywhere else and this moisturizing gel does just the trick to keep me hydrated but not too oily. I previously used the lotion form of this but it got too oily to the point where my face felt too greasy that I had to find an alternative. This one is really nice since I only have to use one pump for the mouth area and nose and I’ll be good for the rest of the day. It also absorbs very quickly and is unscented. I highly recommend.
Leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed!
This is the only moisture I use on my face and I absolutely love it. It is light, and never leaves my face feeling oily.

The texture of this moisturizer was definitely something I had to get used to. It wasn’t moisturizing enough for my dry skin so I ended up returning. During the cooler months, I tend to favor more of a cream so I ended up returning it, My bf has normal to oily/acne-prone skin and found the texture to be odd as well and not as moisturizing
review_title: Too light for my dry skin

review_text: I have combination skin that tends to be more oily than most women my age. This moisturizer is exactly what have been searching for. It hydrates while still controlling excess oil, leaving my skin refreshed and healthy-feeling. I’m very happy with this gel and with Clinique (this is my first-ever Clinique purchase). I used a Chanel hydrating gel for years before they discontinued it, and I have looked for a replacement since. This is the first product that is even comparable, and a bonus that it’s also much more affordable than Chanel! I love it and will purchase again!
It’s very lightweight and doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy or oily at all. I also appreciate that it’s fragrance free. Highly recommended for oily or combination skin tyles.

I was at the checkout in the store and there were so many mini things that I wanted to try something! I picked this and the next morning I put on my hand to try it on and I was so happy with the results! It wasn’t greasy just perfect! It made my hand so silky smooth! I’d recommend this product!

I love this stuff. My husband loves this stuff!! I’ve been using it for years, and love the way it feels on my skin. My skin soaks this lotion up, with no oily residue nor does it “sit“ on my skin. My husband uses it after he shaves and it keeps his cheeks baby soft:) I put a dab on a q-tip to remove stubborn eye make-up that wants to stay under my eyes. I just love this stuff!!!
My skin has definitely improved especially when I use it in combination with Clinique’s creamy cleanser. My skin feels silky. I love this stuff. The price is do reasonable it’s hard to beat.

This is the most amazing moisturizer! It dries quickly, and has an almost “matte“ texture when it dries, but still feels extremely moisturizing! I will definitely be buying again! It also didn’t break me out, and just gives me a beautiful glow<3
AMAZING. A tiny bit moisturizes the entire face and it lasts all day. Better than any other oil-free moisturizing I’ve used and there’s no weird, chemical smell.
Very light-weight, great for sensitive and/or acne-prone skin, not oily/greasy at all

I would have liked the moisturizer to be a bit creamier or heavier. But thats just out of personal preference since I love having a dewy-ness to my skin. but I guess I’ll have to wait until my skin clears up to completely achieve that look for my skin. I like this product though.

This is a beautifully light and deeply moisturizing gel. It moisturizes as if it were a heavy cream, but it is so light and lovely that is allows your pores to breathe. My skin stays moisturized all day...even in harsh wind. It is light enough that I can wear it under foundation and my skin still breathes.

I have been using this product for my skin since I was 17. As I’m now 50, it’s been a long run and I have never been disappointed. The cost is quite reasonable and the daily routine is simple. While genetics play into my “great skin“, I am still mistaken for 30-40 I have to think that my skin routine contributes to that.

When it’s winter, my skin always dried so badly. Someone I know recommended this moisturizing gel for me and this gel was awesome!! It hydrated my skin immediately and after using 2-3times, my skin became really hydrated. I love this gel and I would definitely buy this again.

I love this moisturizer. After washing my face it feels dry with that tight feeling and this relieves that. It goes on with a slightly cool feeling that feels great.I have combo/oily skin leaning to the oily side & this doesn’t make me shiny at all!
I love this lotion during the summer because it feels very light. but for the winter times.. i feel as if its a little too dry for me.This product did not make me break out. My brother loves it.
Have used this product for years. Extremely light, feels like you are wearing nothing on your skin. My go to product.

I am really loving this moisturizer right now. I tried using the lotion a couple of times but the ingredients always irritated my skin and made me break out. I have very oily skin, so finding a good moisturizer has always been difficult. The biggest thing was finding a product that moisturizes without making my skin more oily and doesn’t clog pores. It was also important that I find something that worked well under makeup. I’ve been using this for about a month and so far, DDMG fits the bill. It’s lightweight, absorbs quickly, leaves my skin feeling hydrated (not oily!), and my foundation glides right over it, no problem. I have nothing but good things to say about this product. And it’s reasonably priced. What more can you ask for? For oily/combination skin, this is a good every day moisturizer.
review_title: DDMG fits the bill...and my budget!

review_text: I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer. It is super moisturizing, but drys to a matte finish! Its great for oily skin, and doesnt irritate your skin!:) Perfect moisturizer!

Seriously. Best. Moisturizer. Ever. I cringe whenever I have to put anything else on my skin. Once you go clinique, you never go back. It’s moisturizing and does not make my skin oily. My mom has been using the dramatically different lotion for my entire life and has never tired of it. I use the gel because I have oily skin. Love it love it love it.
It’s light enough without feeling greasy or have to run out and use blotting paper. Good stuff!

I’ve been using this lotion for, literally, years and cannot see myself switching ever.It is the perfect consistency for my oily skin, especially during the humid summer months.It also mixes well with self-tanner, if you’re one of those people (like me) who adds a little to their daily face lotion to keep a glow going all through the year.
review_title: My go-to face lotion for YEARS

review_text: I have very oily/acne prone skin, and this is one of the best moisturizers out there. Leaves my skin soft and smooth without a oil slick by the end of the day. It is also good to use on your hair during the winter to smooth down frizzies. Just wish they would make it with an spf in it.
I had used the regular Clinique moisturizer for years. When this gel version came out I tried it. I LOVE it! Its lighter than the regular but works just as effectively without feeling heavy.
Light, oil free and hydrating. After use skin feels baby soft, makeup goes on smooth.
It is really good! this is my second bottle~ I will keep using it.

My sensitive skin has tolerated well thus far. I use it in conjunction with the turnaround serum and night cream. Wish the hydrating feel lasted a bit longer but afraid to try the lotion for fear of breakouts. Have tried many a lotion, for the price I think this does well and is nonirritating.

This is and will always be a part of my beauty routine, is moisturizing without being greasy, it makes my skin pretty, soft and happy... I will buy this for as long as it is available, great for oily or combination skin

I struggle with products constantly because I’m allergic to lotion. That’s right. I’m allergic to lotion. I have to use gel-based everything, and Clinique makes one of the few gel-based moisturizers that doesn’t contain retinoids (something I use at night) or salicylic acid (something else I’m allergic to). I have to supplement the level of moisturization in the winter, but for an everyday moisturizer, this stuff really does the trick!
i like itdownfall not SPF 15 so i use it at night only
OMG. It sinks in in like 2 minutes. Feels slick to the touch. Smells fresh. Doesn’t make my face feel oily. I have oily skin. Need I say more?
review_title: My face feels like a baby's butt. Litterally.

review_text: I have been using this for as long as I can remember (maybe 10 years) and this is the thing I always go back to. It moisturizes the skin while leaving it non oily. I have combination skin and I am really oily on my forehead, nose, and top of cheeks, while everything else is normal/dry. I use it at night and in the morning under my make up application. This is the only thing I can find that does my skin wonderful. Remember: always put your face moisturizer onto your neck as well! you don’t want to get older and have a great moisturized face while your neck is wrinkly and gross!
Absolutely amazing for my skin type (oily-combination). It left my skin soft and fresh and left me a very happy customer :) I will be purchasing for a very long time!

This is the best lotion! I have sensitive, combination, acne prone skin. I can get really oily so I was always afraid of lotions, but I can get really dry and flakey in areas too because of all the harsh skin treatments. This lotion heals my dry skin and doesn’t make my skin oily/cause breakouts. Plus the price may seem a bit much, but I’ll have one of the larger ones for like a year because a little goes a long way. It’s a good value

This is the best moisturizing gel/lotion that I’ve ever used. Clinique has such awesome products that you can’t really go wrong. I have combination skin and when I use this with the 3 step skin care, it leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized. It doesn’t make me too greasy or oily which can cause breakouts, it’s just perfect. My only complaint is that you can only get this in the 4.2 oz size, and I really wish I could get the bigger one that they show on the product page, which is impossible to find anywhere, even at clinique. Every woman needs a 3 step skin care plan and clinigue’s is the best. I’ve tried other products and always go right back to this one. This is fast absorbing so you can put your makeup on right away and then get on with your day. Moisturizing is the most important part of any 3 step program so you have to find the best one, and this one is that! Go ahead and try it, you can always return it.
This is my 3rd or 4th bottle. It is lightweight, moisturizing and non-greasy. Great for summer and wintertime, day or night.
This stuff is pretty awesome. You wouldn’t think a gel would be moisturizing, but this has truly helped my skin. I recommend this product.

I loveeeeee this gel! the gel is great for combination skin leaving its fresh and moisturized! It helps clear up imperfections. It is now a part of my daily face routine and will never go without it. Its a lifer product!

I have combination type skin, and this product is perfect for me. It does a great job moisturizing where i need it and leaves my oily skin nice and silky smooth. I use this before going to bed and first thing in the morning. it can be doubled as a face primer if you want because of how well make-up goes on on top of it.complaints: it leaves your hands slightly sticky after applying it so wash your hands, and it makes the skin around my mouth slightly dry.
I never used a moisturizing lotion because it always made my skin more oily. This moisturizing gel is amazing. It actually controls oil and makes my skin so soft. I love this stuff!!
The lotion causes me to have breakouts and this is no different. Very, very greasy. Clogged my skin and cause red inflamations and acne.

It’s a fantastic product. :) Compared to everything eslse I use--- This is a lightweight product, that makes my skin feel silky smooth and smooth every morning. I have recommended it to several friends, who also love it!

It is a good moisturizer........I have been using it for a month now and although it hasn’t transformed my skin, it does what it is supposed to. I especially like that I can use it under makeup without messing the makeup up.I actually use a thicker moisturizer at night (surprisingly, I like Johnson’s Baby Moisturizer....I was out of moisturizer on a trip and bought a travel size just to tide me over....and it was great...however, I can’t use it under makeup).
have been using this for years. before, my combination skin gets breakouts so much. this is my life saver! plus sunblock comes separate...so i can use this day and night.

I have used this moisturizer in the past, and though I am not currently using it, I still reccomend it. To put it simply this moisturizer gives combination-oily skin waterbased moisture (as to not clog pores) without a heavy feeling or extra oil, combining natural products and water to give you non irritating, non greasy moisture all day, every day. I don’t reccomend this to people looking for alot of moisture--the lotion version of this is better for that (see my review on that!).
One of the best face lotions for combination skin hands down.
It’s ightweight and gives enough moisture for oily skin. My skin care routine is all about Clinique products (except eye cream) and I’m very satisfied.

I have veryyy sensitive skin so I am afraid to put any kind of moisturizer on. This stuff works great, absorbs quickly and isn’t heavy at all. Doesn’t make my face break out. It’s a great product and I will continue to buy in the future.

OK so I bought this back in Middle School, but didn’t barely use it for about 4 years and started up again my Junior year (last year) and looking back to where my skin was before this year, I can honestly say this does the job (I don’t even use the other 2 steps of this system!Yes, I still get some acneYes, I still have a red nose and some rednessbutMy skin is sooo smooth and looking at the quality, my pores have really evened out so nicely. I actually feel like I have REAL skin rather than dead fish scales! Expensive, but worth it, can use with any cleanser.
review_title: It Made My Skin Amazing! True to its Name..

review_text: Let me start out by stating that I do have dry skin. That being said, this stuff is still wonderful! My skin just drinks it up and it does not cause me to have blemishes either (like a lot of heavier moisturizers do). Now if my skin is overly dry in some spots, I apply 2 layers.

This is a great product at a great price. I use this moisturizing gel in the summer and then switch off to the moisturizing lotion ( be careful they have VERY similar packaging....gel= oily skin types, lotion= dry skin types) in the winter. much cheaper than my old face lotion and works just as good! based on your skin type, give the lotion or gel a try...sephora sells both in a to go size(which is generously sized)...i believe it was around $13 the last time i purchased it but i could be mistaken.

I have combination oily skin and decided to give this a try after i heard so many good reviews but it made my skin feel dry and tight. I don’t know if it was the climate because it was starting to get cold but i still had a bit of oiliness midday. needless to say i returned this product.
Not greasy, best to be used after washing face, can be used in the day / night / any time when you feel needed
I have oily skin and this is the only moisturizer I can actually use. It is so lightweight and does a good job but never makes my skin look oily, shiny or greasy.

I ordered this to counteract any over-drying I might experience when trying different acne-fighting skincare kits. I’m very pleased with it and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to other people with acne-prone skin. It soaks right into my skin with no stinging and relieves that tight feeling I sometimes experience with anti-acne products. As far as I can tell, it hasn’t increased my breakouts or blackheads, and it doesn’t make me stick to my pillow either.
Tried Boscia oil free moisturizer to try something new but went back to this! Felt it did the same thing but was 1/2 the price!
review_title: Oil free, great price, always my go to

review_text: I love this moisturizer. Although I have very dry skin it some how gets greasy by midday and then breaks out. With this moisturizer I never get random breakouts or greasy feeling but I do have to spot treat the dry areas that pop up. I love how soft it makes my skin feel.

hands down best ever. lightweight, absorbs super fast, doesn’t leave a residue feeling like some other moisturizers do.i used to use the dramatically diff moisturizing lotion, and started using the gel by mistake actually. but the difference was amazing! i found out that the mineral oil in the moisturizing lotion irritated my skin, and my skin has been better ever since!
Very light and absorbs quickly. I definitely prefer this to the original moisturizer!

Every now and then I venture into a different skin care routine, but I always come back to clinique. Nothing makes my skin look as great as the 3 step system. DDMG leaves my skin smooth and supple, and never causes me to break out. It goes great under makeup. I’ll always use this stuff!
This is a really great product. It moisturizes without being greasy or causing breakouts on my sensitive skin. Great for all types of skin. I will definitely keep buying this. Highly recommend

I used the Dramatically Different Lotion for a long time, but in retrospect never really liked the way it felt on my face. My skin has gotten a little bit more oily over the years, and I read that the gel was more suited for combo/oily skin. I am very happy since I switched to the gel. It absorbs very fast & leaves your face feeling smooth & hydrated. It is very light, compared to the lotion which I always thought felt heavy and just sat on my face.

For what this moisturizer does and how much you get for the price, it’s the best moisturizer on the market. I’ve tried better moisturizers in the sense that my skin felt less oily longer and my face looked really good, but you pay so much for like an ounce on average. So for 24 bucks and over 4 oz of product, this is the best moisturizer for those who want a treat for their skin but are also trying to save money. One bottle, using twice a day, lasts over three months.

I love the fact that this is a gel. I have oily skin, so I’m always conscious of the shine effect from some moisturizers. This one keeps my skin smooth and moisturized without turning my face into an oil slick. I actually was using the Clinique 3 step acne system and the ance lotion was a bit drying. I use the gel last or sometimes instead of the lotion if I’m feeling extra dry. This is a terrific product to use under my make-up and under my primer.

I have somewhat moderate to super oily skin (depending on my diet, hormones, etc.) Someone at Sephora showed this to me, and on an impulse i bought it. Gel moisturizers are actually reommended for oily skin because they get absorbed into the skin (i don’t like how lotion feels on my skin, it would be great for someone who doesn’t have oily skin but since i DO get oily, i don’t need any more shiny-ness than I already produce). So basically this stuff is great, it’s a GREAT price too, i can see this lasting me for a while. It has a slightly light fragrance, but goes away after you put it on. One pump doesn’t do it for me I need about 2 for my face otherwise i’m pulling on my skin. And it still absorbes all the way into my pores. Didn’t break me out - (It shouldn’t) .If you plan on putting a foundation primer over this make sure you wait at least 10 mintues after applying this if you do.If you have normal, dry skin, you should get the lotion form.

I am an early 20’s customer, and have been using this moisturizer every night for the past 7-8 years. (I do not use it in the morning because I use another product with SPF.)It is a very basic, but very effective, moisturizer for oily or combination skin. Within seconds of putting it on, the product has completely absorbed, my skin feels smoother/plumper, and it looks more even and glowing. The smell is very minimal and clean. There are no real frills to this moisturizer, but if you are looking for a basic, preventative moisturizer (or a lightweight option to wear under foundation), I would definitely recommend this!I should also add that one bottle lasts me 10-12 months (I use ~3 pumps per day), so it is worth the money and, really, a very affordable choice.My only complaint is that, during the fall/winter season, my skin sometimes still feels a little tight/dry after applying. I remedy this, though, by mixing in a tiny bit of a richer lotion/cream.
i had some trouble breaking out last week so i picked this up, and it does the job perfectly! soft dewy skin with no more clogged pores!

Before this product, my skin was pretty much flawless (the least amount of zits ive ever seen). I started using this, and about two weeks later my forehead and cheeks broke out in little surface zits/bumps everywhere! I thought it might be stress, but it never went away. I used it for approx. 2 months and stopped using it a few days ago. I have been using Sephora instant moisturizer for the last two days and applying zip cream llike crazy so we’ll see how it works out.Other than the break out, the product is good because my skin soaks it up fast and its the first moisturizer that doesnt make my face oily during the day. Great PRO because the oil blotting sheets were getting expensive!

This is by far my favorite moisturizer for my oily skin. I’ve been using it 4 years now and the results are still amazing. So lightweight, yet so moisturizing. It’s literally amazing! I don’ know how they’ve done it. I even use it around my eyes without any irritation.
Absorbs quickly and smoothes on evenly. wish it had spf.

Sinks in quickly. no greasy feel. perfect for oily skin. I apply this in the morning after washing my face. then i put sunscreen over it.It works well with layering all types of products. I havent found anything better for my oily complexion.
Love it in the gel form!!

I have been using this product for years, just the right amount of moisture for my oily skin. Unlike other gel moisturizers like Moisture Surge, etc. this one has powdered silica that gives it a nice soft feel on the skin and helps absorb oil at the same time. As to the lack of SPF, they leave it out because some people are allergic, like me. I do know that the men’s lotion for oily skin is exactly the same DDMG, just with SPF, still no fragrance, just the packaging is different.I highly recommend this product, especially if you go through a ton of blotting sheets, it really makes a difference!

It’s been really hard finding a moisturizer fitting for combo skin - you need something that takes care of dry patches yet doesn’t make your skin oily. All the moisturizer I’ve had always gave me a layer of oil an hour after putting it on. But if I don’t use it during the daytime, my skin gets dry. So you see my dilemma?I’ve always wanted to get the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion but when I heard the Gel version came out that was formulated specifically skin types like mine, I ran to swipe it off the shelf.So far, I’m somewhat satisfied. It definitely does not give me an oily layer like other moisturizers do but it’s not exactly intense enough to prevent my dry patches. But then again, I haven’t been moisturizing at night (been lazy). I’m thinking though that once I get into my nightly routine, it’ll all work out.
review_title: Like a tall drink of water

review_text: love this lotion!!! doesnt make me breakout and my kids steal it from me all the time!

I want to start by saying the only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because there is no SPF. I am really hoping Clinique comes out with a formula soon that has SPF instead of having to add an extra layer of sunscreen.This moisturizer is great. I have combo oily skin (oily T-zone, comfortable in the cheeks). Finding a moisturizer that does not leave my skin shiner is hard to find (I’ve been through a lot). I actually stay shine-free all day with this, which feels like a miracle to me. This leaves your skin feeling smooth and soft, not at all oily, greasy, or like you have too thick of a moisturizer on. I would recommend this to anyone with combo oily to oily skin. This is also a great value because of the large size. There are many drugstore moisturizers you could get that are more expensive per ounceI am a Clinique type 3.

Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel was suggested for one of our teens who has slightly oily skin. While this isn’t made for normal skin, I tried it, too, and it we both agree that it’s really good. It absorbs well, without a greasy or oily feeling. From my normal skin point of view, it actually felt slightly tightening in a good way. My teen felt this absorbed nicely and quickly, leaving skin looking refreshed. There is something else I can see in my teen’s skin that is positive, maybe a slight radiance or clarity, but I can’t define it since I’m not quite sure what it is. I can only say that after this is applied I can immediately see something beneficial in that teen’s skin. I’m sorry I can’t be more specific - it’s an intangible change for the better. This seems to be an excellent gel moisturizer.
review_title: ONE OF OUR TEENS LOVES THIS GEL MOISTURIZER

review_text: Time and time again, I always go back to this moisturizing gel. Having oily skin, I use to avoid putting on daytime creams/moisturizers because my face would be completely shiny by the afternoon. But this gel hydrates my face without making me look greasy. You can’t beat the price and a bottle lasted me more than half a year!
This is great for acne or oily prone skin, its refreshing moisturizing and fast absorbing. Also it doesn’t clog your pores.

I love this gel moisturizer, I have normal to dry skin, but can’t stand the lotion. This keeps my skin moist enough even in the winer in WI. If I need extra moisture I use the Moisture Surge, it’s awesome, but not affordable. This sinks in quickly, doesn’t irritate near my eyes, works great.

I hate when I was reading reviews, and people wrote “i love this product its so good!“ because they failed to highlight WHATS so good about it! This gel moisturizer isn’t so much a gel per say, a it is a light greaseless lotion. I have normal skin, but with most products my face turns into a grease-fest after i put makeup on. I used to use DDF Light Dew moisturizer but a friend recommended this so I tried it- DDF is twice the cost, and half the size of this Clinique product! I use one pump and it is plenty for my entire face. Definitely worth trying for those with normal skin that turns oily a few hours after washing.

I used this 2 years ago but I thought it didn’t really do much. I was wondering what the hype was about. I just started using this again after I ran out of my Bliss no zit sherlock moisturizer. That moisturizer is a bit more expensive so I turned to clinique. I don’t know if they changed some of the ingredients through time but now it’s so great!My skin is sooo smooth!! oh and my skin is usually super oily in the tzone but after i used this its less oily. love it!! i am not sure if it helps with pimples but I haven’t gotten any huge zits after using this so thats a really good thing!!It also feels so good and it absorbs real quickly!

This is the first moisturizer I have ever tried that doesn’t turn my skin into an oil slick. Yeah, my T-zone still gets shiny within a couple of hours, but t’s not nearly as oily as it is without this moisturizer.

At first, I used the moisturizing lotion but found it a bit too heavy. This moisturizer is non-greasy, light, and absorbs quickly. My skin feels soft and hydrated. Makeup goes on smoother as well. Just love it!!!

I absolutely love this moisturizer! I have tried a lot of other types, Olay, Mary Kay, Avon, etc. and I will always come back to Clinique! The bottle is great and actually quite easy to get the last of the product out of. What I really love is that even though the gel is lightweight, it still does a great job at moisturizing those dry patches and keeping my skin regulated. I have oily skin and this helps to control it. This is non-greasy, absorbs quickly and so light I don’t even feel it before I put my makeup on in the morning.
I purchased this based on reading previous reviews but this product was useless. initially it soaks right in but later (15-20 minutes) my face was greasy and tight. Not good at all!

I have a combination skin and at first I tried the new Acne solutions kit and didn’t like it at all. It was too hash on my skin.I’ve tried Dramatically Different Moisturizer nearly 5 years ago or more and it was so drying. I don’t know when they’ve changed the formula but I like the new version a lot. It moisturizes my skin very wellbut doesn’t make it oily. It’s not a miracle worker but it’s very very good for my skin. I got a small version but I will buy a big bottle ones I finish this one off.

This product has a thinner texture than most moisturizers and goes on so smooth. It dries quickly and leaves my skin feeling great and looking great - no oily or dry patches - just smooth and normal. It smells great and is priced much lower than other name brand moisturizers I’ve used.
worth it. Extremely lightweight, blends well and is a great base for the day. Not a huge fan of the smell, but it’s very minor. When I can afford to, I buy this. My skin just can’t get enough!

I have honestly never used something this amazing for my skin. I have dry-combination skin, however it’s very prone to breakouts, so it’s very hard for me to find a moisturizer that won’t make me feel greasy. This product is perfect, it took care of the dryness on my face, and didn’t make me feel oily at all. My skin absorbed it within seconds, and left my face looking glowing and refreshed. It does exactly what it promises.

This is a keeper. I started using this with philosophy purity cleanser and my skin has never been better and smoother. Blemishes and dry patches cleared up and I now have consistently good skin! I’m not wasting any more money on drugstore products.

i love this moisturizer so much! normally when it gets into fall and winter my skin gets really dry in some places and will even start to peel, but it’s still oily in others. and this is so lightweight and i can notice the differencebetween the gel and normal moisturizer! this is deffonitly my favorite!

my face absorbs this stuff immediately, then looks perfectly moisturized all day. no other product makes my skin so velvety smooth and soft so quickly and easily. great for my combination skin. way better than the lotion.
Dear CliniquePlease make a Dramatically Different Moisturizing lotion/gel with spf.Thanks, Lex

This Stuff is just average. I have used the lotion before and liked it better. The gel leaves a layer of shine on my face and feels more like a primer than a moisturizer. It didn’t really do anything for skin.

I just ran out of my dramatic lotion, and when I went to order a new one, I noticed the gel, for oily skin, which I have. So I figured if I liked the lotion, surely the gel would be even better. Ive been using it for a couple weeks, and while is fine, I think I’ll be going back to the lotion next time.

I had been using drugstore brand moisturizers and this past winter they just weren’t cutting it for my combination skin! I wandered into Sephora for the first time ever and was RESCUED by an amazing employee who was able to figure out exactly what I needed! She suggested this gel and let me try a few different moisturizers on my hands before I bought. This gel had such a rep for being the best, I went ahead and bought the big bottle! Never regretted it! I’m just starting to run low now, almost 8 months later-using it everyday! Great product!
Good moisture without being sticky or greasy. I really love this one

I’ve been looking for a face lotion for my combination- oily skin for a while before. I have tried many different types that did not work well on my face. This product actually helps control the shine on the face during day time!
This is waaay better than the lotion moisturizer. This makes my skin feel hydrated not greasy! Go buy it!!!

I have combination skin and had a very hard time finding a face lotion I liked. Most left my skin feeling oily and caused me to break out. This gel is absolutely wonderful--I can’t live without it. No breakouts at all, and it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.
review_title: The only face moisturizer I'll use

review_text: I’ve tried every moisturizer out there & keep coming back to this one. I use day/night & it makes my skin hydrated, silky & smoothe.

this is a ’must have’ moisturizer for people with oily and/or acne prone skin. no frills, just an awesome moisturizer for daytime use. have i seen a dramatic decrease in oiliness? no, b/c oil production is multi-factoral. however, i have not broken out, which is a huge bonus. the lotion is light, doesnt feel heavy. this should be a staple in everyone’s skincare regimine.
This is an amazing product! The formula is perfect for people with oily skin because it instantly gives long lasting moisture without making you shiny or breakouts. Love this product.

It took years for me to figure out the right combination of face wash, toner, and moisturizer for my oily skin. Take it from someone who has tried some of the best products out there. This stuff is better! It doesn’t clog pores but moisturizes just enough without feeling tight or greasy. Oil production is lower, and my face feels softer. A pea size amount covers my whole face.
Love this product. It does the job but it’s not greasy and absorbs quickly. It’s perfect for me and an absolute must in my skincare. Won’t do without it.
Love this gel moisturizer! great for ppl who have oily skin and cant stand the sticky feel of thicker lotions/creams

I wish it had spf in it. It does a wonderful job and my skin feels smooth and soft. I used to use it twice a day, and since my tinted moisturizer has spf in it I didn’t mind too much that there’s no sun protection, Well, there are days where I do not always wear makeup, so I bought another clinique moisturizer with spf 25 and plan to use this one at night. Besides that, I totally recommend it.

I have oily skin that is prone to break out if I use lotions on my face. I tried so many different products and none come close to this. Ever since I have been using this I have not had any breakouts due to my lotion. This is a great lightweight product yet moisturizes my skin and leaves it feeling clean and hydrated.
I love this moisturizer. I have slight oily skin and live in the south where it is extremely humid. This moisturizer is perfect giving me hydration without the greasiness
Goes on light, no oily feeling can put your make up on right away...I love it.

Wow, I love this moisturizer! It works really well on my acne-prone skin. It makes my skin feel soft, but not greasy. You only need a little of it each time; this bottle lasted me 6 months. The only downside is that the pump stops dispensing product when there is still a good bit left in the bottle. I got around this by unscrewing the top and scraping it out. A little inconvenient, but it works.
Great product! Not oily or greasy at all. I live in South Florida and my skin doesn’t feel greasy even with humidity
This moisturizer makes my face feels really nice and clean. It does help controlling the oil on my face.
I’ve used this for 3 years and can’t live without it. It make my skin very smooth and hydrated.

For some reason my skin is hydrated better with the gel and not the lotion. It smooths my skin, doesn’t clog pores and hydrates very well. Like all the other skin products, I’ve tried a variety of moisturizing lotions and I always come back to Clinique.
Just the right amount of moisture.

This absorbs so quickly. I have had such a hard time finding a lotion that would not take forever to “sink in“ and I found it!! It also keeps my face from feeling greasy an hour later. Love...Love....Love it!
I super love this product. Was so happy to discover this formula.

I have rather “confused“ skin. A very oily T-zone, dry cheeks, random break-outs, but for the most-part free of blemishes. It’s really hard for me to find a daily moisturizer that matches my skin - I need it to be lightweight, non-greasy, hydrating and quick-absorbing. Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel meets my criteria!

This is absolutely the best moisturizer for someone who struggles with acne but also has sensitive dry skin. I have mild acne but very dry skin and this is the oil-free version of the dramatically different moisturizing lotion, which was made me break out. Besides that, it’s made my skin SO much smoother and softer and my pores are now practically invisible! AMAZING. THANK YOU CLINIQUE! :)
Light AND moisturizing...enough said.

This is an amazing moisturizer. 100 x better than the one my derm. recommended for my oily skin. I love putting it on.. makes my face feel refreshed and keeps it feeling refreshed. I swear that’s its been improving the condition of my face as well as it feels much smoother. I use about 2 pumps per day.. so it will def last me a long time so its worth the cost. It’s just perfect .. non greesy... TRY IT!

My skin is an enigma. It is extremely oily in the t-zone, and combination everywhere else. Since it gets so oily, I used to skip moisturizing all together and would just tone & prime...by the end of the day I would have flakiness around my nose and chin despite the heavy oil on top of it. WTF? When I use this, I don’t have to worry about flakes, and the biggest relief is I don’t have to worry about being extra oily from using moisturizer. This will soak in right away and leave your skin soft without a thick oily film left behind. If you have oily skin you owe it to yourself to try this! If you want a heavy moisturizer this is not it.

I been using this product for years now, and i still love ittt!! I use it everyday after my cleanser and toner. I have large pores on nose, and have noticed that they are less visible now since I first started using this gel. Would recommend to anyone with my same problem. Cheers!!

I bought this product because it’s marketed towards combo/oily skin and I have very oily skin. I’ve been using it since December until now and I have to say that while I do like it, I don’t love it. I thought it was amazing until recently when I tried the Clinique Moisture Surge Extended Thirst Relief. The dramatically different moisturizing gel (DDMG for short) feels like a very lightweight lotion. It absorbs readily and quickly into the skin. I really like that aspect of the DDMG but it honestly does not moisturize my skin that much. Oftentimes, I feel like my skin is very oily because it is dehydrated due to the acne products I use (which I only use once a day). So I want a moisturizer that absorbs readily, feels lightweight, yet hydrates at the same time. The DDMG didn’t hydrate my skin very well. I tried increasing the amount I was applying to my face - usually I use 1 pump but lately I have been using 1 1/2 pumps - and it feels somewhat hydrated. So I would say that this helps with my oilyness a little bit but not enough. This is an okay product but for dehydrated skin that becomes oily throughout the day, I would recommend the Clinique Moisture Surge Extended Thirst Relief instead. If your skin only needs a little bit of moisture or simply a lightweight moisturizer for the summertime, then this product will probably work better for you.For the price, you get a large amount of product that should last several months so it’s definitely a good value. Because of the value and all of the rave reviews, I wanted to like this product more but I’m sorry to say that I will not be repurchasing this once I finish the bottle. I would have given it a higher rating had it not claimed to be a hydrator or “moisture drink.“ I know a lot of people love this product (I wish I did too!) but I would suggest getting a sample of it first and seeing if you like how it feels for a few days before purchasing.

i love this moisturizer! it is lightweight and fresh feeling. i have dry/combination skin and prefer the gel over the lotion because the lotion is too heavy and greasy for my skin even though it tends to be dryer. the only reason i gave it 4 stars is because i find it a little expensive, not too bad because it is so great, but it is a little pricey..

Very lightweight and good for oily skin, absorbs quickly. It’s great for the summer, but I’m not sure if it will be hydrating enough for the winter. But for the price, I would definitely keep buying to use as a summer moisturizer.
goes on smooth and sinks right in, doesn’t feel greasy or sticky...i use it every day

I have used the clinique skincare line since I was a sophmore in highschool and I would recommend it to anyone. The moisturizing gel is lighter than the lotion but still packs the same punch. Awesome product.
My skin type varies with season. It will be oily, dry, and combination year round. This moisturizer alternates as it helps moisturize my dry skin and controls my oil.
review_title: Great for my skin year round.

review_text: This is an old standby for me. No matter what other moisturizers I try, I always come back to this. It’s perfect in the summer for my oily skin in a summer humidity. I stay hydrated without being greasy.
I was looking for a light non greasy moisturizer and this is PERFECT. It works even better with the Clinique 3step system. LOVE IT

I have tried a handful of moisturizers, most of which I find greasy, and leave a residue. I’m a guy who has recently had problems with redness and flakiness with my T-zone. I have combination-oily skin. This moisturizer is GREAT! It goes on lightly, absorbs within a couple of minutes, and gives me just enough moisture to get through the day. I’ve been using this product along with anthony logistics clean start kit ($40) for about 3 weeks and my redness and flakiness has been completely taken care of. I’ve used it 2x daily after washing face, about 5 pumps of the 4 oz bottle, and I’ve only used about 15% of it. I highly recommend this product for men and all alike.
review_title: The perfect moisturizer for combination oily skin.

review_text: I absolutley love this moisturizer! It doesn’t cause my skin to break out or over dry. Also a little goes a long way so it lasts for quite a while. The only reasons I didn’t give it a full five stars is because it takes a few minutes to soak in and the pump in my opion gives you just a little bit too much product.

Well. The good part was that it was moisturising like it’s supposed to be. It made my skin feel really cool and clean + it absorbed quickly.My face felt sticky sometimes though. And even amidst that tingly-cooling feeling it made my redness problem worse. If you have facial redness I would not recommend this.
This is a classic staple for my summer. It is not heavy and absorbs easily. My face only requires two pumps and I still have plently of moisturizer left.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for 5 years and I’ve never found anything better. My skin is oily and acne prone. Clinique has finally made a product that moisturizes without using pore-clogging oils. It works great! I use about two pumps a day and it lasts me 3 months. Love it!!
This is my go to moisturizer because in the summer I’m way too oily and in the winter I become more likely to get dry skin. This moisturizer helps with both!
It is amazing, and i have been using this product for a long time, and my friends heard from me and tried it , all of them think it is great. easy to absorb, and smooth.

i’m 20 and have a combination/dry skin and this is the best moisturizer i’ve ever used (i’ve tried drugstore, different department store and even dermatologist office brands). it’s not heavy or greasy but just the right amount of moisture for the dry, flakey patches on my forehead and bridge of my nose. it leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. i also use it with the Clinique Comforting Cream Cleanser and the Murad Essential-C Toner and after about 8 years of trying to find the right routine I think I’ve got it!

This absorbs fast and doesn’t make me oily. For combination skin, the dry parts will need much more, so I end up going through this quickly. I prefer Korres pomegranate moisturizer to this one - pricier but I use less of it and it is natural - compared to what’s in this moisturizer.
review_title: So light and great for sensitive skin

review_text: I love this gel the right amount of moisturizer for oily or combo skin no spf though I wish but finally something close that I can give it a 4. Now my skin got used to it, I used a little because every girl should use a primer before foundation so your pores don’t clog. I know its a lot of steps for us woman just to look good. My next try for moisturizer DDF light dew moisturizer with spf...

I usually don’t wear lotion, I find most is VERY greasy to the touch for me. So, I tried this Moisturizing Gel and all I can say is WOW! this dries quickly, its lightweight and not greasy at all!! VERY moisturizing and does a great job after the shower and before applying makeup! DEFINITELY recommend!!

one of the best lotion/gels I’ve used. I have oily skin and very prone to breakouts as a result, and this doesn’t make it oily at all, but still moisturized.As a result I tossed my blotting paper because it’s controlling the shine for me wonderfully

Sure, this moisturizer absorbs quickly and feels lightweight, but I think it was breaking me out in little bumps.This is the third time I’ve tried it and it still hasn’t worked. It has silica/silicone in it which breaks me out, so people allergic to that, stay away.Unfortunately, it’s going back to the store. :/

I have been using this for more than four years because it’s oil-free. I have oily, acne prone skin so it helps keep the oiliness down. During the summer, I might couple it with isa knox’s facial sunscreen that doesn’t make my face oily (I know amazing!...a sunscreen that isn’t oily). And in the winter, I couple it with just a little bit of clinique’s moisture surge on areas that dry easily. Great for everyday!
Great moisturizer! I love it because it is wonderful for oily skin! Does not break you out and I am in love with this product!

This is my all-time favorite everyday moisturizer. I used to use the Proactiv green tea moisturizer, which is comparable BUT it is $30 for only 1 oz. This is a great price and works fantastically. I don’t know that it “controls oil“ necessarily, but at least it doesn’t add to the problem. Has never caused any problems for my very sensitive skin.

This is my favorite moisturizer of all time! I swear I can actually feel my skin soaking up the moisture! I live in humid Hawaii but I have dehydrated/combination skin so I have a tricky time finding good products that will moisturize without being too heavy. This gel is the perfect balance for my skin!

I’ve been using this moisturizer for a little over a month now. I haven’t noticed any extra break-outs since I’ve started using it. As far as controlling oil, maybe a little, but not enough for me to notice. I naturally have oily skin. The main thing is that it doesn’t cause me to break out any worse than I normally would.
SO SILKY SO SMOOTH I HAVE NEVER FOUND A MOISTERIZER THAT DOESNT MAKE ME BREAKOUT NOW I FINALLY FOUND IT 27 YEARS TOO LATE LOVE THIS
i have normal to combination skin type, this product is a little bit dry to me .... maybe the cream is better for me.

I have pretty oily skin for someone closer to 40 than 30. I’ve tried every single moisturizer ever made, it seems like, and wasted every dollar I spent... until now. I had resigned myself to never being able to use moisturizer... until now. Going on week two and it’s yet to break me out. All it does is moisturize without creating an oil slick, which is all I wanted.

I heard so many good reviews on this product so I bought it and tried it outthe gel is better to me than the lotion because its lighter and absorbs quickly. It’s just the smell that I don’t like but except for that I love it
I have tried many moisturizers over the years and this one is one of the best I have use. It absorbs quickly, not greasy and last long if you use the correct amount. Really recommend it!
I got the gel one because I have oily skin. My face does feel more moisturize and softer than before. I like its smooth texture and how the skin absorb it quickly. Most likely to purchase it again.

I’ve been waiting for a moisturizer like this forever! Finally, after spending thousands of dollars at the drugstores/ dermatologist this is what has worked! I have sensitive, oily combo skin with some psoriasis on my cheacks(my checks look like I always have a rash) and this stuff has helped smooth, clear and hydrates my skin to look amazing! Thank you Clinique!

i have psoriasis and so my skin is extremely sensitive .ive tried many products and i heard about this and how good it is and i also have oily skin as well..first off a little goes a long way ! ive bought this a while ago and only now ive finished my bottle .my issue with past moisturizers is that it burns my skin .and this is not the case. you get a smooth feel to your skin after you apply it .its amazingi love this stuff worth the price !

I’ve had oily skin all my life and I’ve tried and tried to find something that is lightweight and won’t feel heavy on my skin and make it shiny-looking. Even the ’lightweight’ gels and lotions from drugstores were too heavy. THIS product though, is amazing. It is lightweight, provides just the right amount of moisture for my combination skin, and you don’t need much to make it work.Sometimes, I do need to add a bit extra to the dryer parts of my face (my cheeks) and I switch to the lotion version during the winter for the heavier coverage.Overall, its a great product that provides great coverage for a reasonable price and is great for breakout prone skin.
This is so light yet moisturizing. I love this product and will order it again.

This is the only moisturizer I can use that doesn’t break me out and feel greasy and heavy on my face. It’s fast absorbing and helps prevent my skin from drying out after using acne treatment products.

This is my favorite moisturizer of all-time. I used to use drugstore ones from Aveeno and Neutrogena, but I like this one by far the most. It’s instantly refreshing, non-greasy, and it sets into my skin quickly without making my face sticky to the touch. I used to use the cream version but I found the formula to be too thick, so I have switched to this one and loved it ever since.
Very light! Not oily, but moisturizes very well!!
review_title: exactly what it claims to be!

review_text: No matter when i used this (dry skin, oily skin), this moisturizer always “sits“ on my skin, making my skin appear shiny, oily and sticky! Unless i was to cover my skin with some makeup, i would feel the stickiness all day and i hate that feeling. Currently i’m using DD Lotion under another moisturizer and it’s perfect!
Perfect moisturizer. As someone who has very temperamental skin, this moisturizer does the trick. It adds just enough moisture while managing to stay non-greasy. Definitely worth the money.

After buying countless cheap moisturizers from my local drug store, I finally invested in this more expensive one. I’m glad I did because this one is totally worth it and makes my skin much healthier than it was before. BUY THIS!!

I’ve been using this moisturizer for the past 2 weeks and I think it’s perfect for me. It really feels like it’s moisturizing my face and it goes on lightweight and evenly. I have oily/combination sensitive skin so before I apply this, I use the Mild Toner.
This is good for oily, acne prone sensitive skin. Pretty much the best out there I think. Some antioxidant benefits would have been appreciated.

After using this product my face is matte at the end of the day and the texture of my skin has improved. I’ve been seeing fewer pimples on my face!THIS IS GOING TO BE THE ONE AND ONLY MOISTURIZER I WILL USE ! :)

As a longtime user of DDML, I was a bit skeptical about a gel formula. I am a type 2, so I need a bit lighter moisturizer for the summer. This is it! It melts right into my skin, and leaves it very smooth. I will definitely continue to use this throughout the spring and summer.

I have combination/oily skin that tends to break out easily. I have tried SO many different moisturizers trying to find the perfect formula that hydrates but doesn’t feel heavy/greasy on my oily parts.This moisturizer is it!!! Very light weight but also moisturizing enough. Love to put it on in the morning before I do my makeup cause it absorbs very fast and leaves my skin feeling soft and ready for my makeup.Definitely recommend!!

What can I say? Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel never fails me. I’ve been using Clinique forever but lately I had been hearing that it wasn’t the best for older (63) skin. So I went out and tried 3 or 4 brands touted to be the best for mature skin. SURPRISE, they weren’t. Clinique you never fail me!PS. Even my 37 year old daughter had to admit, Mom knows best.
If you have a oily skin, this is the best moisturizing I’ve ever experimented.
The gel is one of the very few products I can use on my sensitive skin. It never irritates and moisturizes extremely well.

I use this stuff religiously day and night. Sometimes, if you use moisturizers too often, they can make your face even dryer and this NEVER does that. I have oily skin that can get really dry if I use the wrong face cleaner and this formula prevents my face from ever drying out. It’s light weight and dries super fast. You only need a dime size amount or less to get full coverage and a moisturized face. I’ve been using this product for a little over a year and highly recommend it.
review_title: Amazing, the best moisturizer out there!

review_text: I got this a a gift last year and started using this since Jan 2011. However, not only this gel is not greasy, it does not break me out as well.After 4 months of “intensive“ use, I still have half a bottle left.If you would like to find an oil-free, non-greasy, great with foundation moisturizer, you must try this!!!!!!!
review_title: Best Moisturize EVER! Last forever as well!

review_text: This is the absolute best moisturizer for combination skin, and the only one I’ve found doesn’t cause me to break out. It’s lightweight, unscented and awesome.

Best moisturizing gel. Great for combination-oily skin. Makes my skin feels soft. My sister and mom start liking it after I tell them to use it. Great value bought this 3 times already. Great for using with a foundation too. great to apply after a mask.
FINALLY a reasonably priced moisturizer that doesn’t make me break out. I should have tried this a long time ago. I was debating between this and the moisture surge. Glad I picked this one.

I LOVE this moisturizer. I use this everyday after I take a shower. I have oily/combination skin and this lotion doesn’t make my face oily. I’m currently on my 2nd bottle and i have another one for backup. i recommend this to everyone who has oily skin!
I hate the greasy wet feeling of most facial moisturizers, this product is a dream. Have yet to find anything better than this

I’ve been on a quest for the perfect moisturizer, and this one pretty good. It absorbs really quickly, is really light-weight, and does not make me break out. My skin is no longer dry and flaky, but that could also have been a seasonal thing. There isn’t much of a fragrance to it, and you get a pretty good amount for your money, plus a little goes a long way. I tried the Sephora brand moisturizer before this, and I definitely like the Clinique better. Really, the quality of this is pretty amazing for the price. The odds are pretty good that this will be a repeat purchase.
I’ve used this product off and on since middle school, and it has never let me down.
its a little too dry but it changes the skin texture

This product does me wonders! It is inexpensive for the quality that you are getting. I don’t know what I would do without this face gel. I used the face lotion when I was first introduced to Clinique but the gel is a million times better. It is light and conditions your skin fully! EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
Used to use Dramatically Different Lotion and always got oily quick during the day. Switched to Gel when it came out and LOVE it!

I bought this moisturizer and the first time i tried it it felt like all the other moisturizers i have used had no chance! This moisturizer is very lightweight and i love it most because it absorbs very quickly!
Originally purchased the moisturizing LOTION, returned it, and bouthg the moisturizing GEL as my skin is prone to acne. This is working wonderfully. Light, yet moisturizes.

I have extremely oily skin and have tried everything and every combination of products/treatments, but nothing has ever worked--until this product! It’s amazing--it absorbs so quickly and leaves my skin so soft and naturally matte looking. And my skin stays ’normal’ looking for the rest of the day. I’ve never had a mattifying product last that long or have such good results. And ever other moisterizer just leaves my skin feeling greasy and like it doesn’t really absorb into my skin. But not this one--I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product because after years of searching for something that makes my skin act like normal skin, I’ve finally found it!

Originally, I had really dry skin and started using the Clinique moisturizing lotion, and it made my skin combination/ oily! So I bought this one, and it does a good job of mattifying and moisturizing my face.
I love how it feel so light on my skin, it’s a great moisturizer if you have an oily skin..I just love it!!!

It provides the perfect amount of moisture for my foundation to go on smooth... without making my skin coated or oily. This is a multi-buy. I’ve been wearing it for years. It’s better for the spring and summer because winter usually dries the skin.

This is a good day moisturizer and is what I use before putting on my Bare Escentuals foundation. I’ve been using this product for about a year and using this moisturizer (along with others in the 3-Step Skin Care System) has kept my face clear, moisturized and even toned. The reason why I give it 4 stars is because I think this product needs to be used with other Clinique products for best results. I couldn’t just use this moisturizer by itself and be satisfied.

I have oily/acne prone skin and using this moisturizer has helped so much to reduce it. The formula is lightweight and it absorbs quicly so it doesn’t feel like I have some kind of invisible mask on. Because of that, it works great for the warmer/hot months to come. I did purchase this around the end of winter and found it didn’t help much with the drier areas on my face. My dry spots were visible and no matter how much I layered on, flakiness still occurs. I also find that I do not have to use a lot ( a little goes a long way). One pump is all I need :)

This product does absorb quickly, doesn’t clog pores and is very lightweight but I feel like it isn’t really moisturizing my skin. Although I did just get it, so it may take some time to get the affects. Other than that , it has a very great formula.

This is perhaps my favorite beauty product. It is the best moisturizer for oily skin. Lightweight but still does the job. Not greasy, rubs in smoothly and quickly. Doesn’t have much fragrance either. My husband even uses it sometimes after he shaves. Worth every penny!

After using an Oil of Olay with SPF protection moisturizer for a while (and still liking it, just never found it again at the grocery store and didn’t make the extra trip to a drugstore to track it down), I decided to try out Clinique’s moisturizing gel. I bought it in the winter and have pretty dry skin during that time, so there were a few mornings where I’d put it on after a shower and then need to reapply before putting on makeup. I absolutely LOVE the scent (smells like cinnamon tea) and I love the fact that it’s oil free, it has a really light feel to it which will be wonderful in the spring and summer. I’ll probably try a different product with SPF in it when this one runs out but it was definitely worth trying.
This is the only lotion on the market that moisturizes my skin without breaking it out. I combine this with the acne foam and my skin has never looked or felt better :-)
Perfect for those with combination skin like me! I would buy this product again when I finish using it!
very nice moisturizer. its super lightweight and goes on to the skin easily. I have combination skin and it works great!
the title says it all

My skin is oily but I go to college in a very dry area so I always get dry skin here. I’ve been searching for a moisturizer for oily skin that is actually moisturizing and not drying and I always find that they either dry your skin out or they are too oily for my skin. When I heard a review about this moisturizer I went to sephora to try it out and it feels so light and moisturizing that I couldn’t resist buying it. I hate anything that is thick and I can feel it on my skin, I want to put it on and not feel it the rest of the day. After using it for three weeks now it’s definately the best one I have ever used. It feels very light and refreshing on the skin and almost soothing and it doesn’t break me out! This is my holy grail item!

My friend introduced me the product a while ago and I just finished my first bottle. I love it. This is my second bottle. The gel makes my skin soft and smooth. It’s lightweight and not greasy. It’s great for sensitive skin (no fragrance). It’s a bit pricey for my budget, but it’s worth it.
super light and creamy, but not EXTREMELY moisturizing. I have only been using it for about a week, but I do like it so far. Also, the pump distributes a perfect amount.

I was one of those people that never used moisturizers due to my extremely oily/acne skin. boy was I wrong, using this moisturizer helps keep my skin balanced so now it doesn’t have to produce as much oil as before. I’m still dealing with the oil/acne but I think with this product I’m on the right track. All you need is one pump 2x day so I’m hoping this bottle will last me a few months.
review_title: really works great on my oily skin

review_text: Perfect day moisturizer. Holy grail product for me. No breakouts, no irritation, no overbearing scent. Simple and effective.

This lotion feels light on your skin, but at the same time it is very hydrating. I have tried many lotions but no other compares to this one. I’m already on my 6th purtchase and I truly hope that Clinique never stops making this one. If you have oily/ combination skin, give this a try. You will not regret it!
I love this stuff a lot. A little goes a long way. It absorbs pretty quickly as well and moisturises well.
review_title: A little goes a long way.

review_text: I originally purchased the original formulation of this moisturizer, but found it to be too much for my combination skin. I really like this version! It provides all the moisture I need without being too heavy!!

I got it as a sample and my skin is really sensitive and almost everything I try made it break out like crazy. This one is really good. It absorbs really quickly but it’s not for me, I think it’s for more oily skin, because I had to use quite a bit so my face doesn’t feel dry

This is a very hydrating moisturizer, but it is also light so it can be used everyday morning and night. My skin feels great the whole day when I use this moisturizer. In the winter or when I have really dry skin, I will use a thicker cream one the particular area, but other than that this is the PERFECT everyday moisturizer!

The Clinique Gel Hydrant is phenomenal and has done works for my face. It is honestly one of the most moisturizing products that I have used. It doesn’t have the same impact that lotion does. The gel gives your face a fresh look without making it oily. Overall, the product has kept my face feeling fresh and it great becuase all Clinique products are based on acne type skin. Not only does it allow my face to feel clean but does not irritate it in any way.
it’s definitely my choice for summer!! it does work!!
I just started using Clinique products a couple of months ago and they have totally reduced the amount of oil my skin produces.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for almost a year now and its been amazing for my dry/oily combo skin. The lotion keeps my skin well-hydrated without leaving a greasy, oily feeling or look. Because it’s so lightweight and spreads easily, I dont have to buy again for quite a while. Its worth the $$. I’ve tried the dramatically different moisturizing LOTION, and there is a consideration difference between the two.

I have had this product for 3 weeks and I am not completely sure about it. All I know is that it is extremely moisturizing however I feel like this product is actually making my skin more oily because maybe my pores are getting stripped of the oil too fast that it ends up producing more in the end. I don’t think I had great luck with this product, but I will continue to use it once in a while for moisturization

I’ve suffered from acne for about 7 years and this is the first product that has almost completely cured me! my face looks better than it has in years and I finally feel confident going foundation-free! This product is simply amazing, perfect amount of moisture for my combination skin and doesn’t leave me feeling dry or to oily. A perfect moisturizer!
