I wanted to love this....I really did. Upon using it for about 5 days I started breaking out all over my face....in places I usually never break out. I am very annoyed. Anyway, I purchased the Moisture surge gel instead. It is more expensive, but it’s worth it. Plus, this product wasn’t even moisturizing to my skin :/ Avoid if you have acne prone skin.
I have very very dry skin and i know this is used for oily skin but i find this moisturizes my skin better than the dramatically different moisturizing lotion and its a lot lighter!!
This is the best facial moisturizer available in my opinion. I’ve tried many others, but nothing feels or works like the Clinique one.
Great for my acne prone skin. Moisturizes just enough without causing extra oil and break outs, only moisturizer I use. All Clinique products are amazing!!

I have terribly oily skin and this was recommended to keep my skin hydrated but without adding any extra shine. Melted into my skin and left a nice smooth base for me to apply makeup. Love this and will continue to buy.
review_title: Moisturizing yet perfect for oily skin

review_text: Why did I wait so long to try this!? I have oily (in the summer) to combo (in the winter) skin and have gone through so many products (and so much money) trying to find something that would moisturize my skin but not create a bigger oil problem. I found the perfect product in this gel! It feels light and refreshing going on, soaks right in, and dries to a supple, soft finish. No more heavy feeling, or sense that my moisturizer is just sitting on top of my skin. This probably wouldn’t work for drier skin types but it is perfect for me. My skin feels soft and amazing. My powder foundation applied flawlessly on top of this and I noticed less oiliness as the day progressed. Love this!

I first used this moisturizer years ago, but when I ran out I tried something else. I get bored with products very easily, and tend to switch around a lot. Well, after moving to a new area with ridiculous humidity (added to my oily & acne prone skin), I needed to up my game a bit. I decided to give this another go because I remembered it being lightweight. All I can say is what the heck was I thinking when I stopped using this?!?! This leaves my face moisturized enough to where it doesn’t feel tight, sinks into the skin very fast, and dries to a near-powder finish. My face is so soft that I don’t want to wear makeup. That says a lot for me! ;)
review_title: Dear Clinique, I will never stray again!

review_text: this moisturizer is just great! it doesn’t make my skin feel oily, absorbs really quickly and is really lightweight. love it!

This is the best moisturizer I have ever tried! I have oily/acne prone skin and this moisturizer doesn’t make my face oily or break out. Other moisturizers seem to leave a residue on my skin, but this gel makes my face feel soft, clean, and moisturized. Also, I use this under my tinted moisturizer and it helps it go on really smooth. The only thing I would add would be SPF? Why doesn’t clinique have any SPF protection in their moisturizers? Overall, really great moisturizer that I would recommend for anyone with oily/combination skin.

I used this for years when I had cystic acne and very oily skin. It’s lightweight and perfect for day wear, but is moisturizing enough to use at night time as well. Great for sensitive skin with allergies.

I used this as the third step in my 3-step skincare regimen. It’s the only moisturizer that I had applied in the night that would not give me a very oily face when I woke up in the morning. It also don’t break-out my sensitive skin.
review_title: best moisturizer for my oily skin

review_text: I don’t think this product wanted to work with my body chemistry! I (usually) have VERY oily skin, with the occasional dry spots around the corners of my mouth and sometimes the cheeks (during the winter time). I would apply this during the day because it was a lighter moisturizer and I didn’t want to get too oily throughout the day, BUT as I progressively used it, my occasional dry spots started to form. I guess the formula wasn’t hydrating enough for those specific spots.Towards the end of my use of this product, it absorbed into my skin way too quickly, where I would find myself needing a little more hydration. BUT it does do a great job at reducing the production of oil, and I commend it for being the only moisturizer that has made my face the least oily!
I really like this product for my sensitive, acne prone skin. I just wish it had an SPF in it to protect.
I like the gel so much more than the original cream for my oily skin.

love love love this absorbs so quickly, doesnt feel greasy, and makes my skin look fantastic. totally worth the price. i also have really super sensitive skin and this doesnt bother it at all, actually soothes any red spots. definately reccomend!
the only moisturizer that really sinks in immediately yet produces visibly supple, soft skin. love it
I love this gel rather than lotion, because it is light weight and it is great on my face when my skin is dry. I put it on before I put my make-up on and it absorbs very quickly. Love it!

I have nothing but good things to say about this product. It leaves your skin feeling better than velvety while keeping it firm. Although I recently figured out that I’m a combination dry, I’m still in love with this product. However, I definitely recommend this for combo oily or straight oily ONLY.
I HAVE to use this on my skin after i was my face. Its great for oily skin :) It’s light weight and non greasy
I just want to comment on the design of this container/bottle: very stupid design as it’s hard to get the gel resting at the bottom, which means a waste of money and resources.

i finally purchased this moisturizer after hearing and reading so many rave reviews about it. i have combination oily skin, so this product sounded like it could be the answer. i broke out SO BAD! this product was the only item i had switched up in my skincare regimen. i was so disappointed, and i threw the box away, so, i was also unable to return it. argh.

my skin is very sensitive and breaks out very easily. through many years of trial and error. this product has consistently been the only thing that NEVER gives me ANY problems. it normalizes by combination skin. it makes the skin very soft to touch and healthy looking. it works in both harsh winter and hot summers. it actually makes my skin very healthy looking that i don’t ever realy need to wear make up (which is great, because i have yet to find something that doesn’t break me out).I use this lotion and the Lancome tonner, the Radiant Tonique.i attached a photo of me from my engagement photos, that is me not wearing any foundation/powder, and trust me, my skin didnt look like this when i used other products.

This is a moisturizer that I have purchased multiple times!I love how lightweight & non-grease it is. It absorbs into my skin so quickly & keeps me hydrated & supple all day long.It’s a truly comfortable moisturizer! It feels great on, and keeps my skin happy.Sometimes I’ll have to put more on than I usually do if my skin is especially dry, but that’s the only hint of a downside.This is a wonderful product that I’ll continue to buy again & again!

Great for oily skin types. For some odd reason my skin type has changed recently to being more dry, so this doesn’t quite cut it for the amount of moisture I need. But it does absorb very quickly and leave your face very smooth.
Light, and fresh. I have combination skin, and this stuff is awesome! It is light enough so that it’s not greasy, but still leaves your skin feeling hydratred.

I love the immediate feeling of this gel on my skin especially since I live in a warm environment. As far as moisturizers go, this does not deliver all day. I have used the lotion version before which is much more hydrating. I decided to keep this and use it at night over my PTR FirmX serum which is very heavy in itself. The combo works well, but I originally meant in for daytime use. I will buy the lotion again next time and use it at night since it is so affordable for the amount you get and does make your skin super soft. FYI: for daytime, I have since discovered Rexaline and love it.
I love this moisturizer! It’s perfect for my skin type. It’s a little pricey, though it looks like it’ll last a while, hopefully making the price worth it.
Great light moisturizer for oily, acne-prone skin.

I never had issues with my old lotion, but decided it was just time for a change since I’ve been using the same product for 6 years now. I just need two-three pumps and my face is completely moisturized without feeling like I have a heavy film on my face. I have combination/oily skin and I don’t feel like I need to avoid any areas to prevent shine anymore. I would (and have) recommended this products to my friends.
Nice solution when you need only a lightweight moisturizer

This is the best facial moisturizer for the face in this price range. It’s the perfect amount of moisture for my combination/oily skin. I think there are better products out there, but Clinique products are priced right for what they do.

Alright, so this is my second time getting this moisturizing gel which means I definitely like this product. My only concern is that it runs out fast! For example, after each time I wash my face, I typically use 3 pumps of the gel to moisturize my skin. This has to be done twice a day, therefore, I need to purchase more of this product quite frequently and it’s pricy for just a moisturizer so I don’t want to keep spending that money.On a positive note, this product does it’s job really well. It’s keeping my skin clear and hydrated, and it works as a great primer!

I LOVE this stuff. I just went back to it after trying something else. I live in Northern NY with very cold winters and this beats every other moisterizer in terms of keeping my skin hydrated and not getting flaky. After years of being with proactiv, I have decided to try the acne solutions line with this and so far so good. I like both together! I still get shiny in my t zone with the four products but I like the way my skin looks and will just use my blotting powder.
review_title: love the way my skin feels with this

review_text: I find that I have an oily t-zone and dry skin everywhere else. I heard that gel formulas were better for oily skin and that is one thing I like about this product because the gel like consistency makes the product absorb much quicker. However, this product does not provide nearly enough moisture for me, especially during Canadian winters. No Matter how much I put on, my face is still dry and dehydrated. Also, I read in store that this product helps with oil control. However, I feel that the oiliness in my t-zone area has not decreased enough for me to notice a difference.

First and foremost, I prefer the gel over the lotion any day. The gel version is much more lightweight, less oily, and is easily absorbed. I have an oily t-zone or combination skin and this does its job as a moisturizer but not for long and you have to re-apply it. I like it, it’s light and gentle, and Clinique is a good brand, there’s no scent to it which is good, and it’s even good for people with sensitive skin. Overall, it’s a good product, nothing exceptional though.

I have really oily skin around my nose, my eye lids, and on part of my forehead. However I also have dry patches on my checks and around my eye brows. This moisturizer fixes both of my problems! It hydrates my dry patches without making my skin oily. My skins stays fresh and smooth through the entire day.I also bought this bottle in June 2010 and I still have half of it left. I use it every morning and a few nights a week, and it has lasted me 8 months so far...it’s well worth the money!!
gives an amazing balance to skin

My roommate had this and she had really awful acne. When she went to the dermatologist they told her this moisturizer was making her acne worse. I didn’t ever have a problem with acne so she gave it to me to try and my skin started getting breaking out within hours of me putting it on.

I find it strange that ive been an oily girl for life and yet this moisturizer leaves my face feeling dry. As a moisturizer it just doesnt leave me feeling moisturized enough, I have acne prone skin if you take that and add dry skin into the equation its not a pretty combo. I wanted to love it cause everyone loves it but I cant.I still get oily in my t zone n the rest of my face is dry plus no spf...i guess my expectations were too high

This is an amazing moisturizer. I have had oily skin and blemishes ever since I was a teenager, so moisturizers scared me. But as I have begun to age, I knew I needed something. This is wonderful, it keeps my skin more matte, and works as a makeup primer! I use it am and pm, and I don’t think I could live without it now.
At first I didn’t like it so much because I used it during the winter when my skin is unusually dry and I have very oily skin but now I love it!

I will start with the postives: this does make my skin feel softer, and it absorbs quickly without residue.HOWEVER, this actually really dries out my skin, does not even skintone, does not make me “glow“ or really do anything for me. When I mentioned to a salesgirl at sephora that I would be returning it she said she loves Clinique but does not have a lot of faith in this particular product. I have to agree.

This is a very lightweight, yet really moisturizing lotion. I use 3 pumps for the wintertime, since it’s been extra dry. It absorbs into the skin quickly and does a great job as a primer before I put powder/foundation on. Also noticed my face was less oily after the first few times I used it. Nice, clean smell too. Be sure to use it twice a day for optimum results.

The gel really makes a difference in this old school moisturizer (used the original in high school). My face is oily mostly around the t zone but can get out of hand in the Austin heat. Use this after I wash my face and then apply my foundation. This winter my face has been dry and I use 2 pumps. Highly suggested for Texas weather,
light feeling yet very moisturizing, with no gunkygrimey feeling. i LOVE this!

Saw it in KC during the holidays and tried the sample set out at a Sephora store there on my hand. Made it feel like silk, but not greasy. It’s the same on my face. Absorbs quickly and lasts. I’m definitely a new convert to Clinique!

Prior to purchasing this, I had been using a gel moisturizer that I loved (AmorePacific) but it was simply far too expensive to continue using. I searched Sephora.com for an oil-free, gel moisturizer (as that’s was the one I was using was) and the search pulled this up. I have used Clinique in the past and I have always been happy with their products (I love their All About Eyes eye cream) so I figured I would give this a shot...and I am SO GLAD that I did! The consistency is almost exactly the same as the WAY more expensive AmorePacific moisturizer I had been using. It is very refreshing going on and it sinks it quickly without leaving a sticky/tacky residue behind. It works perfectly as a primer for foundation. My skin looks and feels soft, supple, and healthy. I notice far less t-zone “slick“ by mid-day, as well! And the price will not leave you feeling nauseated ;-) Highly recommend!!
I forgot about Clinique! Great price, great product! I needed something lightweight for my oily skin. This is perfect and it has a pleasant smell.

My skin is dry after a face wash, but it gets really oily throughout the day. However, during the winter months it’s becoming more apparent that I needed a moisturizer. After doing some research on Sephora and reading all the good reviews, I decided to try this product out. It’s been a month since I’ve tried the product and it still works amazingly. It’s really good if you have oily skin because it moisturizes without making your face shiny. I will definitely get this again in the future!

I love this moisturizer. I’ve had severe acne in the past and has been on acutane and everything. I’ve always had oily skin and have always been scared of trying moisturizers but this one is great! its not heavy and it doesn’t leave your face with a shine or greasy feeling. I wear it all the time even under my makeup and primer.

Because this winter has been so dry, I needed a good facial moisturizer for my normal to oily acne prone skin. This stuff is allegedly made for people with my skin type, and so I was all excited to try this moisturizer because I have heard so many great things about it. Sadly, it made me break out HORRIBLY.Granted, I have exceptionally acne prone skin and so I’m likley more the exception than the norm. Still, I was bummed, I had really high hopes for this one. I ended up returning it :(
This is much more lightweight and absorbs much faster.
review_title: I prefer this to the lotion.

review_text: I’ve tried dozens of moisturizers, and this is hands down the BEST one I’ve used. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated, and it absorbs into my skin without leaving any residue or shine. Love this stuff, will definitely be repurchasing.
Can’t get enough of this lotion. It works perfectly for my combination skin type in winter and sumer and never feels greasy.

I really believe I am going to love this product!!! I received a sample yesterday with my purchase of the clinique mild face wash. The woman helping me suggested it, because I have dry skin with rosacea and the oil in the lotion would possibly irritate my skin. It absorbed so quickly but my skin still felt moisturized. And it made me so happy to see not nearly as much redness as i usually do when I apply moisturizers!! Although this product is aimed at people with oily skin, if you are a rosacea sufferer than this product is also for you!! I only gave it four stars because I am going to see in a few weeks if it causes me to breakout or anything like that.

I love this. I tried it for the first time yesterday, and I honestly cannot believe how quickly I fell in love. You only need to use one pump, possibly a pump and a half, to cover your whole skin because a little goes a LONG way. I was shocked, because it doesn’t look like that much, but it spreads over everything. I have oily skin and it gives me such a matte finish while still moisturizing, and is a great base for my Bare Minerals makeup. And it dries so fast! With my old moisturizer, I had to wait at least 5 minutes before applying my makeup, and my skin still felt kind of greasy afterwards. This one makes my skin so soft and beautiful, and NOT GREASY! I feel so clean when I have it on, and it’s hard to tell I’m wearing anything on my face. Though it’s a little pricy, it’s DEFINITELY worth the price because it’s clearly a high-quality product that will last a long time. I know I’ve already said it a few times, but I love love love this, and will definitely be repurchasing it in the future.

Great product. I have used the three step system for about 2 years now. Started buying this product from the department store,but switched over to Sephora because of the great rewards and free samples. This product (gel) is great for oily skin. Leaves skin nice and soft.
pricey and overdrying but still refreshing

I’ve tried tons of different brands and so far, I like this one best. It’s a very light weight moisturizer great for day time for those of us with oily skin. I use a much heavier cream for night time. I’m oily half way through the day regardless but luckily, this moisturizer didn’t add to it. I will definitely continue to use it.
review_title: Great Day Moisturizer for oily skin

review_text: This moisturizer is amazing! I’ve always been weary about using a moisturizer since I have an oily T-zone (even in the winter) but this is amazing! It does not leave my face greasy or oily and it absorbs into the skin fast! I will never try another moisturizer! Great price too, compared to others out there.

The moisturizer is great for oily skin and doesn’t make my face look oily while my make up is on (although the shiny-ness appears later in the day). I have some dry skin though from the Wisconsin winter and the moisturizer isn’t strong enough to nourish the dry skin. I think it would be a great product for summer though.

I just got through my first jumbo sized bottle of this stuff which lasted 7 months (I use only before I apply my make up daily) I have combo skin but no matter what oil free product I used my make up always got greasy looking within a few hrs. With this I noticed a HUGE improvment on the oil and shine and my face is never dry even through winter.

I have acne prone skin and rosacea. Certain products wreck havoc on my sensitive skin. I was a bit nervous about this product as Clinique’s Dramatically Different Lotion left a lot to be desired for my skin. This prouduct is perfect for me. No break outs. No flare ups. My skin is hydrated without felling oily. My skin feels smoother. Definitely will purchase this one again!

Absolutely love this lotion. The gel version has a slightly cool effect after application. The pump bottle makes it really easy to use with the perfect amount each time. Doesn’t leave me feeling oily and has the BEST hydration.

I wish they sold a bigger size, because I love love love this product. It is unscented which is perfect for me since it doesn’t irritate my skin. Leaves skin soft and light, not oily. I reccomend this to everyone!
My husband uses it every day. He is not a fan of the lotion but loves the way the gel does not make his face feel oily. It has never broke him out and makes his skin very soft.
Feels light and cool, not at all oily. Great product!

I had used Clinique before and I was not convinced until I bought this product. This moisturizer is lightweight, non-greasy and I feel comfortable all day. It is a very good moisturizer at a good price.

I’ve been looking for a good moisturizer for my acne prone skin for quite some time. This gel is it! It does everthing it says it does and doesn’t break me out. My skin is smooth and hydrated all day long and if any of you are from the NE you know this dry horrible winter we’ve been having is taking a toll, but with this moisturizer I’m good to go. Great job Clinique. Will definitely purchase again. :)

I have dry skin, most notebly around my mouth after I was my face. That’s the only part that gets ’ashy’ per se. This gel is great because I believe it is oil free and so after I put it on and wait about 10 minutes, if I have any areas that still look dry I can reapply and that normally does the trick.
review_title: Almost good enough for dry skin

review_text: I get pretty oily, so I picked this up as I liked how quickly it soaked into my skin and how lightweight it felt. I’ve really liked it, but feel it will be best in the summer months. I live in MI and this winter I’ve been pretty dry despite my oily skin...so I need something even a bit more heavy duty.

i’ve tried so many moisturizers over the years- so the fact that i’ve re-purchased this one 4 or 5 times says a lot.the gel is so refreshing and light- i have oily skin with some dry patches, and in the cold dry winter, it really needs moisture, too.i love this, and after trying so many other things, and talking to beauty advisors, i’ll never stray from this. such a great product!

I have been using this for a year now and my skin has improved tremendously. I have very sensitive skin and this does not irritate. My 17 year old started on the gel formula and she has great results as well. No doubt this is good for everyone.

I was really excited to try this product after reading all of the reviews, and was so sad to be disappointed.I have oily skin, that normally isn’t dry. After using this for a couple of days, I noticed my skin was dry and the oil production was higher than usual. It just didn’t work for me.

I use this day and night, and as a primer sometimes as well. It feels very light to the skin. I would have wanted to try the lotion though, but I have an oily skin so I ended up with the Gel. However, If you’re looking for a moisturizer during heavy winter season, I don’t think this would stand alone enough. But overall, I love this product and I would surely recommend on getting this.
I’m oily and almost everything breaks me out. This, however, moisturizes without making me breakout. Awesome moisturizer. I highly recommend it.

I’ve used this for a couple weeks now and I really love it. My skin is dry/combination/sensitive (sometimes) so it’s hard to find a moisturizer that doesn’t make my skin oily, flaky or broken out. But this stuff has only left my skin nice and fresh. I do tend to use three pumps, but the bottle is bigger than the typical 1.5 oz. bottles I’m used to. During the winter, I would def. suggest a thicker night cream, but for the day it’s still great.

I really like Clinique’s 3-step system. I chose gel in contrast to the lotion because my skin tends to break out. I am almost out of this product and can’t wait to get more. It feels great on and is lightweight and nourishing.

i bought this product because of all of the hype. and i am sooooo happy with it! it makes you face feel so soft and controls your oils almost all day. i could tell the biggest difference in my skin throughout the day when i switched :)

I don’t think I will ever use another moisturizing ever again. I usually tend to stay away from them because my skin is oily enough and they usually just make it worse, but this one didn’t. It makes my skin so smooth and soft and it really is lightweight and isn’t greasy at all. My absolute favorite moisturizer.

I love this gel. It is 100% fantastic. I use it as a daytime moisturizer and have had amazing results. Lightweight, absorbs quickly, my skin doesn’t react to it or break out, good for oily skin types…just awesome.

This moisturizer is perfect. It is so lightweight you don’t feel it at all even right after applying it, but it still keeps my skin amazingly moisturized even during winter in Colorado. It doesn’t make me break out at all and I’m prone to acne. This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever tried. Definitely get the gel version, because the Dramatically Different lotion can be a bit more greasy.

Although this is targeted for combination/oily skin, I prefer it for my sensitive normal/combination skin. It is lightweight and absorbs quickly, but still gives enough moisture in a small amount (large pea?) to last through the day and night

I normally use the Lotion version of this, but, since I have dry-combination skin with an oily t-zone, I thought I would give this a try. Bad idea. It actually dried out my skin and made it flaky and gross. I was honestly sad that it didn’t work for my skin, because it was really light and absorbed so quickly!

This moisturizer created a perfect balance for my skin. I have mostly oily skin, but with some dryer areas on my cheekbone area. I also have occasional breakouts. Since using this product again, I have had zero breakouts and my skin has looked fresh all day long. I can not give this a higher rating!
review_title: Balanced for my combo skin with some breakouts

review_text: I originally bought this because I was afraid that the lotion would leave an oily/sticky residue behind, despite having dry skin (especially around the cheeks/jawline).For what it’s worth, this stuff absorbs like a dream. 5 minutes after applying and it feels like nothing at all, just a really refreshing hydration. It’s non-irritating, my skin feels smoother, and I swear the redness around my nose has gone down!Unfortunately, given my skin type, it doesn’t do much to CONTAIN moisture and I find myself needing to reapply it very often to keep the feeling going.Overall, I would highly recommend this for people with oily skin that need a good splash of hydrating, but I’ll be looking for something a bit more intense next time.

I like this product, it has a cool feeling when on the face. and it is not heavy. The only problem , it does not have sunscree (as far as I know) so you’d have to add that on with foundation or by itself.
Even though I use this with my concealer and foundation, it does not seem to plump the skin or help with lines.

It goes on smoothly and absorbs very quickly. I feel like it quenches my skin thirst without leaving oily. But after 2 days of using it created some dry patches and 6 new pimples. I still used it for awhile but it made me break out in places I never break out. So later, when I was reading the ingredients I found silicone, which was probably the thing that made me feel so smooth. So I am definitely returning this item. I am still recovering from its damage of dry patches and few dozen new pimples

i am completely in love with this lotion. I have very oily skin and after using this product along with the rest of the 3 step system i noticed a dramatic difference in the texture and appearance of my skin. I use the facial soap for oily skin followed by the clarifying acne solutions lotion and then the moisturizing gel. Within a a couple of days my oil and decreased significantly and my skin was the smoothest it’s been in a long time. I’ve also noticed that due to the salicylic acid in the clarifying lotion my poors have decreased in size and the blackheads on my nose are going away. I am so happy with the clinique line and recommend these products to anyone who has oily acne prone skin. Best of LUCK!!!
I have combination skin that is acne-prone. I use this on my cheeks and neck because they tend to get dry. This doesn’t make me breakout. It is very lightweight; you don’t even feel it on your skin.

It look me years to find an oil free moisturizer that would still hydrate my combination skin without making me break out. When used together with the other 2 steps, it is a winning combination! Now 25, I rarely ever break out. it dries quickly and makes your skin soft. NOT GREASY. If your dry skin this product is not for you because it is super lightweight.
This is the best thing that ever happened to my skin. Smells great. Goes on smoothly. Does NOT feel greasy. Have had many compliments on how soft my skin is because of this amazing product.
I love this! This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. It’s lightweight, oil absorbing, great for oily skin. And is great for day and night! One word to describe it would be: AMAZING!

I am loving this product as it definitely does not leave a greasy residue on my skin like the lotion version does. I do add a little more on in some areas of my face otherwise they get too dry. I am very pleased with the overall use of this product.

I have always had super oily skin, but in recent years (and especially in winter) have found that using a moisturizer keeps my skin smoother and more even. Creams and lotions just clog clog clog my giant pores, even the oil-free ones. I used another gel moisturizer before this one (from H20 Plus) but it dried super fast on the surface of the skin before even absorbing.This Clinique gel covers great and keeps my skin smooth and supple looking, but doesn’t increase oil production or make me shiny. I don’t even need another mattifier after using it. Great stuff- I’m a total convert!
I found that this moisturizer is perfect for my skin. It balances out any oily parts on my face, but hydrates the drier areas. My skin is looking better and more evenly toned day by day!

I love that this moisturizer didn’t leave my skin super oily and it didn’t sit on top of my face. My skin felt hydrated and it stayed that way all day long. It’s a bit expensive, but totally worth it.

I have been using this moisturizer for years. I love that it absorbs fast & is so lightweight, you can’t even feel it. I have tried the lotion moisturizer, but prefer the gel because it doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy.
It does not leave my skin red the next day.

this moisturizer was absolutely amazing! i bought a bottle in the christmas madness because it was on sale and i wanted to try it out..i lovee it! it goes on smooth makes my skin amazing and clear. since ive been using it ive noticed a dramatic improvement in my skins texture and appearance. i would recomend this product to anyone and everyone.

This moisturizer is Great! I have combination skin that is oily in the summer and a little dryer in the winter . I have never had any luck finding a moisturizer that i liked until now, this one is great and my skin drinks it up and is left very smooth! I love the packaging and the pump is very convenient for me. The only thing i find is that sometimes i need a little extra moisture during the winter but so far this is the best i have used.

ive tried many many moisturizers before and this is the one i keep coming back too. i have oily skin but i have dry rough patches around my chin and cheecks. theis gel immediately softens up and moisturizes any rough patches but it dosent make my face oilyer. it is absolutely perfect

I love this moisturizer for my oily skin. It does not clog my pores or break me out since i have acne prone and sensitive skin. I highly recommend this. It even works in the winter time when my skin gets dry in some areas. I use 2 full pumps in the winter time at morning and night and in the summer I only use 1 1/2 pumps at night and that is all I need. This is my second bottle.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! I have been using it for about 8 years now and have yet to find anything that beats it. I have oily and dry skin and it works for both. Try it, you won’t be disappointed!

So much nicer than the original lotion. The gel goes on better and it’s great for mixing it with your foundation to get a lighter consistency or even add a little to my sunscreen so it’s not so thick and goes on more evenly.Just love it. Always have at least 3 bottles in the house.
very good moisturizer. I have oily skin and it doesn’t leave my skin greasy.... :D
I’ve been using this product for a while now and I absolutely love it. I would recommend this to anyone who has oily skin.

love it.best skin care buy I’ve ever made and it was easy because it’s clinique.I was worried I was giving in to branding because it was a go to and i chose it so quickly I half expected to use it the first time and toss it in the trash as I do with most products that I end up buying just because I know the brand so well. However Clinique knocked my socks off with this gel moisturizer that keeps my skin hydrated in the cold weather seasons when I really really need it (without making my face greasy and shiny and gross) and in the summer it keeps my skin balanced so there’s no weather change shock that my face has to go through between seasons any more!Best purchase I’ve ever made for my face and it’s pretty inexpensive!!If you have combination skin get it. Just get it. :-)
great lightweight moisturizer for oily skin and the summer months. it has a cooling effect and absorbs quickly. it’s not enough for dry skin or winter months in my opinion, but great otherwise.

I use this as part of the 3 step skin care during the summer. It moisturizes without making my face oily, but during the dry winter months it’s not enough moisture for me. I find that you have to use the clarifying lotion before so that the skin absorbs it better.
This is my new HG; I can see why my grandmother has been using it longer than I can remember! Absorbs in seconds, not sticky at all, and it keeps me moisturized all day. I definitely recommend it!

I’ve been using this moisturizer since I was 13 and I haven’t switched it up since. Well, okay-- during the summertime I use the Moisturizing Lotion but that’s about it. It’s PERFECT for dry combination skin, especially in the winter time! Say bye bye to ugly dry spots :) this will be your new winter essential!
At first it doesn’t seem to do anything but after using it for a while, I don’t get flaky skin. Once I stop, my skin gets flaky, so this must be a good moisturizer.

i found that this moisturizer is good fro all skin types. but if you are SUPER oily then this moisturizer will be too heavy for you it will feeel like it is sitting on your skin but i have dry skin and i love it great for putting on before makeup
This moisurizer is great. It absorbs quickly, keeps oil at bay, and provides such a great finish for makeup application! Since I started using it, I haven’t had any breakouts.
This is a great product. It leaves my skin feeling so soft and completely moisturized.

I like this gel a lot! It’s great if you have oily skin because it doesn’t over moisturize but it doesn’t undermoisturize like other face lotions or gels for oily skin. It also helps me not get so oily throughout the day.

This is the best moisturizer for me. I love it! It doesn’t feel greasy at all, my skin looks great, it goes on smoothly and I find it soothing. This is my favorite moisturizer. Its light. Heavy products make me feel as if I had a mask on and I hate a greasy face.

I’ve tried dozens of moisturizers (both high-end and department stores) and this is the best so far. I have combination/oily skin and with other moisturizers, my forehead would be glistening midday. However, with Clinique’s, my face was able to stay matte all day. I love it.

i LOVE the way my skin feels after applying this lotion! i use the 3-step system and this final step just feels amazing. it’s not oily or sticky like some other moisturizers i’ve tried. one pump covers my face and neck. my skin looks matte & really good- not glossy like i just applied lotion. i could not recommend any other facial moisturizer!
I’m also thinking about returning this product. It’s too thick and hence blocks my skin pores. i really dislike it
review_title: Too expensive and NOT worth it!

review_text: Whether my skin is drying up or in mint condition, this moisturizer also helps me out. It’s great for sensitive skin and my skin doesn’t sting like crazy after I apply it.

This product is not moisturizing enough for my dry skin, but I love it for mixing in with my foundation to create my own tinted moisturizer. It melt right into the foundation and looks seem less. This will forever be in my collection!
review_title: Great for mixing in with foundations

review_text: I like the gel one betther than the lotion type, in winter this gel is not moisture enough but you can put twice a day or more.
This moisturiziing gel absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling smooth and hydrated!

I was skeptical if I would have less oil on my face after using this product. Well it is actually true. I did not have to wipe my face with a kleenix or paper towel as often during the day. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who has oily t-zones.

This is an excellent lightweight moisturizer. I have combination skin and this does a great job of keeping my skin moisturized without becoming greasy and it didn’t make me break out when I first started using it. Great product for the price.

okay i bought this at the end of summer, i think, and i really liked it at first. it absorbed really fast and it gave my skin a nice glow. but it is now winter and i can not use it. it does not moisturize as well as i would like it to. though it may be my skin’s fault. my skin is crazy and in the summer it’s super oily and in the winter it’s super dry. if your skin is oily all year round (unlike mine) i recommend this product. however if it is combination or dry go with the lotion instead of the gel. as i mentioned earlier i bought this around summer and i was in the store trying to find a difference between the lotion and gel. i had no make up and and it was a fairly clean face (i had got out of the shower about an hour before i got to the mall and i do wash my face in the shower, yes i know i ramble a lot. anyway) and i put the lotion on one side of my face and the gel on the other side i did like the lotion more than the gel because it was moisturizing and it wasn’t greasy and didn’t make me look greasy or feel greasy. but i bought the gel instead because everyone was like “ooo you’re gonna look like a mcdonalds burger in a couple hours. you best buy the one for oily skin“ and im just like “okay, whatever“ it was only a few dollars difference so i bought this one instead. looking back i do wish i bought the other one but this one is a great summer moisturizer for super oily skin

This is a nice, light, gentle moisturizer that sinks into skin easily and works well in the summer. The bottle may look pretty, but around that last half inch of moisturizer you’ll be cursing its wide base and teeny pump. For about five dollars an ounce I need to be able to reach every drop of this stuff. I’ll be buying the smaller squeeze tubes from now on.
i absolutely love this lotion. it is perfect for oily skin. great for winter or summer. a must have!!!

I am kicking myself for using the non gel version of this moisturizer for the last year - what was I thinking???I have sensitive oily combo skin and the non gel version of this lotion moisturized my dry cheeks while getting along with my acne cream. It got a little heavy on my forehead during the summer season. This gel version offers the same benefits with a much smoother matte finish.This moisturizer melted onto my skin and quickly dried to a matte and smooth finish. I also skipped my primer because my skin felt so good (almost!). I could even feel the difference on my fingertips. It’s like this moisturizer dries to a fine powder finish.I love this gel and I’m never returning to the original formula!

This product is really lightweight. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy or sticky. My skin feels smooth and refreshed. But now that it’s dry and winter, I feel like this product doesn’t provide enough moisture. A definite must for the summer though, when the weather is warm and lightweight products are necessary!
This gel moisturizer works great for my sensitive skin. Most moisturizers either irritate my skin or cause breakouts. This gel is moisturizing without being heavy or clogging my pores.
I have severe acne and can’t use products that are too strong because I always get really dry skin. This lotion is perfect though. Should buy the toner to go before this product though.

This is the best moisturizer i have tried so far and i have tried tons! I have oily skin and this does not make me shiny and slick like most moisturizers do. It absorbs quickly, and is so moisturizing! It is also works well under makeup. I will never use anything else.
great moisturizer for combination skin

I really like this moisturizer. It leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth without the gooey wet feeling like other facial lotion. I would recommend for normal skin but dry skin during winter season I would recommend the Moisture Surge Extended Thirst Relief.

I bought this gel to help my dry skin. For a while i thought it was working but then every time i used it my skin got more dry, red, and my face was burning. So my mom made me stop using it, it was getting that bad. i had to go to the local pharmacist because i was on vacation and couldn’t go to my dermatologist. i was given a cream that was supposed to relieve redness and burning. it worked but i was very disappointed that i had to stop using it since its expensive. I stopped using it and my face came back to normal. I think i had a allergic reaction to it, even though it is allergy tested. Or i could just have really sensitive skin. so i guess its not for all skin types. :( It could be a good moisturizer for some people but not for all!
I LOVE THE GEL! its a lighter better formula than the lotion..i had no break outs and it makes my skin super smooth..I LOVE THIS!
review_title: so much better than the lotion

review_text: I have very sensitive, combination acne-prone skin and i actually borrowed this from my mother to try it out since other moisturizers out there just leave a gross oily coat on my skin, rather than actually bringing life back into my skin.I do a pretty thick coat of this stuff on the area between my eyebrows and around the corners of my mouth at night, and a light layer of it after washing in the morning. It leaves my skin feeling so fresh and smooth as opposed to greasy.Another tip. i also use this on my lips from time to time because I can’t stand how lip balm leaves this gross carnuba wax kind of film on them... this soaks right in and makes my lips look smooth, soft and kissable. My fiance loves it!

I had high hopes for this gel after reading the reviews. I purchased the gel because I read the lotion version of this product left skin too greasy feeling. Well, this stuff leaves my skin too dry feeling! After following the proper Clinique line of cleanser & toner I use this gel and my skin feels tight and itchy. I liked the way it left my skin smooth and soft tho! but unfortunately it’s not moisturizing enough.
Doesn’t smell bad and goes on your face super smooth!

I received a small sample of this product along with another purchase I made - and I’m SO glad I got this! It helps control my oily T-zone, but also keeps my cheeks moisturized. My pores also tend to be on the larger side, but this gel doesn’t seem to clog any pores or otherwise irritate my skin.I usually use this a few minutes after washing and drying my face. I apply a fairly thin but even layer all over. It leaves my skin feeling soft and balanced without having something heavy or greasy on. It doesn’t take much for it be absorbed in the skin. In the summer months I only need to apply it once or twice, but in the winter I have to apply it more often.My only gripe about this product is that my fingers tend to feel like there’s a thin sticky layer or film on the tips once I’m done - it isn’t too distracting right now in the winter, but in the summer I felt the need to wash my hands to get the film off.

I love this stuff. It is perfect for people with sensitive and/or combination skin. I can’t use anything with oil in it and this still feels like it is moisturizing even though it’s a light gel. I sometimes need something a little heavier in winter.

I needed a moisturizer that wouldn’t add to the shine I already had. This lightweight gel is moisturizing without being greasy. Fast drying. Keeps the oils in check on my checks and forehead. I use it twice a day and it works great!!!
Makes my skin less oily and when I put it on it doesn’t feel greasy AT ALL which I love <3 I always used to use my mom’s lotion for my face but I’m glad I bought this.

The thing I like about this gel is that it is very lightweight. However, at first when I started using it, I felt like I was not getting full coverage because it’s so light. So I would put like two whole pumps on! It was like I was not wearing anything.However, I have gotten used to it and I am down to about 1 or 1 1/2 pumps. It needs to be smoothed in all the little crevices. Once it’s on, it makes my skin feel very smooth and soft.The only reason I did not give it five stars is because it feels sticky on my hands afterwards and they feel kind of grubby. Not sure why, but it’s weird because my face does not feel like that.
review_title: Light, fresh gel great for oily skin

review_text: I’ve used this product for well over a year now and can say that I will not use any other moisturizer. The Moisturizing Gel is great for both cold and warm seasons. It’s not too sticky and is developed for naturally oily skin. It naturally balances the moisture levels on your skin, making it smooth and comfortable. So when the skin becomes too dry, the system will add more moisture, as well as soften and smooth out the texture of your skin.After using this product, I saw a reduction in redness and dryness of my skin. There is no more flakiness and the natural oils of my skin are balanced off well so there is not an excessive amount of shine/oils produced. This is also great as a base for your make-up. Before applying a primer, apply a nice moisturizing gell so your skin feels healthy and protected.I bought this bottle in the beginning of June 2010 and use it twice a day everyday. Two pumps is all you nee for your entire face. As you can see I’ve started to run low so I had bought a back up for when my bottle runs out. But it’s a great product that will last you months and is priced at $24. The price can’t compare to any drugstore moisturizer, but you DEFINITELY get what you pay for. I always believe that you need to invest in your skin.

Clinique’s moisturizing gel is perfect for day use and creates an amazing matte base for makeup application. Have been using this product since they came out with the gel option (in addition to their lotion) and i have never been disappointed. I prefer the thicker lotion to use at night, or on days where my face feels especially tight/dry.

This is the best moisturizer I’ve EVER used! Where do I begin???... It’s super light weight, controls my oily skin all day, makes my make up appear flawless, no smell, this bottle lasts a very long time, you can use it as a primer, doesn’t go on oily, and is a great moisturizer for my skin.
review_title: If I could give it 6 stars I would!

review_text: I’ve tried other moisturizers and keep coming back - this one is the best!

it did ok, i mean it helped a bit with moisturizing when my skin was so dry it was flaking (from medication i was taking from my dermatologist), but i think it might work better on people with normally oily skin- for a moisturizer that will keep your skin under control from oiliness and moisturize at the same time. ^_^
I’m on my second bottle... it lasts so long. It moisturizes enough but never makes my sensitive skin break out!

I have combination skin and when I started on the aggressive acne treatments I currently use, my skin was dry and peeling in some places and oily in others. So, per the recommendation of my dermatologist, I tried this moisturizer and I love it. It absorbs quickly, doesn’t feel greasy, and keeps my skin well-balanced. I am so pleased with this moisturizer and I will certainly be back for more!

I have used this product for over a year, in conjunction with the other 2 products in Clinique’s 3-step daily routine, and I absolutely love it. I have tried other moisturizers and cannot find another one that compares.This one is lightweight and absorbs fairly quickly. My skin is always so soft and moisturized, even in the cold and harsh Indiana weather. I have not experienced any oiliness since I switched to the gel.
especially for summer, the gel would be much better than the other moisturizer that isn’t oil free. This one moisturizes just as well though.

I decided to switch moisturizers after finding that my previous one made my face really oily. After reading rave reviews about this product, I decided to try it out. It’s already been a week and I LOVE IT! My skin has felt silky smooth, isn’t oily anymore, and I only have to use one pump and it’s enough for my whole face!
review_title: A little goes a long way!

review_text: My favorite moisturizer! Goes on light, absorbs quickly and is undetectable under makeup. I prefer the gel over the lotion for oily/combination skin types.

This is an excellent moisturizer! I have oily skin, but I do get dry patches on my face sometimes - especially in the Winter. It’s so much lighter than the lotion, but still gets the job done. And compared to other moisturizers, the price is pretty decent for the amount of product you get.

No cons at all, this moisturizer is perfect for my acne-prone, combination skin. I tried using the lotion formulation, and in the summer that’s a little too much for my skin. However, in the winter I use my Lotion sample when I need it. I’m almost finished with my lotion! It lasted months and I will never use another lotion again for my face.

Perfect for my oily skin!i have been looking for a moisturizer to use in the colder months when it starts to get really dry and this one is perfect! i have oily skin so i dont need anything heavy and this gel is light and absorbs quickly and doesnt make me break out! sooo happy i bought it!

I have been looking for a lightweight moisturizer for some time now and I am so excited to try this ! I recently purchased the gel and I have to say it is so great ! It’s lightweight but still gives good moisture, and doesn’t clog my pores. I will def be purchasing again !

I have been using this for years. I’ve tried many different moisturizers in between (for SPF or using products from a store I worked at) and nothing has ever beat it. I have combination skin in the summer months and normal to dry in the drier, winter months, and this is always great. It’s lightweight, but moisturizes enough to last 24 hours.

In comparison with other moisturizers.. DDM did help control a bit of the oil on my face. I will say that after an hour or two my face just felt sticky. I compared it to my Boscia moisturizing lotion and there really is no comparison. You do get a good amount for your money though, also absorbs very quickly.
This product is absolutely wonderful on my skin. It leaves your skin dewy and hydrated throughout the day. Love it!!

I’ve used a ton of different face lotions and always felt that my nose felt oily after I applied them no matter how thoroughly I had washed my face. I called Clinique and the representative recommended that I try this gel on my nose instead. I use the lotion on my cheeks and the gel on my t-zone. It has worked out great! You can’t change the size of your pores but you can try to reduce the amount of oil coming out of them. I have seen a difference in the appearance of my pores. They are not greasy looking or as prominent anymore. In addition, I haven’t had as many blackheads. I don’t feel like my nose feels greasy or oily after I use the gel. It moisturizes but doesn’t feel heavy or oily. I’m really glad I tried it!

Oh, this is wonderful...I use it as part of the Clinique 3-Step regime. I just love to keep rubbing this into my skin and it gets SO soft. AND the best part is waking up after I leave this on at night...I’ve never had such soft skin in my life, or CLEAR!

I purchased this moisturizer along with the 3 step kit, and I couldn’t be happier. I have oily combo skin and most moisturizers tend to make my skin look super greasy and break me out while the rest do not provide enough moisture. I find that with this moisturizer I get the perfect balance, its very light weight and absorbs very quickly yet provides a perfect amount of moisture without making my skin oily.
My favorite moisture, I use it daily every time after wash. The texture is smooth, not greasy. highly recommend!
This lotion is truly amazing. It is super lightweight AND moisturizers very well at the same time! It goes on smoothly and has a very subtle fresh scent. I highly recommend this product!
So lightweight, makes your skin feel super soft. This is however only for an oily skin type. If you have dry make sure you use the lotion formula.
This is the only moisturizer I’ve ever been able to use. It’s just right for my oily skin. My skin feels moisturized but in the best most refreshing and light way.

I used the lotion moisturizer before and it caused me to break out and leave my skin very oily so I was hesitant buying this again. However after 5 years of trying other products I compared the price and quanity with this Clinique moisturizer again and figured it was so much of a better deal. Also, established brands like Clinique that has been around for a long time say a lot more than the new brands with nice attractive marketing strategies. Then I found out about this gel for oily skin and I was sold. I’m very happy and I can’t believe I think Clinique is cheap now compared to other brands! It moisturizes well although I do have to put two layers on my cheeks. I do use a very strong soap though so I can put up with it :)
I’ve tried many moisturizers, and they’ve always made me break out. My skin feels soft after I use it.

After reading rave reviews, and trying a little sample, I decided to purchase. I like the consistency, and my oily skin loves the fact that it is a gel. No weird smell, and feels great going on.The downside: No SPF. I was torn between this one and Philosophy’s On A Clear Day, because that has SPF 15.Luckily, this moisturizer does exactly what it says, so having to apply a separate SPF product to my morning routine isn’t a deal-breaker for me.I apply twice a day, and use with PTR’s Glycolic wash and Complexion Correction pads.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. However, this is the WORST packaging ever. When you’re about 3/4 of the way through, the pump doesn’t work. So you’re stuck wrestling moisturizer out of the bottle for the remaining quarter of product. If this was in a tube, I’d be thrilled.

Absorbs quickly, no crazy scent, buildable for drier areas.I have very oily skin but at night after all my acne treatments, my face is parched. There’s just enough moisture in this product to prevent oil rebound when I sleep. I use it on the drier areas of my face during the winter before I put my primer and makeup on. I’ve purchased 3 bottles about to purchase my fourth. You can’t beat the price for the amount of product.

I just recently bought this product and for me it has worked wonderfully! I have really oily skin for the most part and this moisturizing gel makes my skin feel hydrated but dry instead of the kind of sticky feeling i get from using facial moisturizing lotions. i would definitely recommend this product to other people with combination to oily skin.
I like this moisturizer for daytime, under makeup, because it soaks in quickly and doesn’t leave a greasy slick film on my face. I do need a more hydrating formula for night though.

I wanted to like this product! Sadly, though it delivered decent moisture without greasiness and absorbed in a flash, it also made me break out like a teenager. I don’t have sensitive skin, so I’m guessing it’s just some sort of allergy. Sad!

I have been using this product ever since it came out on the market. It is a great light alternative to the greasy moisturizers out there. If you live in a very dry climate (think Chicago winters), you might want to switch off to the regular moisturizer once in a while, but this has worked wonders for me.
The gel is really light and absorbs quickly. My skin feels kinda refreshed after it. I use it in the evening, in the morning I use the oil control one from the men series.

I’ve been using the lotion for years and it was great! I purchased the gel for summer to try something new and it was horrible! It didn’t moisturize my dry patches and it made my oily parts VERY slick! That made me break out all over my chin and jawline. Since the moisturizer was the only new product added to my skincare regimen, i knew it was the issue. I had to go on acne oral antibiotics to get my skin back to the pre-gel stage. The lesson i learned is that it’s not the same formula as their lotion and if you have sensitive skin that reacts with breakouts, you should probably stir clear of this product.
review_title: Not the Same as The Lotion!

review_text: this product sinks into your skin and leaves no gross after feeling. makes your skin feel really soft and moisturized. I use the facial cleanser before putting on the lotion and my skin is pretty much flawless.

After cleansing my skin I know I need to use moisturizer, but all of them (except this one) tend to make my skin feel just as oily as it did before I washed my face. This product is really perfect for oily skin!
review_title: Gives my oily skin just enough moisture

review_text: Love, love, love it... It’s all that you can ask from a moisturizer. It’s light, non-greasy, absorbs quickly and moisturizes. On top of that, it’s a descent price.
This is the first moisturizer I’ve tried that didn’t feel heavy or make me break out. I use this morning and night, and it has made my skin very soft and smooth.

I look foward to putting this on every night and every morning! I have oily skin in the t-zone, and this doesn’t make it any oilier, but it does moisturize. It feels so good going on. Give it a try, you’ll love it!

I really like this product because I normally have oily skin. After using this, I don’t really have the problem anymore. The only thing is in the mornings when I put on this gel, I sometimes have to put it on twice because I have dry skin around my mouth area. Overall, good buy!

After receiving a recommendation from my esthetician on what type of moisturizer to get, I took the plunge. Perfect for oily skin, it’s supposed to be a drink without all the crazy clogging stuff you can get. I have yet to see it make be break out. It sinks nicely into my skin without leaving a greasy film, and it definitely feels refreshing. A little bit goes a long way. This product will last.What I love most about the gel is the price. This is cheap when you consider just how much gel you’re receiving. After about a month, my skin is getting smoother, thank god. Smooth without the oil makes me a happy, happy girl.
By far, the best moisturizer I have ever used. It helps control my crazy oily skin. I absolutely love it.

This is really good! As it is far cheaper than the same product sold in China. It is lightweight and fresh, and aborbs quickly. It is suitable in summer. In winter add one more step of lotion is just ok!
I was lucky enough to find this product from the beginning and I have never tried another moisturizer. I never had a reason to! I use this with my Purity face cleanser and it works for me!
Perfect moisturizer when you don’t want a heavy cream on your face. Love it!

Over the past 3 months I’ve been looking for a moisturizer for Oily to oily combo and I think I’ve found it! At first I was very skeptical of this Moisturizing Gel...but in 2 days my skin texture started to appear softer and smoother! I love this product! No wonder it won so many awards for best moisturizer!

This moisturizing gel has to be my favorite of all Clinique products. It works a lot better than the lotion version of the two and really soaks into the skin well and has a really pleasant cooling effect. Additionally, it’s not oily after it’s applied which is always nice. Post-sunburn / sun exposure I like to apply this to any burned areas in particular to help cool the burn and add a bit of moisture back into the skin.

I looooove this gel! I think Clinique has awesome products. I’ve been using it for 6 months now and I’m not stopping. It feels great and fresh when you apply it. I have oily skin so this helps soo much. I HAD moderate acne, and suprisingly after starting to use this gel, it controlled it! And for the left over acne scars, I use the Even Better Dark Spot Corrector, and has faded my spots away!
I love it! It makes my skin soft.. this is my 2nd bottle

This moisturizer is absolutely amazing. I have combo-oily skin, so I used to be wary of moisturizers that would make my face shiny. Clinique’s Dramatically different Moisturizing Gel is light and moisturizing without the greasy feel. It absorbs quickly. My skin feels awesome after I use it, and I would definitely buy this again.
I have normal skin, but tend to go for the non-oily moisturizers. I like this a lot because of how light it is, but this product isn’t great for any kind of dryness problem.
Great moisturizer! Feels light on the skin, absorbs quickly, and still delivers just the right amount of moisture. I will definitely repurchase again and again.
I am a LOYAL fan and I love this moisturizer! It’s lightweight, its doesn’t leave my skin oily and I really like the pump bottle, as soon I’m close to running out I always go get more!

I thought this would be a good night moisturizer for my oily/acne-prone skin. Was I ever wrong.This moisturizer made me break out in the worst possible way. As soon as I stopped using it, the breakouts started to go away, but I’m still trying to nurse my skin back to where it was.I will say that it felt nice when it went on, so I’m sure it could work for some people. I am returning it and hoping to find a better product.

I have really oily skin. In the slightest bit of humidity it immediately becomes an oil slick. Because of this, I avoided using moisturizers entirely. One day I was just browsing on the website and stumbled upon this product and the reviews convinced me.I decided to splurge a bit for this and I have to say I’m a true believer. My skin doesn’t feel tight ever and it always has a nice, smooth feel to it. I think it’s definitely helping to improve the overall clarity of my skin. I can’t wait to get the rest of the line and see how much better it gets. :-)
This has made my skin so soft without adding any shine/unwanted oil or making me break out. Also, a tiny bit goes a long way. This bottle is going to last me forever.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! I have adult, mid 30’s cystic acne with extremly sensitive skin. This is the best moisurizer I have ever used! I also get dry at times, and very oily at other, but this really seems to balance things out. I use it with the #1 toner, for dry skin, its very good to my sensitve skin. Try this!
review_title: My search for Moisturizure is over! I'm hooked!

review_text: So this is the “Butter“. It feels good and it’s cheap at Sephora.
This is by far the best moisturize that I ever bought. It feels amazing on your skin, and you don’t have to worry about your skin feeling oily.

I love this product from Clinique, i have pretty normal skin and just needed a moisturizer to help hydrate my skin in the morning and qt nite and this product does just that it goes on real light and smooth , it has no funny odor and gives you a cool hydrating feeling as it goes on. very happy with this moisturizer definitely recommend it.
This moisturizer in wonderfully light and leaves my skin feeling clean, not greasy like some other moisturizers.
There needs to be one improvement to this, and it is it most have SPF!!!! Its great for hydrating and great for oily skin, but it needs SPF to prevent damage from the sun.
This stuff is great for combination skin. Not too heavy & sinks right in. I definitely prefer the gel to the lotion.

I love this product, along with their redness solution products, and so glad I did. I read the reviews first and decided to purchase. This feels great on the skin and it does hydrate without feeling greasy. I have used this during the summer and will continue to use it. I have normal/combo skin and take care of it moreso during the harsh winter months. It just goes into your skin and I honestly feel that it adds whatever moisture your skin needs for that day. Highly recommend; you cannot possibly go wrong.
I love this moisturizing gel because it is so light and my skin feels nice and hydrated all day long

The gel is light and refreshing for oily/combination skin types. However, if you are on the dry side I would try the lotion version cause it is catered to more dry skin. This is a nice moisturizer to put on before foundation/makeup.
Leaves my face soft and moisturized all day...will definitely buy it again.

You will never look at face lotion the same way again. The lotion isnt oily, and it feels like silk when you put it on your face. It moisturizes your face and makes it feel great. I will never go back to normal face lotion again!

I have only been using this product for one week and so far I’m pleased with it. I have combination / acne prone skin and this gel feels amazing on the skin. It doesn’t make my face feel greasy like some moisturizers I’ve used in the past. It’s very light so I’m not sure how well this would work for someone who has really dry skin.
been using this for years and i have always loved it. i put it on after my morning shower and it works to keep my dry face moisterized throughout the day.

Absolutely the best moisturizer out there. Words cannot describe the perfect consistency and texture. I only wish it had some spf or acne treatment.Lasts forever.Decent makeup removal too. Just glob on eye and wipe off with towel.
leaves my skin super soft. The moisturizer is very light. I love this!

I decided to give this product a try after an employee recommended it to me and I saw so many positive reviews about this product. However, after I used it for a couple weeks, I noticed eve MORE break outs within that time range. I stopped using it and returned it. Maybe it’s just not for me.

I have oily skin so I thought this would be a good moisturizing product that didn’t make me so shiny. However, I found that the gel did not provide enough moisture and last long enough. I will go back to using the Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion.
Works amazingly on my skin.. very light , absorbs quickly and my skin feels so soft..

I have oily skin and recently acne prone skin, so I bought the gel and will never regret it. It is absolutely moisturizing and works so well with my oily skin. If you have dry or combination skin use the lotion, but oily people USE THIS!

I’ve been using this product for a little over a year. Before that, I used another moisturizer that was too oily for my combination skin and it made my face break out like crazy.I used this lotion along with the Clinique acne clearing system. This lotion will not do anything incredible for the skin but it will leave it moisturized and healthy. And that is all I can ask for. After using this with the other Clinique products, my face cleared out within a month.I would recommend this for someone looking for a good moisturizer that does just what it’s supposed to do.

Love this stuff. I always come back to it.I bought a bottle and my boyfriend has used almost half of it! He hates anything of the sort but loves this stuff. It’s really moisturizing without making my oily skin more oily. Highly recommend!

Lately, my skin has been terrible and has been breaking out like crazy. My old moisturizer wasn’t cutting it, so I switched to this one. I really wanted to try a Clinique moisturizer, but I didn’t know which one to use. My skin tends to be on the dry side, but I wanted something oil free, so ultimately I decided to try this gel.This helped with my acne. It seems to smooth out my skin and lessens redness and calms irritation. It smells great, and never leaves my skin feeling oily or heavy. Perfect for summer and perfect for people with acne.That being said... mere seconds after I put this on, my skin feels tight and dry. I put this on in the morning, and by the time I’m ready to apply my makeup, I’m flaky around my chin and mouth. This is most likely caused by the acne medication that I’m on, but nonetheless this moisturizer does a poor job of really moisturizing the skin.

been using this for years. perfect for summer weather or for combination oily skin. if you have dryish skin use the lotion. both are lightweight enough to forget you have on a moisturizer. it is lightweight, however if you want something a little more moisturizing just switch to the lotion
This wasn’t moisturizing enough for me... I felt my skin quenching for more after a few minutes. My mothers been using it for years and swears by it so it just may be my skin type

I’ll admit it, after using this for a couple of years, I got bored and strayed. I’ve tried several different moisturizers over the past year, and now I’m back to the one that works the best. This never leaves my combination skin oily, and it absorbs so quickly. It’s never sticky, and leaves my skin fresh. It’s good to be back.

the only reason it gets 3 stars is because it just wasn`t enough moisture for my skin. for those with oily skin, i`m sure it is perfect, but for me it made my skin itch. but my skin did feel silky using it.

I have combination skin and this is a god send. My skin feels hydrated without ever feeling greasy. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling very soft and smooth. The “scent“ isn’t something I’m in love with, but I love the fact that the products are fragrance free and don’t mind if they don’t smell like roses. I actually prefer it. I can see if my skin went to the drier side in winter, I may switch to something heavier as needed. I appreciate the fact that there is no SPF in the formula either, because I don’t like sleeping with SPF on my face. No matter what, sunscreen adds a different texture/feel to products (and seems to always clog my pores!) I’d rather add SPF at my discretion and not have it on my skin 24/7. Really recommend this for girls with oilier & sensitive skin, works great for me :)
i have psoriasis and ive been on a hunt for a good moisturizing lotion and this is pefect. it drys fast with out drying out my skin . its not heavy or greasy i love it
The gel formula is a God-send, especially for those with skin problems that need a lighter formula. It’s very balanced - it moisturizes noticeably without being heavy.
Moisturizes so well but I prefer the fell of the lotion instead.
I bought the gel version in May after wanting to purchase it for so long! I have oily skin and i find that this hydrates my skin while controlling the oil in it! Everybody should own this!

I’ve used this for many years and although I try something new from time to time, I always go back to it. It’s just the right amount of moisturizer, absorbs quickly and leaves no greasy or shiny finish. There may be products that are as good as this one but I haven’t found any that are better for my combination skin.

Great product. Its not really gel-esque. It just goes on light, and I wish I had bought this years ago, rather then running around greasy! I feel plenty moisturized witha squirt, maybe 2, maximum. No scent, which is nice. Fragranced creams are a turnoff and aggrevate my combination, fussy skin. I’d recommend for fellow combo/oily/acne-prone girls. I recommend also for day use, and just get something more hardcore for night repair and skin quenching if necessary.
review_title: Why did I ever use cream or lotion?!

review_text: I use this at night for my oily skin. I hate the feeling of heavy moisturizer and this does the trick. Sinks right in and leaves me skin feeling perfect.
i love this product it is not oily or greasy at all
I’ve been using this product for over an year and I really like it. It’s very lightweighted and moisturizing.

I really can see the difference after a couple of weeks of using this product. My only comment would be is that I still feel even though it is gel and oil free my face gets oilier than when i used Philosophy.

This product is really nice! I have oily skin and this gel formula just feels so nice and light! You only need two pumps and it covers your entire face, it’s lightweight so you don’t ever feel it. It makes your skin very soft, it absorbs quickly, and it’s a light scent. Two thumbs up!
This moisturizer is great for my sensitive skin. I wish it has SPF in it though.
I am really loving how lightweight this product is. Perfect for day and under makeup!

This little number was a pleasant surprise. Not only is it lightweight, but it quickly absorbs and softens the sensitive areas around the eyes along with laugh lines around the mouth. Because I love this product so much, I am now looking at other Clinique products for various skin care needs.

I have tried so many different moisturizers, and this one is by FAR the best. It lasts a very long time when you get the pump bottle, and one pump is the perfect amount! It’s very lightweight, which is a must for me, and very easy on your skin. Great for any kind of skin there is.

I have always had problems with dry, flaky skin that gets shiny and oily an hour or so after moisturizing. A friend recommended this moisturizer to me, and I’m so glad that I tried it! I can feel it being immediately absorbed into my skin instead of sitting on top and making me feel greasy soon afterward.It sooths my super-sensitive, dry skin and leaves my face feeling soft and moisturized without turning oily and shiny later. I also love that it’s fragrance-free and allergy-tested.If you have combination/oily skin that’s sensitive and dry after cleansing, this is the perfect product for you.
moisturizes my size well, nongreasy, pump is very nice :)
Works exactly as advertised.
I had a smaller version but its the same right! i love this! It smells great and feels great! I use it after my showers when i am traveling and it feel so wonderful! Hope this helps! God Bless! :)

I have been using this moisturizer for about 5 or 6 years now and I am quite happy with it. It is a very lightweight product, yet it leaves my combination skin soft, smooth, and hydrated. It also absorbs extremely quickly. I like using it specially during spring, summer, and early fall, but I switch to the lotion during the colder months because the gel is not strong enough to protect my skin from the dry, cold weather.

I have extreme combo skin and ecezma to boot, I’m very oily in my T-zone and very dry on my cheeks and around my eyes, and this product seems to be really working very well for me - I’ve noticed my skin is very soft and supple to the touch and the texture of my skin is quite smooth - my T-zone seems to finally be under control and my dry areas aren’t tight and dry and with my eczema I have to be really careful what I use so as to not cause a flair-up and this product really seems to be doing the trick - I’m extremely happy

I tried Clinique’s 3 step program and had some success with it, but the face wash and toner ended up being too harsh for my skin, so I switched to a different brand for those two steps...but I have remained faithful to DDMG because it is the perfect moisturizer for me! I’ve used DDMG for about 4 years now and I absolutely love it! It goes on smoothly, and though it appears wet/oily for the first minute, it absorbs into your skin very rapidly, leaving your skin looking natural and non-oily. DDMG provides plenty of moisture and is perfect year round. Occasionally, in the winter, if my skin feels dry from the weather, I will re-apply DDMG or put a little stronger moisturizer on (usually my eye cream)....but this is a rare event. I’ve never had any problems applying makeup on top of DDMG and it doesn’t change the look or feel of my makeup, since DDMG absorbs so well.
This is the only moisturizer that works in my skin!
Good moisturizer for oily skin to use instead of dramatically different moisturizing lotion during the hot weather.

This is my favorite facial lotion. I have combination skin and it manages the dry areas while not causing breakouts in the oily areas. Compared to Dramatically Different Lotion, the gel version is a bit thicker in feeling but not heavy, a much more silky product and more moisturizing.

Makes my skin smooth & soft, but not magical.- Reduces shine for approx. 5 hours (which is only sometimes as long as I need)- I’ve been using it for a week and have not noticed it helps my acne- Feels nice & lightweight- Moisturizes well
THis product is perfect if your skin is oily or you’re prone to breakouts. One pump is all you need so it lasts FOREVER.

Flawless application with this. Absorbs into skin at rate that gives you enough time to spread it.I use this moisturizer in the morning and at night after I cleanse my face, there have been no problems with breakouts at all.I have an oily T-zone but a dry outter cheek. This keeps the dry parts of my face moisturized and the oily parts soft and in control!LOVE IT!
review_title: 5 stars for combination oily and oily

review_text: i love this gel..i have combination skin..and believe it or not...this gel actual helps me combat my oiliness..its the perfect blend of moisturizer and its light..
