My skin loves this gel!!! It soaks in, WITHOUT an oily residue, and makes my skin perfectly moisturized, taut, and fresh. Another plus is that it doesn’t have any type of funky smell. I hate being able to smell my moisturizer or make up. I’ve been using this for for YEARS and have even passed this on to friends and family.
Bought this moisturizing gel by mistake, was too lazy to return it it so decided to keep it...I love it, hydrates well, not greasy and absorbs well! Would never know it’s oil free. Will buy again!
The perfect moisturizer! Softens, smoothes, clears, & keeps skin healthy.

it certainly is very moisturizing!! i only use this tho, when my skin is like REALLY dry, becuz if it isnt, then it makes my skin oily then i breakout in pimples):but i think thats just my skin type hah

I have textbook definition combo skin-oily tzone, normal to potentially dry cheeks/around the mouth area. This gel is perfect, enough to moisturize the normal/dry areas but light enough that my face is not an extra greasy mess by noon.
Makes my skin so soft and not at all oily!

This moisturizer did not change my life, but it’s pretty good. Has a strange smell to me, and to my skin it feels a little heavy. Would have liked a whole lot more if it had SPF. But good moisturizer for the price.
I have an oily complexion and I tend to break out, this keeps my skin very soft and moisturized, it works great for me!
Like the way my skin feels after I put it on. Oil free is a must as it doesn’t activate more pimples.

I have had trouble with my skin for years and have always had a hard time finding moisturizer that wouldn’t make me break out. This is THE ONLY lotion I can use! I have tried everything, but I find it all makes me break out. Definitely recommend to anyone with oily skin!!!
I used Clinique dramatically different moisturizer several years ago, then went on to other products. Love this new moisturizing gel and the pump application makes it oh so easy to apply.

This is about the only thing I can still use from clinque that doesn’t make me oily or breakout. Also I was on the 3 step acne solutions kit for a while and had a lot of drying and redness, I chatted with a clinique specialist and she told me to use this in place of the moisturizer that comes with the kit because it would rehydrate my skin without making it oily. Once I started doing that there were imporvements. I like that it’s a gel so it blends right in and doesn’t sit on top of the skin like a lot of oil free lotions do. I had actually gotten a sun burn on my face...not bad but pretty “pink“ and this was really soothing to put on my face. I did’t want to use the aloe lotion you get for sunburns because I was afraid it would make me break out so this was a nice alternative. I reccomend it over a lot of other moisturizer...drugstore brand and high end.

As someone with oily skin I have struggled to find a moisturizer that didn’t add to the oil my skin already produced.Clinique has really done that for me, this stuff really absorbs into my skin and leaves me with a nice matte feeling. Not greasy, like most moisturizers have done!
i bought this and i thought it was amazing in one use it moisturizes durastically and it keeps working it also makes yur face look so matte after you use it it like gets rid of the oil literally
I really like this product.

My skin is finicky. That is it behaves based on humidity, temperature, and pretty much anything else weather related. That said, I have been using this moisturizer for a little over a year now and I have found that (during fall, spring and summer) it actually manages to deliver an ideal moisture balance without added residue no matter how dry/oily my skin chooses to be. Not only that, but I have never had trouble using this in combination with other astringents or treatments, both prescription and otherwise.

I have oily skin and have a hard time finding moisturizers that don’t put the weight on your skin. I can pack this on my face and don’t feel any weight at all! IT perfectly moisturizes my skin and gives it a great finish.

I’ve always know about Clinique’s Moisturizer but never found myself to pick up a bottle. After trying a sample tube of the moisturizing gel, I just had to purchase a full bottle.The texture of the moisturizer is great. It’s great to use before you apply your makeup because it doesn’t leave a heavy greasy feeling and your skin absorbs it quickly.The whole bottle will last a while, you probably only need about one full pump for your face and it’ll do the job.

it does its job in moisturizing but there’s no difference from other moisturizers. Lightweight but takes a bit longer to absorb than some other moisturizers I have tried. There’s a slight scent but it doesn’t bother me much.

This gel moisturizer has changed the way I feel about moisturizers. I know that you always need to wear moisturizer but up until I found this moisturizing was a hassle. Most products that say they are for oily to combination skin types lie! This one really leaves your face moisturized minus the shine. An amazing moisturizer all year round even in the alternating climate of the dessert.
So light and smooth, perfect for moisturizing summer skin! Feels cool and refreshing going on and instantly sinks into your skin.

This is the most amazing moisturizer ever! It is so refreshing and silky and smooth and not greasey at all! It is lightweight yet totally skin drinkable and gives you all the moisture you need all day!
this is one of the products i simply cannot live without....love it..makes my face very smooth and clear...
this is a great product. It absorbs really fast (like 30s), then i could put my make up on. Also, it really does it job on oil controlling. Recommended to combination skin.

I cannot apply my make-up without this moisturizer...it’s the best product on the market! I use it as a base before I apply foundation and it makes the foundation go on easier. I’ve tried many moisturizers before and I’ve always come back to this one. It’s great for dry and oily skin (I have combination skin) because it’s incredibly lightweight-it feels like you’re not wearing anything on your face! It’s easy to apply and doesn’t take long to absorb in your skin. I would recommend this product to anyone!

I had to switch moisturizers recently due to a line of product discontinued at my local Sephora. WOW! Very happy with the guidance of the Sephora store agent I was turned on to this moisturizing gel. It is now a staple!
review_title: So happy the Sehpora rep pointed me gel

review_text: super lightweight. perfect for summer! best for my skin. I just wish it has spf.
Love it! Great everyday moisture without clogging pores. Lightweight and silky. Works perfectly with my somewhat sensitive combination skin. I use in combination with Clinique clarifying lotion (#3).
I love this product, it is my favorite moisturizer!!

I have acne prone skin and I have tried ALL the oil-free moisturizers and this is the best one. It’s light yet my skin stays hydrated. Makes putting on make up afterwards easy. This will stay in my routine for sure.

I use this with the oily skin liquid soap and the number 3 toner. I love this gel. I opted for the gel because I get oily in my T zone but this works amazingly. I find myself getting less oily every day. I use only one pump for my whole face and it seems to last a while (def longer than the other two products) It smells really great also. I just all around love this as a twice daily moisturizer!

Clinique is a brand that teaches you patience...for people who want immediate results, this is not the brand for you. But when something works too fast...there’s something sketchy about it (at least that’s how I feel.) This moisturizer may, at first, seem like it’s not moisturizing your skin enough, but stay patient and keep using it! It will actually restore your skin and slowly your skin will get used to it. Once it does...you will fall in love with this product and never look back!! There’s a reason why they call this a “yellow miracle in a bottle“...
review_title: the ONLY moisturizer I (have, am, and will) use

review_text: I prefer this solution over the moisturizing lotion. I love it and doesn’t break me out.You can’t beat the price too!
This lotion is great because it moisturizes really well without leaving a greasy residue or feeling heavy on my face. Even though it is lightweight it still has enough moisture for my dry skin!!
great product for oily skin. if only it was spf

This is a wonderful, light-weight moisturizer. It isn’t a miracle product, but it leaves my oily skin nicely moisturized, never sticky, and feeling great. I usually use it whenever my skin is having an off day, or if it’s really hot/humid.
I love this gel. It moisturizes but it does not feel sticky, it’s so light!
great for my combination skin, one pump is enough for my whole entire face and it did its job. love this moisturizer!
Moisturizing without making my skin oily, a good summer moisturizer. I don’t think it would be heavy enough for winter, but for summer it’s perfect, and doesn’t make me break out.

I live in NYC where we have been suffering from extremely high heat and humidity this summer. My normal face cream was just too heavy. This has been the ideal solution. It is light-weight and effective. Although, they brand it as a gel, it still has a creamy texture
I LOVE this moisturizer! Its the only one Ive used that hydrates very well and still has a light, cool feel to it.
review_title: hydrates beautifully while still being lightweight

review_text: Excellent moisturizer, light and non greasy. Skin feels soft and hydrated. I have sensitive skin and this product is perfect.

I’m on my second bottle of this! I have oily skin and this doesn’t make my face into an oily mess. I love how I only need about half a dime to moisturize my face and neck. It also absorbs very quickly and feels very nice.
i know this has been around forever, and i should have tried it before. provides just the right amount of moisture and priced affordable too.
I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer! I feel like my skin feels better the more I use it and it doesn’t leave my skin oily which is always a plus!
i was told by sales girl to get gel instead of lotion because of my oily complextion. I honestly don’t see the difference from using the lotion. Its good and soft but not out of this world

It is great! If you put some on when you see your pores are getting a bit bigger, put some on the night before and they become their normal size that they should be. Also I hvent found a product that makes your skin feel as soft as this has. And, it’s perfect for oily skin! Since it’s oil free. I love it and recommend it to EVERYONE

My skin is very sensitive and dry in some spots, and the gel is lightweight but moisturizing and doesn’t clog my pores. I love it!

the absolute BEST moisturizer i’ve ever used. i can’t live without it. the only downfall is i wish it has spf in it. but other than that it’s amazing.
yah!!! Dranatically different........i love Clinique

works great for oily skin! I would recommend.

this is great for oily skin and is absorbed quickly i wish it was made with spf!!

Love it, have used it a very long time, I also love the squirt bottle

I didn’t like my last moisturizer because it was too oily, so I tried this moisturizing gel. It never makes my skin feel oily and my skin has never been softer!

This is a nice, light moisturizer, perfect for us olily folks. Its good for people with sensitive skin too, since there is no fragrance added. I use this at night, usually when the weather is dry and I need a bit more moisture than what my skin creates naturally.
review_title: Good for people with oily skin

review_text: During the summer my face seems to get oily easier. This moisturizer is the perfect light-weight fix. It goes on silky smooth and gives the “slip“ that you need to put on a little foundation for a perfect looking complexion without making your face feel heavy by the end of the day. My face feels as fresh at night as it does in the morning when I first put it on.

I’ve been using this gel for 5+ years now and could not survive without it! My skin is very sensitive, acne-prone, and can be very oily yet dry, and without this on hand I would be a mess! If I were on a deserted island and could bring one thing with me, this would be it!!
review_title: Could not survive without this stuff!

review_text: I love this product! Its great and moisturizes my skin wonderfully!:) all I have to say is that the gel is better and I have tried both the gel and the lotion( ps I have combination skin)

review_title: Do not take these last few reviews as the NORM

Gel is not as good moisturizer as the cream presentation

review_title: great if your skin isnt too dry

review_text: I usually use Korres Pomegranate Moisturizer during the summer, but I thought that I would try this moisturizer because it was less expensive. After 2.5 weeks I just had to return it because I had tons of pimples under my skin and the worst that I’ve had in the last year was a stress zit! I couldn’t believe it! Maybe it’s the unnatural ingredients in this moisturizer, but it caused me to breakout for the first time in years. I would definitely not recommend this moisturizer to anyone unless they want to get zits.
This is the best face moisturizer ever! It is non greasy and very light.
i am sorry would not buy this product again did help with my oily skin
Love it! Everytime I try something new I end up right back using this product.
what can i say ........ i love this product.L O V E it

The moisturizing gel offers moisture without the greasiness of a regular lotion and it’s very light and refreshing. I have dry skin in the winter and oilier skin in the summer, but I use this product year round.

This is still the best moisturzer, to date, that I have used. I’ve tried samples and purchased others but I always keep coming back to this. DDMG is great for my oily skin. It softens my skin and I have noticed an improvement with using this. Another important factor, I have never broken out from using this product.I like to wear this as my day moisturizer since it doesn’t make my skin oily. My favorite part is that it’s lightweight. I doesn’t feel like I’m slathering my face with some heavy oily moisturizer. I love it! Highly recommend for those with normal to oily skin. Others may want to try the DDM Lotion which is a bestseller as well!

Ok I guess. I have dry to combination skin but was breaking out so I got the gel instead of the lotion. Not really moisturizing enough. I will def get the lotion next time. Not a bad product for people will more oily skin.

i love this stuff. i accidentally bought the gel instead of the lotion but good thing i did! i have combination skin with really dry areas and really oily areas and this gel works perfectly on both. i would recommend this to anyone!
Good for nose and T-zone for oily / combination skin, but it does not moisturize the eye enough.
Clean, soft. Have combo/oily sensitive acne-prone skin and this is a perfect staple. Also madly in love with the scrub, the only product to get rid of my blackheads--ever!

I heard about this gel on Youtube and thought I would give it a try. I have combination skin and haven’t used Clinique in a while. Well, they were right this stuff is amazing. i find this moisturizer to be perfect for my combination skin. i break out a lot and it doesn’t make my face feel oily. it is lightweight, absorbs quickly and is a good value for the price.

This is the only product I have given fiver stars so far. If you have normal to oily skin, this product is soo for you!!! I love wearing this in the summer. It moisturizes with out being oily. When you put it on, its cool, refreshing, and non irritating what so ever. I always feel clean, cool, and crisp after i put this on. Works perfect during the summer under my make up. I definitely recommend this as a summer must have.

I have been a die-hard fan of Clinique’s DDMG since it hit the market. My grandmother loves the moisturizing lotion and always talked Clinique’s products up to me since I was a wee lass, but the lotion always proved to be too heavy for me and caused breakouts. Lo and behold, this came out, and I will never use another moisturizer again. This stuff absorbs super quickly, keeps my skin moisturized, doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin, doesn’t have a gross scent to it, and never causes blemishes. All in all, it’s perfection.
Very good! Quite light. I’ll buy it again!
I’ve used the regular Dramatically Different Moisturizing lotion for years but the Gel is perfect for me. I love the way it goes on and it seems lighter. I will be buying this version from now on.

i have very oily skin, but only during the summer. i picked this up and am so glad i did. im not gonna lie, it did not copletely get rid of my oil production. but it definately made a better improvement than any other product ive used before

I am hard to impress too!!

I used this moisturizer for nights I went dancing and it was wonderful! Creams are too heavy for my skin on nights I go out, this provided moisture, but it was very light and didn’t causy my skin to go all shiny.
I have oily-combination skin and this is a perfect, light facial lotion. Super gentle, and it absorbs so quickly! It smells great too.

Though it’s not a miracle product, it moisturizes just fine. I have combination skin and I’m able to use this lotion in both dry winters and humid summers. Unlike heavier lotions, this one doesn’t cause any acne break-outs.

This product is just okay to me. I do like the fact that it doesn’t have a scent and it feels light on the skin. But it didn’t do anything particularly special for me skin. Once I’m done with the one I have, I will not be repurchasing.

I stumbled upon this moisturizer when I realized that Hope in a Jar was too heavy for my combination/oily skin for summertime. This moisturizing gel is fabulous! It’s quick absorbing and weightless. Works well under make-up and sunscreen. Do not need to use a lot for full face coverage.
I have really oily skin and this stuff works, it doesn’t make me sweat like other lotions. I would absoulutely buy this again. perfect under make-up too.
i have oily skin and this lotion helps keep it under control and doesn’t add any oil/grease.
Perfect moisturizer for my oily skin. Not at all greasy, but makes my face smooth and hydrated. Never caused one break out.
Perfect for a hot and humid day. Not moisturizing enough for a winter day.

I loove this in the summer, when my skin doesn’t need as much moisture. This really softens & smooths my skin, skins in fast, and doesn’t leave it greasy! I’ve tried it in the winter, but it just isn’t as good then. Definitly try this in the summertime if you have combination skin!

Using the Clinique 3-step system has completely changed my skin. I turned 25 and realized that my pores were still large, and my skin was still breaking out. I also noticed those creases that just pop up overnight! I decided to commit to a regimen. I tried all kinds of really pricey stuff, and it made my skin much worse, even after continued use. My friend came over with Clinique, I tried it, and BAM!I combine the 3-step for oily in the Tzone group with once a week Dr. Brandt Microdermabrasion, and my skin is like a dream. I use NO face makeup now, just some bronzer and mascara! It’s amazing. It’ll change your life.About the lotion: keeps my usually oily skin matte ALL day. Makes skin soft and balanced. Feels so nice once it sinks in!
I think this will be way too drying on people with normal/dry skin. However, it should be perfect for those with super oily skin.
review_title: Perfect for people with Oily Skin

love it! not greasy, just perfect for moisturizer!

I love this!! The best oil free moisture around.
Wonderfully light weight, never greasy, but still very moisturizing. When my skin is dry it never stings or irritates my skin like other lotions do.

I’ve been using this product for almost 3 weeks now. I have sensitive skin, and at first I had a few little breakouts while I think my skin was getting used to a new product. But the last several days I have noticed a difference and my skin has been feeling softer and smoother.

I’ve been using this product for over a year now, and this really makes me not try anything else. I have oily, sensitive and acne prone skin, and this has been amazing for my worst ever skin condition. It really does its job as a moisturizer. However in the cooler months, my skin requires a bit more moisture so I either switch to the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, or add Moisture Surge to dry areas.
Softens & Smooths the skin not oily at all.

Excellent product, I wasnt sure at first because I was the least expensive, but I figure since I use Clinique for most everything else, I would give it a try, It really does work great.

I have been using this for a week now and I absolutely love it. I have oily skin so it is very hard to find a lotion that doesn’t make it worse. And I have the problem of other lotions that make my face sweat but not this stuff. I would highly recommend this to people with oily skin.

This moisturizer never makes my face feel greasy. I’ve used some before that after a few hours my face is oily and my makeup gets clumpy. I have very sensitive skin that is aging plus I have adult acne and have been searching for a product like this one. This moisturizes my skin without making it feel oily. Other products either over dry or make my skin feel oily.
My skin stays moisturized and shine free. Good staff
my skin kinda gets drier when new season comes...n Dramatically different moisturizing gel rly work well on my skin... it is not greasy but keep protecting my skin and i just luv it!!

The best moisturizer, bought this one for my teenage son, uses after cleansing to help his natural oil glands to stop overproduction causing acne. No more acne and great sunscreen for a boy who would not normally use one.

I love this stuff! I had tried everything for my dull, breakout prone skin. Dermalogica, La-Roche Posay, Murad....everything expensive. This moisturizer is great! It is so lightweight and really does help control oil. I still get a little oily, but not near as much as I was before I started using this. A little goes a long way! I’m so glad I found this product!

I bought this stuff recently because I was in desperate need for a moisturizer. I use the Clinique Acne Solutions System, and this actually works really well with it. This stuff is so moisturizing, it’s crazy! I would definitely recommend it.

good for oily skin. last a long time just one pump per use

I’m combination skin, oily T-zone and some dry areas around my lips but not too oily overall. I also get milia, so i wanted something lighter than a lotion, oil-free and doesn’t make me break out.......this product works. it leaves my skin feeling smooth and moisture all day. it doesn’t do good job on my dry area, so i bought a travel size lotion and use that......best moisturizer so far

I really like using this moisturizer because my skin can get super oily and this helps control it a bit and makes me skin feel matte. My only problem is that it doesn’t make me matte for a long time. Maybe i just have super oily skin, but other than that, i really love this moisturizer. I have used other moisturizers and this is one my favorite so far. I also find that not a lot is needed. I used one pump, dot it on my face and smooth it out and it covers my whole face already. Overall, its an awesome moisturizer for oily skin people or combination skin.
I have Type 3 skin and this is the moisturizer I should be using, but when I put it on, it is too light. I think I will stick to the DDML.
i love this stuff! it’s the first moisturizer that i’ve ever been able to use and love! i have sensitive skin and cystic acne, and it works perfectly for me...no break outs!
review_title: non greasy, absorbs easily, makes skin feel dreamy

review_text: I used this product when I was younger, but then experimented a lot with all kinds of different moisturizers. I never found anything that I love like this. I’m done experimenting. It’s lightweight, but it moisturizes amazingly without making my skin feel heavy or oily.
This is a great lightweight moisturizer and you get a big bottle at a very good price. This hasn’t caused any breakouts on my sensitive skin. Perfect for summer or any hot humid environment.

I’ve been hearing about this gel for such a long time now. I never wanted to put down the money to buy it but I regret not buying it EARLIER!! This is a miracle product! It smells “clean“ and it absorbs SUPER QUICK. I have combination oily skin and it is perfect for oily skin! My sister said that the bottle lasts forever too!

I was looking for a different moisturizer and decided to go with this one. Even though I have combination dry skin, I really wanted a formulation that was oil free, so I chose this over DDML. It didn’t disappoint. The value is amazing and the product is great! It moisturizes my skin very well and keeps my acne in check. Great product!

This is a light moisturizer that absorbed quickly and moisturized my skin moderately. I felt like I had a film on my skin after using it. I decreased the amount I was putting on my face and it was slightly better.
I like using this moisturizure because it absorbs fast and does not leave my face feeling oily in the morning.

My skin is oily and acne prone, so I always resisted on trying moisturizers. However, this product really surprised me, since it did not cause me spots, and makes my skin looks softer. I would recommend!
Pretty moisturizing, but the smell is not that good. Overall, it is worth the money

I love the “lotion“ formula during the colder & drier months, but this gel formula is great for the warmer months. It has a lighter texture and for me it’s perfect under sheer foundations and/or tinted moisturizers just for the extra boost of non-greasy moisture.

I’ve been using Clinique for years and have always loved the three step facial cleansing products. The moisturizing gel is perfect for my complicated skin type (combination) because it moisturizes the dry areas without making the rest of my face feel like a grease pit. If you have dry skin, stick with the moisturizing LOTION instead.

i have very oily skin and it is annooying waking up in the morning with shiny, greasy face. But after i started using Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel, my skin tone is more bright and soft and smooth! I think it’s very suitable for people who have oily, pimple-prone skin.

But, it made me break out! what the heck!? I have sensitive acne prone skin and wanted to find a good moisturizer to help combat my slight oilyskin and this felt great, it looked great and smelled great. my skin on the other hand after about a week of use, flared up! I couldn’t figure out what it was, maybe it was my makeup combined with it or sme new medicine i was taking. well i didnt stop my meds, duh, so i changed back to my yes to tomatoes drug store moisturizer and i haven’t been breaking out. But i also went back to my Clinique foundation instead of store brand which might be it. Either way, something made me break out this might have been the catalyst or just another cause. :( good thing it was on sale at sephora for only $7.50!

I had been looking at this moisturizer for some time. Having acne prone skin, I’m hesitant to try new moisturizers as they tend to clog my pores and cause more breakouts. Sitting down with the consultant at clinique, we discussed my skin concerns and what was best for my issues.Lightweights, absorbs quickly, non shiny. Its easy to apply, and a small amount (1 pump) covers my entire face.Only downfall is the pump, not sure if its slightly clogged or if the product causes it to rise slowly - just takes some extra time to come back up.I love this moisturizer and recommend it to anyone (male or female) with acne concerns who still need to moisturize.

All my skin care products are from Clinique after trying this moisturizer. I have a normal skin tone that leans a little bit towards the combination type occasionally.Originally I had been using Hope in a Jar by Philosophy which was also excellent, but I switched to this gel because I really like the pump as well as how light it is. When i put it on my face, it smooths everything. I immediately feel very refreshed, and that’s what I like most before i put my primer and make up on. The lightness is great, and the moisturizing aspect is also good.I put four stars instead of five because although it feels great when you put in on, and it feels super light, sometimes I feel like i need to put a little more in order to make sure that it is definitely keeping my face moisturized for the whole day.I really like how with one pump I can spread it along my face and neck though. It is definitely the best for your money.

Clinique is a great brand.The products are a great value.You can’t go wrong with this.They offer it in lotion or gel.I love the gel.It comes in a light weight formual that absorbs quick so we can get on with our beauty routins.It has no smell to it.The amount of product the pump puts out is perfect.2 pumps will do my face and neck,with no extra product going to waste with me wundering where i should put it.....elebows.I hope you will try it.A great mosturizer at a good price that works great with out a bad smell coming from it like you washed your face with a dirty rag.....U know the type.

i have oily acne prone skin which tends to get dry during east coast winters.clinique’s moisturizing gel is perfect for humid weather that i’m experiencing right now. i use this in the morning since my philosophy lotion kept on ’peeling’ off when i put on my foundation.the gel doesn’t leave your face oily or shiny... just perfect for your next step in your morning routine.
Using this product (as well as the lotion and the facial soap) made my face say give me more!!! My face feels so different and so quickly ..it hurts to pay 30$ but its worth it

I’ve tried a lot of different moisturizers and have finally settled for this one -- it’s the only one for me. I have oily, acne-prone skin. This moisturizer isn’t greasy and absorbs quickly for a lovely matte finish. Definitely recommend it!
review_title: Great for those cursed with oily skin

review_text: This is an amazing product! My skin is extremely sensitive and sways between being dry/combination and extremely oil. This gel doesn’t irritate my skin at all or aggravate existing break-outs and blemishes. My dry areas are moisturized and soft, and the oily areas aren’t nearly as shiny and greasy feeling as with other gels and lotions. Typically I get bored with a product and try other things after it’s used up (even if I like it). Not this! I’m on my third bottle and simply love it. One bottle lasts me at least six months using one to two pumps twice a day. This will not replace a night cream for those that like a richer moisturizer in their pm routine. However, I find that if I combine this with a treatment serum/cream I can create a similar effect without the oily feeling. I’m actually glad that this doesn’t have spf in it since some sun protection products breaks me out. I just use makeup with spf in it. It has no scent, simple packaging, and is just a great product that does what it says!
I have tried several products (mattifying moisturizers, oil-free lotons, etc) and this is the best! It never leaves my skin feeling oily but it always moisturizers. It is definitely worth the money.

Love this so much!!!! Keeps my skin moisturized and is not oily or greasy or heavy, absorbs quickly. The down side is, when I put too much of this at night, it will make my face oily in the morning... Also, not strong enough for colder weather.
This is the best moisturizer for my skin which is combination to oily. It leaves my skin feeling really soft after application. My makeup application is alot smoother on top of this moisturizer.
I love this product. It makes my smooth feel so soft, and it feels refreshing and absorbs quickly.

I absolutely love this product. I have oily skin and prone to breakouts. This product, which I wear over Clinique oil-free acne lotion, has been wonderful for my skin. I even feel better on days where I run out of the house with no makeup on...and that is something I normally would be embarrassed about! This product makes my skin feel SO soft. I use it at least 2 times a day, and it works great under makeup. I will definitely be purchasing this product again.

The Dramatically Different Gel is an entirely different product than Clinique’s original yellowish cream. The cream caused me some breakouts and was a very mediocre product. This gel, on the other hand, has a great balance of moisture and oil-control. It hasn’t cause me to break out and is a great day cream. I wish it had a little bit of sunscreen, but I use a little over top of it. It doesn’t get 5 stars because it burns a little when applied to sunburned or irritated skin. The gel burns a little if I use it after exfoliation.
review_title: Good, Basic Moisturizer for Normal Skin

review_text: This product works great. I apply it in the morning after washing my face and using a clinique toner. IT doesn’t leave me skin oily OR dry. It’s great for combination skin. I’ve had no break outs and no drying after using this product.My skin has not worsened, it has even gotten a little ’clearer’. I’d recommend it for someone who has a thorough daily facial regimen.
I really enjoy it, its not sticky or too creamy. It leaves my face smooth and moisturized and without breakouts! plus it absorbs quickly into the skin.

I love this moisturizing gel which gives my oily skin the perfect amount of moisture on those hot summer days. During the winter my skin tends to get really dry so I switch to Cliniques Dramatically Different moisturizer cream instead of the gel.

I like lotion version better than this, but I can’t really use the lotion because it is too greasy for my skin type(I have really oily skin). I think the lotion moisturizes better and is more effective in smoothing out the skin. The only good thing about this is that it leaves your skin looking fresh and not greasy. The lotion is a bit on the greasy side but I still think it’s superior to this. This is good for those who prefer a light moisturization and those who don’t want their skin to look shiny.

So far I’m really really liking this. For whatever reason (I haven’t quite figured out yet) I broke out SO BAD within the last couple weeks. Like, really bad. I have been using Proactiv religiously twice a day every day for about two-three weeks, which has severely dried out my lids and neck, as well as some patches on my face and around my nose. I noticed it yesterday and realized that this was so bad for you! Dry skin makes for wrinkles and I definitely don’t want wrinkles on my eyes and neck (I’m only 23 but hey I want to get an early start!) So I read really good reviews about this moisturizer. I’m really weary about moisturizers and don’t really use them unless i need them. Previously I had been using Jergens gradual tanning moisturizer but noticed it left my already acne prone somewhat oily face even more greasy, so I would only use it every once in a while. Anyway, so I read really good reviews about this moisturizer and read that it does well with skin like mine. I’ve only used it twice a day for about two days and I must say it feels really good! I also didn’t notice a scent at all. It’s very humid here in South Texas and though it hasn’t gotten as hot as it will probably get this summer, I don’t think this moisturizer has made my face very oily at all! I’ve only had to blot once today and reapply my mineral veil and that has really done the job. I wish there was SPF in it though, but I get that with my BE foundation (SPF 15). I also used this as a primer this morning becuase while BE’s Prime Time does an excellent job, I think that is what has made me break out so badly. Anyway, I’m really impressed with this moisturizer and the amount of product you get. For $24 it’s a little pricey, but for a good quality moisturizer that’ll last a good while, I think that’s a good deal. I’m probably going to have to use it for a few more days to get rid of the dryness on my eyelids and neck, but that’s to be expected. All in all, I’m very pleased with this moisturizer so far!
works well, very sheer and silky feeling.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I have oily/combination skin, and this is the only thing that works for me. I have been using it for over 8 years now. It is lightweight and great for someone who wants moisture but not greasiness.
Lightweight, oil free moisturizer that is suitable for oily acne-prone skin! A little bit goes a long way so this big bottle will last you. Love it.
The best moisturizer for oily skin.

This is a great moisturizer for the warm weather. It’s very light and hydrates my combination skin(oily in the T-zone and dry on the cheeks) well.However, I don’t recommend it for the winter season. It doesn’t hydrate enough for my dry spots. So I usually switch to Moisturizing Lotion or other heavier cream in the winter.
review_title: Good moisturizer for the warm weather.

review_text: i’m a huge fan of the dramatically different moisturizer. all i heard was nothing but rave reviews for this product, so i thought i’d give it try. i rushed home so i could it with my new shu uemura cleansing oil (which was another disappointment) and tested it out and it didn’t provide the moisture i was looking for. my face still felt dry. i thought this would be a perfect for my skin since i have combination/oily skin, but i was WRONG!

This is the very first moisturizer I’ve ever used that does not break me out and makes my face baby soft! It’s a great primer. If you have oily skin it’s partly because it’s lacking moisture, so your skin is making more oil to compensate. I also have sensitive, cystic acne-prone skin, and this stuff is amazing!

i love it<3 for someone whos goign through puberty and dealig with combination oily/dry patches/everything thats just exploding out of your pores, this product is EXCELLENT, reccommended it to everyone i knew (= only need a pump and it hydrates and keeps my face nice and oil free, will purchase this product over and over!

I’ve been using this ever since I started using a daily moisturizer, and only have good things to say about it.This gel doesn’t leave any residue on my face. I’ve had problems with other lotions when I tried to put on foundation. I recently tried Philosophy, but the lotion kept rubbing off in clumps. Not so with Clinique!It’s a very light moisturizer that goes on in just a few swipes of my fingers, and very quickly absorbs into my skin. The pump squirts out a perfect amount of gel, so I don’t end up with too much on my hand. It goes on very smoothly, so I also don’t end up missing any areas. Because it’s so convenient, I manage to use it even when I’m in a complete rush. This bottle lasts a long time.I have pretty oily skin, but this never feels greasy, even on a humid summer day. In the winter, or if areas of my face are dried out from acne medication, I dab some thicker lotion samples I have on top of this one. It doesn’t smell, it doesn’t irritate my eyes when I get too close, and it helps keep my periodic breakouts to a minimum.I keep coming back to Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel because it does exactly what it’s supposed to do. It goes on easily, and all that it leaves is softer, smoother skin. It doesn’t interfere with anything else I put on my face, which makes it a great thing to use every day.Now, I just need to find an spf that I like just as much...

I’ve been using this for about 2 weeks, along with the mild cleanser and the clarifying lotion, and I really like it. I used to use Hope in a Jar... This works just as well but you get twice as much product for half the price so it makes more sense to me. I like that its lightweight for the summer months because I tend to get a bit oily.

I bought my first bottle of this over 6 months ago and just finished it. It lasts a long time because a little goes a long way. I just got 2 more bottles...one for the up and downstairs bathroom.My skin has never been so flake-free and smooth. I’m sooo glad they have it in gel for oily skin like mine.
It makes my skin really soft and its and excellent moisturizer! I Love it and recommed it highly!!!!
Its so lightweight it goes perfectly under makeup. Its very smoothing from the moment its first used.

So far I really like this moisterizer. It makes my skin feel amazing and it actually clears my skin up. Still having some minor flare ups but they are 10 times better then they were and it looks like my skin color has evened out. My chin doesn’t look as bad with the acne scars I have on it. It’s only been a few weeks, but I really like this stuff so far!

It is the best moisturizer for my face that I have ever used. Its very light, but it still moisturizes my face in the areas that get dry and does not make my T-zone oily either. Works the way it says its suppose to and I am very pleased

I have combination skin, and this product has done wonders! My skin looks so much healthier! It keeps the dry parts of my skin hydrated and does not make the oilier parts of my skin greasy. I use it twice a day.

I have been around the block, up the street, to the next town, and back again in order to find a moisturizer that was light enough to not make my T-zone greasy and to provide adequate moisture to my dry as the Sahara cheeks. This was the moisturizer, after another shopping trip and reading 20 different bottles, that I decided to try. I LOVE IT!! My oily areas are not exacerbated by this product and my cheeks are moisturized perfectly. Dear Clinique, Don’t ever stop making it... I beg of you.

Goes on so smooth, absorbs right into the skin without leaving any sort of residue or film that some moisturizers leave behind. After it was completely absorbed into the skin it was not oily, it just made my skin feel soft and moisturized.

I have used this moisturizer for years. I like it because it isn’t overly scented, light, absorbs quickly, and inexpensive. In the driest spots, this doesn’t seem to moisturize well, but this does the trick for an overall moisturizer after washing.
Good stuff, 100% will buy another one.
i have been using this moisturizer for over five years and i find it very reliable no matter the season. it feels great, smells fine and doesn’t irritate my skin, which is sensitive.
non-greasy, easily absorbed, leaves no residue, light enough for oily skin

This is indeed a good product but I have noticed no dramatic change in my skin. Generally I like to read hundreds of reviews before spending my hard end money over products andt I knew that it wouldn’t bring any significant change in my skin. Still I like it. now the question is why? I am 22 years old having oily skin with some mild acne and I desperately searched for a moisturiser which is oil free,light weight and wont cause me to breakout.And it’s almost impossible to find a oil free moisturiser in drugstore which can treat somewhat problematic skins like me Then I came to know about this product and wanted to g.ive it a try. It goes on like a smooth butter and absorbs in your skin very well.,it is lightweight and not at all heavy on ur face. the only downside is its just a basic moisturiser with no antioxidants,no SPF. so if you dont expect much from a moisturiser which is oil free and wont aggravate your problems then this is definitely worth a try girls.Should I buy this again? ~ umm Yes,I’ll keep using this because I hardly lay my hands on new things and it dint do me any wrong.
review_title: Good Product but nothing dramatic about it

review_text: I am prone to breakouts, and I wanted to get out of this “anti-blemish“ skin care routine because Im scared i might wrinkle faster. I tried this gel-creme and it absorbs quicly and feels very light. I havent noticed a dramatic difference in my skin, but i will continue to use since i have not experienced any adverse effects. I only use this at night because: a) no spf for the day tiime; and b) “night cremes“ are too heavy for my oily-blemish prone skin.. ENJOY!
I like it! I have combination skin and have always hesitated to put moisturizer on for fear of feeling slimey mid-day. This goes on easily, dries quickly and does not feel at all greasy.l

I didn’t realize that when I was told to get the gel instead of the lotion, there would be such a difference between the products. For skin types like mine, normal to a litte dry in the cheek area while oily in the T-zone, this gel moisturizer is awesome. Is not heavy or oily and works great under foundation makeup.
review_title: Love this better than the lotion

review_text: My skin has definitely responded well to this moisturizer and its great that its a gel moisturizer because it doesn’t feel as heavy as the lotion type. Leaves my face moisturized, not too oily and pretty clear. I will continue to buy this product. Didn’t give it 5 stars because it occassionally required a touch up when my face would get a little bit of dryness throughout the day.

Great product for young and older men. Been using it for many years and will never use anything else but Clinique Moisturizing Gel. I’m 55 years old and have little just a few wrinkles around my eyes. i was a heavy smoker and I’m sure Clinique is keeping my skin looking young.

This gel moisturizer is okay, but not great. I would not repurchase it. I bought it because I have oily, somewhat problematic skin and I heard great things about this product. This product is really great for oil control, I give it that. I wish I could keep using it but it gives me pimples, which is strange since it’s so light weight. Another thing: II really didn’t notice an improvement in the condition of my skin as stated in the description. My skin did not become any softer or smoother. Maybe worth a try if you’re looking purely for an oil controlling moisturizer though.

Awesome. Used it after a friend suggested it for my acne prone/oily skin. I use it every night and its really helped with my acne and keeps my skin really soft. Only thing I would complain is that I can’t use it during the day because its not as creamy as I need my moisturizer to be especially b/c my skin dries up in winter months but its a really light clean feeling gel feels great when i put it on.
Love this moisturizer! I have oily skin and it gives me the drink it needs without making me more oily!

This is the best moisturizing product I have ever used and always leaves my skin feeling remarkably soft after I apply it. I think the gel works a lot better than the lotion, and it also works really well on sunburns. It completely re leaves any pain and keeps your skin from flaking and drying out when the sunburn starts to heal.
This face lotion is perfect for oily/combination skin. It is lightweight but keeps your skin moisturized without any greasy feel. I love it!

I have oily to combo skin and needed something that didn’t make me shine like a mirror. This is perfect! Moisturizes while leaving a matte finish, and is great going into the summer months where you don’t want your make-up to “melt off“.
its was smooth and silky but didn’t make me feel oily
great gel. absorbs quickly and makes your face so s mooth
This product is perfect for my combination skin. It moisturizes the dry areas without making the “normal“ areas feel greasy/heavy.
i love love love this moisturizing gel - perfect for oily skin + hot weather
This stuff is perfect for my combo skin. sinks right in and works...no greasy feeling!

I’ve been trying different moisturizers for 5 years now, and I always come back to this for my combination skin. Wonderfully hydrating, never too much, rarely too little. If it only had SPF in it, I would never, ever use anything else.

I started using this product about 2 years ago, and I love it!!! I have oily skin, but it gets super dry in the winter which doesn’t help with break outs (contrary to popular belief, both oily and dry skin can cause acne). This is perfect because it doesn’t make my skin feel all grose and heavy after I use it. It’s a gel, so it soaks into my skin super fast and leaves it nice and soft. It’s helped a lot with my acne too... I mean, I still get a small pimple now and then due to stress, but people never guess that I used to get bad acne.

Honestly, I have searched for a moisturizer I actually like - everything else seems to heavy for my acne-prone, combination skin. This is perfect! The gel is moisturizing without being too thick on my skin. My skin absorbs all of it and it never looks greasy or leaves a film. I will never change to any other formula.

Clinique Dramatically Different Moisterizing Gel is AMAZING!!! I have troubled skin that breaks out, yet has dry patches, but this moisterizer does it all! It doesn’t leave skin looking oily either. My sister recomended it to me and I’m so glad I took her advice!!!

i got the gel formula of this moisturizer, since its better for people with oily skin. i do like how it hydrates my skin and leaves it soft and absorbs pretty quickly. however, i have pretty oily skin and this doesn’t help with the oil control. so i rather use a moisturizer that controls oil or this is great for the winter seasons, when my skin does get more dry and i need the hydration.
This stuff is amazing. Its lightweight but feels like pouring a glass of water into your skin. :)

I have acne prone skin never really used moisturizers. this stuff feels great and does not leave any icky yucky feeling on my skin. it smells nice too. However, it is not as moisturizing as i would like and my skin still has dry spots sometimes. overall the best moisturizer ive found
It’s light, and refreshing with a light lemony smell. But it doesn’t moisturize intensely and leaves a thin, almost sticky film behind.
Abosorbs quickly, leave the skin feeling moisturized without feeling greasy. Good product.
I mean, the reputation is true. It is a great moisturizer. Don’t be fooled by the cheap price. It does much more than some other overpriced products.

My Opinion: I really recommend this product. Ever since I bought this moisturizing gel, I have no interest in searching for THE next best thing anymore. It’s a great addition to anyone’s skin routine.Rountine/How it Feels: 2 pumps for the entire face and 1 pump for the neck. The liquid looks more like a lotion, however, you will notice the gel-like feeling once you apply. It doesn’t feel oily and I didn’t have to wait long to be makeup-ready (some moisturizers leave your face feeling drenched and will take forever to dry in order to apply your cosmetics). In addition to the daytime, I actually look forward to my skin routine at night now too (*pump pump, rub, pump, rub “ahhh feels good, sleepy time“) Lol.I recommend the pump over the squeeze tube. Unless you travel often and need something more convenient to throw in your makeup bag, you will not need to use the product more than twice a day (morning/night) and can leave it at home.
review_title: Leaves me feeling refreshed and confident

review_text: My skin didn’t like this moisturizer...By 10 AM I was already oily all over my face. Unfortunately this moisturizer that I heard so many good things about didn’t go well with my skin type. Two thumbs down.

I tried this after receiving the original lotion as part of a gift. This Gel formula is much better, it does not hydrate as good as the original, but does not have oil that can break you out. This does not contain mineral oil. (The original does) I like that this does the job without irritating my skin or breaking me out. I got this when the jumbo size was available, and while it was expensive I do not need to use a lot of it and it has lasted a long time. If you are looking for a good moisterizer this would be a great one to try, if you have oily or acne prone skin. This hydrates and smooths your skin without being greasy or causing breakouts.
I really love this moisturizing gel! It doesnt feel heavy and I have noticed a difference in my skin after using it for a few weeks.

Glides on skin nice and smooth. It feels really soft, and a little goes a long way! Keeps skin feeling nice all day, hydrates very well, and does not cause breakouts. It also feels good under my primer and make-up. My face never feels heavy.
I really love this stuff.it moisturizes, it hydrates without leaving your skin all weird feeling. :) LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE :)

this is the best moisturizer i’ve come across for myself so far. it keeps my skin fresh and less oily than usual but sometimes doesnt give me enough moisture under my makeup. i do notice some dry patches later in the day. the skin on my face has become extremely dry over the last year, so perhaps i need stronger moisturizing than the average person.what i like most about it is that it is light and has a great scent, even though i think its unscented. i have never had to worry that it’s going to make me break out, which is a big concern for me.
review_title: your best bet for combination skin

review_text: absolutely in love with this product. I tried the lotion, but it was too heavy, then I accidentally bought this product and will be sticking to it from now on. I have found the perfect moisturizer!!

I love this face moisturizer and cannot say enough good things about it!! I have tried so many other moisturizers that claim to be for oily skin, but by the end of the day my skin looks oily, shiny and gross! However, this one is perfect and I highly recommend it to anyone struggling to find that perfect face lotion for oily skin. I LOVE IT!!
I have been using this lotion for years. It is light-weight and leaves my skin feeling silky smooth. When I’m going through a dry spell, I can even apply 2-3 times a day and never feel greasy.

I got this when I told the saleslady I had combination skin. I used it for a week liberally and it cause my eyes to look wrinkled and some dry patches, too. The rest felt super soft and was great for applying makeup. The dryness and wrinkles under my eyes went away when I stopped using it on my eye area. My eye area is super sensitive and I’d just make sure you try this in the store before buying.

This is the best lotion I have ever tried, and I’ve tried many. I love that it is a gel because the consistency is perfect for my semi oily skin. It never feels greasy and it absorbs right away. Plus I survived my first northern winter without any dry skin or peeling on my face!

I use this product every day and night and it works so well for me. It feels light and I like the way that it makes my skin feel. I can also put it on under my makeup. It’s just such an amazing product!
Works great!Use generously so that all dryness of the skin is gone.Overall great moisturizer.
Overall I love this product, it never leaves my face oily, I do suggest a thicker moisturizer in the winter time as my face was still a bit dry

This is a miracle worker. It sinks right in and there is literally no hang time between application and it actually moisturizing. I feel as if the excess oil that’s going to appear on my face later in the day is already absorbed.
review_title: THIS is god's gift to women (or men).

review_text: This is the perfect moisturizer for me. Although I have oily skin, I still need light moisture. I’ve tried others, but this one does the job best for to improve my skin texture, without any breakouts.
Very light, perfect for summer. Doesn’t make the skin feel greasy, goes on smoothly and doesn’t make me breakout. Perfect for me for very hot days.

Great moisturizer for oily/acne prone skin looking to create a smooth base before make up application without looking greasy 10mins. later. Actually helps to keep my skin more balanced by moisturizing, so my t-zone doesn’t go bonkers w/ oil production throughout the day. Doesn’t cause breakouts either. Will purchase again.
review_title: Helps keep skin matte and moisturized...

review_text: I remember a few years ago Clinique had a campaign for their Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion which said it was a “drink for your skin“. The gel is no different in my opinion- when I apply it, I actually feel like it’s hydrating my face. I look forward to moisturizing because it’s so pleasant- crazy, I know!I use this gel lotion along with the Clinique Acne Solutions Line and think it’s a great program for clear skin. I wish Clinique was cheaper, but other than that, this product gets 5 stars!
doesnt feel like lotion ,makes mt skin feel balanced and soft

I am really enjoying this product. I was a former user of the lotion, but I think that the switch to the gel has been just what my skin has needed. I gave it a 4/5 because I really enjoy carrying a light load when it comes to my products - and for me this only works as a day time lotion, not day and night. I am finding myself in need of a more intense nighttime moisturizer. None the less, I am loving it!

I am addicted to trying out different moisturizers and this moisturizer is in my top 3. I love it because it’s way cheaper than my regular moisturizer (hope in a jar). This definitely improves skin tone and is quite moisturizing for my combination skin (i have dry patches on my chin and my forehead and nose are super oily). My favourite part is the price, the bottle is huge.

I have used this moisturizer for over 3 months now and could not imagine going a day without it. Since the cold blizzard-like weather has nipped my cheeks, and made my face super dry, this is like giving it all the moisture it was in need of. The formula is great; this one in particular is great for people with oily or combination skin and it absorbs very quickly. A tiny squirt goes a long way. Applying twice a day (once after I wash my face in the morning and again before I go to bed) is all it takes.

It works great with my sensitive combination skin, especially during the hot summer months. I would not recommend this product during the colder weather, as it does tend to dry out my skin under my make-up.
After reading other reviews decide to order to try it, after only a few days the difference on my skin is unbelievable. Not sticky and completely absorb in seconds. Will continue to use it.

I love this product! (And so did my 26 year old daughter who tried mine). It is not greasy, yet provides wonderful moisture. Handles my oily T-zone like a charm. Have been using it for a few years. Every time I try something else, I also throw it out and come back to this!
This product was recommended to me by the sales associate and I was not satisfied with it at all. its not hydrating, and didn’t do anything for my face except dry it out!

After all the great reviews on this product, I felt I had to try it. I have combination skin that feels really dry if not moisturized, but that gets really oily in the T-zone. I’ve only been using this for a few days now, morning and night, but can definitely notice a change. My face is significantly less oily, and I feel like I have less of the small breakouts I sometimes get. However, my skin doesn’t look hydrated, and actually looks a little on the dry side. I would recommend using this in the day time, and maybe using a heavier cream for night time.

I tend to have a very oily t-zone, but am mildly dry on my cheeks. With regular moisturizers my t-zone would be oily five minutes after I washed it, but with this moisturizer the oil is much less plentiful, granted it doesn’t cure the overproduction, so I use it in conjunction with the Clinique t-zone shine control pore minimizer and the combination has worked wonders. Anyone else suffering from the freshly washed grease glow should definitely check this out!
review_title: I'm in love with this moisturizer

review_text: I always had oily skin and NEVER moisturized or wore face makeup. I always hated the feeling on my face, I didn’t even like it on my hands. Moisturizers also made my face sweat. I would only wear powder blush and occaisionally transluscent powder to help with the shine. As I’m getting older my skin is now combination to oily. I still hate things on my face.This winter my face started getting dry patches, flakey and red, so I thought I would try moisturizing and liked what I read in other reviews for this product. I am so glad I did!!Immediately the flakiness was gone, and the redness followed. And much to my very happy surprise the color of my complection evened out and my skin looks incredible! It is so soft and supple and young looking!!What works best for me is to add a few drops of water to a small amount in my palm, mix and apply for daytime, that way I don’t feel face sweat or oily at all. At night I apply full strength. But a little goes a very long way. I also apply it to my neck and the “V“ section of my chest. Noticable difference!
review_title: Didn't like stuff on my face, but love this!

review_text: I was having a problem with dryness around the places of my skin that are not oily. This Clinique product helped in only three days! It was fabulous and now my face is so soft and smooth it’s amazing!

Hands down my favorite moisturizer. Very hydrating and effective. One thing I would recommend is using it as a night moisturizer. When I used it in the morning I thought it soaked in, but when I put on my foundation it didn’t last as long as usual.
THIS IS VERY GOOD FOR OILY SKIN IT LEAVES IT BABY SOFT BUT NOT OILY
Love it!!! Hard to believe but I am 50 years old and still slightly oily. This gel is perfect for my skin...never greasy and moisturized perfectly. So glad I tried it...

Ive tried many, many different moisturizers before I found this one! I love it! I have very dry, sensitive skin, and this product works miracle! It doesn’t irritate, it leaves my skin healthy looking. Thank goodness for clinique!
review_title: Been using this moisturizer for years

review_text: For anyone with oily skin this product is for you. I find that this product smooths my face without lingering for hours after you apply it. Just a little dab will mosturize my face nicely and my skin just sucks it up. I can apply foundation or powder within a minute of applying. The only downside is that it doesn’t have an SPF rating.

I have oily/combination skin and finding a moisturizer has proven difficult. I bought this the other day at a friends recommendation. I applied in the evening before bed. Normally my skin will be a bit oily when I wake up but I was suprised by how soft my skin felt with no excess oil. I’m looking forward to seeing how this product effects my skin clarity/condition over the course of time.

This is my second bottle of this gel, and I honestly can’t tell you how long its been since I bout the first one. They last SO long. It may look expensive, but one or two pumps will do your whole face. I have some dry patches and some oily patches used to take over my whole face. Not anymore! I have altered to other samples of moisturizer but I don’t think I’ll ever use anything else! It makes your skin feel like a baby’s skin!
I buy this for my mom. She swears by it... and has used it since I was in High School... non greasy and this large size lasts for ever.
ever non greasy gel formula!!
Does everything it says it would, I have no complaint!

Not great for people with dry or dry/combo skin. I’d been told that this would not be as greasy, but it dried my skin out because I have dry skin to begin with. I went back to the lotion version of this gel.

I have very oily skin and every moisturizer I have used just made it worse. Then I found Clinique Moisturizing Gel....it is amazing! It goes on so smooth and my skin just drinks it in but it is NOT oily at all! I love it!!! My oily skin has improved soooo much since I’ve been using this gel. I’ll never use anything else.

This is by far my favorite moisturizer. I have tried the moisture surge as well, and I think this one is better at moisturizing. It absorbs quickly and leaves the skin feeling very silky and non-greasy. I have not had any problems with acne while using this product even though I have sensitive skin. The only thing I would change is including some SPF protection.

I thought I was grabbing the moisturizer cream that I always use, but got home and was pleasantly surprised with the gel. It feels so good on your skin. I’ve been using it for a week and I get great compliments on my skin even in the bitter cold!! Love it! Will recommend it to all who willl listen!
I my skin is pretty oily and most moisturizers are too thick. This moisturizer is light enough to not feel heavy but works well on my sensitive but oily skin
Fantastic moisturizer. use it at night, and u feel the difference when u wake up. however, in the day, u feel ur face getting oiler though.

My mom suggested I use this when I was 5 and it’s been my favorite product for the last 12 years. I use it everyday now before I put on my makeup and it works miracles. It doesn’t make me breakout and hydrates my skin perfectly at the same time.
This feels like silk on my face. It’s never too heavy or oily but my skin looks and feels fantastic after use. My skin has looked so much better since using this product.
review_title: The BEST moisturizer ever, hands down!!!

review_text: i have extremely oily skin so it has always been difficult for me to find a moisturizer that would minimize the pores as well as smooth my skin. This moisturizing gel is simply the best product for my skin type, it doesn’t make me break out or make my skin feel greasy. And it’s the best deal for $24!!!

I love this moisturizer! I have oily skin in the summer and dry skin in the winter and this works great every season. My skin literally sucks it in and it makes it feel soft and smoothe! My husband loves it too!
Have always loved Clinique products and love this as well! It does what it says - TZone isn’t oily and my cheeks are dry! I feel like I’m 20 again!
I love, love, love this moisturizing gel. It feels so good on my skin without making my skin oily. Putting it on is my favorite part of the day!!
This product is ok...its called “dramatically different“ but i don’t see anything “dramatically different“ about my skin. I would probably shop around some more before buying the product again.
i love this moisturizer!! it is soooooo smooth and isnt greasy feeling. i absorbs so well and is nice and light weight! definite repurchase!!!!

I purchased this moisturizing gel over the weekend after reading reviews online. I’d previously been using a cheap Clean and Clear moisturizer and it just wasn’t cutting it. I also previously used Hope In A Jar but wasn’t impressed with the smell or the results for the price. I crossed my fingers that this stuff would be better and I’d say it was worth the money. A little does go a long way and it has been incredibly smoothing and fast-drying. My skin doesn’t feel tight after application, which I love. I’m not crazy about the scent (it says fragrance free but there’s still something there). Either way, so far... so good!
This is the best moisturizer I have used. It glides on my face very easily, absorbs quickly and leaves a smooth velvety feel. Not to mention a little goes a long way so it will last you a long time!

I have used this Moisturizing Gel for years and would never switch to anything else. I have extremely oily skin, and this gives me just enough moisture so that my face doesn’t over produce oil. And this bottle lasts FOREVER - seriously, for my face I use 1 pump in the morning and at night, and this will last months.
i picked this facial moisturizer for my oily, acne prone skin because it seemed to be the best deal for the price. i am happy with my choice.

I love this. I used to use the regular dramatically different moisturizing lotion. And in fact I still do. But I love to load this up all over my face and neck. It givees me a dewy look without being greasy and my face is never flaky. This also does wonders after time in the sun.

I. Absolutely. LOVE. This. Moisturizer! This is a great daily moisturizer even for my normally oily skin. I use this after washing my face and my skin literally drinks in this moisturizer.This is considered a gel but it really feels like a moisturizer without the oiliness. It’s lightweight and it doesn’t leave your face hard, frozen, or sticky like common facial gels can do. Not only that, but after applying it my skin feels so smooth and soft. Another plus? No breakouts from this one!I love that for once, you actually get what you pay for in reference to size and quantity of product. I’ve had my current 4.2 oz bottle for over a month and it’s not even near half gone with at least twice daily use.The only things that could make this product better is if it contained anti-aging/preventive properties (it’s never too early to start!), if it was all natural, if it had oil-controlling properties, and most importantly if it had SPF. I know Peter Roth and Bare Escentuals sell finishing powder with SPF so I’m interested in using that over my moisturizer.I consider this a daily moisturizer and in that it’s great. If there was a time that my skin was intensely dry I would probably use this in combination with a richer moisturizer that’s specifically targeted for extremely dry skin. But as a daily item, I highly recommend this product.
review_title: Can't believe I waited this long!

review_text: ive tried about every hydrating cream possible, and this one is great so far, it doesnt make me break out, it’s really light so i only put a pea-size amount of gel on my whole face and it’s enough :)

this gel worked great overall; my skin tone was evened after just a few days of use, and i noticed significantly less oil on my face throughout the day. however, it doesn’t supply much moisture. i use a clarifying mask weekly on my skin, and this gel failed to deliver the moisture to my face that was needed--hence, i had a peeling nose and forehead.
This gel didn’t provide enough moisture but would probably be really good for summer, when my skin tends to be more oily.
review_title: Better for summer, not so good for winter

review_text: I absolutely love this product. I was trying to find a lotion to use under my makeup. I use to find that my skin would get oily from the minimum make up I was using. I find this is a nice wear under makeup. I like it cause it is non-greasy and so light as a moisturizer. I will be buying the bigger version. For now I have the smaller one and it has been lasting me a while but I just love the feeling of this moisturizing and the thought of running out of it scares me hehe
this get is perfect for cold weather or any time of the yearlub it

I love this moisturizer! When I was younger, before this formula was available, I used the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion and hated it, so I was wary to use this with the cleanser and toner, but it turned out to be the only thing that I liked of the three. I have semi-oily skin and my face just drinks up the moisture in this gel. I don’t feel oily or heavy, and I usually use 2.5 pumps, especially in the winter since I walk half a mile to work every day. At first it seems like it will be too much, but it leaves my face feeling smooth, soft, and moisturized!
An excellent gel for oily skin and it never caused any breakouts

Great moisturizer for oily skin. It moisturizes and wears well under my make up and even plays well with my retinoid products. You can layer on extra if needed for those dry days or flaking skin (in the case of retin a usage) and I never get break outs from it. Light and soothing.
I have oily skin and have tried many types of moisturizers and this by far is the best! My skin looks and feels great, doesn’t make my skin shiny.
this works great on my skin. i use it every morning and every night before bed after i wash my face. this gel formula works great on my oily-skin type. well worth the price.
I have pretty oily skin, i found this very good for me
Not oily, great for oily/combo skins, good quality with great price.
As a person with sentive skin, prone to breakouts, I find this lightweight product perfect for night-time application. I also love the great price!
i love this moisturizing gel :]

i have oily prone acne skin which only certain kinds of moisturizer is good for me. this is really good with controlling shine and absorbing oil. i have no worries about y face being shiny thru out the day. but as for winter its not moisturized enough. and my face is only good for 1hr then the dry peeling skin comes back.

I’ve had trouble finding a moisturizer that actually moisturizes my skin without causing breakouts or excessive shine - NO LONGER! Clinique’s moisturizing gel is exactly what I needed, and it actually manages to keep shine down for most of the day! Although more expensive than drugstore moisturizers I typically used, I’ll gladly pay every cent for this gem!
This helps my skin everyday. It’s light and absobant.

Most moisturizers are too heavy and make my oily skin even worse, but this gel is so lightweight that it soaks right in and moisturizes without overloading my face. In the summer it’s light enough that I don’t have to worry about blotting the shine off my face and even in winter weather it’s still strong enough to keep my skin from drying out. The scent is light and clean, not at all overpowering. This is the perfect moisturizer for combination/oily skin!!

this product soaks in very quickly and doesn’t leave any kind of gresy feeling which i love. the only downside is that it makes for a very spotty foundation canvas. if you plan to wear foundation over this, be sure to use some kind of primer!

The only moisturizer I have ever liked. I have combination/oily skin and my face loves this lightweight gel. Just enough moisture to keep it from feeling tight, but not so much that it feels heavy or greasy. A cool drink for the face. A favorite.
It hydrates very well and one of the star product of Clinique. I love it and also expect it will have a little more functions other than just hydration.

I love the finish of this. My skin feels so soft due to the silicones in it. This doesnt make me break out. I no longer get an oily tzone a few hours after cleansing. I dont have super oily skin so this isnt the best for me in the winter. My only problem(same with most clinique products) is that there are dyes and quite a few artificial ingredients in this.

I have very dry skin and purchased this product to use with a set of Clinique skin care products. When I first apply it, my skin feels softer. After about 30 minutes my skin is flaky again. It didnt work for me.

my skin is normally combination-dry in the winter, with scaly/flaky patches around my eyes. this moisturizer soothes my dry patches while smoothing out the scaliness that comes from harsh winter winds. this moisturizer works great!

Gave me exactly what the description said. Perfect moisture balance for my skin that is comfortable in the cheeks but oily in the t-zone. It absorbs quickly and makes my face feels phenomenally soft! Winter irritation is gone!

I have combo/oily skin and this moisturizer has actually decreased the shine on my face while giving moisturization to the drier parts. It’s very light and doesn’t feel heavy at all. I recommend if you have oily skin that tends to break out.
I have naturally oily skin but use perscription acne topicals. This left my skins with dry patches all over. I do think that it would do a good job in the summer but not in the winter.

This is seriously one of the best products I have ever used!!!!!!!!! This is my holy grail moisturizer. I was having a lot of issues with moisturizers and even stopped using one just because every thing I used broke me out. I have extremely oily skin in my t zone and needed something to fit my skin care needs. I decided to try this as a last resort and am so pleased! It is so light and gives just enough moisture. It has not broken me out, and makes me face so incredibly soft. Only half a pump is needed for your entire face and neck even. Clinique is amazing. Definitely recommended!
Makes my face even smoother....

just this morning i put this on because my face was dry and flaky from my face wash and now it doesnt even look like i had that problem this morning.....this is soooooo hydrating..and it absorbs in so well soon as i have it rubed it i cant feel any residue or oilness and my face looks sooooo soft and hydrated....def the best

Didn’t moisterize and caused me to break out (oil-free, really?). I know a lot of people who use Clinique moisterizers and swear by it but I guess my skin reacted to something in the formula. It’s probably best to avoid this if you have dry/sensitive skin.

I’ve tried a few moisturizers before and this one is pretty good. I do, however, feel like i have to use more than the normal moisturizer to get my dry spots (esp. in the winter right now). The good thing is, IT DOESN’T MAKE ME FEEL OILY! It doesn’t seemed to need to be reapplied at any point during the day either, my skin stays moistened throughout the day. I’m pretty happy with this, but I think as of now I still prefer the Boscia Moisturizer and I may buy that once this runs out. Happy shopping!

I have used this lotion on and off for several years, but I always come back to it. It is a no frills moisturizer that leaves skin comfortably smooth and soft. Great for sensitive skin, and I even use around my eyes wth no irritation. It absorbs quickly and helps makeup glide on smoothly.

this is a staple of my beauty regimen. it never interferes with any other product and it always feels light on my face. because i prefer sheer coverage, i usually layer this with a tinted moisturizer, like clinique’s almost makeup. if the lotion version is too oily for you, this is the better option.

This is a great moisturizer for those of you, who like me has very oily skin. First of all it’s very lightweight and your skin absorbs this gel very quickly. There is no thickness too it so it won’t clog your pores. I noticed a patch of dryness on my skin when I used it the first time, I wasn’t going to give it a 5 star rating, but I noticed that it was no longer there after a couple mins. This is one of those moisturizers that is great all year rounds, good at ridding those dry patches during the summer without giving you that mask feeling and great with winter too because it provides enough moisture to conquer the dry patches created by the cold weather. I also have acne prone skin and this product does that cause breakouts or irritation. I never really indulged in clinique products in the past but I really started to noticed that clinique provide pretty good skincare products ( for acne) and their prices are fair as well.

I have been using this moisturizer for years! I have combination skin and the lotion is just too greasy for me. The GEL is moisturizing enough and absorbs very quickly so I can put on make up right away. It leaves my skin very smooth too! This is totally a 5 star product. The reason why I rated it 4 stars now it’s because I ordered my bottle from sephora online this time....the pump stopped dispensing after 1/4 usage because the tube was cut!!! I’ve never had this problem when I buy from the clinique counter.
