I really liked this moisturizer, but having to add and SPF product on top just ruined how nice it felt. Also, with the extra layer, even the formulation for oily skin was slick city come mid-day. If it felt this way and had SPF, it would be love.

I’ve been using Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel for years. It’s great for skin that’s more prone to be oily because it’s oil free but it doesn’t dry out your skin. I put it on after showering, first thing in the morning , and/or before putting on my Clinique foundation. I HIGHLY reccommend this moisturizer. And because I model, my skin is my career so I can’t afford to use products that aren’t effective.
great for combo skin when you don’t want an oily base for your makeup. light and moisturizing
I’ve been using this stuff for years and love it! It’s fragrance free and doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy.
I got this one because is for oily skin, but I didn’t like it as much, plus it doesn’t control my oily skin like it supposse to. I like the lotion better, and my foundation goes smoothier also.
i love this! since i’m allergic to most things that have oil in the formula, this is perfect. lightweight and my new favorite!
Awesome, just the right amount of moisture for my already oily skin. Absorbs perfectly, not greasy at all.

i worked with aveda products for at least 5 yrs, and never got the results i was looking for. saw this product, thaught i would guve it a try, and after cleansing and toning i use this gelnlotion and my face does not make my skin too dry and did not leave it feeling greasey in a few hours, the oil is under control all day. and i work in a resteraunt the there is oil every where it feels like. over all this product i great for oily to normal skin, does not make skin too dry, will control oil all day, leaves skin feeling smooth and hydrated.
Time tested perfection ;-) Not a complaint with my tempermental skin!

... because it does moisturize my face without making it break (which happens to me with all moisturizers, even those made of green tea, etc..) and it is fast absorbing! (so that I don’t have to wait half an hour to be able to apply my make up! Love it!

I have very very oily skin (typically 2 hours later my makeup feels super heavy and I turn very shiny). I normally use the Body Shop’s Green Tea moisturizer but I run through that stuff like water and it doesn’t seem to set in right.I love this Clinique moisturizing gel. The gel goes on lighter and absorbs well into oily skin. I like it better than lotion since my skin is so oily - any other lotion feels kind of heavy or slightly greasy. Love love love this stuff. The price isn’t that bad either. $13 for 1.7 fl oz. I would recommend this to anyone with oily skin.
review_title: Better than lotion for oily skin

review_text: I have been using this for a year now and i am on my third or fourth bottle. I love this stuff, I also use clinique’s cleanser for oily skin and my skin has been improving ever since. This gives me just the right amount of moisture without making my face feel greasy or breaking me out. I highly recommend this to oily acne prone people out there looking for just enough moisture.

I’ve had this product for a long time but I no longer use it...at first I loved it because it made my skin extra soft and moisturized but then it started making my skin super flaky and no amount of product I put on it would unflake it. Finally I stopped using it. If u want to try this product I reccomend getting a sample to try first.
I love this so much. This is the second time I bought this product! Highly recommond this!
not expensive but with great result

I have extremely oily skin-even in the winter which in turn causes many breakouts even though I’m in my 30’s. Oily skin with breakouts in my 30’s makes me feel dirty and unfresh. After going through many products, reading many reviews, I took a chance and bought Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. It’s description seemed to fit me needs. It has made all of the difference.I apply 2 pumps of the gel in the morning and it is the perfect amount to moisturize my face & neck area. It has a light fresh clean scent, it is very lightweight on the skin, & absorbs very quickly. My face feels clean even after applying it.My face stays oil free through my 8 hour work day and after-until I get home at night & I wash it.It’s winter and I usually used to breakout and my skin became so dull so I HAD to wear make up everyday but since usung this moisturizer everything has changed. My face is clear with absolutely no blemishes, and my complexion is brighter & softer. I haven’t had to use make up in months. I do not know what I would do if this product was to ever be discontinued. It took me along time to find it and I can’t live without it.

Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is the best moisturizer I’ve used. It’s extremely light weight and oil free so it is perfect for your face and it never causes breakouts or oily skin. It is also absorbs quickly so your face isn’t left with any tacky feeling. I have used this product for years and will never consider switching. It’s the best facial moisturizer out there.

I like but I did not love. It was moisturizing and not greasy but my skin did not like it as much as I did. Although it was not greasy, I became greasy. I started using it during the spring time and into the summer and then ditched it for something else. It was good, just not for me.

i used to use this moisterizer, then i used a body shop one, than came back to this. i dunno if they changed the formula but its not as amazing as i remembered. maybe i need the lotion one now? i like the lightweightness of it but it doesnt seem to moisterize my face enough during these winter months. i think i will use this more during summer and use a creamier one for winter... :(
I like this product and I will keep buying it.

I have been seraching for good moisturising cream/gel for my sensitive skin since long time. After clinique my serach is over. It’s very good and within reach of my budget. It last for longer. My skin gets irritated very easily but after applying clinique it feels great. Also I don’t get any acne. The only con is it doesn’t have spf in it.
been using for the past year . love it.
I love this moisturizer “gel“. I have oily skin so I don’t like regular face lotions. I use this in the summer and winter and it provides the perfect amount of moisture!
I love this moisturizer. I have oily skin and this leaves my face feeling smooth and silky, but not greasy.
Such an amazing moisturizer. MUST HAVE
I LOVE THIS!!! My aunt bought it for me in a gift set a few years ago and I’ve loved it since! This is a staple for me!
not oily, lightweight, perfect for wearing under makeup,
I really like this. It’s moisturizing enough without being greasy. It’s not too thick.
runs out extremely quickly since you have to use alot this product doesnt do anything it is supposed to do it definitley does not improve or soften the skin i would not buy this product again

I felt like this product just sat on my skin and did nothing. It left my skin feeling tight and not moisturized. The odd film it left on my skin had a shine to it, which made my face appear oily far before it really was.

i purchased the trial size of this because of all of the reviews i read. i have oily skin, but during the winter months i have started drying out on my cheeks closest to my nose so i wanted a moisturizer to help. this is extremely lighweight and does help with the dry spots for a moment, but after a few hours the dry spots come back. it does not add any additional oil and didn’t make me break-out, which i greatly appreciate. however, i am really looking for something a bit more moisturizing, that lasts, especially at night. this is a nice product for someone without any dryness.
review_title: nice product, but not extremely moisturizing

review_text: This product is great. I have combination skin so this is excellent as a day moisturizer and with combining with my makeup and helping to make my night cream go further without making my face purposefully shiny (oily). A lot of product for the money, will last a while.
I have very oily skin and break out often. This gel is extremely light weight and absorbs super quickly. It makes my skin very soft - almost like a primer. think I’ve converted to this for life.
Feels like an actual moisturizer, but helps keeps break outs to a minimum. Skin feels soft after application.
i have oily skin. this gel helps my skin stay hydrated, but oil free!

I looooooooooove this product! since the very first time I used it I felt the difference! (makes my face feel like baby skin!) and what’s more, I usually get irritated and get blemishes with other moisturizers, but not with this one!It dries quick and makes my skin radiant, healthy & moisturized!recommended! :)

This gel lotion is SO WONDERFUL. In the past I had bought the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion and it made my oily skin feel so greasy to the point where I would not use it. So I decided to buy this again but I opted for the gel. I don’t know if this has happened with anybody else...but my skin doesn’t get oily AT ALL when I use this in conjunction with the 3-step Clinique system. I love it and will continue to buy it! =]

I usually use cliniques acne solution system. However, this winter i realized my face was getting dry and flakey so i added this to my routine. I prefer the gel to the lotion because the lotion made my face feel oily. It has definitely improved my skin!

At first I was a little curious by the fact that it was called a gel, but it’s actually great! The moisturizer is awesome and it doesn’t feel heavy like a lotion. Your skin can still breathe after putting this on. Even in the winter when I have a lot of dry, flaky skin I can put this on generously and not feel like I am clogging my pores. And in the summer it doesn’t feel greasy. Definitely would recommend to anyone.

I am absolutely in love with this stuff. I have been searching for years for a moisturizer that would work with my oily skin and this really does the trick. Not only does my makeup go on so much more smoothly than it ever did before, but my makeup actually stays on all day. I have also had less breakouts since using this moisturizer because it’s so lightweight that it doesn’t clog up my pores like others have done in the past. It’s also great that it absorbs so quickly because you don’t have to wait so long to begin applying your makeup so it’s saved me a bit of time in the mornings too.
review_title: the best moisturizer i have ever tried

review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! It’s by far the best I’ve ever tried. In the past I’ve broken out just looking at other moisturizers, but this one is perfect for my oily acne-prone skin. It doesn’t really feel like a gel to me, but I suppose it’s slightly more gel-like than Clinique’s DDM Lotion. I actually like the DDM Lotion too, but this is much better for my skin type. It absorbs quickly--I’m ready for the next step in my routine as soon as I put down the bottle. It’s not at all greasy, and it smells fine. It also leaves a nice soft velvety feel. The only downside is the packaging. It looks pretty, but the hard, boxy, bulky bottle is difficult to travel with, and I end up having to leave it propped upside down to get the last of the product out. It would be better in a tube or jar. But I love it so much I’d probably buy it even if it came in a Ziplock sandwich bag.

I LOVE this product. 2 thumbs up. 5 stars. Its the best mosturizer I’ve used. I love it. It makes me feel refreshed and ready in the morning. It doesn’t make my face look greasy, oily, or shiny, which other mosturizers have, and I hate that. So the fact that doesn’t do that, makes me love this product even more. It clears up any dryness or flakiness I may have on my face! :) I’m glad I bought this product and I reccomend it to anyone!
review_title: I love this product.. Mosturizing.. yet, not oily.

review_text: I have used this product for years, I have oily-combination skin and it is the only moisturizer that dosen’t break me out. The gel DD moisturizer absorbs quickly into the skin and leaves no greasy residue. I don’t even need to use a makeup primer when I use this lotion before applying my foundation.
i love it because it keeps my skinned hydrated without feeling caked on.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for a couple years now and it is great! I have combo/oily skin and this moisturizer doesn’t break me out at all. Not too heavy, absorbs quickly, I think it is a good price for the amount you get. 1 bottle lasts me 6 months at least.
i love this it works great and keeps my face fresh and adds moisture.
I just love it. It just goes on so smoothly and feels wonderful! ! It feels so natural, not at all like makeup. I certainly will continue to use it.
Once I bought the gel, I found it is great. So light and soft.
This gel has something in it that made my face burn-had to go back to the lotion

I have very acne prone skin at 26. I love this moisturizer because it definitely, and I mean definitely, does not break me out. And I have spent lots of time and money searching for a moisturizer that doesn’t worsen my skin! A little goes a long way...
I have mostly oily skin and when it came to using moisturizers I became very paranoid, but this one is just right. You can see and feel the difference right away and it does not feel heavy at all.
review_title: I cant get enough of it...

review_text: Clinique’s Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is by far the best moisturizer I have used in a long time. I noticed a dramatic difference in my skin after about a week of use - so soft and smooth.

I have been using this product for a couple of years now and I absolutely adore it. My skin is very prone to break outs and naturally oily so using a regular facial moisturizer is really asking for trouble. My dermatologist told me not to use lotions any more and to find myself a gel. Guess what? I did. Clinique offers moisture without grease and I love them for it. It goes on really light, provides excellent moisture and doesn’t make me shinier than a new penny within an hour of putting it on.
review_title: A Gel that actually moisturizes! Hooray!

review_text: I’ve been using this lotion for over 5 years and love it! I switch between the lotion (winter) and gel (summer), and the lotion is my favorite of the 2. it does a great job of moisturizing my skin and keeping it soft in the cold!
I will love this for the summer, but I need more moisture during the winter. I use Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion which is perfect for my drier winter skin.
review_title: Not so perfect for my winter skin!

review_text: The Gel version of Clinique’s Moisturizer is just great! I have oily skin that gets dry in certain places during the winter. This moisturizer is wonderfully light. It never leaves an oily residue on my face. It leaves my skin feeling balanced and ready to take on the day. I only wish it had some sunscreen in it.

I looove this gel! A year or two ago when I was still breaking out because of puberty and what not, this was the best moisturizer for me. It’s not too heavy (in fact it’s really really lightweight; one of the biggest reasons I love it) and absorbs right away. It makes your face feel moisturized without giving you that nasty greasy feeling. It’s not the best for moisturizing if you have really dry skin but I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with acne or mild break outs because it works!
For those of us with persistently oily skin, the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is the answer to keep our skin from drying out (and still being oily!) during the winter.
better than any mosturizer out there in the market!!!!!

I first started using DDMG about a year ago and I love it. My skin is acne prone and sensitive. I have an oily T-zone, which made it hard to find a moisturizer that would work for my whole face. This product is great, it doesn’t leave any sort of oily residue. Since I have been using it, my skin has overall been a lot better. I used to have dry cheeks but this product has balanced my whole face. I will buy this product again.
average moisturizing gel. But doesn’t do anything beyond moisturizing. Too light to use in winter.

After trying out this product, I noticed I started breaking out in various parts of my face by the end of the day. I gave it a few more days thinking it had nothing to do with the product, but it was. Seems to work in the aspect of controlling oil and providing just the right moisture, but did not work out for me.

I have used the lotion version for YEARS! Switched to this gel version when it became available. I like the gel’s consistency better since it is less oily and absorbs super quick. Its not the best for moisturizing and there is no SPF but I like having it around for those days where my skin is irritated or just needs a rest. I can depend on this to play well with my other product - there is no cross-product reaction and it doesnt pill up beneath my primer and foundations. Most importantly, it doesnt clog my pores and there is nothing in this to cause irritation or allergic reaction, this is definitely my ol’-reliable go-to product!

I think this product is fantastic. I have sensitive skin and pores that love to enlarge. Although I avoid the bridge of my nose, this product does not aggravate those problems on other areas of my face.

I have been using the ddml for about a year so when I saw the ddmg in store I had to try it. I LOVE IT!!! It feels so much better than the lotion and seems to absorb quicker. I like the texture and it really is amazing.
This product is absolutely excellent. The gel feels like silk on my skin.

I was hoping to find a balance between the DDM gel and the lotion, but the lotion is too oily and the gel does not moisturize enough. I find myself putting this gel on more than once, just to get enough moisture in my skin. Not a favorite...
Deeply moisturizes, without being greasy.

I rarely, if ever, have used moisturizer on my face since it’s been oily since I was a kid. Now that I’m older, I want something that will help keep the wrinkles at bay and not clog pores or make me feel like an oil-slick. This is a great product and very gentle. I use it on my forehead, neck and decolletage.

I’ve tried so many other moisturizers before but never seemed to find the right one for my skin type. My t-zone tends to get really oily and this gel formula works really well for me. My skin feels so soft when I put the moisturizer by itself. I’ll also put it on before I put on my make-up primer and it just works really well with the other products that I use.
Not moisturizing enough. Still not moisturizing enough at night when I mix it with by oil from Ren.

This stuff is cheap, compared to Clinique’s Moisture Surge, which I was using before this. Because of the comparable reviews and ratings, I thought I’d give Dramatically Different a try.First of all, I HATE the lotion form of this. It was too oily, smelled funny, etc. when I used it a few years ago. However, I was pleased that this gel is light and clean-feeling. I’m not too satisfied with the scent, but it’s faint so it’s not a huge problem. DDMG is definitely less moisturizing than Moisture Surge (hence the name of the latter), so I moisturize in layers with DDMG, which isn’t a problem since it absorbs quickly and feels light, while leaving a semi-matte finish.So all in all, a great moisturizer, especially for acne-prone people like me. :) If you have really dry skin though, this might not be moisturizing enough.
i’ve asked for a sample of DDMG in Sephora.. i’m using it for days now.. i love it! ill be saving my moolah for this =)
Great! Non oily! Absorbs quickly and keeps my skin balanced!
After awhile using it... my skin became very very dry

Every single moisturizer or sunscreen I have ever applied to my face has broken me out. I’m almost 30, so it’s not hormones, I’ve never had acne or any of that. I have combination skin, so some parts get really dry (my cheekbones) and other parts get oily easier...it’s hard to deal with. I bought this b/c I thought a gel type moisturizer might be different, especially from Clinique. They know skin, right? I’ve been using ths for three days & I love it! I can’t tell I’ve put anything on. It’s not oily, it’s light and obviously doesn’t clog my pores (at least not so far), but it keeps my skin moisturized and nice. I’ve also noticed a wrinkle reduction; I’m not sure if it’s this or my other skincare products (Dior facewash and Lancome toner), or the combination. I highly recommend this for people with picky skin.
LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER! it is the only one i have tried that didn’t clog my pores! i will continue to buy this for a long time.

I had gotten a sample of this moisturizer many years ago as part of a Clinique “gift with purchase“ promotion. I tried it then, but did not think too much of it. I have an excellent night cream (Olay Regenerist Night) but was never satisfied with any of the day time moisturizers that I tried. Out of the blue, I decided to get a sample of the moisturizer and give it one more try. This time I noticed a huge difference in the effect it had on my skin. It was absorbed immediately, seemed to “even out“ my skin and provided a great base for make up. The only drawback is that it has a strange fragrance, but I can live with that!

This is exactly what my combination skin has been looking for. It’s light and not greasy, and makes my skin super soft and glowy. I recommend it to anyone who has oily to combo skin. My only complaint is that it doesn’t contain SPF.
review_title: the stuff I've been waiting for.

review_text: I used to use the DDM lotion, but found it too greasy. But I love the new gel formula, it feels like you have nothing on. It’s especially great to mix Philosophy Vitamin C Booster.
so far the cream is good Ive only used 2 days but what i like about is that it dryes quit and it does not feel stiky on my face after i use it....

I have combination skin that is prone to breakouts, and this is one of the only moisturizers I can use that will not only keep my dry areas from getting dry, but it keeps my oily areas matte all day. And I mean all day. I also love that it is light, and soaks very easily into the skin.

I have very sensitive combination skin that is prone to breaking out especially at the chin. I tried this product and loved the smell and the feel of it, but it did not hydrate my skin enough. I am now using the lotion and it has been working better.
I have been using this moisturizer for years! Light, never greasy. The gel formulation doesn’t seem much different from the lotion, but that doesn’t deter me from using it.

This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I have always had oily combination skin. This keeps me from overdrying my face and has never broken my skin out. It’s actually the only moisturizer that hasn’t. It is the best. I especially need it since I am now 39!!!

I have oily T-zone combination skin, and this is great for summertime. It’s really light, and is a perfect sheer moisture layer on top of my night serum. When the weather cools, I switch back to BE RareMinerals face moisturizer. This is a life-saver for oily skin when the weather’s hot! Just a dot spread on the cheeks, chin and forehead is enough.
I have skin that is sometimes oil and sometimes dry, this is perfect for both occaision! Can be used on dry skin!!

I love this mosturizing gel. I have combination skin and roseaca and moisterizers are difficult to use to balance out. My roseaca is cleared up and skin not too dry or oily. It absorbs quickly to underneath cell without having

I’ve been using this moisturizer on my face for more than 6 months. I have acne-prone skin, an oily T-zone and enlarged pores. While this moisturizer doesn’t directly treat any of these conditions, it doesn’t aggravate them either--which is more than I can say for many so-called acne treatments. It makes my skin feel very soft, supple and isn’t dulling. It’s very light and absorbs into the skin very well. Light enough to use all summer and moisturizing enough to use during winter. I wish that I had discovered this gel sooner.

This is the only moisturizer that works for me. It leaves my skin smoothy smooth and smells herby. I love the cool gel, doesn’t feel greasy at all. Although there is a downside to this beautiful product. Friends will come up to me to feel my face, and I love my friends to death, but their germy hands gives me acne! Start charging them fees if they want a touch. I tried a bit of the moisturizer for dry skin, it has a really strong smell and felt rather odd, I don’t know if it works as well as this one, but make sure you get the right one for your skin! The bottle lasts a whole year. I wish they could make this product with SPF though.
excellent product. Used it since it first came back. Hard to go to something else
i remember the first time i used it with the 3 step system 3 years ago. It moisturizes and softens without you even realizing you have something on your face- yes, its that light.

It definitely does it’s job at moisturizing very well! My skin has never felt smoother. Normally I have an issue with my nose getting extremely oily by midday, but this is the first facial product I’ve used that makes it look and feel flawless. The only thing that would make this better is SPF of at least 15, but not at a higher price. This is the most I’m willing to pay for a skincare product, honestly.
clinique has never disapointed me...this moisturizer is amazing and keeps my skin moisturized all day..not greasy

So I’m one of those girls who has oily, acne prone skin, and I’ve always been scared of moisturizers; for good reasons though- most of them make me break out! I end up drying out my skin too much because of acne products and not moisturizing; this lotion is AMAZING... it absorbs quickly, no grease, no break-outs, perfect! Lately for some bizarre (probably hormonal) reason, I’ve developed very dry, irritated skin (for the first time in my life!) and I use this at day time still (perfect under makeup) and a heavy cream at night (atopalm- miracle lotioin for irritated skin) to calm my skin. Love love love it!!

I’ve used the dramatically different lotion for a few years and it worked great. when they began to make the gel version, I was skeptical- why change a good product? But on a whim I tried it and I LOVE it. if your skin is a little prone to shine and oiliness this moisturizer is feather light, and hydrates without adding oil or greasiness. also, as a bonus, you don’t have to use very much. literally one tiny dab spread evenly over most of my face, so its an incredible value. it makes my skin feel great after using the matching toner. I still use the lotion version of this moisturizer at night, cause it tends to come in the free gift at most makeup counters, but during the day, I use the gel. it sets up my skin perfectly for my makeup in the morning.

I love the way this makes my skin feel! I apply it to my face and neck twice a day. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling moisturized without feeling greasy. I have had problems in the past with moisturizers leaving my face too shiny, but this gives my skin a nice, healthy glow.

So this face moisturizing gel is fantastic. Before Clinique, I used the Philosophy Hope in a Jar, which is 10X more expensive. I actually prefer Clinique better, it’s light (which is VERY important to me), and it absorbs quickly. Since it is not an oil base, it doesn’t leave a oily residue on my face either.Only wish? That it had SPF in it.

Clinique is one of those brands that just doesn’t have the “fun“ or “wow“ factor as say, Philosophy or Stila. I really didn’t want to like this product because it is so basic and easy. BUT I love it, and am onto my second bottle. In conjunction with other various cleaners and serums in my skincare system, my problematic skin has cleared up immensely. A must-have lotion.
i love it! it feels good on your face. it doesn’t make your face feel greasy. your skin just drinks it up and after your skin feels like your skin just softer!

Occasionally I try something new and different, thinking it will be as good as this gel. It never is and I end up wasting my money and being unhappy with the condition of my skin until the bottle runs out and I can return to my Clinique. Will I ever learn?!The gel is light, but moisturizing. Skin feels clean and not weighed down or greasy. Perfect for summer humidity, as well as harsh winter cold. A little bit goes a long way, so the bottle lasts and is worth every penny!
This gel moisturizes skin without feeling greasy and causing breakouts.

I could never figure out, no matter how many ’greaseless’ face lotions I bought, why my face was so gross and oily by the end of the day. This lotion is a gel, and since the day I started using it, greasy ends to the day are gone. Fantastic if you have oily parts of your face.

This is good for combination oily skin. I think it moisturizes great but it takes a while to feel the results. When you apply it your face feels moisturized but then as it drys it goes back to feeling dryer. The next morning you can definately see and feel the results tho. Thats how i’d explain it ahha. definately not holy grail material.<3

The title basically says it all, this isn’t a super special lotion but it is a good daily use one and it’s not as expensive as so many of the other ones. Sometimes even when I’m using it, I will have dry spots on my face, though.
non greasy, just enough moisture, great for my combination skin. I use two pumps when my skin is extra dry and one when It’s not so dry. Just what I have been looking for.

I love this moisturizer. The gel just feels a lot fresher for your face than a cream, especially if you have combination/oily skin. It absorbs fairly quickly and feels like a drink for your skin, as strange as that might sound.
review_title: A New Staple in the Beauty Regimen!

review_text: I love this stuff! It basically achieves the same purpose as the moisturizing surge but as a lower cost. Unlike the moisturizing surge, this gel remains very lightweight, which I like. I don’t enjoy feeling as though there are layers of product on my face. I have combination skin, and it was recommended to me that I use the dramtically different lotion instead. However, I find that the lotion feels too heavy, takes too long to absorb, and leaves my skin feeling oily. My skin is extremely sensitive and my cheeks tend to be on the extreme dry side, and although others have commented on the gel being too drying for this type of skin, I disagree.
This is the ONLY moisturizer that my skin will tolerate. I’ve tried other brands and I always end up back at Clinique. The Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel is my lifeline. LOVE IT!!

For people with oily skin, this would be a great moisturizer, for me, it just doesn’t do enough. I have very dry skin, and normal skin through the t-zone, and this wasn’t what I needed in a summer moisturizer. It was too light even for hot weather, but for people that have oily to oily/combination skin, this would work amazing.
love love love the best! we never use any thing but this

This works very well for oily/combination skin, though it would likely be drying for dryer skin. On my dry areas (forehead, jawbone) I may dab a little DD lotion, but the gel works just fine alone. I would buy this again.

I usually use Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, but I thought I’d give this Gel a try. I found it to only be OK for the first couple of days and then I noticed, over time, my skin drying out. I could see how this would be a good lotion for people with oily skin, but for people like myself with combination skin, I think the lotion works better.

I had been using a lotion mositurizer and my face was oily all the time! I finally purchased this while I was at Sephora this past weekend and it is perfect!! My face feels great throughout the day! Finally!

I have tried so many different moisturizer from drugstore to proactiv to presciption ones..and no matter what they broke me out.. so I couldnt use them but even when my skin was acne free Its oily as can be but gets dry spots on cheeks and nose.. and this make my skin GORGEOUS for the first time in my life!!! love the 3step system now too!
review_title: FIRST FACE MOISTURIZER NOT TO BREAK ME OUT!!!

review_text: this product is promising (to say the very least)for once i can actually see the skin beneath my problem areas; again, another great investment.<3
Feels super lightweight, does not leave a greasy look or feel
I’ve tried many moisturizers, but I always come back to this one...it’s fantastic during the summer months.
I read in cosmo magazine that this was the best moisturizer, and they were right! it keeps my face smooth and hydrated all day.
It is light but after couple hours wearing it under make-up, my face get oily and shiny. I have to return the product.

I love using this moisturizer especially in the summer because it is so light that it doesn’t make my skin feel greased down.... i like the fact that the gel still gives great moisture and it absorbs well...

I love this moisturizer! The lotion was almost too heavy and made my skin oily so they recommended I try this gel instead. I love how its not heavy and it is perfect for oily skin. It goes on smoothly and the pump bottle always gives me just the right amount of product for my face.

This stuff isn’t too expensive and yet works great. It’s a very lightweight moisturizer that provides plenty of hydration without leaving your face to feel mucky or weighed down. I would recommend it for anyone.
Liked this moisturizer sometimes for summer nights, but for a girl living in Canada, the winters really dry my skin out and this lotion only added to the flakyness.
This is perfect for oily skin. It might be too dry for dry skin. I love it.

my skin is pretty horrible right now, i’m not really sure why, but I had a total breakout this summer. even so, this gel has been making my skin smoother, and may have even helped it improve....we’ll see

Best moisturizer on the face of the planet!! I have only used for last few months but I can already see a difference, I use the Clinique acne solutions face wash which tends to dry out skin so this is the perfect solution.

I have oily/combo skin, and I have often had trouble in the past finding the right skincare regimen so that I am not dried out nor too greasy. I have finally found something that works well on my skin! The dramatically different moisturizing gel is sooo lightweight and heavenly-feeling! It’s like putting tiny moisturizing dollops of clouds on your face (well, minus acid rain and pollution and stuff). It also smells really good, though the scent doesn’t overwhelm. I would definitely recommend it!
the best ,oistureizer i have used for my oily skin. and it is light weight enough that i don’t feel it on my face all day!

At first I thought it was so-so, but later I felt like my skin was so much smoother and less irritated. In the long run, my pre-pms skin is so much nicer!(I used it in conjunction with the acne clarifying lotion and acne soap).

This is a great, affordable oil-free moisture option; each bottle lasts me several months.I have combination skin that can get dry and flaky in some areas, but I can only use oil-free products or I pay the price in breakouts. This product provides adequate moisture without causing breakouts, and it has a nice, non-greasy finish.I sometimes need a little extra moisture to avoid flakiness (esp. in drier seasons) so I use Clinique’s Moisture Surge (another GREAT oil-free product) in combination with this where I have dry patches. Since using this combination, I have had NO problems with dry, flaky skin.

I like lotion version better than this. I think the lotion moisturizes better and is more effective in smoothing out the skin. The only good thing about this is that it leaves your skin looking fresh and not greasy. The lotion is a bit on the greasy side but I still think it’s superior to this. This is good for those who prefer a light moisturization and those who don’t want their skin to look shiny.

This lotion is not that great if you have breakouts and combination skin. I first tried this and though it was great but in the end it dried out my skin, i love Clinique but this is not a good lotion to spend your money on.
This is a good, lightweight moisturizer which doesn’t leave my face oily. You also get a lot for your money. Highly recommended.

Compared to the lotion, this is okay. Maybe because I’ve been using the lotion for 10 years, I don’t know. I found this kind of heavy, and not as moisturizing as the otion, believe it or not. I thought it would be more moisturizing.

I was looking for a good moisturizer and chose this one because of all the great reviews, but frankly I didn’t like it very much. I have combination skin that’s not really sensitive, but for me, this didn’t work well. I tried it out for a month and in the beginning it was alright (it absorbed quickly, was light and nongreasy), but over time I found that I started getting little bumps under my eyes. When I discontinued using it, the small bumps went away. I was disappointed with this product.

i just started using the clinique 3-step. at first i was hesitant to use a moisturizing gel because other gels i have used in the past weren’t nearly as effective. it absorbs quickly and makes my skin feel ultra smooth. it doesn’t feel like it’s clogging my pores at all.
It is a very light, non-oily day moisturizer. I have combinational skin and this product keeps everything in a balance.

I got this because it’s paraben-free and I wanted something lighter for the summer. It goes on very smoothly, and I’ve had no skin allergies to it. It just takes a little getting used to something that’s oil free, as I typically have somewhat dry skin.

I have acne prone skin that is dry in certain areas. Any other moisturizing lotion I’ve used has worsened my skins condition. They’re all so thick and greasy, I’d get clogged pores and breakouts. This gel is my new favorite product. It’s so lightweight and absorbs so quickly. It’s perfect.

I have been a Clinique fan ever since I was in jr. high. I used to use the regular Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion and found it was too thick of a cream and left my skin oily. Once the gel came out, I started using it and have been buying it ever since! I have dry skin so I use it once a day, in the morning, and have beautiful skin all day! I love this stuff!

I love this gel. My skin’s been breaking out to any kind of lotion or toner but it doesn’t break out to this one. I also love the light feel after application, without getting oily at all! It is really moisturizing as well because my skin used to chap even if it is not a dry season.

i have used the moisturizing lotion since my teens, and recently i was accidently given the gel instead of the lotion. when i went home and realized what had happened, i was in desperate need so i used it anyways. it turns out i love it way more, it doesnt leave a greasy feel at all, and completely soaks into my skin. i am not oily in the first place, but i prefer this formula by far.

I’ve tried many many moisturizers for my sensitive acne-prone skin, and I’ve yet to find anything that measures up to this one! It never feels heavy or greasy and yet it moisturizes effectively. It’s worth noting though, that the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion was much too rich for me. For those dry winter months I’ll sometimes use the Clinique Moisture Surge Extra at nighttime.

Despite Clinique being hypoallergenic, I was severely allergic to this skin cream. I believe it was the active ingredient in the “lightweight formula“, whatever that may be as I have been allergic to many similar skin creams in my hunt for a new one. I’m going back to using Bliss’ under eye cream all over my face.

I live in an incredibly dry climate and need facial moisturizers to control my acne prone skin. I tried to always use the Murad moisturizers, but it was getting pretty expensive. After talking to a very helpful Sephora employee, I was pointed to this Clinique moisturizing gel. I use it now as my nighttime moisturizer and have a travel size one for when I go to the gym and need to do a quick moisture application after working out. It doesn’t aggravate my acne, and It seems as if the gel keeps me hydrated for longer, as opposed to a traditional cream moisturizers. Definitely worth the money.

This is fabulous. It goes on smooth and dries right away. It feels like silk going on your skin. I definitely prefer it to the original lotion. I recommended it to a friend and she switched to the gel too.
I’ve been using this since I was 13 and I haven’t stopped since.

I like Clinique’s three step line for oily skin because it is non-drying. It has helped my face clear up some, but I have PCOS so it will probably never go away. However, I can always rely on Clinique Dramatically Different Moisterizing Gel to not clog my pores and be lightweight while still moisturizing.

This is perfect for the summer months when it gets hot and sometimes humid. I find that this is not enough for the winter. During winter I tend to use this on top of another moisturizer just to add more moisture to my face. I like how it also absorbs quickly and the pump bottle is awesome!! I don’t think this product broke me out but I dont think i have noticed a dramatic difference after using it for a month or so. Overall this product is good for the summer but it will not be enough for the winter
Good lightweight, fast absorbing moisture for sensitive or oily skin. But doesn’t last long and won’t really improve your texture of overall feel of your skin.

I used to use the lotion by Clinique religiously. I switched to the gel for the summer, and I’m never going back! This moisturizer is lightweight, and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy. I would recommend this to anyone.

i have never used a clinique product, and this is obviously a great product.first off, you get A LOT of product for the money, 4.2 ozthat is worth the price, and especially for such a great moisturizeri apply this after my bliss peeling groovey serum, and since my skin peels from that, it dries out, and i apply this and it just drinks it up and moisturizes it fantasticallyi can wear makeup after i apply this because it absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soooo soft!

I am currently on three medications for my acne, Retin-A and menocycline along with birth control.Ever since I began my treatments over three months ago I ahve been desperate for a good moisturizer, one that will moisturize really well at night when I have my topical cream on, but can help contain my oily throughout the day.This is perfect!I wait abbout ten minutes after I apply my topical cream at night, then apply a pump of this moisturizer after and its perfect! My skin feels comfortable and smooth. It’s so lightweight and blends into your skin perfectly!During the day it works great to add moisture to my dry/flakey areas but control the shine in my nose and forhead. It’s in no way a mattifier or anything like that, but it doesn’t add to my oilyness.
review_title: Perfect for those on prescription acne treatments!

review_text: I am a first time user of this product. It works like a lotion - not sure why it’s considered a gel but it is reasonably priced and my skin is responding well - it absorbs quickly so I can apply foundation just after using it.

This is one of the best moisturizing products that I have used. Compared with lotion, I like this one better coz it can keep your skin feel cool, especially in the summer. Beside, the price is quite reasonable. Highly recommended.
Love this moisture-- great for the skin!

I have what you call combination skin where my t-zone gets oily and everything else gets dry. This is by far, my favorite day time moisturizer. The bottle is a pretty good size so, you can use it for a good 3~6 months!I love this moisturizer so much, I’m taking the sample size with me to my Hawaiian vacay.

I know that sounds contrary to the purpose of the lotion, but the first time (and 2nd, and 3rd) that I used this as a night moisturizer, I woke up with an oil-slicked face. My skin had overcompensated for the lack of ANY oil(s) during its night repair. So, this bottle is rarely used. Sometimes I will mix it half/half with sunscreen, knowing my face will get oily during the day, but at night I’m back to original DDML type I-II, despite a naturally oily face with rare breakouts (simply cause I wash it every day!).
review_title: Not recommended for oily skin (w/ few breakouts).

review_text: good for those of us with oily and dry skin
This is the only moisturizer that I can use that won’t make my skin breakout! It smells and feels great!
This a wonderful, unbelievably light moisturizer! I use it when my skin is irritated, feels too oily, having breakouts or I need a break from my heavy-duty anti-aging regimen.

i have the craziest skin imaginable (oily, blemish, acne prone, discoloration) and it iis so difficult to find a product that won’t break me out. I found the Philosophy Hope in Jar worked really well however I cannot stand the smell. I used it religiously, tolerated the smell but thought there had to be something better out there... and so i tried the Clinique moisturizing gel and it’s great. I am very hard to please. I’ll be honest and say it really doesn’t help me with the OILY skin dilemna but it doesn’t break me out, great texture of product, a little goes a long way, and my skin has improved alot. Can’t have everything so i’ll give it 4 stars rather than 5. I’m impressed but would recommend you get the smaller tube or sample before spending money on the full size bottle. Good Luck, hope I helped.

I’ve been searching for a moisturizer for my combo-oily skin forever and finally found it!! This is the only thing I’ve used that doesn’t have me waking up with an icky, oily face. Holds up well under makeup and I actually have noticed the texture of my skin improve. It’s light and fragrance free!!
this moisture cream is so light and makes my face so soft and smooth, love it.

I have been searching long and hard for something that can help keep my face moisturized, keep my T-zone from breaking out, and no shiny spots on my face. This absolutely does that for you skin. My face is a lot clearer since use (have battled acne for a very long time) and I don’t get as many breakouts. The best thing is that my face no longer has huge shiny spots in pictures. It’s great, try it!

this gel is fantastic. i have combo skin..so the regular version is much to heavy for me. this is perfect, it goes on smoothly and keeps my face/neck soft, i def. recommend.. also, the price isn’t too bad either!

I have used the lotion version of this for years so i decided why not try the gel. I use it for a base under my more heavy creams like Repair wear and Youth surge. I have normal to dry skin and have used proactiv for years but could not get the pimples around my chin to go away for good. Since I started using this the pimples are gone. I think the lotion version must have an added oil that the gel does not.
Clinique DDML is the best moisturizer ever. It got better when I could order it at Sephora.com, and the best ever is this new DDM GEL! Leaves a smooth finish like an expensize primer.

Personally I don’t love most of moistures because of the oily feeling (even if that would be how moistures are supposed to be..), but I like this because it absorbs quickly & doesn’t leave heaviness. In spite of the lightness my skin seems softer - it works for me!
This moisturizing gel is wonderful for oily skin. I use this daily before applying makeup and it helps to keep my make up fresh all day.

I have very oily skin and use it year round. The lotions aren’t ideal for me, so the gel is perfect.This gel moisturizer is light weight, spreads evently, absorbs quickly.I have been using it for years and would definitely recommend for people that have combination to very oily skin.
The only moisurizer i will wear under makeup. Does not make skin greasy and also calms my sensitive skin.

Buying this product after seeing excellent reviews for oily skin, I’ve decided to give it a try. This product does an excellent job of moisturizing. It absorbs quickly into your skin and doesn’t leave behind a greasy mess. I found only a pea-sized amount was enough to cover my face, so this bottle will last me a long time. Anyone that has combination-oily skin should give this a try too! Worked for me :)
Great moisturizer for oily skin. Absorbs quickly and feels light weight. Works well with other products.

My boyfriend got me a goody bag from Sephora in Times Square and they had a free sample of this stuff in the bag. So I gave it a try and it works great! It really smooths my skin. The only problem is that I’m currently using this acne medication that really dries my skin out. So it doesn’t work as well as it did before I was on this acne medication. But I’m definitely going to be buying a regular sized bottle.

This is my holy grail moisturizer. When I decide to stray and my skin freaks out/breaks out, I somehow always find my way back to this stuff. After just finishing this dangerous product junkie cycle and being saved by DDMG once again, I think I’ve finally learned my lesson.It’s super light weight and has this barely there light smell (that I absolutely love...can’t explain it, just lovely). When I used to get Clinique facials (more than 5 years ago when I wasn’t a poor grad student), my aesthetician smoothed this on over my face and it instantly felt cool and comfortable - I was instantly hooked.Though I am a type 2 by Clinique’s guide, I still like the way this gel lotion feels better than the original DDML. When I need extra moisture, I just slather on an extra thick layer, let it dry, and then add another for a DIY mask (it’s the poor gal’s Moisture Surge).I *know* a bunch of ladies think that this would be 10 times better with SPF in it, but I disagree. My biochem friend insists that combining SPF and moisturizer can make the SPF less effective. Whether or not this is true, some sunblocking ingredients can also block pores (which stinks for ladies like me who tend to get breakouts).All in all, it’s the perfect cool base for my makeup - both liquid and mineral/powder - and does not oxidize or alter the shade of my foundation. It plays well with SPF foundations, and rarely makes my face look shiny (only if it’s super hot and humid...but then, who doesn’t look a little dewy?).It’s a keeper.

I have oily/dehydrated skin. Naturally oily... but because I use topical gel for moderate acne my skin is dehydrated. I love that this product is oil-free... but i put 4 coats of it on my skin and was still dry!You must have really really oily skin to use this moisturizer!

The Clinique 3 step system is easily the BEST thing that has ever happened to my skin. I never thought I needed a moisturizer since my skin was oily, but was I wrong!! This non greasy gel melts into my skin & actually helps my body produce LESS oil on my T zone. My skin is noticably softer & smoother after using. I can’t believe I waited so long to try it.

I absolutely love this lotion. It’s very lightweight, yet moisturizing at the same time. If you’re looking for a simple moisturizer, this is the winner. I actually mix it with 2 pearl sized drops of the Sheer City Block (SPF25) to allow enough moisture and protection at the same time.

I used to regard moisturizers with a mixture of fear, panic and loathing. When I finally swallowed my anxiety long enough to try DDMG for the first time, my oily skin entered sebaceous gland heaven! Even after a few hours, my skin stayed smooth and dewy, somewhere in that really delicate area where it’s hydrated but not oily. Definitely worth trying if you have a long history of struggles against moisturizers and battle plans designed specifically to avoid using them!

This lotion is a godsend to my picky skin... other oil free lotions do not moisturize enough and my skin ends up flaky and cracked. This lotion is such a great balance and never leaves my skin greasy, it is the best lotion for under my makeup that I have ever used.SPF would be nice, but it would probably ruin the consistency of the lotion.

i have battled with acne since i was 14. of course it is not nearly as pronounced as it was then. in fact, my family now laughs at me when i complain about my acne as they don’t even see it. over the years i have tried a variety of products including a slew of different oil-free moisturizers. the problem with moisturizers made for acne-prone skin is that they are often medicated and as I am now 22, i want to guard my skin against aging. as such, i required a new moisturizer. i was definitely nervous trying DDMG as DDML made my face so greasy it was simply ridiculous. however, the DDMG in combination with clinique’s acne soap and clarifying toner has helped my skin be not only clear and break-out free but also nourished and moisturized.i recommend this to any and all acne-sufferers. FINALLY a moisturizer exists that doesn’t break out my skin AND truly moisturizers (and as such guarding my poor forehead from premature wrinkles!).

LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!! I have tried MANY moisturizers for oily skin and this is the only one that truly delivers. Some other moisturizers that claimed to be oil free broke me out. Some “green tea“ moisturizers felt like overpriced aloe vera gel, felt sticky, and didn’t moisturize enough. This is PERFECT! My skin drinks it in and it is great year round. It doesn’t have spf in it which is a good thing for me because spf creams break me out. I use peter thomas roth powder spf on top of this every day.

I’m a 2 in Clinique’s skincare line but I prefer the gel moisturizer to the lotion as it doesn’t feel as heavy on my skin. I also tend to mix this with the Clinique Acne Solutions moisturizer. I can tell a difference in my skin when I’ve missed a day or two. Super super moisturizer for anybody that is on the fence. This is one cult fave everyone should try.
I like this lotion. It’s not too thick or greasy. Seems to be working great so far!
i have a really oily t-zone and this is the only product ive found that has a great balance without being too greasy - it provides a great clean finish and i highly recommend it!

Good god!this moisturizer is one of the best ever!1.) makes me cheeks soft2.) my chin was flaky b/c of the proactive I was using, and after applying it, the regions of my mouth and chin/cheek regained it’s moisture and stopped flaking.fantastic :D

This is probably one of the best moisturizers I’ve ever had. It’s fantastic for oily skin: skin feels velvety, smooth and bright. However, it does not have an SPF so you should probably wear a foundation with SPF over it, OR get it closer to the Fall.It in a way reminds me of Biore’s “Dual fuzion: SPF 30+ moisturizer“ from their “in between skin“ collection. PLUS Biore has an SPF.

If you are like me that dosen’t like to feel greasy: this is the perfect product for you. It its really cool because absorbs quickly and you feel your skin with a lot of hidratation with the cold feeling. I love it!! The problem is that I finish the product very fast but your face needs the refill! HAHA

This moisturizer makes my skin softer. It’s not heavy or thick; it’s pretty lightweight. I have very oily skin and this doesn’t make me feel more greasy. I use it everyday!! It’s the only moisturizer that seems to do the trick.
Great moisturizer. It is lightweight, moisturizing, and excellent for oily or combination skin. It doesn’t irritate my skin and I would definitely recommend it

I have t-zone oiliness and a tendency to break out with anything heavy on my skin, but this stuff feels light and absorbs quickly while still providing my skin with enough moisture for the day. Highly recommended!
this is one of the best face moisturizing lotion i have ever used, and i have pretty acne prone skin and it doesnt give me any problems

This is the only lotion I can use in the daytime during the Spring through Fall months. Period. I have a slightly oily t-zone and this lotion is lightweight and absorbs quickly. I mix it with foundation during the summer, also, to make a tinted moisturizer. Perfect. Love it. Buy it.
absorbs quickly and keeps your skin soft, very light wight.

After spending an obscene amount of money on various moisturizers, who knew that Clinique would be the answer? I have combination skin and battle breakouts. This gel has balanced my skin dramatically. I add a scoop of Philosophy Turbo C booster powder to this gel in the morning, apply, and I’m perfectly moisturized for the day. And, it creates an excellent canvas for makeup application. I’m extremely satisfied with this purchase and I am happy with the price point for this product.

I have been hooked to this moisturizing gel for 2 years. I have always neglected facial moisturizers because i am an oily girl. This totally softened my skin, made it radiant and actually keeping my oil at bay. I would recommend to girls with sensitive skin, and everyone in the summer.

I’ve been using this year round for several years. It’s the perfect light moisturizer. In the winter, my skin is usually parched, so I will use a richer moisturizer on days that my skin is particularly dry. This is perfect for combination or oily skin that needs some moisturizing, since it doesn’t leave your face shiny and quickly absorbs into your skin.

The gel is lightweight, non-greasy, absorbs very fast, and mattifying. Definitely good for controlling oily t-zone, but left my cheeks feeling dry. I just tried it and know it’s not for me because when I smile I can feel the skin on my cheeks pull tight.
review_title: Good for Oily T-Zone Not for Cheeks

review_text: just enough moisturizer - is great and lightweight under makeup. feels great on the skin and doesn’t leave it feeling greasy or oily.

Ok if you have semi greasy to normal skin this stuff is perfect for the summer months. It absorbs quickly and leaves your skin nice and smooth feeling. I just love it and if you look at the price and how much you get for the 24$ its cheaper than some wal mart brands ie olay. My husband also uses this and he has oily combo skin also. You will not want this for the winter because it isn’t enough but this is perfect perfect perfect for the summer.
review_title: PERFECT SUMMER MOISTURIZER FOR COMBO SKIN!

review_text: I have dry/combination skin and this stuff is awesome! I live in a desert climate, which doesn’t help my already dry skin, but my face can get oily with heavier lotions. The Dramatically Different lotion was really heavy for me and made me oily, so I switched to the gel and I won’t use anything else. It goes on smooth, absorbs quickly, and better yet, I don’t feel suffocated by if I start sweating, like I do with other moisturizers. Great stuff and worth the price.
I apply this at night before bed and wake up with smooth, even, supple skin! I’m in love!

It wasn’t until recently that I found out that Clinique made the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Cream in gel. I had been using their cream fo a while, and I found it excellent. The thing is that I have very oily skin, and although I hate it now and always have, I have come to terms with it; my skin will be oily for life. I didn’t know that the cream was for dry skin, and that they had the gel wich was specifically designed for oily skin, but when I found out, I put it on top of my list, so I could get it on my next visit to Sephora.Needless to say, since the cream had been wonderful, even to my oily skin, the gel surpassed its properties and it now helps me deal with my oiliness, refreshing my skin, and provinding it with the perfect moisture.I love it :)

This lotion is excellent for oily/combo skin. I have oily skin and opt for oil free moisturizers that won’t leave me feeling greasy. This is the best out of the scores of lotions I’ve tried. It leaves your face feeling soft and smooth with no residue. Hallelujah!

I have been using this for over a year now and I love it! I have acne prone skin and it does not break my skin out. It is non-irritating and very soothing on the skin. It is not greasy at all and although I could get by with a little, I usually slather it on because it feels so good. I wear Laura Mercier oil-free tinted moisturizer over this and it gives a good finish.

this may look like any other moisturizer but it is really amazing! i love it! i use some drying skin products but this can fix it all. i go to school thinking my skin might be dry but by the time im there its normal as ever, and stays that way! love it! its worth the money!
I wasn’t sure how I would like a gel compared to lotion but WOW! My face is really soft and just the right texture to apply foundation. I’ve never used a product for oily skin like it!
Absorbs quickly without any oily residue afterwards. Keeps your face moisturized throughout the day. Probably my favorite moisturizer I’ve ever used.

My skin changed when I became pregnant and my old moisturizer did not work anymore. My T-zone became very oily and I needed a product to help with that and moisturize. I am really happy with this product as my skin feels dry and smooth. It is good value for the price.
review_title: Does not leave my skin feeling oily

review_text: I really liked this product because i have oi8ly/combination skin and most products(even oil-free products) still make my skin so greasy. I like that it’s light and once you apply it your face feels really clean and not like it’s caked on with greasy lotion. It did seam to help with the t-zone oil on my face. I would highly reccomend!

favorite moisturizer, i use it every single day. oil-free is a must for me. creams tend to sit on the surface of my skin, so i completely love the gel. it’s weightless, immediately quenching, and refreshing. it creates an optimal smooth canvas for your makeup application as well. leaves you with soft, luxurious skin :)
This lotion is amazing. It is hydrating without being greasy. I use this right after the level 3 toner. It makes my skin feel smooth and comfortable.

I absolutely LOVED this moisturizer. It left my skin feeling very comfortable and balanced, never greasy. It absorbed instantly and I haven’t ever been as pleased with the way my skin felt from any other moisturizer. However, my skin is very sensitive to parabens and other preservatives and this resulted in my skin breaking out like crazy. It stopped immediately after I switched to a paraben free moisturizer. If your skin isn’t sensitive to ingredients like that and is on the oily side then you can not go wrong with this light and refreshing moisturizer, you will love the way your skin feels!
review_title: Awesome product but didn't work for me...

review_text: I am extremely picky when it comes to moisturizers. So much so that I gave up using them for a good while because they all felt heavy and greasy on my skin. I decided to give Clinique’s DDMG a try though, and it is unbelievable. First of all the gel just glides onto your skin. Immediately my skin felt cool and moisturized. In less than a minute it had absorbed completely and my skin was left smooth and soft. I never thought I would find a product that didn’t feel like it was just sitting on top of my skin clogging my pores. One pump covers your whole face, too, so the bottle will last forever. It is definitely worth the price. I encourage anyone with oily skin to try out this product.

For sooo long i have been looking for an oil, free moisturiser that does not make my skin too dry and i have found my perfect match...this gel applies perfectly and makes skin smooth without any oily or greasy look. my make up aplpies perfectly on top as well. i would recommend it to evryone who has oily skin.

I love this moisturizer! I have incredibly difficult skin...very oily, acne-prone, just finished accutane about 6 months ago, currently using a retin-a product and having bi-weekly micro-dermabrasion treatments. (What the heck??? I never had these problems as a teenager, but in my early 20’s, after 2 kids my whole complexion changed.) I have struggled for a very long time to find a facial moisturizer - even the ones my dermatologist has recommended don’t seem to help the oiliness. For a long time, I’ve used Gold Bond Healing lotion,which works great but is very heavy (not made for a face either). I had to wait at least 30 min to apply my makeup. This moisturizer is so light, leaves a nice matte finish, smells great and helps to minimize oil throughout the day. I use the three step system - face wash for oily skin and number 4 clarifying lotion/toner.
IT WAS FABULOUS!it’s perfect for people with t-zones..my cheeks were really dry while my forehead was extra oily, i love it! It’s a miracle working moisturizer.
LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER!! Its the first moisturizer that really hydrates my skin without breaking me out... Its amazing!!
review_title: BEST MOISTURIZER FOR OILY TO NORMAL SKIN

review_text: i wouldnt use any other moisturizer after trying this this was perfect ,only had to apply once and already can feel a difference i especially use it before applying any make up.

If you have dry or mostly dry skin, you should definatly purchase the MOISTURIZER, not the GEL! When I was at the Clinique counter, the lady said that the break-outs along my chin and forehead were could be because of the gel with my skin type. She was right! I stopped using the gel for the moisturizer and I have not had any problems since!
i have combo skin so my face isn’t dry most of the time, so i use just a little bit at night and it works! doesn’t make my face oily at all

I have never found a moisturizer that didn’t break my skin out or irritate it. I began using this in the monring in additino to the Clinque Acne Regiment. I use the acne moisurizer at night to take care of my problem areas but if I use it more than once a day it dries my skin out, especially around my hairline and cheeks (I have dry skin there). This moisturizer feels so light and soaks right into the skin. I’ve never used the Lotion instead of the Gel, but I’m so happy with this I’m sure I’ll stick with it. In my opinion, there’s nothing comparable. If you’ve had a hard time finding a moisurizer, PLEASE try this one out!

I rarely use moisturizers because I hate the way they make my skin feel greasy. I’ve tried so many but I’m in love with this one! It makes my skin feel naturally smooth and soft. It doesn’t feel like I’m wearing anything! It soothes on contact and doesn’t make me break out.

I have normal/dry skin and this product was not moisturizing at all. I also NEVER break out and within the first week of using, I started breaking out around my chin and on my cheeks. I would not recommend this product.

This product is so amazing. I hate using lotion as moisturizer because it feels like it makes my skin even greasier than before. This gel is so amazing. It absorbs extremely quick. It is also extremely light and totally worth the money! BUY IT!

I have extremely oily skin that breaks out with other moisturizers. Before I started using this I would just avoid using moisturizers altogether. This moisturizes without clogging my pores or causing me to break out. I use this as part of the Clinique 3 step skincare and I rarely ever break out. I would definitely recommend this product.

i use to use this product all the time, at first i loved it but i didnt think it did anything because i have extremely oily skin and nothing works. so i tried this, gave it some time (to see if it worked) but it didnt, everyone seems to love it but it really did nothing for me, its a good moisturizer but its not a good moisturizer for someone who has really oily skin like me.
review_title: not as good as its put out to be

review_text: I have always had oily skin and have always looked for a good moisturizer that felt good and wasn’t oily and didn’t leave my skin feeling sticky after a couple of hours. This moisturizer does all that. And I have been using it with the facial bar, also from Clinique, and I don’t break out nearly as much as I used to.
review_title: A moisturizer that doesn't make me "shine" !!!

review_text: I like the gel consistency of this product. After a few uses, it starting irritating my sensitive skin. I read through the reviews and I found one person who mentioned that there is alpha hydroxy acid in this product. Unfortunately, this isn’t quite right for me.
Have used since it was launched, years ago. Have loved it ever since.
A little goes a long way so you are definitely getting your moneys worth for this moisturizer. Great under makeup!
It’s very light and moisturizes well. But sometimes, there are still dry spots after I’ve put it on. But it’s my favorite till now!
took some getting used to as it is to control oily skin - but I love it!
This is a great moisturizer for the summer for anyone with dry, sensitive skin because it is very lightweight, absorbs quickly, and doesn’t leave any kind of residue.
It sinks right in and is not greasy. Leaves my skin soft with no breakouts.
amazing lotion! perfect for oily skin types. no dry spots.:]
was gift for daughter-in-law. she loves it.
THis is my favorite moisturizer. It’s never greasy and very light!

in the past moisturizers had the tendency to make my skin realy oily and greasy (including the Clinique’s dramatically different moisturizer LOTION). Not only does this allow my skin to breathe, it also effectively hydrates my skin. I’ve even got my sister using it now!

I got it as a replacement for my Moisture Surge b/c it was cheaper but it was still gel-type (not lotion). I have combination skin, with oily T-zone and dry cheek area. I use toner, moisturizing serum and aloe on top of a moisturizer every time I wash my face. This was definitely less moisturizing than moisture surge (b/c my face would feel a bit tight even after I applied this). But if I put on enough, it’s still a good moisturizer. Its texture is similar to moisture surge, so if you think you can use something less moisturizing than moisture surge, then this is the cheap way to go!
This product is great...it absorbs quickly and lighweight. This gel mosturizer feels very cooling..is the first one I use and is the last one too.

i have tendency to try new products whenever something new comes up but i keep coming back to this moisturizer! i have a bit sensitive skin and this one is by far the best moisturizer that’s lightweight and almost watery. i love the texture. it’s perfect for summer!

This is an AMAZING moisturizer for those on the “shiny face“ side.Leaves my skin smooth and fresh. During applying I notice that it is very fast absorbing and lightweight. Since it IS a gel, it kinda had this slight sticky feel to it but that rapidly vanishes as you continue to rub on your face. My 1 & ONLY con is that I found that it does not help my skin keep it’s moisture during the winter cold weather there for I need a moisturizer much creamier and rich. I give Cliniques Dramatically Different Moisturizng Gel * * * * * 5 stars ! * * * * *
I’ve tried everything out there for moisturizers, THIS IS THE BEST!!!

I’m always dealing with minor breakouts because that’s just the way my skin is, but DDMG caused the worst breakouts I’ve ever experienced in my life both times I tried to use it. After only two or three days of applying DDMG, my entire face was covered in huge, red, painful cystic bumps that still haven’t gone away two weeks after I stopped using it. The only good quality to this gel was that it didn’t leave my oily skin feeling greasy; it did, however, leave it feeling like a gravel driveway. Not everyone has the same reaction as me, but if you’re acne-prone I’d suggest you steer clear of this product.
This is the perfect moisturizer for oily skin. You can’t beat the quality and you can’t beat the price. I LOVE IT!
My husband uses this because he can’t find anything he likes better....it is okay and it works but he is not completely sold on it....He continually looks for a better product

This has been one of the best moisturizers I’ve ever used. Most others contain fragrance or oil that cause breakouts even if they are labeled for oily-free I have combinations skin and I notice that unless I moisturize I get very oily after cleansing since my skin has to compensate for me washing the oil off. This stuff sinks right in and if I need more it doesn’t feel heavy and has yet to cause me to break out.

... a moisturizer labeled for oily complexions would make my dry/combo skin feel oily? I bought a little tube of this after test-driving the lotion form and finding it too heavy. I liked the application of the gel better - it’s thin and spreads easily, you only need a little to cover your cheeks completely. However, my normally dry cheeks and chin stayed shinier and oilier than normal while using the gel, too. After giving it a good two weeks to see if things balanced out, I gave up and went back to my old standby Lancome. There is good news, though - not a breakout in sight while using this, so it had that going for it! I really wanted one of these moisturizers to work, but I think it wasn’t meant to be.
I love this moisturizer. It is lightweight and sinks into my skin quickly. It keeps my skin feeling smooth and looking healthy.
my skin is so sensitive so finding a good moisturizer is really hard, but this one doesn’t and makes my skin feel so soft.
I love Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel. I have sensitive skin, and I can use this on my face as well as around my eye area.
I love this moisterizer, I noticed improvement in my skin in about 2 wks in terms of tone and softness. For the prize you cant beat it!!

I always was warned against using DDM Lotion because it’s so oily, so when Clinique came out with a gel formula I was ecstatic. This stuff is great, and versatile as well. Works very well when mixed with foundation to give a sheer look, and makes skin soft on contact.

This is a great daily moisturizer. It sits well under make up and keeps my skin feeling fresh for hours. The smell is pleasant. I struggle with combination skin and this moisturizer quenches my dry areas without making the oily areas overproduce. My only complaint is that once the bottle gets near empty, it’s difficult to get the remaining product out with the pump centered in the middle.
i really dont get why this has such good reviews! i have pretty oily skin and this does nothing to help prevent it, nor does it mattify. this is really better for normal skin i think and thats it

This is the only facial product that doesn’t make me break out. I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizes it like nothing else. Plus it doesn’t give me a break out! I love it and it loves my skin right back!

I’ve used this product for years. I’ve tried others, but always come back to this one. You can’t go wrong with it. Not only does it moisturize, but it evens skin tone and promotes skin’s radiance also!

Have been using this for a week in conjunction with the cleanser & toner III. This is the best moisturizer I’ve encountered; it moisturizes my face without feeling greasy or like it’s clogging up my pores, I’ve noticed my face feels better all day. Granted, it does feel greasy on my fingers after I apply it, but since it’s so awesome on my face, who cares that it feels gross on my hands?
review_title: who knew gel would do so well?

review_text: LUUVVVV ITTT very very good product I watched FaffenetX3 on youtube and this was part of her skin rutine and i was looking for a moisturizer to try and thought i would buy it and it is soo FAB makes my skin very soft and keeps moisture throughout the day.

This is the only lotion I can use on my face. I have an oily and dry (combination) type skin. I use clinique oil-free foundation with the lotion. I am very particular with my lotion and LOVE this one, I would be upset if it was discontinued.
I like this gel because of my oily skin!I think it is good for oily type~
I love this! It doesn’t leave residue on your face. It’s so lightweight you forget that you have moisturizer on your face. I absolutely love this product.

I purchased this because the moisturizer I’ve used for years is no longer available - my forehead and nose are usually oily, so I decided on the gel rather than the lotion at the last minute. It does a great job moisturizing and keeps my face at the perfect balance - not too dry and not too oily. It did cause some minor breakouts, but I’m hoping this will stop as my face becomes more used to the product.

I love this product! I have been using it for about two years now. I have very acne prone skin and it never breaks me out. I use a lot of it all over my face. It feels very cool and soothing when you put it on and my face stays moisturized all day. I wear it under Laura Mercier oil free tinted moisturizer.
this moisturizing gel completely improved my skin texture, soften, and smooth. It doesn’t break me out and works good on my skin.
Excellent daily moisturizer for oily skin. Gives enough hydration without adding shine or slip under makeup

After switching from the lotion to the gel I experienced fewer under the skin breakouts. Didn’t realize I needed to change to the gel to help control my T-zone. Results were immediate. Skin looks more youthful and less dry.

I always use this stuff. It’s simply the best for oily/combination/acne prone skin. Leaves skin feeling fresh and moisturized with NO buildup, and never makes me break out. I’m constantly trying new skin care products, but this one is forever in my must-have pile.
definitely dramatically different, feels very nice to put on, not oily at all...I just wish they would make it with spf, but I guess that might make it feel oily

I never used a moisturizer until I found this product! I am really picky about the things I put on my face and always disliked lotions especially because they would always feel thick and greasy to me...and I tried a ton of different ones! I almost gave up and considered having dry skin the rest of my life until I found the gel version of Clinique’s famous lotion! I am somewhat obsessed with it and apply it at least three times a day! I have really noticed a change in my skin’s appearance...it is very smooth, hydrated, and even in tone. Thanks Clinique!
Love it....not greasy at all and leaves my face feeling perfectly moisturized....not heavy at all.
I have been using this product for 24 years now and I love the way it hydrates my face and neck. I believe its the key to looking younger than I really am.

I heard so much about this product that I decided to give it a try. I bought the one for combination skin. What a disappointment! My face was beet red and wrinkled. Fortunately, my dermatologist helped. Be careful if you are allergic to alpha hydroxy acid. The product contains it, even though it is not listed as an ingredient.
I really love this product. Moisturizes without feeling greasy. Perfect start before foundation!

This is a great moisturiizer if you have oily skin like I do....it controls shine a bit but above all it feels great on the skin....very refreshing!...it doesn’t just sit on the skin! It’s the only moisturizer I can trust for now!
