This is great! Use it with your daily face routine and replace it with your current mousterizer. It is very light and you can put it on mulpile times in the day without messing up your makeup! And it softens your skin really well!

This is the best moisturizer. I love the way it leaves my skin feeling fresh all day under my makeup. It’s NOT greasy at all and doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily. It’s at the top of my list for moisturizers!!!
I tried the lotion and the gel! and the gel is so much better! I love it!
I absolutely love this product!

Very lightweight; I didn’t think a gel would be able to provide adequate moisture, but this really does a great job. A little goes a really long way: 2 small pumps is more than enough for my entire face and neck. Highly recommended for acne-prone skin and/or oily/combination skin.
This was my first time ordering from Sephora and was delighted with the service and promptness. I shall certainly order again

I’ve had a hard time finding something for my verrrry dry, sensitive skin that doesn’t make me break out. Although it feels very light, it glides on, smooths out my rough patches and lasts pretty much all day, either under makeup or on it’s own. I even think it makes my skin on makeup-free days look a lot more “awake“ and even-toned.
review_title: Perfect combo for dry, acne-prone skin!

review_text: Nice and fluid, non greasy, but could an inch more hydrating...
I’ve been using this product for over 2 years. I needed something to soften up my dry skin. This works great! My skin glows and very moisterized!

I have been using this for a while now, I got it in a bonus gift set from a clinique purchase. I fell in love with the lotion, and then i tried the gel, and wow, it solved my oil problem. I have dry skin on the cheeks and oily skin on the T-zone, it was so bad that it completely dissolved my makeup, but thanks to this amazing gel! my problem is solved. I would highly recomended for people with sensitive skin and combination skin.

I swear by this product. It’s great for people who need moisture but are break-out prone. It leaves your skin feeling moisturized and soft with out feeling greasy. Plus a little bit goes a long way, so this will last a long time!

I am very happy with this moisurizing gel. It leaves my skin feeling softer than anything else I’ve used. It’s lightweight which seems to be good for oily skin, but on my dryer spots (and during winter), I need more of this product to do the trick. Someone below said she pumps only once, but during the winter, I pump at least twice, sometimes 3x. I still would recommend it because I love the way it leaves my skin feeling soft and not greasy.

Its lightweight, but I still felt like I had something on my face. I felt like over time it clogged my pores. I used it as part of the Level Four skincare regimen with Clinique, and I think the set was just a little too heavy for me.
this has been my go-to ever since it was introduced a couple years ago. it’s the perfect lightweight moisturizer for my oily-combo skin.

It’s a lot cheaper than some of the other lotions out there. The gel is a lot better than the lotion b/c the gel is oil-free, and I liek that. Otherwise, I don’t think that it does that much to improve my skin tone. I do have to layer it sometimes to really moisturize my dry areas though, it’s super light. I break out a lot, and this doesn’t stop the break outs or anything, but I don’t think it makes it any worse than other lotions I’ve tried.

I have spent more money than I care to think about on “high end“ moisturizing lotions. Who knew that everything that my skin needed was in this bottle without the crazy price tag. My skin didn’t break out after using this light weight gel. And, my skin felt smooth and matte. My makeup applied like a dream, and I wasn’t an oil slick by mid-afternoon. Great product!

I am so glad to have found this product. It moisturizes my skin well, without causing breakouts (which is usually my issue). It moisturizes without being oily or sticky... and it absorbs very quickly, so it can even be used just moments before applying makeup.I had tried a sample of the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion before purchasing this product, and found it to be far to heavy for my skin. I found the DDM Gel to be the ideal solution for me. I’ll be keeping this product in my skincare arsenal!
This is really great on my oily skin. The gel absorbs really quickly without making my skin feel greasy. The only downside is that I have to use quite a bit of it because it does absorb so quickly.

This is by far the best moisturizer I have used to date.Because of a strict acne regimen my skin gets really dry (and still stays oh so very oily... Dry cheeks, but breaking out everywhere... eww!). If you know what I’m talking about... You may want to consider this.I now use this every morning & night. I don’t look flaky anymore! It absorbs quickly, and after application I can start my makeup routine less than a minute later. It doesn’t feel like I’m wearing anything but it feels GOOD.As always with moisturizers, apply after you wash your face so you skin can retain the most moisture =)

I read that this was better than the lotion in terms of ingrediants (I hadn’t tried either yet) so I gave this one a shot, and i’m impressed. I had used Clinique’s moisture surge before, and although it was good, it was a little pricey. This was considerably cheaper and works just as well. I have combination skin, and this keeps my face moisturized without making my nose oily. Not to mention the bottle lasts forever... I just need one pump each time I use it. I think I’ll get this again.

I used to use the moisturizer that came with ProActiv (it’s not very good, FYI), and I ended up STILL breaking out in my t-zone. I got frustrated and realized what the problem was once I switched moisturizers. This is a must-have if you have oily or combination skin and can’t use lotion-based moisturizers. I’ve not had a problem with this since I started using it :) It’s amazing and I’d recommend it to anyone.
review_title: Best moisturizer for oily or combination skin!

review_text: I like the light feel of this moisturizer, plus it doesn’t leave my skin feeling oily afterwards. I would definately buy it again.

I love this facial moisturizer and it is the only one I will buy. It absorbs into skin quickly without leaving my face appearing greasy or feeling heavy. It also does not clog my pours or cause break outs. It is perfect as long as you do not have excessively dry skin on your face.

This moisturizer is very lightweight and absorbs easily, yet it does a great job keeping skin smooth and moisturized. Being fragrance free, it works well for sensitive skin. The lotion version did not work for me so I was pleasantly surprised by this.

I have always had problems with moisturizers leaving my face too greasy. I have oily skin and this moisturizer soaks right in and leaves you a nice smooth face with no extra grease. I would recommend it to anyone.
very lightweight, great for oily/combo skin.not greasy...and still moisturizing. love it.!

My skin is on the oily side but is also sensitive. I love this moisturizer because it absorbs quickly, is very lightweight and improves the texture of my skin! I’m in the Canadian prairies where is gets very cold and very dry and find this product better in the summer months though, as it is really light. But it is awesome!

Been using this forever, absorbs too quickly, but in a different way than HOPE IN A JAR. I seem to have to keep reapplying it, and it still doesn’t moisturize too well, maybe its just because it’s winter, and cold, who knows.!

I love this product. I used to use it all the time, but had stoped using it a couple of years ago due to short funds. Anyways I started back using it and just remembered why I love it. It is just an all around great product. I will say that this product is better to use in the summer. The dramatically different lotion mosturizer is better for the winter months. I just dont know what I would do without my lotions!!!
Smooth going on, not greasy, keeps my face soft.

I have been using the Clinic 3-Step program for over 5 years, and nothing works like it. I love the gel lotion, I get enough moisture without feeling greasy. Only downside, is the rare times I have dry skin, it doesn’t seem to get the job done...Still worth the buy in my book!

I found the Dramatically Different cream was too heavy for my combination skin, so I was very happy when they came out with the gel. It goes on so silky, absorbs quickly and leaves me skin feeling so smooth. I use it morning and night. It doesn’t have any fragrance and doesn’t cause breakouts. I love this stuff!

I used this for my combo skin. Dry cheeks, oily t-zone. Within 24 hours i noticed results. This is the best moisturizer i have used by far. I will be sticking to this for now on. My t-zone is not as oily as it was. maybe a touch on my nose in the morning, but that’s it. My cheeks feel refreshed and are no longer flaking. I highly recommend this product. It’s not thick and it’s not thin- the consistency is just right and absorbs into your skin quickly. It’s awesome. Has a light scent, nothing overpowering- just a nice fresh scent.

This is a great moisturizer for acne-prone skin...it’s lightweight, soothing & absorbs really quickly. I have combination skin and this works wonderfully; it provides enough moisture for the dry areas, and doesn’t overdo it on the oily areas. I feel like I get great moisture without having to use very much and it doesn’t feel heavy, thick or greasy at all.

I love how this moisturizer feels on my skin. I have been using lotions in other brands for a long time, and this gel stays fresh on my skin. I have oily areas on my skin, so this is a must-have for me...and anyone else with oily skin! =)
Works great on the dry and oily parts of my skin! Just enough moisture to relieve my dry cheeks, and it has never made my skin breakout.

I think this is fairly pricey, but it lasts awhile, you only need 1-2 pumps and that’s it. It’s not too heavy or greasy which is just what you need if you have oily or even combo skin. I recommend this and would buy again.

Such a great product that everyone can use! Perfect for sensitive, acne prone, combo skin like mine. I use this morning and night and have been since I was 13! I buy this again and again. It doesn’t have sunscreen but my makeup does so I am still protected and when I know I will be outside I just add a Clinique sunscreen overtop. When I am a little extra dry in places I add a dab of Moisture Surge and it works great together. What can’t be beat by any other of the (numerous) moisturizers I have tried is how lightweight but deeply moisturizing it is! It melts right into your skin and leaves it silky smooth. You won’t end up greasy midday or dry. It works great in conjunction with other Clinique prodcuts but also well with other skincare lines as well. Everyone should have this product!

I use this as a night cream and it works miracles! The lotion version of this just doesn’t compare, nor does any other moisturizer on the market. I use it only at night though because my skin soaks it up better when I’m not active (and I don’t want to waste it by using it during the day when I would just sweat or work it off).I love this gel and have repurchased again and again. One bottle probably lasts me well over 3 months with my routine so I think it is definitely worth the money.Only 4 stars though because there’s no SPF for me even if I did want to wear it during the day. And also because it’s rather thick so you look greasy after a while (also another reason why I only apply at night!)

This is another experimental product I’m trying... and I’m glad I picked it up. It definitely lives up to its description! My skin feels soft, smooth and hydrated. Simply amazing! Long lasting and very affordable (& for make-up wearers, you can put away your primer serums, this is a good enough base for application) :)
review_title: simply a m a z i n g.

review_text: This is the best moisterizer for acner prone skin and because its a gel, its non greasy and sheer. Love this stuff! And 4oz definetly lasts!
texture of moisturizer is excellent....may need to layer it a bit over drier areas during colder months. Overall, one of the best I’ve tried...

This product is a little too dry, even for my oily skin. I put it on, my skin absorbed it quickly, but then my skin felt even drier than before I applied it. I found myself using way too much to compensate of the lack of moisture.

This is a great all around product to have in your arsenal. I have the typical combo skin with the oilier T-zone and dry cheeks and this stuff works awesome on unifying all those areas. During the winter I have to apply a little more than usual to those drier spots, but otherwise a thin layer all over works just fine.

I decided to give this a try shortly after they released it a few years back...and now I refuse to use anything else. It is so refreshing when you put it on your skin and that does not disappear like some lightweight lotions can. I have oily skin in the summer and in the winter it is more combination-type and, this is the only lotion that works year round. I used to switch up moisturizers from mediocre lightweight lotion in the summer to mediocre heavier lotion in the winter but I have finally found the PERFECT lotion year round. Also, it wont make you break out if you have sensitive skin like me. LOVE IT!!!
review_title: THE best moisturizer for oily/combination skin

review_text: iv’e tried so many products before, this is the best moisturizer, very light on the skin and doesnt make you break out at all..i love this and will defintily buy this again

This moisturizing gel is great when used with the clinique facial soap and toner. It really does feel like a “drink for your face.“ I have very oily skin and was worried it would just make me break out- but it hasnt! Its great and worth the money!

I’ve been suffering from intensely dry skin this winter, and I’ve tried a few drug-store brand moisturizers in hopes I wouldn’t have to spend big bucks on something more high-end. My sister uses Clinique’s Moisture On-Line, which I have tried and liked, but I was only able to use it at night because it is heavy. I have tried multitudes of the sample sized DDM Lotion, but all it ever did was sit on top of my skin. So I decided to give DDMG a try, and I am so glad I did.I don’t know how accurate the “combination/oily/dry“ skin references are, but I’m 20, have mild occasional breakouts, and a slightly oily forehead. However, my nose, cheeks and chin have been killed by the winter air.I bought this on Saturday, and have used it morning and night after cleansing, and the name is true - I have found that it has made a very, very dramatic difference! I have no more flakes, no more dry patches, and my skin looks so healthy! I can even actually apply makeup again without looking like a desert. Simply fantastic. And a lot goes a long way, so really, I don’t think that the price is bad. One little pump covers my entire lower face, and one more covers my forehead. It does absorb quickly and I can’t even feel it on my skin. For extra care, I apply immediately after cleansing, and again about ten minutes later, especially if I’ll be outside in the cold air.Thanks, Clinique!!!

This works pretty effectively. It doesn’t make my acne-prone skin breakout. It leaves my skin super soft and soaks in quickly. However, there are some parts of my face that don’t get moisturized enough.

great for combination/oily skin types! i have sensitive skin and found the lotion to be too oily, even in the winter time. however, the gel is PERFECT. it’s very lightweight, yet it gets the job done.

I bought the travel size in a tube about a week ago and have been using it since. It’s perfect for an oily t-zone and has really reduced my blotting paper use. I use it both at night and during the day. You only need to use a very small amount to cover your face, so this tube will last a long time. I plan on purchasing the full size pump when I get close to empty. Try a sample at a Sephora store or buy the travel size ($12.50), you won’t be disappointed. But remember this is for combination/oily skin. You would probably need the DDM lotion for dry/normal skin. There is minimal if any smell for fellow migraine sufferers.
review_title: I think I found my Holy Grail of moisturizers!

review_text: This Moisturizing Gel works fantastic, even if you have slightly oily skin. For many years I used the original moisturizer, when this Gel formula came out I grabbed it up and haven’t used anything else. It doesn’t feel greasy or heavy as did the other moisturizer, I even like it in the winter when my skin is a little on the drier side.. it still works great. I don’t get break outs from it either, and I haven’t noticed a smell to it as another reviewer had. Good Product!
I love the three step system. This product doesn’t feel moisturizing at first, but you definitely feel it later. Skin feels smooth and supple but not greasy or clogged. Very light but it works.
do not like the smell at all but it does the job so whos complaining.
great moisture for everyday use, in winter you can try the lotion

For years I received samples of the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion in gifts with purchase when buying Clinique products. After the first time using it and discovering that it was too oily for my skin, they gradually piled up in my drawer. I gave up on Clinique for my moisturizing needs until the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel came on the market. Now I use it daily morning and night. I only wish that there was a version with SPF, but overall I am very happy with the product.Use: I use about a nickel-sized amount for the whole face.Texture: It is light, smooth, and absorbs very quickly.Feel: Afterwards, my face feels moisturized but not oily.

this moisturizer is awesome. it has a lot so it will last a longg time. the price is pretty cheap since buying an oz of some other moisturizer is usually 35 dollars and this bottle has about 4 oz. it says no fragrance, but it has a nice veryy light smell to it. ive tried the regular clinique moisturizer. that one does moisturize a lot, but leaves a greasy feeling behind, but this one doesnt at all. this gel moisturizer leaves a natural moisturize to the skin. also facialists recommend using a gel moisturizer rather than one with oil in it unless you have superr dry skin like dry flakes everywhere. but i still think you should have one of these. highly recommend it. =)

This gel moisturizer is great at night-time for my oily skin. It’s lightweight and absorbs quickly and leaves my skin incredibly soft with absolutely no greasy feeling. I only use this at night and not in the morning because the only downfall is that it has no oil-control benefits. I doubt it would moisturize enough for someone with dry skin, but it’s perfect for oily or combination-oily skin. It also has no fragrance, which is good if you have sensitive skin.
I liked the lotion DDM but iit was heavy and kind of greasy so I tried the gel and loved it! It absorbs quickly and its a great lightweight moisturizer.

This is the best lotion of all time. Clean and pure, no fragrance, no greasy feeling, absorbs quickly and effectively.Its bare bones ie. no sunscreen, no vitamins, no fluff. Its simply the best lotion. Perfect lotion for any makeup routine.

My skin goes from being combination to oily based on seasonal changes. I have tried countless moisturizing lotions and creams on my face and they would end up clogging my pores badly. This is one product that does not clog my pores, is totally lighweight, and works excellent under makeup. I have it in the 4.2 ounce size as I don’t ever want to be without it.
this is the 3 rd time I buy it. Will continue to buy it~ decent price, and decent quality

I tried the regular moisture lotion and found it to be a little too much for my face. I tried the moisturizing gel and love it. My face isn’t greasy and it feels very soft. I’m glad I gave up Philosophy Hope in a Jar because it only temporarily worked and than caused breakouts.
Work well for me, will buy it again.
A great product. Non greasy. Will leave your face soft and dry free.

I liked the idea of getting a moisturizing gel for my oily/combination skin and I need an oil-free formula, so I hoped this Clinique product would work for me. It has worked, for the most part. The skin around my mouth gets particularly dry in the winter, so I need a thicker moisturizer for that area. I still use it on the rest of my face morning and night and it works great. In the summer, I think this moisturizer would be perfect. I’m also happy that it’s a large bottle for the price, especially when you compare it to other high-quality brands who charge $40 for an ounce or so of lotion. I don’t wear a lot of makeup, but I can imagine it would go on pretty smoothly over it because it leaves my face really soft.
I have very sensitive skin and this is really great especially if you suffer from rosacea.

I have combination to oily skin and this is the best moisturizer I have found. It feels very lightweight, hydrates my skin for the whole day, and what I love the best is how I do not look shiny/greasy at all during the day while wearing this product. I would reccomdend this product to everyone I know, and it turns out that all my friends use Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel already!

i have dry combo skin and i was using the 3 step system i got in a set with mild soap, clarifying lotion 2 and the lotion version of this moisturizer. that caused me too break out in my t-zone so i had to swap the lotion for this oil-free gel. this was definitely the right choice. my skin hardly breaks out any more, the only thing with it is that since its designed for oiler skin that mine i find it leaves a little to be desired as far as moisture goes. so i use the moisture surge on the dry areas (the one in the pink jar) and that seems to be a good combo.

i love.love.looove this product. i used to use OLAY as my moisturizer and thought that it was the best moisturizer ever... until... i got this one. and honestly it is the BEST moisturizer there is. i highly recommend it especially if you have oily/combination skin... like i do =)

My skin is a little oily yet I get dry flaky patches. I am supposedly a skin type II, but the DDML made me breakout and clogged my pores. I still use the type II formulations for steps 1 and 2, but I use the Moisturizing gel instead of the lotion. I love it! It moisturizes perfectly , has a refreshing texture and does not make me breakout! It’s Awesome!!!!

I accidentally bought this instead of the lotion formula and was pleasantly surprised. It moisturized and left a matte finish. This is a great summer time moisturizer. My husband likes that it works then “disappears“.

I loved the original DDMC but could not use it due to my oily acne prone skin. I have been using this for over a year and I love it. This gel moisturizes and does not make me breakout. I use it twice daily and reccomend it highly.
I love this moisturizer! It works really well for my skin and leaves it feeling smooth and hydrated! It’s also a really great value for the price.

this works great on my normal to combo skin. i had tried the lotion version and didn’t like it. glad i tried this though! it moisturizes what needs to be moisturizes, and works almost as a mattifier for the t zone.
I use this product everyday. great to apply before make-up its non-greasy, moisturizing my dry areas and refreshing oilier ones!
perfect for oily but dry skin.
another bottle of this.well, I don’t think I have to say much about it

I love the way this gel feels and it works great also. My face feels smooth and my makeup goes on nicely after, as well. Not too heavy to apply makeup but plenty of moisture to keep face hydrated after applying foundation.

I have very oily skin, and was never able to find a moistuizer that didn’t make my skin feel slick and gross. I had read good things about the traditional Clinque moisturizer, and tried this based on that. It’s great, absorbs quickly, leaves my skin feelling good and soft. Excellent product all around. Won’t use anything else.
I have been using this product for about two weeks. My skin is just as oily as ever. The texture of my skin is better though.

I used to use the DDM cream but would experience occasional breakouts as my skin tends to be oily in the t-zone. Then the gel came out and it’s been my twice daily staple ever since. It feels very light but definitely makes my skin soft. I use it morning and night on my face and neck. Perfection!

I love this. I have really oily skin and this really helps control the oil production on my skin. it feels so nice too. it is really soft... if that makes sense. my face is never tight after using this either. try it.... i did and I loved it.... also.... you get almost 5 oz. for around 23 bucks! good price too
wasn’t moisturizing enough

I recently bought the three step kit type 4 by clinique to get rid of my minor acne and to clear up dark spots. I have to say that my skin is softer, but the gel doesn’t seem to moisturize enough for me unless I put a lot on. I have oily skin, so I guess I’m used to my skin being too moisturized. It doesn’t leave my skin oily in the morning, so I will continue to use it.
the best moisture ever! for fall and winter you may want to use this one first then use something else since this is the gel
Compared with the moisturizing lotion, this gel never brings me break outs. And it is cheap, so after a mask, i use a lot of it to keep my skin moisturized.

I’ve use this moisturizer for a couple of years. Although it doesn’t work on anti-wrinkle or anti-oxidant or any other functions, it is a good moisturizer. No stickness, no oil-like feeling, no fragments, never ever allergy nor breakout, feels just like the natural healthy oil produced by human skin, or maybe better! I am always worried about breaking out whenever I use a new product. But the first time I used it, I know it wouldn’t and it doesn’t in fact. It keeps my combination oil skin moist though all year except for the really dry winter.

I have used this product for years - it is great if you suffer from sensitive skin - this does not promote any breakouts, but give the moisture my skin needs. I do recommend it for anyone with sensitive skin issues.
I’ve never been much of a believer in the 3-steps by clinique but after trying it out for the last month i’m hooked.. this lotion is fantastic... goes on smooth and makes my skin feel soft all day

I’ve been using this product ever since it came out. The “Gel“ is much better for me that the regular cream. I have normal skin but I love the feel of an oil-free lotion. My husband also uses this stuff. Definitely a must for daytime and also is a good nighttime mosturizer.
Love Love Love!!!!!!

I have been searching forever for a moisturizer that hydrates and prevents shine. I have oily skin, so every time I’d try a new face moisturizer, it would either look greasy or not moisturize enough. This feels so smooth and clean, and actually makes my skin look better! It’s the best I have tried.

I’m currently using this product only at night due to it’s lack of SPF. I find that my skin reacts better to the gel vs. the lotion. It really is moisturizing and glides on smoothly and quickly. If it had SPF for daytime use, I’d be more satisfied.
I don’t believe I can live without this. It’s that amazing. It makes my skin so smooth and I use it as a base because it allows my make up to go on easier.
Loved this for my combo skin, didn’t make me breakout.
love this product, especially for the summer. provides excellent hydration without feeling heavy or greasy. strongly recommended for oily skin.

This lotion is wonderful...I’ve tried so many different lotions. If your skin tends to be oily I think you should give this product a try. I noticed a difference in the first couple days of using it that by the afternoon I wasn’t shiny all over like usual. It;s maintained it’s results also.

I lost my first bottle because of the complete mess that I am and ordered one immediately. I think this product is a staple for my skin. I use it with the 3 step program and I have seen results.Make sure that this is for your skin type. I used to steer away from Clinique all the time because my mom gave me the lotion instead of the gel. I’d break out every time!

I couldn’t leave the house without applying this. I never could use the DDML, because it always broke my face out and felt VERY heavy. But the gel is a totally different story. It’s very lightweight and helps makeup smooth on easily.

Like many, I have skin that can be dry in some areas of my face but oily and acne prone in other areas. I just bought this gel a few days ago and already I love it! I replaced my Neutragena Oil Free moisturizer with this product, and immediately I noticed that my T zone did not get an oily residue by midday as it had before. And yet my skin feels quite smooth...quite impressive! It is pricey I must admit, but I’ve never found anything like it before among “pharmacy“ brands.

The price scared me a little at first which is why it took me so long to muster up enough nerve to buy it. I have oily skin but, in the winter it gets super dry and flakey. This will be the second winter I am using this product and it works wonders! I haven’t had any dry skin on my face yet and am obviously loving it! It works great in the summer too b/c it isn’t heavy at all. I never felt like I was wearing a moisturizer. It was definitely money well spent!

This gel formula is so perfect for people with oilier skin, or in warmer climates/weather. I always thought the original lotion was too greasy-feeling. Try this one unless you’re really dry. It makes a huge diffence!

This is the only face moisturizer I have used that does not make my skin oily or greasy after using. A little bit goes along way and the bottle last for me at least three to four months. If you have sensitive skin or combination skin this is a really good face lotion to use.

ive used this for 4 years now and still love it. i have oily skin and this really helps balance it out. it’s very light so it’s perfect for summer or warmer climates but in wintertime i’ll use something more moisturizing

I adore this moisturizer. The gel formula make it especially great for summer since I have oily skin. It also does a great job of keeping my skin from feeling tight during the winter. I usually mix it with a little of Clinique’s Super City Block in SPF 40 since it doesn’t have an SPF in it. Highly recommended for those with oily skin.
Thisis very lightweight but moisturizes alot
I love this stuff. It’s perfect for oiler skin but still helps with dry patches especially during the winter and brings a healthy glow!
It feels so good on my skin. I actually wash my face more often so I can use it. That’s OK right?
i love this mouisturizer so much!!! i love the way i leaves my skin, my skin is very oily and this gel keeps it under control!!!

This product moisturized my face yet didn’t leave it greasy, and it didn’t make my T-zone break out. It’s great to use all year round, especially on colder days, and it made my face feel a little smoother and not as tight.

I have really oily skin and the gel is perfect to use before or after makeup application! Normally I don’t use moisturizer but it is perfect for the winter months when everything chaps up a little. It even feels really nice on your hands!
This product goes on very smoothly.I havw aabsolutely NO complaints. Not only does it moisturize well, but it gives you a great glow

This is the best lotion for my sensitive combination skin. My T-zone is oily and my cheeks are dry. This lotion keeps everything balanced. The only thing that would make me love this more is if it had SPF in it.
I love this moisturizer, its provides just the right amount of moisture and is light enough for my oily skin. It feels very light and clean too.

My sister swears by this stuff. Just make sure that you’re using the gel if you’ve got oily/combination skin, and the lotion if you don’t. Otherwise, you may break out! Then again, this happens with any skin product- you have to make sure you know your skin type. This gel does smooth your skin and keep it hydrated.
review_title: Great product when using the right one!

review_text: I have never found a good moisturizer the ones for acne prone skin leave me feeling taught and flaky but the one used for dry skin always left my skin oily and would further break me out but this moisturizer leaves my skin soft with out being overly-hydrated.

I typically do not use moisturizer becuase my skin breaks out so easily. But this product doesnt clog my pores, and I can actually feel this difference from using it. My skin is so soft and smooth. Even though I still have some blemishes, I have definitely noticed a DRAMATIC difference in the quality of my skin since I began using this.

This gel makes my skin really soft all day and its no too thick to make my skin greasy. its lightweight and makes my skin fresh. its also a pretty good price compared to other moisturizers in sephora.
review_title: really light, keeps my face fresh all day

review_text: I use the gel during the spring, summer and fall. but come winter i switch over to the dramatically different lotion. the gel is lighter and is all i need for the non-wintery months. both of the moisturizers are great though. they are both relatively lightweight and soak into your skin quickly. it’s just that the gel is a little bit lighter than the lotion.

My oily skin still always needs a moisturizer because it will dry out at times, but every moisturizer I have tried has just made my complexion worse. Finally, I bought this as part of the 3 step program, and cannot leave the house without remembering to dab some of it on! It is amazing, lightweight, non-greasy, does not clog my pores, and makes my skin look great! I love it! I also love that there is a cover so the pump is not constantly exposed.

the only moisturizer that i can totally trust my skin. my skin is sort of sensitive and gets break outs every now and then. but this gel gives me the moisture that i need with no irritations at all. in the winter, i use moisture surge after this gel to lock in extra moisture, and it works wonderfully.

Oh my gosh ladies this is a must have!!! If your anything like my skin, then you have sensetive skin where almost everything else that you’ve tried in the past has just irratted your skin or may even caused a break out! But with this Cliniquue product i have finally found something that works! Not only does it work but it makes your skin feel so smooth and kind of like a cool mint refreshed feel after application, and that feeling last even after it drys on your skin! I like to use this product at least twice a day. When i wake up after i wash my face i apply this, and at night i do that same process and when i wake up my skin is still as soft as if i just applied this product. I some times get dry spots on my face with the changing of the seasons and this helps and has even gotten ride of my dry red spots!!! I am a huge fan if you haven’t noticed already ;) so needless to say i give this 2 thumbs up!

I have fairly normal skin, but in colder weather it gets a tad dry on the cheeks, this gel moisturizer is fragrance-free, silky and hydrating. I don’t have oily skin, which is what it’s recommended for, but I love how quickly it absorbs into my face, so I can get on with my makeup routine I need a smidge more moisture on the cheeks these days, though.

This is really light-weight. I used it along with the 3-step skincare line. After the soap and toner dried out my skin, this moisturizer didn’t really do much to help it. I mean it’s not a bad moisturizer, but I have found better ones for a lower price.

The moisturizing gel goes on very matte and dries quickly. Works very well under makeup. The only con I could find for this product is that I wished it provided more moisture. However, its adequate. Whenever I need extra moisture I put a cream on at night before bed.

Back when i was a swimmer, my skin would get damaged from constant contact with chlorine and this saved my dry damaged skin!I tell my little cousin to use it as she is now a swimmer with the same problems as me.She loves it.

This product is an absolute must-have for me! I am an adult with oily skin and most lotions and creams only end up clogging my pores. Also, I wear makeup almost on an everyday basis, so I love that this profduct is totaly compatible with makeup. And, I also feel that this moisturizer actually keeps my face more matte-looking than without.This product is absorbed into the skin quickly, it feels weightless on the face, and it never clogs my pores. And, it can be used around the eyea area as well.
This is great for my combo skin which is more oily in the summer. Doesn’t make me break out and feels silky going on.

I use this as part of the three step regimen. It’s not my favorite thing. I guess it does the job, but it’s not a moisturizer that you can count on for preventing wrinkles. The positives- it absorbs quickly, it’s not messy, goof for on the go. Overall a good product, but if you’re looking for prolonged moisture probably not a good idea!
I’ve been using this for years as it doesn’t make my already-oily skin break out.... I still need a little moisture replenishment after showering and this works well without overdoing it.
I have used this product for years. it is perfect for my face - moisturizes but not oily

This is one of my favorite moisturizers. My skin gets very dry but is also prone to breakouts and this moisturizer is perfect for me! It makes my skin feel smooth and isn’t oily at all. I really like the thickness of the gel formula.
better than the lotion but still not a favorite
This is a nice no-frills moisturizer just like the Dramatically Different Moisturizer, but the gel left my face feeling sticky for awhile. I will stick with the original.
review_title: Nice moisture, but leaves a sticky residue

review_text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. It is perfect for my oily skin. It’s very light, yet effective, doesn’t make me break out, and soaks in quickly and completely. Perfect under makeup.

I love using this before bed underneath my Bare Escnetuals Rare Minerals night treatment. It gives just the right amount of moisture and never feels heavy or greasy. It is also great underneath an SPF cream that isn’t moisturizing enough.
This moisturizer works great, I mostly use it in the winter months when my skin on my face decides to become dry. Not oily, just perfect. works great under makeup as well.

This is the product I’d really recommend as the best moisturizer! I’ve been using it for long now and I’ve also tried something like it that I bought from the drug store and it wasn’t anything like this! Ever since I started using Clinique my skin has been so much better.

This moisturizer really sinks into my skin and makes it feel fresh and healthy. Moisturizer sometimes causes my skin to feel greasy or dirty, but this moisturizing gel gives me a fresh feeling and keeps me moisturized the entire day. When I started to use it, I noticed that my skin become soft and smooth.

My skin usually breaks out once in a while and is dry and oily. This gel formula is much better suited for my skin than the original and is completely non-greasy. Maybe they’ll come out with a SPF version soon!
Moisturizing without being greasy. I have oily skin that gets dry in patches, and this moisturizer keeps my balanced.

I love this stuff! I was looking for an everyday moisturizer that had absolutely no oil since my face tends to get super greasy if there’s even a hint of it! I love using it with a spray toner so it absorbs even more, but it’s great by itself too. I only wish they made a version with SPF!

I somehow keep coming back to this moisturizer...I can’t help it! I love how quickly it absorbs into my skin, and how soft my face feels after it dries! I also love the super subtle scent it has (I don’t believe it has any added perfumes, but it still smells pleasant). I just wish they would add SPF to this!I have combination skin, with dry patches and an oily t-zone, and this stuff works the best of any lotion/gel I’ve tried to date!

I love this moisturizer! It it oil-free and goes on so smooth. Great base for makeup. Makeup never goes on streaky or cakey since moisturizer is oil-free. If you like this you MUST try the moisture surge face products which are also oil free gels. I even like them more than this.
LOVE this product. I have extremely oily skin and this is so light weight. I took off a star only for the fact that it does not contain spf.

I really like using this moisturizer right now. I recently started Retin-A and it leaves my face flaky and dry/irritated but this soothes it and moisturizes without all the oil. No breakouts, silky feeling and excellent price! I just wish it had loads of anitoxidants, otherwise it is a winner.
Only moisturizer I’ve ever used that doesn’t feel too gross and heavy. Sometimes it left residue on my fingers but other than that, A+ for sure.

This is nothing short of a miracle product. I love everything about it. I prefer the gel over the lotion version because of how quickly it is absorbed. No more greasy feeling. It even seems to help my foundation go on smoother. It isn’t scented too strongly either so my boyfriend even uses it on occasion.
Lightweight, cool, fresh, great for everyday use. I wouldn’t say it’s AMAZING, but it does get the job done and maintains my skin. And it recieves 5 stars for the price too!
lightweight moisture that is ideal for summer. the oil free formula is great for break-out prone or combination skin
To me this is a perfect moisturizing GEL. I have troubles with oily skin and this is not greasy at all. I won’t use anything else!
Finally my skin is balanced. I will never use anything else again. It isn’t greasy like so many moisturizers out there. You can’t even feel it on. I love it.
This is one of the best moisturizers I have ever used. Gentle and great for combination skin.

I’ve used the Dramatically Different Moisturizer for years. The classic “yellow stuff“ is light, soothing and couldn’t be improved upon, until now. The gel is just as good but seems to have a slightly lighter texture and scent. It also seems that a little goes a lot longer way too....the large bottle seems to last forever! Worth every penny!

I have oily T-zone, normal cheeks in the summer and dry cheeks in the winter.It works very well with oily T-zone and normal cheeks. It absorbs quickly, lightweight and is not greasy. The smell is chemical but very faint, unlike Hope in a Jar. And no adverse reaction when applied.During the winter when I have oily T-zone and dry cheeks, this is not enough, even if I apply twice, the cheeks are still dry. I suggest the lotion version if you have dry cheeks but oily T-zone.
review_title: For combinational skin on the slightly oily side.

review_text: I like the light-weight feel but it’s not a miracle product. I like it much more than the lotion though because the lotion was too greasy for my oily skin.
I love this product! It goes on very smooth and gives you wonderful moisture, leaving your skin feeling great.
I have normal to oily skin and i love this moisturizer. It’s one of the few that come in a gel rather than lotiona dn it’s perfect for year round use. My only complaint - wish it had SPF!!!

I love love this moisturizer. I use it at night and its light and less greasy than the cream so its good for my slightly oily skin. The only downside is that it doesn’t have SPF which is why I use it at night and use a different one for day.

I love love love this moisturizer! I always feel like I am taking GREAT care of my skin. It’s not expensive and the bottle lasts forever and I always feel elegant when I use it. I’m thrilled they made it in a “gel“ formula for us “oily“ girls!
this is the best thing that has happened to my oily skin. I loved the lotion but it was breaking me out. this gel is comforting but light, and oil free. what more could you ask for?

This is the only moisturizer I can use on my skin. Anything else makes be breakout. It’s very gentle and effective and it absorbs very quickly. If Clinique could add an SPF to it that would not cause me to get blemishes, I would be in heaven!

I bought this a few months ago for my skin which oscillates during the month from very oily to oily-combination skin. This product is great for the days when my skin is very oily, but for the days when it is more combination, it does not provide enough moisture for my dry spots (around my mouth and on my cheeks). Otherwise, I have never had a breakout using this product, and really like it for my oily days.
review_title: Good for oily to very oily skin as advertized

review_text: I find the gel better than the lotion cos it’s not so greasy but somehome I don’t really like this. Bought it once and I don’t think I’ll buy it again.

I liked the dramatically different moisturizer until they came out with the gel. I love the gel so much more! I have oily skin and this was light and didn’t make the oil and shine worse unlike so many other moisturizers I have tried. It’s a little pricey but SO worth it.

I absolutely love this product and use it every day before putting on my makeup. I used to use the Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion, which is great as well. However, I find that the gel works better for me as it leaves my skin with more of a matte finish. Especially in the summer time when you can get a “shine“ to your face, I find that it is better to use a light gel like this one rather than a creamier moisturizer.
I love this moisturizer. It’s effective, but light and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy. It works perfectly under your make-up.
What a great moisturizer. Perfect for people with oily skin. Provides moisture without feeling heavy. One of my favorite skincare products.

I’ve never used moisturizer in the past, because I have very oily skin and just didn’t see the point. When I learned that even oily skin needs some kind of moisturizer I tried many different kinds and was always disappointed with them. Then I tried a sample of this and fell in love with it! I use it at night (I use something with SPF during the day, but I look forward to washing that off each night and putting this on!) and it evens out my skin, seems to control oil somewhat and leaves my skin feeling so soft and not at all greasy. I won’t use anything else, because nothing else is this good. It would be nice if it had SPF in it, but that would probably make it greasy and not as effective. This is the best product and totally worth every penny!
review_title: The only moisturizer I will use!

review_text: I cannot get enough of this moisturizer. I can’t believe how fast it absorbs into my skin. I am a little oily in the T-zone and this moisturizer doesn’t at all add to the shiny-ness. I love how my face looks when I use this;and, I wish they would put an SPF into this product. This is one of my favorite Clinque items.

I’ve used the 3 step products for around 8 years or a little more. So that itself should tell you something. I have oily/acne prone skin and using the 3 step is the best for me. I tried alot of things and turned out to be allergic and this saved me. Very light. Love the gel formula great for oily skin!!!!!
Basic, simple and efficient! This moisturizing gel is very lightweight for combination skin and it has improved and evened out my complexion. My skin is clear and soft everyday! I’m loving it!

this gel is amazing! i use it in the morning under my makeup and i also use it as a night cream. i wake up to extremely soft skin and my complexion is also evened out, i think it has improved my skin a lot. i wil definately keep on purchasing it
review_title: The best for my oily skin!

review_text: I like how comfortable this moisturizer is; however, I can only use it at night during the summer time as it does nothing for my oily skin. It is rather disappointing that it is marketed towards those with really oily skin (hence the gel formula) and yet no oil controlling ingredient. A mattifying ingredient would be nice!

Perfect for oily/acne-prone skin. It mattifies my skin, especially around my forehead & nose, which is a big plus. It never irritates my skin either, and I don’t have to use a lot of product to moisturize my whole face. The only problem I’ve had is that it takes a little time to absorb; otherwise, its amazing.
these are so handy to have on me, they where a little smaller than expected but they are perfect to throw into my bag when I’m going anywhere!
Bought 5 packs and all were dried up,no product,They will not clean anything.

These wipes are amazing. For some reason I can’t find them in stores and they don’t seem to be available online either. I really hope Sephora hasn’t discontinued them because they are the only makeup wipes I use￼
I bought these Sephora wipes to use when I run out of my Sephora pads, for cleaser & toner. These are by far the WORST wipes I’ve used. They dried out my skin & did not remove makeup well.

Did what I wanted it to do and better than my o/s by Patrick starr. Just a personal opinion so if anyone is offended buy whatever brand you want. I found these better than others I’ve used and will purchase again. Especially since it didn’t dry my ski. Out?
Amazing wipes would absolutely recommend. They are very refreshing on the face and the smell is delightful & very light witch i really like. For the price aswell you can’t go wrong :)
review_title: if you dont buy these you're really missing out.

review_text: I’m constantly ordering the Sephora Cleansing and Exfoliating Wipes. I think these are really great wipes, not too thin and not too dry. I use all the formulars that are hydrating, moisturizing, and exfoliating, and I really love them all.
review_title: I keep these on my nightstand!

review_text: Love love love and live for these wipes. Favourite wipes with all time favourite flavour coconut. If you want to buy just go for it . I just love them.
It’s a must.  I don’t know how I went without this for years.
Not for the slightest of sensitive skin people. Very fragrant and irritated skin.

I got the Hemp wipes and while they honestly work great at removing my makeup and whatever, but the perfume was burning my skin. They did remove my lash glue so that was impressive. After use I’d have to wash my face really good after use due to how oily and slimey my skin felt afterwards.
The packaging and the wipes were half the size they were last time I bought them.  I will not be buying they again.  The wipe isn’t big enough to wipe the makeup off my face.

These are just ok in a pinch. They aren’t as wet as I’d like (maybe mine were just old? Idk) so it takes more than one to really feel like I’m doing much of anything, and they definitely don’t remove mascara. I will use them up just to refresh my face in the mornings before my skincare routine, but for makeup removal they aren’t great. I wouldn’t repurchase.

Awful!  They use to be good, the last time I purchased them I threw them away thinking they were expired.  I just purchased them again today and found out through the internet that the formula has changed.  They are super stinky and make me gag.  Please go back to the old formula.  I will be returning the ones I purchased today.
I can’t stand the smell or feel of these. Has an old smelling fragrance and the leftover residue is very slick and gross feeling.
These are super rough on sensitive skin. Felt like I was cleaning my face with sandpaper. Not cool. I trashed them.
I really like this wipe.  The aloe vera is so gentle.  I have no issues with this formula.  There is no redness or breakouts when using it.  My makeup comes off easily.
The coconut one has a very weird smell to it. It leaves you feeling very sticky you need to wash your face after.
These are a little heavy for me. The scent is overpowering and they sting my skin a little bit still clean well.

I thought these would work well and smell good too but, I was wrong. It took 3 wipes just to get off my make up (which was just mascara and eyeliner). They had a smell that wasn’t terrible but definitely not what I was expecting.
This is SO extremely tiny that a pen is longer than the package itself. I bought this online, so didn’t know it was so small until it arrived. Will not be purchasing again

I bought the rose wipes to use when I’m out of town so I don’t have to pack my face wash and face cloths. The package says there is “No need to rinse.” 10 minutes later I’m still wondering if this sticky feeling is going to go away on its own. I’m thinking the no rinse claim is not true. It’s hard to feel like it did the job of cleaning my face when it’s still sticky. Next time I will try rinsing the cloth out to use as a regular face cloth at the end.The fragrance is alright. I would prefer no fragrance but I wanted the hydrating wipes.
Barely removes makeup, and dries out super fast. It made my skin feel weird after using.
Super produit laisse une peau  bien exfolier parfait pour nettoyer quand on est en sortie se range très bien dans un sac
Love love love these wipes. So refreshing and cleansing that you want to use them head to toe!
Literally horrible. Dried out my skin and left a weird, sticky film. Also didn’t remove any makeup, literally just rearranged it? Especially eye makeup. Smell was decent though!
Didn’t like these at all. Could have gotten about the same result with plain water.
Blehck. I hated these so bad. They smelled horrible...and they really dried out my face. I LOVE the coconut water ones, but the aloe vera ones were awful. I 100% do NOT recommend.

Please don’t change the formula on these!!! These are the best exfoliating wipes I’ve used. I’ve been using for years. And they’ve been hard to get these days, as they are constantly out of stock. Sephora has changed their exfoliating wipes on the charcoal and grapefruit ones already. I hope these leaves these ones alone. I understand them wanting to make them ‘CLEAN’ approved…buy why change the texture of the wipes?!! I really hope Sephora reads their reviews because everyone agrees that the previous texture with the exfoliating dots are better than the new woven textured clothes. Anyhow, they recently restocked aOn the 19th and I managed to scoop 5 packs. I will be using sparely by cutting them on halves.
review_title: Shepora please don’t change these wipes!!!!

review_text: I’m a lazy person so I don’t like makeup remover, this one is perfect for me, and it removes makeup very cleanly, I like to use this one piece and then use some face wash, very clean, hope it will never be discontinued
Very very very very very very drying. Do not buy this product at all.

These are miniature ones not full size. They smell really good and work just as good as the full size ones. Also im pretty sure they have good ingredience that are good for your skin. Not harsh feeling. I love them :)

I use this all the time, especially as the makeup person for a local dance academy. They are great with dual sides, one as a wipe the other as an exfoliate. This purchase was for my great niece who has just started using makeup. I included them in her “Welcome to Sephora” gift box which was packed full (14lbs) of Sephora samples .

These makeup wipes are sooo bomb! I love the ingredients, the style, I think its sooo cute for makeup wipes and it feels refreshing! I always want to keep it in my purse! Hope they never discontinue and come more back in stock so I can stock up!
review_title: I NEEEED MOREEEE!! bomb makeup wipes

review_text: These are ok, a little rough on the skin, though. I don’t wear a lot of make up, so I don’t know how good they would be for that, but they do the trick fine. I’d probably not use them every day, though.

I got the coconut water scented minis. The scent is wonderful, not too strong and not the “fake“ coconut smell. They are definitely cleansing, not exfoliating. I would use this to remove makeup. Feels great on my skin, very refreshing. Note that the mini size is VERY small, the shape of a deck of cards but not as thick. However, at the time I purchased, the minis were a (very slightly) better price per wipe ($0.30 per wipe vs $0.32 for the large size). I would consider buying these again, they were great to add to my cart in order to get free shipping.
review_title: Refreshing mini coconut water cleansing wipes

review_text: Too rough of a texture for my sensitive skin.   Fine for convenience but I would rather exfoliate properly with a separate product.

They do the job well enough but isn’t ideal for makeup like mascara, eyelash glue, eyeliner…burns my eye a bit to be honest. It’s cute and compact though, and nice if you’re not doing any of the aforementioned eye makeup.
These wipes were slightly irritating to my sensitive skin but they took makeup of super-easy the watermelon scent smells like candy.
Smells like mens cologne on your face and it’s dried out
The wipes are rough on my face :( it feels like paper against your skin, though it smells really nice and fresh.

I have been using these wipes for YEARS and I am out of my supply & every time I try to order now they are out of stock and have been for a long time. Other ones cause break outs I need these!!! Please bring them back!

The new “exfoliating” aspect of the wipes now suck.  Instead of exfoliating (which the OLD ones did brilliantly), these new ones are softer than an actual washcloth. The old ones did a fantastic job and I am sad and annoyed they have changed and have no reason to buy them anymore.

I actually laughed at the size of these wipes when I received them because I was expecting something much bigger (just in a smaller quantity).  Completely my fault though because it clearly says “mini“ on the website.BUT, in spite of the size, these (at least the grey pack that says “Detoxifying“) are surprisingly good!  They have a very light scent, which shouldn’t be offensive to most people, remove makeup just as well as any other wipe, don’t dry out the skin, and where these really won me over was their exfoliating side... These are not kidding around!  They will exfoliate, massage, and bring back the circulation to your face AND neck! LOL  And yet, I felt no irritation or sensitivity of any kind after using them...  I know we are all different when it comes to these things but I really loved these qualities and will definitely order a few more when they come back in stock.  So I went from completely dismissing them in my mind when they arrived to now being in love with them... :)By the way, these wipes are manufactured in France, as you can see in the pictures included...
Easy to use. Very hydrating. When I go on trips this is what i used to wash off mascara and face oils

WHY DID SEPHORA CHANGE THEM?! They are DRY!! I have used the rose ultra moisturizing for YEARS and ALWAYS stay stocked up on them. I just restocked and when I went to wipe my face it was like wiping a dry thick cloth on my face! There is BARELY any moisture in the wipe! I thought I got a “bad” pack but then opened the second one and the same! Now that I have read the other reviews I see it is not my imagination. WHY change something everyone loves?? Now I have to find a new wipe after loving these for years! UNTIL THEY CHANGE THEM BACK…SAVE YOUR MONEY OR YOU MIGHT AS WELL RUB A DRY CLOTH ACROSS YOUR FACE! So disappointed in Sephora when these WERE the best :(
review_title: WHY DID SEPHORA CHANGE THEM!! CHANGE THEM BACK PL

review_text: Bearded Men these work great when you want to wash your face without getting suds all up in your beard ! Grapefruit is my personal fav but I have only tried that and watermelon. They really do leave your face feeling fresh and clean .I just threw a pack in the basket one day while buying cologne and Now they are a staple product that I can’t live without.  No more dry beard from my face wash. If you want a tough exfoliating wipe go Grapefruit if you want a smooth fresh pleasant smelling wipe go watermelon. I imagine the exfoliating side would help with make-up. Only certain ones have the exfoliating side so look closely at the packaging.5 stars all day great product
Best wipes I ever used. I couldn’t order them in England so every time I came to visit my family in Canada, I would stock up to take to England. I have sensitive skin and this works magic.

I was disappointed when I recently ordered a few packages of the grapefruit exfoliating cloths.     I originally ordered the a couple of months ago and I LOVED them - great citrus scent and great exfoliation.    The new cloths are a totally different fabric (like gauze) and have zero citrus scent.
Look the lather! I’m all coconut products!! Very small and compact for a crossbody purse + great travel mate

I had been buying these coconut wipes for a few years now - recently got a couple more packs and discovered they were completely changed. The wipes are thicker and textured, not as “wet” so it requires more scrubbing. The formula feels stickier on the skin as well - I used to not require rinsing my face afterward but now I do. Even the packaging is worse… the plastic closure doesn’t seal as securely. I will need to find a new product because these are terrible now.

These are the best make up wipes I’ve ever found. They leave the skin feeling clean and moisturized. Some make up wipes leave the skin feeling very oily! I do not prefer the exfoliating ones however - they are too harsh for my skin!

they changed this product. the old wipes were great and soft and took your make up off perfectly. this new version of these wipes leave your face sticky and with make-up left behind. this new version is horrible. will be returning all the sephora wipes i just bought.
Enjoying the exfoliating side. Pretty rough you have to be carful not to rub too hard. The other side is comforting after you exfoliate.

They made my skin feel really fresh as my “on the go” type of makeup remover/cleanser. I do prefer to actually wash my face when I get home or before I go to bed, but if I’m in the car and ‘out & about’ these do the trick!
review_title: Great for a quick refresh on the go

review_text: A NEW MUST in my purse/backpack/carryon good for on the go cleansing wipe, cant tell about makeup remover bc dont use muchsoft smell, not a soft material

This used to be THE BEST makeup removing wipe. But this last package of it I just purchased, the formulation was totally different. It still did a great job of cleaning but it left a greasy residue all over my skin. No indicator on the package that was a new formula or anything.

For some reason it won’t let me review the grapefruit wipes, which are what I ordered. I ordered them back in June , and they had the exfoliating side. Sounds as if maybe they no longer have the rough exfoliating side, which is a shame. It took me a little adjusting to get used to them, because the exfoliating side is pretty strong. But I really love the grapefruit fragrance, and came to appreciate how well they exfoliate. I normally use some kind of exfoliating treatment or serum every night, but didn’t have to when I used the grapefruit wipes. They’re fabulously effective. If they have the same formulation available, I’ll be ordering them often. I’m in my 50s and don’t have particularly sensitive skin FYI.
Gentle on skin. Cleans well. Unscented. Didn’t use it on makeup.

I ordered a restock of the exfoliating wipes and found out that the wipes are completely different. The exfoliating side is gone and the material is different. These new wipes left my face feeling sticky and greasy. Its sooo sad because these were my go-to facial wipes for my very sensitive skin.

I use to love the charcoal exfoliating wipes. Then they went out of stock forever. I tried the charcoal gentle exfoliating wipes and I am not a fan of those at all. The 5 stores are for the wipes that use to be available.
These are nice to have on hand. Not sure if they are doing anything extra but they are not breaking me out so that’s cool.

I have gone through at least 5 packages of Hemp and at least 8 of Rose. Recently, Hemp changed from smooth on both sides to smooth on one side, exfoliating on the other. It’s not very abrasive,  just different and with dubious improvement. Overall, it’s an average product.I am taking 2 stars off because Sephora quietly reduced the cloths from 25 to 20, but kept the price the same. It’s cheaper to buy from the drugstore, and with comparable, if not better, quality.
Sadly these made my face and eyes burn so bad after using them! I have never had an issue with make-up removers till trying this one. The smell is a little strange also.

New formula sucks. I was a years long user of the originals. Do not like the change!!!  Better off using an unscented baby wipe sprayed with my foaming cleanser.  Cheaper and better than these redesigned ones!

The New Formula is AWFUL! I have been using these for years and I loved the rose and the watermelon scents. Recently repurchased and believe the reviews— this has definitely been reformulated and it is terrible. So aggressively fragranced and it does not fade plus it leaves my face feeling sticky, not fresh. Hard pass for me. There are drugstore alternatives that are better performing at a lower price point.
Love these wipes. Just had a baby and these have been so easy to use when I’m exhausted and don’t want to fully wash my face in the morning or before bed.
Easy, breezy, beautiful “Sephora Girl!“ Or in other words: Easy to use, smells great, and takes off my makeup easily!
Perfect for your gym bag or to have on the go. No sticky residue and works for stubborn eyeliner.

Absolutely loved these charcoal wipes and would regularly buy them. Saw they were out of stock so I was so happy to see them in store. Unfortunately the formula has changed and it is not as exfoliating and totally not the same:( Will not be buying anymore
bought a small pack of the hemp ones at Sephora. Love them and they smell great.
Leaves my face sticky but still love the refreshment
These wipes smells really nice, but were not the best at removing any makeup and left my skin feeling irritated.
review_title: Not the best wipes out there

review_text: love having these on hand during the hot summer days. hold up well for playground duty, airport freshen, or event makeup prep.

I used to love these wipes but I purchased them recently for the first time since the pandemic and they are not the same. They made my face feel extra sticky, the scent wasn’t off and it was overall an uncomfortable experience.

Like many others, I was a fan of these wipes. I have sensitive skin and found the coconut wipes and the rose worked well for me. I still had some in my supply but I ordered three packs along with some other items to qualify for free shipping. I have been extremely disappointed in the updated formula.  They have changed both the material used for the cleansing cloth (thicker and more like fabric) and the formula for the liquid. While I prefer the former material, the newer is OK (but not great). What I’m having a much harder time with is the formula for the cleanser itself. What used to be lightly scented and refreshing is now cloying and leaves an unwanted sticky residue on my skin. I find I have to rub harder for the product to be effective.  Rest assured this will be the last time I purchase these. Ick! Now to find a way to use them elsewhere so they are not wasted.  :(
review_title: Another Former fan ... new formula is awful  ICK!

review_text: Perfection. Removes the makeup and exfoliate. Not drying skin at all.

Please bring back the old exfoliating wipes! The new ones don’t do anything! These were a staple for me for years and now I’m so dissatisfied. Your makeup wipes were the reason for me ordering through Sephora over ulta!

I do love these wipes! There are others I like as well but the price point is so good with Sephora. That said, the packaging isn’t always the best and the plastic lid frequently falls off the package that the wipes are stored in. Other than that I love them!
review_title: Product great but packaging could use some work

review_text: I find these wipes actually really rough to use on the face so I decided to use them to exfoliate my legs and my arms sometimes and it works super well! It is really great at removing dead skin. Just wouldnt recommend for more sensitive areas like the face.

I wanted to like these cause they’re cheap and smell nice. But these wipes are honestly so harsh to the skin. They leave an oily film on your face and they barely remove any makeup. I cleansed after using them, and they still made me break out and I don’t even have sensitive skin.
I love these. Super convenient. The rough side is the most exfoliating cleansing cloth I’ve ever used to date and the soft side is perfection.
Great facial wipes to remove makeup while cleansing and exfoliating face. Obsessed with the coconut water hydration and doesn’t leave my skin dry.
Very happy with this. It does a good job cleaning. I use it before bed. Quality vs price is good.
Kind of smells funky and makes me lips dry but it does the job really well so ^.^

None of these are good for my face. Too harsh and always leave some kind of film behind. But, while trying to use up the wipes to not waste any. I found out they work great for refreshing armpits and feet! The exfoliating side is awesome for armpits and feet. Keeping them feet smooth and armpits light colored. I still use glycolic acid on them overnight 2 times a week. I just can’t replace my lcd deodorant.
Love love love this product! I love the way it smells, it cleanses your face sooooooooo well, removes make really well. Your skin smells and looks refreshed after using it!

I love these and you seriously cannot beat the price. I see no reason to pay up for cleansing wipes is these Sephora ones do the job perfectly. I would recommend to try out a bunch of different flavors. I’ve tried them all and my favorites are watermelon and coconut water. They don’t leave you dry.
I really like these. I have super sensitive skin and they don’t make me break out.

I love these cloths.  The first thing I noticed was the scent. The grapefruit scent was just like the real thing.  When they are opened up they were very moist.  One side was very smooth and the other side was a bit rougher.  My skin felt clean and soft.  I will continue to purchase.
Doesn’t remove makeup. Wipes were barely moist when I opened the package.
It is very hard on the skin. I bought it 2 years ago and I could only use it twice. Now I use it for cleaning surfaces because it is not good for my face.
Even the soft side feels rough and it doesn’t take off my makeup without a lot of harsh scrubbing! Awful.
Great wipes and NO breakouts. Refreshing, moisturizing and removes all my makeup.
Stung my face and eyes, scent was over powering. These wipes are great in theory, but I’ll stay away until a fragrance free version is released.
super rough on face. doesn’t really remove well. odd smell. didnt really like it overall.

Im so glad it’s not just me that noticed the change in the charcoal wipes! First the package got smaller, then the formula became inconsistent. Im down to my last package & along with the green tea. Now those are gone? What’s up Sephora? Do you have to change everything?
I love these wipes! They make my skin feel so clean! They gently re,I’ve makeup and oil and they smell great. You get lots for the price too.

So... not only did the packaging change, but the whole wipe itself has changed! I’m not sure if I like it yet, but I loved the previous version especially the exfoliating side. This new design smells different and is a thicker material like a wash cloth. The exfoliating side is more gentle which some people may like.
These facial wipes are great. Scrubby side, soft side, very nice scent. These will be my fave from now on!!!

I love these grapefruit exfoliating wipes. They smell real fresh and have a course side for smoothing my face while getting ready for the summers sun after a very long winter. Will be sharing these with all my good friends.
I love these wipes! Fast easy and effectively clean my makeup away
They smell very great and make the face feel refreshing and soft.

These used to be my FAVORITE wipes!! The coconut and the charcoal were amazing. Now the formula is different and the wipes are awful. You also only get 20 wipes not 25. I also think the coconut water wipes stink like coconuts when they used to have almost no scent at all. Why did you guys ruin a good thing?? Please please change the formula back. No one likes these now. I don’t even know what wipes I can use now since I used these for years and my skin loved them. So disappointed and frustrated.

I have been enjoying the Charcoal Exfoliating wipes for years, but you have changed them. They have gone from 25 wipes down to 20 and you have downgraded the exfoliating side of the wipe. It does nothing now. No abrasion at all anymore, just nothing little soft texture. Used to love these wipes, but will not purchase them again. Disappointed!

Please bring back the old formula. The new formula wipes are awful. They’re not damp enough, the texture is weird, and they smell strange and leave a sticky film on the skin. These wipes used to be my favorite but I will not be repurchasing since they changed the formula.

I tried this product in the “rose” and “coconut” types. I enjoyed using both very much, highly effective in removing all makeup (but I prefer to use this as the first step of a double cleansing routine). These are especially useful on the go, super handy for travel to freshen up. My only complaint with these is the fragrance can cause some sensitivity to my skin. It would be super helpful if there were a fragrance-free option!

I have been buying these for a while. I work in an environment that wreaks havoc on my skin. These are fantastic at the end of my day or even to refresh my face on my lunch break. I typically buy in multiples and came online to purchase my next batch only to discover that they don’t sell my favourite scent, coconut in Canada anymore. I am absolutely devasted. I hope this is only temporary as I will be gutted using my last wipe knowing I won’t be able to get more. Please make the coconut available soon again for your Canadian customers. PLEASE?!?!

I have been using these wipes daily for over a year now. I used to love them but they changed the packaging and formula. The wipes are now so dry they are basically unusable. I got two packages and opened them both to discover that the wipes were barely damp. It feels they had been sitting out in the sun to dry out. Won’t be repurchasing.
These wipes are excellent. They smell nice, they work really well and are affordable. What’s not to love?
Great!!! Will reorder again love the smell, gets makeup off face really well
I didn’t like at all it will dry out my skin and it’s said smell like coconut but smell something else
I got the coconut ones, they smell amazing. They are thick and take off any makeup or just help cleanse. No water needed. They work well.
Amazing scent, great exfoliant and gentle on the other side! Feels fresh and clean :)
Love these! They smell amazing, and do a great job. They’re also a bit moisturizing
Obsessed with Rose anything and these are amazing. Works great. Only wish they were a tad bit cheaper but I’ll still buy.
Irritated my sensitive acne prone skin. My skin around the eyes turned red and stung from these. Use a cleansing balm instead!

I love these for when I do a full face of makeup and want to take it off after a long day, I use one of these, wash my face, and do my regular skincare routine. Also, they just feel really nice on my face, I use the Aloe, coconut, watermelon, and rose the most. As the texture of some of the other wipes are more like a scrub.

Meh....I wasn’t impressed.  It took several wipes to remove all my makeup and it wasn’t able to get my mascara off.  The wipes left a sticky, weird film on my face.  I gave it 2 stars because the smell was nice.
Wish they would bring these back permanently again !!
Works well when your on the go but I still would rather use micellar water because it is better for the planet but otherwise it works good when your in a hurry.
It could totally clean my make up, and my face wasn’t dry at all.

Amazing if you like exfoliating swipe. These are the best exfoliating wipes I’ve tried. They are aggressive enough to get the dead skin and makeup off. My skin glows after use. The grapefruit fragrance is very energizing and pleasant. I keep repurchasing these!
i didn’t expect these to get eye makeup off as easily as they do! plus they make my face soft. would recommend!
Sephora Collection Cleansing & Exfoliating wipes smell amazing and remove a full face of makeup with ease!
These babes are my favourite from the line!  Easy to store and they help to take away mascara or any left traces of make up. Never change them, pleeeeese!!!!
review_title: Keep them buying over and over

review_text: watermelon had too much scent, not overbearing but unpleasent, and not as nice as other brands wipes that are more natural and rated for price/value. Main ingredients coco and castor oil with alcohol. Small wipes and package for travel. Wont return nor repurchase nor use for face.
These are great smelling wipes and remove all my makeup! But they are not exfoliating like the charcoal wipes are!

I’m hating the new formula. Old wipes used to be so much better for exfoliation. The texture actually worked for my dry flaky skin. I just used their new formula and it’s horrible. Texture is not good enough at all. It does not feel like it’s exfoliating anything. These used to be my go to wipes for years and now I have to find something else.

Does the job fairly well! It takes the make up off but I would not herald it as a skin hydrating or immediate fix. However, as a wipe I do recommend. I typically use wipes as a first step to removing make up and also when I am doing my make up to clean off brushes quickly. Otherwise, I do not recommend this product for the soothing and relaxing it promises. However, as a cleansing wipe it does work!

Hi I always recommend clean products These wipes are fantastic, these are thick like a shop cloth paper-towel level thick & one is all you need to stay refreshed. The wipes have two sides, one is soft the other is bumpy & rougher - like an exfoliating pad. I always buy these but the new formula sucks!!! Drys the skin. Feels very weird. Hope they bring the old one back. Good to see I am not the only one that feels this way.

These wipes are fantastic, these are thick like a shop cloth paper-towel level thick & one is all you need to stay refreshed. The wipes have two sides, one is soft the other is bumpy & rougher - like an exfoliating pad. I have bought the charcoal for a gift - he loved them. Aloe Vera was a gift - they loved them and I really like the Bamboo.
review_title: Best facial wipes / cloths I've found.
