This was working fairly well with my skin until I’m not sure if it was my moisturizer or this but I’m pretty the ordinary hyaluronic acid was burning my skin idk why i read the directions and did swhat it s
I have combination skin more on the oily side and this serum is perfect. I have repurchased countless times and I will continue to go back to it. It leaves my skin feeling soft and glowy.
This sirum is in my night routine every day. It helps my skin because I have dry and sensitive skin, but after a scrub my face and put it on, my face become very stingy.

It has become my skin barrier shield! I started to use it after purchasing an all over benzoyl peroxide treatment for my hormonal acne. The benzoyl dried me out so much, my skin was red and inflamed - I almost returned the product, but I was conflicted as I was desperate to clear my acne. After introducing this HA into my routine after cleansing, I have not experienced the dryness or irritation since, whether that is from benzoyl. It is a must for me to use when I use any potentially irritating additions to my skin care, whether that is AHAs, BHAs, retinol and of course benzoyl.
Will never not be using this! Has transformed my skin barrier and helped clear up a ton of my acne
I have repurchased this 3 times. This serum is amazing and it’s incredibly hydrating.

I really wanted to love this but it did not love me lol this burned my skin,  made me break out very bad, and very very very dry. Yes I did try while my face was damp and aloe spray to make it damp but my face was in alot of pain.
The product arrived completely damaged and broken. I have ordered this product before and it had always arrived in excellent condition until this past order.
review_title: Used to be my favorite product from this brand

review_text: been using for a month! all bumps on my face disappeared! amazing for younger people.

If you have dry skin, you don’t know how bad you need this. In the winter time, my skin gets really dry and flakey but this serum helped with just that! I use this in my everyday skincare and I highly recommend.
This is an inexpensive product but you don’t get the best results. There is better hyaluronic acid serums. After use two bottles I didn’t feel good hydration.
I love wearing this with the rest of my skincare. Help with a little kick of hydration to enhance makeup wear, I highly recommend adding this to your cart.
My skin used to be flaky and dry, and this has completely solved my dryness issues!! Highly recommend
I use every day AM and PM. my skin normally has a spot at all times, but my skin has been perfectly clear for the month I have been using this
I’ve been using this ha for 2 weeks and I love the way my skin feels.

review_text: My favourite hyaluronic acid serum I’ve tried and for a great price! Hydrates my skin nicely and doesn’t leave my skin feeling sticky like some others have. Would definitely recommend to anyone, especially people who are new to skincare!

I miss this if i skip it in my routine. Its easy to think it is not doing anything, but it adds and extra bounce and glow to my skin that otherwise isnt there. i have actually tried to drop it from my routine to simplify my steps, but i immediately brought it back. Cant stop, wont stop.  For anyone having issues with it being drying- ALWAYS use this on damp skin. Hyaluronic acid is a Humectant which means it pulls water from the surrounding environment. In most cases, this is from the air or water ontop of the skin. If you apply this to dry skin, chances are that the humectants will actually pull water from the deeper layers of your skin, which can cause dehydration problems. Either put this on while your skin is damp from cleansing, or give your skin a mist with water if you want to be fancy ;)

I’ll be quite honest I’ve never used any kind of drops but was really excited to give this a try as part of my routine. It was very simple and easy to use the dropper and apply the glow drops on. I love that it helps with hydration on the skin and gives my complexion a new me! I love that these Dr. Barbara Sturm glow drops have vitamin A and Omega 3 which I believe my skin doesn’t get enough of and reduces irritations. The wild rose extract helps my skin with the pores and helps my skin to look even(especially on pictures!). It’s been quite simple to use daily and just takes a few minutes a day! As someone who tries to minimize her makeup and look for natural looking skin, as well as prevent aging; This felt right for me! I have sensitive skin, I was a bit apprehensive at first but I was happy with the results as the days went on. When I do wear makeup, these glow drops felt like a great primer before putting make up on. Overall, I am satisfied with this product and plan on using it daily till I run out then restock! It’s truly a must have!

I suggested H.A. to deal with irritated dry spots on his face & it did the trick perfectly. They’ve never returned. I appreciate the Ordinary’s neutral packaging for a lot of reasons (skincare is for everyone; the “pink tax“ needs to die), but in this case, I’m sure it helped my partner keep an open mind about whether the product was “for“ him.

review_text: This is my third bottle and I swear it transformed my skin. As someone with slightly dry skin, this has the perfect balance of moisturizing my skin without too much extra maintenance. Coupled with a good cleanser, moisturizer and sunscreen and you’re good to go. Highly recommend (especially for the price point)!

After using this product for a couple of months, my skin feels smoothe and has a nice glow. I use this product at night. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated. I love it so much that I recently purchased the 60ml.

I received a full bottle as a gift, so free and I still tossed it. I’ve tried several other hyaluronic acid serums and this one is ridiculously sticky. No clue how people are using this under cream or make up. I kept on over night and made me break out. I never break out and didn’t even have acne as a teen. I have somewhat dry skin- I can’t see this helping people with dry or oily skin. I would invest in something a little more expensive

I haven’t had the best luck in the past with this brand but this is solid, I’ve tried other hyaluronic acids that did nothing but I can tell the difference in hydration with this. It’s thick but I personally like that and it sinks in fairly quickly with no sticky residue. Whatever is left over I rub on my hands and they’ve stopped cracking. I didn’t even buy it for that but it’s a nice side effect. I had a fine line on my forehead that has gone away. I do use a serum and a moisturizer after this but I think this is what made the most difference. Will definitely keep buying.

I usually don’t like serums at all but this product was recommended for my dry skin. I am in my 40s and trying to prevent wrinkles like crazy. Perfect product. I use it every single day, morning & night! I’m on my 3rd or 4th bottle right now. I use it on my face all down my neck & it makes my skin feel hydrated all day!

Seldom do I write a review. I’ll be leaving this same review on all 4 if The Ordinary that I use consistently; Hyaluronic Acid, Retinoids, Salicylic Acid, & Lactic Acid. Before using The Ordinary I had a list of issues with my skin; intense dry patches, small bumps, scarring, intense painful acne that just would not go away. I tried many paths, products and treatments to improve my skin and comfort and unfortunately nothing seemed to help.After about 1.5 months of continuous use of the ordinary my skin started to slowly change. The Ordinary products are wonderful, simple, no added unnecessary fillers/scents, ethical, and my favourite company. One of the only company’s I’ve remained loyal to because I respect their products and what they stand for. The Ordinary isn’t an end all be all, or a quick fix! Please take care of yourself. I’ve also worked on a lot of life issues, try to keep my stress low, take better care of myself and not overwhelm myself when I am able. I will say that in addition to all of this I don’t believe the drastic and intense changes in my skin are massive and I don’t believe they would’ve been possible without this brand. I’ve shared The Ordinary with friends, family, and clients. It’s affordable, simple, and wonderful. PHOTOS above are before I used the ordinary and after 7.5 consistent months of use. It’s taken me time and research to find which products are most beneficial to me! ☺️ There’s so much helpful info and videos from dermatologists on this brand and how to use these products, also suggestions on which will be best. Everyone I’ve introduced it to adores their products, I’ve never received so many compliments on my skin. (I’m my second photo I am only wearing a couple dots of concealer. (My scars texture is unreal)How ever, everyone’s skin is different.Just keep that in mind. ❤️

I personally am a huge fan of The Ordinary Brand and have been trying new product all the time to see what actually works with my skin type. This is the second time I’ve got something from The Ordinary (the first time was their moisturizer, which was great), and as someone with really dry skin, I decided to give this serum a try. It’s very hydrating and left my skin really soft, which I definitely appreciate. However…after putting on my moisturizer, I noticed some pilling. It’s super weird, because that’s never happened to me before with a serum. That’s a bit of a deal breaker for me, because that kind of thing drives me crazy. I’ve also read reviews saying that the texture is sticky, which personally isn’t a problem for me at all. My biggest issue is the pilling — if The Ordinary could reformulate and somehow get rid of whatever causes it, I would definitely rebuy. But for now, I’m just going to use it just because I have it.

I use this in my skincare routine, every morning and night. Right after washing my face with a Salicylic Acid Cleanser(The Inkey List), I apply a few drops of this evenly on my face, while my face is still wet/damp, as Hyaluronic Acid is said to absorb better into the skin with the presence of water molecules. I will never stop using this product, ever. This is one of my acne life savers(from The Ordinary), especially since I have Acne prone oily/combination skin. Along with the use of other serums from this brand, there is a noticeable difference in my skin. DO REMEMBER that the use of skincare will not only benefit your skin but will also increase its sensitivity(therefore more suspectable to UV damage), so ALWAYS wear sunscreen during the day.

It goes on smoothly, and I can layer on products on top without too much wait time. I follow the guidance I’ve seen about applying after cleansing before the face is completely dry. For reference, I have dry skin, and I live in Minnesota. The harsh winters (really from mid September through April) do a number on my skin. This serum along with a rich moisturizer twice a day are the key for me.

hydrating, if you’re using retinol and want to skip the red dry skin, use this,

I’ve been using glossier’s super Bounce for several years now but the $28 for a small bottle had me looking for an alternative.  At a very competitive price point I decided to give this particular product a try. Needless to say I will be going back to glossier‘s super Bounce ASAP. In fact I’m not even finishing the ordinary‘s bottle! It is simultaneously incredibly watery and incredibly sticky. My skin has broken out horribly! That was definitely not a problem I had with any other product including the glossier super Bounce. So one star for the product itself but I am adding an additional star because the ordinary has excellent moral standards in regards to it being vegan, cruelty free etc.

I don’t know what more anyone could want from an 8$ bottle of serum. I apply it to my damp skin after I shower or wash my face by pressing (not rubbing) in a few drops. I have never had issues with it making my skin sticky or hindering the next steps of my routine. Do I think this product is a holy grail for moisturizing and anti aging.. no. Do I think this product is an affordable, reliable and predictable means to boost hydration or act as a vessel for the addition of stronger actives? Absolutely. Of course everyone’s mileage may vary with how this product works for them and their skin but for this price, I would never try and talk someone out of trying it. I do find the packaging of the ordinary products like this one quite annoying (glass bottles with droppers). But that’s because I am a clumsy fool who knocks them over while they are open on my counter. I can’t hold this product accountable for my own lack of body coordination.

I even use it on my knuckles sometimes, when they get SUPER dry from washing my hands in the winter and doing dishes, before applying hand lotion and it makes a world of difference like you wouldn’t believe- even if that’s not a traditional use for it. Your face will thank you for this! Just be careful what products you pair it with- I’ve noticed that it works differently with different face washes and lotions. Either way, it’s worth it. review_text: As mentioned in many reviews, this can dry your skin out of not used properly and I have extremely dry skin. I pair this with a moisturizing facial mist before and after applying the hyaluronic acid serum and it truly does lock in the moisture of the spray and help keep my skin from drying out.  Very affordable as well.

I would recommend it if you need a Hyaluronic acid in your skin care routine on a budget. If you can splurge some, I would recommend Vichy 89 Hyaluronic serum.

I do occasionally use it on my face and love it. Definitely use on damp skin so that it soaks in well without leaving a tacky feel. A little goes a really long way, if you use too much you might get a tacky feel or pulling, but just a couple drops on damp skin is perfect (at least for me).

I went with the larger bottle. Recommended by my sister. Just wow! I’ve been using it a few months now and am seeing a noticeable difference in my skin. It’s evened my skin tones, balances my combination skin, leaves skin looking healthy clean & glowing with no makeup, with makeup, goes on before primer, helps everything stay in place & applies smoothly. Pilling so badly and can’t really use with anything else (sunscreen, moisturizer, cream, etc). This should be the last thing on your skin. Also I don’t feel like it does much on my skin because I still feel so dry and have to put a second layer later on. My skin is NOT dry.
I haven’t seen any major results but it might just be my skin type

review_title: I tried the ordinary and inky list …

review_text: Being a skincare beginner I didn’t realize that it needed a moisturizer on top so I got small white heads from drying out my skin. I started using the Neutrogena Hydroboost Water Gel but I feel like it’s still not moisturizing enough to use on top of TO’s Hyaluronic Acid so I would recommend using a thicker moisturizer on top so the Hyaluronic Acid has more to absorb since it can absorb like 1000x it’s weight or something xD. I love how it didn’t irritate my skin and went on smoothly since it’s water-based. It might pill the more serums/products you put on. Be sure to apply on wet/damp skin so it can absorb the water too.

Some comments are saying that this pills, and yes it does if you use too much product or don’t let it dry/absorb before layering other products on top. I use this both morning and night (mostly night) on damp skin (one drop) typically as the first step to my routine and wow! It really does plump up your skin just like that. Sometimes I would wet my hands a little and just pat it/dab it on my face after applying the Hyaluronic acid. The reason why I apply it on damp skin is because hyaluronic acid draws in moisture from its surroundings. If there’s no moisture then the hyaluronic acid starts drawing in moisture from our own skin, leaving our skin drier. So if you use it correctly, then the benefits will definitely show! Hope this helps!

Ce produit est fantastique ma peau est rendu douce au touché donne un éclat éclatante mais quand je regardais des influenceur mettre ce produit cela enleva toute leur bouton mais cela et faux. Il est bon pour toute peau même grasse.

For the price point you can’t beat it. I apply it on damp skin and most of the time when used correctly it gives me nice hydration. I just bought this a week ago and I am really enjoying it.  I use .1 percent tretinoin every night, and like many other tret users I struggle with dry peeling skin, especially in the winter. I wear very lightweight makeup products like tinted moisturizers and when I use those with this product, the hydration and glow still comes through when I apply the tinted moisturizer, which I think gives a flattering, youthful look.  I’ll continue using this every morning and see if my opinion changes over the next month or so.

I have normal skin on my face but in the winter it can lean to the drier side. This serum is the holy grail to my morning routine. It has made a huge difference. review_text: I do microneedling & I have all my patients use this for after care. It’s phenomenal! However I think some of the reviewers on here my not be using it correctly. This product is hydrophilic meaning it loves water. It uses that water to penetrate into your skin and give your skin that plump look. Therefore this product needs to be used with damp skin. If you dry your face thoroughly & then apply it, it will not have water to help it absorb into your skin. So it will sit on top of your skin and cause piling. Also once the product absorbs all the water underneath your skin it will help with tightening and plumping and in order to seal in that plumpness you need a good moisturizer to seal it in. So first wash face with a damp skin then apply this product, once dry and absorbed add your moisturizer and then add a mineral sunscreen over the moisturizer. Hope this helps anyone who is starting their adventure with HA products :)

It’s a good at what it’s for, but my last HA serum was the CereVe one and I preferred the texture of that one, more cream like. This one feels a little too sticky. I’ll use it till it’s gone tho, but I bought the 60 mL so it’ll be awhile

I just purchased this and love it. I was using Clarity ($72) and this is just as good. I have very dry skin and use this at night after my retinol serum.  I’m very picky about my products and this will definitely be repurchased!

It does keep moisture in when you use it on wet skin. However, the texture is really off putting and kind of feels like snot (due to the hyaluronic acid I think). You have to get used to it. It will kind of lather on wet skin if you’re not gentle enough. I will not repurchase but am not really dissapointed beacause it was relatively inexpensive.
This is definitely one of my favorite skin care must haves. I have oily skin, but the more balanced & hydrated it is, the less oil I have. I use this twice a day.

I bought this product (along with many others) from The Ordinary after doing research and seeing that people were raving about it. Hyaluronic acid has tons of benefits but I didn’t get any from this product. It did nothing for me - didn’t make my skin worse or better. The Ordinary is definitely not for me, but I wish it was because it’s affordable and has cleaner ingredients.
I really like this product.First time user.My skin feels great and it’s super hydrating.The product feels great and a little bit goes a long way.
I love this product so much. Makes my skin glow and feel plump and firm.
I love this! Skin was dry and textured, and after a few days, my skin became so smooth and hydrated! 100% recommend!
I love this stuff, I’m on my fourth bottle! It’s one of the only products that is hydrating enough to combat my drying acne cream without clogging my pores.
Bought this for my hair as I read that it helps keeps moisture in it and I’m pleased to say it actually works lol. Hair is looking hydrated and healthy (:
I did not notice a difference after using this product for over a month
Absolutely changed my skin, so freaking good! Have been using this for over a year repurchased this Atleast 5 times.My skin is glowy, dewy and just is hydrated 10/10

I’ll give it 2 stars for value but this stuff is really thick and sticky and pills up on my face after application. I have been using HA for like 10 years and I’ve tried a lot of brands, and I have made my own, which this inspired me to go back to doing lol. I know from making my own that HA serum really shouldn’t be super goopy and thick so I think they must use some additive to have that affect, which might make it seem like it is a high concentration of HA but that is not necessarily true. I am using this now on my chest and arms just to use it up (heck I am 38 and my skin can use all the moisture it can get!). The inkey list makes a decent HA serum that is cheap and does not pill up like this. My daughter said it doesn’t pill up for her and she said she liked it, fwiw. But I tried so many different ways of applying - using less, using more, rubbing in more, rubbing in less, spreading as thin as possible, trying on a totally bare face with no products after, etc and nothing worked.
review_title: Sticky & goopy and won't absorb, pills on my face

review_text: Best thing for my skin. Evens out my skin tone perfectly, while giving me a radiant glow. The glow you will have right after using it is incomparable to other higher priced items that claim radiance. A must have and a constant part of my low maintenance skin care routine.
A very good product for hydration. You have to pat it onto your face and only use a few drops of it. This doesn’t replace moisturizer so use this before moisturizing.
This is a great priced product.  I use it for cosmetic micro needling.  And it does get flaky after use.  But that is normal. Leaves my face soft whenever I rinse off after a treatment.
very good at smoothening my skin, helps absorb the nutrients from my moisturizer
This hyaluronic acid is better than others to the same price

I like to mix this in my moisturizer or on a damp face, it works really well and helps my skin retain moisture. It is sticky for sure but drys down and makes my skin smooth. My oily combo skin loves it and the price is fair. I notice as I get older my skin gets more dry spots so this is a must in the winter for me.
This product is great for retaining moisture in the skin. Apply after washing and top with your favorite moisturizer. There’s no need to buy a more expensive product.
Really cleared up my skin. For its price, it is so worth it and leaves skin feeling smooth to the touch. It definitely ranks up there with the more expensive versions of the same product.

I wash my hands constantly so they’re always dry, rough, and look older than they are. I was checking out at Sephora and saw this, couldn’t believe it was only $7, had heard some good things about it so I thought I’d give it a try. I’ve been using it on my face AND hands. And the results are incredible! I used it daily before my normal moisturizer and cannot believe how much younger my skin looks!! I will definitely be purchasing this again.
review_title: You have to use it to believe it!

review_text: Love this serum! It hydrates the skin but it is a little sticky. It gives the skin a glow which is amazing. Will definitely recommend and repurchase.
A staple product in my everyday skin care routine. I would only recommend using it in the PM, it tends to break up and sit on top of the skin so its not good for under make up.

I definitely see a difference in my skin in the short time I have used it. I put it in with my skin being damp after washing and then my night cream over that when it has dried a bit. My flaky spots are gone my skin feels so soft and smooth.  My red rosacea areas have also improved. I am always careful what I use because of my sensitive skin, but I have had no problems using this product.  Can’t wait to see if more improvements will come the longer I use it.
love this product especially for the winter time! absorbs moisture so well especially for those with dry skin
It’s an amazing product!!! Love it, my skin feels so good and refresh

Use it daily on damp skin. It works well, but I feel like there are better products out there. The price point is good so I keep using it. The overall cost of my skincare routine is a little high for me, so I appreciate having products at different price points. Would definitely spend more if it was a good Vitamin C, but for a HA, this works fine!
I feel like this did nothing for me, when applying certain products on top this would peel off, very weird

It’s ok not that amazing!! I’ve extra dry skin and I thought it will help me. Initially it worked but gradually it became so sticky and whenever I’ll put some drops on my fingers I just didn’t wanted to put it on my face anymore. That sticky feeling turn me off !! I’ve switch to inkey one and it is working perfectly

I use this daily on my skin, twice a day, after washing my face. If you put too much it will feel a little sticky, so be mindful on how much you put on. I’ve seen an improvement overall in the moisture in my skin. I struggle with dry skin, so adding this to my routine has helped a lot.
its so wonderful, perfect for my skin. Even my friends and family are willing to buy this product.
Works well, makes skin look plump and a little dewy. Helped with dark circle under eyes a little after using for 2-3 months.

As much as people recommended me to get this serum because I have super dry skin, but unfortunately it didn’t provide me the approximate hydration I thought it would give. I tried to use it on damp skin before applying, yet my skin doesn’t feel intensely moisturized. I wouldn’t recommend if you have super duper dry skin.

It’s good. For being ultra moisturizing I find it dries quick upon application. To fix this I’ve just been adding a few drops to my cream instead of using it before my cream. It might not be the “correct” way to use it but I find it works.
Very absorbent and helps a lot with dry skin. Apply when face is still damp after shower, before moisturizer.
This is one of the serum I will buy over and over again from Ordinary. Good value for the money too.

Before I started my Master Esthetician program I had everything from this product line. Once I started school we were introduced to so many high end products that I forgot all about The Ordinary. I was at Sephora the other day and decided to purchase  this and wow I forgot how much I love it. It’s so simple but gives such good hydration. Have I used better?? Yes. BUT for this price I would much rather use this and add it to a great moisturizer and make it to even further. If you spray water on your face before, the product works much better since it’s a water-binder and loves extra moisture.
Helped when I had bad acne. A good value. Something that I think I should always have in my skin products collection.
Nothing special, but I still buy more and great for a simple skincare routine.
I dont know if it does anything to the skin long term. It feels a bit plump and moisturizing after

100% recommend as a part of your skincare routine! I have very sensitive skin, and this product works well for me. Texture is thick and sticky - which is expected of hyaluronic acid. Just a couple of drops goes a long way! Just make sure to slowly transition into the product, just to avoid any skin irritation (it happened to me).
Love it! My oily skin is so much better after I use this. Actually, every type of skin SHOULD USE IT ❤️

This is really sticky and peels off my face after just minutes of being on. It makes my face feel tight and not very hydrated. It doesn’t look good under makeup either. I tried this instead of my usual La Roche Posay  serum and I won’t be repurchasing.

This is now a must have in my routine. I love the feeling of my skin after applying this. I use it every day and night. I’ve also used this on the tips of my hair which I discovered through TikTok and it has amazing results. ❤️

this might sound weird, but i think this product is what made my skin start developing small bumps that look like fungal acne. i have dehydrated skin and wanted to add a boost of hydration to it. now i was quite surprised that my skin was acting out due to this product since hyaluronic acid is something the body naturally has. i gave this product a month and half to work but my skin just kept getting bumpy and i’d get small pimples. and it left my skin feeling gross. once i stopped using this product my skin finally cleared up. (this was my only new skincare addition at the time). very strange. i also used it with water since that is how hyaluronic acid is supposed to be used.

This was too rich for my skin so I started using it in my hair (thanks, tiktok) and I was simply amazed at the results. It’s been a month and I usually need a haircut by now but my split ends have disappeared. I work it into damp hair (don’t use a towel, just keep it wrapped in a hair wrap to avoid further friction and damage) and follow it up with argan oil also from The Ordinary. Frizz is also almost non-existent the morning after (I wash my hair at night)! I use a clarifying shampoo twice a month in case of product buildup but it hasn’t really been an issue. If this product also didn’t work for your face I recommend it for your hair!
review_title: too rich for my face, worked miracles for my hair

review_text: I use this in the morning as a first step and my face feels immediately hydrated and soft after application. Such a great product especially at the price point.
This stuff is so great! So affordable!! My skin feels so soft and more plump. I use it at night and it the morning applied to damp skin! Recommend it to my friend and she loves it too!
amazing! the package arrived in Costa Rica in perfect condition and the product is the best.

It is clear but when I apply it, it leaves white streaks, which is odd. with moisturized on top it looks fine but once I add my skin tint/tinted moisturizer, it pills/flakes off (I tried using different moisturizers, and same thing so it is this product and not the moisturizer). once I get the pills off and put a little more skin tint on...it looks good. Not sure I would buy again, a hassle to move off the flakes and apply skin tint again.
review_title: It may work but it also pills/flakes off

review_text: I used to buy the Ordinary religiously but not anymore. I’m going back to K-beauty!! 1.I dropped this from the sink on the first day and the entire thing shattered and spilled. I’ve never had this happen with other products. I guess this is what happens when you cut corners. Absolutely shocking that this bottle is so fragile2. I read that the US regulation for cosmetics is still stuck in the 80’s and hasn’t been updated. Can’t trust the ingredients in US made cosmetics anymore. On the other hand K beauty products are stricter with regulation and ingredient control, are affordable with better quality control . I am going back to K beauty skin care after this. I will not be buying the Ordinary products again.
review_title: Cheaply made, you get what you pay for

review_text: Not a big fan. Didn’t find it hydrating and the texture is weak. I tried the Odorylan hylauronic acid and it’s amazing, I’ll stick with that.
it is truly a gem!! for the price and the magic this does is amazing

Love it.  I mix it with the Argireline solution (equal parts) and apply to my face, neck and decolté.  My face is beyond smooth to the touch.

love this product! it is so effective and very affordable, highly recommended!

I love the consistency of this acid, and I think it has done my skin good to use it, I became a fan of it since last year when I tried it for the first time! It also has a very affordable price, I definitely recommend it!
This product is as good as glyderm, it makes my skin look and feel 10 years younger, it tightens and moisture, while turning over collagen reproduction best results by the whole st
I think everyone knows this one its a must. I ordered this 3rd time

I use this Hyaluronic Acid for 3 months already since August, now I am on the second bottle. My skin feels really moist and smooth all the time. Before I always had some dry spots on my face in the fall and winter seasons, but after I used this Hyaluronic Acid, I don’t feel any dry cracks on my face any more. I use this every morning and night after the toner, before essence or serum in my skin routine. I found out if I rub it on my hands first and then tap it to put on my face when the toner is not all the way dry yet, this way my skin can absorb it so much better and won’t feel sticky any more. I hope this review can helps someone to resolve about stickiness issue.
So dang sticky. It does the job and hydrates the skin but I find myself looking for other products that have hyaluronic acid in it so that I don’t need to use this

I love The Ordinary as a brand, but absolutely cannot stand this product. The only way to truly benefit from this form of hyaluronic acid is to apply another moisturizer or occlusive over top of it, otherwise it actually pulls moisture out of the skin rather than draw it in. You’d think that that would be taken into consideration when it comes to how this product layers, but it isn’t... the product pills awfully when trying to put anything over it. Will be returning because I don’t even want to give this away to friends or family.
Get it I love it I have very dry skin and I layer this with the alpha Arbutin ! It super hydrated and drys fast !
Favorite hydrator for skin, will recommend for those seeking hydration

This is a simple, yet highly effective addition to a skin care regime at all ages. Just a few drops goes a long way towards providing hydration. I really notice a difference in the softness of my skin when I go a while without using it. It does not conflict with other products, so it can be used morning or evening and can be used to mix up other powder formulations from TO or other product lines. This is a cruelty free, silicone free, vegan product that will just add that extra moisture we all need, especially during the winter or dryer seasons. FYI, especially good to aid with the overall dehydration experienced by some post-menopausal.
This completely stopped making my skin flaky and dry. Winter and fall are the seasons that trigger my skin a lot but this serum really helped fight my dryness.
this makes my face feel so nice and i feel so pretty after doing my skincare, it also helped clear my acne a bit

I haven’t really used it for my skin but I’ve been using it on my damp hair for my split ends. I think it works great and I have noticed a difference. Also, you can apply it to the lips (while damp) and lock it in with a lip mask or balm. my lips have stopped being dry and flaky after doing this.

I use this 2x a day and paired it with the 5%lactic acid at night. My T-zone has always been dry, but I get breakouts on my chin, this product changed that! No more breakouts for me! My skin looks and feels different.. ❤️❤️❤️

i’ve been using this for about 4 days now and i see a big difference. i use it every morning and night and my skin has never felt better. my skin is very sensitive so i can’t really use many products but this has made me skin feel so nice.

i love it so much! my skin is very dehydrated and this serum helps a lot. can’t complain about the price either.

not my favorite, this serum pills so bad no matter what combination of products i use this with. honestly i use enough products that already have hyaluronic acid that i did not see any improvement with this.

One of the best products I’ve found for my sensitive skin. Highly recommend.
Love this product on my skin. I use this every other day so that it does not dry out my skin

I tried using this since March 2021 and this was the only product that helped me with my acne plus their naicimide serum product as well. I’m in my 2nd bottle right now and I love it. AM routine: I cleanse my face first, massage my face with this hyaluronic acid with DAMP skin, next is naicimide serum, moisturizer and lastly is sunscreen. Same at PM but I use liquid exfoliant instead of naicimide then moisturizer. I’m happy with this and will definitely recommend.

Love this! I typically swap my serums out constantly, but this one has made a place in my usual skincare routine. It’s one of the few things I use that makes such a noticeable difference, making my skin look plump, hydrated, and glowing.
It’s not bad but not for me. I think the level panthenol is way too low to plumb and calm skin. 5% panthenol, more glycerin, and beta-glucan would make this a powerhouse humectant.
I don’t go a day without using this! My skin is so much softer and radiant because I’ve added this serum to my routine.

im super satisfying with this product especially at this price range. i  use this one all seasons, because even though it has hyaluronic acid and b5, it doesnt feel greasy after applying. in winter, i put it under a coat of moisturizer, so the hydration gets locked in. in summer, i use it directly under foudation as primer, and my makeup looks glowy.

LOVE THIS! I have dry skin and it makes my skin feel so soft and smooth and my complexion looks fantastic. I cannot believe the price because I would definitely pay more for a product like this. My husband started using it as well after he saw my results.

You can tell these comments didnt do their research. hylauronic acid is thick, so it’s SUPPOSED TO BALL UP. so when it dries and you apply multiple serums on top (which is recommended) of course it’s going to do that. Besides that, it’s not a bad product. Takes about 2 weeks of consistent use to see results. It’s hydrating and left my skin really nice. I paired it with the naicinimide & zinc 10% from ordinary (not bad, not impressive though) and it really helped my acne out. My skin looked better. If you have really bad acne, this product is gonna help hydrate your skin. It’s delicate enough for sensitive skin too. Only con is that it kinda runs out quickly, so I have to grab more.
review_title: HYLAURONIC ACID IS SUPPOSED TO BALL UP

the only hyaluronic acid you’ll ever need. it sounds dramatic, but i’m serious—there’s a reason this was the best of beauty award winner. as with everything from the ordinary, it’s more than worth your money.

I bought this as a replacement for Drunk Elephant’s B-Hyrda. I do feel like it does help hydrate my skin, but it is so sticky. It doesn’t really dry down. Keeps the moisture within. Helps serums and other products to penetrate the skin deeper. Live!

I just put a bunch on my face and glide it around and allow it to dry. My face is very glowy. I also use it under my eyes after the caffeine serum dries from the Ordinary as well.
review_title: good once you know how to apply

Great dupe for Glossier’s super bounce! A little thicker but I love it.

I never ever use any kind of serums on my face, This is the best thing I ever had. My skin looks so fresh and new after using it. Highly recommend it. Its not harmful, no side effects.
Changed my skin completely. I am glowing now. Would totally recommend this one

Not sure if it’s true but I decided not to repurchase this item and try out The Inkey List instead - or eliminate it completely to see whether or not it really did make a difference.
review_title: Not sure if it was effective tbh.

review_text: Hydrating product, little goes a long way. I use a couple of drops and pat into skin and let it dry down before other steps in my skincare. Skin quality has changed, feels smooth and supple. 10/10 recommend.

This is my absolute favorite hyaluronic acid, you can’t beat the price and I think it’s comparable to any other more expensive alternative. It’s plumping, hydrating, and makes your skin more glowy. Just have to make sure your skin is wet when applying, and it sometimes takes a bit for the product to sink in + for your face to stop feeling a bit greasy from application.
Hydrating and not sticky.  Wonderful under moisturizer day and night routine.

one of my first TO products and I loved it at first, it made my skin so soft and hydrated. but then I ran out and didn’t use it for a few weeks and didn’t notice a difference in my skin, and then when I finally re-ordered, I started getting little bumps like clogged pores. don’t know what changed

Can’t tell much yet, anytime anyone tries a new age defying product, it must be given a month in my opinion to know how well it works. This is a very thick, viscous, I don’t mind that but I mix it with another night time lotion, this seems to give my regular regimen a boost. This alone spreads on thickly but absorbs quickly as well, its tight feeling. My suggestion is to mix with another anti-aging topical to get nice even spread over the face and neck for a soft flexible finish.
review_title: Nice, best as add on to what you already use.

fantastic! my skin feels soft and hydrated. my order arrived super fast

I have been using the product for awhile now and have a seen a noticeable difference in my skin. My skin is much more hydrated, and I find my blemishes heal faster faster than they did before. So, basically it would just dry up and roll off my face. It does not layer well.  I tried adjusting the amount I was using and waiting for it to dry before applying next step- and still same thing.  I swapped for the INKEY version and that problem was gone.
review_title: Good product, just not for me and my routine.

review_text: I realized my acne was caused by dryness, so I redid my routine to incorporate more moisture. This product was good and boosted the moisture on my face - I replaced my toner with it, and noticed an improvement. One day the glass container broke - I was on vacation, and the only replacement I could get at the small town grocery store was the Neutrogena Hydration Serum - and I have to say the Neutrogena product absorbs better and brings more moisture - there is a slight scent to the Neutrogena product, but I didn’t notice any irritation from it.
review_title: Good Product, but not the best

Love love love! this was the best add on to my skin care routine ive seen such a good improvement in my black heads!

I normally don’t do reviews but I couldn’t help myself. I’ve been dealing with dry skin for awhile & this has been the only thing that has made a difference. I have really sensitive skin & was scared to try it but once I did I saw an immediate difference. I’m so glad I gave this product a try!

Amazing!!! 3 days in and already see a difference. With age my skin has been acting a little different and breaking out from stress. Needed to switch up my facial products and I’m so glad I did. Love it! Keeping this 43 old skin looking right.

This is my second time buying this. I love it and recommend mixing it in with lotion and/or creams before applying it. It amps up any lotion and/or creams I use. I use it all the way from my face, to my feet. It’s made my elbows, knees, and feet baby skin soft. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because it clumps by itself. But I still highly recommend this product. Just mix it in with any lotion or creams.

This product is the holy grail of skincare! It’s easy to apply, absorbs effortlessly, and is gentle on the wallet. Bonus points on the packaging. I’m on my 5th purchase, and still an extremely happy customer. My skin loves this!
review_title: This product is the holy grail of skincare!

review_text: This should be a staple in everyone’s routine. This adds 1000x the hydration I use it on cleansed damp skin add a couple drops then add moisturizer. After a week  of consistently using this my skin feels more plump and my dry patches from using Retina A have subsided.

I’m on the fence with this product. I usually use Wishful’s Thirst Trap Juice serum but have been looking for a cheaper alternative. Decided to give this a try as The Ordinary brand always seems to work with my skin. Now this has the same texture (not oily or greasy) as the Thirst Trap Juice and absorbs just as nicely, I thought I found a much cheaper dupe. After over a week of using though I started to get really bad blackhead breakouts on my nose and cheeks. So I had to stop using it. Not sure why the reaction with my pores as it’s oil free not greasy at all and absorbed really well into my skin. So I keep it but now I mainly use it on my cuticles now. So still looking for my dupe for Wishful’s Thirst Trap Juice but I do recommend trying this product. Even if you are acne prone because I am and did not get any full out pimple breakouts from using this, but if you suffer from big pores or blackheads I would stick with the Thirst Trap Juice.

I’ve been using this product for years, one of my favorite to incorporate into my skin care routine. I have oily skin but I still want it to be dewy, a lot of times individuals don’t use this correctly which is why it can make your skin dehydrated. Make sure to use when your face is moist and this should keep your skin looking supple.

so good!!! It has a sticky consistency which I don’t mind,but if you are someone who doesn’t like sticky serums it might not be for you. It hydrates and plumps the skin making it feel really refreshing.
I Love It!!!! I use it on a damp face after cleansing, and before moisturizing. i have extremely dry skin and eczema, and it helps sooo much!!!
ok hyaluronic acid serum is very sticky plus weird texture but it was cheap so not unexpected.

( I have sensitive skin too)

This hyaluronic acid helps me keep my eczema under control & practically gone. I wash my face, apply hyaluronic acid to my damp face, apply retinol/sunscreen and then my moisturizer. My eczema has cleared up 90% for the last six months since using this. My skin is great now!

I mix a drop with my moisturizer and my skin feels so hydrated afterwards.  After letting it sit for a few weeks and not really knowing what to expect, it’s now a must-have, and love the way my face looks when I wake up!

This is such a great product! It makes my skin look plump & healthy. It’s awesome for hydration! But BE SURE to apply when your skin is slightly damp/moist (not dry!!)-otherwise instead of the nice hydrating effect, it’ll just feel sort of tacky. Recommended this others and now there all hooked!!
Such an amazing product that’s absolutely worth the price! So hydrating and doesn’t feel heavy on your skin at all. Use right after cleansing for best results!

super lite, but it makes my skin glow. and its been an easy thing to integrate into my skin care routine

I have used it many times under makeup (as part of my morning skincare) and it doesn’t seem to have a negative impact, although I’m not sure if it does anything to help with makeup specifically. There’s a great amount of product for the price!

I feel like I frequently forget that I have this product amongst all the other skincare I own. Probably because it’s so cheap that there’s less urgency to use it. But every time I remember to use it, the next day my skin is so vastly different and refreshed and smooth. White heads reduced. I can’t say that about all my other more expensive products. This cheap product packs a lot of punch. I would use this for 2-3 days in a row, then stop using it for a couple weeks. Then come back to it again to experience how effective it is when you stop using it for a while. Price x effectiveness = deserves 5 stars!
Great value product. Very hydrating and a little goes a long way.

I have not yet worked this into my night time routine but will soon. I also do not experience stickiness and I use the whole amount that comes out in a single squeeze from the syringe. I’m putting this on my face neck and upper chest… like I said I love it. Makes my skin plump, smooth, and hydrated.
review_title: a newbie and I love it

review_text: love this HA! My sensitive, rosacea-prone skin drinks this serum up and have already noticed more plump, hydrated, and less fine lines since starting 2 weeks ago. Regarding all of the other comments around this product being sticky: I have experienced no stickiness issues (and better overall results) when applying to damp/wet skin, allowing the hydrophilic HA to pull in moisture into the dermal layers of the skin rather than just sitting on the outer, epidermal layer.

makes my skin look so fresh, and also added an extra but of moisture - which i really need! works amazingly

This product is very hydrating. A little goes a long way so be careful! I use around 3 drops for my entire face. Don’t use more than you have to or your face will feel very sticky. I use this fresh out of the shower, wait a few minutes, then layer with the retinoid serum. They have been making my skin feel very soft and smooth. Not a dry or flaky patch in sight, which is amazing because I get flaky skin around my nose and mouth, and normal lotions don’t help. It doesn’t really have a scent at all which is great for sensitive skin. You also just can’t beat the price! I’m very impressed.

LOVE how it makes my skin feel and look so hydrated, but it does flake up on me a bit around my chin and forehead unfortunately so I wont be repurchasing.

Good price for the amount of product. This feels nice in my makeup regimen — I will use after cleansing and using a must, apply this then eye cream, then moisturizer. Seems to work well and keep my skin hydrated and plump!

I love this product! I make sure I apply it when my face is wet. It sinks into my skin so nicely. My skin immediately feels soft and moisturized. I normally lock it in with a moisturizer immediately afterward.
Amazing for the price! I read to leave my face damp after watching so the hyaluronic acid has something to hold on to and what a game changer!

Onto my second bottle. Goes great with my skincare routine

This is the best product that you’re ever gonna find for this price, if you have dry skin (like me), believe me you need this. It retains the hydration on your skin perfectly, this is my 5th bottle and I would buy it till I’m dead.

This along with a good cream is really saving my skin and acne!! Love it so much

This really helped with my dark spots and helped my skin to glow.-(i have combination skin btw) at first i started to breakout when i used this at night with the Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% and the Lactic Acid 10% + HA, but then i limited it to only in the morning with the  Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% and i stopped breaking out.
Make any skin feel amazing. This is my second time buying it.

I have normal to dry and dehydrated skin. I was looking for a serum to add to my daytime routine to add moisture to my skin. I think the product is okay. It’s not terrible, but it’s not the greatest because of the runny texture. The moment I apply it to my face, it drip from my face if I delayed patting or rubbing it in. Also it got sticky and tacky on my skin, which made it difficult to layer other serums. Great product, i’m using it already 6 months and the results are great
recomended this product for all skin types special for dry skin.

This is a wee gem — I’m on my third bottle! I’ve used more way expensive products in the past and had similar results. So glad I gave The Ordinary a try, I won’t go back to another brand for this (hyaluronic acid 2% + B5) or the Retinol 0.5% + squalene — both are amazing value for money!!!

I bought this at Ulta about two months ago now. I use it everyday, but it really just has not done a thing for my skin.I was interested in this because my skin has been a bit dry now that I’m back in an air conditioned office. The rest of my skincare routine, with each addition, has always benefitted my skin. I really like The Ordinary, I use their niacinimide, their squalene, their retinol, their cleanser, all of those are great. This just really doesn’t do anything though. review_title: Meh I'd still buy it but don't expect much

review_text: I have combination to dry skin and was very worried this was going to make me very oily. I know how important hyaluronic acid is, and I REALLY wanted to incorporate it in my skin routine. My skin is dry on my cheeks nose chin and neck, but VERY oily on my forehead. I use this all over my face at night (as I use The Ordinary Niacinamide +Zinc In the morning). My face is very soft and for the first time in about 4 months no breakouts at all on the forehead and zero fungal acne anywhere ( not sure this alone is responsible for that, but helps) This works well and I totally recommend.

I have bought 3 of these so far. I will continue to buy them. Hyaluronic acid is all together good for your skin. This product is great and at a reasonable price. It leaves my face so hydrated. I love this product.
I don’t like it, I dry out my skin and I get acne. I no longer use it and I lost my money on this product that did not help me at all.

Letting you guys in on a little secret with this product and the lactic acid HA serum! So you know how you always see especially in lip ads how these women have super plump smooth lips? Well I was searching for a lip serum for my dry lips and noticed one with glycolic and lactic acid in them wellll i did a test... half a drop of the lactic acid and rubbed in and then wipes off excess then followed by a drop of this right out of the shower.. MOST PLUMP PERFECT LIPS EVER! I put a thin layer of laneige lip sleeping mask over to attempt to make the results last and so far I am super impressed. Definitely cheaper than any lip serums or plumpers and most of us probably have these already on our shelf. Thank me later!

overall this was okay. i used it for a long time and found it’s somewhat hydrating, but not like other products i’ve tried. also not a fan of how it feels - it’s thick (and sort of sticky) for a serum.
amazing product it made my skin look so much better and cleared it up so much
