LOVE IT DEFINITELY RECOMMEND! Last a long time to!
Texture un peu collante... Je le mets seulement le soir et avec ma crème par dessus et c’est correct. Hydrate bien la peau.

I’ve used this everyday, twice a day for about 5-6 months now and it has been a game changer! My skin is a lot more soft and hydrated! I have rosacea and my cheeks are way too sensitive and this has been amazing! Even when I try new skincare, makeup etc that causes my skin to flare/ react, I normally stop using all other products but continue with this, mild cleanser and a light motorizer. I will say, compared to the inkylist one I don’t like how it gets kid of white (milky) texture, it’s not the end of the world, just takes me some time to work it in. Overall a phenomenal product!

I’ve been using this for about 9 ish months now and it has helped my oily skin so much. It reduces my oil production and the serum it’s self isn’t tacky when on my face. If you do end up buying this make sure your face is wet since hyaluronic acid is a halogen and takes water/moisture from around it. If ur skin is dry when you apply it, the serum will take moisture from your skin and cause damage.
I used it for 2 months now , I can see a lot of improvements

I really wanted to like this product. Overall it did what it says, made my skin nice and hydrated, however it left me with tiny little pimples around my face. I have problems with hormonal acne on my jaw that pops up but these tiny little, fluid filled bumps are new. And they only appeared when I started using this product. Sad it didn’t work, at least I didn’t break the bank! I’ve been using it in my body lotion to lock in some extra moisture when coming out of the shower. It hasn’t been anything spectacular but my skin is soft.  I won’t buy it again but i don’t mind using up the rest.

This is a nice serum, especially for the price. I haven’t experienced any irritation, and I have very sensitive skin. It works best when applied to wet skin, and I have used it on my face, hands, arms, hair, and feet--all with positive results. I don’t know that I’ve had a better experience with any hyaluronic acid serum, and for the price of this, it really can’t be beat. I would recommend it, and I will be getting a bottle for my mom to try.

Perfect. I have combo skin, my nose is oily and the rest of my face is extremely dry. I use this at night after washing my face and apply the Murad City Skin Overnight Detox Moisturizer on top (it’s really expensive but I received it in a boxycharm subscription, a great alternative would be the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Gel Cream for extra dry skin). For my t-zone I use The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Masque.
review_title: Night-time hydration for extremely dry skin

review_text: Absolutely love The Ordinary products and how they both have my skin looking and feeling. My skin glows and I’ve gotten so many compliments from people. It’s definitely a product I keep stocked and recommend to family and friends.

Love this product because a little goes a long way. Excellent spreadability on damp skin, and it soaks up all the water making your skin look super refreshed and hydrated. This is an awesome product. I have very dry skin and use this twice a day.

I only bought this product so I could receive my birthday present in the mail. I have dry skin, so I figured this would be a good addition to my skincare routine. I put it on while my face is very damp, like other reviews suggested, and I think it works pretty well! It does pill like other reviews were saying, but only with some products and not with others. I think this may be due to the thickness of the serum. Because of this, I’ve just been using it in the morning with my lighter-weight serums and moisturizer instead of night time, when I use thicker serums and more intense moisturizers. For the price, I think this product is well worth having in your skincare line up. I’m giving it four stars instead of 5 due to a lack of versatility with other products.
review_title: Good quality, low-price addition for your skincare

review_text: The best thing about this product is the price. I love how affordable this brand is. The product itself is pretty good. I have used better serums but the price makes it very tempting.
review_title: it’s affordable and does the job

review_text: My skin looks and feels amazing after using this product!
This product is awesome. I am using it for 10 months and it works great. Also there is no side effect on my skin.
This product leaves your skin looking glass-like. Make sure you add this product to damp skin to lock in moisture! Will definitely re-purchase.

I didn’t want to buy a moisturizing serum with my already oily hormonal skin, but since I started using this my skin has been so much healthier. Doesn’t do much for my fungal acne when that crops up but I barely have regular pimples anymore. With my the ordinary niacinamide to get rid of acne scars and hyaluronic acid after, I have never been happier with my skin.

This serum felt tacky when I first put it on, but it dried matte. It felt like nothing on my skin as its very light. However, it pilled every time I put any other product on top of this. This happened even after I let it absorb for a good 15–20 mins. Not for me.
When I added this product to my skin care routine, it wasn’t good. When you layer it with other products, it pills. I didn’t use it long enough to know whether or not it was effective.
review_title: Pills when layered with other products

review_text: Obvi the price is great. While I find it a little bit too heavy in the summer months, this was a life saver during the wintertime, when my skin was so dry. I could wear this morning or evening to give my skin a hydration boost. But be careful -- make sure to pat some water on your skin before applying, because if there’s no water for the HA to put into your skin, it instead will draw the water from your skin and dry you out :(
I’ve always struggled with incredible my oily skin and since I’ve been consistently using this my skin is almost never oily. It’s a life saver.
I feel like I’ve already seen good results in a few weeks. I like it so much I gifted it to my mom and sisters.
review_title: Trying to keep my good looks(prevent and slow age)

review_text: It’s been so long since I’ve had a skincare product absolutely blow me away! This has brought life back to my skin and totally transformed its texture. My foundation looks absolutely airbrushed after only a few weeks of use!
Great budget-friendly option. Applies a bit sticky but dries quickly. I wouldn’t expect miracles from it, but it does the job. It’s a regular in my skin care routine.

I give this 4 stars because I find it doesn’t sit well with the Niacinamide. I know many people who love it though but this one isn’t for me as I like to use a concoction of TO products, this particular product just doesn’t sit well on my sensitive skin.

I was curious to try this product (and the brand) because of the very reasonable pricing. I’ve been using the hyaluronic acid and the buffet for about 2 months now and have noticed a difference in my skin- shinier, healthier, and I have even noticed fewer forehead wrinkles. It is odorless and applies very easily. It does leave a little sticky feel on my hands and skin but then dries quickly. Of note, another brand for hyaluronic acid also leaves a little sticky feel so maybe it’s just something with this type of serum. Regardless, it’s a great product and I like the brand. Can’t beat the value.

I find myself torn on this. It’s cost effective and with the right combo of products can really standout. I dislike the consistency and when I got HA elsewhere in my skincare regime then it didn’t have an additive effect.
Definitely seen an improvement on my skin I bought a few products from the Ordinary but this one is the main one I use everyday and night on damp skin.

Very hydrating! I use this 1-2 times a day and it’s probably my favourite product. My skin tends to be very dry and peel since I have been dealing with acne since I was 14 and I’m am 20 now I use a bunch of strong acne creams to fight my acne and this has helped the dryness. Even when my skin has had good periods like when I would have no breakouts and it would be completely clear I would still use this as it hydrated your face very well and left it looking refreshed.

I really wasn’t the biggest fan of this product, I’m giving it 3 stars bc the ingredients are great. The texture is sticky and gooey and leaves a mess on the bottle everyone you use it. In addition my skin felt like it had a weird layer on when I used it. The Inkey List hyaluronic acid is much better in my opinion.

I’ve definitely noticed a difference in my skin since incorporating this into my night time routine. The overall texture of my skin has changed and I feel like it has helped my skin look and feel more hydrated.

Es un productos con pocos activos e ingredientes. Los justos y necesarios para cumplir con lo que promete la marca. Se necesitan dos o tres gotas para cubrir rostro y cuello. Al principio tiene una textura un poco pegajosa pero seca rápidamente. Los volveriaa comprar sin dudas.

I put this on with moisturizer in the morning before I do my makeup as a sort of primer. It sits well under makeup and makes my skin look and feel hydrated. The quality of the product is great for the prize and size.
It’s perfect when you apply it on damp skin, my skin feels hydrated and plumpy
Very hydrating and plumping the skin ........ recommend to everyone Easily absorbed on damp skin
I noticed this product worked so much better for me when I applied it to very damp skin. Plumps the skin, great price.
So great! I love this serum. It’s so moisturizing but light and doesn’t make my skin feel oily.

My skin got absolutely destroyed and dried out by a vacation. I lathered up moisturizer, masks, nothing...after one week of using this, my skin was plump and hydrated. And I have extremely sensitive skin. This product is a game changer.
I used this in my skincare routine and I have dry skin but also acne, and it helped control both things. I have purchased this product twice, nothing bad to say about it!

I have struggled with my skin and acne since I was 11 and this is the first thing that has ever worked for me and is still working for me after months. I use this along with their Niacinamide.  I dont remember when my skin was this clear before. I could cry
review_title: the only thing that has worked for my skin!

review_text: This is the only hyaluronic acid I’ve ever used and I love it! Like that it comes in the bigger size too. Since it’s a staple of my skincare routine now, I haven’t even tried other brands due to the price. My skin looks great!

I am using this at night after I use the ordinary retinol 1%. The product is a little sticky but my face does look amazing in the morning. Great price but 4 stars because it’s a little sticky but I would still buy it

This has made my skin so soft and plump in the winter. I didn’t like it at first because it felt kind of uncomfortable and heavy on my skin. Then, I read somewhere that hyaluronic acid is supposed to be applied when your face was still wet. I gave it a try and it was so different. Now I leave it in the bathroom and apply it right after cleansing then move onto serum and moisturizer
review_title: Applying on wet face made all the differences

review_text: I am absolutely obsessed with The Ordinary products. It has done wonders for my hyperpigmentation and acne scaring. I love hyaluronic acid but I must admit I did not like this product. Doesn’t feel like it seeps into you skin and also leaves your skin sticky. I use The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid instead (same price range) and I find it way better. EVER other product I’ve tried from The Ordinary I’ve loved (and I’ve tried A LOT). This one is the only one that falls short for me
review_title: Falls short for me - but I do love The Ordinary

review_text: I got this to mix with the Vit-C powder.  But can’t use it that way unless I’m just going to be sitting around the house since it makes my face feel like I’m wearing a mask and then peels and pills off.  There’s no way you can wear makeup over it.
I truly love this product!  It is just perfect given the price and its effect on my skin.  I will be on my 3rd bottle soon.

Very hydrating which I like but definitely pills. It’s kind of a weird consistency and if I apply my other serums or moisturizer too soon after it is quite pilly. But it serves its purpose to retain moisture. Good product for the price I guess.

Within a day of using The Ordinary’s HA serum, my super dry lips were so soft and plump, even on cold days or days with low humidity. On my face, I use 1-2 drops before my moisturizer, and my combo-dry skin feels smoother and feels a bit more firm too. After a few days, I noticed that some of my acne cleared up, and the HA serum helped to re-hydrate my skin. I’ve even used this on other parts of my body, especially on my legs post-shave, or my skin just happens to look/feel tight and dry. I’m currently using my second bottle, and this serum will always be a staple in my skincare routine!
Will definitely keep buying! Best hyaluronic acid out there

Love this product! Did take some time to get use to with how often to use it every week, but definitely recommend to be used for a more hydrating skincare routine! Always make sure to look at reviews with your specific skin type as The Ordinary carries products that may work better for a specific skin type than others, I’d say this is great for those with dryer skin!
Loved it! It took my skin a few days to get used to, but now it makes my skin feel soft and plump.
Best priced and high quality serum. I have such sensitive skin and this was such a pleasant surprise! Would recommend to anyone trying to find a good priced serum!!

My skin is acne prone and currently very dry from benzoyl peroxide and differin. I like using this as a base to all my skin care, followed by moisturizer and then differin. It layers really nicely and my skin drinks it up right away because it’s so dry atm! Definitely recommend for those of you with dry or acne prone skin. This is better than Vichy for a quarter of the price IMO
This product is so hydrating, my skin feels so plump and nourished when I use it twice a week.
Amazing stuff, skin is glowing, looks plumper and is very hydrated. Love it, and its ridiculously affordable!!
For some reason it’s not letting me give 5 stars but I want to. MY SKIN DRINKS THIS STUFF UP. literally this is amazing my skin feels and looks smoother and so nice. Just get it
Amazing! Identical to ones that your paying $50+ for. I don’t think I could ever go back to any other brand. Well worth the price. Must have with retinol.
HOLY GRAIL - WILL FOREVER PURCHASE. Amazing for my sensitive skin. I love it so much.
review_title: Dry dehydrated skin? You need this.

review_text: LOVE using this on my skin after washing my face. My face feels more rejuvenated and just overall refreshing. This also helps with my smile lines. Make sure your face is still damp with water before applying this amazing product!
Felt sticky and didn’t hydrate it left some sort of film on my face
This is one of my staple items in my beauty cabinet. Unscented, moisturizing, and easy to mix with any other products. Love it
Honestly, I like ordinary but I don’t really like this product. I feel like it’s sticky and made my face to have acne. However, for the price point, it may be a good hydrating serum.

I’m late to the Ordinary game. I can’t believe i waited this long to start using their products. This product glides onto my dry skin like butter. It feels amazing to put on! I’m so excited to incorporate this in my night time skin care routine!!
Bought after a great recommendation. Is slightly sticky which I love. Great for that glass skin finish plus I truly feel hydrated with it.
I’m so glad I ordered this product it’s a great product I will be purchasing more  did not dry my skin out and makes my skin looks flawless.
Works great! Makes my skin feel really nice and refreshed.

A great moisturizing serum that is simple and very affordable. I had to dock 2 stars because this serum PILLS with multiple products - a sign that the other products I apply afterwards do not reach my skin and help it as intended!! Hence I use it only on my neck as a single treatment.
Great for my skin! Doesnt irritate, leaves a little dryness so I need to use moisturizer after
Really good and hydrating. I notice it kinda pills or clumps in baby hairs and looks a bit strange but I find it’s a pretty easy fix
LOVE THIS STUFF. I never want to be without it. It does exactly what it claims

I love this product. It does an excellent job of hydrating the skin. However, I only purchase this during the summertime because I live in Canada. Our winters are really cold so if I use it during winter it will dry out my skin. So I would recommend anybody who has dry skin living in Canada or any cold climates to purchase this product during the summertime.
After 1 week of use. I have big zits on my face. Who needs this at 62. Glad it was cheap. I’ll use it for my hands.

I’ve had this for about a year, and I don’t love the texture, it kinda feels like slime on your face. But it’s hydrating and makes my skin dewy and nice when it absorbs, for the price this is a pretty good product

Ordinary provides you with top quality products for a very, very reasonable price. I absolutely love using the Hyaluronic Acid as it goes on wet from the dropper and dries quickly. Seems to be helping my skin and for the dirt cheap price who could say no? Ordinary is really going to put the overpriced brands out of business when it comes to products such as the aforementioned and other acids/mixed for your face and hair. Top notch.

My holy grail. I prefer this one to the Inkey List’s 100%. Make sure to apply to a damp face. Leaves my skin hydrated all day long & has helped with acne (the cherry on top). Will forever repurchase!!!

Between me and my boyfriend and friends... We have purchased this product multiple times, haha. It is THAT great. I think it’s a great addition to my routine, it’s my first step before my toner. If you’re on tretinoin like I am, and you’re going through that flaky burn purge, it’ll sting! :cDoes it clear my skin? No, but it keeps me moisturized for a lot longer than before this product. It’s my holy grail - something I’ll repurchase for the rest of my life for sure.
Be careful if you have sensitive or dry skin. This product gave me a very bad break out. I stoped using it for 3 days and everything went back to normal.
review_title: Can break out sensitive or dry skin

review_text: Works...was shocked that it does, with the affordable price.

This company should be called The Unordinary.  There is no way we should pay $$$$ for 30mls of something that costs PENNIES to produce.  These are chemical preparations, figured out in labs, and made in factories.  They are not magic elixirs. At my age I am not expecting miracles.  Just some decent skin care that will improve things.  Only three days into using this so no changes yet.  BUT it’s relaxing and fun to try new beauty stuff, and it mixes beautifully with the rose hip oil (also The Ordinary) and also the HA lotion they sell.  I’m giving five stars based on the mixability and the price alone.  Totally worth it.
LOVE this product, it has really hydrated my skin. I’ll keep buying it
Simple, easy, affordable. This is an excellent addition to any skincare routine. Can be used in combination with a lot of other serums to increase spreadability. (Your skin will thank you!)

I am a bit of a skincare junkie and i never typically write reviews. I had to for this product though. I started using the ordinary in 2018 and my skin has been clear since then. This product is my holy grail product, i keep coming back and buying more! I don’t have many holy grails and typically when i run out of a product i try a new one in its place BUT NOT FOR THIS ONE! I swear this hyaluronic acid is magic, my skin looks plump and healthy and flawless! TIP: Hyaluronic acid is plumping so if you put it around or on your lips it gives a natural plumping without the pesky burning of lip plumpers!
it’s not that hydrating and it’s lives a tacky feeling it’s not the best

I’m obsessed with how this makes my skin feel mixed with a moisturizer!! I have recently just got into skincare and this is one of the few things some of my friends have suggested. I was a bit skeptical at first bc there is so much hype around the ordinary brand in general (ex: it’s affordable, the ingredients are exceptional and the packaging doesn’t look cheap) is it too good to be true?  But the truth is this is 1 out of the 3 products I bought and it’s amazing there brand is simply & straight to the point! my skin has never felt more hydrated, plumped and glowy. I also love the way it feels mixed in my daily moisturizer, doesn’t make it too heavy or sticky feeling which is a big plus bc i’m not a big fan of that slightly sticky feeling after applying serums 10/10 would recommend to anyone starting out in skincare

I started using this product a few weeks ago, honestly I’ve never been very disciplined with my skin care routine or consistent at all! Never used serums on a regular basis. After reading the reviews about this product I decided to see what the hype was all about and there’s no way you can beat the price ! My personal experience with the product is very favorable, my skin feels like literally soaking up the moisture after the product sets. It is a little tacky right after application but it goes away quickly ! I’m 32 years old just posted a picture along with my review with zero filters or retouches !

I really love this product! For the last few months i had really dehydrated skin and it was a perfect solution for me. Now my skin looks more like normal type, not dry at all.  I use it in pair with Payot moisturizing balm for sensitive skin. High recommend this!
I have some fine lines that show when my skin is dry and have generally dry skin, especially in the Canadian winter. I can’t leave the house without layering this under my moisturizer!
Love this product. I use it AM and PM and it hydrates my skin so well. Love the ordinary and is definitely my go to skin care brand!
If you’re reading this, this is most definitely your sign to get this ! I use this product almost everyday and I have seen such an improvement with my skin
i love this for hydrating and smoothing my skin!! i use it every day and my skin feels great and hydrated, not to mention how cheap the product is if you are wanting perfect skin on a budget!!
review_title: awesome product. love how cheap it is

review_text: High recommend this! Great product that is affordable. Hyaluronic acid is known to be very hydrating for your skin. I have combo skin that is oily often and this did not cause breakouts. I have to layer this with a moisturizer after
I really liked, it made my skin looks really glowy
Un sérum simple, efficace et peu dispendieux.Je l’applique sur mon visage encore humide et l’effet repulpant se fait sentir immédiatement.Je l’adore !
Amazing for the price and the size I love it, really hydrates. A Must in your routine
Very hydrating! Also noticed my skin has gotten much brighter and more glowy. Definitely recommend adding into everyone’s skin care routine.
Love love love this product! My skin is dry and this plumps up my skin and makes it glow!

I love this serum, it truly hydrates the skin. I apply on wet cleansed skin and it has made my skin SO much better. Applying makeup now goes on like a dream because this minimizes those dry patches I used to have all the time before incorporating this into my routine.
All time no brainer, affordable. Does it’s job very well, love it♥

Love this stuff! My skin is so dry and I didn’t realize how simply moisturizing my skin fixed a lot of my skin needs. Apply this product on DAMP SKIN. it retains that moisture and allows the product to sink in without being sticky. Once I figured this out this product became my holy grail! Makes my skin feel like it drank a gallon of water. Started with the 1 oz bottle and now I’m on the 2 oz bottle. And you only need about two to three drops (sometimes even less). There’s a lot of reviews about it being sticky and peeling so try it on damp skin before you throw it out. And yes it does absorb very quickly.
review_title: Use it correctly. HOLY GRAIL for dry skin!

review_text: I don’t know how it’s possible for my skin to feel drier and very tight after using this, but that’s exactly what happens. All of the HA some I’ve used before this felt hydrating and were quickly absorbed, this one takes a very long time to absorb. I do wet my face before applying it. Nothing in my skincare routine has changed besides the hyaluronic acid serum. I don’t think this one will work for me. I wish I could leave a review and share my personal feedback without having to recommend a product or not.

This has to be the BEST hyaluronic acid out there. It’s simple, effective, and affordable. Apply on damp skin, and lock it in with your moisturizer. Your skin will thank you. This product improved my skin barrier when it was completely ruined a few years ago. I had random breakouts and once I started to use this I realized that my skin was just really dehydrated. This is one product I cannot live without!

I would definitely recommend! I have combination skin and I usually have trouble with foundation clinging on to dry patches. After using this product my makeup applied on more smoothly. I do want to add I still use my regular facial cream on top of this serum but definitely feel the difference.

This product has really boosted the hydration in my skin (I have dry/combo skin). I use this twice a day on cleansed damp skin. You have to use it on damp skin and lock it in with moisturizer. The price point is also good too. I just wish I knew what % hylauronic acid is in this product
This has become a staple in my skincare routine. I use it morning and night. It plumps my skin and is the perfect product before moisturizer.

I have oily/combination skin and it’s not sensitive at all but this product made me break out. Maybe it’s supposed to do that in the beginning and with continued use your skin looks better? I didn’t use it daily and I stopped using it when I started to break out

So worth the hype!!! Ever since starting to use it WITH water (put a little water on face and hands, it wont soak in properly without it) I have seen incredible results at lightening speeds. Get this! Start using it every night (w water!) and don’t wait until you’re older - if you’re 20 and older, get on it!
Great product! Is hydrating and leaves your skin looking VERY dewy without being sticky or wet at all

I noticed an immediate difference in my skin when I started using this product, it’s been significantly less dry.... a little plump even! I always apply a mist first so that the hyaluronic can do it’s job and pull the water in. I did find that it wasn’t always sinking in super nicely, and when rubbing it in, it would leave an odd soapy/white cast. After that I started tapping it in (lightly patting my middle three fingers around my face) and found that made a huge difference.
I really like it! It is great for light hydration. It can be sticky but I don’t mind because I don’t touch my face unless I’m applying products. It makes my skin look dewy which I like!
This product is great and I notice the added moisture, but I can only use it when I’m doing a simple skin routine because it always pills!
review_title: Nice product, but pills when using other serums

review_text: This product has definitely been a game changer, it really soothes and hydrates my skin. Ever since last quarantine I have been constantly using it and I am in love.

This product has CHANGED my life once I figured out how to use it correctly. The directions don’t say this, but I got a tip to apply this to a damp face and apply moisturizer after, and what a difference it made!! My skin is normally so dry, and it has really helped with this. Can’t recommend enough!

I bought this as my first ever serum, and went for this one because of the amount of times Ive heard to try the ordinary brand, as well as loving it’s price tag lol. After having really rough, dry skin this winter, this honestly saved my skin from peeling numerous times. I use it depending on how dry my skin is, so sometimes i only use it at night, while other times ill use it both morning and night to get the nice glow it provides for your skin. When I use it as part of my morning skincare routine, I usually wont put makeup on over it because of the amazing glow it provides your skin. I paired it with the toner that the Ordinary has and i love the combination. I love the difference in smoothness and hydration this product has brought to my skin, def recommend!
This product single handedly changed by skin completely and for the better. I use it everyday twice a day and have found patting it into clean skin with your hands is the best application.
My brother used it and he loves it!!! he says it completaly changed his skin, he definetly recommend this
It’s a good product. Just very sticky after. I probably just put to much. But I would recommend having damp skin when you use it.

I love this product! I use it after cleansing and before applying moisturizer in the pm, but I know some people use this twice a day as well. It leaves my skin noticeably brighter after use, and over time it has really contributed to more radiant skin because of the consistent moisturizing. One note - always apply to slightly damp skin, so it absorbs better into the skin!! Took me awhile to learn that.
Leaves my skin feeling great! Will definitely repurchase
Love it for the price.  Use to use the one from Strivectin, but this is only a fraction of the price and appears to feel the same on my skin.

This product does such a great job at hydrating! I read through some reviews before buying and using and it’s very true when people say to use this overtop of a wet/damp face than a dry face. It works much better that way.
This stuff is amazing, I use a spray bottle with water and empty the contents of the ordinary into it. Great hydration.

This is a super affordable serum to add to your skincare collection! The dropper bottle allows the product to remain sanitary and be easily applied. Despite this, I have not seen a significant difference after applying it.

This product is nice, but it took me a really long time to learn that it will pill like no other unless it’s applied first thing to damp skin, right after you wash your face. Its fabulous in that case! But it has been so grossly pilly all over my face in any other layering situation (have tried it before oil products, after oil products, to dry skin, etc.). I’ve had other hyaluronic acids that I didn’t have to rush to apply before, so for that reason four stars.
review_title: Apply first thing to damp skin

review_text: My Favorite The Ordinary Product hands down! It leaves my skin moisturized and soft. I use it in the mornings after my toner and before a moisturizer with SPF.

I like to use this product in the morning as my moisturizing layer (after toner and before sunblock) and it’s been working well for that purpose! There were also a few times during the winter when I put it on my hands because they were super dry, and it seemed to absorb well.
GREAT MOUSTURIZURE IF USED CORRECTLY. MAKE SURE TO HAVE A DAMP SKIN BEFORE AND APPLYING AND YOU WILL SEE AMAZING RESULTS

I’ve been using this for about a month now and I noticed my skin clearing a little more than before which I’m SO obsessed with this brand now, I have been restocking ever since. I’ll upload a photo showing about two weeks later on my skin how it worked with my skin. I usually apply this right after cleansing my face before the heavier face creams–– day or night.

I have waited for a while to see the result of using ordinary products before writing my reviews. “Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5“ was ok on my face even I felt dryness after using this product and need to use moisture immediately. I may buy again this product.
Perfect for my dry skin! I put it on a WET face before my moisturizer and my face is juicy all day.

I really like this product so far. Not a crazy noticeable difference, but definitely plumps the skin. Read how-to and make sure to apply to damp skin then lock in with a moisturizer.

I tried to use this product by itself and also combined with other The Ordinary products. My skin was not able to absorb the product on its own - the consistency is too thick and ends up in crumbs when I apply additional products on top. Whereas when combined with my other two The Ordinary products, it seems to be work on my skin. However, I’m more convinced that the improvement on my skin is due to the other two products mixed in and not the hyaluronic acid itself. I only use a pea size amount and rub my hands together until they are warm and gently pat the product on to my skin. I tried to use the product on a freshly washed face and without layering additional products, but have not seen improvements. I would only recommend purchasing this product to mix with other the ordinary products and not as a stand alone product in itself.
no he probado otros, pero este me encanto se siente un efecto instantáneo y ayuda a que mi piel se sienta hidratada durante todo el dia,
review_title: indispensable para el dia a dia

review_text: the price is good but not works very well for dry skin. won’t buy it again.

This product is very tacky.  Not slick like other HA serums I have tried. This is my personal preference though. I’ve used it on damp skin to draw it moisture into my skin but my skin doesn’t feel any different after a weeks now.

it foams which i don’t like. don’t forget to make sure ur face is wet before you put this on and moisturize after application or else this won’t work!! by using water and moisturizer, you’re watering down the liquid to be able to seep into your skin and moisturizer locks it in place!!

review_text: I love this stuff! Especially with their vit C lotion. Together, they make the skin super plump and glowy. Five stars!

Not even close to hydrating. Maybe a little sticky, doesn’t hydrate my skin, flakes if you don’t rub it all in completely, pills under other products. Just not good.

Love applying this before the moisturizer.  You don’t have to use very much of any of these products to get great results.  I use the regimen day and night and have noticed a positive change in my skin, complexion, under eyes, and crows feet.  :) Love the price and that it is cruelty free.

review_text: This product is amazing. It absorbs quickly and hydrates the skin. The Ordinary’s prices cannot be beat. I like that it only has necessary ingredients in it.
This serum feels nice but I noticed no difference in my skin. I feel like hyaluronic acid is over hyped?  Or maybe it’s just that my skin couldn’t care less about it.

I am 30 and I still breakout so much plus I have acne scars on my cheeks! I have been using it for 30 days! This product has made a lot of difference on my skin. I havent gotten a single pimple and so far my acne scars are starting to fade away!

I gave it two stars because of the great price, and the ingredients really aren’t that awful, but for some reason this just does not work for me at all. I read the reviews also before purchasing this and when I saw people say it was peeling on their skin i thought, oh they are probably just doing something wrong, but no, it does peel, even when i put a moisturizer on top. It’s very very sticky as well, which yes I know hyaluronic acid is already pretty thick and sticky, but not as bad as this. Doesn’t even feel like it sinks into my skin, just sits on top.. Even though this is cheap, I would just try to find another serum to be honest..
I’m using this with the niamicide and i am seeing a difference!

I love skincare especially now that I have entered the 30s world. I began to use retinol, I have always had dry combination skin. Due to the retinol, my skin got irritated and dry. I LOVE THIS SERUM. I apply it right after I shower, I pat it on my face and neck. My skin not only looks, but feels so plump and healthy. It did not break my out. All of my dry irritated patches and the peeling stopped, some of my fine lines diminished. My skin looks so fresh. I have used the hyaluronic acid by The Inkey List and tbh I love them both. The Inkey List is not as eco friendly because of their tiny plastic containers. This serum does have a slightly tacky feel to it, but it subsides shortly after application. I love the glass bottle and the dropper. Not to mention this is BUDGET FRIENDLY AND ECO FRIENDLY. The only thing is I learned they were bought out by Estee Lauder. I really hope The Ordinary does not lose its integrity and change their formulations.
review_title: BABY SOFT SKIN TIS A WIN

review_text: I don’t find it very moisturizing and it peels a lot on my skin. I wouldn’t recommend, I think they have better products.

Hey I have eczema on my eyelids. I love makeup. Use this as a base nightcream after cleaning my face. Then I add other creams for my eczema on top (with no hydrocortizone) . It keeps the moisture on my face and my eyelids aren’t swollen the next day. I am 25 and since I’ve been using it someone asked if I was 20 years old and someone else said my skin is glowing. Results after a month.

The ordinary has figured out what other companies have yet to accomplish. No need for a litany of ingredients, just the things that work and no fragrance. This does its job. It plumps skin and I can even use it under my eyes. Skin care should not break the bank and women should not be fooled by a multi billion dollar industry that there aren’t  any miracles out there. I will always purchase from companies that keep it real and keep it affordable. Packaging is simple and the heavy glass bottle with sturdy dropper is appreciated.
review_title: No junk or fragrance or crazy price.. it works

review_text: Great product! My face felt softer after first use and paired with the niacinamide twice a day, my acne is gone after 3 weeks

This is amazing I have oily dehydrated skin and because of how dehydrated it was my skin looked dull and flaky and I had pre mature wrinkles at only 17 I used this for a week and my skin is completely different my flakiness is pretty much gone and so are the wrinkles and my skin looks so much brighter and my skin barrier has become stronger.

Highly recommend this product! Great pricing and it is sooo effective. I have dry skin, and this has helped my skin get this glow and allows it feel so soft and bouncy! Just a little drop goes a long way and makes your skin feel so so good!

Super non-greasy and soaks in quickly while still feeling super hydrating. Also awesome to use in the morning before makeup, as it absorbs into the skin and doesn’t leave a residue. I use The Ordinary’s rosehip oil before applying this (when I use it at night), and the two make my skin soft, hydrated, and super bright.Now a staple of my skincare routine!
Love this stuff. It completely changed my skin during the winter months this year and now I’m hooked. Absolutely incredible product, especially the price!

Super good serum! I have very dry, sensitive skin and a lot of products would irritate my skin. This serum has really helped with my dry patches. Before bed, I apply 3 drops of this to damp skin and let it set in before applying other products.

Make sure to either use right after washing or buy a facial mist, this product needs to go on damp skin! Otherwise the texture becomes very tacky and it will pil. This is a daily must have for my combo skin!
Love! The prices are astonishing based on how amazing this product is!

Straightforward stuff, exactly what I was looking for. I needed a medium for my powdered acids and wanted something simple so I wouldn’t have to worry about combining the wrong ingredients. I mix 3-5 drops with either TO’s Niacinamide powder or The Nue Co’s Vitamin C powder and spread all over a freshly essenced or misted face. It does dry out pretty quickly so work fast - like how’d you apply sunscreen all over your face. It can get sticky as it dries but I like that sort of “grip” when spreading it on. Will continue to buy and would recommend if you’re looking for a no-frills HA.
If what it does to my skin it could do to my insides I would gobble this up. Amazing product, cheap, effective. I spray a mist first, add a few drops then spread.
review_title: if I could drink this I would

Je l’ai recommandé à 2 de mes amies et je l’adore. Je l’applique 2x par jour, après mon nettoyant et lorsque ma peau est encore humide.
Doesn’t feel sticky and makes my skin feel so moisturized all day.

I mean is HA, you can’t really go wrong with HA. Had very dehydrated skin but with using this every day and night my skin has bounced back. Its soft and supple and less irritated. I use it under my serums like niacinamide, retinol and vit c, and if im using an exfoliator then i use that first and put this HA over top. and of course always moisturizer and sunscreen in the mornings.
This is one of my favorite serums. It goes on silky and dries smooth and clean. I really like this stuff!

This is a staple in my everyday routine. It glides on so smooth, and dries beautifully. Wearing alone, I find it gives my skin a dewy finish. Most your face, rub it on your face and neck and once dry you have to use a moisturizer to keep your face from getting dry. Your skin will be dry if you don’t follow these two steps ;)

With this, my makeup lasts all day. This is a game changer. It keeps my skin looking dewy and makes my overall appearance glowy. I feel more confident after using this because my makeup and skin looks almost photoshopped. I definitely recommend if anyone is struggling with dry or dehydrated skin, or wants their makeup to look better.

I started using (glycolic acid+buffet+caffeine+hyaluronic) along with moisturizers 2 months ago. I have an extreme dry sensitive skin and it’s hard to find the right products. this is perfect for a night product, but for day time wear it was a bit tacky feeling on my skin. it is great though for the price
review_title: i wanted to love it but it's STICKY

review_text: I’ve tried so many brands of hyaluronic acid and this is my favorite. it’s affordable and works wonders on my skin, especially in the winter. my skin feels hydrated, soft and smooth, and looks youthful. PS: the correct way to apply it is on damp skin followed by a moisturizer. if it’s applied on dry skin, it’s going to draw moisture out of your skin and dehydrate your skin. that’s why apply it on a damp face or after toner, it’ll draw moisture from the water or product instead!
review_title: GREAT PRODUCT BUT APPLY IT CORRECTLY!!!

review_text: This is probably my 8th or 9th bottle. I love it so much! I read some comments and I am unsure how someone couldn’t love it! I have used it incorrectly before and using it on dry skin will make it pill and flake yes. The best way to apply is on damp skin, and while my skin is still wet I apply my moisturizer (@olenabeley on Instagram and YouTube is the skin queen and that is how to do her 3 step moisture method with it) . I am in Canada and I have not had flaky skin when using this with a good gel moisturizer. I am obsessed! The key is using on damp skin for sure!

This is a great Hyaluronic Acid Serum, but ON IT’S OWN. Does NOT play well with others. Anytime I incorporate this underneath any of my other beauty products ( Vitamin C, Retinol and regular moisturizer ), it PEELS profusely. To the point where I look like I have dandruff around my hairline. I really love The Ordinary but will not be buying this one again. I have just purchased the new one by Wishful so hopefully it will work better!
review_title: Does not play well with others

review_text: Works well to moisturize!!! Honestly this one worked better than the inkey list one, but if you wanted to pair this up with a niacinamide, get the inkey list one.

I use it alongside the ordinarys niacinamide and it’s an amazing combo for clearing light acne and moisturizing my skin. Love it so much that I just ordered my second bottle!

hated this product at first. it was sticky and tacky. i finally learned how to use it properly ! i use this at night, apply a spray of spring water first — apply the product — then another spray of water. i then dry it all down with the cool shot on my hair drier. i promise it’s great this way ! 4 stars cause it took me like a year to figure out a proper way to use this.

I seriously love this stuff, I use it AM & PM every day hyaluronic acid doesn’t cause any negative effects used with any other product much like niacinimide so those two are always in my routine. LOVE IT! Wish it wasn’t as goopy as it tends to drip a lot while taking it out of the bottle and while applying it. Feels amazing on the skin though and I’ve defiantly noticed a difference in my skin.
I mean yeah it’s the best. Everyone uses it. I don’t know what it does but I know it makes my skin look so smooth
