review_title: IT MAKES MY SKIN GLOW AND HEALTHY

review_text: I’ve been trying to figure out what’s been making my skin so extremely dry and irritated, I didn’t think it would be Hyaluronic Acid. I took this out of my routine and my skin is back to normal. I already suffer from seasonally dry skin, this was no help.

I’ve been on a journey with this! When I first started using it, it would flake a ton and really dried my skin out. However, it worked well if I misted my face before and after application. After a year or so of use though, I felt like it wasn’t working for me anymore and noticed my skin getting a little red so I switched to another product. I will say that my skin has never looked better than when I was using just this and some argan oil! Perhaps it isn’t working well with other stuff in my routine :(

Disclaimer: Not a dermatologist or industry expert. I have repurchased this multiple times a love it! I don’t know much about serums, but I do know that I have dry skin that can sometimes get patchy and flake off during the winter. After using this serum, the dry patches were much smaller and occurred less frequently.  I think this particular serum is better than the Inkey list. Their hyaluronic acid is much more runny and I like the dropper feature!
review_title: Glad they came out with a bigger bottle

review_text: This is the super moisturiser for dry skin,You feel glow skin on next morning
Such a fantastic product. use every day. Highly recommend.
This product leaves a lot of what looks like dry skin but is actually dried up pilling product on my face. It makes your skin look crusty. Do not recommend.

I have to say I really wanted to like this product, but unfortunately I’m highly disappointed. I have oily acne-prone skin, and even after applying this HA on damp skin, it would always pill and never absorb. I tried so many different ways of using it: alone with a moisturizer and an SPF, along with other TO acids/serums, and it would ALWAYS lead to pilling. After that I thought maybe it just wasn’t for my skin type and it would work better on dry skin, so I gave it to my mom. She has dry aging skin, and usually products absorb into her skin very easily and quickly, but not this one. This HA was pilling on her skin too. I’m just sad we weren’t able to see the results because of its nonabsorbent formula. The only reason I’m giving it 2 stars and not 1 is because there are still people who like this product, so my review is by no means calling this product inefective, I’m just sharing my personal experience.

Started using this product sometime last summer, and it’s awesome!! I sleep on my side so I frequently have pimples pop up on the sides of my face that eventually just because red spots and it cleared most of them up within a week! I went through a period of a few months not using it and they came back; started using it again recently and they’re going away again! Definite MVP in my skin care.
Such an amazing product really make my skin hydrating!!
great product will buy again. helps sink and is very hydrating

Love this product.I brought this product a while back and it has lasted me for at least 3 to 4 months.I brought the 60ml and it has been a great add to my skin routine.I would apply it daily and could see that my skin has appeared more clearer and hydrated.
review_title: NEED TO HAVE IN YOUR FACIAL ROUTINE.

review_text: Optimal results, cost effective, my only note is that this product is a bit tacky when first applied so one must definitely wait a couple of minutes before applying moisturizer and foundation to ensure the product penetrates.

I’ve been using this pretty much twice daily for a few weeks and I love it! The texture of my skin has improved and I am beginning to see less of my fine lines and wrinkles due to the hydrating effect.
My all time favorite hyaluronic acid serum. Works so well, even in winter! I love using it on a wet face and locking it in with a thick moisturizer. Amazing for the price!

This is my third time purchasing this product. It provides extra hydration for my dry skin. I apply it on wet skin and put my moisturizer on top. Dries down quickly and does a great job for it’s affordable price.

Pills under everything. Not sure why the reviews are good on this product. If you use it under anything- foundation, moisturizer, spf, etc it pills very bad and thus is a total waste of a product. Will not be purchasing ever again.

I have super dry skin and generally love hyaluronic acid in products, and this is a good one with great value for the price. The only thing I will say is that I do prefer this at night under my moisturizer rather than in the morning.. I find that it pills / bunches up, which isn’t great under makeup. Other than that I did enjoy it, and did find that it made my skin softer than usual. For the price I don’t think you can go wrong, just test it under makeup!
Nice texture. Great packaging. Highly recommended.

Great for plumping the skin. I use this product to plump up my skin and I mix this product and a quarter scoop of The Ordinary 100% niacinamide powder to reduce shine on my face. I have very oily/acne prone skin and I love these two products mixed together before applying on my face. I have not had any breakouts using this combination but I do use chemical exfoliants every night in the form of BHA liquid exfoliant 2% (once a week) and a tretinoin 0.025% cream  (6 days a week). I have found the Elta MD UV clear SPF 46 is a Godsend for ladies with very oily skin.
review_title: This works on oily/acne prone skin

review_text: Love this serum! I have dehydrated, acne prone skin so I will take all the moisuture I can get, but I can’t use thick, creamy products as they tend to break me out. I pair this with my FAB ultra repair face moisturizer. Best combo!
awesome product, love how tacky it makes me skin look softer and more plump. Use this before moisturizer and you’ll notice a difference in a few uses!

This product is pretty good. I use it more than any skincare product I own. The consistency is so nice - it feels like liquid silk. Very hydrating. I havent seen any crazy results, but I do like the way it makes my skin feel and you cannot beat the price.
This product really helped my dry skin! I will be rebuying it!
A little tacky, but it’s to be expected. For the price, can’t be beat.

I have had dry skin on my forehead all winter and tried everything - adding a humidifier, following moisturizer with oil, even slugging/vasaline. This is what finally made the difference! My skin has been hydrated, plump and smooth. I typically have sensitive, acne-prone skin as well and this hasn’t broken me out. Can’t say enough good things!

I have to say I was a bit skeptical to try this product as I heard mixed reviews and it was tacky and what not but oh my am in love!!! I used to use the La Roche Possay hyaluB5 serum and really loved it until I tried this... this product has made my face feel and look amazing, I saw more results with this under $10 product then I did with the competitor for about $40. Will keep purchasing this!!
Adore this product. I was having really deep blemishes and just generally lousy feeling skin. I saw a huge improvement in the texture and clarity of my skin with regular use of this serum.

I can’t believe I waited so long to try this product!! I have somewhat combination skin, so never really thought I needed the extra hydration - but it has completely changed my skin! I use is AM + PM, and my skin has never felt so plump/hydrated and it has really helped with dry patches. I also have had mild acne for a while - and I swear since using this (in combination with The Ordinary glycolic acid + niacinamide) it has significantly reduced the amount of break outs I have been getting. Definitely a new staple in my routine!!
Love it. Used it after two other ordinary products and it left my face feeling amazing.
Hydrate tres bien la peau et pas Cher en plus.j’adore les bouteilles en verre.
Love this product! Use it everyday and it keeps my skin so moisturized <3
Keeps my skin sooooo moisturized and I use this every single day!
Ça hydrate beaucoup ma peau, j’ai vu une différence après la première utilisation
Amazing! Been using this product for 2 weeks and already see improvements in my skin. Love The Ordinary products!

I use this serum in the AM part of my skincare routine and found it immensely helpful to combat my dry, flaky skin. After just a few days use my skin felt noticeably less dry and tight. It does pill if you immediately layer another serum or moisturizer on it so it helps to take about 15 minutes for it to dry.

Jusqu’à maintenant, je ne vois pas beaucoup de différence visuellement. Je l’utilise 2 fois par jour depuis presque 3 mois maintenant. Par contre, le feeling de ma peau est tellement mieux! Moi qui a une peau très sèche surtout en hiver, je sens ma peau hydratée, elle ne craque pas! Juste pour ces raisons, je suis très satisfaite! Je l’utilise avec la crème hydratante Cerave.

I absolutely adore this product. The price is great, too. The formula absorbs fast into the skin and you don’t need a lot to feel hydrated. Be sure to use a moisturizer directly after using this product to lock in moisture.
This plumped my skin and gave it a dewy glow. I especially like the results after using it after derma-planing. I got so many compliments on my skin.

I have tried different moisturizing creams for years with no success. I had dry and flaky skin for the past few winter months. After only a week of using this product with a moisturizer there is a noticeable different. My skin already looks and feels so much more hydrated. I highly recommend!!

I kinda prefer this HA Serum over the Inkey List I have not try the Inkey List HA Serum I mean I been wanting to try it that everyone was so hype about it’s just well the Inkey list HA Serum packaging is so terrible like it’s nothing like the ordinary serum packaging like just a serum glass bottle but when I use this I think I got some hydration I don’t know I don’t mind the stickiness but I feel like this serum hydrate me also don’t ever buy serums like TJ MaXX or Ross because when I bought serums there it was really watery but this serum feels like a serum not watery but overall a great serum

Everyone has different skin. For me, this product made my skin purge(small break out one side)  like crazy, then I stopped using it for 1 week. I have normal to dry skin, and once I applied this my skin felt plump and hydrated but the small pimples were popping out of my skin; then they dried up. I am still using it to figure it out if it’s working or making my skin break out. I’ll say this- anything with any chemicals will always have a reaction on skin. Be careful. Try it and if it doesn’t work- return it or toss it. It’s a 6/10.
I love the packaging because it’s glass and the formulation is hydrating. Might notice some stickiness but it’s not an issue since I go over with a moisturizer anyways. Good price.
I mix just a small drop of this with my aquaphor healing ointment to help with my extreme dry/ sensitive skin and it is working wonders!!!!!!!
Such an amazing formula - it’s not sticky, and it absorbs so nicely into your skin with great hydrating effects. Will buy again.

This is a lot better than the Inkey List in my opinion! I finished the inkey list one and wanted to buy another one but they were sold out! So I ordered the ordinary’s, and I’m so glad that I did. Both formulas are lightweight, but I found that the ordinary one sinks in a lot faster and it feels so much lighter. My skin is instantly super soft after it absorbs. I have oily and dehydrated skin, so hyaluronic acid is a must in my skincare. It didn’t peel or anything for me like some reviews said. I used it as a first step in my skincare after cleansing- using it on DAMP skin. I applied it all over my skin and waited until most of the product absorb, then pat it with my fingers and palm. Then I continue with the rest of my routine. Keeps me less oily throughout the day and makes my skin baby soft!
I really enjoy using this serum before moisturizer, it helps nourishing my oily skin without making it greasy. Definitely 5 out of 5!

this product is everything and so much more, its amazing for ur face, I use this product for my face some nights, my foot ( a crazy dry/burnt area on my foots side) and this hydrated that spot like a miracle!!! and overnight!!! I also use this on scars on the body or my knuckles that are dark from dehydration. the only thing BETTER then this is ALPHA ARBUTIN!! THAT PRODUCT IS A GAME CHANGER ON UR FACE OR BODY FOR DEHYDRATION, DARKNESS ETC!!!!

I wanted to love this product. This is my first time purchasing from the ordinary and I have heard so many good things. For reference I have extremely dry skin (eczema on my eyes and neck). This product made me break out a lot and I used it for a couple of weeks and it did not get better. I used it on damp skin but still did not find it useful.
Très hydratant parfait pour combiner avec une crème hydratante

Best purchase I’ve ever made. My skin is so soft and no more dry patches! I have combo skin. I use this with niacinamide, and a light weight moisturizer with hyaluronic acid from cetaphil and it does wonders for my skin! It’s great to help with extra moisture as I do use a cleanser with SA in it. 100% recommend this item.

when I first started using this serum I really didn’t understand the hype behind it.. until I started mixing it with my moisturizer. It gives it such an incredibly hydrating boost, makes my skin feel so healthy and gives me such a glow. I mix it with my moisturizer both AM and PM. seriously, my already great moisturizer truly doesn’t feel the same without it anymore... it’s a definite must-have. plus you can’t beat the price point. I recommend this to everyone! you can’t lose!
Not as sticky as I thought it would be, which is great. It’s a nice extra boost of hydration. Highly recommend!

Love this product! I recommend spraying water on your face or using on damp skin because it will pull moisture from its surroundings and if you put on dry skin it will try to pull it from your skin. For the price you can’t beat it!
Great price, great product. Just make sure you use it on damp skin, before moisturizer. Can be a hit or miss for acne-prone skin though.
I used this twice and threw it out after. It’s SO sticky and didn’t do anything. Spend the extra money and get something nicer

Okay so I see all the reviews of this causing pilling when being layered with other products. I in fact did have the same experience at first as well, but I think I figured it out. You only need a small amount, and I mean small. Size of a drop of water small. (Per section of face) A little goes a long way. The consistency of this is super sticky and thick at first, which dries down & absorbs quickly after applying. But if you apply too much (which honestly is anything bigger than a drop per section of your face) it will cause pulling. 10/10 after figuring it out.
review_title: USE ONLY A LITTLE TINY BIT!!!!!!!

review_text: It’s worth the hype!! I bought this randomly because I heard so much about it and I have repurchased the bigger size!! I use this before moisturizer and my skin has never felt so hydrated. 10/10 recommend.
It pills whenever I put a lot products...but it’s not bad if I can fix the pilling issue

I have been using this product for about a week and my skin looks more glowy and hydrated which is especially great for our Canadian winters. I also use the Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG along with this and between the two, I’ve notice a difference and it’s been only a week :)

This is a good product for the price. Definately not the best hyaluronic acid serum out there. It is sticky but this is common and once you apply your moisturizer it subsides. My issue is that you layer your skincare or apply makeup there is quite of bit peeling. Horrible under makeup. Otherwise it’s fine on its own with moisturizer.
Great under or mixed into moisturizer with an unbeatable price. Highly recommend!
Product was sticky and caused a break out. It may not be a great fit for my skin type.

I absolutely love this product. It took me a while to figure out the best application for my skin. However, after watching a Derm explain hyaluronic acid and it’s properties I realized (for my skin) I need to use HA after I’ve applied my other products, but before I apply moisturizer. The HA locks-in everything that I applied up to that point, and then allows my skin to absorb moisturizer. I have ZERO issues with build-up, tackiness or pilling. I just turned 40 and have finally found products (Sunday Riley Morning Routine, Ordinary HA, Belief moisturizer) that work for and enhance my skin.

I had multiple friends recommend this to me so I finally tried it and have loved it ever since. I have really dry skin and so far this has been the best thing I’ve found that actually helps and is affordable.

LOVE this stuff! My skin is dry/sensitive and I struggle with acne - this stuff has helped my hydration and even out my skin tone so much it’s incredible. It does pill quite a bit so I only use it at night but that it’s not a big enough deal for me to stop using :)

Using this as the 1st layer in my skincare i find that everything else layers on so much better. the trick is that your face has to be a bit damp when applying, either use a toner or leave your face a bit wet after cleansing. If your face is fully dry it will get tacky and not go on well. I have oily/combo skin and still use a good moisturizer ontop. It will not hydrate your skin on its own.
Quick results and more effective than similar products priced much higher.
Was very beneficial to my skin and improved my skin care routine a lot
Similar to the inkey list hyaluronic acid serum but I find this one to be more hydrating. I would recommend!
So far loving this product , barely a month and its helped me clear up a few dark spots and acne scars .
This hyaluronic acid made me break out. sad cause it’s affordable!
Needs to be mixed with a moisturizer. I have tried it by itself and it just is sticky and starts to peel. Makes a huge difference in my skincare routine. Highly recommend.

This is the first thing I use after I wash my face EVERY morning.  The key for HA is to have your face still slightly damp when you put it on. Then I follow with my Josie Maran products. Such a staple in my routine. Really helps my skin hold in all that moisture. Everyone should be using HA.

About a year ago I had unknowingly stripped my skin of its natural oils and had no clue. I was told this product would help and change my skin but it didn’t do anything. It also is really sticky which is something i personally hate in skincare.
There wasn’t anything that was crazy mind blowing about this product but it does it’s job and that’s good enough for me!

I fell in love with this product. I’ve used Niacinamide and Latic Acid from The Ordinary, and both have been about 4/5 stars. I didn’t notice crazy changes but I enjoyed the feeling of my skin after I used both. This product though, this is something different! I have combo oily skin and this product honestly covers all my skin problems- acne, dullness, oily ness, and overall jsut bad texture. Get it!
review_title: SO ABSOLUTELY AMAZING- QUICK RESULTS TOO!!!

review_text: Can’t believe this!!My skin has transformed with this serum!I was a bit skeptical for this to work but I decided To give it a try. I am so glad I did!My skin is so healthy and younger since I’m using this serum. I’ve been using serums from luxury brands (12 times the price of this one) and I can’t believe this serum actually works better!

I love this product. I’m already on my second bottle. I use it right after I take a shower and my face is still a little bit damp to lock in moisture. I use this with biossance vitamin c oil & a moisturizer. I haven’t had dry skin since! Can’t live without it.

at first it feels sticky when you apply it but that feeling last only for one minute. i put my day/night cream after and my skin now feels so soft and doesn’t itch anymore. works as well as my previous product that was $55.
Love it Great price and does the job! Highly recommend

Why would i like ANY product that can;t be mixed with ANYTHING!it peels off and makes me so mad because that means that i need to start all over again in order to look good.I use it in so many ways with different products and is always the same PEEL OFF resultEven if is the cheapest i will not buy this again never, i really prefer spending more money in something that actually worksOR CHANGE THE FORMULA!!!DON’T BUY
This serum was one of the first products I got from this line.After my first use I couldnt believe how soft my skin feels! Its a great serum to support your skin.
Great for problematic skin types. Bought in a kit and now use it every day in my skincare routine.
Provides great hydration and soaks into skin quickly! Doesn’t leave gross feeling/residue on skin.
I’m not really sure that this is doing anything for me. People say I have nice skin. I have been using it for 6 months.

I’m finding this product very tacky and not mixing well my moisturizers. It starts pilling on my face. Still trying to find what works well with this product. However you can’t beat the price of this product, hoping I can make it work for me!
Absolutely love! My skin feels & looks amazing. I have very dry skin & sometimes has eczema breakouts on my cheeks. This has been great so far and will last a long time.
Love how this keeps my skin hydrated and helps with evening out the texture. It does apply a bit tacky on my skin so I usually let it set for five minutes before layering on other skin products.

I have seen pretty dramatic effects using The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid. I have incredibly dry skin and adding this product to my skincare routine has definitely helped! I generally spray a water mist on my face before the serum and I have found that my skin has improved and become almost dewy with continued use. I also mix this serum with The Ordinary Lactic Acid in my nighttime skincare routine in order to dilute it a bit, so I am finding multiple uses for this product. I will continue to repurchase when I have finished this bottle, can’t beat the price and quality for this one.

I’ve tried a lot of TO products and this is the one that never drops out of my routine. It’s been really useful lately because I’m using tretinoin in the PM and using this in the AM under the Natural Moisturizing Factors helps keep my skin from drying out (a really easy thing to do in the winter!).
review_title: Helps keep moisture esp. during winter

review_text: TO Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5improved hydration. less fine wrinkles and smoother skin.
Made me break out like crazy... I thought it was my skin purging but it lasted a few months. I stopped using it and now my skin is clearing up, disappointed :(
Good product. Keeps my dry skin nice and plump. Very affordable.
Can’t miss this step in my skincare routine! Love it and so affordable.
I love The Ordinary. They are affordable and their products are easy to add to my everyday skin care routine.

I struggled with the worst dry skin in Canadian winters that flaked and felt tight, no matter how much cream I put on. Hyaluronic acid was the game changer and I’ve been using Hada Labo’s Premium forever until they reformulated. I ordered this as a replacement and was not disappointed. Is it sticky? Absolutely. Did I finish the whole bottle anyways? Absolutely.I use it after my toner/snail mucin and pat it into my skin until the stickiness goes away, then spray a hydrating mist and seal everything with cream. I just ran out and have already noticed a difference. I’m scrambling to order more because my skin looks and feels dry. While this isn’t the most cosmetically elegant formula because of stickiness, it’s cheap and performs well for it’s intended purpose. Will keep repurchasing until I find something more interesting.
Super hydrating and love the larger size, will definitely be purchasing again!
Good product! I will buy it again! Makes skin more smooth, after some period of use.
I’ve used this for a couple weeks now and my skin is more hydrated.
One of my all time favs !I see the difference, it’s a great price and has been a fav for a long time

I’ve been using this product for a little over a year. I use it every other night because it does show such a huge difference. I have really dry skin especially in the winter, and this practically changed the game for me. It does pill up when you rub other products in if you don’t let it completely soak into your skin. I love the hydration boost it gives, and you wake up glowing every time. People ask me what my secret to a healthy glow and it’s really this product. I do highly recommend using it at night with a thick night cream on top because the purpose of hyaluronic acid for the skin is to absorb as much moisture as possible and if it’s not locked in with something thick, it can absorb other things that aren’t moisture. Highly recommend, and it’s a must have in my night routine.

if you’re buying a hyaluronic acid serum, you’re probably looking for moisture and hydration. you will not find that in this product, in fact, it is slightly drying. i wouldn’t recommend unless you have very oily skin. also, it pills horribly under makeup and other products. with the ordinary, it’s hit or miss. this is a miss.

I love this product and use it every day. When I first purchased in 2018(or 2019) I thought it was too sticky and left a tacky layer on my face so I stopped using it. Since then my skin has changed and with regular exfoliation and being gentler with my skin, I feel this absorbs and hydrates well.

Hydrates really well. My skin instantly looks more...vibrant? if that makes sense? It’s really gloopy, so a little goes a long way, which is great since the bottle is miniscule. Just a smear off the side of the dropper does my whole face and neck.
review_title: Does what it says on the label

review_text: It pills and feels sticky. I prefer the Inkey list Hyaluronic acid.
I love how it help my skin complexion! I would by it  again!
Super sticky but great for moisturizing skin paired with a light cream.
I love this. It feels so good on my skin plus it’s cheap.
I’m not sure if mine is weird or something but it like soaps/lathers up?? Is that suppose to happen? I don’t know....
It is very good. Very good for dry skin. Put it on damp skin
I have dry and sensitive skin especially in the winter and it really helped my skin. A little bit sticky but it doesn’t bother me.
I have sensitive combination skin and live in a cold climate. This serum is super hydrating. It makes my skin feel smooth and plump.
Can’t describe how much I love this product! My skin instantly felt solfter and more moisturized! I then put my night cream over top and wake up with beautiful and glowing skin!

Didn’t do much for me, personally. My skin has gotten better since i started using The Ordinary products (I love most of them!), but I am not sure if it is Hyaluronic Acid that did all the work. It feels quite sticky on skin and makes it harder to apply moisturizer afterwards. Without moisturizer it feels quite dry, as if I washed my face with soap.
This product was easy to use and didn’t irritate my skin at all. I have pretty sensitive skin so I was worried how it would react.
Worth the hype! Goes on beautifully and a little goes a long way
I love it. It makes my skin feel amazing and so moisturized.

Hyaluronic acid works BEST on damp skin!! When used right, this is such a good product especially for its price point. A plumping and hydrating serum! The only SLIGHT problem I have is that it can get hard to twist/open overtime.

This is my skin after 2 weeks of using the Ordinary’s hyaluronic acid and niacinamide together (I’m just wearing eyeliner)! I have combination skin with mild acne. The only qualm I have is that it makes my skin feel a little dry/tight at first, but after using moisturizer over it that feeling goes away. You’re supposed to use it while your face is still damp to get the most moisture from it! I use the hyaluronic acid first, then the Niacinamide after it dries, and follow with a moisturizer and also eye cream at night. I use this night and day; it definitely feels like my skin is smoother and more glowy. It is unscented and an amazing value for the price.
This makes my skin feel SO nice and soft. Works like a charm for dry skin! I love using this in the morning before applying moisturizer and putting on makeup - makes for a lovely base.

I really wanted to like but I’ve been using for a week now and every time I’m finding it is pilling and flaking off which is disappointing.. I’m applied the thinnest layer and let it dry fully but still pills for me. I will say I did feel like my skin was more hydrated and kept in the moisture!
I absolutely love this product! I have dry skin and this helps to moisturize and hydrate my skin. It leaves a bit of a sticky feeling, but it’s fine after moisturizing on top.
I’ve got pimples after the usage, I’m not 100 percent sure that it’s because of that product but pros are not so big to risk. I expected more of moistrising
I loveeee this serum. As soon as I switched to the inkey list serum I noticed a huge difference. Will forever repurchase.
Hydration without any oily feeling! It is thicker and sticky at first, but it instantly starts to sink into your skin and your face/neck feel so soft. The Ordinary does it again.
It’s a little sticky, but it works! My fave is plump and hydrated.
Je l’applique deux fois par jour. Produit chouchou!
Just another product that is actually as good as they say.

I saw some Facebook ad for some miracle product to plump up aging lips. I noticed it had hyaluronic acid in it, so just for fun, I started putting this product on and around my lips. While not the same result as fillers, it makes a noticeable difference in restoring a prettier, more youthful shape to my lips and restoring a healthier tone. I put a balm over it. My lips are so much less chapped and look so much better. Now I’m using it on my hands too. I use a LOT of products, but if everything I buy, this truly gives the most bang for your cosmetic buck.
Not recommended at all. It made my skin more dry and cracky after using it.
game changer for my dry eczema prone skin! it skin is smooth, moisturized and plump

It has an award winner for a reason and I can say so myself this product is so fresh  and leaves the skin with a beautiful glow finish! I highly recommend it, I have acne prone skin and this doesn’t cause any bad surprises! You won’t be disappointed, I’m already at my second bottle and I recommend to use it before any heavier creams, give it a few secs to dry off tho

I don’t think this is a bad product, I see many people are happy with it. But I genuinely do not understand its use and benefits. I know its best applied on damp skin, and that it helps retain water and moisture but seems to be a very surface level product. It feels nice until it dries and then my face becomes super tight. Yes - you can and should use moisturizer/oils to keep/lock that moisture in, but this product does not leave any moisture to be locked in behind. If the product is drying my skin, how could it possibly be doing it any good? My mom also used this, but the over drying created deep lines/wrinkles in her forehead. So...why should I even bother? It just seems to useless (perhaps even damaging?)
review_title: Don't understand the hype or benefit

review_text: It’s a great first time hyaluronic acid product to try, and it’s not expensive. Personally for me there are better hyaluronic acid products (mainly Korean ones) out there, but this is a nice product too. Make sure your skin is damp before using because hyaluronic acid needs moisture to work the best. It does leave my skin plump and dewy looking.
Hydrate en profondeur et rend la peau pulpeuse!!!!
This is way better than the inky list one, and it’s even cheaper! Love love love.
Muy bueno , es el tercero que compro , lo recomiendo.
Can’t live without this stuff now. Put it all over my face day and night and even under my eyes I’ve notice my dark circles have gone down. Definitely a must have.

I really love how simple the ordinary products are, you aren’t paying for fluff, you are getting the simple ingredients. I don’t think this will give you a drastic change unless you implement this into a stricter regime. I put this on after moisturizing and it seems to help lock in the moisture.
I love this! Cheap and very effective. Sinks into skin. Packaging cool. Why pay hundreds for a the same ingredient? I am trying their retinol now too.

This serum is a must have in my beauty regimen. I have extremely dry skin and winter months of MN makes it even harder for my skin to retain moisture but ever since I started using this serum, my skin feels hydrated and doesn’t feel as dry as it used to. This serum is a magic in a bottle. Love the whole line of ordinary products.
will forever live, breathe, and die by this. it’s so good and takes care of any dehydration in your skin, highly recommended!! thank you hyram

This stuff is great! Even better...SO affordable! I use it on my face some but actually more for my stretch marks on my stomach (thanks to my kids-they’re lucky I love them ;)). I do microneedling and then apply this after a few times a week and other days just apply to my skin morning and night. It is definitely helping tighten my skin and I am happy with that! I have recommended to several people. One friend said she uses it on her face religiously and it has cleared up dry eczema patches she had been dealing with for years.
I love this stuff, I use this and the buffet in the am, and my skin always feels nice and tight for the whole day!!! highly recommend
Didn’t work great for my skin type but a fabulous product.

I love the formula, but always heard noise at the bottom of the bottle. Thought it was a metal ball that can be found in the bottom of some products. I just finished the bottle and was trying to get the last bit so I open the bottle and poured the remainder in my hand. I was shocked that there was a broken glass syringe in it, but it wasn’t because my syringe from the bottle was broken. Someone during manufacturing must have broken it and left it in the formula to just replace it with one that wasn’t broken. I love how cheap the products are but not at the cost of quality controls.

I bought this product along with the Ordinary The Buffet which I use at night and this one in the morning. I am 45 and my skin is starting to look a little winter grey with sun damage and fine lines. Immediately after using this product I noticed a huge difference in my hydration. Is it helping with fine lines? Not sure but I like the way my skin looks and feels and that’s enough for me.
This product is incredible!! LOVE IT! I have been using it for a few days and I can already see results!
I noticed a big difference in my skin within 2 weeks! What a great price!

I actually disliked this product at first. Got it over the summer when it was humid and applied way too much where I think I almost over hydrated my skin which wasn’t dry to begin with. Caused me to also break out. Decided to give it another shot in the cold/dry months and it is a staple in my skin care routine. I learned to use only a few drops for my whole face and neck. Works really well paired with the niacinamide for me.

Love this product. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed. I usually use it at night after I cleanse, in combination with the (.5% Retinol from the Ordinary as well), before my moisturizer. I’ve been using this product for about a week and have already noticed a difference in my skin texture and hyperpigmentation. Sooo amazing for the price. Thank you The Ordinary!
Perfect size and affordable price. Leaves my skin glowing and feeling healthier.

I highly recommend this product for those who suffer from dry skin (including dry patches, flaking). I always struggled with dry skin especially during the winter time. But this product has done a great deal of help for me. Definitely a great product for harsh Canadian winters. I use it everyday, both AM and PM. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Like all hydrators it works best with moisturizer! I only use 3-4 drops to avoid excess serum from coming off.Rating it 4 stars because its a great product for the price. Obviously if you invested into more costly products than you would get a better result. All in all, great product and great brand!
Started using this about a month ago and haven’t had any dryness issues since. I pat it into my skin and don’t have any issues with pilling.
Love this. Almost didn’t buy it as I heard it isn’t a necessity, but so glad I did. I use it at night and wake up fresh faced.
It’s good for the price.   This product makes my skin feel plump and fresh.  10/10.

I’ve just started on my second bottle of Hyaluronic Acid (HA) and I’ve been using this product twice daily for three months. It really is a must have for your skincare arsenal and if you aren’t using an HA already, I highly highly recommend buying this one from The Ordinary. HA is usually my first step after cleansing unless using an AHA or BHA toner. (In that case I would use HA second.) My advice and experience:- First I mist my face/neck with distilled water that I’ve put in a reusable travel size spray bottle that I’ve stored in my mini skincare fridge (yes I love certain things cold!)- While my face is still damp I apply 3 drops of HA and work in upward motions all over my face and neck. (Important! Make sure face is damp when applying HA so it can work it’s hydrating magic!) - Allow to dry for one full minute before moving on to my next serums. Once applied my skin feels completely hydrated, looks dewy (but feels dry to touch) and has the perfect blank canvas to receive the next batch of products. The packaging and dropper application is beautiful and easy to use and control how much HA is coming out. If you have a skincare fridge, pop this baby in there to have cold HA to apply to your face. (Not necessary but an EXTRA step if you’re feeling EXTRA - which I usually am!) (Your kitchen fridge works too!) TLDR; Buy this product! You won’t be disappointed and your skin will rejoice in all its hydrated bliss.
Love this product. Hydrates my skin. Goes on like a serum & sinks into skin so quickly! Love that it comes in 2oz size.
love it, moisturizes well, price perfect, I’ll order second one
This is the best new product I’ve found in years. I instantly saw a difference in my skin and have received so many compliments.
I love this product ,i can see a difference on my skin,I like how my skin easily absorbs the product.

I do not know what I was doing with my life before this product. It is so extremely hydrating and honestly feels so incredible on the skin! Love this serum - I use it and a vitamin C serum in the morning, after cleansing and before applying my moisturizer and sunblock. This product is the newest addition to my skin care routine and since using it, my skin feels much more hydrated and my fine lines are less noticeable. **One note though is to make sure that the skin is slightly damp when applying (from either cleansing or from your toner). HAs draw moisture into the skin, but if you apply to a completely dry face you risk the HAs drawing out moisture from your skin - which would dehydrate your skin in the long run. And don’t forget to moisturize right after to seal in the hydration!

Not a fan of this product - I understand the benefits of HA and tried this product a few different ways to get it to fully benefit my skin - tried to put it on first and then after it dried, layer with an oil/serum and moisturizer. Let me start off mentioning that I have easily dehydrated skin. I drink plenty of water, moisturize day and night, and always wear spf but not matter what I do, my forehead always dehydrates by the end of the day. I’m in my early 20s so forehead wrinkles should not be a major concern for me, but the dehydration gives me fine lines like crazy. I’ve heard plenty of great things about this serum and I believe in hyaluronic acid’s abilities to draw in and keep water in the skin. I use products with HA on myself and my clients but nothing I’ve used has given me the results this one bottle has. In just one day. ONE DAY. My skin looked so much better. The only thing to be mindful of is that it does peel when used with many other products and makeup so I would keep this to a PM part of your routine, or wait awhile before you apply your makeup so that it absorbs more.

I have been using it for 2 weeks now and I can honestly say it has made my skin plump, youthful and glowing to the point of creating a “foundation” look on my face the next morning. Only downside is it is very sticky on face which I read before purchasing but it’s easy to look past with how wonderful this product is.

Single best skincare ingredient to date. Skin looks plump, glowing, refreshed, and more youthful with just one application. Dewey, hydrated, AND diminishes the appearance of redness and blemishes. Even helps my husband’s skin which is much drier than my oily skin. Good for most skin-types. PROS: easy to control dropper, lasts for multiple applications. A difference can be seen after the first application. CONS: Too much product can cause pilling. Causes my foundation to oxidize, so can’t use it on mornings when I have events. However, this is great after you wash your face at night- just use a few drops and rub into the skin. You’ll notice a difference immediately. Nice price point.

Honestly, I’ve been using it for a month and it hasn’t really changed my skin yet. In the beginning, I used it night and day, on a dry face, but when I saw no change I asked around and learned that I should apply it on a damp face to activate it. Hyaluronic acid absorbs moisture from its surroundings into the skin, so if you apply it on damp skin, it will absorb the water. After I started using it like this, and only using it in the morning, I saw a difference. My main concerns were my enlarged pores on my nose and some breakouts on the forehead, and my forehead cleared up a little. I used this product with the 10% niacinamide + 1% zinc syrum and I think they helped each other clear up my skin! I haven’t seen a difference in my pores, but I will be consistent with the product and hope it works its magic.

Very good for dry skin. I have atopic dermatitis (eczema) and this products saved my life. However, you want to put it on damp skin because it will get sticky if not. I use a daily mosturizer called Base Glaxal Vitamin E after putting on the hyaluronic acid. I’ve never experience any irritation, any redness or even inflammatory symptoms. Would 100% recommend.• Use on damp skin• Can be use 2 times a day • Recommend to put mosturizer after• Gentle on the skin

There are certain products you can layer this with, you just have to exeriment and figure out which. I don’t use this all over my face only certain areas, because I just can’t stand the sticky feeling.  I also have acne on my chin, and I’ve noticed this serum causes them to be more inflamed.  It’s not SUPER moisturizing, so just get a good moisturizer for the winter.  It is good for the spring/summer when you don’t want something too heavy.  Won’t be purchasing again but it’s good to know that hyaluronic acid is not for me (even though experts say it’s gentle for all skin types and daily use).

I sometimes will wait 15 minutes before applying any other products but even that does not seem to work. Even applying just the serum with nothing over it seems to result in peeling.

I’m 30 and use Rx benzoyl peroxide + clindamycin to treat acne, which works well but also can cause my skin to cycle thru bouts of red, itchy, flaky dryness. If I apply it after my Rx in the morning, I’ll wait 5-10mins for the Rx to dry then spritz my face with water before applying the serum and sealing in with moisturizer. If applied at night I use after cleansing on damp skin. I do find it really helps with the dryness by giving my moisturizer a boost, and the price is spectacular.
review_title: use on damp skin, gives moisturizer a boost

review_text: I have oily skin, but I found that during the night, my skin would get dry and almost flaky, which is weird. After looking around a bit, I came across this product. I tried it out and I was very pleasantly surprised! It leaves my skin slightly tacky after applying it, but after moisturizer, it’s fine. In the morning, my skin is soft, dewy, and hydrated. I do think that during the day, it’s not a good idea for me, just because my skin is oily, but it’s great for overnight usage. Definitely recommend for dry/normal/combination skin. If you’re like me and have drier skin overnight, I think it’s worth a try!
This product really does hydrate your skin. It is a little sticky and drips so you have to be careful when applying it. But it is working well for my skin.

Make sure that your skin is damp then apply it. Otherwise it can do the opposite and pull moisture from your face. Then seal the moisture with a moisturizer. I didn’t realize this before. This product worked way better than the glossier one for me. It’s more hydrating and way cheaper.

Regardless, it does feel sticky/tacky when I put it on and it does pill if applying other product on top. Again, overall not bad for the price, but I’ll finish the bottle and move on to try a different moisturizer.

It’s more like, 3.5 stars. It feels more hydrating in the summer when my oily skin will help me out. Now during the winter, my skin is drier and I have to use another moisturizer on top of this to make sure my skin doesn’t feel tight. Regardless, it does feel sticky/tacky when I put it on and it does pill if applying other product on top. Again, overall not bad for the price, but I’ll finish the bottle and move on to try a different moisturizer.

I have super dry skin and this has made a wonderful difference! It looks so plump and feels so hydrated. You have to use it right, otherwise it doesn’t work well. Personally, I found that applying it in a steamy bathroom on wet skin, applying a generous amount of lotion, then a heavier cream does the job great! I always felt like lotion and creams didn’t deeply hydrate my skin, but now with this, my skin soaks the lotion right up! I have to reapply lotion often, but I can’t complain, because my skins looks so good and feels so much better now.  My fine lines have improved.I would recommend to people with dry skin that lotions and creams alone don’t seem to hydrate. But beware! You will be using extra lotion.

For the price, this product is great. I like how plump my skin looks after using this, and it really does help hydrate my skin! The issues I have are that it feels sticky and also pills, so that is why I’m giving this product 3 stars. Since this product is so affordable, I really can’t complain, just some small things that I didn’t like, but this product does its job.

A simple, feel-good addition to anyone’s skincare routine. The Ordinary HA plays well with all sorts of skin types, cleansers, actives, etc... and experience-wise it’s also honestly just nice to use. Quick-absorbing, pleasant, plumping! I find HA works as an ideal base layer for me when my face is damp before applying other serums.
review_title: Hit refresh on your skin with this HA

review_text: Nothing special about it. Very sticky and peels/pills really bad after it dries even after applying moisturizer so I wake up in the morning with flakes of this serum stuck to my eyebrows and other parts of my face. It looks like dry dead skin but it’s actually this serum. It pills/flakes even when simply trying to apply moisturizer on top of the serum. I will finish the bottle but will not repurchase. Trying the inkey list HA serum next to see if it’s a better formulation.
very good quality, just when applied the acid is quite dry on the face. Always have to put moisturizer on afterwards.
Love this product! Such a great addition to my routine. It leaves my skin sooo moisturized!
My face turns dry three hours after application. I don’t think this is that useful in terms of hydration. However, for its affordable price I think giving it a try would be worth it.

This stuff makes my skin so plump and dewy. You need to understand it to use it though, as hyaluronic acid can dry your skin out if used improperly. It draws moisture from the air but if the air is dry, it can actually pull moisture from your skin and cause dryness. It works best in humid climates where there’s lots of moisture in the air, but you can use it in dry climates too with a few tricks. First, I put it on while my face is wet, not damp, and let it sink in for a few mins. Then I put a super hydrating moisturizer on top and then seal it all in with an oil or a small amount of cerave healing ointment. This helps with water loss, keeping the moisture in your skin. So far this method has worked well for me in the dry winter climate.
review_title: Good product at a great price

review_text: Love this it help keep my skin hydrated. The ordinary products are amazing!
Hate it, doesnt do anything, its sticky and it get bizzarre after 2 months of use
I love this formula highly recommended , live the ordinary products
Love this product! Love the price too...totally worth it. I use it in the morning with the caffeine eye serum.
This is amazing. Makes look my skin so fresh. My number 1

Tried and true!!! I cannot live without this! It’s like liquid gold! I add this to my moisturizer and my skin drinks it all up. I noticed a difference in 2 days of use. I highly recommend this. Especially for aging and tired looking skin.

honestly this is not a NECESSARY product. but i feel like it is great in adding extra face protection to my routine, and therefore is a luxury i am definitely willing to spend money on. i will DEFINITELY be buying again.

Juste wow!!! Depuis que j’ai commencé à utiliser les produits The Ordinary, ma peau a changée considérablement, mais ce produit en particulier est mon préféré. Ma peau est hydratée, souple, je vais définitivement continuer à utiliser ce produit.
Love it!! Makes my dry skin glow and it makes my skin sooo soft!!!

This is a really nice product with a great price. Unlike other serums this one is not sticky or tacky. I can wear this during the daytime under my makeup without any piling. Having added moisture during the winter is perfect and keeps skin looking healthy. Did not cause any skin reactions. Definitely worth it.

When I first bought this, I had balanced skin so of course my skin hated it and made me breakout. It sat on my shelf for about 4 months. Now that its winter and my skin is dry as a desert... My skin loves it!!!

Is this necessary? No. But it is a nice add on to add moisture to the skin. My skin is very dry and I felt this product helped as an extra boost. I would definitely recommend this especially for the price

The Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 has been a game changer for myself. My skin type is combination/dry + acne prone. Every sense I added this and a few other The Ordinary products to my routine, my skin is so much clearer! I may have the odd pimple here or there during the month but my cystic acne is completely gone, GONE! It doesn’t hurt to sleep on my pillow anymore! This product brings moisture back into your skin, I’m pretty sure my skin was so dry that It was over doing it on the oils in my T zone and than caused me to break out all the time, This is a staple product in my routine and I highly recommend it, also very affordable and easy to use, a little goes a long way.
I love this, I have chronic extremely dry skin. This helps my skin absorb and maintain moisture.

i’ve been using this for a month now and i’ve been having amazing results. i have oily skin and this has helped so much. the bottle is small but there’s lots and i mean lots of product in the bottle if your using the right amount and not wasting the amount of product that you don’t need. 10/10 i love. i’m never switching.

I have been using this with The Ordinary’s moisturizer and sadly it doesn’t seem to be working well for me. My skin purged for 2-3 weeks and still feels super tight and dry. I’m going to try a different moisturizer to see if maybe that’s the issue. Otherwise I like that this product is not sticky at all. Sinks into your skin really nicely.

The best product for oily skin ever!!! For years I’m fighting with my super oily skin all over my face. I usually use always 3 oil-absorbing sheets eachtime and 3 times per day! This serum has changed my skin in like one week, I realized today that I only needed 1 oil-absorbing sheet to mattify my face. It’s incredible I’m so happy! Can’t wait to see more results. And the price.....wow!

LOVE The Ordinary’s products!! Got the hyaluronic acid small size a few weeks ago and I use it every single day. It’s helped so much make my skin feel more hydrated and plump and just overall look better. Bought the larger size and will likely be a permanent fixture in my skincare routine.

I love this product! I mist my face then apply the HA serum. Once it’s dried I put my moisturizer on top. It makes my face feel hydrated all day! I would recommend it and buy it again. I love the price too!
Safe for sensitive skin, helped me in the long term for my redness and pores
i pat into my skin and it works great. but be careful because the bottle is glass and will break if you drop it
I was suffering from acne (have been on accutane in the past) and this product cleared my skin in a few days. I wake up with pump glowing skin. I use AM & PM before their Natural Factors moisturizer.

I’m in love with this product! The best thing to happen to my skin ever! It hydrates my skin and makes my skin smooth! Before buying this product you should do some research for your skin type first to see if it is the right fit.

This sort of “foams” upon application no matter if I dab or rub. It’s also doesn’t absorb and peels later in the day. But it really helped to moisturize my excessively dry and cracked hands after excessive hand washing during thanksgiving.

Realistically speaking, I bought this by accident but it’s worked for my skin maybe the slightest bit. Nothing too crazy that I would recommend it to other people but I can say that this is very hydrating! :)
Love this!! definitely recommend watching skincarebyhyram on youtube!

If applied correctly this stuff is amazing! Previously didn’t like it and thought it actually was making me dryer... fast forward a few months later after doing more skincare research I tried it again applied to a damp face and the results shocked me. I had mainly been trying to calm my skin and clear acne hyperpigmentation and this completely changed the game for me. I have oily acne prone skin however this didn’t break me out, helped fade scars so much faster than they had been, and keeps my face insanely soft. This in conjunction with the cerave moisturizing cream works wonders for me. If you’ve previously disliked this product give it a try on a damp face it’ll change your mind
Great product at affordable price. I have used expensive professional brands from doctors offices. I like this as good or better. Highly recommend. I will purchase again

I have expensive hyaluronic serums that I’ve purchased and find that for the fraction of the price, I could be layering this in between skincare steps instead. I would not use this as my sole moisturizer, it simply isn’t hydrating enough. However, between my toner and moisturizer, this is is great for an added layer of hydration. Would recommend!

I have always struggled with dry skin. This serum has helped so much, I keep my face damp after washing and then I apply this. My skin feels so plump and hydrated after using this. When I wake up in the morning, I don’t wake up to flakey skin. I’m upgrading to the 60ml size. The only reason its 4 stars and not 5, is, because Some days, my skin will still be dry after using this, but that just might be my own skin problem.

I really wanted to love this; so much so that I bought the 2oz bottle.  I’ve used SkinCeuticals HA Intensifier for years, but was running low & decided to try a more economical option (thanks to 2020 hitting my wallet).  This just doesn’t do anything.  The SkinCeuticals is a ‘repair’ product that’s designed to not only moisturize, but plump & firm the skin AND help your body produce more if it’s own hyaluronic acid over time.  I switched to the Ordinary version twice a day for about 2 weeks without changing anything else in my routine... my skin definitely doesn’t feel as smooth & plump as usual.  I also find I have to wait much longer after applying this to add my moisturizing cream over it or it pills BAD (& I use the proper amount & pat it in).  I recently had a baby & haven’t gone back to work yet, so I rarely wear makeup these days but I seriously don’t recommend trying to use it on days where you will.  I attempted over the weekend to wear tinted moisturizer & it just balled right up.I’ll mention that if I let it sit for a while (like a few minutes vs my usual maybe 30ish seconds) it doesn’t ball up but it doesn’t make my skin feel nourished, moisturized, nada... the only real upside is that my skin can be sensitive & it didn’t cause any irritation.That said, I’m returning & have already ordered my usual SkinCeuticals

I was super excited to use this, however after using it for a week I saw no difference in my skin, and then it proceeded to break me out, and I’m still dealing with the zits it left. Do not recommend for those with acne prone skin.
Very Hydrating and a must most especially during the winter for my oily skin.....it keeps it soft, smooth, hydrated and healthy looking....I also mix it with my vitamin C cream and it does wonders

Great product. Surprisingly helped reduce my acne, which I wasn’t expecting at all. After about a week of using it day and night, I started to experience the hydrating effects of the serum. The serum has also helped even out my skin tone. The serum is a bit sticky, so maybe pat water on your face with a cloth first or use moisturizer over top of it.
This is my favourite serum ever it’s so affordable but it works so well. I recommend applying this on damp skin because I find it sinks in better.

I love this stuff! Before this, I was forking out hundreds of dollars each year for Skinmedica’s highly expensive Ha5 hyaluronic acid. Now, I only reserve the expensive stuff for special occasions and nights out. For everyday use, I use this product instead and it performs really well. It pumps my skin and leaves me with a glow that I love. I have recommended this to several friends and family members and they love it too. CONS:- It leaves a bit of a sticky residue for about 10-15 minutes after applying, but that isn’t really a big deal, as long as you give yourself enough time to let it soak into the skin before applying makeup.- It can cause pilling if not applied correctly. That can pretty much be avoided by patting it onto the skin instead of rubbing it. Other than these two small downsides, I feel like it’s a wonderful product for the price. Not perfect, but still great, especially because it won’t break your bank account.

This has been a wonder for my dry skin. It’s a little sticky, but feels great otherwise! Leaves my skin feeing hydrated and looking dewey. If you struggle with very dry skin like I do, try this product!

Very practical stuff,  everyone needs this in their regimen. First of all cost efficient, secondly can be used for everything and everyone.  I put it on my 5 year old sons face after a bath then lather him up with Vaseline,   Helps his skin from chaffing now that he has to wear masks at school.  I use it on my hand after I wash them to keep my cuticle nice and supple then apply moisturizer,  I use it on my face as a part of day and night regimen.  It’s just a layer after your toner prior to any other treatments or moisturizer.  Now thanks to finding the ordinary I can buy separate treatment at convenient price and layer my treatments with just and cheap face cream to seal it all at the end.
Left my skin feeling sticky. If you’re looking for a more water-like , thin consistency then go with the Ordinary Marine Hyaluronic acid

Avoid this and the Marine Hyaluronic acid serum like the plague if you have acne prone skin. They contain red algae (Ahnfeltia concinna). Algae almost always causes breakouts for people struggling with acne.
great for glowy skin. use it on a damp skin for best results.
Amazing!! Does not leave my skin sticky or coated with residue! It moisturizes before even applying a moisturizer!! My new favorite !!

I love this product so much, its so affordable and it hydrates my skin without it feeling sticky. I have dry and sensitive skin, and i find that it works for me. No scents, and absorbs beautifully. Already purchased my second bottle!

review_text: absolutely loved this. saw a big difference within a about 2 weeks of using. amazing price and super cute packaging, will buy again!

I am used to natural products and I am very picky about what I put on my skin but I do not regret giving HA a chance. I spray pure rose water on my face before using it and I complete with a homemade calendula serum and let me tell you that if my skin could talk she would thank me.
review_title: U wont regret buying it. If you do, blame it on me

Honestly i like it , for the price that u get its perfect not expensive , it gives a glow to my face , you should put it on a clean face ( use a cleanser ) and seriously after you will see the difference i think its a good investment to have in you skin care routine. I had use this product for 2 month and my skin looks very healthy and hydrated.

Jadore juste trop cette marque et je recommande 100% ce sérum, pour ceux qui aime pas ce mettre de crème c’est parfait puisque le sérum est vraiment hydratant qu’on aurait pas besoin de rajouter de la crème par la suite !

i bought the 60mL bottle and have been using it on my face for the past 3 months. i put the serum on every night and right after i use CeraVe’s moisturizer. i tell you not these two products have completely cleared up my forehead acne. this product also makes your skin feel super soft and hydrated. if you are struggling with forehead acne, this is the product to buy. this also completely got rid of all the redness and most of my acne scars have faded extremely.

I have struggled with dry sensitive skin my whole life. Due to dry skin, it is uneven and textured. Also my skin would be red. I’ve tried so many moisturizers and serums and nothing worked. The closest product that would work is Cerave, but would still need to apply their products 2-3 times a day. This winter has really made my skin dry so I finally decided to try The Ordinary. I got this serum and the Natural Moisturizing Factors + Ha lotion yesterday and I can already see a difference. Over night I have no textured skin. I don’t usually leave reviews but I am so impressed. Next I’m going to dry the chemical exfoliants.
Love this ! Great hydration and amazing texture ! I use it at night before my night cream. It’s wonderful to layer with my other serums !

It doesn’t play well with others. This product is good for use after microneedling or a peel, but I don’t see it having serving any purpose in a regular skincare routine.

review_text: Si vous avez quelques pots de crème pas assez hydratante ou si votre peau s’est accoutumée à votre crème de visage et que celle-ci ne semble plus convenir pour vous hydrater, ce petit produit est une solution magnifique. Ma peau est vraiment capricieuse, les crèmes sont soit trop grasses et me donnent des boutons, soit pas assez hydratantes et je pèle durant la journée. Je mélange ce produit à mes crèmes qui ne semblent pas être assez hydratantes pour moi ou je le met juste avant et le tour est joué. Ma peau reste 100% hydratée avec pratiquement n’importe quelle crème de jour!

I love this. I have VERY dry skin. Make sure to pat a bit of water all over your face before using them use your moisturizer after wards. My face is feeling more moisturized lately! Does leave a bit sticky after but it’s really not that bad, drys fairly quickly.

It took me a while to realize how much I love this product. It is definitely a regular in my skin care routine. The only downside is the way it is said to be applied doesn’t work for my skin. If you have sensitive and dry skin, either pat it into your skin when wet or mix it with your moisturiser for some added hydration. If I put this on my skin without mixing it with a moisturiser it leaves my skin very dry.
I have been using it since last four days. I haven’t noticed much difference but yes the application has made my skin a bit hydrated. Looking forward to see some great reults after a momth of use.
It made my skin very moisturized when I used it. But  it has a sticky consistency after you apply it

after using this product for a little over 2 weeks along with The Ordinary moisturizer, i’ve noticed a huge difference in my skin. it feels moisturized from within and less tight. i love this product so much that i have the 2oz bottle sitting in my cart for when i run out of my current 1oz bottle!
I have acne prone, sensitive, dry skin and this product doesn’t provide enough hydration to last even a couple of hours.
review_title: Not enough hydration for dry skin

review_text: 100% love this product! The price is amazing and it does wonders for my dry skin. Only downside is that I go through it fairly quickly but replacing it doesn’t break the bank!
Cleared my skin within 2 weeks. Definitely recommend buying it!!
Leaves the skin feeling great and I love that afterwards you can apply any other serum and then your moisturizer.

Amazing product. Always use HA on damp skin and spray water on your face one more time after you’re done with your routine. You will feel a huge difference. I find that people who find it too sticky usually use it on a dry face. Always use HA on damp skin... wet even and lock it in with a moisturizer right away. :) I’m not a newbie to HA, have been using it for years. Trust me, a great HA doesn’t have to be expensive to do its job. It’s the fast food of ingredients, it’s supposed to be ’cheap’. This product is amazing for the price just remember to use it on a wet face and try to lock it in with a moisturizer as fast as possible after your serums, spray water one more time and let it air dry.
Great price point. Noticeably amplifies any moisturizer you layer on top of it.

Isn’t the best HA i’ve used, but it’s ok. Feels kind of sticky and sometimes causes breakouts. If you’re looking for a good and inexpensive HA try inkey list’s. Much better feeling and i believe a bit cheaper
I absolutely love this!!!! I will definitely be purchasing this again!!♥️

Initially bought this to get my husband to start taking care of his skin at a low price point but After trying it, I sort of stole it back XD. This really punches above its price point and delivers some serious hydration and plumpness. We will be ordering more for sure. It’s definitely a thicker serum but I feel like that makes it easier to apply. So far I haven’t had any trouble layering it under makeup or primer!
review_title: bought this for my husband and well... I stole it

review_text: Amazing product!! Great price. Will definitely purchase again!!

I have enjoyed this product so far! I use it morning and night. It is slightly sticky, but does not bother me once it dries. It seems to moisturize and control oil at the same time! I would recommend this for people with combination dry/oil skin.
love this product. it has done wonders for me so far!
I have VERY SENSITIVE skin and this did not make my skin breakout! Apply this WITH MOISTURIZER for it to really work!

It literally did nothing to help moisturize my skin. It’s a very sticky consistency and then dried pretty quickly on the skin, leaving it super parched and dry. Layered with other products after, it seemed to completely negate the effect of everything after. Sure, this is affordable, but you’re better off paying more money for something that works than waste your money on affordable products that don’t do anything remotely close to what they promise.
review_title: Spend your money on something better quality

review_text: Amazing can’t wait to buy another one, felt very hydrated. Only problem is it’s a little sticky

I use this once a day at night as my base layer, before I put on any serums or moisturizer. I pat my face dry with a towel to get rid of any water droplets and then put a thin layer of this on damp skin. It can get sticky if you apply it to dry skin or if you put too much of it on at once, so be careful of that. I give it a couple minutes to fully absorb and then apply my serums and moisturizer over it. Once I started using this I noticed that my serums absorbed faster and that I needed to use less product, because it just glides right over the HA. It does seem to have helped hydrate my skin a bit, but that could also be due to the new cleanser I’ve been using. The formulation did not irritate my skin, which is very sensitive and acne prone. A decent, affordable entry level hyaluronic acid if you’re looking to try out an HA serum.

Decent, basic hyaluronic acid serum that doesn’t cost a fortune. I have never had a problem with it, and it seems to serve its purpose well. That’s the way I see all of the products in this brand, and I appreciate them. I’m very thankful they exist!
Not as good as I thought it would be, a good product but it makes my face sticky and I would honestly recommend more the inkey list hyaluronic acid
Definitely recommend this product, just within the first week of using it, my skin was looking and feeling better. You will love it, give it a try!
The texture is very sticky. No strong improvement seen.

I have used this product for over a month now. I enjoy the sheen this product gives to my skin, and it has left my skin feeling more supple and hydrated. My only complaint is that if you apply this on dry skin it will flake off and leave a residue. Make sure you apply this on wet skin and wait for it to try before applying another other product. Otherwise, excellent and I would recommend this to someone who is looking for an affordable hyaluronic serum.
Excellent product.  Effective and pleasant formula.  Price is unbeatable!

I purchased this product along in the small size to give it a try. its amazing! my skin is extremely hydrated and has a great glow to it. I’ve only used it for a week and just purchased the larger size!

I really wanted to love this, after all of the glowing reviews I have heard, but every time I tried to use it my skin broke out. I’m not giving it 1 star because it did hydrate well, but it definitely wasn’t worth the breakouts.

It’s a great product when used properly. I find it better to use it with a damped face. Make sure that you’re using other products that also works for you! (E.g. chemical exfoliant, makeup remover, moisturizer) at least for me, by itself it’s not enough.

This is the only hyaluronic acid that I use. I use it both in the morning and in the evening before my eye serum and my moisturizer, and I love it. It really helps my skin start hydrated, especially in the winter. This product is affordable, and the bottle will last you at least two months if you use it twice a day.
Great stuff! I wear it after cleansing at night, followed by the cold-pressed rose hip seed oil or Laneige’s water sleeping mask. Wake up with refreshed, plump, hydrated skin!

this product is amazing!! i love how it is so cheap but can do so much better on my skin. it has been only 3 days i’m using the ordinary products but I can already see the results. i definitely recommend this product. 11/10!! ♡

This product was the perfect solution for my dehydrated skin.

this is just average. for the price it’s great. i just expect a hyaluronic acid to add lightweight moisture but this is SO THICK. it honestly also did not leave me anymore moisturized and was super tacky after application. i love both panthenol (b5) and HA but i had to regift this product

I have really dry skin on my nose and chin so using Hyaluronic Acid has been amazing. I didn’t give it 5 stars, however, because I feel HA is only effective in conjunction with other products. So I use HA daily, but I need petroleum jelly at night to lock in the moisture, or salicylic acid to exfoliate. If only there was one, all encompassing product that would do the trick! Either way, I strongly recommend hyaluronic acid for dry skin and have noticed a more glowy finish because of it.

This has been effectively moisturizing for me. In my K-Beauty routine, I apply it after essence, but before serums. And I have found that it boosts the hydration that my combination skin wants. Affordable, easy to use, no-nonsense product, and my skin is happy.
I love it so much but I am not sure if its doing much

This serum has really helped to hydrate my face and bring it back to life, the only downside is that it leaves almost a tacky feeling for about 10 minutes until it fully absorbs. Overall it’s a great product and I would definitely recommend it.
staple product for clearing acne! must have for all!!!
Loved it, with dry and sensitive skin it really worked well for me. Would recommend for anyone, not just people with dry skin. I’m definitely buying it again!

I love this product, I use it everyday. It replenishes moisture into my skin and keeps it moisturized. It moisturizes your skin but it is not meant to be used as a moisturizer but. If you do want to use it as a moisturizer i think that would be fine.
This is the best product for smooth skin and gets rid of acne and maskne within days. I highly recommend it

Love this product!! The downside of this product is it is very sticky on your hands. but absorbs quickly on your face. One of my favorite products of all time. And the price? Won’t break the bank. Love this stuff! It gives me that extra layer of hydration and I used to have SUPER oily skin, like fried chicken! But as soon as I started incorporating this into my skincare routine, it’s been a GAMECHANGER! I no longer have oily skin and P.S. (if you tend to have oily skin, it’s because your skin is actually very dry!! So your body produces more oil to compensate for that, if you’re face is hydrated enough, your skin won’t be as oily!!) This serum is also amazing for all skin types! I tend to have pretty sensitive skin and this works wonders and doesn’t give me any irritation!! This is also great to use before makeup as well as it gives you that shine and smoothing effect! On my second bottle, and will continue to repurchase!!
Amazing, Seen a difference in under 5 min. it is 10000% worth the money
I have seen an improvement in the moisture of my skin.

hyaluronic acid is a magical product it does magical things, however, it pulls the moisture from your environment and then into your skin, it is not a moisturizer, but it can be just as good if not better in some cases, so if you life in a hot dry area, this is not a product for you, with all that said I love this product, i have combination skin and I love this product with all my heart, but tahts to me said for most of the ordinary products

I had been looking at this product for a while and today I went for it and I could not be happier. Long-term hydration with usage over time, but not instant so still use a moisturizer over top. I also LOVE the package. the dropper makes applying easy but somehow fun and entertaining. I use this one with the Niacinamide acne treatment which I also recommend. I also want to say that this one is safe for sensitive skin. Even on my most sensitive days, this is a good dry skin fix! Totally gonna buy it again!
This product is terribly confusing. It’s supposed to help hydrate your skin yet it made mine horribly dry and tight. Would not recommend for dry/dehydrated skin!!
Great hydrating serum. It does go on a bit sticky but It dries quickly. Blends well with other branded serums and creams. Can’t beat the price! Great to use both morning and night.

I’m so glad I bought this product. It has definitely helped my dry desert skin.I even stopped my skincare routine for a day to test how my natural skin was, and my face wasn’t as dry as it usually is w/o skincare.It is a bit sticky when it dries, but if you have horribly dry skin like me it will sink in eventually on its own, or follow up with a moisturizer like I do and the stickiness goes away and your skin will feel hydrated and smooth.
review_title: Excellent serum, especially for the price!

review_text: The best one out I’ve tried. Absolutely my favourite serum from the ordinary I can’t do without it in my skincare routine.

I LOVE this Hyaluronic Acid. After Washing my face morning and night I pat this hyaluronic acid onto my still damp skin before using my Inkey list eye cream, moisturizer, and the ordinary rosehip oil (plus spf in the am). I have combination sensitive skin and this is super non-irritating. You notice an immediate difference, but after a few months of daily use I find my skin to be much more plump and glowy. Much prefer to Marine Hyaluronics which feels like nothing.
review_title: Buy this don’t waste your money on pricier serums

review_title: Left my skin drier than before

review_text: I swear by this! It’s been in my routine for the past 2 or 3 years and I will never look for another hyaluronic serum. I have super sensitive skin and i’ve never once had any issues! Please try it

I could’ve been that or just another thing. It’s great for the price, and I use 1 drop per cheek before a face primer!
Très bon produit. Pas trop lourd non plus pour la peau. J’ai une peau sèche et je vois une différence depuis que je l’utilises.
