review_title: Already worked for my dry face spots

review_text: This is one of the best products The Ordinary came out with. Love
Highly recommend for anyone with dry skin. I’m on a strong retinal and this has helped keep my skin from drying out. Make sure your skin is wet/damp before applying.

Another product from the Ordinary that I wish worked for me, but unfortunately not. I have combination skin; and this made my skin oilier. I know that if you are in a dry area, the hyaluronic acid will draw moisture from your skin - leaving it drier, so I tried to pair this product with light moisturizers, but it caused me to breakout. It doesn’t layer well with makeup either. At night, it’s super drying - it’s not a comfortable feeling. I’ll pass. I’d still recommend it because hyaluronic acid is a great product for (if used properly), but I suggest you do a patch test because this formulation may not work for you
review_title: This formulation does not work for me

review_text: When I initially used it, it was so hydrating, but after a week it lost its oomph. But I still use it because it helped with my flaky skin.

This is perhaps the worst hyaluronic acid serum that I have ever used! I have been using hyaluronic serums for years, and this one is definitely terrible. Even after applying on damp skin it is STICY! Additionally, there are not enough hyaluronic acid weights to make this product effective. I found that this actually dried and dehydrated my skin. Do yourself a favour and upgrade to PTR’s hyaluronic, Glow Recipe’s, or Dr. Dennis Gross!

I bought this a few months ago ever since, i cant stop using it. Its probably my favorite skincare product seeing that i have pretty dry skin. Its very hydrating and feels amazing on the skin. It is a little bit tacky after you put it on though, so if you dont like that i wouldnt recommend, but if you dont mind and you have dry/normal skin I would definitely recommend!

nice thick a little goes a long way. it comes with a droper and it was filled to the rim. and all that for limited. i actually appreciate brands giving you all the bang for your buck. went well with derma needling so im pleased.
What a great product !!! A great addition to the other pieces of The Ordinary products !

Within days of using this product my skin has cleared. I have always suffered from dark marks but with this use of this product and other the ordinary products, they have gone down exponentially. Now I hardly ever experience breakouts. I use this product on damp skin.

I enjoy using this product. It can feel a little sticky, but I like that and it does go away after using another serum or after the application of a moisturizer. It’s comparable to any HA serum I have tried and it’s got a great price. A good basic to have!

Honestly this is the best product I’ve found in a long time. I’ve been using it morning and night for about 3 weeks and I’ve already seen a massive change in my skin. I was on accutane previously so going off of it was hard on my skin. I started seeing weird breakouts, skin dullness, and textures I haven’t seen before. Since I started using this my skin look plumper, more even, hydrated and I’m breaking out less. My skin literally looks like I have a filter when I take a picture. It’s that good!! My fine lines have also disappeared and the few I have on my neck are also a lot less noticeable!
Perfect product for my extremely dry skin! This wonderful HA has helped plump my skin up and soak up all the other hydration from other skincare products. Will buy again!

I’m using this after the ordinary mandelic acid and squalane and my skin is looking better after only a few days (I have dry skin and acne) but this product is definitely the star! Right when I put this on my skin glows like crazy. Great immediate result that lasts hours and hours, excited to see the end result of using it every day :)

This is the best hyaluronic acid out there. Well at least it’s the best one I have tried. This is the second bottle I purchase I really do love it. It really does aid in everything being absorbed into the skin. Remember we all need hyaluronic acid in our lives.

I’m 31 and have had fine lines for years already..after buying a ton of ordinary products and starting a better skin care regimen focusing on battling these age marks i definitely can tell the hyaluronic acid combined with a supplement of collegen is totally helping.i botox the forehead but i see a huge difference in my smile lines especially when I continually use this am and pm instead ofbtrading off with other products (I like niacinimide as well does wonders for overall complexion but your not meant to mix those two). I would totally recommend..i tell anyone who complains about aging to just try the ordinary products because the price is just incredible for the results.
It does what its suppose to do. It leaves the skin hydrated if your skin is a little dump, but if your skin is dry it doesnt feel like its hydrating so much

The Ordinary makes some great products and the HA serum is one of my favorites. This is my second time buying, and will continue to purchase. This serum really does subtly plump skin and you can’t beat the price.
review_title: One of my favorite The Ordinary products

review_text: Obsessed with this. My 3rd bottle. I use this before my moisturiser and it helps me boost my moisturiser deep into my skin. It helps to heal my ance so quick without leaving any dark spots or scars. Cannot live without it. So glad I discover this product

I like the texture of the product. My face absorbs the product really easily and it leaves my face dry. I think I have to give it more time to see changes on my skin. Although it has helped me with the white heads around my nose.

Love this product makes my skin feel super hydrated. It doesn’t layer too well with my vitamin c serum but other than that it’s amazing.

I love this Hyaluronic Acid.  It makes my skin smooth especially when I follow up with my moisturizer.  Works really well under my undereye cream.  Best results ever!

Best hyaluronic product I’ve ever used. Will keep buying it until I can’t. Tip-make sure that your face is damp before applying. Will make your skin feel yummy and plump.

Great price point and makes skin nice and smoothReally helps my acne and helps clean out my pores

One of my favorite products ever!!! I would highly recommend it to anyone, and everyone!!

This is an amazing product to add moisture to your skin. I’m oily and use this because it’s one of the view products that adds moisture without causing my skin to feel greasy or break out. I put a couple drops on at night and in the morning if needed, or after a shower. I wouldn’t buy another hyaluronic serum when this works perfectly especially at this price point. I highly suggest at least trying this before buying a $50+ serum for the same thing.
Had high hopes and tried this a few times but each time caused bad breakout.  Not recommended for acne prone skin.
My skin is so plump and hydrated now! I thought it was moisturized but since  I started using this, it has become less red and have less breakouts due to dryness.

I purchased this based on the many positive reviews, and I bet it works well...just not for my skin in particular.Its very sticky, and leaves my skin feeling tight and tacky. I put my normal moisturizer on after waiting for it to set into my skin. I suddenly had horrible breakouts on my forehead and around my nose, and the product was piling too. But after piling, I had dry flakes too. I stopped using it for a month and continued with my regular products. Once I tried it again, I broke out again. I have dry sensitive skin, I’m sure this product works for a lot of people, just not for me.

This is a staple after my essence, serum, or face mist, and then topped off with Biossance’s Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil which im using a lot lately... or Dermalogica’s Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF 50 (toggle between this and the Murad City Skin Age Defense SPF 50) if I’m headed outside. Topping it off with the oil before it dries completely guards against the tackiness you might otherwise experience, and seals I  the moisture. I was struggling with dehydrated skin before and this has really nipped it in the bud. Such a good price too.

This is definitely not the best Hyaluronic Acid on the market, it did nothing for my dry skin and it felt tacky/sticky. If this didn’t work for you, I highly suggest the La Roche Posay HYALU B5 SÉRUM.

As a person with oily skin, I loved this. I use this only at PM and I mix it with my other serums. My face feels more hydrated and plumped, with a healthy glow. I don’t use this during the day or before makeup just because of how sticky it is and I’m afraid it will make my face look oiler than ever. Overall I think it’s a great product!
Dry skin girl here. This does nothing. If you keep adding extra it gives a sticky base and that’s about it. I have no idea why this product is hyped.

The first time I started using this product I had a terrible breakout, and I thought the product was to blame and that it wasn’t doing any good for my skin. After my breakout subsided I decided to give it another go. Before I wasn’t using the product on my damp face, but once I started using it with a damp face, this product has changed my life forever

It has a sticky texture compared to the same products from other brands. But given the $80 price difference between them, I will take this one. Does the exact same think (hydrates) as the nearly $100 hyaluronic acids that I’ve used.
i love this product.  every since i started to use this product. I has been glowing. i would def recommend this product to anyone with dry skin.
LOVE THIS!! been using it only for a couple days and i already see a difference.
review_title: glass of water for your skin

review_text: Although it feels tacky and sticky at times, it works. Don’t need to use alot. Haven’t seen any signs of piling when using.

I really like it on my skin, let it very glow and I stopped using my acne cream, and use just this product, in beginning, it was peeling off because i applied it directly on my skin, after that I started put it after a toner and then do my moisturizer, worked very well.

A bit sticky/thick to apply, but makes the skin feel smooth and soft when applied. I’ve only been using it 1-2 weeks but my skin looks and feels lovely! It hasn’t been a dramatic change but so far so good!

In a word”amazing” The whole line is incredibly inexpensive and I’ve been to three dermatologist in the last year for adult acne and using the cleanser the salicylic acid mask two times a week along with this serum and then moisturizer has made an amazing difference
Looooove the Ordinary don’t use any other product now. Pure clean and does exactly what the package says. My skin is ten years younger thanks to the Ordinary!
review_title: The absolute best skincare line EVER

review_text: I used this for the first time and broke out. I stopped using it for a month see if it was the issue. I didn’t break out, not even on my period. Used it last night and woke up with painful breakouts so it was most definitely this. I wanted to love it so much.

I’ve been using this consistently for the past 6 months and it’s made a world of difference. I have super dry, sensitive skin and being able to control the amount of hyaluronic acid I can use in my routine is really key to keeping it moisturized and balanced. All of The Ordinary products I’ve tried have been great, but I continue to buy this when I’m close to running out. This is the last serum I put on before moisturizer. It does feel a little tacky at first, but once you put on moisturizer that goes away. Don’t use this without a moisturizer or it will just pull moisture out of your skin and make it SO much dryer.
Great addition to my skincare routine. Keeps my skin feeling hydrated while not feeling oily. Definitely recommend.

I just started using it today, once in the morning and once at night. My initial thoughts are that this product is very easy to use and very sticky when applying products over it. After it has dried down, there is a very obvious plumping of the skin. I have to observe how the product responds to my acne and texture after a period of time but so far, loving it.

It is insane how much of a difference this $6 serum makes for me. I have spent hundreds of dollars looking for skincare to help my redness and reduce my adult acne. Once I started using this... it disappeared overnight. How is that even possible?!
review_title: How can something so cheap be SO GOOD

review_text: I love the way this makes my skin feel after it dries, but it is a very sticky formula. Depending on what else you might layer on top of it, this formula also balls up very very easily

I’ve been using this at least once a day since I got it, it’s a miracle-worker.  I’ve noticed such a difference when I use it, the dryness I’ve been experiencing (I live in north Texas) is gone and my skin is much softer.  I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a hyaluronic acid product but not willing or able to splurge on some more expensive products.
Love the ordinary products! This ones in my daily skim care routine!

Game changer at a low price point! So I’m in my 40’s and showing some signs of aging. I’ve tried retinol as well as more expensive hyaluronic acids. I tend to get dry patches near my nose. Worse in the winter. This serum used twice a day has helped drastically. I apply a couple drops to my whole face. Let it absorb for a couple minutes. In the morning I then apply my makeup  as usual. At night, after makeup removal, washing and toning face, I apply this and follow up with my moisturizer. I added this to my routine a month ago. Didn’t bother or cause any issues on my sensitive skin.
review_title: New staple for daily regimen at great price!!

review_text: This is a good, basic hyaluronic acid serum, however it drys down on the skin very sticky and I didn’t notice a real difference in my skin. The stickiness could be good for make up if you were to use this in the morning, it does disappear however after app moisturizer on top. When applying to skin the serum doesn’t glide over either and your hands get stuck and don’t move smoothy,

For God’s sake, if I recommend it, I have been using this brand for months and no product gave me results even when I had a lot of using it But this one does not compare to the others, since you put it on it gives you a smoothing effect that by God is like a protector and as you use it if it reduces the lines of expression and leaves it and it looks so smooth

10/10 highly recommend omg. i have had the DRIEST skin for the last two years due to acne medication and what not. literally, i’m talking about dry patches, flaky skin, all that. it was not pretty LMAOO but this product saved my life! i’ve been using it twice a day for the last two weeks and my skin has never felt so moisturized. trick is, after washing your face, wet your hands and pat your face with a little water so your face is DAMP. after, apply 2-3 drops to your skin and rub/pat it in. it dries pretty quickly because it’s a humectant so beware! i wait around 1-3 minutes after and apply some BHA exfoliant and follow up with cetaphil cream. :) OH and i’ve been applying sunscreen daily in the morning! i think that’s also helped my dry skin a lot, i’m really dewy now :)
It’s honestly my favorite thing to buy! It works wonders for my skin, and it leaves such a hydrating feeling to it.
I do not recommend this product for oily skin, does not absorb well and made my foundation break and crease I had to return
This is an awesome addition to my routine. I live in a very dry climate so I always need extra moisture. This goes on easily and isnt greasy at all. I use it day and night.
I use this in combination with my other The Ordinary products (this on my chin/jaw & temples as that’s where I’m more dry) and my skin is looking the best it has looked in years!

It is a good product all around in it delivers exactly what it says it will. It just goes on so thick and I always get a lot of build up from it. Will not buy again due to those issues. It could be user error.
Definitely worth trying! Makes skin feel so soft and texture free! I have always looked for a product for oily acne prone skin & this is it! Works as a moisturizer

I’ve heard a lot about this serum and decided to go for it because it is so affordable. I have dry skin year-round and am always looking for a good serum to help with my skin looking flaky or feeling tight. I’ve used this for a few months and really like it for the summer months. You can wear under your cream moisturizer or add this into it. I think I’ll need additional hydration in the winter, but for this price, it’s worth a try for your skin. It is lightweight and makes a difference in your skin right away.

Great stuff easy to apply under moisturizer. Tightened the fine lines on my forehead visibly and the small lines around my eyes. I noticed a bit of a tingling sensation after application which is normal because I have skin sensitivity issues. I am in my forties and all I can say is god bless whoever made this.

Great price and I’ve noticed a difference in my face when I use it. I suggest to use after shower and not on a dry face. I spray my face with water mist before using it. A little goes a long way. This will be part of my permanent facial routine. It goes on after face wash and toner and before any creams.
Like it but could be better. I don’t notice a considerable “bounce” in my skin but it gets the job done.

This is a staple on my skincare routine! I use it in the morning and night (A little goes a long way). The combination of this serum and my moisturizer has been such a game changer for my skin. Would definitely recommend
Love love love this HA serum!! Perfect consistency, perfect price! Win win! I will be purchasing again!
Awesome product for an awesome price. Make sure to let the product soak in for a few minutes before applying more layers. You can literally feel the product soaking into your pores.
Use in the winter. Doesn’t affect sun exposure. Worth the price point. Use without any other product underneath.

My skin is very hydrated and “glossy“ in the best way after use. The only downside is that it is a bit sticky, so a little bit goes a long way. I haven’t tried to use it under makeup yet, but on days where I am just sitting around the house or running errands, it does the trick.

Decided to try and overall happy with this. Combo skin. I usually don’t apply serums, mosturizers mornings because my Tzone can get shiner and somewhat oily (mostly minimal, somewhat moderate) especially in summer. But using one drop of this in the am gives me a nice subtle glow to my skin and my skin looks brighter and healthier. Not oily at all! Maybe a little sticky first applied but soaks in and face feels smooth. This gives me enough hydration paired with my serum and mosturizer for nighttime. I had received a bottle of Dr. Strums hyaluronic a while back with a purchase. .33 oz. This size cost $110. I must say I absolutely love it. My face feels extradinarily smooth and hydrated. Much more than The Ordinary. But because of the price bought an alternative, The Ordinary instead. Maybe I will purchase the other one one day. But so expensive.
For the price point, you really can’t go wrong with this. It’s a great addition to your nightly treatment routine and infuses moisture.
review_title: Good product to add to your face routine

review_text: Got one for myself, one for my sister and one for my daughter. I have combo skin, sisters skin is dry and daughter has acne prone. We all use sunblock if that helps. Sister and I use twice a day, daughter once. We all have different shades of tan skin. This stuff has been amazing for us all. With in just a few days our skin began to glow, look clearer and very soft. Mine and my sisters pigmentations were a bit lighter ... not much but geesh we didn’t expect that. It made our skin tone so pretty. I did have to stop using my pigmentation cream because the combo caused redness.
I was using a way more expensive hyaluronic acid previously. A $70 product! I find that this works just the same and I find it settles into my skin better than other hyaluronics I’ve tried.

I have skin a bit more on the oily side, and the consistency of this is a bit sticky so I don’t use this routinely; but I love using this in the evening for a boost of hydration whenever I feel my skin needs it.

I use this everyday at morning and night. After I wash my face, I leave my face damp and add two drops of this to pat into the skin. It takes about a minute or two to dry down. Then I use my moisturizers. I usually have acne kick in around my period, but this stuff has kept my oils controlled and my skin glowing. A little goes a long way. If you look up Cassandra Bankson on YouTube, she has some videos on how to layer this with other products to get the best effects. Good luck y’all. :-)
review_title: Coworker said my skin was glowing :-)

review_text: This review is from my daughter because that’s who I bought this for. She loves The Ordinary whole line. This has helped keep her skin looking great and has helped with evening skin tone. She highly recommends any of there products!
review_title: makes skin look fresh and healthy

review_text: No bueno! It pills and did nothing for me, reminds me of my ex.
My dry skin is VERY THANKFUL I found this product by watching many TikToks talking about The Ordinary. Super affordable and has done WONDERS for my dry and irritated skin.
review_title: i will never live without this

review_text: I have been using this product for a couple months now and it is for sure my favourite Ordinary product. The stickiness goes away within seconds and I found it really helped with making breakouts go away quicker.

I’ll be buying this product again! It’s a great bargain and makes my skin look and feel more plump and hydrated. It does leave the skin feeling a bit dewy. I love this, but if you like a more matte feel, this may not be a product you’d like. For the price though, I’d buy it anyways and at least use at night. :)

I’ve been using this everyday twice a day for about 3.5 months and while I won’t say it’s any kind of magic potion, I do feel like it’s helped to balance my combination skin. I tend to get oily in my T-zone but very dry around my mouth, but I haven’t had many issues with that since I’ve started using hyaluronic acid.I’m no skin expert by any means, but some tips I learned that helped me to use this product more effectively: (1) mix a few drops with your moisturizer and apply to wet or damp skin. Hyaluronic acid is a humectant so it works best when it has some kind of moisture to bind with. (2) If you layer other products on top of your hyaluronic acid, you should wait a few minutes between products to give them each time to absorb. I also experienced the little flakes that many people complain about here when I first tried to layer rosehip oil with this, but a little internet search helped me realize that you just need to give each product a few minutes to sink in so that it doesn’t flake up. (3) Since we’re all (hopefully) washing our hands a lot, some of you who have sensitive skin like me might be experiencing breakouts on your hands. Hyaluronic acid has been great for healing scales and rashes on my skin, so if you get rashes on other parts of your body, maybe try applying a little hyaluronic acid to see if it heals it. Hope that helps!
review_title: Great for added moisture & treating rashes

review_text: After years of everyone telling me to save money and switch, I finally made the switch to the Ordinary. Well, it’s certainly cheaper. Was absolutely not what I was looking for. Thick, sticky, and prone to pilling, it’s worth spending even a few extra dollars on a drug store HA serum than this. The only plus side is the price point, but you’re definitely going to be getting what you pay for. If you’re really strapped for cash and trying to add HA into skincare, just use a cleanser and moisturizer that both have HA in the formula and skip the extra step.
this pills up under and skincare that I try to use it with. returning

review_text: I use this on my hands every night before bed. Right before I tuck into bed I wash my hands, apply this to the backs of my hands while still a bit damp (paying extra attention to areas that tend to get dry) and then apply lotion over top. My hands have never been softer.

I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Hydrating, lasts forever and the price is incredible. Highly recommend.

review_text: I’ve used this for the past 6 months now and I feel like I’ve definitely seen a difference! I tend to break out the most on my forehead, but since I’ve started using this, they occur less frequently and are a lot less severe. It also keeps my skin hydrated without leaving it feeling greasy or oily throughout the day like some other serums do. This also spreads very easily on the face (two drops is enough for me), but can leave streaks of foam if you rub too fast or hard. I like to just massage it into my skin slowly and gently. It is a stickier formula, but you don’t notice it after you apply your moisturizer, sunscreen, etc. Overall I really like it, especially for the price! The glass bottle is really nice as well and can be reused if you choose to. Will be repurchasing!

review_text: Gel serum that keeps moisture in and can’t beat the price. I usually use this product at night and it keeps my skin moisturized and supple in the morning for makeup
I think it works...skin feels slightly more moisturized than without it. I will probably continue to use.

I did not see any real effects from this. If anything it made me break out. The serum itself is thick and gooey...almost soapy when you rub it in. Doesn’t play well with other products. I was thinking about purchasing the buffer, but at this point, I think I am going to bite the bullet and just try drunk elephant.
I love the product but I dont know what happens with the white caps, are so bad quality.

For the price this product is really good for my skin. I’ve included it into my night routine and noticed a difference within a week, the notice was a early wrinkle I have on my forehead and after using this the change has been wonderful. Consistency is what you have to be to achieve the wanted results. The line on the forehead is less noticeable and it’s definitely because of the ordinary. I would highly recommend this product also it’s not harsh and a little goes a loooooonngg way. So go ahead and add to cart and get hydrating.
review_title: ONE OF MY ALL TIME FAVS

review_text: Was disappointed when I didn’t see an immediate difference but consistent use morning and night has lead to overall better-hydrated skin! I’m on my second bottle and will continue to purchase. As others have mentioned, always apply to damp skin and don’t use too much product to avoid pilling. I still always apply moisturizer on top. One star off because the dropper always leaks and the texture can be slightly sticky.
very good for hydrating skin and leaving skin feeling nice and even

The Ordinary’s Hyaluronic Acid 2% is a meh to me. When it arrived I was impressed by the size of the bottle. Not sure what I expected but the bottle is generous for $12 CDN. However as hyaluronic acid products go, this is a stretch to call it good. Maybe it’s the vegan aspect? It’s clear and super thick. Applies nicely and then I waited for the plumping and magic to happen. It didn’t. I’m in my 40s so I don’t wear much makeup anymore or do more than basic skin care but still, I was hoping this would be an effective enhancement but it didn’t really do anything that I could see or feel. By end of day there was a little roughness but it washed off. And in the days since of trying again it’s the same result. Friends, I’ve been around, so I’d say if you can budget it, go for Yonka’s Advanced Optimizer Gel Lift or, if you can still find it for sale, Visible Youth -- both hyaluronic products that WOW.

At first, I didn’t like HA. But I learned to use it after moisturizing not just on its own. After putting this one after a moisturizer it feels great! A little sticky but it’ll go away. I recommend mixing this with a Vitamin C serum. Overall good product for the price!

I’ve been using this product now for about 10 days and holy cow..... I use it twice a day and my rosacea has literally disappeared. I’ve been suffering for the last two years. I’ve taken prescription medication, and prescription gels and NOTHING has worked. I was about to give up when my friend told me to try “The Ordinary”.... I was definitely skeptical because it’s 1. Affordable and 2. Not a prescription..... but I will honestly never use anything else ever again. In 10 days my rosacea is literally gone.
it pills so badly, and i don’t even wear makeup. get the good molecules one it’s so much better.

Would have given 5 stars if not for the packaging. My skin is fuller and plumper for sure. It DOES take some time, consistent usage and patience to work and for a difference to be visible. Some of the bottles from The Ordinary seem to be deformed and don’t close very well. This is critical for the type of products that can’t be exposed to air and will oxidize. Guess that isn’t much to complain about since the products are quality and cheap, but it did mean I returned the malfunctioning bottle to avoid a product that goes bad and then goes on my skin.
Feels very sticky on the skin but I do think it’s helped me with break outs and dryness.
This really has given my dry skin the extra hydration it has needed and I love the price. One of my favorite skincare products that I will be purchasing again.

This product can be a little tricky but just as long as you know how to use it. When applying your whole face has to be damp. If not the serum will pill and sort of peel off like glue. It will do the opposite of what it’s supposed to do which is hydrate. Overalls this is my favorite serum that I use day and night and my skin is always dewy and hydrated.

I have a normal skin type. This solution matched with the The Ordinary Aha 30% Bha 2% Peeling Solution and a moisturizer has worked wonders for my skin. I use this product everyday and it leaves a noticeable difference over time leaving your skin super glowy. I definitely would recommend this if you have dryer skin during certain months.

It was promoted by everyone so I bought it without even thinking and the hydratation is good but the product is just too thick. It sometimes even coated on top on my skin and then blocked the cream! For the price, it’s perfect but if you are looking for something light, it won’t be THE serum for you.

i had been using this serum once a day (nighttime) for a few months now. recently i started accutane and began using this twice a day. I haven’t experienced any dryness at all! It’s crazy how well this works. definitely recommend!
This helped clear uneven skin tone. This product is amazing!
Not sure why but every time I use this product if I apply an oil or moisturizer after, this serum starts to leave flakes all over my skin.
Love the price - Love the product. I use this after my cleanser / toners and other acids. Afterwards I use a moisturizer. I have never had such a soft face.
This product works really well for my dry skin. I like how my skin feels decently hydrated after application.

This is my favorite product at the moment. I love how it moisturizes my skin without being too heavy. It mixes well with all my other skincare products. The 30 ml bottle lasted 2.5 months of twice a day use of 1-2 drops. I just repurchased in the 60 ml size since I love it so much.
review_title: you need this serum in your routine

review_text: Amazing product! After washing my face, I usually apply this product on my damped skin to allow it to absorb well into the skin. Highly recommended.

I went into Sephora looking for a better moisturizer to use over the winter, and while the sales person helped me find a decent one, she also recommended a hyaluronic acid serum to help treat my acne (dry skin can cause breakouts, who knew?) and recommended either this serum or the inky list. Initially, using this under moisturizer at night made my skin feel more hydrated for longer. Using it continuously (I recently purchased my second bottle) has made my skin more plum, even, and reduced breakouts, and actually gave my skin time to heal. While I might try to look for a serum with a few more ingredients, this is such a great product for the price point. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with dry, acne prone skin, or anyone who lives in an extreme climate!
This is amazing! I love this so much the only thing that I would change is it is a little bit sticky
This is my first time using Hyaluronic Acid and I feel like I have visibly more plump skin after just a few weeks. The product application itself is sticky on the skin which I am not used to

I spent hundreds of dollars on Dr. Barbara Sturm’s Hyaluronic Acid serum (3 bottles) and wish I’d tried this sooner. It’s hydrating, readily absorbed by my skin, and never bothers my hormonal chin acne. I’ve been using this twice daily, followed by their Mandelic Acid at night. I haven’t even needed moisturizer in humid weather. Love this brand.
Love this! It is the perfect serum to apply before moisturizers.

Versatile HA serum! I am currently on my third bottle of the larger size and it’s been a staple in my skincare routine! A great addition to heavy moisturizers at night & into foundations/ BB creams during the day.I find it works best when you mix the serum with your moisturizer on the back of your hand prior to applying to the face...otherwise it can leave a more tacky feeling on your face when applied alone.
review_title: Great Product for the Price Point

review_text: I have combo skin and have been using this for a bit over two weeks. Love how hydrated my skin feels and the plumpness/bounce in it!I wish I had discovered this much sooner.
Love! Using this for about 3 weeks now daily in the AM and my face always feels nice and hydrated.

This product absorbs into my skin so well. Especially when applying to damp skin. There’s an immediate look of hydration when you apply. After about a month, my skin saw a drastic change in plumpness. Game changer!

My every day go to! I love this serum, it always leaves my skin feeling hydrated but never oily. I have combination skin, dry cheeks but an oily T zone. Since using this product, I no longer have dry cheeks and my T zone is under control. This product also works great under makeup!

I have only been using for ~2 weeks, I haven’t noticed any visible changes with respect to smoothness but I will say that I feel like I am using about half the moisturizer I usually use, so it is definitely hydrating!

So good! Use this every morning before moisturizer and my fine lines have seriously faded. Absorbs well and has made my face so soft and less oily. It even re-plumps dimples in the skin after, say, squeezing a pimple like you’re not supposed to.
The smell is a little weird and is kind of sticky but my skin is much softer and more hydrated so i would recommend if you have dry to normal skin.

In general, I love hyaluronic acid. It’s my favourite skincare ingredient of all time. I’m also a big fan of The Ordinary and they make up a HUGE part of my skincare routine. So I can say, with total honesty and impartiality, that this product is such a miss and I really don’t understand how it won allure’s Best of Beauty in 2019. It’s literally the only product of The Ordinary that I haven’t loved and immediately pledged my undying loyalty to. I’d been using a Japanese brand of HA for years, but it isn’t always available online and is generally hard to get here in Canada, so I thought I’d try out The Ordinary’s HA, and I’ve never been so disappointed in a product in my life. It’s sticky, it’s thick, and it ALWAYS pilled underneath my moisturiser, no matter how little I applied. And don’t even get me started on how it made my foundation look!! So patchy, pilly, and just straight-up ugly. I tried so many times to love this product, but every single time I would end up having to wash it off before leaving the house because it just looked *bad*. I can’t even comment on the effect it had on my skin, because I couldn’t bear to keep it on long enough for it to make a difference.It took about two weeks of troubleshooting this product before I gave up and decided to go back to my tried and true. In comparison, the Japanese brand is soo light and thin. It soaks in right away, and I can apply layer after layer with absolutely no pilling. It is truly a holy grail product, and The Ordinary’s version will unfortunately never compare :(Maybe I would’ve liked it more if I didn’t have anything else to compare it to, but once you’ve experienced perfection you just can’t go back.
review_title: possibly The Ordinary's worst product ever

review_text: I have tried the Ordinary caffeine solution and the Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% peeling solution. This has been my third purchase by the Ordinary. I don’t really like this product, it’s sticky and doesn’t seem to make a difference. As much as I wanted to like this line I just do not see changes. A positive is that I do have sensitive skin and haven’t had issues with it making me break out. The caffeine solution seems to be the only one worth trying.
This product did not do anything to my face. When applying it feels sticky but it absorbes quickly. Personally I would not buy again.
Omg I love this stuff!!!!!!! My skin has never looked so beautiful. I wish they carried this in store at Sephora. Re-purchasing as soon as I run out.

I wish i read the reviews before buying or trying this. The first times i used it, it seemed going well. I went to the beach (which i blame part of this) and next day i got i sun burnt on my face (looked really bad) I continued using this product normally because I didn’t think it was the reason of the burnts. 3 days later i woke up with my face irritated, dry, itchy, “texturized” with a lot of bumps. After reading a lot of reviews I understand what’s the problem. I feel sad because I really wanted to like this product.

This feels nice when applying and plumps the skin. It does not irritate my sensitive skin. Can’t speak to long term effects as I have been using for a couple of weeks only. I love The Ordinary’s products. I use this after their marine hyaluronics formula and at night i later with their lactic acid 10% peel, between toning and moisturizer.
Love this product. Very hydrating! I use it twice a day and have noticed a difference in skin texture/hydration.
Love this serum for just a little extra hydration before my creams, without being oily like facial oils leave me.

This is such a great product. I put it on at night underneath my moisturizer. Every time I put it on, I notice a huge difference in my skin in the morning. Its brighter and feels less droopy. You can’t beat the price either.
loved it, i really like it! it is an essencial part of my routine
review_title: great part of my skin care routine

review_text: I’ve always had small bumps that aren’t SUPER noticeable (nobody has ever said I have bad skin), but gave me textured skin! They’re so small and there’s so many of them, most of it was caused by dryness. I’ve used a lot on my face but THIS is seriously removing them and I’ve only been using it for two days. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE use on damp skin. I wash my face, apply toner, then spray rose water to dampen again and apply this. Moisturizer on top so that it can sink in!
I put this under my primer right before i do my makeup and it makes my makeup look amazing. And within about 3 days of using it my acne cleared up!
WOW! This product is so good and affordable. It deserves many beauty awards! One drop is enough to do the magic. <3
This product is super good. I really recommended and the price is good
Excellent product at a fraction of the cost of the products from my dermatologist.  I buy this frequently and highly recommend it.
review_title: Great product at a small price

review_text: Excellent product at a fraction of the cost of the products from my dermatologist.  I buy this frequently and highly recommend it.
review_title: Great product at a small price

review_text: I love this product! The consistency is a little weird at first (it feels sticky and soapy) but when you tube it in, it gets better. It always leaves my skin feeling so smooth!
Didn’t like this serum. The texture is super thick and sticky and my face didn’t feel moisture after applying. But as for its price, I’d say it’s ok for body use but not for face.
So good for days when you need the extra hydration! I would take this with me while working in the field all day in the tractor and apply when I felt I needed.

does feel hydrating but leaves a film on my face. So I’m sure it’s not really absorbing to my skin but just sitting on top of it. The first time I used it, I thought my skin was peeling but soon discovered that its just the product lifting/peeling off. If I rub my face with my finger, particles come off like my face was dirty or like dead skin but i know it’s just the product. i generally don’t wear make up during the day but i can imagine this is a huge problem for anyone who wants to put foundation or anything similar on top of this. I think I will just use this at nights to avoid this problem.

I think for the price this is great - especially to test the long term effect of hyaluronic acid on your skin and if it’s an active you want/need in your routine. Overall the product is a little bit sticky/tacky after absorption but I didn’t find that a problem once I applied my moisturizer on top.Personally I’m not sure I need the serum as an extra step in my day to day routine for my skin type.

This product has done wonders for my skin!!! I have been using this product for months! I get small hormonal acne breakouts around my period, and this product has helped keep those breakouts very minimal/at bay. It has improved the overall texture of my skin, it is no longer bumpy and no random dry spots around my skin; in other words, it has truly balanced my skin. I have also noticed my skin is less oily in the t-zone and slightly minimized pores. This is really the ONLY [treatment] skincare product I use! (I apply moisturizer & SPF after using this in the AM, and PM use this alone after washing my face.) A little goes a long way, don’t apply too much or you’ll be sticky. I highly recommend this product to any skin type or concern. Using this has encouraged me to NOT pick my skin, otherwise, if you have broken skin while using this product it will STING! Do not pick your skin, PERIODT!
review_title: Reduces T-zone Oiliness, Skin Texture, Acne Prone

review_text: I found this product to be very thick and very sticky. It unfortunately doesn’t entirely absorb into the skin, which leaves it tacky throughout the day. I definitely wouldn’t use this for morning skin care. It however does what it should: hydrate. It leaves the skin very smooth and supple to the touch. I just personally like hyaluronic morning and night, so i’ll opt for a thinner formula next time.

I had to give up on this particular product because as part of my routine, I put on a layer of face oil as my final touch; I have a very dry skin. Unfortunately, the sticky hyaluronic serum interacts with my face oil in a way that it creates a white glob that can be visible.
review_title: Interacts with Face Oil and Creates a White Glob

review_text: Amazing hydration!  I do have normal skin, however I do need an extra boost of hydration, especially at night and during the colder/winter months.  This product can be a little sticky, but when I get amazing hydration at an affordable price, its definitely worth the mild stickiness.

Love this stuff. Helps give me that extra hydration after I cleanse. My only complaint for pretty much all the ordinary serums, is the bottle cap sucks. I always have an issue putting the top back on. It either gets stuck or doesn’t want to twist on. Two of my serums have spilled out because of this issue. Lovely inexpensive product though.

It’s not giving me any hydration. I used other serums that made my skin look great. This one I am not seeing a difference. It’s also super sticky?! However, I still need to finish the whole bottle. With other seems, you feel the difference right after you put them on your skin.
love the texture, and it doesn’t have any kind of smell, I love it
Broke me out really bad!I don’t know why, I don’t have sensitive skin. This made me get large red breakouts

I have dry and sensitive skin. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 felt so silky and smooth on my skin, my face was very comfortable with this formulation. My skin felt and looked hydrated just from one nights use of this formulation with my skincare! I highly recommend all of The Ordinary products. This Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B% has become a holy grail in my skincare routine! The price of the products of The Ordinary make my wallet extremely happy. I love that the quality of these products feel expensive although the prices are totally affordable! This is definitely worth the purchase!
Face began to break out after a few days of use - I thought it was something else but realized it was this product. Will return.
Absolutely amazing. I did not know what to expect but for the price my skin feels fantastic.
review_title: Buy this - you won't regret it

review_text: Great product, helps to bring moisture back to skin!

USE THIS CORRECTLY!!!Only been using for a week and I already noticed a difference! Skin texture has become super soft and smooth definitely looks moisturized. I use my toner and then pat this on right after while my face is still wet and then apply moisturizer right on top

When I started using this my skin was mostly clear and I’d get a bump every now and then. Since using this, my skin has broken out more than it has in ages. I have small bumps all over my cheeks and chin. It does help with moisturizing, but the irritation isn’t worth it for me. I’ve been using this for about 2 weeks now to see if my skin can get use to it and the bumps still haven’t stopped.
Great product that has made a huge difference in how moisturized my skin is, especially for the price. I use it in both my am and pm routine.
Loving it for my dry and sensitive skin. I have been using it for one week and I already see a difference in my skin texture!

I used this product for the frist time yesterday and I know I can’t have a fully review now but for what I’ve seen so far I can say that its consistence is a little too sticky so I was worried it wouldn’t dry out but it actually did and it was pretty quickly. It also left my skin feeling so soft right after it dried, can’t wait to see the long term results.

I live in a really dry climate and this product has really helped with the dry points on my skin. I avoid using it on my oily areas like my t-zone and chin, but my cheeks which used to be dry and rough are so much more soft and supple

i was so excited for this because the price point was great and i hear great things about the ordinary. it was hydrating, however i got a loooot of breakouts. like a clump of pimples on my chin and small white heads on my forehead and cheeks. i stopped using it for the last 3 days and my skin finally is going back to normal. im pretty disappointed and i dont want to waste the product, but i dont want continued breakouts.

This is hands down my favorite The Ordinary product and I’ve tried a few. My skin is so dry that it often feels like ant product just sits on top, but this sinks in quickly and really moisturizes. Will definitely be a repurchase.
Works well. Leaves a sticky residue but is resolved by moisturizer. Helps with acne and fine lines well. No smell or anything which is good.
AMAZING! Definitely 100% recommend. I saw immediate result. it moisturized and hydrated my skin quit well. My sin become much more radiant and glowy.
new holy grail!! if you have dry skin use this before moisturizing and you will notice the difference after a few days. my skin is glowing and so plumpy i love it!!
AMAZING!! I saw immediate results. I know pores don’t shrink however the appear to be smaller and my skin is so soft. Don’t over use the product, one to one and a half drops will work well.
I don’t know what the magic is behind this stuff, but my combination skin has never looked better! Just ordered my third bottle, can’t live without!!!
So good for the price ! Very hydrating serum ! Can be a tad sticky after applying

this serum transformed my skin. after less than two weeks of use, (using twice daily), my skin was SO soft and looked so much healthier. i myself am still in my teens, but i would still recommend this product to anyone who can get their hands on it.
Nope did not work at all. My skin just felt dry the next day.

This is my first hyaluronic acid serum and it’s lovely. goes on slightly sticky but I work it in when my face is damp and it quickly settles down matte. I follow with a light moisturizer. I noticed that when I was using this regularly, some subclinical acne on my forehead lessened but flared up again when I forgot to use regularly. so maybe that’s a con, but I’m happy with the serum itself.

I really wanted to like this and by itself it seems like a good product but it does not sit well under anything I put on top of it. Any moisturizer or makeup I put on top pills and I’ve tried using it with different things but the result is always the same.
absolutely love this product and would highly recommend it it makes my skin feel amazing when I apply it and it is great cause it can be combined with any other serum from the ordinary family
I use this at least twice a week and have seen my skin look brighter and less wrinkled.   It’s strong enough to Jaye a difference but light enough that I don’t harm my skin.

Expensive creams, drug store creams, pricey serums you name it I tried it to help quench my dehydrated skin. This has transformed my dry patches and roughness. I few drops is all you need and it lasts forever.
I have only used the first day and I can see significant improvements.  Redness has gone.  Skin looks way healthier.

I’ve had this about a month now. I use it in combination with a micellar water and the Natural Moisturizing Factors, also from this brand. I’m pretty impressed! I was worried because I tend to get oily skin at times of stress but this has kept me feeling good through it all. I knock off a star because the bottle sucks. The lid won’t screw on at all so I have to be insanely careful with it. If you’re fine with that, well worth the price to me!

I have combination to dry skin but this honestly makes your skin so smooth and less red. It has changed my skin fir the better and it’s probably my favourite skin care product now as its really good in the longterm for your skin as well.
So nice and hydrating for my dry parched skin in the winter.

I’ve been using this for about 2 week almost 3 and I must say it’s okay. nothing super mind blowing, I do feel like my skin plumps up a little but other than that it doesn’t do anything else for my skin. its a good product not saying its not but I don’t think I will be repurchasing. NOTE: 2 drops was more than enough for my whole face, when I use other serums and my moisturizer I had to control how much I put on, I noticed I started pilling so a little goes a long way.

I’ve been using this for some months now. It is a serum that is a typical serum consistency, but gets sticky as it dries down. This serum definitely needs to be paired with moisturizer, as it gets rather dry and tight when it dries down completely. I have noticed that I get blocked pores on my eyelids when I apply it there, but no other complaints to my normal/dry/sensitive skin. The price is fantastic as well.
review_title: very good serum for the price

review_text: (I know its soon but I’ve already seen some differences in my skin) I’ve been using this morning and night for 2 days so far with the Niacinamide solution, I thought it was making my skin drier at first but when I wash it off my skin is already a lot softer and more supple. This definitely has to be washed off if you’re going to wear makeup because its thick and sticky but not uncomfortable once it sinks in. I just know it wouldn’t look good under makeup, It seems like it would pill at least with my skin type. I’m going to keep using it, but so far I think its fine. Highly recommend the Niacinamide solution however, it’s amazing. This product isn’t very immediately moisturizing and feels slightly tight and dry on the skin, good once washed off!!!
review_title: Supple skin in 2 days, just "fine" results so far

review_text: Got a bad reaction. There’s white pimples all over on my face never got any pimples like that. Like they are so many in one place.
Kind of sticky but it brightened up my face sooo much!!
I love this product! It is very simple, but is effective. I have found it is a little thicker and more sticky than other formulas I’ve used, but you can’t beat the price.

It’s a typical serum consistency very thin but semi slimy. Trust me you only need the tiniest bit of this do not use more than a few drops you’ll just be wasting it. It glides on very easily smoothly as it’s a fluid serum absorbs very quickly starts to dry down and your fingers will start to kind a catch on your skin though it’s not tacky. In my experience that’s a common feature of serums. But I’ve noticed my skin has been so much more hydrated lately although I’ve recently started a whole new mostly the ordinary skincare routine but compared to the price of some hyaluronic acid serums and compared this is the same exact quality of those high end ones I used to buy I won’t be switching back I’m staying with this one. And like I said you only need the tiniest bit so this bottle will last quite a while. Also because the ordinary products are so affordable I recommend picking up a few at a time when you can because almost their entire product line seems to sell out very quickly whenever they’re restocked!

Not really a fan. The consistency is super sticky and although it sort of hydrates your skin, the texture becomes very odd. Everytime I tried to apply a moisturizer after using this I would see minor red bumps on my face and the next day would have a minimal breakout and my skin usually doesn’t break out

Unfortunately, this product did not work at all for me. ): I was hoping it would help add some light hydration to my skin but it ended up giving me a bad reaction that caused rough, itchy, small white bumps on my face and chest. I have sensitive skin that is slightly oily and prone to hormonal breakouts. I bought this because of Tik Tok (lol) but be careful!! What is popular/trendy may NOT be what is right for you and your skin. Also, please always do a patch test with new products!
i am in love with this serum!! it is very lightweight and leaves my face extremely hydrated and plump. it also soaks into my skin very quickly

My skin was really dry and uneven after trying after I came across the ordinary. My friend recommended using hyaluronic acid to hydrate my skin all while evening. My skin has never been more smooth than what it is now, I am not longer dry in the areas I was struggling with. It also helped with my dark spots on my skin. Keep in mind, to probably just make this part of your nighttime routine. I noticed that when I used it during my AM routine, my foundation didn’t apply smoothly..it looked like it was peeling off. Once I switched to only PM use, it solved the problem.

This serum didn’t do anything positive to my skin. I used as recommended and applied to damp skin under my moisturizer. Each day my fine lines got deeper and deeper and my skin got more and more sensitized. I was so sad because of all the good reviews and the amazing price point!
It hydrates very well on my skin. I apply oil then aloe vera after this, before bed. I wake up with better skin. I have been using it for about 2 wks.

Love love this hyaluronic acid, and it cannot be beaten for the price.  For all of the reviews saying they do not like the texture and it piles, you need to put this on while your face is still sort of wet.  I put it on morning and night, directly after I wash my face.  I sort of pat my face dry so it is still pretty damp and then put this directly on my skin.  It takes about a minute or so to dry completely, but then I follow this up with my moisturizer, and then my normal routine and I’ve never experienced any piling.  This makes my skin feel hydrated and plump, and it has honestly been a game changer for my skin.
review_title: Love - Just Make sure to use with water!

review_text: I feel like this helps my face retain more moisture, but I’m not a fan of the texture. It is very thick and goopy, and it tends to pill when additional layers are added. It’s a nice product for the price, but not my favorite.

I have been using this product for almost 2 1/2 months now. On my second bottle and ordered the bigger one. I have acne oily combo skin and it really helps to keep my skin under control. Many people say this product is sticky, but I dont get it. I usually apply it to my face and pat it in. It feels like nothings there. Ive been using this and Kiehl’s Ultra Facial Oil-Free Gel Cream and my face has been sooo amazing! Havent had any major breakout or if any in about a month. Would totally recommend!
review_title: Yes for oily combo acne skin!

review_text: I used this product to help with hydration and some dry spots I get during season changes. This thing works wonder. Its so amazing and does the job. 10/10 recommend!
Just ordered my second bottle (the bigger one this time). Comes in handy whenever my skin needs extra hydration and has been a lifesaver for my hands due dryness from much handwashing.

I’ve been trying the ordinary products for a few weeks now and for the price, I can’t really complain. I noticed the my skin seemed less dry and that my pores looked smaller after a few uses. I use it with other products from their brand

I have yet to try any other brand of hyaluronic acid serum, but for the price I really can’t complain. My skin is much more hydrated since using this serum and my pores seem smaller. Hyaluronic acid is great for sensitive or acne prone skin in need of some hydration!
I just use it for a couple so not sure how it works on my skin. But the fistt I dont like the texture, it like you put glue on your face, and you peel it off exactly same way as school glue.

I have combination skin with dry patches on my cheeks and around lips. Ive been using this for 3 weeks now as a part of my am skincare routine and Im pleased to say that the dry patches have almost completely disappeared. Would recommend 100%

Okay, so this is my first serum I have ever bought. So, I can’t compare it to anything else. I will note this though, it did not last long. About 2 months. I felt like I needed to use quite a bit of product because it wouldn’t cover my entire face. It absorbed too quickly and WAS NOT moisturizing enough. My acne has reduced a bit but it’s still present. I have not noticed a difference in how my skin feels or looks either. So, overall...YES the product is a great price BUT because it doesn’t last very long, I would much rather buy something that will have a bang for its buck. On to the next serum!
Love The Ordinary products. Affordable and just really great skin care. A few drops go a long way, feels good on my skin, no adverse reaction. Works well. Happy with this purchase.

I have a combination of normal and dry skin, where I have very dry skin around my nose and mouth. Extremely moisturizing, it doesn’t dry out on your skin and feels slightly sticky to the touch after applying. I use this before I put on the Ordinary HA facial moisturizer and they work great together. Makes your skin look healthy and Dewey, but not oily.
Absolutely amazing!!!!! This thing helped with my dry skin.
I liked that it was lubricating and moisturising.  it was good to apply with a roller ball
Ok so I love this product, I struggle a lot with dry skin which causes my face to produce excess oil leading to acne, and this hyaluronic acid serum helps my skin stay hydrated and soft.
Product came half empty, with the lid slightly twisted off. I am SO disappointed. Great price point but NOT when you only get half of what you’re promised. I expected way better from Sephora.

I have been using this product for weeks now and I definitely can feel a deference in the look and texture of my skin. It just feels more supple and balanced .  Definitely a MUST HAVE in my skin care!
review_title: Once you start you won’t stop!

review_text: This stuff is magic. Smooths my skin, feels firmer instantly and makes my skin glow! I use it a few times a week. Love it.

This serum is amazing, helps to even out my very red cheeks and smoothes my skin! I have been using this since the beginning of April and I couldn’t recommend this enough. This also mildly hydrates my skin and makes it glow so much.
I’ve noticed a big change in my skin by the product once dry gets all peely on your skin and rubs of very easily. But besides from that I love it!
I purchased three of these, two for my daughters and one for myself. We have just started using the product but I’m happy with the results so far

I have been using this at night and TO Buffet during day the day.  I’ve had dry skin and lips since January from working outside, and this finally seems to be something that works, especially on my lips.

This stuff makes my skin feel like I just came out of my mother’s womb. It helps acne, dry spots, overall hydration, and smoothness. There’s some reviews that say it turns to this sticky goop, which is true if you put makeup over it within like an hour of application. If you don’t wear any makeup it’ll work for you during the day. However, if you do I recommend using it only in your nighttime routine. It’ll change your life.
I absolutely recommend this product. I had redness in my face and within 1 week it was all gone. My face looks smooth. I’m impressed! Worth the hype and price! ♥️
Great for what it is- immediate hydration that doesn’t break the bank or my skin out!
This stuff is great. My face is much softer and moisturized. It works far better than the expensive serums I have tried in the past.
Not overly impressed, left an thicker residue than expected
I love this product. I have sensitive dry skin and it’s hydrate my skin perfectly. My skin feels refreshed and calm.  and  the  price  is  perfect

LOVEEEEE IT. I use this everyday! After the first time my face felt very soft and after a week my pores were smaller? And my skin looked overall “happier” I very much recommend this product, and I also would consider pairing it with the salicylic acid masque from the ordinary too;)

This product is amazing for its price! Compared to products i’ve used that range in the 20s, for under $10 this does more than it should. I purchased the smallest bottle and I will repurchase once it’s out. Before buying I was hesitant as other reviews claimed it to be sticky, however once I tried it for myself I did not feel that way at all. Perhaps others may be applying too much product at once or they are not combining with a moisturizer. I use a cleanser first and then the Ordinary moisturizer after the serum and it makes my skin baby soft. I’ve been using it day and night for the past few days and so far my skin is not red anymore and I feel like my pores are minimized.

Amazing for night-time use especially! I find I wake up with such hydrated skin! I have normal-dry skin and it is sometimes sensitive but this did not make me irritated or breakout at all. I like that it is a good active to layer other products with because sometimes it can be confusing trying to combine different actives in a skin care routine. And for the price you really can’t beat it! Would recommend and purchase again and again.
Definitely recommend, my skin is so much clearer and hydrated! My pores have shrunk and notice my blackheads disappearing. Love this product!
With regular use it works!!! Made my blackheads go away.
I got this recommended as an acne spot treatments & I love it ! It works & gets rid of my terrible acne in les than 2 days !
Love it. I wear it before my moisturizer and my skins stays hydrated!!
As long as you know how to use it, its a great product. initially when i started using it, encountered some problem of dryness and piling, and then got to know how to use it..And now i am happy..

It goes onto my skin very smoothly and leaves a glowy/shiny appearance afterwards which I don’t mind. I have dry/combination skin. I used about 5 drops am and 5 drops pm for about 1 month and my skin is noticeably softer and looks more hydrated! I still have plenty left. Probably can use for at least another 3 months! Good size if you just want to try it out.
I was buying hyaluronic serum for $125.  This works JUST as well!!!  WINNER!!!

Super thrilled about this purchase! My skin has never been so soft. I live in a very cold climate (arctic) and was having issues dealing with my dry skin and it always ruined my makeup looks. This saved my face! It’s so amazing. Do recommend applying a few minutes before makeup application because it can be a bit sticky.
Did not like this. Was very sticky once applied and didn’t really make a difference.
leaves my skin feeling super hydrated and smooth. i normally have dry patches on my cheeks but ever since i’ve used this product they are gone.

The Ordinary is proof that high prices doesn’t equal effacy. This stuff is a lifesaver for my fussy dry skin. My skin hasn’t been this hydrated in a very long time. One to two drops is all I need before I layer on my moisturizer. It’s kept my skin soft through the winter and the changing of the seasons when my skin goes a little haywire and would get uncomfortably dry.You got a user for life!
review_title: Who says you need to spend big bucks for a serum!

review_text: The product itself is pretty good but the top of the bottle I got was broken and would not screw on and it spills if it isn’t propped up. I put in a little baggie and when I opened the bag and half of the product had spilled and made a mess. Very upsetting and extremely inconvenient. I hope it was just a defective bottle but even so that product never should have gone to a costumer.
This product helps add moisture to my skin, but it feels a bit sticky when applied. You have to wait a while for the product to dry before applying moisturizer or this serum pills up
Put this on before bed when my skin is feeling dry. (With moisturizer on top or overnight mask) I will be purchasing it again!
This product is really good for dry skin. Has a weird smell but overall it works great and really hydrates your skin.
Love love love ! Great price and even better product on my second purchase
Really awesome product! It helps keep my skin super moisturized and the price tag is super awesome too. I don’t think there’s anything super insanely unique but it helps give a boost of moisture.
Awesome product, to be honest i saw someone using them then i check them here and choose according to my skin and it really work i can feel difference. Its really awesome.
For the price, its pretty good. I found it difficult to layer anything (makeup) over it due to how sticky and thick it is (like aloe vera).  So, I started using only at night and I am pretty pleased.
If you have trouble with dryness, this is the product for you! I had extremely dry areas, and I could feel results instantaneously with this! Its affordable, has good ingredients, AND WORKS!

This is the second bottle I ordered. I love this product. I’m in my early 50s and it really made a difference reducing wrinkles. I use it once a day and put my moisturizer on top. Great product and a great price.

I LOVED IT! I could notice the difference in my skin after 2 weeks using it. My skin is smoother and looks younger, there is a natural glow that wasn’t there before. It even smoothed some wrinkles. My skin is a combination and sometimes I have problem with acne using some problems, but with this product I didn’t have any problem. SUPER RECOMMENDED!

Made me break out into red, painful spots almost immediately.  Apart from that, it pilled when combined with other serums and/or moisturizer.  I have heard a lot of good stuff about this product but it just didn’t do anything for my skin.  It felt sticky and sat on the surface of my skin.

I bought this product to apply after microneedling but learned that it’s also good to use to help very dry skin. The skin on my chin was peeling from a bad reaction to a skin product and I tried a lot of different things to help my skin heal. I used this twice and my chin was back to normal. Absolutely love this product it 100% works!!
I absolutely love this product and it definitely is something i’d buy again. Very hydrating and helped my acne a ton. Highly recommend as an addition to your skincare routine it’s amazing!
This product is excellent for moisturizing my skin

I can’t say this makes a HUGE difference but I will definitely keep repurchasing this because I do have dehydrated (still oily) skin so it can get flaky and this remedies that right away, definitely need it for winter

This stuff pills like crazy! Even after letting it dry for a long time, it still pills. I only use it at night because of this, and let it dry for about 10 minutes before adding my oil. It seems to work, my skin is nice but the pilling makes me think it does not get absorbed
review_title: Pills So Much, Best Used Only at Night

review_text: It all started during lockdown. I took the leap and downloaded the infamous TikTok app. After watching several, I mean several, reviews/demos; I took the leap and purchased an array of products from the line. The products are great but unfortunately due to the demand of product, the packaging has suffered. I’m unable to close the cap correctly. It’s unfortunate I’ll be able to pack it with me in future travels.
This is great under moisturizer, it made my skin feel super hydrated. The only problem with this is that it made my skin a bit sticky but after moisturizer it’s much better, highly recommend.
Broke me out so bad. I. tried it for two days and it made everything worse on second day.

I dont know why, this make my face darker or very sensitive to the sun? I notice 2 days later that my face is slightly getting darker. It help with pigmentations and make my skin feel a bit plumped but not worth that they make my face look tired all the time. Also minor break out all over my face. Definitely will return.
I wanted to like this after reading good reviews, but it left my face feeling sticky. Not a fan

I’m not sure I have seen any benefit from this product. After putting it on your face- your face is pretty sticky/tacky. I’m not a huge fan- but the packaging and quality is nice. I wouldn’t repurchase.
I love this so much, I only apply at night and wake up with my skin super hydrated. Also helped me with my acne scars and refining pores.

this product isn’t that bad. the ordinary is a very good brand and this product didn’t disappoint. my skin feels very even and my acne scars are improving by the usage. i recommend if you’re struggling with acne and need a cheap treatment
Worst product if you are looking for hydration.This serum leaves you the skin opaque and dry.

i have struggled with eczema and dry skin for ever... i wanted a serum that was hydrating & that is exactly what this did for my skin! definitely recommend & it’s really great if you mix with moisturizer!!
review_title: GREAT FOR DRY AND SENSITIVE SKIN

review_text: Very sticky. If you layer products, this will almost “crumble” up. It feels like if you’ve ever taken your makeup with toilet paper and there’s a residue left
Left a film on my face. I could roll it off with my fingers.  There are better hyaluronic acids out there.  But it is cheap.
I just ordered two bottles of H.A. from Ulta online but I see it costs less here.  I know where I’ll be getting it from now on!
review_title: Best Price online I could find.

review_text: Leaves my skin feeling super smooth. Saw a difference in my skin after one use! Helped even out my skin tone. I cant wait to see how it continues to perform.

I would like to start by saying, I have spent countless dollars trying to find a good skin care routine. For me, if it works, no expense is worth sparing. After reading up, I decided to buy 4 products from The Ordinary in replacement of my current skincare. At first I was skeptical, as I started use after a major breakout from both acne and melasma dark spots (I have incredibly sensitive skin, and as an adult it’s hard to find anything gentle, yet strong enough to work). After my skin adjusted to any sensitivity within a few days, this product (daily use), paired with their “Vitamin C Suspension“ (nightly use - and I think the real hero here), Caffeine solution (night/day for eyes), and Salicylic Acid Masque (weekly use) COMPLETELY cleared my skin. I have never had that result even using $100+ serums, no less in the middle of a no-forgiveness humid summer. These products immediately begin to soothe irritation once in regular use, and have brought my skin back to life. Could not recommend more, best value by far.

As someone with SUPER sensitive skin, I didn’t enjoy this product. It is super sticky and it actually broke me out. I think it is moisturizing but if you have really sensitive skin I would be careful. Kinda want to return it but kinda feel silly for returning $6 so guess I am stuck with it.
Very hydrating! Loved it!Would recommend for someone with very dry skin. Lesson learned.

I live in a really dry climate, and on top that I take a medication that dries my skin out like crazy. I was having issues with flaky, dehydrated skin no matter how much or what kinds of moisturizers I was using but this fixed it!!! I use it morning and night, right onto my damp skin (to seal in some moisture) after cleansing. I only need a little bit to cover my whole face and it absorbs quickly. It wears great under moisturizer, primer, foundation etc. and helps my makeup look better because I’m not all flaky. I have very acne prone skin and this doesn’t irritate my face or break me out at all! Seriously a holy grail product for me

It seems to be working so far.. the only thing I dislike about this product is it’s texture, and the amount that came in it (mines is almost finished already)but  it gives your face an oily glow and stays on throughout the day.
Love this idem very hydrating. After putting on becomes a little sticky but goes away after a couple minutes. Definitely recommend!
ive been using this one for a month almost, i have seen a much smoother skin, smaller pores, it takes a while to start seeing the effect but overall it has been a nice prdocut
The best serum yet! It’s simple to use and you see results within a week!

This is perfect to add into your morning and night time skincare routine! I’ve found that my skin is starting to get more dry, especially after moving to a new state, so I now have more combination skin instead of super oily. This was a perfect addition because it doesn’t make you oily but adds so much hydration! It also doesn’t break me out and has actually helped a little bit with my acne. I also had my boyfriend try it out, who has super oily skin, and it absorbs in really quickly and doesn’t break him out either. My biggest recommendation is to put it on when your skin is still a little damp, so don’t dry your skin off completely. I’ve found if you put it on when your skin is super dried off it definitely takes longer to soak in and can become a little sticky and pill under makeup. When you apply it when your skin is a little damp it really just pulls all that hydration straight into your skin!
review_title: Amazing! Use when skin is still a little damp!

review_text: This product is great addition to my skincare routine!

First, I would like to say that this is a great product to start with if you are looking to improve skin moisture. It can be used day or night, and interacts well with many other products. It’s quite inexpensive which is also a huge bonus. I took away one star for the texture of the product, that is just personal preferences. When you apply to skin if you used circular motions to “rub” into skin, it gets slightly frothy and increasingly tackier. I apply 4 drops to face, and will only swipe in one motion to move around my face. I find that helps with the tacky feeling. I see some comments that it flaked, or not to wear under makeup. I query if they were using too much product; or really rubbed it in to create the froth I had mentioned  earlier. Overall, would recommend!

Love this serum! It really helps my skin retain moisture. I change up my routine periodically to try out new products - but this is THE one I can’t go without. I use twice a day and always follow up with moisturizer. My skins feels hydrated and soft all the time.

Finally!!! Found a serum that actually hydrates my skin. This is my first time trying out The Ordinary products and I’m hooked! The serums is a speed quickly into my skin and after a few seconds my skin feels soft! It does feel a bit sticky when applying but it goes away quickly.

This is the BEST serum for dry or sunburnt skin. As a labourer I get sun burnt ALL THE TIME! This works better than aloe vera. My skin recovers so quickly when I use this this hyaluronic acid serum. I can not live with out this product now, I use it in my morning and night time routine!
My skin is so glowy after this, it also absorbs quickly and isn’t sticky.
Nice but when applied, is gooey and flakes off after it’s dried on your skin. Do not use under your makeup.

I did not have high hopes for this (such a low price!) but this helped SO MUCH with my dry patches!!  I use it morning and night and it feels really good. I’ll be repurchasing for sure!  Great, great product and SO affordable!!

This product broke me out twice. About after a week of using this, I woke up with red bumps on my face so I stopped using it and waited for my skin to clear. I tried the product again and the same thing happened. I have about 5-6 painful, red bumps on my forehand and cheeks. My skin is far from sensitive so I’m not sure what it is about this product that disagrees with my skin.
I’m already in my second bottle and loving it. Practically a pool of hyaluronic acid, the skin is hydrated without regret.
I love this sooo much, it’s helped w my acne and I 100% recommend it!

Before using this product i had lots of dry patches on my face, but after only a few days of regular use the dryness was gone! I was truly amazed bc I tried so many face products and nothing did the job until this! I am a strong believer of this product

I really love this product!! It has helped my skin a bunch and its only been a week of use. I have combination dry/ oily skin and I use it twice a day in the morning and night. it has a really nice texture its really smooth but thick as well. It goes on a little tacky and feel sticky at first but once it settles into your skin it doesn’t leave any of it behind. There is no smell which I really like, also blends well with my innisfree moisturizer.
