A little bit goes a long way. There is no need for a dropper full of product. 2 -3 drops will cover for your entire face. Leaves face a little bit tacky so I like this product as a hydrating primer. The packaging is not the best and is glass, so be careful. GREAT product. 100% recommend.

This makes my skin look great, however it is a little sticky when i apply it.  However the stickiness goes away when i apply the ordinary natural moisturizing factors +Ha.  Other than that i recommend this!

I absolutely love this! Probably the most affordable hyaluronic acid on the market, from a reputable brand. Ive been buying this for over a year. A little goes a long way, and I use this 2x daily. I have had problems with piling with this, but I simply started using a little less product, and I find that sealing it in with moisturizer helps a lot. I haven’t had an issue with breakouts or dry skin because of it. My skin feels more plump, and very hydrated. I use it in the AM and PM, after cleansing, I use toner, vitamin C (at night), hyaluronic acid, eye cream, and then moisturizer. I’ve also been applying jojoba oil before bed, and during the day if I’m not going anywhere.

I really like the product since my skin is so dry. I have about 7 TO products but I have a specific regime that I created so I can use them all throughout the week. My only hang up with the product is the bottle/cap. It’s super crooked & won’t screw in completely. The red painful ‘mask’ that I purchased in a separate order is the same way. The packaging needs some work. I’d be furious if I were traveling & it spilled everywhere! I really hope a rep from TO or Sephora can see this & pass the message along.

I don’t normally leave reviews but this product is now a must have for me! I was a bit skeptical if I would like it as the formulation is a bit thicker and stickier than I expected. But I have been using it for nearly 2 months now and I find my skin is very plump and moisturized. I usually have issues with dry spots due to using a cream for acne & dealing with cold Canadian winters. This product has really helped get rid of the dry spots in my skin and keep it hydrated! Absolutely recommend especially for the price of it, can’t be beat!
I’ve used this for a week straight, and it works as it says!

When I first started experimenting with this, I was pilling like crazy. I would drag my finger across my cheek and dead skin would come with it. I find that using less makes that problem go away. I use it after a toner and apply moisturizer and oil after. I love it. It sticky on application, but dries quick. I feel my moisturizer literally deep into my face with this serum. As the title says, I’m repurchasing it already after still having a pretty full bottle, just incase.
review_title: I’m repurchasing after only a few uses!!!

review_text: My skin has pore problems and I’ve had large pores on my cheekbones skin for nearly 2 years since I moved to a different country. I do not have much time to take care of my skin and also because my busy work environment does not allow me to have time to clean my skin and I’ve suffered from stress too so in recent times my skin has deteriorated severely. I am an Asian girl with combination skin and when I bought this product I was very worried about my choice because I’m not professional in choosing skin care products as well as not knowing much more about their ingredients. But after watching some clips and beauty tips on youtube, I see that this product has lots of good review, I decided to buy with an appropriate price. This is a product that treats pores and makes my skin lighter. And one thing that didn’t disappoint me is that this product is completely useful and I feel a marked change in my skin compared to the products I used before. Hopefully this product will also be suitable for those who are wondering, worried about the issue of skin with large pores like me that can be improved after using this product. What I really like about this product is that the price is very reasonable but the quality is too great. I highly recommend.

It’s good. Being that my skin is the Sahara desert, my moisture level has def increased. I do want to try other HA’s because I am not totally sure if I am sold. Although, I will purchase again since there’s no big ($$) loss or n trying it again. It did not irritate my sensitive skin, which is ALWAYS a bonus being that I never know when my skin will reject something, no matter how eco-friendly or natural it is. Def worth a try if you have not yet.
This is one of my favorites from TO. I put it on after using the toner and it hydrates my skin like crazy and I love it. My skin is super soft using this with the moisturizer.

I REALLY wanted to love this based on all the great reviews. This product kept breaking me out, and I don’t have sensitive skin. The price for this product is more than reasonable, and the formula does dry fast. However, it just didn’t work with my skin. Otherwise all Ordinary products are really solid and affordable and I respect that in a company! This probably works on a lot of people, just not me. However, I would still recommend it because my rating isn’t typical for this product.
Great product !! The whole line is phenomenal and you can’t beat the price!!!!
review_title: Get it When You See it’s In Stock !!!

review_text: So moisturizing healed my dry patches in a matter of days.
The product fascinated me, I would definitely buy it again.  Since I arrived I use it every morning ♥ ️

I use this after The Ordninarg’s Lactic Acid and Farsali Unicorn drops and it does moisturize. For me, it’s a delayed effect but it does work. Right away it leaves a little bit of a sticky residue and takes a little time to soak in but my face seems to retain moisture throughout the day. Won’t be repurchasing but for the price I have zero complaints.

I have dry sensitive skin that has struggled with acne (more white heads). I started using this and my skin definitely feels more hydrated. I also haven’t broken out, and the effects come pretty quickly. I use it after my toner and before my moisturizer. Definitely get!!!!

I usually have sensitive, acne-prone skin. I’ve been using this for the past 6 months. I’m very satisfied with the result. My face looks moisturized and my skin tone has improved. I also used other products but this one is a must-have. These are the other products that I’ve been using along with this: The Ordinary Niacinamide (daytime), caffeine soln (day and night), Glycolic acid(night), natural moisturizing factors (occasionally), Dr Dennis Gross stress repair face cream (day and night for past 2 months)

I was a little skeptical about using this product just because I didn’t think it would really work for me since I have bad luck lol. I had really textured, dry and bumpy skin which gets worse during the summer. I have only used this 3 days so far (once in the morning and once at night) and it has made the skin on my face so smooth and soft! The serum is a bit thick however my skin absorbs it and makes my face look super hydrated! I also have very sensitive skin and I didn’t get any irritation with the use of this product. I am just surprised by the fact that the price is so cheap for a product that actually worked for me! Definitely recommend to those who have similar skin types as me!
Amazing! my skin isn’t acne prone but I was looking for a product to help with skin hydration and glow and this product makes my skin feel amazing. Would recommend.
I found this to be moisturizing without making my skin greasy. I have aging combination/dry skin and am so happy to find a non-oil product that works.
I love this serum!! It goes on a little tacky at first but it feels so good on my skin. Very hydrating and soothing.
I really like this product! The serum is hydrating and has a great consistency. It’s not too sticky or oily at all. It sits under my moisturizer and makeup perfectly.
I love this so much! It instantly brightened my face. I started using this in the morning and The Buffet at night and I’m in love! Highly recommend even thought I just started.

The price point is really nice but I find it to be very tacky and it also pills on my skin. It seems to take awhile to actually settle into my skin before I can layer on my next product. I prefer to use B-Hydra by Drunk Elephant over this but this is a nice substitute if you are on a budget.
Good for oily skin. Use small amount every time. Good price
This product helped alot w/ my acne but my face was kind of peeling but other than that it helps alot.
this products really helps with my skin’s dryness. I have been using it for a while and will continue to purchase more as it probably works well with my combination dry skin.

Great product! Have been using for a week now and it feels so good! I have a really dry and as a result dull skin and this product has left me with a soft and smooth skin.The only disappointment was that for the third time in a row I didn’t receive the samples with my order!!! And I see this is happening with other orders as well!! This should not be happening...

This makes my skin feel super hydrated, but I have a hunch it does break me out a little bit. I use a buffet serum, then this, then my moisturizer/sun screen and it doesn’t pill up too bad. I’d recommend messing with the order of application if you’re experiencing a lot of pilling. It’s also great for use on the body  before lotion if you’re feeling extra dry. Keeping it in my routine because it delivers and is cheap.
I have been using this serum for about a month and my skin has completely changed for the better! It is super affordable and gave me really positive results!

this hyaluronic acid is seriously the best, if you’re thinking of giving it a try; go for it. At this price point I was astounded by what it did for my skin. It has minimized my melia and leaves my skin so dewy and beautiful with every use!
review_title: see what this product will do for you!

review_text: I love this stuff! I have combination skin and it helps hydrate my dry parts, and reduce unneeded oils. I have also realized it reduced my redness.

I’m so disappointed, I really wanted to like this especially after hearing so many people raving about this. But after one use (and this was the only product I switched out in my routine) I had skin irritation and a huge dry spot with red bumps on my right upper cheek area. My skin usually isn’t too sensitive and this doesn’t always happen to me. But it definitely did not agree with my skin what so ever.

This product is one that has really changed my skin... finally. Im a skeptic when it comes to serums so this really surprised me. I was prone to having these tiny little acne bumps on my face, dark spots from sun exposure and scars - the list can go on. I always thought that my skin was oily because it was compensating for the lack of hydration it was getting - so I loaded on the cream moisturizers. My skin was still oily and I continued to get acne. So finally I just did some research and took a chance by using hyaluronic acid and an oil-free moisturizer. These in combination have changed my skin. This product locks in the moisture the gel-based moisturizer adds. Moisturized skin, without the oily-ness all day. (I use the tatcha water cream with it).
It leaves a thin layer of film on skin and peels when applying other products afterwards, especially sun screen. Weird.

Best product!! I use this along with my moisturizer (1-2 drops) and my skin feels amazing! It supports my moisturizer and helps it to go deeper in my skin without it getting oily. Highly recommend everyone add this to their skin routine! I have combination oily skin in the summer and combination dry skin in the wintertime. This stuff is a staple like milk and bread in my life! I’m in my 40’s and my skin is still like I’m in my late 20’s.

The Ordinary is definitely one of my favorite skincare brands! It is amazing how affordable yet how effective they are. This product is a staple in my night time skincare routine. I don’t use it in the a.m. because I found it did not sit as well underneath makeup, even if I let it fully dry down and put moisturizer on top. But at night time, this is an amazing hydration boost. It does dry super quick as you’re putting it on, so just make sure to work fast or put it on in sections.
This is amazing. Just used it twice and it worked wonders
so far this has been amazing! I’ve been using it twice a day for a week and my skin feels so soft and smooth. Obsessed

It’s like a watery type of texture, not exactly just water because it still feels like you have something on. It’s also very cool on the skin, so I feel refreshed when I put it on my face. Will definitely buy again, the bigger version this time :)

Love this, after just two uses, it got rid of a dry patch I had. I use it every morning & night before applying the belief true cream moisturizer. Love that combo & have already repurchased the big bottle before the small one even finished.
Literally saved my dry skin. Use every night before bed after washing my face and top with the ordinary moisturizer.

I’ve been using this product for a while now. It has become one of my favorites. It does have a thicker/high viscosity consistency, so it takes a little longer to absorb. Less is more with this product, hence why it has lasted so long. I put my toner one, leave my face wet, then put this product on. I have combination skin, but this product has helped keep my skin hydrated without it feeling greasy. I bought the 60ml bottle about 2 months ago and just now buying a replacement! It is a must in my skin care routine now.
review_title: Has Worked Wonders for my Combination Skin!

review_text: Great stuff. The only negative thing I would say is don’t expect to get the samples you pick because it’s unlikely they send the correct ones. You will probably get two of the same samples which is what happened to me and was super lame. I was really hoping and wanting to try Kosas foundation and some face oil but instead they sent two of the same samples for a very light or dark skinned person which does not do anything for me.
review_title: great product! You will be disappointed w/samples

review_text: this is my first review for Sephora & I just want to say this product is beyond amazing. Its only the 3rd day and my skin feels so clean, hydrated, and plump. I have dry skin and sometimes my face feels dull and this product gave me a refreshed look. After cleansing my face, I use this product, and then moisturize.
review_title: Been using this day and night

review_text: I absolutely love this product! It has really smoothed out and calmed my skin! The only two downsides that I wish I could change are that 1) it does have a significant dry down period. When it’s applied it, it’s a little tacky and stays like that for about 25 seconds even when rubbed into the skin. 2) you can’t apply it to broken skin. I usually have about 1-5 breakouts in different places on my face at any given time so it is a little annoying that I can’t use an acne product on my acne. Other than that it’s absolutely wonderful and super light weight! Would recommended 10 fold.
2 drops left me with an even texture and completely hydrated skin without any grease. Great price too without the additives or scents other products have!
This worked really well for my dry skin. Feels sticky and tacky at first, but if you let it dry and then use moisturizer over it, you will wake up with plump and hydrated skin.
I have dehydrated skin , I tried so many brands and skin cares but this one is just a wow....

This product is amazing. I’ve been using it for a few weeks and my skin appears more even and it has really helped reduce my acne scars.I use it morning and night. I use it right after I wash my face, use toner, and under-eye cream.  I saw a review that CHANGED THE GAME! In order to apply without piling, spray your face with water or get it wet (I use one of those Evian sprays). Make sure your face is damp. Then take the product, about a pearl size amount, and SPREAD it on your hands, don’t rub. Then take your hands and PRESS them on your face. Do not rub the product in. Simply hold your hands to your face and slowly cover your entire face by just holding you hands up to the skin (until your face feels the heat of your hands). Then let it dry and continue with your skincare routine. Total game changer.
I’ve been using this product with my other skin care routine for a week and half and this product has stop my face from getting oily when I wake up. It makes my face feel soft all day!

I have normal skin that often lacks moisture even after using lotions. Nothing seemed to really give me that moisture and dew I was looking for until I found this. It’s such a great price, lasts a long time, and very easy to use even all over the body. Just try it. It’s amazing.
Really good for redness and dry skin, leave the skin smoother and without any dry patch when you apply make up.

I love this product! It hydrates my skin so nicely and leaves it with a dewy glow. I use it one a day in the evening. I would recommend using a moisturizer after putting this product on otherwise it can leave your skin feeling a little sticky.  I use a little less than half of the applicator full. I would highly recommend!

I’ll start this review off by saying I’ve never had a skin care routine. Never thought I needed one and I wasn’t into the multiple step process. During quarantine I decided to focus on self care and develop a skin routine. I did tons of research on what products, how to apply them and what order to apply them in. I decided on The Ordinary because of the price point (didn’t want to break the bank), reviews and that they’re vegan and cruelty free. I’m so happy with these products, my skin has never felt so tight, hydrated, soft and looks so clear! I use this product in the AM after The Ordinary’s Caffeine serum and The Ordinary Buffet and after my moisturizer. And in the PM after The Ordinary’s Retinol 2% in Squalene and after the Buffet and before moisturizer. I highly recommend this product and trying in in these AM/PM routines because your face will glow and feel incredibly soft.
review_title: Leaves you with such a soft, hydrated face!

review_text: Such a steal! I used this for a month and could see visible difference in my skins texture, it made my skin extremely soft and well hydrated. My face looks very healthy now even with blemishes. Highly recommended!!!!
I do my normal skincare routine, then after everything else I put a little of this one before my sunscreen, followed by make up if I am doing that that day. I only use it before sunscreen.

This is great! It makes the skin look “even” with a clear and clean look. It also allows you too look dewy but not greasy! It drys down pretty fast and it leaves you feeling locked in with moisture. You deff do not feel this on the skin it is very light weight. A little goes along way dont over do it.
I saw immediate results completely worth it very soft and gentle on the skin!

So I have to admit I was not in love with this product at first, but because I could not turn down Hyaluronic acid for such an amazing price (after research of course) I even bought a second bottle, still not totally convinced. My main issue was the tacky feeling and the pilling. I then read that it needed to be applied to a wet face. I began using it after spraying with my facial spray and it was mildly better. Then I discovered the life changing combo: mixing it with Dr. Dennis Gross’s Hyraluronic Marine Booster. When mixed with that, and put on wet skin, it is the most amazing thing I have ever put on my skin. I have it four instead of three, because this combination is so fantastic, but a four instead of a five, because using this product in this way makes it infinitely more costly. I will use the Marine Booster no matter what the cost so if this makes it even better, I will continue to use this as part of my powerhouse combination!
review_title: Pretty good. AMAZING when mixed with other product

review_text: This doesn’t sit well with my combo skin , it dried out my O zone , after 2 days I used , my skin started to peel and dry out, as soon as I stopped it, my skin went back to normal.

This product works wonders, but the bottle top was faulty and broke. Ive bene using this for a week and can already see and feel the difference in my skin’s hydration! Seriously awesome and amazing price too! But, the bottle top hasn’t ever screwed on just right, and today it spilled all over the inside of my makeup bag. Wish I could give it the 5 stars it deserves, but its packaging is vital to being user friendly. I look forward to better packaging and a better experience in the future!
review_title: Amazing, but the top is defective!

review_text: On the plus side, my incredibly sensitive skin did not react to this. It moisturizes well, but remains tacky and does not fully absorb. If you layer anything on top, it will pill. I will finish off the bottle instead of returning, but only at home or at night, without other products on top. It will make an ok after sun treatment this summer. All of The Ordinary dropper caps are a little iffy but since I haven’t travelled with this, I’m not too worried. I also purchased Buffet at the same time and like its results and texture much better. It has a high enough hyaluronic acid content that I feel is worth buying instead of the acid + B5 in the future

I Iove this product and have previously directly from The Ordinary and had no issues. However my most recent purchase of this through the Sephora website the cap was faulty and pops off of the bottle, especially when fully tightened. Unfortunatly I was unaware of this flaw when I placed it in my skincare bag and ended up with most of the bottle covering the inside of said bag and my other products.
review_title: Fantastic Product, but the packaging was fautly

review_text: Like other reviews, this product is great for its price point. You can’t beat it. My complaint is that the formula is sticky and doesn’t absorb fully which causes pilling.

i’ve been using this product for about a month now, and i gotta say i love it. it brings a lot of hydration to my dry skin. i mean it’s for basically all skin types, but its so amazing on my skin! i just bought another bottle, and when i have money i will definitely be buying the big bottle. it is a bit sticky, but i don’t mind it. i apply after double cleanse and tone and it works amazing. and my gosh it’s so in-expensive. most people will be paying 30+ dollars for a product that probably isn’t cruelty free or vegan. so stop wasting your money and buy this instead:)
Blemishes? Dark spots? And blackheads? No more! I love this product and cannot wait to order it again.

I’ve gone through two bottles of this and I recently purchased another one. I like this product and it’s also cheap. The only thing I dislike is that it peels after you layer on other products on it which is a bummer. My face feels soft and plump after I apply this. The marine hyaluronic by the ordinary is also similar to this and doesn’t peel.
Fantastic product. Only requires 2-3 few drops for entire face. Noticed a difference in skin tone within two weeks.
For the price, it is so worth it. I personally also love the COSRX hyaluronic acid because it feels lighter, but for the price, this product is unbeatable!

i have very dry skin and this product is amazing. It feels very soothing and moisturizing. My skin has improved quite a bit using this product. I have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate my skin at all nor did my face breakout. Definitely recommend!

My skin is so happy! Bye bye dry skin! I use this twice a day as part if my “ordinary “ skin routine. I alway follow this up with a moisturizer as HA is know to steal moisture, even if its from your own skin. As with all “ the ordinary “ products, price is amazing, and their own site has a tonnes of info on what products to use together

This product is amazing, assuming you use it right. If you used this and got dry painful skin, that means you DID NOT use it right. Make sure you layer and occlusive over this product (like a moisturizer or facial oil) to seal in moisture. If you do not, all the moisture the product brought to your face will evaporate. It is sooo important!
review_title: Use it RIGHT and it will work

review_text: I wanted to love this product but it stripped my dry skin of any last bit of moisture, my whole face became red and painful and it destroyed my skin texture. Looks like it worked for other people but beware if you have dry sensitive skin and try a patch test on a small area first.
I have seen a dramatic improvement in my skin since adding into my regimen. Very happy with it!
Great value for a great product. I will most definitely buy this again.

Love this product. Found that the best application is when I use few drops mixed with my moisturizer immediately after cleansing my face when the skin is still damp. Would love for The Ordinary to come up with pure hyaluronic acid without the addition of B5.
This didnt work for my dry skin. It felt sticky and almost made my skin feel drier than usual.
review_title: Made me feel even more dry

review_text: honestly love this so much, it’s very lightweight and i use it during the night time before going to bed after my moisturizer. So far had it for a couple of days but haven’t seen any noticeable changes in my skin. But if you have sensitive skin, this won’t affect it all.
I purchased this product for my dry skin and if anything it only made It worse

This was such a miss for me. I was looking for an alternative for my Glossier HA just due to price (because otherwise I love it) and saw this. The price is right but that’s about it. It’s extremely sticky and even though I applied it to damp skin like you’re supposed to with HA (yes I tried several different ways), it still dried me out and caused 3 new pimples to pop up. While I love the idea of TO, this time I’ll shell out more for something that works.

I typically use the Marine Hyaluronic from The Ordinary, but it was not available so I ordered this one instead. The texture is much thicker than the Marine Hyaluronic, which may work for some, but was not for me. It left my skin a bit sticky, and it was just not my preferred medium for a hyaluronic serum.
I wanted to love this product but I feel that it has  made my dry skin worse. Is that even possible? I did read a comment about applying it on wet skin so I’m willing to try that. FINGERS CROSSED

For all y’all who have been commenting that its drying, I recommend applying it this way.. (Thanks to Dr Dray, this method has been doing wonders to my skin!) - After I wash my face, I’ve stopped wiping/patting my face dry. I apply the Hyaluronic Acid directly onto my wet face, and often follow up with a thermal water spray. I allow to the product to naturally do its thing, then once dry I follow up with a moisturizer. Make sure you’re following up with a moisturizer!!!Also hyaluronic acid should be used in climates that are NOT dry! So if your environment is already not humid, you’re probably not going to reap the benefits of this thing.. It may even do the opposite of what you’re wanting it to do because HA pulls water from the air and if there’s no water.. well you get the picture!Living in a humid place, and also pairing it with this method of application, my skins definitely more plumper, hydrated, and happy :)
review_title: Ideal for humid places & apply on wet face!

review_text: I use it at night only. It start scrambling if you put something on top...

I’ve purchased other hyaluronic acid off amazon before and it always had a gel-like texture and would leave a sticky film on my skin. This stuff is amazing (especially for how cheap it is)! It would be hard to beat the results you get from another product at this price. My skin feels much softer, smoother, and moisturized.

This product did help with my dry skin but my face is covered with acne. This product broke me out all over my face. Ive never dealt with cheek acne until i started using this product. I really wanted to love this product but sadly my skin hates it.

I have dry skin along with eczema so my skins a little complicated. Since this was labeled as a “hydrating” product I thought it would work. But it didn’t the first time I used it I saw that my skin was dry at the end of the day. My dry patches showed so much more than they usually do. I tried to work with this product for a week but same results and my skin just felt as dry as could be. It didn’t help hydrate anything.

I really wanted to love this as the price is unbeatable.  I broke out from this pretty bad and it also did not sit well under my face oil or mix well with serums.  I would not recommend this product if you are prone to acne, use a retinal or any kind of acid based serum (lactic or glycolic).

I received the package at almost 9pm, opened it up, and see that it leaked on the packaging paper and inside of the box. The screw-on top is not aligned and leaked out. I tried to contact an agent immediately but they were busy so I emailed them. It has been 3 days with no response. Have not used it so I can not say anything about the product but the top can not be properly closed as there is still a gap even tightening it. I will be returning.
I am loving this so far! Skin feels more hydrated and less oily throughout the day.
This HA serum left my skin super plump just after the first use.
review_title: Good HA serum and Good price!

review_text: great for sensitive skin.. amazing and also an amazing price

I don’t hate it but i don’t love it. Something is off about it. The texture is weird and it actually does not feel hydrating after i put it on. I do think my skin looks plumper / more glowy since I’ve been using it but i still don’t love it. I won’t repurchase it - but the great thing is the price i don’t feel bad about not loving it. I did try using it immediately after spraying a hydrating toner (murad) and it went on much better. Still experimenting with it.

Honesty, you can feel the difference the first day you put this product on your skin. Personally, my skin can be easily irritated and blemish-prone with new products, but not this one. Immediately, I felt a difference in texture with my skin and it has really changed my skincare for the better. I totally recommend and I will be buying again since I just ran out!!

My skin has gotten more dry especially by my cheek area. Unsure why. I have brown skin (Jackie Alina’s complexion) and used this product every day then every 2 days for a few months. I mainly use this under my makeup now until it finishes and that’s why I gave it 2 stars because it works okay at that.
review_title: My combination skin is now dry

review_text: The serum leaves my face feeling nice and soft while minimizing the appearance of my pores. I recommend using this product at night and applying it with a moisturizer/hydrator
This made my skin break out... it didn’t mix with the other products that I put on my face ( majority was Peter Thomas Roth products) Will not buy again.

Unfortunately I am in the minority where this product only severely dehydrated my skin. I looked up instructions and tips on how to use this hyaluronic acid before trying it on myself - I made sure my skin was damp before applying and then followed up with my favorite moisturizer. However, the next day, my skin was totally dehydrated and peeling. I have occasional eczema, so I thought it might have been that so I tried this serum again, this time with a totally wet face and I let it sit for a few seconds before applying my moisturizer again. My skin is still peeling right now and I am desperately trying to do damage control. Will not be using this product again - I also really don’t like the consistency, it is very sticky and I find that it kind of just sat on top of my skin and didn’t really sink in all the way. I can’t say this won’t work for someone else since there are so many great reviews but I would recommend doing a patch test before using this all over your face because my skin is DONE right now.
so good for dry skin!! sticky texture but goes away after putting on moisturizer. my skin is visibly plumper and more hydrated after only a couple days. highly recommend!

Umm.. so i dont know. It is sticky. And it pills. And i dont think it has done anything for my skin after a few weeks of consistent use. Its gone to the back of the cabinet, where skin care products go to die. The price is great. But.... i didnt notice any effect. So there you go.
Love this! I use it in combination with other serums from the ordinary. This one is great! Will buy again.

I’m still not sure if I like this produce or not, and I am going to try The Inkey List after this runs out, because it’s very sticky and my face DRINKS it before I can spread over my face. It’s possible it’s because I need it and my skin is that dehydrated but I will give it a couple of months before deciding. You also can’t beat the price with a clear ingredient list.
I have been using this a few times a week for a couple of months. I have no idea if it does anything. I will use it till it is gone, but not be rebuying.
I have rosacea and very oily skin, This serum is great by itself for humid summers and can be added to a regular light moisturizer in winters when you want  a little extra boost without heaviness
I’ve used several hyaluronic acid brands and was incredibly surprised how much I ended up loving this product. It helps my skin feel so soft and hydrated in the morning . How is it only $6?

I’m 51 with skin that needs moisture. I layer on an essence first, then follow up with this serum before I moisturize. It’s wonderful. Doesn’t make me too oily and helps me retain a more youthful complexion.

Maybe I didn’t use this product right, but it didn’t do anything for my skin. At all, even made it worth. Granted it’s $7, but HA is amazing when you find the right product - the skinceuticals one is PHENOMENAL. A huge price difference but I actually saw amazing skin results.
It’s a little goopier than I expected. Find it pills on the skin without using a chemical exfoliant first. But it’s v affordable and gets the job done aside from that.
such a great price. Must be applied to damp skin to be the most effective

Nothing short of AMAZING!I apply this product morning and night as indicted on the bottle, after cleansing and using a toner. I apply this product, then apply my hydration mask to sleep. I’ve been doing this for a few weeks now and boy am I impressed.

I absolutely hated this. Where I applied it it never soaked into my skin. It formed a thin film and sat on top of my skin. I could pee it off like elmers glue. Not moisturizing whatsoever. I guess you get what you pay for.

Way too sticky. I was so excited to try this, especially because of the hype and the low cost. The only HA I own is Glossier- it goes on like a dream but felt like it wasn’t doing anything. Well.... I like it more than this. Will be returning. Also, when I use it.. it makes my other skincare products peal.

This has been a game changer in my skincare routine! I have very dry skin and this has really helped to hydrate my skin.  I love it! I use it every morning and in the evening I use the Hylaluronic Acid 2% + B5 and the combo has worked out really well for me!

I love the way the product works and I can totally see it working on my skin. My face feels so much softer and hydrated. However, I’ve been having trouble with the cap. Recently I noticed that my cap doesn’t close properly and I can’t get it to close properly no matter how fast or slow I twist it. It still closes and stays on but I’m not sure if this will effect the product. My cap basically looks warped and expanded. Does anyone else have this problem? Or know of a way to fix it?
Simple addition to the skincare routine. I use it first after washing my face morning and night.

Tried about 10 or so products from TO so far and this is absolutely my favorite! Absorbed quickly, great moisturizing power, couldn’t ask more for that price. It does feel sticky if you layer too many different products, or use it after serum that’s a bit thick. I like to use it( sometimes add another simple serum like “buffet”) before putting on a hydrating mask or a layer of aloe Vera gel

Dried out my face almost immediately. It makes the face look dewy and glossy but when you take it off, your face turns into sandpaper. My face feels very itchy now and I have small bumps all over my face.
review_title: Gave me small bumps all over my face

review_text: Love this serum. Use twice a day on a damp face, instantly gets rid of dry flaky spots
love this stuff!!! I have combo/dehydrated skin and makes my face pump and healthy. I also use the niacinamide with HA..which I love as well

This is my first purchase from the ordinary and was hoping for great things but not matter what I do it pills in me. i’ve used first before my routine during or after. The results are the same. Very disappointed will not repurchase and if i could I would return but not sure I can since everything is closed. I wanted to purchase more from the brand but i’m glad I didn’t.
My skin was breaking out bad with the mask I have had been wearing at work. Started using it and the next day my skin was already better. I only use it at night.
It’s very very very sticky! I tried to apply alone or add to my toner/ moisturizer. It still very sticky!

At start I thought I didn’t like it. It didn’t soak in and felt sticky, but then i learned how to use it properly. Three drops in my hands, I rubbed it and apply it on my face, after put it this way it absorbs inmmediately. Feels really hydrated. I have combo skin and my daily routine is niacinamide + hyaluronic acid + amino acids + moisturizer and sunscreen, some days put my makeup on and my foundation looks great, i think it’s all about the time we wait to absorb and how apply it, I’m happy with it and i love it.
review_title: Re purchasing, best Hyalu product ever

review_text: Amazing product! I don’t don’t it to be sticky and a little goes a log way. It really hydrates my skin!

This product is a great addition to my skincare routine. I apply this after using my toner and the hyaluronic acid helps to soak up and hold onto the moisture of the products I use on top of this. The texture of this product is a bit slimy but didn’t make the application unpleasant. The only downside to this is I can’t wear this on the same day I’m wearing makeup because I find that it lifts my foundation and gives me an uneven, textured look. It has to do with the fact that this product has a tendency to pill if you rub your face after it dries. Other than that, it keeps my skin moisturized and is a vital product to my routine.

I suffer from very dry, sensitive skin so I was hopeful that this product, would help bring my skin back to life. Unfortunately, I didn’t see much improvement after using the whole bottle. I added this to my nightly skincare regime, and didn’t see any noticable change in my skin. The slightly sticky consistency was not my favorite, and I felt like it didn’t ever really nourish my skin the way I had hoped. It’s not a bad product at all, but it just didn’t work for me. If you’re searching for a solution for dry skin like I was, this is definitely worth a try.

I had so many hesitations about this product because it’s too cheap to be true?!! But IT BLEW MY MIND. I noticed a difference the next day after first use. My skin is glowing and so shiny. Give it a try!

This was my first time using serums in my daily routine. This with the Niacinamide have cleared my face within a couple days. I just purchased a new one and I love everything about it. My face is not as oily and it’s inexpensive.
I am new to The Ordinary products and bought this to work on hydrating my skin. I applied this before my moisturizer and it absorbs well into my skin. Looks like my skin just had a gulp of water.
review_title: Like my skin had a gulp of water

review_text: Straight forward skincare for a great price. Does what it says it does. It’s a little sticky at first, but sets down after. My skin feels hydrated.
I bought it to hydrate my face and it hasCons: I can’t layer it with sunscreen
I use this Hyaluronic acid basically every day. I really like the consistency! No complaints!

This product is AMAZING. My husband got this for me as a gift. I had no idea what it was or the cost. I use expensive skin care. Philosophy, Clarins, Peter Roth etc. THIS IS GOOD STUFF. My forehead wrinkle has always bothered me. I used this every morning and night under night mask/moisturizer and daily moisturizer and after only a month I noticed it improving! I’m buying the big bottle now. Love love love
Definitely hydrating! Get this if you want a glow without the grease or shimmer. If you don’t want it to pill then dab it rather than rubbing it onto your skin.

I was suspisious with the price of this pruduct. But I confirm my skin retains water and got more hydrated. Dont get me wrong: I have a mixed oily skin . I got no pimples and skin not oily. Gel texture. Fresh. Great before your daily hydratant
Love this brand! so inexpensive but still good quality. I will be buying more!

I used this for a week before being told that my skin looked tighter, the ultimate compliment. I’ve used Sunday Riley Luna oil, Lancome Genifique, Tata Harper’s night oil... this had great results (if not better) on par with those brands and it’s one fraction of the price. The dropper is a bit frustrating but I cannot get over how tight and smooth my skin looks.
review_title: Incredible serum, better than luxury brands

review_text: Such a great, affordable option. It isn’t obviously as amazing as your clinical or medical grade products but IS AN AMAZING OPTION!!! Not everyone can afford pure, high end products and I recommend this even if you can afford the higher end items.I wish the dropper was significantly better though... drips all over the place even when you aren’t squeezing it, really hard not to make a bit of a mess or to control the amount of drops quite well at all... with the higher end HA I have, it’s a very clear *drop, drop* and this runs and runs... Would repurchase!
review_title: great affordable option, works! dropper sucks tho

review_text: I was so excited about this brand after it blew up over social media and I’d been looking for a quality hyaluronic acid treatment for some time. I was so disappointed for the first few weeks of using this in my daily skin care routine because it made any moisturizer or makeup I put over it pill no matter how long I waited for it to soak in. I was about to give up on it until I started reading reviews saying that you should use this while your face is still wet. I usually use this after my toner and didn’t want to wet my face again so I decided to try adding water with it in my hands before applying to my face AND IT IS A GAME CHANGER WOW. Made the biggest difference and now I’m obsessed, face is so hydrated and no more pilling! If you’re not loving this treatment, trust me just add water and it will change your life.
A little bit sticky and i can’t mix it with my oil before bedtime because it kind of remove the serum. Good price !

This is a great product once you figure out how to use it. This technique is the best and so simple once I figured it out. It makes this $7 bottle really really worth it. I’ve bought it on and off a few times over the years but I’ve only now figured out how to properly utilize it. This serum can act all sorts of ways depending on the way I apply it. It can become sticky, it can emulsify and become tacky, and it ball up like a peeling solution, and it dry on top of the skin without absorbing creating a very dry look, and it can create a plastic like film on top of the skin. LOL now that being said, when applied correctly this stuff sinks and melts into my skin beautifully plumping it up and creating an absorbent foundation for my moisturizer to follow. This is how I apply this particular Hyaluronic acid to my skin:**On DAMP SKIN** this is either damp from previously washing my face, or splashed with water, orr spritzed with a face refresher like a toner or those aerosol water spritz thingys. Use the dropper to pour a small amount, approx pearl sized, and I SPREAD it across my hands. I do not rub or ‘warm up’ or use any rotating movements, I simply spread the product by gliding my hands across one another (imagine brushing crumbs off your hands or something). This spreading motion is how I apply it to my face as well. I do NOT RUB this product in, I do NOT USE CIRCULAR MOTION to rub it in. Simply spread it evenly across my face and then with my whole hand I press it into my skin until it feels warm. My face usually still feels a bit damp which is what I want, I immediately apply my moisturizer which is Cerave and that locks in the water absorption. My skin is immediately plump hydrated and even toned. **BONUS HYDRATION if you apply this in a steamy room i.e. after you shower and your bathroom is still steamed up.
review_title: How to make this bottle WORTH IT’S $7 cost

review_text: No frills just HA! I use this in accompaniment to vitamin C serum or after retinol/retinoids. If the texture of the serum is bothersome, you can apply a moisturizer over it, or as I do, my SPF and it usually helps with pilling. You are paying for the active ingredient at a great value and it works.

This product was just meh. The first one I purchased was in-person in Canada and the consistency was very watery. After the first bottle shattered in my bag, I repurchased it from Sephora US and the consistency was much thicker and stickier. Not sure what’s up with that. The product itself didn’t feel very hydrating at all despite its claims, and it pilled up under moisturizer really badly. I tried it under 3 different moisturizers and after cleansing my face, but nothing helped. I hoped to love this product given how affordable it is, but unfortunately it didn’t work for me.

Well, this is not particularly the fault of the product itself, but I found out that you’re not supposed to use it in dry climate (i live in high desert) because it will draw moisture out of your skin into the air instead of out of the air into your skin. I found out about this after I started cracking around my nose and cheeks, which stayed red and painful for almost a week! I was getting extremely dry and my skin started getting irritated and breaking out. Other than that, it’s okay. Mostly helpful when I’m in more humid climate (east coast).
review_title: OH GOD PLS DON'T USE THIS IN DRY CLIMATE

review_text: Had this on my shelf for months and barely used it because I have an oily tzone and figured this would make my skin too oily. But I recently did more research on it and I will never go a day without using this!!!!!! I love it. Its helped my pores shrink, give me a glow and I love the texture of it on my skin - hydrating but gives me a matte finish. I use this right after Buffet + Copper Peptides and right before my moisturizer and makeup. I use this in the morning and at night.. and it will always be a staple. Even if you have oily skin, I guarantee you that you need this.
review_title: A staple in my everyday routine

review_text: First of all, this product is so cheap compared to other skincare products and is definitely worth the buy. I have really bad acne especially on my forehead and with less than 1 week of usage, my skin is already so much cleaner. I use it in the morning and at night before using my moisturizer. The first few seconds of using the product, the product is really liquidy. After you dab the product into your skin, a few seconds later the product will fully “dissolve“ and leave a sticky, but refreshing residue. (the stickiness is not bad at all btw). This product has helped my skin feel and look so much healthier and I absolutely recommend it to anyone with bad acne and blemishes. This is my full honest opinion, 10 out of 10 in love.

I’ve been looking for ways to cut the cost of my skincare routine and when I saw hyaluronic acid for only $7 I figured you can’t go wrong with at least trying that. I have used different HA type serums for hydration by other companies (caudalie and drunk elephant) and found them to be really awesome adds. They add so much moisture and bounce to your skin and help the products on top go a bit further. That was not my experience with The Ordinary’s HA. Ordinary’s HA tightened and dried my skin (literally the opposite of what HA should do?!). And I couldn’t put any products on top of this without the HA pealing and rolling off on my face with little chunks everywhere... gross.I firmly believe that everybody’s skin is different so my experience might not be the same as yours. But I also firmly believe that you get what you pay for and I’ll probably just toss the remainder of the bottle as no stores are open to return to and $7 is not worth mailing back a return.
review_title: You get what you pay for...

review_text: The best serum you can get for the price! It’s a staple in my skincare routine now.

This was my first purchase from The Ordinary and my first ever hyaluronic acid product.  I must say that I’m really impressed! At the first application, my skin looked visibly plump and glowing. The price makes this even more worth it. You need very little and the dropper is very helpful in dispensing the right amount. I love this product BUT I knocked off one star for one reason only which is under makeup, this product pills very badly! I’ve also tried one from  the inky list and while that one doesn’t pill, it doesn’t hydrate as well as this one. I’ll be sticking with this one in the future but beware that the pilling can be frustrating.

I’ve loved other products from The Ordinary, and loved other Hyaluronic Acid products - but didn’t love this one in particular. I’m not sure if I got an “off” batch, but I can’t use this with any other products (usually I would layer Hyaluronic acid and a Squalenes serum) or under make up because the Acid starts to pill up and rub off. So weird! Does this happen to anyone else? I can kind of keep it on ok if I “pat” on the second product/make up but it’s definitely annoying and doesn’t seem to happen to other Hyaluronic Acid products I’ve used.
Love this stuff. It’s like a large glass of water for your skin!! So hydrating.
I don’t use this alone I add it with my moisturizer and vitamin c serum and I love my results I’m getting
This stuff is awesome! I had a friend recommend the brand to me and I will be purchasing most of the items in this skin care line. The value is insane!
This serum coupled with a good moisturizer does great at keeping skin hydrated. Alone it doesn’t do much but with something else... It does good. Cant complain about the price

I really wanted to like this but it made my skin feel so dry and right like I couldn’t move my face. I used it for a few days and it made me break out a lot for a week after I stopped using it. I have somewhat sensitive skin but nothing has made me break out like this did.

This product didn’t work for me. I used it over the course of 6 months and it just doesn’t add moisture to my skin the way it should. If I was especially dry, it seemed like using this made me even drier.
LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! It adds sooo much moisture into my skin! Can’t say enough good things!

This product has been a game changer! I have naturally dry skin and it has done wonders in hydrating my skin at a deep level! You MUST APPLY TO DAMP SKIN!!! If you try to put this on dry skin it will have the opposite effect as intended. A little goes a long way with this. I follow this up with a select few serums and a high quality moisturizing night cream for dry skin to lock it all in!
Love this product ! Stick with it and you will see results! Made my skin soft and plump. Gave me the hydration my skin needed without making it feel oily.
AMAZING! Highly recommend! Great product for the price! Remember to apply while your face is still damp with water!
Good pricing. This helps with the hydration of your skin. Good product
Splash water on your face before you apply this and thank me later, you won’t need to use as much and it won’t pill under other products
My skin doesn’t like this at all. Clogs my pores & is so sticky.. kind of just sits on top but doesn’t absorb into skin.

For the cost, I would say it’s definitely worth trying this serum. Unfortunately, I found that it pills a lot and I cannot wear makeup with it. I stopped wearing it in the morning and applied it at night after showering, however I found that the following morning (a full 6 hours later) it still pilled and took off my makeup.
My favorite ordinary product. It smooths my skin and a perfect moisturizer. A small drop is good for all. I apply it under eye too.

One of my must have holy grails!! The way HA works is by drawing moisture to your skin so don’t expect this to feel like a moisturizer it is not that! But it will make a huge difference on dry skin over time. The correct/best way to apply this is on damp skin, you can also mix a few drops with a face oil on your palms before applying (which is what I do) and/or with your moisturizer, wait until it absorbs before applying makeup!

To all the people saying it is sticky or it makes their face more dry- you need to apply it to a *damp* face! This way it draws the moisture from the water into your skin and it won’t feel sticky. Otherwise, it could be pulling moisture from your skin and drying it out. I didn’t like the product on first use but upon applying it to wet skin it has become a game changer!

I do notice a difference with this product. My skin is temporarily more hydrated but I wouldn’t say it’s more hydrated after I wash this off. This also pills up when I apply makeup or rub my face just a little too hard (even hours after application). I go back and forth on whether I like this and would repurchase

This product took me a little while to get the hang of. I experienced the problem noted by many that it pills under makeup, which it definitely does. As it is did for me under serums and other face creams. The instructions mention to mix it with water based products but that didn’t work for me either. What i do now is went my hands with just a little bit of water and then apply the product.I give it a good 10-15 minutes to sit and soak in, and then I’ll apply my next product. It’s not very convenient and I can’t apply this product when i’m in a rush but I do like it and it’s an excellent value.
review_title: you may need to manipulate the product a bit

review_text: This is a great product. I have dry skin with a little oil on my t zone and was worried it may lead to issues, but it actually worked great! And wow, WHAT A PRICE!
One of my holy grail products, I use it almost everyday. Can be a little sticky when first applied, but when your moisturizer is applied over top it’s perfectly fine!
Definitely recommend this product , it will give glow to the skin with great moisturizing effect

This product was sticky and not in the good way. I felt like it didn’t hydrate my face at all and if I tried to go in with make up after it would break up my make up. Any products I’d use on my skin felt like they weren’t working at all and all I felt was that stickiness. It did okay on my neck. Nothing spectacular.

It leaves your skin glistening. I use it every morning and night after cleansing and before moisturizers. Would recommend if your looking to incorporate hyaluronic acid into you skin regimen, I’d highly recommend this product.
This product doesn’t really absorb into the skin. Instead it becomes flaky and sits on top.  It also isn’t suited for layering. The price is nice.

Overall a good product, if you are having trouble with the tacky feel of the product apply the serum on damp skin!Your skin is able to receive more hydration because the hyaluronic acid has water to hold and transfer into your skin!

I’ve bought this three times (forgetting I’ve owned it) based off the amazing reviews. I finally had to leave one myself.  This is very tacky and sticky (and cakes around the opening after a few uses). I’ve noticed that this feels like a drying mask where it makes my skin feel thirsty and tight and will literally peel off my face after an hour or so. Only when I use it with heavy moisturizer, it makes it more bearable.. but really notice no difference to my skin. Please remind me to not buy this again; I don’t care how cheap it is.
review_title: I am confused what the hype’s about?

review_text: Give this a chance, the first time I used this my face felt sticky and tight. I tried it again the next day and it was like a different serum! I use it with the Ordinary face cream. I love it and the price is great.
I wanted to love this.  I tried it for after my dermarolling.  However, it dries and PEELS.  Very unsightly and I feel like it’s not really working or soaking in if it’s peeling off.
Amazing ! Use this all the time and see great results. I recently ran out and ya... see a big difference !

Amazing! I have used so many serums before, Lancôme, ,shiseido, alginist, this is the best basic hydrating serum I have ever experienced. Used along with NMF +HA cream, it works wonderfully! Although it’s a little sticky with the first touch of it, but absorbs quickly.

Takes a while to notice results with this product. I started using it a few months ago and felt like it made my skin drier right after application. But my sister swore by it so I kept going with it. I’ve definitely noticed a difference, but it’s not huge, which isn’t a big concern for me since it’s so cheap. I use it once a day but if I forget, I don’t notice a huge difference in my skin so I wouldn’t say it’s a make-or-break product.
Absolutely love this product. And at a great price point!!
Didn’t hydrate my skin at all, in fact it made it even more drier.
Love this product. Skin feels smooth and hydrated every time I use this. Great value for money.

I like to use this product in conjunction with retinols and retinol alternatives. I find that the combination of both products together really helped my skin repair itself. In fact, I found that my scars and dark spots went away. My face also felt hydrated. While doing some research i read that if you are using a product with Hyaluronic Acid in it, you should make sure that your face is somewhat damp or that you are in a humid environment (like in your bathroom after a shower) in order to get the full effect of Hyaluronic Acid. I read that if you apply this product directly on a dry face, the Hyaluronic Acid will take the moisture from your skin and either dry you out or cause breakouts. By keeping your face a little damp, the Hyaluronic Acid will trap the moisture underneath it and use it to help your skin! Ever since i started applying this product at night after my showers or after washing my face, i noticed a difference. my face felt plump and hydrated (but not oily) when i wake up.

Honestly, for the price, it’s pretty awesome. I wouldn’t ONLY just this but also use with a moisturizer and maybe a facial oil. Absorbs into skin very easily, and you do feel the skin is plumper after several uses. Out of all of Ordinary’s products, definitely high on my list.

I never knew how important it is to keep your skin hydrated. Using this for about a month my skin has been glowing, feels plump, and I have not suffered as much from hormonal acne. I use it day and night. It does have a sticky consistency so instead of rubbing it into the skin I pat it into my skin to really make sure the serum seeps into my skin.

I tried this product different ways and experienced the same results: peeling product and tight, somewhat uncomfortable skin. When I tried it with my nightly skin routine, I woke up with patches of my skin peeling, which is abnormal for me. I thought maybe my skincare products weren’t working together with the hyaluronic acid, so I did tested different patches on my face and arms to see how the product performed. I used 1 drop in each area and allowed it to dry for 10 min before applying anything on top. The patch without additional product looked as if there was a film on top and when I began rubbing it, it peeled up white “crumbs“ as if a peeling mask was being removed. When I applied moisturizer to the other patches of skin and rubbed it in, almost immediately the product began peel off. The only time I didn’t experience peeling was when I carefully dabbed the moisturizer into my skin but even then, my skin felt tight and uncomfortable and left me wanting to wash my face. In all cases, the product didn’t feel like it sunk in but felt as if it created a barrier on my skin so even if it didn’t peel any products that are applied on top wouldn’t sink into the skin. For the price, I’m not too angry at the disappointing results but it’s a lesson in not believing the hype. Next time I’ll be sure to request samples before trying any “rave“ skincare product.
review_title: Leaves film, doesnt sink in, and peels easily

review_text: I’ve been through 3 bottles of this stuff. I use it morning and night, its a great hydrator. Its really important to remember to apply it to damp skin though!!! Hyaluronic acid is really strong, it absorbs moisture and locks it in. So if you put it on dry skin it’ll suck up your moisture and steal it. Works amazing but remember to keep your skin damp!
I love this product. I pair it with Vitamin C and it works great!

This product completely saved my skin. I’ve been using HA products for a few months, like sheet masks and a moisturizer, and I had already noticed the difference. I got a pretty bad chemical burn on my face due to a strong cleanser (I have extreme sensitive skin) and applying this serum twice daily completely healed my intense peeling and cracked skin in only a few days. I absolutely recommend any hyaluronic acid products, but this one is definitely a game changer!
I have used this product on its own as well as with niacinamide in the morning and evening. It’s helped make my skin feel more plump and really helped diminish all my pimples.
So far this product is very good. My jawline is usually super dry but since I have used it there’s no dry spots at all! Great product for the price.

I’ve been using this product for a few months now. I have noticed SOME improvement on my skin, however I find that it pills when I put anything else on-top of it. Even after waiting 30mins, if I put on any facial oil or moisturizer it starts to pill. I found that I have to GENTLY pat any other face product I put on after this.

I’ve been using this for the past 3 months or so and I’ve definitely seen an increase in my skins moisture, texture and elasticity.  I’ve tried other HA’s and this one works great by far and you can’t beat the price.  Definitely recommend for anyone needing more moisture in their routine.
Wonderful product. Great price. Wrinkles less obvious because of hydration!
Amazing Product! I loved it so much that ordered the bigger size like a week later!
Great serum for sensitive combo skin type. I bought this when I couldn’t justify the $$$ of  S.O.S from Claudalie.
Provides excellent moisture and is a good first step before creams.

I add this underneath my moisturizer at night, I find in the morning my skin feels well hydrated and smooth. I find when first putting it on it can have a bit of a sticky feeling. I also have found a couple hours after applying it flakes. However not sure if that has something to do with how I am using it. Overall, for the price it’s a great addition to your skincare!
My favorite Hyaluronic acid oil on the market! Best price and great quality available. Love all The Ordinary oils and moisturizers.
Love this product for my dry skin and for the price you can’t go wrong. I’ll be repurchasing this once it runs out. I’m looking forward to trying other skincare products from this line.
I am loving this product! It’s a little sticky at first, but it’ll dry down. It’s great for my slightly sensitive skin. Gives me extra hydration without being overpowering (aka breakouts).
I have been using this product for 3 weeks and my skin already looks better. I love it.

Loved this product! My skin has some issues with keeping in moisture and staying hydrated, so I needed a serum to help lock that needed moisture in. My esthetician recommended this product a few months back during my facial, so I thought I should give it a shot.  Needless to say, I am so happy with the results. My skin is dewy and plump! Worth every penny and I highly recommend!

This is the third time I have ordered this product. It is thick and rich and works well under my moisturizer.  The quality of the Ordinary products, especially for the price is excellent. With the larger size, it is even a better bargain!
review_title: Hyaluronic Acid at this price is crazy!

review_text: Love this product!!! Face feels hydrated And looks awesome!

No complaints with this serum, it definitely gives a hydration boost but you need to use with a moisturizer for sure to lock everything in. I’ve been using with the Fresh Rose Deep Hydrating Moisturizer and its a nice combo. It’s a little hick and gooey coming out of the dropper but absorbs pretty nicely on my dry/combo skin. I’ve found that I need an extra healing oil for my chapped nose area but the HA Serum definitely helps.
This has helped my oily/acne-prone skin so much! I put on after cleansing and vitamin c serum and my skin has felt great, not super oily, and not dry! Love it and will buy again!
This product made my skin smoother. when you apply it it’s a tacky texture, but after just a few minutes it absorbs into my skin.
love it i use it every night and my skin is glowing!

Theres no product I’ve purchased, emptied and repurchased more. Theres nothing else in my beauty routine thats as versatile or at a better price point. I layer it into my routine when my skin needs extra moisture which is most days given all the actives I use. After toning my skin, I apply with a drop of d-bronzi (drunk elephant) mixed in and a layer of spf on top. I only pill if I let this product dry before adding my spf on top. My trick is layer right away. The end result is a super hydrated, dewy look that belongs on vacation.
I’ve been using this product for a couple of months with zero change in my skin. I was excited to try it after so many positive reviews but it simply fell flat.
Love this serum! It keeps my skin so hydrated and supple.

there’s nothing wrong with it, but it hasn’t really done anything. it’s probably because i don’t use a sunscreen. the cap won’t close properly and i really hate that, but i don’t think it dries out the product. it’s a nice size. i’ll update this review once i get a sunscreen.
this helped with my cystic hormonal acne. you need this in your skincare routine if you don’t already have something lie it
Love it this product! I saw a big difference within the first week of using it. Very affordable as well
review_title: Must have in your daily routine

review_text: I’ve been using this now for a few months. I do find that it plumps the skin, giving me a more hydrated, fresher appearance, and it works well with my moisturizer, but I could take it or leave it. The tacky, sticky feeling as it dries is unpleasant. Bonus is it does not react with my sensitive skin.

I absolutely love this product! I’ve been into hyaluronic acid for a while, and this is a great way to get moisturized skin! I was a little nervous to buy even though I’ve seen this on many lists of top hyaluronic products because several reviews here talked about the product being sticky or pilling if you put anything on top of it. I have a slightly oily skin type, but this goes on so well and only is sticky until it absorbs (I’d say less than 10-15 seconds?) I’m wondering if people who are experiencing pilling have properly exfoliated. You should also always let a product absorb before putting another one on! I’ve only ever had issues with pilling when a) applying too much of a product or b) not exfoliating or washing skin enough. my skin feels so hydrated after this, I still use a moisturizer because hyaluronic acid helps to make moisturizers do their job and absorb into your skin better.
Cured my dry skin after just one night. I love this product and will continue to restock!!
An absolute staple in my skincare routine. Make sure your face is cleansed and moist when applying this product, follow with a moisturizer!
I didn’t really see any effects after using HA. My dermatologist told me that HA really only works if you inject it under the skin so I’m going to drop this one from my routine.

I can only wear this product at night because it comes through beneath makeup. It absorbs quickly and makes my skin feel hydrated immediately, but the texture remains on the surface of the skin. If I put makeup on top of it, it looks like a thin layer of Elmer’s glue is stretched across my face. It’s not exactly pilling that’s the problem (because it doesn’t roll of my face when I try to remove it)--but something comparable that I don’t have a word for yet. I got this after I tried (and loved) the Sephora brand All Day Hydrator and wanted something more concentrated with Hyaluronic Acid. I like this formula enough to continue using the bottle that I have, but I will not be re-purchasing it.
review_title: Good for night use, impossible under make-up

review_text: This product is very thick and you really dont need alot a little of it goes a long way i love it i love the tackiness it has when youre done applying it i havent had a problem with peeling although around the lid is messy and peeling like a bottle of glue with that being said i like this product on my skin and it hasnt effected my makeup application jts really affordable and worth the try!

I struggle with dry skin and this definitely helps! I wash my face and put this on before my lotion and it gives an extra boost. Before my lotion, it does feel a bit tight, so I would recommend always adding a lotion on top. My skin glows with this product and I’m constantly buying it because I love it so much!

so this product works best when applied on damp skin. if you put it on dry there’s no benefits. i pat a couple drops into my damp skin, wait 10 or so minutes and then follow with moisturizer. it doesn’t pill or flake on me and actually helps my moisturizer go on smoothly, strange to see all the bad reviews! i guess i got lucky with mine, my skin is combo/dry and very reactive and i’ve had nothing but success with this one, i always repurchase.
This did nothing to my skin except leave it dry and red. My skin was left irritated and had a couple of minor breakouts. It supposed to hydrate your skin, but I didn’t notice any hydration qualities.

This product is so worth the money, gives beautiful hydration and leaves skin feeling refreshed. The only problem I have had when using this alone is it drying and peeling from my skin, but this may be because I have been using it very generously. But in relation to the price, I can definitely overcome this issue. When added to another cream or product, I have not experienced the same issue.

I am on my fifth bottle of this and I cannot live without it. It helps hydrate my face without causing breakouts, and not to be gross, but I’ve struggled with butt acne since I was a teenager, and this has solved that problem completely.

In the matter of a day, I experienced the serum pEELING! I didn’t even get the chance to try makeup on top because it was peeling because I added an Oil on top. I’m pretty annoyed right now and I didn’t see or feel a ‘pluming and hydrating’ feel to my face like everyone else did during the first use.
Love this stuff! I have been using this for over a month and have seen significant improvement in my skins hydration. I have ran through the product quickly and will definitely be repurchasing.
A little sticky on its own,  but affordable enough to mix a few drops with my body cream.  This really improves the crepey skin!

This is easily my favorite hyaluronic acid on the market. I have tried too many overpriced and under-performing ones to know., This high quality acid helps plump your skin and hydrates unlike any other. Very happy with this find.

I have been using this product for the past 2 weeks and it does a great job and keeping my skin motorized and dewy and dries down with in about a minute or so. To get the best effects of this serum it’s best applied after your cleanser and toner while the skin is still damp. The down side is it does how ever pill up which can be very annoying but it’s not the end of the world the trick is when applying the serum PAT it on to your skin instead and it will not pill. If you are going to layer it with another product apply it in the same method to avoid pilling.
This product is great. I add a few drops to my nigh time moisturizer and when I wake up my skin looks and feels great.

What the heck?! This is the exact opposite than I thought it was going to be... I love the texture-it’s like a gel almost. It was easy to apply. There’s no scent, thankfully. It’s clear in color. Only, a few minutes after it dried it PEELED! What?! I felt and looked like I had just applied Elmers glue to my face! HECK NO! I bought this to use in conjunction with skin care and makeup-not on its own. I could never use this. What sucks is that it was so cheap that, starting a return is basically pointless but I am doing it anyway because is $6 that can be used on anything else! Very disappointed!! I may have received a bad batch but I just don’t feel like trying again with this. The only other Ordinary product I have tried is the lactic acid and that is a million times better and so worth it!!
review_title: Feels like applying Elmers glue to my skin!!

review_text: This is my favorite serum ever. I use it morning and night and it leave my skin feeling soft, supple, and hydrated. If I am not wearing makeup during the day and I feel like my skin needs a little pick me up, this is my go to. It wears well under makeup too. I actually think the tackiness helps with that. My skin drinks this stuff up, it is incredible!
J’ai pas du tout aimé, laisse la peau sèche et à un effet collant.

This product does not absorb into the skin. It feels like a tight layer of plastic sitting on your skin.  It also peels off, particularly if you apply anything else on top of it (including makeup).  It did not moisturize my skin, in fact my face feel tight and uncomfortable after application. I cannot say for sure if this is the product that made my skin break out, as I was using another new product at the same time. Such a bizarre product, I am confused as to why so many people love it.  I tried applying less, applying more, waiting before applying anything on top of it....all to no avail. I tried applying other serums underneath it as well but the result was always pilling. Just could not get this product to do anything useful for me.
This product is awesome. Holds hydration and my skin feels soft and plump after use. Bye bye dryness.

The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid has totally balanced my oily, but often dehydrated skin. I use a very thin layer over my entire face after cleansing and my skin is instantly rehydrated. This serum is extremely emollient and slippery so don’t use to much or it’ll drip everywhere. Just a few small drops and then wait a few seconds for it to absorb. It doesn’t make the skin greasy or disrupt moisturizer or primers when placed on top. It has replaced the buffet serum for me and has eliminated the need for a moisturizer unless in the depths of winter.  I highly recommend.
review_title: The one serum to rule them all.

review_text: I put it on and initially, my skin felt good. When I woke up, my skin was peeling so much that the flakes were the size of coins. It scared me. Upon further testing I realized it was this product. I began flaking in less than an hour. I did a spot test after the fact on my arm, where my skin is not sensitive, and it also began flaking. It is supposed to moisturize but does the opposite. DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE OILY OR COMBINATION SKIN!
review_title: Flakes My Skin! DO NOT BUY!

review_text: I will definitely recommend this! It makes my skin so soft!

This is a really great serum to boost hydration in your skin! Especially considering the price point, this is a must have. A lot of people are commenting on the stickiness of the serum. It is true, however, if you’re following the serum with a proper moisturizer and face oil there is no traces of a sticky residue left. I always recommend this product.

I’m almost done with my first bottle. I use it morning and night right after washing my face and I get my fingertips wet and then apply it with damp hands and I think it works best like that for me. My skin feels super hydrated after!

Does help moisturize skin overnight, but too sticky to wear during the day. Good for it’s price point, and will help ease some of the drying effects of Retinol, but not great for daytime. I will be trying something else for next serum.
It was good, I thought it wasn’t work but it works a lot
After the first use, my 40y/o skin felt softer and definitely more moisturizer. Definitely recommend!

this product is easy to put on you don’t need a lot but its a little sticky when you first apply it. For me it makes my skin feel tight where the dry parts. But everywhere else it feels fine. I’m a little disappointed I really hoped for my skin to feel more hydrated.
Amazing! Skin feels revitalized and moisturized, not heavy at all. Great absorption!

This is my favourite serum. Hyaluronic is known to contain 1000% of hydrations and it is just perfect for everyday hydration care. I use this in both day and night and this is key to stay hydrated. I am on my third bottle.
Decent for the first 1 minute after application. Feels a lot hydrating when you follow up with your regular moisturizer. The serum tends to peel off and dry up on your face.
review_title: Not bad but could be better

review_text: Made for hydrating your face. Use after cleaner and toner!
Very hydrating!!! Super nice on the skin and works well when mixing with other products
using 2-3 times a week as i have other products also. Liked very much. It is cheap but has an effect
I think I must have got a bad batch. When I put this product on it never sinks into my skin. It leaves a small layer on the surface and then peels and flakes off.
I love this product. I learned that it is best combined with Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA in AM and 100% Plant-Derived Squalane in PM.

Initially absorbs very well but soon after starts pilling like crazy. Flakes off my face. Absolutely can not wear during the day. Not sure if it was a bad batch as I have not had this problem with the Ordinary’s serums.

This is the first serum I have ever tried, so I’m not super familiar with exactly they are supposed to do. What I can say it that the application is easy and I really love putting this stuff on before my face creams. It’s very soft and glides on the skin. It does get sticky for a few seconds after applying, but absorbs quickly into the skin. I do believe my skin is improving because of this product. The price is also a bonus!

I just had to write a review. I am a 59yr old woman and recently purchased 7 different The Ordinary products. What an incredible difference they have made for my skin.
