I have light wrinkles and deep wrinkles which have most definitely been reduced. I have tried so many products and spent way too much money on creams that did nothing. I’m feeling so much better about my skin!

I absolutely notice a difference when I’m using this consistently, my skin is horribly dry. I’ll use it on lips or hands if they are feeling particularly dry in addition to under my facial moisturizer.

I just started using it and right away I’ve notice a difference . I already use an essence , toner, facial spray and a serum right before moisturizing and I still felt the dry patches on my face . Fortunately, immediately after using this my skin felt supple and hydrating even throughout the day I didn’t feel any of the dry patches . The only thing I haven’t used it with is makeup . Hopefully it performs well !

I have textured skin due to dryness and sensitivity but when I applied this product, hydrated problem areas like my cheeks where it’s very sensitive and dry. it felt like the oil hydrated those problem areas and locked that hydration in, leaving my skin smooth and got rid of the texture of dryness.
review_title: Helps with dryness and sensitive skin

review_text: Best moisturizing product by far! My skin has been going through some changes due to weather and a little aging which has caused dryness and fine lines. I was able to tell a difference by first time use as my skin looked smooth, hydrated and plumped. Definitely recommended!
Every time I apply this it doesn’t seem to shrink but peel off after I put makeup on. I found the inkylist  hyaluronic serum better than this one.

Miracle worker! I could definitely tell a difference in my skin after the first use of this product. It looks more moisturized and plump. I love it. I catch myself looking in the mirror at my skin and I am ecstatic with my results

Hello soft skin!! My face feels so amazingly plump after I put this on! My skin is very dry and dehydrated so I will usually apply this right after I’ve taken a shower to take advantage of all the moisture in the air, and it truly works wonders. Be sure to use a water-based moisturizer and face oil for protection though, as it has felt like it was pulling hydration out of my skin when I wasn’t careful about that.
I use this at night along with the ordinary toner and my face looks incredible in the morning. Completely hydrated, even tone and my pores are non existent! Really great and you can’t beat the price.

Not sure if it’s just my skin being sensitive but I squeezed 2  on my fingers and applied in to my face and after about a minute or some it’s started to burn. I’ve been using this on my hands recently then layering it with a lotion since my hands get so flakey due to washing it all the time. However, on your face, it’s also really nice :) I just prefer using it on my hands due to how dry it gets.

Product is sticky, but if you let it settle it doesn’t peel. I really like to use this at night, and i love mixing it with the Drunk Elephant b-hydra. It’s worth trying, and I will definitely repurchase

The product is sort of sticky and if I try to layer sunscreen or another moisturizer on top, it pills immediately.  Pretty disappointing.  I’ll probably try to use the rest of the bottle by applying only before bed. Wouldn’t buy again.

review_text: Dry, oily, dehydrated, or normal - your skin will appreciate this little bottle of wonderful. I started on this about a month ago and I instantly noticed a huge difference - and by instantly I mean the day after. I’ve actually never seen such fast results from a product. I apply this twice a day, AM & PM, all over my face, neck, and underneath my eyes & for instant plumping and dewy, dreamy skin. So worth it.

Love this serum! I actually enjoy the stickiness and if you let it soak in it will go away (especially if you layer a moisturizer on top). I will sat that I’m not sure there’s a dramatic difference in hydration, but it is noticeable (I have dehydrated and dry skin).

I wanted to really love this but unfortunately I just don’t. I have several amazing products from The Ordinary but this is not one of them.It feels amazing when it first goes on but turns sticky immediately. I have to pat it into my skin or it foams up which, I can get past if that were the only problem. My biggest issue is that once it dries I cannot apply anything  additional to my skin or the product pills up and flakes off like nasty dead skin. Even a gentle rub pills it up and it flakes off.I might be able to use this at night if I am  super careful when applying my moisturizer but I will not buy this again and cannot recommend it to others.
Gently exfoliates my skin, lightens scars, and also helps dry my acne.I use this before I moisturize in order to keep my skin looking even.

I was really hyped to get this after someone highly recommended it to me. I was also very happy with the price as well. I only used it a few times, usually right out of the shower with my face still damp and in one week it caused me to literally get dandruff on my face! I thought this stuff was supposed to hydrate your skin, not dry it out!I use it the same way, only 2 drops, fresh out of the shower with damp skin after cleansing it in the shower. Wait a minute for it to soak in, spritz some rose toner on it and apply my moisturizer and even after all this, I still got face dandruff. I went online to Reddit to see if they had any suggestions and there wasn’t many outside of the air perhaps being dry and this stuff is supposed to draw in moisture, but since I applied it topically, it drew out the moisture in my skin instead of the other way around. I’m not sure if this is 100% correct, but I can’t figure it out. Guess I will have to keep trying since I’ve got the rest of the bottle to go

I’ve been using this for some time now, and I’m still confused on how creams are supposed to go over this product. review_text: This stuff took my skin to a whole new level. I’ve always had problem skin, and I use prescription topical treatments which have helped tremendously. I think this product is a great value! It layers beautifully with my other skin care! I feel like it’s been helping with the fine lines in my forehead. Would recommend!
An amazing affordable serum. I paid much more for a similar product and see the same results.
I work outside all winter and I tried every kind of lotion and none worked like this product along with rosehip seed oil, this has been my saving face. No more chapped flaking skin.
Amazing stuff I have literally gone through 3 bottles now. I use it before my moisturizer every night and have seen a difference in my skin. Love it!!

I am a big fan or The Ordinary line. But this product is a no for me. I have used other brands of both B5 and hyaluronic acid, without issues. But this pilled up completely. This product is really good for people who have dry and sensitive skin. I only used this product once but it’s still very easy to use especially having the squeeze top. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend, 10/10.

I kept trying it to see if it was other products in my routine, but it kept happening. Definitely patch test if you decide to try it.

review_title: a great product for a great price.

not really seeing a difference after several weeks of use. still have a lot of texture in my dry areas the consistency is weirdly sticky. sometimes doesnt lay well with my other products. would rather spend a little. Irwin money and get the glossier version or the drunk elephant one
review_title: okay, but there are better options

review_text: Three drops; one on each cheek and forehead is all you need. I rub it in a little like when I’m marinating some baby back ribs, then gently pat till the face is kinda dry. It moisturizes the deeper layers of the skin so you still need to moisturize with a cream or something afterwards or you’re going to feel like your skin is a bit tight. It goes great with foundation (I use NARS) and makes my face feel hydrated underneath. I’ve lost count of how many bottles I’ve gone through. It’s relatively inexpensive and works just as well as Drunk Elephants hyaluronic acid too.

I was tempted by the good reviews but also skeptical because of the price. I tried it and it gave me cystic acne and made my face so red and blotchy. Took over a week to clear up. Never again will I buy discounted skin products. The consistency was also super sticky and created a later on my skin that peeled off later.

The Ordinary is my favorite beauty brand, and is the first place I go to find products. When I first heard about HA, I thought it made sense and made the purchase. I applied it in the evening and morning and it gets absorbed right away. But in certain areas, especially where I have existing acne, it started to flake on the surface. My skin was a bit reddened and taught, but I didn’t necessarily break out. After using it for a few days, I saw that it didn’t change the nature of my dry skin like I thought it would. After deeper research, I found that HA in the lab doesn’t necessarily behave like the HA found in our cells. If anything, the “water it absorbs“ is not from the air, but from the surface of our skin, since it is in direct contact with it. That probably explains the tightness. There are other products I love, so this I will discontinue.

This product is my HG for dry skin. I took accutane 5 years ago and have had horribly dry skin ever since (worth it!). Since starting this product I finally don’t feel like my skin is super tight and dry. Even better, if you contact their customer service they’ll send you a personalized skin care regime based on what your skin care concerns and conditions are!
review_title: fantastic product, even better customer service!

review_text: I usually love the ordinary but this serum pilled and flakes off my skin even if I only used one drop. I dont think it did anything at all and was very disappointed.  This is the only serum I’ve used that hasn’t soaked into my skin, I usually love serums but this one was like liquid plastic.

It’s hard for me to take away stars from this product because I LOVE The Ordinary. I love what they stand for, I love their products, and obviously I love their prices. They’re also the only skincare company I’ve ever seen that offers a one year return policy on their products if purchased from their official site. ONE YEAR!Anyway as for this product, it’s a good, basic serum. If you’re looking for hyaluronic acid, then here it is. And it does what it’s supposed to do. However, some Ordinary formulations can be hit or miss when it comes to application and layering. I found that this one does not seem to play well with other products. On its own it’s fine, but if I apply anything over top this serum tends to pill. Not a big deal for me if using at night, but I prefer hyaluronic acid in my morning skincare. So I can’t recommend this serum for use under makeup or for layering anything on top.Honestly hyaluronic acid is found in a lot of skincare products these days so I don’t find this serum all that special or necessary, especially compared to other Ordinary products. But if you’re just looking to add hyaluronic acid to your skin, and you don’t care about it pilling, then this one will work. I just think there are better versions so I wouldn’t repurchase this.
review_title: Not the best product from this brand

review_text: I felt like my The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid wasn’t really doing anything until I started putting it on while my skin was still wet in the shower – total game changer. My skin feels way less dry and the serum is a great base for all my other nighttime skincare. Love how affordable it is too.
After my Skinceuticals ran out I thought I would give it a try and I will def not be going back. Hydrated and plumped my skin. Absolutely love! I am acne prone skin and didn’t break me out.

This product actually works great for what it’s suppose to do, I noticed visible change in my skin (blemishes and uneven skin) HOWEVER do not use under makeup it pills up. I recommend only using at night

This serum is truly amazing. I had dry rough patches all over my face by my mouth and nose and on the backs of my hands from washing them so much. I started using this and in just a few days it’s all cleared up and so super soft. A surprising amount of people don’t know how hyaluronic acid works. It takes and holds moisture making it easier for your skin to absorb it. In order for it to do this it needs moisture to begin with. The key to using this serum and any hyaluronic acid product is to apply it to WET skin. If you don’t then it may end up having the opposite effect by taking the moisture out of your skin. I get out of the shower at night and before drying off I apply this to my still moist face (it helps that the hot water already has my pores open). Allow it to air dry and then apply your moisturizers or oils over it. It will help you absorb your moisturizers and oils better as well. I wish I could give this 10 stars it’s truly the best when applied correctly.

I’ve been using Ordinary skincare products for 3 years now, this is by far the best hyaluronic acid for my mature skin, I also use other products from this line and my skin looks hydrated, youthful and it feels wonderful, best purchase ever I am hooked.
Wanted to love it but I couldn’t layer it under my makeup and moisturizer. It just starts to pill and ruins my foundation. Going to have to return it :(
Seems to be making mySkin look better and brighter after daily use

I really wanted to love this product. Not that it is bad or anything but I haven’t noticed any difference at all. And with everyone raving about hyaluronic acid nowadays I was hoping to see more. Love the ordinary products but this didn’t seem to do anything for me.
Very good! I use it with the other acids from Ordinary and this one saves my face from dryness!

Love using it and it’s perfect for my combination skin. I use it daily! It is a pure product and the purest form of any product can be a little harsh for some people’s skin. If your skin is sensitive I would not recommend this or I would only recommend using this product once or twice a week as opposed to daily.

Looove this product. I’ll use 2 Good sized drops along with a few drops of their caffeine, lather it into my hands, and slather it all over a very damp face to lock in the moisture. This product works wonders IF YOU USE IT RIGHT by making sure you’re locking in enough moisture with it so it has water to hold on to! I love to get my face very damp with a plain fresh rose water spray.

I love the way this makes my skin feel. It’s so easy to use and it’s so good for adding moisture yet not being greasy on my skin. My skin has never felt better. Definitely a product I’d recommend especially because it’s so inexpensive. So worth your money. I just wish it was stocked in-store as it’s really inconvenient to have to purchase this online when all other products I buy in-store.

LOVE THIS. I have been wanting to get a serum but have been wary because I have such sensitive skin. This is amazing. It doesn’t make me break out or dry out my skin. I apply it twice a day before moisturizer. Also it’s super affordable!
THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING!!!!! Really helps moisturize my skin and doesn’t require you to use a lot of moisturizer over top! Can’t recommend this enough!!!!
Excelent notice the change from the first application

This is a very simple and straightforward product, so there isn’t much to criticize. If you’re someone who needs hydration for your skin, a hyaluronic acid serum like this one would be a great addition to your routine. Hyaluronic acid is one of the (if not THE) best ingredients out there when it comes to attracting moisture from the atmosphere to your skin. The best way to use this is to apply it onto a face that isn’t completely dry, then follow up with a moisturizer in order to lock that moisture in. Of course, if you have other skincare concerns, just using this serum won’t be enough to solve everything for you, and you’ll have to layer your other products in addition to your hyaluronic acid. It might be smarter to just buy another product that contains hyaluronic acid as well as other ingredients you need — this would decrease the number of layers you’d have to do, which is preferable. The only thing I’m not a huge fan of is the texture. It’s a watery gel but something about this serum feels a little slimy. It can even feel slightly sticky at first. I prefer The Ordinary’s Marine Hyaluronics much more. That product has a straight up watery texture (it literally feels like you’re putting water on your face) and is therefore much thinner and lighter in consistency, which makes it more ideal for layering. Overall not a bad product and very affordable.
Love this product!  I have sensitive skin and it just makes it hydrated and happier.  I layer it over The Buffet.
review_title: Love it!  I consider it a skin care essential.

review_text: Love this product! I like to put this on after I cleanse my face and tone with a non alcohol toner on a wet face. This soaks in the skin very nicely and gives a nice hydrated look. I have to wait a little while to apply my moisturizer on top since it will start to clump up, but overal great! Would purchase again. Did not make me break out which some products do with my sensitive skin.
I’ve repurchased multiple times now.  I apply to a wet face then follow with moisturizer, it has worked wonders for me!
This product is great. Ordered it twice. Keeps my skin moisturized and vibrant under my make up.
Loved how this product provides hydration without greasiness or shine. It absorbs quickly. I use it on neck too. It’s foe all skin types.

I really wanted to love this product but I haven’t seen the best results. My skin doesn’t seem to be more supple or moisturized and I think it could be causing me to breakout. I apply it on damp skin and then put a moisturizer over as I was told this is the bets way to apply it. Maybe its just me but I have been breaking out more than usual when using any product with HA....at least its low cost so its worth a shot to try it out!
if you have dry skin, this a must have!!!! use it on wet skin and follow up with moisturizer and your skin will truly thank you.

Very hydrating, and for the price, you absolutely cannot find anything better. The formulation is much thicker than I expected, and can feel a little sticky on your fingers before you apply (no stickiness after application). I cocktail this with my Drunk Elephant Protini and it works really well.

Feels amazing to put on and layers well with all other products (and helps them absorb better into your skin as well). I recommend this to all my friends
review_title: This product is a life saver with 0 down sides

review_text: After I applied this serum, it started to flake off. I tried to apply it again with while my skin was wet and it still flaked off. I didn’t find the serum hydrating. Honestly not worth purchasing at all.

I combine this product with the Drunk Elephant Protini Polypeptide Moisturizer. I’m almost done the bottle now. I’m giving it three stars because even though I’m using it consistently, I honestly don’t know if it’s doing anything? I keep a daily skin log and I haven’t seen much visible change in my skin. Perhaps it’s doing something wonderful and I’m just not seeing it?? Sometimes my skin still feels a little tight/dry when I use it with my moisturizer, which is disappointing. I’m not upset about the lack of results because of the price! I think I might order another bottle to get me through the winter months and because I’m on a tight budget, but I wish I could see/feel more effective results.

I’m on my second bottle of TO’s HA, and I just love this stuff. I don’t know if they adjusted the formula or if I’ve simply become better at applying this hydrator, but it does not pill under my moisturizers, makeup, oils, or SPF. The key is to apply it to a wet face, and your skin will lap it up. I’ve been using it with Laneige cream skin and it’s like a dream.
review_title: Might be a learning curve but it's great

review_text: I’m on my 2nd bottle of this product, already half finished and definitely going to order more in future.  I have been using hyaluronic acid for over a year now and it’s a favourite part of my skincare regimen.  For starters, this product best works when layered with a facial oil or moisturizing face cream on top of this serum.  Using it alone may cause tight dry skin. I have extremely dry and sensitive skin and this product has been super nice to me.  I wear it every single day as a first step of skincare before any Vit C serum.  I usually wait 5-10 mins before layering with oil or cream as some products MAY pill IF used right after applying this serum.  I would definitely recommend purchasing this if you have dry skin.  it holds in moisture throughout the day (esp winter months because canada is brutal like that). After incorporating this in my skincare routine, and following up with oil/cream, I have never experienced dry patches on my face.  my face looks dewy and moisturized at the end of the day.  highly recommended!!

Do your skin a favor, ditch the expensive syrums and buy this! After years of doing unspeakable things to rid my skin of acne, I destroyed my skin’s natural moisture barrier, leaving me with very dry skin (a fair warning to those acne prone ladies and gents, don’t use harsh soaps and physical exfoliates!  They will damage your skin and can actually make acne worse). After trying several different expensive moisturizers whose fragrance irritated my tired skin, I discovered The Ordinary. Out of all of the products in the line I’ve tried, this has made the single biggest difference in my skin! My skin is glowing and has regained its youthful appearance! I am super cautious to claim that any one product can fix your skin, because let’s face it, that is an advertising ploy meant to lure you into buying more unnecessary products. BUT! There is reason this is used in so many face care products as a featured ingredient. Hyaluronic acid is a naturally occurring substance in the skin that draws and locks in moisture from the environment. Unfortunately your skin produces less as you age. Many derma fillers are made using hyaluronic acid to help smooth fine lines and wrinkles. Syrums like this use molecules too large to really sink into the skin and rather sit on top as a surface barrier (still very important!) If you live in a dry environment, this may not be super effective, as there is no moisture to draw in to the skin and instead, it may draw moisture out of the deep layers of the skin. This can be helped by using other acids in your evening routine that target the deeper layers of your skin. I also highly suggest pairing this with a thicker moisturizer on top, as this is meant to mimic your skin’s water barrier. You only need a small amount of this to spread a thin layer over the skin. If you find that it pills when adding other products on top, trying waiting a few minutes for it to dry.
review_title: A muyst have for dry and/or aging skin!

review_text: I used this per the recommendation in my morning and evening skincare routine suggested by the OT company. I found this to make me appear a bit too greasy. I passed it onto a friend who has dryer skin.
This product is amazing and the price is beyond great!! Everyone needs this in their skincare routine. It’s a must have purchase!!

I use this with the Ordinary Niacinimide and by skin is perfect!! No more acne or redness. It has completely changed the texture of my skin and it feels amazing and my skin doesn’t get nearly as oily throughout the day or dried out in the cold. Highly highly recommend!

This is by far the most amazing skin product I HAVE EVER USED. I have combo skin and can sometimes get random “bumps“ along my forehead. Ever since using this product my skin is so clear, tight, and smooth. It’s helped a lot with my confidence and I’ve even been getting compliments. I also have sensitive skin and can’t really use scented products but this product is basically odorless. If you’re like me and have to brave cold Canadian winters, combo skin, and in need of hydration, this product is for you!
I mix it with my moisturizer at night ! No complaints skin is hydrated and can’t go wrong with the price.

I love this! It’s wonderful to use after treatment and serums. I use a daily moisturizer with HA already, but if my skin is dry, I’ll add a drop. Otherwise, it soaks in at night and my skin is so soft!

What a lifesaver! My dry skin absolutely loves this! On days when my skin is especially dry, I rub this into my skin after cleansing and the relief is real! Under a moisturizer, it helps my skin feel nicely moisturized and I’ve definitely noticed less dry patches under makeup since using it.

I am honestly so amazed with this product!!! After only 2 days using it in the morning and at night I have noticed a HUGE improvement in my skin’s hydration and glow. It does feel a little tacky at first but I use a moisturizer over top and it soaks right into my skin within 10 minutes. . For years I had just accepted the fact that my skin would become dry, flaky and dull during our harsh Canadian winters. This stuff is seriously a game changer. It gives my skin such a youthful glow, sealing in moisture throughout the day. I am so impressed, especially at this price!
My skin react well to this product :( Really tried to like though

This stuff is like a drink for your skin , you can actually feel your face gaining moisture after applying. I am prone to breakouts and have sensitive skin , but this did not break me out . It also wears great under makeup and my face lotion .

Very good, great price! I put it on before bed before my moisturizer and remove it in the morning and it helps keep my skin hydrated. Will flake off or create gunk if you put moisturizer or makeup over it so don’t recommend putting it on in the morning. But great overnight!

I have VERY dry skin, and this has help to improve it greatly. I use it every morning right out of the shower while my skin is still damp, and it holds in the moisture wonderfully. And you can’t beat the price! Holy grail product for me!

This is a great product for what it is, a simple Hyaluronic Acid. It has helped in the hydration of my skin, when used in conjunction with other holy grail heavy moisturizers. I could take or leave this product in my routine, but do enjoy using it while I have it. I will say when I’m dehydrated or when there is really low humidity where I live, I don’t see that this does much for my skin. With how the acid works, it needs moisture in the air/surrounding area to work properly.Highly recommend a tip I saw from a dermatologist on YouTube: make sure to slightly wet your skin before applying to help ensure it doesn’t immediately suck the moisture from the top layer of your skin.
It’s pretty average if you’re looking for something to boost the hydration level for your skin. I’d skip this and go straight for a heavier cream and top it with argan oil and then a sleeping mask.
review_title: Average Product for a hydration booster

review_text: This is my second bottle, I could be more disciplined and use it every single day, but sometimes I skip it.Keeps my skin in place if I’m wearing make up, and also helps with hydration, easy to apply, dries fast and doesn’t make me sticky!

I tried this after I used up Niod(sister brand to the ordinary) hyaluronic acid and I can definitely say that this one works just as good,the Niod one I found does work a little bit better,as well as having a thinner consistency but this one works hydrates my skin just as good. Also I find that even though it gets a little sticky if you rub it in too have too much I always go on top of it with a moisturizer so it’s not that much of an issue for me, overall I really do love it it has red spots dry skin perfectly and I’ve already repurchased it.

Absolutely LOVE this product. I love that it’s vegan, I love that it’s simple, I love that it works and I LOVE that I can add it to other DIY skin care. It has done amazing things to rid the dry spots and signs of aging plaguing my face. Amazing. I’ve bought 6 bottles or so now and the quality is always there.

Literally cured my dry skin. After 2 weeks of use day and night my skin is plump and hydrated. My skin was a little sensitive at first but it got used to it. This product is AMAZING. I highly highly recommend if you struggle with dry skin. My skin is so soft and smooth now!

This made my dry, crepey skin go away in two days. Two. Days. This cold, dry Michigan winter is wreaking havoc on my skin, and this has saved the day. It feels sticky for a few minutes, but just let it sink it. Let your skin drink it up. My skin looks and feels like a million bucks. Follow up with a good night moisturizer to seal the deal, and by morning you’ll think magic happened.
review_title: give it two days and it’s like magic

review_text: and part way through my second bottle. I’ve really enjoyed adding this product to my routine, and I’ve had no issues with dry skin since adding it.
It’s just okay, the price is good, and I make sure to moisten my face before using but it doesn’t seem to soak into my skin well, I have better look with the ordinary buffet serum

I usually don’t review, but this Hyaluronic Acid is exceptional. I’m old (almost 68), and I started using hyaluronic acid on my face at night and after it dries, I apply my Retinol. Skin texture is now smoother, and my brown age spots are fading!! I promise! Just be careful to test a little on your skin before you start using it. Some people have very sensitive skin.
I’ve been using this product for almost two weeks now and it makes me skin feel so good! My acne has looked a lot calmer since using this before my moisturizer too.

This has been a game changer for my dry skin... it’s so moisturizing! Can have a tacky feel after applying but I honestly love that because it makes me feel like all my other products will adhere to the skin.

I have extremely dry skin, with redness and flaking all winter. I wanted to try other hyaluronic treatments but they’re all so expensive. This worked within a week to totally transform my skin! I have never had skin like this in the middle of winter - no flakiness or dry patches anywhere. I feel like my skin has a better barrier and isn’t raw or inflamed, and in that sense I think it’s helped with acne too. Definitely worth a try if you have dry skin, especially at such a great price.
DO NOT USE if you have rosacea. I had a terrible flare-up after one day of use.  Red face, pimples, and flushing were so bad I had to go to the derm.

Love this product! The Ordinary did not miss the mark with this one! I’ve been using it on my face under my thick moisturizer of choice but more importantly I’ve been using it on my stretch marks post shower. I’ve noticed a decrease in visibility and I couldn’t be more thankful.
I love this product. My skin has never felt so good in my life. Keeps most of my acne away. I use only the ordinary now. Couldn’t be happier

What’s not to love? I went through the 1 oz size quickly and was glad to see the 2 oz option is there. Put this on as soon as you get out of the shower and then put a moisturizer right on top. I use it daily and won’t ever skip it. And with The Ordinary’s prices, I suspect I will continue to repurchase as long as it is available.
I’ve heard good things about “The Ordinary“ brand and I really wanted the Hyaluronic Acid to do amazing things for my skin but the product made my sensitive skin break out
review_title: Really wanted to like this product :((

review_text: I can’t tell you exactly what this does for me but I can’t go a day without it. I use every night and mix in my retinol or glycolic acid serum and apply after toner. I only notice a difference in my skin if I don’t use it and my skin looks dull without it. It’s a staple for me now. I have combo skin for reference.

this product broke me out so bad. I used it the first time just like a serum under my moisturizer for a 2 days in a row. It turned my skin red and broke me about real bad. I gave it a break for like 2 weeks and then mixed it in my moisturizer as I thought may be applying directly might not be the best. It still gave me red irritated skin and horrible whiteheads. NOT GONNA USE THIS EVER AGAIN!
It doesn’t really help with my dehydrated skin. :(

After using a different more pricier brand for about a year, I discovered this affordable gem. I’ve been loving how HA has made my oily to acne prone skin feel and it’s been the best addition during these dry winter months. It is sticky but it’s also easy to add to any moisturizer. I’ve given these as gifts to family and friends. Will continue to purchase.

This is a game changer! I had noticeable results the first time I used it. I had been using a different brand at the same price point for several months and felt it really didn’t do anything for my skin. I decided to try The Ordinary because I love their AHA peeling solution and I am hooked. My skin was noticeably softer and smoother after one use. My dry patches are gone. Highly recommend this!
review_title: softer smoother skin after one use!

review_text: my skin has never looked better i’m on my second bottle and i’ll for sure drive again
Awesome value for price. Great ingredient for moisturizing skin. Favourite staple in the winter months. Can’t go wrong for such a great product at such an affordable cost.

I have pretty oily skin So I need a lighter moisturizer typically, but when ever my skin is particularly drive this works like a charm. Sometimes it pills when i have a super bad dry patch. whenever I use this and go to bed with it on it leaves my skin very dewy and supple!

The solution has a very gel-ish feel to it, and doesn’t penetrate the skin well. I had to wait for 10+ mins for it to dry, and it was still sticky. After an hour, it starts to flake off, and almost looks like pilling on your skin. No matter what you put on top, sunscreen, moisturiser, foundation, this make it clump up. I tried everything to make sure it wasn’t my other products and it’s only when I didn’t put this on that the pilling stop.

I reaaally wanted to love this because some of my favorite products come from the Ordinary. My skin is on the combo/dry side and although this went on smoothly, it caused really bad breakouts for me. I generally never have breakouts, but I started to break out on my cheeks and forehead like CRAZY. Once I stopped using this, it cleared back up fairly quickly. Still bummed though,
Loved!! it’s part of my skin routine.  I washed my face, applied hyaluronic acid, moisturizer, primer and foundation.  The skin was perfect!! Looks so natural!! Super recommend ❤️
Purchasing my second bottle now, a little goes a long way! Love this product, My skin has improved a lot! This item is a must!
Does what it is expected to do, and for a great price! I have repurchased the larger bottle and have not had any issues so far.
Yea this stuff didn’t do crap toMy skin I am glad I only bought the small bottle and didn’t get the bigger one.
The product is a staple in my skin care routine. The perfect hyaluronic serum and the price even better

Will always be a part of my skincare routine! I have keratosis pilaris on my cheeks and this is the most effective product I’ve tried to completely smooth the texture of my skin. I also have sensitive skin and this did not bother it in the slightest. Highly recommend!

Helps my generally oily skin maintain a good balance in the winter, keeping it hydrated but not greasy and not dry (and then overcompensating!) it works well with my moisturizer and you can’t beat the price.

Fonctionne très très bien! Cela fait 3 mois que je l’utilise tous les jours. Seulement ne pas employer seul il n’est pas assez hydratant alors vaut mieux ajouter une crème mais pour améliorer les signes du vieillissement et la densité de la peau il est excellent!
review_title: Améliore la texture de la peau

review_text: Did not work for me, going back to La Roche Posay. I thought I would try this out. It arrived frozen. I messaged the company to ask if this would affect the product and got no reply. The first few days it dried immediately on my skin and burned my face red. Not sure if related to the thawing. I tried it a few more times and it still dries immediately and now also pills when I put on my cream. I rewashed my face and used my other brand and it didn’t happen. Not good.

I rarely write reviews but I’m doing it for this product. I apply it as part of my nighttime routine and occasionally in the am too. It is amazing! It gives me a hydrated and dewy look that I thought only microneedling could achieve. I’m 34 and my skin is starting to need some extra loving. If you’re the same, then definitely grab this. My face has never been softer!

I have been hearing from the two YouTubers I trust that this is good stuff for a while, and so I tried it, and it is! It’s a yucky texture, but once you rub it in, it isn’t yucky anymore, which is key. I feel like it has really helped my hydration, and I can use sort of a mediocre moisturizer with this and not become a desert overnight. I’m sure once I have a good moisturizer, I will see the benefits of this even more.

This is week 2 of using this product but the results of using HA 2% can be seen immediately! The skin looks and feels plump and is so moisturized in the dermal layer. I always use this after a moisturizing light toner water (Pyungkang Yul) and before my Marula oil and other moisturizers/spf! HA works by drawing in moisture to keep your skin moisturized so to be safe I always use products ON TOP of this product. You won’t regret how wonderful your skin looks and feels (I am in my mid-20’s with combination sensitive skin)

I have oily skin and was told I needed more moisture. So after trying a few different moisturizers and not having much luck, I was skeptical. I’ve been using this for less than a week at night and I can already tell a difference in my skin! My face feels baby smooth and the oiliness is practically gone! My skin also feels cleaner and more calm. This is going to be a permanent staple in my skin care routine.

Such a powerful product! I use 3 drops in the evening and in the morning if needed. This serum leaves my skin less irritated and super hydrated. It is a great addition to my skincare routine and isn’t full of unnecessary junk!

was excited to try this product, especially for winter season because it gets so dry here! I didn’t find this made any difference in my skin and if it wasn’t for my moisturizer, my skin would be a desert
this irritated my skin and made me break out. i’m not sure what i expected for $6. definitely was not worth it.

I have oily skin and was told that my skin was not holding in moisture. I started using this early last year and just purchased a new bottle last month and I have made this a must have in my skin care routine
This serum has a pretty tacky feel to it which I didn’t love. I think my skin is also a little sensitive to it. No rashes or breakouts, but my skin feels hot sometimes after use.

This product has to be a part of my arsenal forever! It’s best used with a delivery system aka moisturizer so that it is evenly distributed into your skin. My skin is all the better for using this product.

I swear by The Ordinary brand. I love to use this product at night and if has helped a lot with my dry skin. I recommend using it after any other product, because it will pill when something is applied on top of it if it isn’t completely dry.
Its very moisturizing and its rapidly absorved by my dry skin. It helps me a lot in the winter,  will surely purchase again.

Unfortunately my skin became sensitive to this. Dry and itchy rashes on my forehead and chin. For me hyaluronic acid works when mixed with other stuff. Bought the Buffet serum and my skin loves that stuff! This one is just not for me.
Excellent, no nonsense, affordable product. Keeps me moisturized so my face doesn’t become greasy.
A great moisturizing solution that absorbs well and doesn’t break out oily skin when used sparingly. One of my favorites from The Ordinary!
personally, i don’t see any difference of using or not using

As of right now. I am loving this! I def recommend this product. I have been waiting so long to get a chance to purchase this and I’m happy I did! I have dry skin and it makes my skin feel so soft after applying. It even shows me where my dry skin is. (It comes off on face)

I didn’t know I needed this so much! i read from an aesthetician that hyaluronic acid is so good for your skins hydration, so I originally bought it because during the winter my skin is on the drier side. however, it has given my overall appearance so much life. my skin looks hydrated and alive. I plan to continue using this even in the summer when I have oily skin. I now swear by this product and HA!!!
I love this hyaluronic acid great for my sensitive skin and a super great price!
The Ordinary has changed my life. My skin is so dry, and this moisturizes it to the point where I feel confident walking out of my house every day:) and it’s so reasonably priced!
review_title: Never going back to another product:)

review_text: I love the way this product hydrates and evens my texture - all while feeling weightless ! Recommend this highly, plus it’s super adorable !

I love this product.  The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid is wonderful for my skin.  I noticed a difference immediately.  I use it around my eyes, on the “frown lines“ of my forehead and on each side of my mouth.  The difference is amazing.

great price and a little goes a long way. feels a little tacky at first but once my gel moisturizer is on my skin feels smooth and hydrated. some of the comments mention pilling under makeup but I haven’t had any problems with that. would recommend.

This was my first product from this line and I’m so impressed. I mix a few drops of this with my night moisturizer and have noticed that my skin feels more hydrated than with the moisturizer alone. I have really dry skin (especially in winter) and will also rub a few drops between my palms and press onto my skin throughout the day for a little extra hydration. Can’t beat this, especially for the price.

Another winner from The Ordinary.  This serum keeps my skin plump and moist all day and I love that it’s packed with good nutrition for my skin.  The serum has no scent.  The texture is viscuous and a little slimy (like the Korean snail mucous serums) but that’s what seals the moisture in your skin.  I find it works best to apply my moisturizer immediately after the serum.  They kind of blend together to create the perfect moisture veil.  I would recommend 5-10 minutes before applying foundation when using this product.  I don’t wear foundation but when I apply tinted moisturizer I’ve never had a problem with pilling when I use this product.
review_title: Great product for plump youthful skin

review_text: leaves a sticky peel-like residue on my skin, doesn’t absorb like other serums and doesn’t produce any noticeable results even after a few weeks of use :( there’s tons of better serums by this company!

I am a fan of hyaluronic acid. I have used other brands, but this one is as good as any and much cheaper. I recommend using a moisturizer over it if you skin is dry or mature. Sometimes I just put foundation over this product. You need a layer over the H.A. to hold in the moisture, I think.

This was recommended to me by The Ordinary as part of my night time and day time routine. I absolutely love this product. I pair it niacinamide and the ordinary moisturizing factors with HA in the morning and no longer need to use primer. Make up stays all day. Skin feels completely hydrated
Like the product but it was spilt in the ziplock bag it came in. Thank goodness all of it wasnt lost.
I love this for daytime! Leaves my skin moist without being oily!!!Can’t wait to use this during our muggy Manhattan summer.
Helped to even my tone and fade spots. It’s a bit dry so don’t forget moisturizer and sunscreen. Took about a month to notice a big difference. I have oily skin.
White crusty residue... cannot be worn nicely during the day

This stuff is absolutely terrible! Within less than 5 minutes of putting it on my face, my skin became extremely dry! I tried it a few times just to give it a chance, but no! This stuff made my skin drier than it normally is. And it does not blend well with other lotions.

This stuff is a life savior! Especially in the cold winter months. My skin just sucks it up and looks so good after I use it. It can have a bit of a sticky consistency while waiting for it to absorb, but nothing major and feels fine after absorbed. I apply this with my hands and then rub the residue into my hands after and my hands have never felt so soft, so consistently. (I am a barista, so lots of bleach water and hand cracking in winter months. But not with this)This is a good, cheap, basic, moisturizing treatment that I recommend for everyone. It doesn’t sting like some acids and leaves your face so moisturized.
